original_en_text: Pilgrim<br>You are blessed to walk the foundations of Pharloom.<br>Humble yourself before the shells of those who gave their lives to hold our kingdom’s weight.
original_zh_text: 朝圣者<br>行走于纺络根基是你的殊荣。<br>在这些为王国献出生命者的躯壳前，应保持谦卑。
translated_text: 朝圣者<br>您很幸运能够在法鲁的地基上行走。<br>在那些为支撑我们王国的重量而献出生命的人们的尸体面前谦卑自己。
secondary_translated_text: pilgrims<br>You are lucky to be able to walk on the foundations of Faro.<br>Humble yourself before the bodies of those who gave their lives to support the weight of our kingdom.

original_en_text: <hpage>You are wrong, Lady...<hpage>I knew the wish, and the price to achieve it. And now, across these many ages, I have only come to know it better...<hpage>Strength... in mind, in care, in claw. Strength enough that I may live to see a world better than our own, or to craft a world as I desire. <hpage>That was the wish, of my mother, of my mentor, and of you...<page>...Indeed, spider... So much pain you must have passed to speak our hope so simply...<page>For her you become... who knows clear our desire, and has seen full the darkness beneath our house, I would show you the gift...
original_zh_text: <hpage>您错了，夫人……<hpage>我知道您寄望于我，也知道达成这期愿的代价。历经岁月后，如今的我的看法愈发透彻……<hpage>心志、仁念、爪牙——皆需刚强。强大到能让我亲眼见证美好世界之降临，强大到能助我亲手创造一个理想世界。<hpage>此乃生母、恩师与您的共期之愿……<page>……诚然，小蜘蛛……你一定历经了不可估量之苦痛，才得此彻悟……<page>既然你已经成长……明晰我们的期愿，也见识过我们家园下深藏的黑暗……我这便将礼物赠予你……
translated_text: <hpage>你错了，女士。<hpage>我知道这个愿望，也知道实现它的代价。现在，这么多年过去了，我对它有了更深入的了解。<hpage>力量...在我的心里，我关心，在我的爪子里。足够的力量，以便我能够活着看到一个比我们自己的世界更好的世界，或者创造一个我渴望的世界。<hpage>这是我的母亲，我的导师，也是你的愿望……<page>...确实，蜘蛛。你一定经历了这么多痛苦才如此简单地表达我们的希望。<page>为了她。你变得.他清楚地知道我们的愿望，看到了我们房子底下的黑暗，我会向你展示这份礼物。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>You are wrong, ma 'am.<hpage>I know this wish and the cost of realizing it. Now, after so many years, I have a deeper understanding of it.<hpage>Power... In my heart, I care, in my paws. Enough power so that I can live to see a world better than our own, or create a world that I desire.<hpage>This is my mother, my mentor, and your wish...<page>... Indeed, spider. You must have gone through so much pain to express our hope so simply.<page>For her. You become. He knows our wishes clearly and sees the darkness under our house, and I will show you this gift.

original_en_text: Coral sways,<br>Clear water flows,<br>Upon our river free of time.
original_zh_text: 珊瑚轻摇，<br>净水长流，<br>河流超脱时光之外。
translated_text: 珊瑚摇曳，<br>清水流淌，<br>在我们的河上，没有时间了。
secondary_translated_text: Coral swaying,<br>Clear water flows,<br>On our river, there is no time.

original_en_text: Witness, the first light. The only means we possess to resist that void with which our family is forever linked.<page>Reach forth, child grown strong. Wrest it from this remembrance. Burn yourself free from our sad fate...
original_zh_text: 来吧，见证这道最初的光芒。这是我们抵御虚空的唯一手段。而那虚空，却与我们的族群永世相连。<page>伸出手来，我的孩子，你已通过历练变得强大。在这忆境中夺取那光芒，焚尽我们悲惨宿命的枷锁……
translated_text: 见证，第一道光。我们必须抵制与我们的家庭永远相连的空虚的唯一手段。<page>当你长大后，你的孩子会变得更强大。从记忆中取出。将自己从悲伤的命运中解放出来。
secondary_translated_text: Witness, the first light. The only means we must resist the emptiness that is forever connected to our families.<page>When you grow up, your children will become stronger. Take it out of memory. Free yourself from your sad destiny.

original_en_text: ...Ignore them, daughter... their whispers...<page>...Greater, grander... Weaver, guardian, queen... Those are their desires... not your own. Certainly not mine...<page>...Only if you resist them, you might see it, another hope... beyond...<page>...But to recall these words, in time so far... Will you even remember me, child? Could you?...<page>...A mother... before the mask... before I lay forever in duty...
original_zh_text: ……莫听，女儿……她们的絮语……<page>……伟大……崇高……织者、守护者、女王……皆为他们所欲……非你所求，更非我所愿……<page>……唯有抵抗，方可见……另一线希望……<page>……但时过境迁，这些话……你可会记得？你可会记得我？...<page>……作为母亲，在戴上面甲之前……在因责任而永眠之前……
translated_text: ...别理他们女儿他们的低语。<page>...更大，更大。韦弗、守护者、女王……这些是他们的愿望。不是你自己的。当然不是我的。<page>...只有当你反抗他们时，你才能看到另一个希望……超越。<page>...但回顾这些话，到目前为止……你还记得我吗，儿子？你能...<page>...母亲戴口罩之前。在我永远承担责任之前
secondary_translated_text: ... Ignore their daughters and their whispers.<page>... Bigger, bigger. Weaver, the Guardian, the Queen... these are their wishes. Not your own. Of course not mine.<page>... Only when you resist them can you see another hope... beyond.<page>... But looking back at these words, so far... do you remember me, son? Can you...<page>... Before my mother put on a mask. Before I take responsibility forever

original_en_text: ...Show us your craft, child...<page>...Show it splendid, as only we can teach...<page>...Prove yourself more Weaver than Wyrm...
original_zh_text: ……展现你的技艺，孩子……<page>……展现那唯有我等能传授的绝技……<page>……证明自己更像织者，而非沃姆……
translated_text: ...孩子，向我们展示你的手艺..<page>...要精彩，因为只有我们才能教。<page>...证明你更像韦弗而不是魔鬼……
secondary_translated_text: ... Boy, show us your craft..<page>... Be wonderful, because only we can teach.<page>... Prove that you're more like Weaver than the devil...

original_en_text: At water’s source,<br>And coral’s heart,<br>Our lord born last to rule.
original_zh_text: 水源尽头，<br>珊瑚心核，<br>末生之主将临。
translated_text: 在水源地，<br>珊瑚心，<br>我们的主最后生来就是为了统治。
secondary_translated_text: At the water source,<br>Coral Heart,<br>Our Lord was last born to rule.

original_en_text: ...She called us daughters... Called us divine... She lied...
original_zh_text: ……她称我们为女儿……称我们为天选……皆是谎言……
translated_text: ...她叫我们女儿……称我们为神圣。她撒了谎。
secondary_translated_text: ... She called us daughters... called us holy. She lied.

original_en_text: ...Alas... spider’s child...<page>...For our ways you will think us harsh... You will think us uncaring, unrepentant...<page>...And so we must seem, for such is the cost of our wish...
original_zh_text: ……唉……蜘蛛之子……<page>……你必定认为我等冷酷……认为我等无情且固执……<page>……但我等必须如此，此为实现期愿之代价……
translated_text: ...唉...蜘蛛的孩子。<page>...你觉得我们对方法很严格。你会认为我们漠不关心，不知悔改。<page>...所以我们必须看看，因为这是我们愿望的代价……
secondary_translated_text: ... Alas... Spider children.<page>... You think we're strict with our methods. You would think we were indifferent and unrepentant.<page>... So we have to see, because this is the price of our wishes...

original_en_text: ...She called us daughters... She called us divine...
original_zh_text: ……她称我们为女儿……称我们为天选……
translated_text: ...她叫我们女儿……她称我们为神圣。
secondary_translated_text: ... She called us daughters... She called us holy.

original_en_text: ...We are life... We are growth... What world without us?...
original_zh_text: ……我等即生命……我等即生长……无我则世如荒土……
translated_text: ...我们就是生命。我们在成长。没有我们什么世界？
secondary_translated_text: ... We are life. We are growing. What world without us?

translated_text: ...来吧，孩子们，见证我们的觉醒……

original_en_text: ...Good... Better...<page>...Yet still you will need to be faster...<page>...In time, they will come for you... Those who fear your nature, and those seeking to claim it...<page>...To survive our world, you must learn to sting... swift and sudden...
original_zh_text: ……尚可……精进……<page>……你仍需更快一些……<page>……终有一日，畏惧你本性者将至……欲夺你本性者将至……<page>……欲存于世，须学蛰刺……快如闪电……
translated_text: ...好吧...更好...<page>...然而，你仍然需要更快。<page>...假以时日，他们会来找你。那些害怕你本性的人，以及那些试图声称你本性的人……<page>...为了在我们的世界中生存，你必须学会蜇人。快速而突然。
secondary_translated_text: ... Okay... Better...<page>... However, you still need to be faster.<page>... In time, they will come to you. Those who are afraid of your nature, and those who try to claim your nature...<page>... In order to survive in our world, you must learn to sting. Fast and sudden.

original_en_text: ...Our claws to crush... Our claws to rule... Our claws to save them all...
original_zh_text: ……以爪粉碎……以爪统治……以爪拯救众生……
translated_text: ...我们的爪子要被打碎了……我们的爪子统治.我们的爪子拯救了他们。
secondary_translated_text: ... Our claws are about to be shattered... our claws rule. Our claws saved them.

original_en_text: ...To dance... And love... And end... Together...
secondary_translated_text: ... dancing. And love and end. Together...

original_en_text: Pilgrim<br>May these fields of flame sear away all impurity.<br> That you be granted ascendance to the verdant lands above.
original_zh_text: 朝圣者<br>愿这烈焰原野焚尽一切污秽。<br>赐你升入苍翠之地的权利。
translated_text: 朝圣者<br>愿这片火田焚烧一切不洁之物。<br>你被授予在上面的绿地上降落的权利。
secondary_translated_text: pilgrims<br>May this firefield burn all unclean things.<br>You are granted the right to land on the green space above.

original_en_text: ...Better a child spun mad... than none...
original_zh_text: ……宁要癫狂之子……也好过膝下无子……
translated_text: ...孩子疯了就好了……总比什么都没有。
secondary_translated_text: ... It would be better if the child was crazy... It's better than nothing.

translated_text: ...蜘蛛姐妹。我们的歌还在继续。

original_en_text: ...Better a child spun frail... than none...
original_zh_text: ……宁要脆弱之子……也好过膝下无子……
translated_text: ...不如做个弱孩子……总比什么都没有。
secondary_translated_text: ... It's better to be a weak child... it's better than having nothing at all.

original_en_text: ...Better a child spun pure... than them...
secondary_translated_text: ... Pure children are better. than they

original_en_text: ...For her light... eternal... our song sustains...
translated_text: ...为了她的光芒。永恒的。我们的歌还在继续。
secondary_translated_text: ... For her light. Eternal. Our song continues.

original_en_text: We speak the wish of the Master Herald,<br>he who signs an Age’s end.<br><page>Under chapel fallen to the monarch’s might,<br>Over camp collapsed to the black thread plight,<page>Scorched field on edge, shells black and burned,<br>Up towers spinning, near the surgeon spurned,<page>Cage of one who raged against the silken lie,<br>Fell heart of frost, who soars on high,<page>Past cradle’s peak, last test of fitness,<br>That the age may pass, this shroom its witness.
original_zh_text: 此乃使者大人祈愿，<br>宣告纪元终结到来。<page>圣堂倾颓君威下，<br>骸营覆灭黑丝劫。<page>焦土边际髓骨灼，<br>纺塔孤医灰沼别。<page>囚笼首罪逆丝客，<br>霜心振翼费岳阙。 <page>摇篮极顶终试炼，<br>菌主临鉴纪元歇。
translated_text: 我们表达先驱大师的愿望，<br>签署时代终结的人。<br><page>在君主的权力落入教会手中后，<br>营地陷入了黑线困境，<page>焦土边缘，贝壳黑色燃烧，<br>塔楼旋转，附近的外科医生被拒绝，<page>一个笼子里躺着一个人对丝绸生气，<br>从霜心坠落，翱翔在高处，<page>经过摇篮的顶峰，最后的身体测试，<br>愿时光流逝，这就是它的见证。
secondary_translated_text: We express the wishes of the pioneer masters,<br>The man who signed the end of the age.<br><page>After the monarch's power fell into the hands of the Church,<br>The camp was in a black line dilemma,<page>On the edge of the scorched earth, the shells burned black,<br>The tower rotated, nearby surgeons were turned down,<page>A man lying in a cage was angry at silk,<br>Falling from the heart of the frost, soaring high,<page>After the peak of the cradle and the final physical test,<br>May time pass by, this is its testimony.

original_en_text: ...How we hunted... How we sang... My children, I saw you glorious...
original_zh_text: ……昔日狩猎……昔日咏唱……我的孩子，我曾见你们辉煌……
translated_text: ...我们如何狩猎。我们如何唱歌。我的孩子们，我看到你们很荣幸……
secondary_translated_text: ... How we hunt. How we sing. My children, I am honored to see you...

original_en_text: ...From our Silk... A child born loyal...
translated_text: ...来自我们的丝绸。一个生来忠诚的孩子。
secondary_translated_text: ... From our silk. A child born loyal.

original_en_text: <hpage>So, the Herald visits this land too...<hpage>If he is here, now, then great change or a savage end is inevitable. He would care to see nothing else...
original_zh_text: <hpage>使者竟也踏足此地……<hpage>若他在此现身，巨变或浩劫将无可避免。除此之外，他目空一切……
translated_text: <hpage>所以，《先驱报》也参观了这片土地……<hpage>如果他现在在这里，那么巨大的变化或野蛮的结局是不可避免的。他不想看到其他的东西……
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>So, the Herald also visited this land...<hpage>If he were here now, then huge changes or barbaric endings were inevitable. He didn't want to see anything else...

original_en_text: Ah... I understand, stranger. I presume too much of one who is not a flea.<page>I’ve heard the settlement below us is setting up a wishwall. Perhaps I’ll send Grishkin down to hang up our wish...<page>
original_zh_text: 唉……我明白。对外族提这种要求太过分了。<page>听说下面营地建了祈愿墙，我让格里什琴去挂上我们的愿望吧……
translated_text: 啊...我明白了，陌生人。我对一个不是跳蚤的人有太多的看法。<page>我听说我们下面的定居点正在建造一堵愿望墙。也许我应该派格里什金挂起我们的愿望……<page>
secondary_translated_text: Ah... I see, stranger. I have too many opinions about a person who is not a flea.<page>I heard that a wall of wishes is being built in the settlement below us. Maybe I should send Grishkin to hang up our wishes...<page>

original_en_text: Bug not flea, my learnings, all have been scratched to your maps. Can give no more.<page>Leave now! Seek and save lost fleas, for a caravan full and whole!
original_zh_text: 外族虫，位置都标在你图上了。没其他的了。<page>快去吧！找到那些迷途跳蚤，凑满旅团！
translated_text: 蠕虫不是跳蚤，我的教训已经画在你的地图上了。没有更多.<page>现在离开！寻找并拯救丢失的跳蚤并建造一个完整的商队！
secondary_translated_text: Worms are not fleas, and my lesson has been drawn on your map. no more.<page>Leave now! Find and save lost fleas and build a complete caravan!

original_en_text: Have you met her yet? Our burly new companion, Vog! Fresh returned from a long time spent tracking.<hpage>We have met, Fleamaster. It gladdens me that so strong a flea exists as her.<hpage>Yours was a caravan sorely lacking for protection, and I am too bound by my own tasks to provide it for you.<page>Why, we would never impose so! And now, no matter! Her scent may be strong, and her taste for brew bottomless, but her skill is sharp.<page>If predators draw close, her talents will provide much confidence to our caravan.
original_zh_text: 见过我们的新成员沃葛了吗？她的追踪术很是了得！<hpage>见过了。有这般强力的跳蚤存在，我也轻松一些。<hpage>毕竟你们旅团缺少护卫，而我又有要务在身。<page>怎么敢劳烦您！放心吧，虽然沃葛经常臭烘烘的，又嗜酒，但本事过硬。<page>如果有掠食者靠近，她的本领能安大伙的心。
translated_text: 你见过她吗？我们魁梧的新合作伙伴《Vogue》！辛从漫长的追踪中回来了。<hpage>我们见过了，Freymasters。我很高兴有一只像她一样强壮的跳蚤。<hpage>你的车队严重缺乏保护。我受到使命的限制，无法为你提供保护。<page>为什么，我们永远不会强加这样的东西！现在，没关系了！她的气味可能很浓烈，对啤酒的品味深不可测，但她的技巧却很敏锐。<page>如果捕食者靠近，她的才华会给我们的车队带来很大的信心。
secondary_translated_text: Have you seen her? Our burly new partner, Vogue! Xin returned from a long pursuit.<hpage>We have met, Freymasters. I am so happy to have a flea as strong as her.<hpage>Your motorcade is seriously unprotected. I am limited by my mission and cannot protect you.<page>Why, we would never impose something like this! Now, it doesn't matter! Her smell may be strong and her taste in beer is unfathomable, but her skills are sharp.<page>If the Predator gets close, her talent will give our team a lot of confidence.

original_en_text: You remain, bug not flea? Would you seek service of me, ehh? Mine is knowledge much, the places of the lost little ones, heard and smelt across the caves.<page>You could help find! And bring! For all to come together now that times turn dark...<page>But no map you hold! If learnings are wanted, a map must be owned. Until then, we have no trade to make.
original_zh_text: 你还在啊，外族虫？要我帮忙吗？我知道那些迷途小辈的踪迹，各处洞穴都有。<page>你来寻找！把它们带来！最好齐聚于此，全体跳蚤……趁黑暗未临......<page>但你没有地图！想要情报，先准备地图。在此之前无可奉告。
translated_text: 你留下来，昆虫不是跳蚤吗？你会要求我的服务吗，嗯？我有很多知识，山洞里听到和闻到丢失的小东西的地方。<page>你可以帮忙找到它！拿过来如今时过境迁，大家团结一致。<page>但你没有地图！如果你想学习，你必须有一张地图。在那之前，我们没有生意可做。
secondary_translated_text: If you stay, aren't insects fleas? Would you ask for my services, huh? I have a lot of knowledge about places in caves where I hear and smell lost little things.<page>You can help find it! Take it here. Now that times have changed, we are united.<page>But you don't have a map! If you want to learn, you must have a map. Before that, we had no business to do.

original_en_text: Our travels have end, and now soon the world will also have end! At such bitter of times, brew with friends is most sweet.
original_zh_text: 旅途结束，世界也要完蛋了！这种苦涩的时候，跟朋友一起喝药酿最甜。
translated_text: 我们的旅程结束了，现在世界即将结束！在这样的苦日子里，和朋友一起酿造是最甜蜜的。
secondary_translated_text: Our journey is over, and now the world is coming to an end! In these tough days, brewing with friends is the sweetest thing.

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings again, sir flea. I see you were able to unite safely with this caravan.<page>Oh yes! All thanks to you! Dear, sweet you! Heh heh!<page>The Fleamaster, that old bore, tells me to call you Miss Hornet. But such a prickly name ill befits such a delicate beauty! Shall I call you something prettier, like ‘Nectarsweet’, my dear?<hpage>You shall not. Address me by my name or not at all.<page>Gradak! Of course. Of course! Heh heh. And now, I shall let you in on my little secret. My carriage doubles as a soothing spa, you see. It’s most ingenious.<page>The water inside is piping hot, and purer than a psalm! Heh heh! I’d gladly let you soak inside, for a modest fee!
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了，跳蚤先生。看来你顺利加入旅团了。<page>是啊！全托你的福！亲爱的小甜心！嘿嘿！<page>跳蚤首领那老古板让我称呼你为大黄蜂小姐。但这带刺的名字配不上娇花！叫你"蜜糖甜心"如何？<hpage>当然不行。要么称呼我的本名，要么闭嘴。<page>咳！是是是！嘿嘿，透露个小秘密——其实我的车厢兼作温泉疗愈所！<page>水温滚烫，而且比圣诗还纯净！付点小钱就能泡个痛快！
translated_text: <hpage>再次问候，跳蚤先生。我看你可以安全地与这支车队会合。<page>哦，是的！感谢您发送编修。亲爱的，亲爱的你！呵呵！<page>跳蚤王那个无聊的老家伙让我叫你大黄蜂小姐但是这么刺人的名字，不适合这么漂亮的人！亲爱的，我应该给你起一个更漂亮的名字吗？<hpage>你不应该。直接叫我的名字，或者根本不叫我。<page>格拉达克，当然，当然！呵呵，现在，我想告诉你我的小秘密。你看，我的马车兼作舒缓的水疗中心。这是最聪明的。<page>里面的水滚烫，比诗还纯净！呵呵！我很乐意让你泡进去，不贵！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Greetings again, Mr. Flea. I think you can safely join this convoy.<page>Oh, yes! Thank you for sending the review. Dear, dear you! Hehe!<page>That boring old fellow Flea King asked me to call you Miss Bumblebee, but such a prickly name is not suitable for such a beautiful person! Honey, should I give you a more beautiful name?<hpage>You shouldn't. Just call me by my name, or not at all.<page>Gladak, of course, of course! Hehe, now, I want to tell you my little secret. You see, my carriage doubles as a soothing spa. This is the smartest.<page>The water inside is boiling hot, purer than poetry! Hehe! I'd be happy to let you soak in it, it's not expensive!

original_en_text: Dear one, how shameful for the world to end while poor Kratt still has so much living left in him!<page>But how sweet of you to join me here! Will you play the Flea Bounce game, that I may appreciate the beauty of your agile form while I await my doom?<page>To play is simple. Leap up and keep bouncing on the fleas who fly past for as long as you are able!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的，可惜末日来得太早，可怜的克拉特还没活够呢！<page>但有甜心你在就好！要玩这跳蚤蹦蹦的游戏吗？我想欣赏你美丽灵巧的身姿呢！<page>规则很简单，跳起来踩飞过的跳蚤，持续越久越好！
translated_text: 亲爱的人，当可怜的克拉特留下这么多生命时，世界末日是多么耻辱啊！<page>但你能加入我真是太好了！你能玩跳蚤弹跳吗？这样我就可以欣赏你敏捷的形态，而等待坏运气？<page>玩起来很容易。跳起来，跳在跳蚤上尽可能长的时间！
secondary_translated_text: Dear one, what a shame the end of the world was when poor Clutter left so many lives behind!<page>But it's so great that you can join me! Can you play flea bounce? So I can appreciate your agile form and wait for bad luck?<page>It's easy to play. Jump up and jump on the fleas for as long as possible!

original_en_text: Strange beasts prowl these grey lands. I hear them roar and shriek outside camp. Is best to stay inside and make quiet.
original_zh_text: 这片灰地时常能听见怪物吼叫，最好待在营地里别出声。
translated_text: 奇怪的野兽徘徊在这些灰色的土地上。我听到他们在营地外咆哮和尖叫。最好呆在室内保持安静。
secondary_translated_text: Strange beasts lingered in these gray lands. I heard them roaring and screaming outside the camp. It is best to stay indoors and remain quiet.

original_en_text: At longest last, have our flea roamings ended! Every sandy grain and stinky squelchy maggot was worth to endure, to claim such a home!<page>Is time for rest and celebrate, and none have earned such more than you, Miss Hornet! Raise your flask and drink most heartily with us!
original_zh_text: 终于不用流浪了！这一路上吃沙喝风忍蛆虫都值了！<page>是时候庆祝了！大黄蜂小姐，和我们一起举杯吧！
translated_text: 终于，我们的跳蚤漫游结束了！每一粒砾石和每一只发出恶臭的吱吱声的蛆虫都值得忍受，并且拥有这样的家！<page>是时候休息和庆祝了，没有人比你赚的钱更多了，大黄蜂小姐！举起你的瓶子和我们一起喝吧！
secondary_translated_text: Finally, our flea roaming is over! Every grain of gravel and every fetid squeaking maggot is worth putting up with, and a home like this!<page>It's time to rest and celebrate, no one makes more money than you, Miss Bumblebee! Raise your bottle and drink with us!

original_en_text: We will camp here in these grey lands until more fleas find their way to the caravan. Please lend your aid to any of our fellows you find lost out on the roads!
original_zh_text: 我们会在这灰地扎营，直到更多同胞归队。请继续帮助寻找迷途的跳蚤！
translated_text: 我们将在这些灰色的土地上扎营，直到更多的跳蚤找到大篷车。请为路上迷路的同胞提供帮助！
secondary_translated_text: We will camp in these gray lands until more fleas find the caravan. Please provide help to compatriots who are lost on the road!

original_en_text: <hpage>I am travelling these lands for my own reasons, Fleamaster. However, if I happen upon any fleas on my travels, I will aid them as best I can.<page>Oh, oh, I could ask for nothing more! They must all be hiding or stuck in dangerous places, but if you rouse them they are sure to find their way here to us.<page>May the kingdom bless your travels and keep you safe, stranger! You are welcome to rest here with us whenever the roads bring you back!
original_zh_text: <hpage>我的旅途有自己的目的，但若路遇跳蚤，会尽力相助。<page>那就足够了！他们肯定是困在各处险地，只要脱困就会自己寻路归来。<page>愿王国庇佑您旅途平安！也随时欢迎您回来歇息！
translated_text: <hpage>Freimaster，我在这些土地上旅行是出于我自己的原因。然而，如果我在旅行中遇到跳蚤，我会尽一切努力帮助它们。<page>哦，哦，我不能再要求什么了！他们一定都躲在或被困在危险的地方，但如果你叫醒他们，他们一定会找到我们的路。<page>愿王国保佑你的旅程，保佑你的安全，陌生人！每当道路带您回来时，欢迎您和我们一起在这里休息！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Freimaster, I travel in these lands for my own reasons. However, if I encounter fleas while traveling, I will do everything I can to help them.<page>Oh, Oh, I can't ask for anything more! They must all be hiding or trapped in dangerous places, but if you wake them up, they will definitely find our way.<page>May the kingdom bless your journey and bless your safety, stranger! Whenever the road brings you back, you are welcome to rest here with us!

original_en_text: The journey here was long, but we didn’t lose a single flea! I’m told it’s good luck to bring a guest along when travelling, so we must have you to thank!<page>I trust the trip was agreeable for you. A pleasure perhaps? Nestled in with our dear little ones...<hpage>They certainly make for energetic travel companions. I’ve not often had opportunity to socialise with such spirited sorts.<page>Splendid! And now, you must go and see Grishkin, sitting there by the bubbling cauldron. After long travel, we drink to revive our spirits!
original_zh_text: 这趟旅途虽长，但没丢一只跳蚤！听说带贵客同行能带来好运，肯定是您的功劳！<page>旅途可还舒适？和小家伙们挤在一起挺开心吧？<hpage>他们确实精力旺盛，我很少和这么活泼的旅伴打交道。<page>那就好！现在去找格里什琴吧，她在冒泡的大锅旁。长途劳顿后该喝点提神！
translated_text: 来到这里是一段漫长的旅程，但我们没有失去一只跳蚤！听说旅行时带着客人会带来好运，所以我们一定要感谢您！<page>我相信这次旅行会让您感到愉快。也许很有趣？和我们亲爱的小家伙们依偎在一起。<hpage>它们确实适合精力充沛的旅伴。我很少有机会和这么活泼的人交往。<page>太好了！现在，你必须去看看格里什金，他坐在沸腾的大锅旁边。长途旅行后，我们喝酒提神！
secondary_translated_text: It's been a long journey here, but we didn't lose a flea! I heard that bringing guests while traveling brings good luck, so we must thank you!<page>I am sure this trip will make you happy. Maybe it's fun? Snuggle with our dear little ones.<hpage>They are really suitable for energetic traveling companions. I rarely have the opportunity to associate with such lively people.<page>Great! Now, you must go and see Grishkin, who is sitting next to the boiling cauldron. After a long trip, we drank to refresh ourselves!

original_en_text: Miss Hornet, your bottle is full of Flea Brew. You know what such means! You must have drink! Har har!<page>When you have finish drinking, return and we will fill flask again! I’m is always brewing!
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐，你身上的药酿还满着呢，得先喝光！<page>喝完了就回来找我！我这儿药酿管够！
translated_text: 大黄蜂小姐，你的瓶子里装满了跳蚤啤酒。你知道这意味着什么！你一定要喝！哈哈！<page>喝完后，回来，我们会再次加满！我一直在计划！
secondary_translated_text: Miss Bumblebee, your bottle is full of flea beer. You know what this means! You must drink it! Haha!<page>After drinking it, come back and we will fill it up again! I've been planning!

original_en_text: My fellows give much worry for the other fleas, but I’m not give at all. They will find their way to us, and if not, who keep count of them anyway? Har har!
original_zh_text: 大伙总爱担心那些迷途的同胞，我才不愁！该来的自会找来，没来谁又数得清？哈哈！
translated_text: 我的同伴们担心其他跳蚤，但我一点也不担心。他们会找到我们的路，如果没有，谁会记得他们呢？哈哈！
secondary_translated_text: My companions were worried about other fleas, but I wasn't worried at all. They will find our way, and if not, who will remember them? Haha!

original_en_text: Ahh, and before the road steals you away from us again, allow me to offer you a humble gift!<page>One of the little ones found a pale artefact while digging about in the sands. A spiny, cold sort of thing.<page>I see no use in it for we fleas, so of course we are all too pleased, eager even, to bestow it upon our dear friend!
original_zh_text: 趁您还没走，请收下这份薄礼！<page>有个小家伙在沙地里挖到件苍白古物，冷冰冰带尖刺。<page>对我们没用，正好赠予挚友！
translated_text: 啊，在这条路再次带你离开我们之前，请允许我送给你一份卑微的礼物！<page>其中一个小家伙在挖掘沙子时发现了一件苍白的文物。一个多刺、冰冷的东西。<page>我认为它对我们跳蚤来说没有任何用处，所以我们当然很高兴，甚至渴望把它送给我们亲爱的朋友们！
secondary_translated_text: Ah, before this road takes you away from us again, please allow me to give you a humble gift!<page>One of the little guys discovered a pale artifact while digging in the sand. A prickly, cold thing.<page>I don't think it will be of any use to us fleas, so of course we are happy and even eager to give it to our dear friends!

original_en_text: For your hard efforts and eternal friendship, please accept these meagre rosaries as reward.<page>Think of we fleas when you find chance to trade them!
original_zh_text: 为了酬谢您的辛劳，请收下这些念珠。<page>旅途上别忘了我们跳蚤，朋友！
translated_text: 为了您的辛勤工作和永恒的友谊，请接受这些微薄的念珠作为奖励。<page>当您有机会交易跳蚤时，请想想我们跳蚤！
secondary_translated_text: For your hard work and eternal friendship, please accept these meager rosary beads as a reward.<page>When you have the opportunity to trade fleas, think of us fleas!

original_en_text: Dear one, my lone light amongst the darkness! Will you bathe in Kratt’s spa-carriage and let the warm waters wash away your worries?
original_zh_text: 亲爱的！黑暗中的明灯！可愿光临克拉特的温泉车厢，让暖流洗去烦忧？
translated_text: 亲爱的人，黑暗中我孤独的光芒！您想在Clutter的水疗车里洗澡，让温水冲走您的烦恼吗？
secondary_translated_text: Dear one, my lonely light in the darkness! Do you want to take a bath in Clutter's spa cart and let warm water wash away your worries?

original_en_text: Please, my dear, step inside! I will stand guard here while you bathe... Right on this very spot!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的，请进吧！我就在这为你站岗……寸步不离！
translated_text: 亲爱的，请进来！你洗澡的时候，我在这里站岗……就在这里！
secondary_translated_text: Dear, please come in! I'll stand guard here while you're taking a shower... Right here!

original_en_text: Dodeshna. Want for shelter from the thick, grey air? Is heavy, and wet. I’m worry for the little flea’s health in this land.<page>And they make play in the filthy water. I say them stop, but they just laugh and splash on me. They are lack respect!<hpage>Most bugs instinctively obey those with strength and will. Speak with authority, or your commands may go unheeded.<page>Ugh... really, is Fleamaster’s job to teach the fleas such. I will just have rest here until is time to move on.
original_zh_text: 多德什纳。要来避一避吗？这的空气又闷又湿，小跳蚤们要生病了。<page>他们还玩脏水，说了也不听，反而溅我一身！没大没小！<hpage>虫类大多听从强者，你得用权威口吻。<page>唉……这本是首领该做的。我还是好好休息等旅团出发吧。
translated_text: 多德什纳。想避开厚厚的灰色空气吗？又重又湿。我担心这片土地上小跳蚤的健康。<page>他们在脏水里玩耍。我叫他们停下来，但他们只是笑了，还给我泼水。他们缺乏尊重！<hpage>大多数昆虫本能地服从那些有力量和意志的人。与权威交谈，否则您的命令可能会被忽视。<page>呃...事实上，Fleamaster的工作就是教跳蚤。我就在这里休息，直到该继续前进了。
secondary_translated_text: Dodeshner. Want to avoid the thick gray air? Heavy and wet. I am worried about the health of the little fleas in this land.<page>They were playing in dirty water. I told them to stop, but they just laughed and splashed water on me. They lack respect!<hpage>Most insects instinctively obey those with power and will. Talk to authorities, otherwise your orders may be ignored.<page>Uh... In fact, Fleamaster's job is to teach fleas. I'll rest here until it's time to move on.

original_en_text: Away then, bug. Await challenger, shall I.
original_zh_text: 那就走吧。我会等下一个挑战者。
translated_text: 那就走开吧，虫子。等待挑战者。
secondary_translated_text: Then go away, bug. Wait for the challenger.

original_en_text: Vikna! Our little game has ended. But I trust, after a short rest, you will play with us again?
original_zh_text: 维克纳！游戏结束。不过你应该还没尽全力吧，休息会儿再战？
translated_text: 维克纳！我们的小游戏结束了。但我相信短暂休息后，你会再次和我们一起玩吗？
secondary_translated_text: Vickner! Our Mini games are over. But I believe after a short break, will you play with us again?

original_en_text: Ahh! Do I understand you rightly, stranger? You will help gather the lonely fleas to our caravan? Truly?
original_zh_text: 啊！我没听错吧？您愿意帮忙召集流落各处的跳蚤？当真？
translated_text: 啊！陌生人，我明白你的意思吗？你愿意帮助将孤独的跳蚤收集到我们的大篷车中吗？真的吗？
secondary_translated_text: Ah! Stranger, do I understand what you mean? Would you like to help collect lonely fleas into our caravan? Really?

original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐！跳蚤的救星！我们等候您很久了！<page>看看这块宝地！远离外面的危险，跳蚤们肯定能在这茁壮成长！<page>这里就是我们旅团的终点站了，纺络再找不到比这更好的归宿了！<hpage>合你们的心意就好。能有这么多跳蚤幸存，我也感到高兴。其他虫类大多没那么幸运。<page>没错！未来充满希望，这全仰赖您的帮助。为纪念乔迁之喜，请收下这份纪念品。<page>我最近学了缝纫，小家伙们也帮我收集材料。想给你的工具袋加个口袋，让旅途轻松些。<page>区区薄礼不足挂齿，希望您别失望！
translated_text: 大黄蜂小姐！我们的救世主！我们多么希望您能来访。<page>看看吧！除了附近土地的黑暗和死亡之外，您给我们的这个美丽的地方是安全的。跳蚤变得聪明和强壮的地方。<page>我们将在这里结束我们的旅行，因为法鲁姆没有更好的定居地点了。<hpage>我很高兴地点是对的，跳蚤大师。知道这些跳蚤能存活下来是一件平静的事。大多数的法鲁昆虫似乎注定要面临更悲惨的命运。<page>确实如此！充满希望的未来正在等待！只是因为你自己和你的努力。为了纪念我们的到来，我很高兴为您提供一项小型服务。<page>我一直在学习缝纫，小跳蚤一直在为我收集材料。我想我可以在你的工具包里多加一个口袋，让你的旅行更轻松一些。<page>一个小忙，比你应得的要少得多，但我仍然希望它让你满意！
secondary_translated_text: Miss Bumblebee! Our savior! How we wish you could visit.<page>Check it out! Except for the darkness and death of the nearby land, this beautiful place you have given us is safe. A place where fleas become smart and strong.<page>We will end our trip here because there is no better place to settle in Faroum.<hpage>I'm glad the place is right, flea master. It's a peaceful matter to know that these fleas can survive. Most Faro insects seem destined to face a more tragic fate.<page>Indeed! A promising future is waiting! Just because of yourself and your efforts. In honor of our arrival, I am pleased to provide you with a small service.<page>I have been learning to sew, and little fleas have been collecting materials for me. I think I can add an extra pocket to your kit to make your travel easier.<page>A small favor, much less than you deserve, but I still hope it satisfies you!

original_en_text: <hpage>I know not what you plan, Fleamaster, and at this time I cannot participate.<page>Ahhhh. Ahhhhhhh! Wretches, wretches, all of us! How can we begin without you, dear friend?
original_zh_text: <hpage>我不知您作何打算，跳蚤首领，但此刻我无法参与庆典。<page>啊啊啊！可惜啊，这太令我们难过了！没有您这位挚友，庆典如何开始？
translated_text: <hpage>我不知道你的计划，Freymasters，而且我现在无法参与。<page>啊啊！可怜的东西，可怜的东西，我们所有人！亲爱的朋友，没有你我们怎么开始呢？
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I don't know what your plan is, Freymasters, and I can't participate now.<page>Ahhhh! Poor thing, poor thing, all of us! Dear friends, how could we start without you?

original_en_text: Gathered here we are, to honour the grand champion of this very final of all festivals!<page>Now, Miss Hornet! Strike the great effigy with all your might!
original_zh_text: 我们相聚于此，为这末日庆典的总冠军加冕！<page>大黄蜂小姐，现在请全力击打巨像！
translated_text: 我们聚集在这里，向所有节日的最后一个冠军致敬！<page>现在，大黄蜂小姐！全力以赴，击打伟大的雕像！
secondary_translated_text: We are gathered here to pay tribute to the last champion of all festivals!<page>Now, Miss Bumblebee! Go all out and hit the great statue!

original_en_text: The little fleas like this place most of all. They are as much happy as I ever hear them!
original_zh_text: 小家伙们非常喜欢这地方！我从没听他们这么欢腾过！
translated_text: 小跳蚤最喜欢这个地方了。我从来没有听过他们这么高兴！
secondary_translated_text: Little flea likes this place best. I have never heard them so happy!

original_en_text: Oh, dear friend, Miss Hornet, look at our marvellous troupe! Their numbers full. Their spirits bright. All thanks to your heroic efforts!
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐快看，我们壮盛的队伍！跳蚤们无一遗漏，个个精神饱满，全仰赖您的英勇相助！
translated_text: 哦，亲爱的朋友，大黄蜂小姐，看看我们令人惊叹的剧团！他们的人数已经满了。他们的精神是光明的。这都归功于你们的英勇努力！
secondary_translated_text: Oh, dear friend, Miss Bumblebee, look at our amazing troupe! Their numbers are already full. Their spirit is bright. This is all due to your heroic efforts!

original_en_text: Another journey complete! And a new, high spot for our rest, upon the doorstep of that mighty Citadel, no less!<hpage>It is fortunate that all of your companions survived the trek, Fleamaster. The howling rise beside, and the tangled wood before it, have both claimed the lives of countless bugs.<page>Indeed! A perilous ascent! Maybe it was your company that brought us luck, Miss Hornet? It surely put us fleas at ease to have you and your weapon riding close.
original_zh_text: 又一趟旅程结束了！这次竟然停在了圣堡门廊这样的高处！<hpage>你们能平安抵达这里实属万幸。旁边的峭壁和前边的丛林都葬送过无数旅行者。<page>确实凶险！或许是您带来的好运？有您持械护卫，大伙安心不少。
translated_text: 旅程再次完成！这是我们休息的新高地，就在那座强大城堡的门口！<hpage>幸运的是，你所有的同伴都在漫长的旅程中幸存下来，弗赖马斯特。旁边的嚎叫和面前的纠结木头夺走了无数昆虫的生命。<page>确实如此！危险上升！也许你的公司给我们带来了好运，大黄蜂小姐？让你和你的武器靠近一定会让我们跳蚤放心。
secondary_translated_text: The journey is complete again! This is the new highland where we rest, right at the doorstep of that powerful castle!<hpage>Fortunately, all your companions survived the long journey, Freimaster. The howling next to him and the tangled wood in front of him claimed the lives of countless insects.<page>Indeed! Danger rises! Maybe your company has brought us good luck, Miss Bumblebee? Letting you and your weapon close will surely reassure us.

original_en_text: Oh, and look, Miss Hornet, look at how many lost fleas have come! It seems even the last few stragglers are now with us.
original_zh_text: 噢对了，大黄蜂小姐快看！如此多的跳蚤同胞，连最后几个掉队的都回来了！
translated_text: 哦，看，大黄蜂小姐，看看这里有多少迷失的跳蚤！看来，即使是最后几个落后的人现在也和我们在一起了。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, look, Miss Bumblebee, look how many lost fleas there are! It seems that even the last few people who fell behind are now with us.

original_en_text: Ah! Aha! A native of these fiery lowlands approaches! Have no fear, my friend, we fleas are but humble travellers!<hpage>Well met, sir, though like you I am not of these lands. I am merely journeying through.<page>Oh. Oho! A kindred spirit! It’s good luck for wanderers to meet on an unfamiliar path.
original_zh_text: 啊哈！是这片灼热低地的原住民！别怕朋友，我们跳蚤都是卑微的旅者！<hpage>幸会，不过我和你一样只是途经此地。<page>噢！原来也是流浪旅者！听说路遇同道是好兆头呢！
translated_text: 啊！啊哈！来自这些炎热低地的当地人正在逼近！不要害怕，我的朋友们，我们跳蚤只是卑微的旅行者！<hpage>先生，我很高兴，尽管我和您一样来自这些土地。我只是在旅行。<page>哦，哦！志同道合的人！对于流浪者来说，在陌生的道路上相遇是一种好运。
secondary_translated_text: Ah! Aha! Locals from these hot lowlands are approaching! Don't be afraid, my friends, we fleas are just humble travelers!<hpage>Sir, I am very happy, although I come from these lands as you do. I was just traveling.<page>Oh, Oh! Like-minded people! For wanderers, meeting on unfamiliar roads is a kind of good luck.

original_en_text: Dodeshna, dear one, dodeshna! Heh heh! Have you returned to use Kratt’s luxurious spa-carriage? I’ve kept it roastily warm for you...
original_zh_text: 多德什纳亲爱的！要来泡克拉特的豪华车厢温泉吗？泉水一直为你温着呢！
translated_text: 多德什纳，亲爱的，多德什纳！呵呵！您要回来使用Kratt的豪华水疗车吗？我已经为你烤得很热了……
secondary_translated_text: Dodeshner, dear, Dodeshner! Hehe! Are you coming back to use Kratt's luxury spa cart? I already baked it very hot for you...

original_en_text: Vikna! The game is now ended, and the Flea Juggle champion has set an even higher score! Tremble in awe, dear fleas, at the might of our dear Miss Hornet!
original_zh_text: 维克纳！游戏结束，耍耍记录刷新！颤抖吧跳蚤们，见证大黄蜂小姐的实力！
translated_text: 维克纳！比赛现已结束，跳蚤杂耍冠军创造了更高的分数！亲爱的跳蚤，敬畏地颤抖，我们亲爱的大黄蜂小姐的力量！
secondary_translated_text: Vickner! The competition is now over and the flea juggler champion has created a higher score! Dear flea, tremble in awe, the power of our dear Miss Bumblebee!

original_en_text: There are many lost and lonely fleas still scattered across this kingdom. If only some more of them joined us, the caravan could continue its journey.<page>You’ll find the little dears in all sorts of strange places, for they love to peek and pry and play, but if you rouse them they are sure to find their way here!
original_zh_text: 还有太多同胞流落四方。如果能多召集些，旅团就能继续前行。<page>那些小家伙总爱躲在古怪角落玩耍，但被发现就会自己寻路回来！
translated_text: 这个王国里仍然散布着许多迷失而孤独的跳蚤。如果更多的人加入我们，团队就可以继续旅程。<page>你会在各种奇怪的地方发现这些小宝贝，因为它们喜欢偷看、窥探和玩耍，但如果你叫醒它们，它们一定会找到这里的路！
secondary_translated_text: This kingdom is still dotted with many lost and lonely fleas. If more people join us, the team can continue on the journey.<page>You will find these little babies in all kinds of strange places because they like to peek, spy and play, but if you wake them up, they will definitely find their way here!

original_en_text: Those great rumbles from beneath, they have sound similar to giant beast. Such beast is much sorrowful though, I am think.<page>Fleas and monsters alike have their troubles...
original_zh_text: 下面传来的轰隆声，像巨兽哀嚎。或许长得越大，悲伤也就越大吧。<page>跳蚤和怪物各有各的苦……
translated_text: 下方传来巨大的隆隆声，就像巨兽一样。不过，我认为这样的野兽很悲伤。<page>跳蚤和怪物都有自己的麻烦。
secondary_translated_text: There was a huge rumbling sound from below, like a giant beast. But I think such a beast is sad.<page>Fleas and monsters both have their own troubles.

original_en_text: <hpage>The Fleamaster and his caravan sought for caves offering space and safety. This calm lake and shore may prove suitable.
original_zh_text: <hpage>跳蚤旅团在寻找宽敞又安全的驻地，这片湖岸看着很合适。
translated_text: <hpage>弗莱克马斯特和他的商队寻找提供空间和安全的洞穴。这个平静的湖泊和海岸可能是合适的。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Flecmaster and his caravan searched for caves that provided space and security. This calm lake and coast may be appropriate.

original_en_text: Oh, Miss Hornet! Wonder at how large our caravan has grown! So bold and boisterous! This gilded chamber can barely contain us all!<page>The many fleas are itching to journey once more, to find a space to stretch their wings. But from here, as their leader, I am hesitant to order us so swiftly away.<page>These heights hold too much danger to set forth without a safe goal held clear in mind.<page>What of you, Miss Hornet? Your tasks carry you throughout this kingdom. Have you ever encountered a place appropriate?
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐！看旅团现在多热闹！这金色大厅都快装不下了！<page>大伙急着再次启程找个宽敞的地方，但身为领袖，我不敢贸然行动。<page>高地危机四伏，没有明确目标不能冒险。<page>您有什么看法？您走遍了纺络，可曾遇见过合适的去处？
translated_text: 哦，大黄蜂小姐！想知道我们的团队发展到多大了！好大胆又活泼！这个镀金的房间里几乎容不下我们所有人！<page>许多跳蚤渴望再次旅行并寻找空间伸展翅膀。但从这里开始，作为他们的领导者，我犹豫了一下命令我们这么快离开。<page>如果没有明确的安全目标，这些高度的危险太大了。<page>你呢大黄蜂小姐你的任务带你穿越这个王国。你遇到过合适的地方吗？
secondary_translated_text: Oh, miss bumblebee! I want to know how big our team has grown! So bold and lively! There is hardly room for all of us in this gilded room!<page>Many fleas are eager to travel again and find space to stretch their wings. But from here on, as their leader, I hesitated and ordered us to leave so quickly.<page>Without clear safety goals, the dangers of these heights are too great.<page>What about you, Miss Bumblebee? Your mission takes you across this kingdom. Have you ever met a suitable place?

original_en_text: We will camp here a time before moving onward. These moments of safety and calm must be treasured, rare as they are.
original_zh_text: 我们会在这里暂驻。安宁时光难得，要好好珍惜。
translated_text: 我们将在这里扎营一段时间，然后继续前进。这些安全和平静的时刻必须珍惜，尽管它们很少见。
secondary_translated_text: We will camp here for a while and then move on. These moments of safety and calm must be cherished, although they are rare.

original_en_text: Oh, my dear friend, Miss Hornet, look at how many of the lost fleas have come! It seems even the last few stragglers are now with us.
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐快看！如此多的跳蚤同胞，连最后几个掉队的都回来了！
translated_text: 哦，我亲爱的朋友，大黄蜂小姐，看看这里有多少迷失的跳蚤！看来，即使是最后几个落后的人现在也和我们在一起了。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, my dear friend, Miss Bumblebee, look how many lost fleas there are! It seems that even the last few people who fell behind are now with us.

original_en_text: And now that we have met, know that I am Fleamaster Mooshka, leader of this caravan!<page>Our own journey has barely begun, but you are most welcome to tarry here a while, stranger. Where ways are dark and winding, good bugs must stay close together!
original_zh_text: 既然相遇，容我介绍——我是跳蚤首领穆什卡，旅团领袖！<page>我们刚启程不久，但欢迎您在此歇息。现在外面混乱得很，好虫子们应抱团取暖！
translated_text: 现在我们见面了，我们知道我是Fleamaster Mooshka，这个团队的队长！<page>我们自己的旅程才刚刚开始，但欢迎你在这里呆一段时间，陌生人。在黑暗曲折的地方，好昆虫必须互相依偎！
secondary_translated_text: Now that we meet, we know that I am Fleamaster Mooshka, the captain of this team!<page>Our own journey has just begun, but you are welcome to stay here for a while, stranger. In dark and tortuous places, good insects must snuggle up to each other!

original_en_text: The bellowing sandy land was full of much danger. We was almost lost poor Varga to hungry worms as we travel up!<page>Sadly, he is finding way here after all. Har! Is only jest. Grishkin and Varga is great friends, just like all fleas is being.
original_zh_text: 这片沙地凶险得很！来的路上瓦尔加差点就进了蠕虫的肚子！<page>可惜最后他找到路回来了！哈哈开玩笑，格里什琴和瓦尔加关系好着呢！
translated_text: 咆哮的沙子充满了危险。当我们向上旅行时，可怜的瓦尔加几乎被饥饿的蠕虫迷住了！<page>可悲的是，他终于找到了出路。哈！只是个笑话。格里希金和瓦尔加是好朋友，就像所有跳蚤一样。
secondary_translated_text: The roaring sand is full of danger. As we traveled upwards, poor Varga was almost charmed by hungry worms!<page>Sadly, he finally found a way out. Ha! Just a joke. Grishkin and Varga are good friends, like all fleas.

original_en_text: You have brought them all, bug not flea. My work is done! No more searching needed. Ours is a caravan full!<page>Now my duty must change. To watch. To protect. This new task I am looking much to liking.
original_zh_text: 你把他们全找齐了，外族虫。我也不用再四处搜寻了！旅团满员！<page>现在改当护卫，这新差事合我胃口。
translated_text: 你把他们都带来了。蠕虫不是跳蚤。我的工作完成了！不再需要搜索。我们的车队已经满了！<page>现在我的责任必须改变。手表为了保护。我似乎很喜欢这个新任务。
secondary_translated_text: You brought them all here. Worms are not fleas. My work is done! Search is no longer needed. Our motorcade is full!<page>Now my responsibilities must change. Watch for protection. I seem to like this new task very much.

original_en_text: Is warm here, you agree? Is very... what is say, cosy?<page>The Fleamaster though, is always want to move on. We will be drag away somewhere much worse soon, I think.
original_zh_text: 这儿暖和，对吧？很……温馨？<page>但首领总想挪窝，我猜迟早会搬去更糟的地方。
translated_text: 天气很热，你同意吗？非常...你说什么，安慰？<page>然而，弗莱克马斯特一直想继续前进。我认为我们很快就会被拖入更糟糕的境地。
secondary_translated_text: It's very hot, do you agree? Very... What do you say, comfort?<page>However, Fleckmaster always wanted to move on. I think we will soon be dragged into a worse situation.

original_en_text: Oh... what a shame. Heh heh! I think you’d find the waters inside delectably soothing, if you’d only reconsider!
original_zh_text: 噢……真遗憾。这泉水能舒服到骨头里哦！要不再考虑考虑？
translated_text: 哦...多么可惜啊！呵呵！我想如果你重新考虑一下，你会发现里面的水非常舒缓！
secondary_translated_text: Oh... What a pity! Hehe! I think if you reconsider, you will find that the water in it is very soothing!

original_en_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, I bring a delivery, supplies from the couriers of Bellhart to aid your settlement.<page>Such dedication you continue to show us, Miss Hornet!<page>While we may seem safe out here at range from danger, we cannot go far to forage, and the many fleas need much nurture!<page>Food and provisions, such as you bring, are crucial in these desperate times.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我从钟心镇带了补给来。<page>大黄蜂小姐，您总是这么关照我们！<page>这里看似安全，但难以远行觅食，这么多张嘴要喂呢！<page>你带来的食物和物资真是雪中送炭！
translated_text: <hpage>弗赖马斯特，我带来了一批货物，贝尔哈特信使送来的物资，来帮助你安顿下来。<page>你一直致力于我们，大黄蜂小姐！<page>虽然我们似乎远离危险，但我们不能走得太远，许多跳蚤需要更多的营养！<page>在这个绝望的时刻，食物和物资（比如你带来的东西）至关重要。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Freimaster, I have brought a shipment, supplies from the Bell Hart messenger, to help you settle down.<page>You've been dedicated to us, miss bumblebee!<page>Although we seem to be far away from danger, we cannot go too far, many fleas need more nutrition!<page>In this desperate moment, food and supplies (like what you bring) are crucial.

original_en_text: This trial is Flea Dodge. Stay upon platforms, avoid attacks. Longer stay gives bigger score.
original_zh_text: 这试炼是跳蚤溜溜。站住平台，躲开攻击。坚持越久分越高。
translated_text: 这次审判是跳蚤躲避。留在平台上避免攻击。停留时间越长，分数越大。
secondary_translated_text: This trial is flea avoidance. Stay on the platform to avoid attacks. The longer the stay, the greater the score.

original_en_text: Dodeshna, dodeshna! I am saying, welcome to our caravan, stranger!<page>You are a very funny, very strange flea, isn’t it? No fur at all, and your wings fall off!<page>Har, har har har! Is just jest, of course. Us fleas famous for giving jokes!
original_zh_text: 多德什纳，多德什纳！我的意思是，欢迎来到旅团！<page>你真是个滑稽的跳蚤，没长毛还掉翅膀！哈哈！<page>开个玩笑啦！我们跳蚤最爱逗乐子！
translated_text: 多德什纳，多德什纳！我的意思是，欢迎来到我们的大篷车，陌生人！<page>你是一只非常有趣、非常奇怪的跳蚤，不是吗？没有皮毛，你的翅膀就会掉下来！<page>哈，哈哈！当然，这只是一个玩笑。我们跳蚤以开玩笑而闻名！
secondary_translated_text: Dodeshner, Dodeshner! I mean, welcome to our caravan, strangers!<page>You're a very interesting, very strange flea, aren't you? Without fur, your wings will fall off!<page>Ha, ha! Of course, it was just a joke. We fleas are famous for making jokes!

original_en_text: Some beasts here, I see them eat through the bony ground. Is very smart! Bone is everywhere much abundant! If only I had such stomach, har har!
original_zh_text: 这有些野兽会啃地上的骨头，真聪明！这到处都是骨头，我要有这胃口多好！哈哈！
translated_text: 这里的一些野兽，我看到它们正在啃噬骨头地。非常聪明！到处都是骨头！如果我有这样的胃就太好了，哈哈！
secondary_translated_text: Some of the wild beasts here, I saw them chewing on the bones. Very smart! There are bones everywhere! It would be great if I had such a stomach, haha!

original_en_text: Drink to full, Miss Hornet! Why waste? Be merry with us fleas before it all ends!
original_zh_text: 喝个痛快，大黄蜂小姐！浪费？都要完蛋了，只管开心就好了！
translated_text: 大黄蜂小姐，把它都喝了！为什么要浪费它？在这一切结束之前，和我们跳蚤在一起快乐吧！
secondary_translated_text: Miss Bumblebee, drink it all! Why waste it? Before this is all over, be happy with us fleas!

original_en_text: Vikna. The trial has ended, and you have bested your old score. Rishkiz, champion!
original_zh_text: 维克纳，试炼结束。你超越了自己，里什基兹，祝贺你，冠军！
translated_text: 维克纳。审判结束了，你已经击败了你的旧比分。冒险，冠军！
secondary_translated_text: Vickner. The trial is over and you have beaten your old score. Adventure, champion!

original_en_text: Normally I would never burden a visitor with the caravan’s worries. But! Isn’t it the custom of this kingdom to share your deepest wishes with strangers?<page>Well, my wish is for the poor lost fleas of these lands to find their way to our caravan! Stranger, could you not help us?
original_zh_text: 本不该让客人操心旅团的琐事，但据说倾诉愿望是纺络的风俗？<page>我的愿望就是迷途跳蚤能回归旅团！能请您帮助我吗？
translated_text: 通常我不会让游客担心大篷车的麻烦。但是！与陌生人分享自己最深切的愿望不是这个王国的习俗吗？<page>好吧，我的愿望是让这些土地上可怜的迷失跳蚤找到我们的商队！陌生人，你能帮我们吗？
secondary_translated_text: Normally I don't make tourists worry about the trouble of caravans. But! Isn't it a custom in this kingdom to share one's deepest desires with strangers?<page>Well, my wish is for the poor lost fleas in these lands to find our caravan! Stranger, can you help us?

original_en_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, if your troupe is still prepared to travel, I have discovered a cave beyond the Citadel, at the edge of some ancient aqueducts. That place may well suit your needs for safety.<hpage>The trek would be long, but once reached, you will find a sandy shore, free of predators, beside a wide clear lake. It is as peaceful a place as I’ve seen throughout these fraught lands.<page>That’s it! It must be! Our destination has at last been set. Our journey can continue!<page>True friend of fleas you are, Miss Hornet. That place shall welcome us, no doubt. Will you be joining for this new journey?
original_zh_text: <hpage>要是旅团已经准备妥当，我发现圣堡外的古渠尽头有处洞穴或许适合你们。<hpage>路途虽远，但抵达后有沙滩湖泊，没有掠食者。是我在这里见过最安宁的地方。<page>就是那里了！终于找到目标了，旅团可以启程了！<page>真不愧是跳蚤挚友！那地方肯定很适合我们。愿意与我们一起同行吗？
translated_text: <hpage>弗利斯特，如果你的剧团还计划旅行，我在城堡外发现了一个洞穴，在一些古老运河的边缘。那个地方可能非常适合您的安全需求。<hpage>徒步旅行可能需要很长时间，但一旦您到达，您会发现一片沙质海岸，没有掠食者，旁边是一个宽阔清澈的湖泊。这是我在这些令人担忧的土地上见过的最和平的地方。<page>就是这样！一定是！我们的目的地终于确定了。我们的旅程还可以继续！<page>大黄蜂小姐，你是跳蚤的好朋友，毫无疑问，我们在那个地方会受到欢迎。你会加入这个新旅程吗？
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Forrest, if your troupe is still planning to travel, I found a cave outside the castle, on the edge of some ancient canals. That place may be very suitable for your security needs.<hpage>Hiking can take a long time, but once you arrive, you will find a sandy coast, free of predators, next to a wide clear lake. This is the most peaceful place I have ever seen in these worrying lands.<page>That's it! It must be! Our destination was finally confirmed. Our journey can continue!<page>Miss Bumblebee, you are a good friend of fleas, and there is no doubt that we will be welcomed in that place. Will you join this new journey?

original_en_text: My treasured guest... what need have I of rosaries, now that all is ending? Please, use my spa-carriage, free of charge! Dear Kratt is only too happy to provide!
original_zh_text: 尊贵的客人……如今万物都将终结，我还要念珠何用？请随意使用温泉车厢吧，分文不取！亲爱的克拉特乐意为您效劳！
translated_text: 我亲爱的客人既然结束了，我需要什么念珠？请免费使用我的水疗车！亲爱的Kratt很乐意提供！
secondary_translated_text: My dear guest, now that it is over, what rosary do I need? Please use my spa cart for free! Dear Kratt will be happy to provide it!

original_en_text: So many lost fleas have made it here... Truly, I’d never dared to hope we could gather such a grand company!<page>But still there may be more out there in this wide world... What a wonder it would be if they too found their way to our fresh paradise!
original_zh_text: 这么多迷途同胞都回来了……真是做梦都不敢想！<page>但或许还有其他流落者……要是他们也能找到这新乐园该多好！
translated_text: 这么多迷失的跳蚤来到这里..确实，我从来不敢希望我们能聚集这么大的团队！<page>但在这个广阔的世界里，可能还有更多。如果他们也找到了通往我们新鲜天堂的路，那将是多么奇迹啊！
secondary_translated_text: So many lost fleas come here.. Indeed, I never dared to wish that we could gather such a large team!<page>But in this vast world, there may be more. What a miracle it would be if they also found their way to our fresh paradise!

original_en_text: Auugghhh... the pain! Such fury, over a mistake! Poor little Kratt did not mean to steal a look!<page>This old carriage needs constant care. I was only doing repairs! I had no intent to intrude! And I barely saw a thing!<hpage>Lie no more to me, flea, and be grateful you still live. Know that if you peer again, you will die.<page>Of course! Kratt would never! Let’s consider the matter forgotten, and you shall forever be my treasured guest!
original_zh_text: 啊嗷！好痛！发这么大火干嘛！克拉特不是故意偷看的！<page>车厢需要养护，我只是在修补！这是无心之过，而且我基本什么也没看见！<hpage>不必编故事了，这次没死算你走运。下次再偷看，你必死无疑。<page>不敢不敢！这事就这么翻篇吧！您永远是贵宾！
translated_text: 啊...痛！为一个错误感到愤怒！可怜的小克拉特无意偷看！<page>这辆旧马车需要不断维护。我只是在维修！我不是故意打扰的！我几乎什么也没看到！<hpage>别再骗我了，跳蚤，谢谢你还活着。你知道，如果你再盯着看，你就会死。<page>当然！克拉特永远不会！算了，你永远是我的客人！
secondary_translated_text: Ah... Pain! Angry about a mistake! Poor little Clutter had no intention of peeping!<page>This old carriage requires constant maintenance. I'm just repairing it! I didn't mean to disturb you! I saw almost nothing!<hpage>Stop lying to me, flea, thank you for being alive. You know, if you stare again, you'll die.<page>Of course! Clutter never will! Forget it, you will always be my guest!

original_en_text: Dodeshna! Miss Hornet, is it? Welcome to our new camp! The travelling is done, and so we drink! <page>Is no better way to revive spirit than to drink the famous Flea Brew! I’m have just finished a batch, bubbling and warm!<page>You are friend, finder of lost, little fleas, hmm? Here, take bottle of Flea Brew with you! Will keep you warm while you travel.<page>I am always brewing here, so have no fear to drink plenty, and return whenever you are wanting more!
original_zh_text: 多德什纳！是大黄蜂小姐吗？欢迎来新营地！旅途结束，该喝点啦！<page>来点提神的跳蚤秘酿！我刚熬好一锅，热乎着呢！<page>是你帮忙找回流落在外的同胞对吧？那这瓶药酿送你！路上暖暖身子。<page>我整天都在熬制药酿，喝完了随时来取！
translated_text: 多德斯纳！你是大黄蜂小姐吧欢迎来到我们的新营地！旅行结束了，我们喝酒！<page>没有比喝著名的跳蚤啤酒更好的恢复活力的方法了！我刚吃完一批，又热又香！<page>你是失落小跳蚤的朋友和发现者，嗯？带一瓶跳蚤啤酒来这里！它会让您在旅行时保持温暖。<page>我总是在这里酿造，所以不要害怕喝很多，想要更多的时候再来！
secondary_translated_text: Dodesner! You must be Miss Bumblebee. Welcome to our new camp! The trip is over, let's drink!<page>There is no better way to rejuvenate than drinking the famous flea beer! I just finished a batch and it's hot and fragrant!<page>You're the friend and discoverer of the lost little flea, huh? Bring a bottle of flea beer here! It will keep you warm while traveling.<page>I always brew here, so don't be afraid to drink a lot and come back when you want more!

original_en_text: You remain, bug not flea? If service is you here seeking, none is left for me to provide. All fleas are here, collected close.<page>Much better it is now for fleas to be together, ready to face whatever end will come.
original_zh_text: 你还在啊，外族虫？如果是要找我帮忙，那我帮不了什么了，跳蚤们都回来了。<page>现在大家都聚在一起，只剩等待最后的终局了。
translated_text: 你留下来，昆虫不是跳蚤吗？如果您来这里是为了服务，我无能为力。所有的跳蚤都在这里，并且收集得很好。<page>现在跳蚤已经聚集起来，并为任何结果做好了准备，情况好多了。
secondary_translated_text: If you stay, aren't insects fleas? If you're here to serve, there's nothing I can do. All the fleas are here and are well collected.<page>Now that the fleas have gathered and are ready for any outcome, things are much better.

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair greetings again, large flea. Of your many companions, I had little worry you would survive to find this caravan.<hpage>Would you tell me now of the task that saw you so apart from your fellows, and so fearsome in form?<page>Grrr....Mine is to track, by trail and smell and senses sharp. Find our friend fleas, our young most of most, to bring them together and grow them strong.<hpage>If you have sensed the locations of other lost fleas, would you share them with me? I may be able to send them safe to the caravan.<page>The locations! For price they could be shared, but you hold no map to mark! If learnings are wanted, a map must be owned. Until then, we have no trade to make.
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了，大个子。就知道你能活着找到这里。<hpage>能告诉我你为何离群索居，还练就这副体魄么？<page>吼……我负责追踪，靠着足迹气味，找回幼崽养壮族群。<hpage>若是探知迷途跳蚤下落，就告诉我，或许能送他们归队。<page>位置，拿念珠换！但你连地图都没有！想要交易，先弄张地图来！
translated_text: <hpage>再次问候，大跳蚤。在你众多的同伴中，我并不担心你能活下来找到这支商队。<hpage>现在你能告诉我是什么任务让你以如此可怕的形式与你的同伴拉开了距离吗？<page>咕噜……我的是通过痕迹、气味和敏锐的感官进行追踪。找到我们的跳蚤朋友，最年轻的跳蚤，把他们聚集在一起，让他们变得坚强。<hpage>如果您已经感应到其他迷失跳蚤的位置，您会与我分享吗？我也许可以把他们安全地带到大篷车。<page>地点！就价格而言，他们可以分享，但你没有地图标记！如果你想学习，你必须有一张地图。在那之前，我们没有生意可做。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Greetings again, big flea. Among your many companions, I am not worried that you will survive to find this caravan.<hpage>Now can you tell me what mission has allowed you to distance yourself from your companions in such a terrible way?<page>Gollum... Mine is tracking through traces, odors and keen senses. Find our flea friends, the youngest flea, gather them together and make them strong.<hpage>If you have sensed the location of other lost fleas, would you share it with me? I might be able to get them safely to the caravan.<page>Location! In terms of price, they can share, but you don't have a map mark! If you want to learn, you must have a map. Before that, we had no business to do.

original_en_text: Bug. World is ending. Nothing left but to test ourselves.<page>This trial is Flea Dodge. Stay upon the platforms. Avoid attacks. Longer stay gives bigger score.<page>To score most is to become champion. This is only thing left to strive for.
original_zh_text: 虫子，世界就要毁灭，除了试炼也没别的事可做。<page>这试炼是跳蚤溜溜。站住平台，躲开攻击。坚持越久分越高。<page>分最高的就是冠军，而夺冠是最后的意义。
translated_text: Bug.世界正在毁灭。除了考验自己，别无选择。<page>这次审判是跳蚤躲避。留在平台上。避免攻击。停留时间越长，分数越大。<page>最多的分数是成为冠军。这是唯一需要为之奋斗的事情。
secondary_translated_text: Bug. The world is destroying. There is no choice but to test yourself.<page>This trial is flea avoidance. Stay on the platform. Avoid attacks. The longer the stay, the greater the score.<page>The most points are becoming a champion. This is the only thing that needs to be fought for.

original_en_text: Bug, you are champion of Flea Dodge, but trial is still open to you. Can you defeat your own score?
original_zh_text: 虫子，跳蚤溜溜的冠军归你了。但挑战还将继续，你能突破自己的成绩吗？
translated_text: Bug，你是跳蚤道奇队的冠军，但审判仍然对你开放。你能打败自己的分数吗？
secondary_translated_text: Bug, you are the champion of the flea Dodgers, but the trial is still open to you. Can you beat your own score?

original_en_text: So bug not flea, you return. World is ruined. Final end comes soon, says Fleamaster.<hpage>This land is gravely wounded, but death need not follow. It is now my task to free this kingdom from its dark fall.<page>Grrr... such words are just fancy. Nothing left now, except to protect what little we have.
original_zh_text: 外族虫，你回来了。首领说，世界要完蛋了。<hpage>纺络遭受重创，但未必没有转机。我会帮王国摆脱黑暗。<page>吼……漂亮话谁都会说，现在我们也只能死守这点家当了。
translated_text: 所以虫子不是跳蚤，你回来了。世界被毁了。弗赖马斯特表示，最终结果很快就会出来。<hpage>土地受了重伤，但死亡并不一定随之而来。现在我的任务是将这个王国从黑暗的衰落中解放出来。<page>呃...这太浮华了。现在除了保护我们所拥有的小事，什么也没剩下了。
secondary_translated_text: So bugs are not fleas, you're back. The world is ruined. Freimaster said the final result will be out soon.<hpage>The land was seriously injured, but death did not necessarily follow. Now my task is to liberate this kingdom from its dark decline.<page>Uh... This is too flashy. Now there is nothing left but protecting the little things we have.

original_en_text: Come, you revellers! Try the Flea Juggle game! Keep striking fleas upwards. Keep them airborne for as long as possible!
original_zh_text: 来啊狂欢者！玩跳蚤耍耍！把跳蚤打飞，滞空越久越好！
translated_text: 来吧，你们这些狂欢者！尝试跳蚤杂耍游戏！继续与跳蚤作斗争。让它们尽可能长时间地在空中飞行！
secondary_translated_text: Come on, you revelers! Try the flea juggling game! Continue to fight fleas. Let them fly in the air as long as possible!

original_en_text: <hpage>I have seen a place, Fleamaster, a cave beyond the Citadel, at the edge of some ancient ducts. That place may well suit your needs for safety.<hpage>The trek would be long, but once reached, you will find a sandy shore, free of predators, beside a wide clear lake. It is as peaceful a place as I’ve seen throughout these fraught lands.<page>That’s it! It must be! Our destination has been set. Our journey can continue!<page>True friend of fleas you are, Miss Hornet. That place shall welcome us, no doubt. Will you be joining the caravan on this journey?
original_zh_text: <hpage>我见过一处地方，在圣堡外的古渠尽头，或许符合你们的需求。<hpage>路途虽远，但抵达后有沙滩湖泊，没有掠食者。是我在这里见过最安宁的地方。<page>就是那里了！目标已定，旅团可以启程了！<page>真不愧是跳蚤挚友！那地方肯定很适合我们。愿意与我们一起同行吗？
translated_text: <hpage>我见过一个地方，Fleamaster，城堡后面的一个洞穴，位于一些古老管道的边缘。那个地方可能非常适合您的安全需求。<hpage>徒步旅行可能需要很长时间，但一旦您到达，您会发现一片沙质海岸，没有掠食者，旁边是一个宽阔清澈的湖泊。这是我在这些令人担忧的土地上见过的最和平的地方。<page>就是这样！一定是！我们的目的地已经确定。我们的旅程还可以继续！<page>大黄蜂小姐，你是跳蚤的好朋友，毫无疑问，我们在那个地方会受到欢迎。你会加入这个旅程吗？
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I have seen a place, Fleamaster, a cave behind the castle, on the edge of some ancient pipes. That place may be very suitable for your security needs.<hpage>Hiking can take a long time, but once you arrive, you will find a sandy coast, free of predators, next to a wide clear lake. This is the most peaceful place I have ever seen in these worrying lands.<page>That's it! It must be! Our destination has been determined. Our journey can continue!<page>Miss Bumblebee, you are a good friend of fleas, and there is no doubt that we will be welcomed in that place. Will you join this journey?

original_en_text: All are here now, bug not flea. For your seeking, ours is a caravan full.<page>Much better it is now for fleas to be together, ready to face whatever end will come.
original_zh_text: 跳蚤全齐了，外族虫。托你的福，旅团满员了。<page>世界就要完蛋了，抱团总比落单好。
translated_text: 现在一切都在这里，虫子不是跳蚤。为了您的搜索，我们的舰队已经满了。<page>现在跳蚤已经聚集起来，并为任何结果做好了准备，情况好多了。
secondary_translated_text: Everything is here now, bugs are not fleas. For your search, our fleet is full.<page>Now that the fleas have gathered and are ready for any outcome, things are much better.

original_en_text: Ooh, heh heh heh! What a turn, for dear Kratt to be strung up in such a dank little cave!<hpage>Cursed threads stretch throughout this land, set to ensnare the unwary. You seem no worse for it now, at least.<hpage>That metal carriage... It is yours, I assume?<page>Ooh, yes, yes! I’m setting out to join the nearest flea caravan, aren’t I? Safety in numbers, yes? I’ve had more than enough of venturing alone.<page>And you... I trust I will see you there? My carriage hides a special secret I’d gladly share with you when next we meet! Heh heh!
original_zh_text: 嘿嘿！没想到克拉特会在这阴暗的洞窟里翻船！<hpage>丝咒遍地，一不留神被缠住。你看起来倒是不担心？<hpage>那金属车厢……是你的吧？<page>对对！我正要投奔跳蚤旅团呢！独行太危险了！<page>你……也会去旅团吧？那我们旅团再见，车厢里有惊喜等着你哟！
translated_text: 哦，嘿嘿！亲爱的克拉特挂在这么潮湿的小山洞里真是太好了！<hpage>诅咒的丝线遍布大地，注定要困住粗心的人。至少你现在看起来没有更糟。<hpage>那辆金属马车……我想这是你的？<page>哦，是的，是的！我正准备加入最近的跳蚤舰队，不是吗？安全号码，对吧？我厌倦了独自冒险。<page>而你...我相信我会在那里见到你？我的马车隐藏着一个特殊的秘密，下次见面时我很乐意与您分享！呵呵！
secondary_translated_text: Oh, hey hey! Dear Clutter, it's so nice to hang in such a damp little cave!<hpage>The threads of curse spread all over the earth, destined to trap careless people. At least you don't look worse now.<hpage>That metal carriage... I think this is yours?<page>Oh, yes, yes! I'm about to join the nearest flea fleet, aren't I? Security number, right? I'm tired of taking risks alone.<page>And you... I believe I will see you there? My carriage hides a special secret that I will be happy to share with you the next time we meet! Hehe!

original_en_text: And now, with our caravan bursting, we’ve rested here long enough. We fleas must head higher!<page>Oh, but stranger, how remiss of me! First, please, what shall we call you?<hpage>You may call me Hornet, Fleamaster. Know that I, like you, am glad to see your fellow fleas safe with your caravan. These are dangerous lands to travel alone.<page>Oh, vavenda! That is to say, incredible! What a beautiful thing it is! All of us together.<page>Dear friend... Miss Hornet. Our caravan prepares to depart toward the wide moor high above. Would you travel with us, as our honoured guest?
original_zh_text: 如今旅团拥挤不堪，我们也休整已久。跳蚤们必须向更高处进发！<page>哎呀，我真是失礼！还没请教您的姓名？<hpage>叫我大黄蜂即可。很高兴见你和同胞平安相聚，在这种地方独行确实太过凶险。<page>哈哈！能与同胞团聚，还结交了新朋友，真是太好了！<page>亲爱的朋友……大黄蜂小姐。旅团即将前往上方辽阔沼地，您愿意作为贵宾与我们同行吗？
translated_text: 现在，我们的舰队已经满员了，我们已经在这里休息了足够长的时间了。我们跳蚤必须走得更高！<page>哦，但是奇怪的是，我是多么疏忽啊！首先，我们怎样才能给你打电话？<hpage>你可以叫我大黄蜂，Freymasters。你知道，我和你一样高兴看到你的跳蚤同伴在你的车队中安全。独自旅行是危险的土地。<page>哦，瓦文达！换句话说，令人难以置信！这是多么美丽的事情啊！我们所有人在一起。<page>亲爱的朋友们。大黄蜂小姐。我们的车队正准备出发前往高空广阔的沼泽。作为我们的客人，您想和我们一起旅行吗？
secondary_translated_text: Now that our fleet is full, we have rested here long enough. We fleas must go higher!<page>Oh, but the strange thing is how negligent I was! First of all, how can we call you?<hpage>You can call me bumblebee, Freymasters. You know, I'm as happy as you are to see your flea companions safe in your fleet. Traveling alone is dangerous land.<page>Oh, Wavunda! In other words, unbelievable! What a beautiful thing it is! All of us together.<page>Dear friends. Miss Bumblebee. Our motorcade is preparing to set off for the vast swamps at high altitude. As our guest, would you like to travel with us?

original_en_text: I have marked your map, bug. See the learnings of fleas lost across the lands.<page>If you are as brave as told by fellow fleas, seek them. Save them. For a caravan whole.
original_zh_text: 外族虫，地图标好了。上面有流落同胞的位置。<page>如果你真如传言般勇敢，就去救他们吧。凑满我们的旅团。
translated_text: 我已经标记了你的地图，虫子。了解各地消失的跳蚤的情况。<page>如果你像跳蚤同伴告诉你的那样勇敢，那就去找到它们。拯救他们。对于整个车队来说。
secondary_translated_text: I've marked your map, bug. Learn about the situation of fleas that have disappeared in various places.<page>If you are as brave as fellow fleas tell you to, go find them. Save them. For the entire team.

original_en_text: You are welcome here always, Miss Hornet, true friend of fleas!<page>Stay as long as you care. Rest and restore. We many fleas do so enjoy your company.
original_zh_text: 随时欢迎您回来，跳蚤的挚友！<page>想留多久都可以。好好休息，我们都喜欢与您相伴。
translated_text: 这里随时欢迎您，大黄蜂小姐，跳蚤的真正朋友！<page>只要你关心就留下来。休息并恢复。我们的许多跳蚤都喜欢您的公司。
secondary_translated_text: You are always welcome here, Miss Bumblebee, a true friend of fleas!<page>Stay as long as you care. Rest and recover. Many of our fleas love your company.

original_en_text: Dear friend of fleas, please! If ever you come upon a cave both wide and free, return with haste and tell us.<page>The fleas are oh so eager to journey, and I’m eager to see them to a destination safe!
original_zh_text: 跳蚤之友啊！如果发现宽敞安全的洞穴，请速来告知！<page>大伙迫不及待地要启程，我也盼着带他们去安全的归宿！
translated_text: 亲爱的跳蚤朋友们，拜托了！如果您遇到一个又宽又空的洞穴，请回来告诉我们。<page>跳蚤非常渴望旅行，我渴望看到它们安全到达目的地！
secondary_translated_text: Dear flea friends, please! If you encounter a wide and empty cave, please come back and let us know.<page>Fleas are very eager to travel, and I am eager to see them reach their destination safely!

original_en_text: <hpage>That is well, Fleamaster. My travels through this land have been far and deep, and yet at almost every reach I met the friendly, inquisitive presence of your kind.<hpage>You fleas have an uncommon desire for adventure which I find admirable, even if it is seldom matched by capability.<hpage>Though I am long accustomed to travelling alone, following your journey, and sharing some part in its progress has been a warm thing.<page>And so happy have you made we fleas! Even as the darkness comes to claim us, we would be honoured to bestow one final gift, a treasure from fleakind’s glorious past.<page>May it mark you in Pharloom’s final moment as a friend to us all.
original_zh_text: <hpage>那就好，我走遍纺络，处处都能遇见你们好奇的同胞。<hpage>你们对冒险的热忱令我钦佩，虽然常常力有不逮。<hpage>我素来喜好独行，但与你们相遇确是暖心之事。见你们团聚也很是欣慰。<page>哈哈！我们跳蚤也欢喜得很！因此在这黑暗将至的时刻，请让我为您送上最后的赠礼，这是跳蚤一族昔日的珍宝。<page>愿它永远守护在您身边，铭记您为我族挚友。
translated_text: <hpage>那很好，Freymaster。我在这片土地上游历了很远很深，但几乎无论走到哪里，我都会遇到像你这样友好而好奇的存在。<hpage>你们跳蚤对冒险有一种不同寻常的渴望，我觉得这令人钦佩，即使这种能力很少与之相匹配。<hpage>虽然我早已习惯了独自旅行，但跟随你的旅程并分享你的进步是一件温暖的事。<page>我很高兴你给我们做了跳蚤！即使黑暗降临到我们身上，我们也很荣幸能够赠送我们最后的礼物，一份来自跳蚤辉煌过去的宝藏。<page>愿这标志着你作为我们所有人朋友的最后时刻。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>That's good, Freymaster. I have traveled far and deep in this land, but almost no matter where I go, I will always meet people as friendly and curious as you.<hpage>You fleas have an unusual desire for adventure, which I find admirable, even if this ability rarely matches it.<hpage>Although I have long been used to traveling alone, it is warm to follow your journey and share your progress.<page>I'm so glad you made us fleas! Even if darkness befalls us, we are honored to be able to present our final gift, a treasure from Flea's glorious past.<page>May this mark your last moment as a friend to all of us.

original_en_text: You are have luck, Miss Hornet, to lack the fur of we fleas. All the blowy sand of that place is getting very stuck inside!
original_zh_text: 你真幸运，大黄蜂小姐。不像我们长着毛，这破地方的沙子全钻进了毛里！
translated_text: 大黄蜂小姐，你很幸运没有跳蚤毛。那个地方所有的沙尘都被困在里面了！
secondary_translated_text: Miss Bumblebee, you're lucky you don't have flea hair. All the sand and dust in that place is trapped in it!

original_en_text: The beasts here are... much frightful, hm? Scary?<page>But if give them space, they leave alone. You respect beast, beast respect you.
original_zh_text: 这里的野兽……挺吓人？<page>保持距离就没事。你对它们敬而远之，它们也一样。
translated_text: 这里的野兽是。很可怕，是吗？可怕的？<page>但如果给他们空间，他们就会独自离开。你尊重野兽，野兽也尊重你。
secondary_translated_text: The beasts here are. It's scary, isn't it? Horrible?<page>But if they are given space, they will leave alone. You respect the beast, and the beast respects you.

original_en_text: Grand Champion... bug called Hornet. Will you once again challenge the Flea Dodge trial?
original_zh_text: 名为大黄蜂的虫……总冠军。你要再次挑战跳蚤溜溜吗？
translated_text: 总冠军。一种名为“大黄蜂”的错误。你会再次挑战跳蚤路悬疑案的审判吗？
secondary_translated_text: Championship. A mistake called "bumblebee". Will you challenge the Flea Road suspense trial again?

original_en_text: Fierce one, my dear Grand Champion! Will you dance and fly with us above the water?
original_zh_text: 小辣椒，亲爱的总冠军！和我们一起在水面上共舞吧！
translated_text: 勇士，我亲爱的冠军！你想和我们一起跳舞、在水上飞翔吗？
secondary_translated_text: Warrior, my dear champion! Do you want to dance and fly on the water with us?

original_en_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, I bring a delivery, supplies from the couriers of Bellhart to aid your settlement.<page>Ahh, such a kindly gesture adds much warmth to our celebration!<page>These poor little fleas will never grow to roam the world as we have, so let us give them what happiness we can before the end.
original_zh_text: <hpage>跳蚤首领，我带来了钟心镇的支援物资。<page>啊，这份善意让庆典更添暖意！<page>这些可怜的小跳蚤注定无法像我们一样游历世界，就让我们在终结前尽力给予他们欢愉吧。
translated_text: <hpage>弗赖马斯特，我带来了一批货物，贝尔哈特信使送来的物资，来帮助你安顿下来。<page>啊，这样友好的举动给我们的庆祝活动增添了很多温暖！<page>这些可怜的小跳蚤永远不会像我们一样长大并在世界上徘徊，所以让我们在一切结束之前尽我们所能给它们幸福。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Freimaster, I have brought a shipment, supplies from the Bell Hart messenger, to help you settle down.<page>Ah, such a friendly gesture added a lot of warmth to our celebrations!<page>These poor little fleas will never grow up and wander the world like us, so let's do everything we can to make them happy before it's all over.

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings again, sir flea. I see you were able to unite safely with this caravan.<page>Oh yes! Heh heh. All thanks to you! Dear, sweet you! Pray tell, what does one call such a delicate beauty? Surely yours is a name most sweet and soothing. Are you Fairgrace? Or Nectarsweet?<hpage>I am Hornet, sir. Address me by that name or not at all.<page>Gradak! Of course. Of course. My dear, Hornet! I shall let you in on my little secret. My carriage doubles as a soothing spa, you see. It’s most ingenious.<page>The water inside is piping hot, and purer than a psalm! Heh heh! I’d gladly let you soak inside, for a modest fee!
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了，跳蚤先生。看来你顺利加入旅团了。<page>是啊！嘿嘿，全托你的福！敢问美女芳名？定是甜美如"香露仙子"？<hpage>我名为大黄蜂，要么称我本名，要么闭嘴。<page>咳！是是是！亲爱的大黄蜂小姐！嘿嘿，透露个小秘密——其实我的车厢兼作温泉疗愈所！<page>水温滚烫，而且比圣诗还纯净！付点小钱就能泡个痛快！
translated_text: <hpage>再次问候，跳蚤先生。我看你可以安全地与这支车队会合。<page>哦，是的！呵呵，谢谢你的一切！亲爱的，亲爱的你！请告诉我，如此精致的美女叫什么名字？你的名字无疑是最甜美、最抚慰人心的名字。你是公平的恩典吗？或者油桃？<hpage>我是大黄蜂，先生。叫我这个名字，或者根本不叫我。<page>格拉达克，当然，当然，我亲爱的，大黄蜂！我要告诉你我的小秘密。你看，我的马车兼作舒缓的水疗中心。这是最聪明的。<page>里面的水滚烫，比诗还纯净！呵呵！我很乐意让你泡进去，不贵！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Greetings again, Mr. Flea. I think you can safely join this convoy.<page>Oh, yes! Hehe, thank you for everything! Dear, dear you! Please tell me, what is the name of such an exquisite beauty? Your name is undoubtedly the sweetest and most soothing name. Are you a fair grace? Or nectarines?<hpage>I'm bumblebee, sir. Call me that name, or don't call me at all.<page>Gladak, of course, of course, my dear, bumblebee! I'm going to tell you my little secret. You see, my carriage doubles as a soothing spa. This is the smartest.<page>The water inside is boiling hot, purer than poetry! Hehe! I'd be happy to let you soak in it, it's not expensive!

original_en_text: Mamashka. The trial begins. Flea Dodge!
original_zh_text: 玛玛什卡。跳蚤溜溜，试炼开始！
translated_text: 马马什卡。审判开始。跳蚤道奇！
secondary_translated_text: Mamashka. The trial begins. Flea Dodge!

original_en_text: <hpage>I saw your plea posted at Bellhart, sir flea, and accept your request.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我在钟心镇看到了你的祈愿，跳蚤先生，我接受。
translated_text: <hpage>跳蚤先生，我在伯哈特看到了您的请求并接受了。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Mr. Flea, I saw your request in Burhart and accepted it.

original_en_text: The dirge I sing is for the end of our old lives...<page>Here at the end of times, our paradise crumbles beneath us. Flea and friend alike, all will soon be consumed...
original_zh_text: 我唱这首哀歌，祭奠旧日终结……<page>末日将至，乐园崩塌。跳蚤与挚友，终将湮灭……
translated_text: 我唱的挽歌是为了我们旧生活的结束……<page>在世界的尽头，我们的天堂在我们脚下崩溃。跳蚤就像朋友，一切很快就会被消耗掉……
secondary_translated_text: The dirge I sing is for the end of our old lives...<page>At the end of the world, our heaven crumbles under our feet. Fleas are like friends, everything will soon be consumed...

original_en_text: Ahh, look! The poor fleas are starting to make their way to us! What a precious thing!<page>We have much to thank you for already! And I hope we will have even more to be thankful for very soon! Please, keep seeking out our lost fellows!
original_zh_text: 快看！迷途的同胞开始回归了！多么珍贵的情谊！<page>我们对您感激不尽！还请您继续帮忙寻找失散的同胞！
translated_text: 啊，看！可怜的跳蚤开始向我们走来！多么珍贵的东西！<page>我们已经有很多事情要感谢您了！希望我们很快就会有更多值得感激的事情！请继续寻找我们迷失的同胞！
secondary_translated_text: Ah, look! The poor flea began to come towards us! What a precious thing!<page>We already have a lot to thank you for! I hope we will have more things to be grateful for soon! Please continue to search for our lost compatriots!

original_en_text: Grrr.. bug, not flea. Why you must bother me? This spot is mine, fair fought and earned.<hpage>I won’t stay long, madam. Nor would I contest your right to this cave. I only ask what task causes you to perch alone atop these dank ducts?<page>Task? Mine is a work most important, but not for talking of here, where danger waits close. Soon, I depart to seek fleas, my fellows, and join them.<page>Now... Grrr. You leave me! I go soon to seek other fleas. A flea alone is good, but fleas together is best! Till then, rest I need! Off, bug!
original_zh_text: 吼……外族虫，干嘛烦我？这地盘是我打下来的！<hpage>我无意久留，跳蚤，也不打算抢你山洞。就是好奇你独自在这做什么？<hpage>做什么？当然是重要的事，但没空多说，附近有危险。我马上就要离开，去找我的同胞。<page>唔……你走吧！跳蚤还是聚在一起更合适，我待会就去找他们！现在要先休息！
translated_text: 咕噜..是昆虫，不是跳蚤。你为什么要打扰我？这个位置是我的，公平竞争，获胜。<hpage>我不会待太久，女士。我不会质疑你对这个洞穴的权利我只想问，是什么任务让你一个人呆在这潮湿的管道里？<page>任务？我的作品是最重要的作品之一，但不是在这里谈论它，危险就在这里。很快，我开始寻找跳蚤，我的同伴，并加入他们。<page>现在...嗯.你离开我！我很快就会寻找其他跳蚤。一只跳蚤很好，但跳蚤放在一起才是最好的！在那之前，我需要休息！关掉它，虫子！
secondary_translated_text: Gollum.. Insects, not fleas. Why are you bothering me? This position is mine, fair play and win.<hpage>I won't stay long, ma 'am. I won't question your rights to this cave. I just want to ask, what mission is it that keeps you alone in these damp pipes?<page>Mission? My work is one of the most important, but instead of talking about it here, the danger lies here. Soon, I began looking for fleas, my companions, and joined them.<page>now... hmm. You leave me! I will soon be looking for other fleas. One flea is great, but fleas are the best together! Until then, I need to rest! Turn it off, bug!

original_en_text: Dear friend... Miss Hornet! Forgive us, but we beg one more favour from you. Will you accompany us in our final act...?
original_zh_text: 亲爱的朋友……大黄蜂女士！请原谅，但我们恳求您最后再帮一次忙。您可愿陪我们完成旅途的终幕……？
translated_text: 亲爱的朋友们。大黄蜂小姐！原谅我们，但我们请求您再帮一个忙。你愿意陪我们完成最后的表演吗……？
secondary_translated_text: Dear friends. Miss Bumblebee! Forgive us, but we ask you one more favor. Would you like to accompany us to complete the final performance...?

original_en_text: It is time for the Festival of the Flea! One last, grand celebration before the black quakes pull us all down into the darkness!<page>Rouse yourself fleas, one last time! Let the games begin!
original_zh_text: 跳蚤庆典就要开始了！在黑暗将我们拖入深渊前，最后一场盛大狂欢！<page>跳蚤们，最后一次振作起来！游戏开始！
translated_text: 跳蚤日来了！黑色地震将我们所有人拖入黑暗之前的最后一场盛大庆祝活动！<page>最后一次，自己抓跳蚤！让游戏开始！
secondary_translated_text: Flea Day! The last grand celebration before the black earthquake plunged us all into darkness!<page>For the last time, catch fleas yourself! Let the game begin!

original_en_text: Ahhh! Alas. Then we shall pray your own path remains safe.<page>And now, our new home is calling. We venture again!<hpage>Good travels, Fleamaster. May your journey ahead be safe and smooth.
original_zh_text: 啊哈哈，唉，那就祝您前路平安。<page>好了，新家在召唤，我们又要启程了！<hpage>一路顺风，跳蚤首领。
translated_text: 啊！唉。然后我们会祈祷你自己的道路仍然安全。<page>现在，我们的新家正在召唤。我们再次冒险！<hpage>祝您旅途平安，Freymasters。愿您未来的旅程安全顺利。
secondary_translated_text: Ah! Alas. Then we will pray that your own path is still safe.<page>Now, our new home is calling. We take the risk again!<hpage>Have a safe journey, Freymasters. May your future journey be safe and smooth.

original_en_text: But stranger! While you’re with us, you must hear of the miracle that has occurred!<page>See all these fleas gathered to our troupe? It seems so many! An impossible number, yet here they are, safely joined together. Our most cherished wishes answered!<hpage>If you were seeking fleas to join your caravan, I have found and freed many throughout my travels.<page>Oh! Can it be? Then you here are our saviour, our dear fleafriend! For all have made their way right, straight to us!<page>And now, with our caravan full to bursting, we’ve rested long enough. We fleas must head higher!<page>Oh, but saviour, how remiss of me! First, please tell, what shall we call you?<hpage>You may call me Hornet, Fleamaster. Know that I, like you, am glad to see your fellow fleas safe with your caravan. These are dangerous lands to travel alone.<page>Oh, vavenda! That is to say, incredible! What a beautiful thing it is! All of us together.<page>Dear friend... Miss Hornet. Our caravan prepares to depart toward the wide moor high above. Would you travel with us, as our honoured guest?
original_zh_text: 这位朋友！既然与我们同行，您可要听听旅团发生的奇迹！<page>看见归队的跳蚤们了吗？数量超乎想象！原以为这不可能，但它们已然齐聚于此。我们的祈愿实现了！<hpage>如果你是在寻找跳蚤，我在旅途中解救了许多。<page>噢！难道是您？那您便是我们的救星了，亲爱的跳蚤挚友！所有伙伴都因您重聚于此！<page>如今商队拥挤不堪，休整也已足够久。跳蚤们必须向更高处进发！<page>噢，救星阁下，原谅我失礼了！请问该如何称呼您？<hpage>叫我大黄蜂即可。很高兴你能和同胞平安相聚，在这种地方独行确实太过凶险。<page>哈哈！能与同胞团聚，还结交了新朋友，真是太好了！<page>亲爱的朋友……大黄蜂小姐。旅团即将前往上方辽阔沼地，您愿意作为贵宾与我们同行吗？
translated_text: 但是陌生人！当你和我们在一起时，你一定要听到已经发生的奇迹！<page>你看到这些跳蚤聚集在我们剧团里了吗？好像这么多！这是一个不可能的数字，但它们是安全组合的。我们最珍视的愿望得到了回应！<hpage>如果您正在寻找跳蚤加入您的舰队，我在整个旅程中发现并释放了许多跳蚤。<page>哦！可以吗？那么你就是我们的救世主，我们亲爱的跳蚤朋友！因为每个人都朝着我们走来了！<page>现在我们的团队已经挤满了人，我们休息的时间已经够长了。我们跳蚤必须走得更高！<page>哦，但是救世主，我是多么疏忽啊！首先，请告诉我，我们应该怎么称呼你？<hpage>你可以叫我大黄蜂，Freymasters。你知道，我和你一样高兴看到你的跳蚤同伴在你的车队中安全。独自旅行是危险的土地。<page>哦，瓦文达！换句话说，令人难以置信！这是多么美丽的事情啊！我们所有人在一起。<page>亲爱的朋友们。大黄蜂小姐。我们的车队正准备出发前往高空广阔的沼泽。作为我们的客人，您想和我们一起旅行吗？
secondary_translated_text: But strangers! When you are with us, you must hear the miracles that have happened!<page>Do you see these fleas gathering in our troupe? It seems so many! This is an impossible number, but they are safely combined. Our most cherished wishes have been answered!<hpage>If you are looking for fleas to join your fleet, I have discovered and released many fleas throughout my journey.<page>Oh! Is that okay? Then you are our savior, our dear flea friend! Because everyone is coming towards us!<page>Now that our team is packed, we have had enough rest. We fleas must go higher!<page>Oh, but Savior, how negligent I was! First, please tell me, what should we call you?<hpage>You can call me bumblebee, Freymasters. You know, I'm as happy as you are to see your flea companions safe in your fleet. Traveling alone is dangerous land.<page>Oh, Wavunda! In other words, unbelievable! What a beautiful thing it is! All of us together.<page>Dear friends. Miss Bumblebee. Our motorcade is preparing to set off for the vast swamps at high altitude. As our guest, would you like to travel with us?

original_en_text: Welcome back, my fierce one. Dodeshna! Heh heh! I’m sure your travels have wearied you.<page>Oh no, I wouldn’t dare take rosaries from such a treasured guest! Please, use my spa-carriage, free of charge! Dear Kratt is only too happy to provide!
original_zh_text: 欢迎回来小辣椒！嘿嘿，旅途累了吧？<page>哦不，我哪敢收您钱！随便泡！克拉特乐意为您效劳！
translated_text: 欢迎回来，我的凶猛男人。多德什纳！呵呵！我确信你的旅行让你感到无聊。<page>哎呀，我不敢从这么珍贵的客人手中拿走念珠！请免费使用我的水疗车！亲爱的Kratt很乐意提供！
secondary_translated_text: Welcome back, my fierce man. Dodeshner! Hehe! I'm sure your travels bore you.<page>Alas, I dare not take the rosary beads from such a precious guest! Please use my spa cart for free! Dear Kratt will be happy to provide it!

original_en_text: Miss Hornet! You have proven yourself the champion at each of our flea games!<page>I am confident now that the grand champion of our festival has emerged. It is none other than yourself, of course!<page>And thusly, must our final ceremony begin. Fleas, prepare yourselves!
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐，您包揽了所有跳蚤游戏的冠军！<page>我宣布，您是当之无愧的庆典总冠军！<page>最终仪式现在开始！跳蚤们，做好准备！
translated_text: 大黄蜂小姐！您已经证明自己是我们赢得的每一场跳蚤游戏的冠军！<page>我现在相信我们音乐节的总冠军已经出现。你当然是！<page>因此，我们最后的仪式必须开始。跳蚤，准备好！
secondary_translated_text: Miss Bumblebee! You have proven yourself to be the champion of every flea game we have won!<page>I now believe that the overall champion of our music festival has emerged. Of course you are!<page>Therefore, our final ceremony must begin. Flea, get ready!

original_en_text: Good friend of fleas is you, Miss Hornet. Now must join and drink much. Be merry before all ends. Brew is made, enough for all!<page>No charge for you if needing more. Why waste when future is final?
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐，我们跳蚤的挚友，快来喝！末日临头该及时行乐！药酿管够！<page>尽管喝吧！都要完蛋了还留着干嘛？
translated_text: 跳蚤最好的朋友就是你，大黄蜂小姐。你现在必须加入并喝更多的酒。在一切结束之前要高兴。啤酒已经准备好供大家享用了！<page>如果您需要更多，则无需付费。当未来已成定局时，为什么还要浪费它呢？
secondary_translated_text: Flea's best friend is you, Miss Bumblebee. You must join in now and drink more wine. Be happy before it's over. Beer is ready for everyone to enjoy!<page>If you need more, there is no need to pay. Why waste the future when it is a foregone conclusion?

original_en_text: A strange flea has joined our troupe. All are welcome, but something about this one sets my fur to raise.<page>His carriage offers a steaming service, but the charge in rosaries is stiff, especially for us fleas who carry few.<page>For the companionship we provide, and the safety of our numbers, surely some discount is deserved?
original_zh_text: 有个怪跳蚤入伙了。虽然我们来者不拒，但这家伙让我寒毛直竖。<page>他提供蒸疗服务，但要价高昂，我们跳蚤哪有这么多念珠？<page>看在我们提供庇护的份上，总该打个折吧？
translated_text: 一只奇怪的跳蚤加入了我们的剧团。欢迎大家，但这件事让我的外套更加粗糙。<page>他的马车提供蒸汽服务，但念珠的成本很高，尤其是对于我们这些携带跳蚤很少的人来说。<page>为了我们提供的友谊和我们人数的安全，我们当然应该打折一些？
