secondary_translated_text: A strange flea joined our troupe. Welcome, everyone, but this incident has made my coat even rougher.<page>His carriage provides steam services, but the cost of rosary beads is high, especially for those of us who carry few fleas.<page>For the friendship we provide and the safety of our numbers, we should certainly discount?

original_en_text: Vikna! Dear one, you outdo yourself! To beat your previous high score is a marvel indeed!
original_zh_text: 维克纳！亲爱的，你又破了自己的记录！太神奇了！
translated_text: 维克纳！亲爱的，你已经超越了自己！打破以往的高分，确实是一个奇迹！
secondary_translated_text: Vickner! Dear, you have surpassed yourself! Breaking the previous high scores is indeed a miracle!

original_en_text: You still here, bug not flea? Is rest I need before I leave for caravan. Not chat. You feel trouble-type. Make my shell tense.<hpage>I shall take my leave, madam. Stay strong on your own journey. May we meet again at the caravan, amongst your fellows.
original_zh_text: 你怎么还在？我休息够了就去找旅团。别啰嗦，感觉你身上麻烦事不少，让我甲壳发紧。<hpage>那就告辞了，女士。祝你路上顺利，我们旅团再见。
translated_text: 你还在这里，虫子不是跳蚤吗？去大篷车之前我需要休息一下。不聊天。你觉得自己有麻烦了。让我的壳紧张起来。<hpage>我该走了，女士。在旅途中保持坚强。希望我们能在商队中再见到你的同伴。
secondary_translated_text: You're still here, aren't worms fleas? I need to rest before going to the caravan. No chatting. You think you're in trouble. Make my shell tense.<hpage>I should go, ma 'am. Stay strong during the journey. I hope we will see your companions again in the caravan.

original_en_text: Ah, of course. Perhaps you will be trying one of the other games?
original_zh_text: 啊，好的，想玩其他游戏吗？
translated_text: 啊，当然。也许您会尝试其他游戏之一？
secondary_translated_text: Ah, of course. Maybe you will try one of the other games?

original_en_text: Grrr... bug not flea. Still wishing for knowings of my work? But you hold no map to mark! Until a map is owned, we have no trade to make.
original_zh_text: 吼……外族虫，还惦记我的情报？但你连地图都没有！先弄到地图再来。
translated_text: 呃...昆虫不是跳蚤。还想了解我的工作吗？但您没有地图可以标记！在我们拥有地图之前，我们没有什么生意可做。
secondary_translated_text: Uh... Insects are not fleas. Still want to know about my work? But you don't have a map to mark! Before we had maps, we had little business to do.

original_en_text: Thank you. Thank you! I’ll treasure these sweet-smelling rosaries dearly! Now, don’t be shy. Step inside!
original_zh_text: 多谢惠顾！这些香香的念珠我会珍藏的！别害羞，快请进！
translated_text: 谢谢，谢谢！我会非常珍惜这些芬芳的念珠！现在，不要害羞。进来！
secondary_translated_text: Thank you, thank you! I will cherish these fragrant rosary beads very much! Now, don't be shy. Come in!

original_en_text: Vikna! My dear one, my dancer, the game has ended and you have proven yourself the champion!<page>None can best your score. You have shamed us all with your fearsome grace! But you will keep playing for me, yes?<page>The end of the world need not be a lonely thing... eheh heh...
original_zh_text: 维克纳！游戏结束，我的亲爱的舞王！你已加冕冠军！<page>无法超越的优雅身姿！但你还会继续玩吧？<page>末日狂欢可不该独自度过，嘿嘿……
translated_text: 维克纳！我亲爱的人，我的舞者，比赛结束了，你已经证明了自己是冠军！<page>没有人能比你更好。你用你可怕的优雅羞辱了我们所有人！但你会继续为我工作，不是吗？<page>世界末日并不一定是一件孤独的事...呵呵。
secondary_translated_text: Vickner! My dear one, my dancer, the competition is over and you have proved yourself a champion!<page>No one can be better than you. You humiliated us all with your terrible grace! But you'll continue to work for me, won't you?<page>The end of the world does not have to be a lonely thing... Hehe.

original_en_text: Excellent, excellent! Let us make preparations and be off without delay! Rouse yourself fleas, for the caravan roams once more!
original_zh_text: 太好了！即刻整装出发！跳蚤们动起来，旅团要再度启程啦！
translated_text: 太好了，太好了！让我们做好准备，立即出发吧！振作起来，让车队再次漫游！
secondary_translated_text: Great, great! Let's get ready and set off immediately! Cheer up and let the motorcade roam again!

original_en_text: My dear, will you play Flea Bounce for me once more? Leap up and bounce on the fleas who fly past for as long as you are able!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的，再玩一次蹦蹦游戏嘛！只需跳起来踩飞过的跳蚤，持续越久越好！
translated_text: 亲爱的，你能再给我玩跳蚤弹跳吗？尽可能长时间地跳起来并在飞翔的跳蚤上弹跳！
secondary_translated_text: Honey, can you play flea bounce for me again? Jump up as long as possible and bounce on flying fleas!

original_en_text: Say you dodeshna to the new flea sitting there? Is quiet one, but is very good at games!<page>Have no worry for him, Grishkin will look after. Will fill him with brew and meet him to all the other fleas.
original_zh_text: 看见新来的安静跳蚤没？他玩游戏可厉害了！<page>别担心，格里什琴会照顾他的。先灌他药酿再介绍给大家！
translated_text: 说你对新跳蚤dodeshna的看法是对的？这是一个安静的游戏，但非常擅长游戏！<page>别担心他，格里什金会照顾他的。会给他灌满啤酒，然后见到所有其他跳蚤。
secondary_translated_text: Say you were right about the new flea dodeshna? It's a quiet game, but very good at it!<page>Don't worry about him, Grishkin will take care of him. Will fill him with beer and see all the other fleas.

original_en_text: Here we shall remain, for a time, Miss Hornet, and pray that more lost fleas find their way to us.<hpage>What others I encounter, I shall send your way, Fleamaster.
original_zh_text: 我们会暂驻此地，祈祷更多迷途同胞能够找来。<hpage>如果在路上遇到跳蚤，我会让他们来找你。
translated_text: 大黄蜂小姐，我们会在这里呆一段时间，祈祷更多迷失的跳蚤找到出路。<hpage>我遇到其他人，我都会送你，跳蚤大师。
secondary_translated_text: Miss Bumblebee, we will stay here for a while and pray that more lost fleas find a way out.<hpage>If I meet anyone else, I'll send it to you, flea master.

original_en_text: <hpage>That is well, Fleamaster. My travels through this land have been far and deep, and yet at almost every reach I met the friendly, inquisitive presence of your kind.<hpage>You fleas have an uncommon desire for adventure, which I find admirable, even if it is seldom matched by capability.<hpage>Though I am long accustomed to travelling alone, following your journey, and sharing some part in its progress has been a warm thing.<page>Ahh, and so happy too have you made we fleas!<page>I would be honoured to bestow one final gift unto you, Miss Hornet, a treasure from fleakind’s glorious past. May it mark you forever as a friend to us all.
original_zh_text: <hpage>那就好，我走遍纺络，处处都能遇见你们好奇的同胞。<hpage>你们对冒险的热忱令我钦佩，虽然常常力有不逮。<hpage>我向来独来独往，但与你们相遇也令我感到暖心。<page>哈哈！我们跳蚤也高兴得很！<page>请允许我献上最后的赠礼，这是跳蚤一族昔日的珍宝。愿它永远守护在您身边，铭记您为我族挚友。
translated_text: <hpage>很好，兄弟们。我在这片土地上游历了很远很深，但几乎无论走到哪里，我都会遇到像你这样友好而好奇的存在。<hpage>你们跳蚤对冒险有一种不同寻常的渴望，我觉得这令人钦佩，即使这种渴望很少与之相匹配。<hpage>虽然我早已习惯了独自旅行，但跟随你的旅程并分享你的进步是一件温暖的事。<page>啊，我很高兴你给我们做了跳蚤！<page>大黄蜂小姐，我很荣幸送给你最后一份礼物，跳蚤辉煌过去的宝藏。愿这标志着您永远是我们所有人的朋友。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Very good, guys. I have traveled far and deep in this land, but almost no matter where I go, I will always meet people as friendly and curious as you.<hpage>You fleas have an unusual desire for adventure, which I find admirable, even if this desire rarely matches it.<hpage>Although I have long been used to traveling alone, it is warm to follow your journey and share your progress.<page>Ah, I'm so glad you made us fleas!<page>Miss Bumblebee, I am honored to present you with my last gift, a treasure from the flea's glorious past. May this mark that you will always be a friend to all of us.

original_en_text: The spa is yours, dear guest! And always open for one so considerate and kindly as yourself... eheh heh...
original_zh_text: 请享受温泉吧，亲爱的顾客！这里随时向您这样贴心又善良的客人开放，嘿嘿嘿……
translated_text: 亲爱的客人们，水疗中心是你们的！并始终向像您这样有思想、善良的人敞开心扉。呵呵。
secondary_translated_text: Dear guests, the spa is yours! And always open your hearts to thoughtful, kind people like you. Hehe.

original_en_text: With luck, my dear, we will meet again when I have joined the flea caravan.<page>My carriage hides a special secret I’d gladly to share with you when next we meet!
original_zh_text: 运气好的话，我们在旅团再见。<page>我的车厢里给你留了一份惊喜呢，下次见面再为你揭晓！
translated_text: 亲爱的，如果幸运的话，当我加入跳蚤大篷车时我们会再次见面。<page>我的马车隐藏着一个特殊的秘密，下次见面时我很乐意与您分享！
secondary_translated_text: Honey, if I'm lucky, we'll meet again when I join the flea caravan.<page>My carriage hides a special secret that I will be happy to share with you the next time we meet!

original_en_text: The pact is made then. Fellows! Steel yourself! It is time, it is time!
original_zh_text: 那么契约达成！伙计们！打起精神！时候到了，时候到了！
translated_text: 协议就此达成。伙计们！坚强点！是时候了是时候了
secondary_translated_text: The agreement was reached. Guys! Be strong! It's time. It's time.

original_en_text: This long lake... Space is much more big here. Finally I have some quiet from the little fleas.
original_zh_text: 这片湖……真宽敞。终于能躲开小跳蚤们清净会儿了。
translated_text: 这个长长的湖。这里的空间要大得多。我终于可以冷静下来了。
secondary_translated_text: This long lake. The space here is much larger. I can finally calm down.

original_en_text: Ahh, that is a shame, but I understand. I’m sure our roads will cross each other soon enough.<page>And now, we must be off! Rouse yourself, fleas. The caravan roams once more!
original_zh_text: 唉，虽然遗憾，但能理解。相信我们很快会重逢的。<page>现在，我们该出发了！跳蚤们动起来，旅团要再度启程啦！
translated_text: 啊，对不起，但我明白。我相信我们的道路很快就会相交。<page>现在我们得走了振作起来，跳蚤们。商队又开始游荡了！
secondary_translated_text: Ah, I'm sorry, but I understand. I believe our paths will intersect soon.<page>Now we have to go. Cheer up, fleas. The caravan began to wander again!

original_en_text: The grand ceremony has ended, but still we play! Will you honour us with a display of Flea Juggle, Miss Grand Champion Hornet?
original_zh_text: 庆典虽已落幕，但游戏不止！冠军大人愿意赏脸继续玩跳蚤耍耍吗？
translated_text: 仪式结束了，但我们还在玩！你想向我们展示跳蚤杂耍者、冠军大黄蜂小姐吗？
secondary_translated_text: The ceremony is over, but we are still playing! Do you want to show us the flea juggler, the champion Miss Bumblebee?

original_en_text: Wonderful! Wonderful! The fleas will be overjoyed to share this next journey with our favoured companion! Let us away!
original_zh_text: 太好了！跳蚤们肯定会因为有贵客同行而欢欣雀跃！我们这就出发！
translated_text: 太好了！太好了！跳蚤会很高兴与我们最喜欢的同伴分享它们的下一次旅程！让我们走！
secondary_translated_text: Great! Great! Fleas will be happy to share their next journey with our favorite companions! Let us go!

original_en_text: Mamashka! Let our beautiful game begin! Flea Bounce!
original_zh_text: 玛玛什卡！蹦蹦游戏开始！
translated_text: 妈妈志香！让我们开始我们美丽的游戏吧！跳蚤弹跳！
secondary_translated_text: Mom Jixiang! Let's start our beautiful game! Fleas bounce!

original_en_text: <hpage>Unfortunately not, Fleamaster. I have visited many of this kingdom’s caves, and none would offer the safety and space you require.<hpage>If ever I come upon such a place, I will let you know.
original_zh_text: <hpage>很遗憾，并没有。我去过的洞窟都不符合你们的需求。<hpage>但若将来遇到，肯定前来告诉你们。
translated_text: <hpage>不幸的是，弗赖马斯特。我参观过这个王国的许多洞穴，但没有一个提供您所需的安全和空间。<hpage>如果我遇到这样的地方，我会告诉你的。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Unfortunately, Freimaster. I have visited many caves in this kingdom, but none provide the security and space you need.<hpage>If I came across a place like this, I would let you know.

original_en_text: How do you like our festival, Miss Hornet? While the world crumbles around us, we will laugh and dance and frolick!<page>Make merry with us, and play some of the games of old!<hpage>My time is slim, Fleamaster. If I am to join your games, know it will be only to hone my skills for the greater trial I must soon face below.<page>Of course! Of course! Joy or learnings! Any reason is fine by us, Miss Hornet!<page>And look here, we have Flea Juggle, where the challenge is to strike fleas upwards and keep them airborne for as long as possible.<page>To have our treasured guest challenge this humble game would be an honour for us, truly!
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐觉得我们的庆典如何？就算外面世界崩塌，我们照样欢欣起舞！<page>开心点，来陪我们玩玩老游戏吧！<hpage>我时间紧迫。参加游戏只是为了磨练技艺，应对接下来的恶战。<page>都行都行！不管是玩乐或修行都可以！<page>看这里，这是跳蚤耍耍——把跳蚤打上天，滞空越久越好！<page>贵客肯赏脸挑战，我们荣幸之至！
translated_text: 大黄蜂小姐，你觉得我们的假期怎么样？当我们周围的世界崩溃时，我们会大笑、跳舞、嬉戏！<page>和我们一起玩得开心，玩一些古老的游戏！<hpage>我的时间很短，Freymasters。如果我要加入你们的游戏，请知道这只是为了磨练我的技能，以应对下面我即将面临的更大考验。<page>当然！当然！幸福还在学习！任何理由都可以，大黄蜂小姐！<page>看看这里，我们有跳蚤杂耍，挑战是击中跳蚤并让它们尽可能长时间地在空中飞行。<page>我们非常荣幸能够邀请我们宝贵的嘉宾挑战这场微不足道的比赛！
secondary_translated_text: Miss Bumblebee, what do you think of our vacation? When the world around us collapses, we laugh, dance, and play!<page>Have fun with us and play some old games!<hpage>My time is short, Freymasters. If I'm going to join your game, please know that this is just to hone my skills for the greater test I'm about to face next.<page>Of course! Of course! Happiness is still learning! Any reason will do, miss bumblebee!<page>Look here, we have flea juggling, and the challenge is to hit the fleas and keep them flying in the air for as long as possible.<page>We are very honored to invite our valuable guests to challenge this insignificant competition!

original_en_text: A mistake, treasured guest! Never again! Ohhh. Never again!
original_zh_text: 一场误会啊贵客！绝不再犯！我保证！
translated_text: 一个错误，亲爱的客人！再也不会了！哦再也不会了！
secondary_translated_text: A mistake, dear guest! Never again! Oh, never again!

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair greetings again, large flea. Amongst all of your troupe, I had little doubt you would survive to reach this caravan.<hpage>Would you tell me now of the task that saw you so apart from your fellows, and so fearsome in form?<page>Grrr....Bug not flea! Mine is to track, by trail and smell and senses sharp. Find our friend fleas, our young most of most, to bring them together and grow them strong.<hpage>If you have sensed the locations of other lost fleas, share them with me. I may be able to send them safe to the caravan.<page>My learnings? Not free for you, bug not flea. Rosaries! Give those and I shall say of what I have sensed. Work like mine... much long, and hard. For that, I deserve some riches held.
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了，大个子。你能平安到达这里倒是不令我意外。<hpage>能告诉我你为何离群索居，还练就这副体魄么？<page>吼……我负责追踪，靠着足迹气味，找回幼崽养壮族群。<hpage>若是探知迷途跳蚤下落，就告诉我，或许能送他们归队。<page>我的发现？外族虫，不白给，拿念珠来！我这行当又苦又累，理应拿点报酬。
translated_text: <hpage>再次问候，大跳蚤。在你们所有的团队中，我毫不怀疑你们能够幸存下来到达这支车队。<hpage>现在你能告诉我是什么任务让你以如此可怕的形式与你的同伴拉开了距离吗？<page>咕噜……昆虫不是跳蚤！我的是通过痕迹、气味和敏锐的感官进行追踪。找到我们的跳蚤朋友，最年轻的跳蚤，把他们聚集在一起，让他们变得坚强。<hpage>如果您已经感应到其他丢失跳蚤的位置，请与我分享。我也许可以将它们安全地带到大篷车。<page>我的学习？它对你来说不是免费的，虫子不是跳蚤。念珠！鉴于此，我会说出我的感受。像我一样工作。漫长而艰难。为此，我应该有一些财富。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Greetings again, big flea. Of all your teams, I have no doubt that you will survive to reach this team.<hpage>Now can you tell me what mission has allowed you to distance yourself from your companions in such a terrible way?<page>Gollum... Insects are not fleas! Mine is tracking through traces, odors and keen senses. Find our flea friends, the youngest flea, gather them together and make them strong.<hpage>If you have sensed the location of other lost fleas, please share it with me. I might be able to bring them safely to the caravan.<page>My studies? It's not free to you, bugs are not fleas. Rosary beads! In view of this, I will tell you how I feel. Work like me. Long and difficult. For this, I should have some wealth.

original_en_text: So many lost fleas have made it here... Truly, I’d never dared to hope we could gather such a grand company.<page>But, oh! The world has grown so dangerous, and there may be more lost fleas out there. I do so hope they can find their way to us!
original_zh_text: 这么多迷途同胞都回来了……真是做梦都不敢想！<page>如今外面更凶险了，可能还有其他流落的同胞。真希望他们能找到我们！
translated_text: 这么多迷失的跳蚤来到这里..事实上，我从来不敢希望我们能聚集这么大的公司。<page>但是，哦！世界变得如此危险，可能会有更多的跳蚤消失。我真的希望他们能找到我们的路！
secondary_translated_text: So many lost fleas come here.. In fact, I never dared to wish that we could gather such a large company.<page>But, oh! The world has become so dangerous that more fleas may disappear. I really hope they can find our way!

original_en_text: We fleas are all gathered, but now the world has loudly marked its ending! As great as our numbers grew, it seems our caravan will be the last.<page>There is only one thing left to do... but the preparations require time. If your travels wind their way back to us, dear friend, you yourself are welcome to participate...
original_zh_text: 跳蚤们虽已团聚，但世界即将毁灭！恐怕我们是最后的旅团了…….<page>只剩最后一事可做……但需时间准备。亲爱的朋友，如果再来，欢迎参与……
translated_text: 我们跳蚤都聚集在一起了，但现在世界正在大声标志着它的终结！尽管我们的人数持续增长，但我们的团队似乎将是最后一个。<page>只剩下一件事要做了……但准备需要时间。亲爱的朋友们，如果您的旅行回到我们身边，欢迎您亲自参与。
secondary_translated_text: We fleas are all gathered together, but now the world is loudly marking its end! Although our numbers continue to grow, it appears that our team will be the last.<page>There is only one thing left to do... but preparation takes time. Dear friends, if your trip comes back to us, you are welcome to participate in it yourself.

original_en_text: Miss Hornet, I must tell, we’ve seen evidence nearby of a hunter of our tribe, a flea that seeks fleas!<page>As pungent and gruff as their sort often are, they’re still useful to have around a caravan.<page>A flea of their rare skill, settled among us, could offer defence and more.<page>If you’re still to be helping grow our town, search them out, up atop the muck choked ducts.
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐！附近有我们族群的猎手出没的迹象，那是位专逮跳蚤的跳蚤！<page>虽然那家伙臭烘烘的又粗鲁，但对旅团很有用。<page>这样的好手要是能入伙，既能当护卫又有大用。<page>如果您还愿意帮忙壮大我们的旅团，就去腐殖渠上面找找吧！
translated_text: 大黄蜂小姐，我必须告诉你，我们在附近看到了我们部落猎人的证据，一只正在寻找跳蚤的跳蚤！<page>尽管它们通常很辣、很粗鲁，但它们在大篷车周围仍然很有用。<page>一只拥有罕见技能的跳蚤定居在我们中间，可以提供防御等等。<page>如果您仍然想帮助我们小镇的发展，请在淤泥堵塞的管道中寻找它们。
secondary_translated_text: Miss Bumblebee, I must tell you that we saw evidence of our tribe's hunter nearby, a flea looking for fleas!<page>Although they are usually spicy and rude, they are still useful around caravans.<page>A flea with rare skills settled among us and could provide defense and more.<page>If you still want to help develop our town, look for them in silt clogged pipes.

original_en_text: A cauldron full of Flea Brew.
secondary_translated_text: A big pot filled with flea beer.

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair greetings again, large flea. Of your many companions, I had little worry you would survive safe to find this caravan.<hpage>Would you tell me now of the task that saw you so apart from your fellows, and so fearsome in form?<page>Grrr....Mine was to track, by trail and smell and senses sharp. Find our friend fleas, our young most of most, to bring them together so strong they could grow.<page>A task once important, mine! But not now. All fleas are here, safe. A rare many! Time for toasts, and brew to fill our bellies!
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了，大个子。就知道你能活着找到这里。<hpage>能告诉我你为何离群索居，还练就这副体魄么？<page>吼……我以前负责追踪，靠着足迹气味，找回幼崽养壮族群。<page>这差事曾经很重要，但不需要了！现在大伙都齐了！该喝酒庆祝！
translated_text: <hpage>再次问候，大跳蚤。在你众多的同伴中，我并不担心你会发现这支商队安全地活着。<hpage>现在你能告诉我是什么任务让你以如此可怕的形式与你的同伴拉开了距离吗？<page>咕噜……我的目的是通过痕迹、气味和敏锐的感官来追踪它。找到我们的跳蚤朋友，最年轻的跳蚤，并将他们聚集在一起，让他们变得更强大并成长。<page>曾经重要的任务，我的！但不是现在。所有跳蚤都在这里，安全。稀有多了！是时候举杯喝点酒填饱肚子了！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Greetings again, big flea. Among your many companions, I am not worried that you will find this caravan safe and sound.<hpage>Now can you tell me what mission has allowed you to distance yourself from your companions in such a terrible way?<page>Gollum... my intention is to track it by traces, smells and keen senses. Find our flea friends, the youngest fleas, and gather them together to make them stronger and grow.<page>It was once an important mission, mine! But not now. All fleas are here, safe. Much rarer! It's time to raise a glass and fill your stomach with some wine!

original_en_text: Look here! All these lively fleas flocked to our caravan. Thanks to you and your hunting, our numbers grow grand. Mayhap, in time, we could grow to match even those caravans of our fabled past?<hpage>To see so many safe is a welcome sight, Fleamaster. Their playful cheer suggests you are a fine steward for the swelling troupe.<page>Such kind words, Miss Hornet! How lucky we are to have found a friend so fair!<page>But now, we must away! These moors have been our host long enough. It is time to climb and hoist towards drier caves!<page>Good friend to fleas, would you join us on this next journey?
original_zh_text: 看！这么多活蹦乱跳的同胞加入！多亏您帮忙，队伍越来越壮大。或许能重现当年先祖们的盛况？<hpage>看见这么多跳蚤平安无事，我也很欣慰。他们的欢声笑语也证明了你是个称职的领队。<page>大黄蜂小姐过奖了！能结交您这样的朋友才是旅团的幸运！<page>但现在该启程了！沼地虽好，但不应久留，该向更干燥的洞窟进发了！<page>跳蚤之友，愿意与我们一起出发吗？
translated_text: 看这里！所有这些活泼的跳蚤都涌向我们的车队。感谢您和您的狩猎，我们的数量正在增长。也许，随着时间的推移，我们甚至可以成长为与我们传奇过去的大篷车相媲美？<hpage>看到这么多人安全是一个受欢迎的景象，弗莱克马斯特。他们俏皮的欢呼声表明你是这个不断壮大的剧团的出色管家。<page>你太好了，大黄蜂小姐！我们多么幸运，能找到这么美丽的朋友啊！<page>但现在，我们必须离开！这些荒地已经成为我们的主人很久了。是时候攀登并攀登到干燥的洞穴了！<page>跳蚤的好朋友，你想加入我们的下一段旅程吗？
secondary_translated_text: Look here! All these lively fleas flock to our motorcade. Thanks to you and your hunting, our numbers are growing. Perhaps, over time, we can even grow to rival the caravans of our legendary past?<hpage>Seeing so many people safe is a welcome sight, Flecmaster. Their playful cheers show that you are an excellent steward of this growing troupe.<page>That's so kind of you, miss bumblebee! How lucky we are to find such beautiful friends!<page>But now, we must leave! These wastelands have been our masters for a long time. It's time to climb and climb into the dry cave!<page>Good friend of fleas, would you like to join us on the next journey?

original_en_text: Vikna. The trial has ended.<page>Bug not flea... impressive was your performance. Your score exceeds even my own.<page>To see skill so much, moments before everything ends, gives me unexpected joy.<page>Rishkiz... I congratulate you, champion.
original_zh_text: 维克纳，试炼结束。<page>虫子，你超越了我，没想到外族也有这种身手。<page>末日临近还能见识这般技艺，着实是意料之外的惊喜。<page>里什基兹……祝贺你，冠军。
translated_text: 维克纳。审判结束了。<page>昆虫不是跳蚤。你的表现令人印象深刻。你的分数甚至超过我的。<page>在一切结束前的那一刻看到这么多的技巧，给了我意想不到的快乐。<page>危险。我祝贺你，冠军。
secondary_translated_text: Vickner. The trial is over.<page>Insects are not fleas. Your performance was impressive. Your score even exceeds mine.<page>Seeing so many techniques at the moment before it all ended gave me unexpected happiness.<page>Dangerous. I congratulate you, champion.

original_en_text: Ahh, Miss Hornet! Greetings, and well met, once again!<page>The journey here was long, but we didn’t lose a single flea! And now fate has brought us back together again... what a marvel!<hpage>It is good to see you safe, Fleamaster. The journey to this moor from the caverns below is long and dangerous.<page>Dangerous, certainly, but we fleas are born to roam!<page>And now, you must go and see Grishkin, sitting there by the bubbling cauldron. After long travel, we drink to revive our spirits!
original_zh_text: 啊！大黄蜂小姐！又见面真是太好了！<page>长途跋涉到这但没丢一只跳蚤！命运也让我们重逢……真是奇迹！<hpage>旅团平安就好，从下方洞窟到这沼地，路上肯定充满危险。<page>确实有不少危险，但跳蚤天生爱流浪！<page>现在，您去找格里什琴吧，她在冒泡的大锅旁。长途劳顿后该喝点提神！
translated_text: 啊，大黄蜂小姐！你好，又见面了！<page>来到这里是一段漫长的旅程，但我们没有失去一只跳蚤！命运现在让我们重聚，真是个奇迹！<hpage>很高兴看到你平安无事，跳蚤大师。从下面的洞穴到沼泽的旅程是一段漫长而危险的旅程。<page>当然这很危险，但我们跳蚤生来就是为了漫游！<page>现在，你必须去看看格里什金，他坐在沸腾的大锅旁边。长途旅行后，我们喝酒提神！
secondary_translated_text: Ah, miss bumblebee! Hello, we meet again!<page>It's been a long journey here, but we didn't lose a flea! What a miracle fate has now reunited us!<hpage>Good to see you're safe and sound, master flea. The journey from the caves below to the swamps is a long and dangerous journey.<page>Of course it's dangerous, but we fleas are born to roam!<page>Now, you must go and see Grishkin, who is sitting next to the boiling cauldron. After a long trip, we drank to refresh ourselves!

original_en_text: Grrr.. bug not flea. Why you must bother me? This spot is mine, fair fought and earned.<hpage>I won’t stay long, madam. Nor would I contest your right to this cave.<hpage>I have encountered several of your fellow fleas, united in a caravan. Perhaps you would consider joining with them?<hpage>Yours seems a hardy hide, and I fear alone they lack the strength to survive long in this land.<page>Caravan? Grrr. Felt it in my fur... Time for change. If caravan is close, then my task, these lands, may near be complete.<page>Now... Grrr. Much talk I gave. You leave me! Meet again at caravan, amongst good fellows. There I share my learnings of fleas and Pharloom. Till then, rest I need! Off, bug!
original_zh_text: 吼……外族虫，干嘛烦我？这地盘是我打下来的！<hpage>我无意久留，跳蚤。也不打算抢你山洞。<hpage>我在一个旅团见过你的同胞。为何不加入他们？<hpage>你看着有些本事，他们也缺少护卫。<page>旅团？吼……感觉到了……是时候了。旅团出发，我在这的活也要结束了。<page>唔……不废话了。你走吧！在旅团再见，到时告诉你跳蚤位置的情报。现在我要休息！
translated_text: 咕噜..昆虫不是跳蚤。你为什么要打扰我？这个位置是我的，公平竞争，获胜。<hpage>我不会待太久，女士。我不会质疑你对这个洞穴的权利<hpage>我遇到了你的几个跳蚤同伴，他们聚集在一个大篷车里。也许你会考虑加入他们？<hpage>你的皮毛似乎很坚韧，恐怕它们本身也缺乏在这片土地上长期生存的力量。<page>大篷车？嗯.在我的毛皮上感觉到它。是时候做出改变了。如果商队接近，那么我的任务，这些土地，可能就接近完成了。<page>现在...咕噜。我说了很多。你离开我！在大篷车里，在好朋友们中间再次见面。在那里，我分享了我对跳蚤和法罗的了解。在那之前，我需要休息！关掉它，虫子！
secondary_translated_text: Gollum.. Insects are not fleas. Why are you bothering me? This position is mine, fair play and win.<hpage>I won't stay long, ma 'am. I will not question your rights to this cave.<hpage>I met several of your flea companions who were gathered in a caravan. Maybe you will consider joining them?<hpage>Your fur seems to be very tough, but I'm afraid they themselves lack the strength to survive in this land for a long time.<page>Caravan? hmm. Feel it on my fur. It's time to make a change. If the caravan approaches, then my mission, these lands, may be nearly completed.<page>now... Gollum. I said a lot. You leave me! Meet again in the caravan among good friends. There, I shared what I knew about fleas and faro. Until then, I need to rest! Turn it off, bug!

original_en_text: Ohhhh! What other choice do we poor wretches have?! Cruel fate leaves us with only one last task...<page>Dear friend... Miss Hornet! Forgive us, but we beg one more favour from you. Will you accompany us in our final act...?
original_zh_text: 唉！我们这些可怜虫别无选择！残酷的命运只留下这一最后任务……<page>亲爱的朋友……大黄蜂女士！请原谅，但我们恳求您最后再帮一次忙。您可愿陪我们完成旅途的终幕……？
translated_text: 哦！我们穷人还有什么选择？！残酷的命运只留给我们最后一项任务……<page>亲爱的朋友们。大黄蜂小姐！原谅我们，但我们请求您再帮一个忙。你愿意陪我们完成最后的表演吗……？
secondary_translated_text: Oh! What options do we poor have?! The cruel fate leaves us with only one last task...<page>Dear friends. Miss Bumblebee! Forgive us, but we ask you one more favor. Would you like to accompany us to complete the final performance...?

original_en_text: Vikna! The game is ended, and we have a new Flea Juggle champion! Incredible!<page>Miss Hornet, with your skill, I’m certain you could best all three of our games and become the grandest champion of them all!
original_zh_text: 维克纳！游戏结束！新的耍耍冠军诞生了！太强了！<page>以大黄蜂小姐的本事绝对能包揽我们三种游戏的冠军！
translated_text: 维克纳！游戏结束了，我们有了一个新的跳蚤杂耍者！难以置信！<page>大黄蜂小姐，以你的技术，我相信你一定能在我们的三场比赛中取得最好的成绩，成为所有比赛中最伟大的冠军！
secondary_translated_text: Vickner! The game is over and we have a new flea juggler! Unbelievable!<page>Miss Bumblebee, with your skills, I believe you will achieve the best results in our three games and become the greatest champion of all games!

original_en_text: My, what a sweet face now emerges from the darkness! Poor Kratt has been hiding here from those blackened beasts for too long, all alone!<hpage>The beasts and bugs ensnared by the black thread are dangerous indeed. You have done right to hide yourself from them, sir.<hpage>That metal carriage... It is yours, I assume?<page>Ooh, yes, yes! I’m setting out to join the nearest flea caravan, aren’t I? Safety in numbers, yes? I’ve had more than enough of venturing alone.<page>And you... I trust I will see you there? My carriage hides a special secret I’d gladly share with you when next we meet! Heh heh!
original_zh_text: 哇，没想到黑暗中竟出现这样一张美丽的脸！可怜的克拉特独自在这躲避黑丝好久了。<hpage>受丝咒侵蚀的虫兽确实危险，你躲起来是对的。<hpage>那金属车厢……是你的吧？<page>对对！我正要投奔跳蚤旅团呢！独行太危险了！<page>你……也会去旅团吧？那我们旅团再见，车厢里有惊喜等着你哟！
translated_text: 天哪，黑暗中出现了一张多么甜美的脸啊！可怜的克拉特独自躲在这里躲避那些变黑的野兽太久了！<hpage>被黑线困住的野兽和昆虫确实很危险。先生，你向他们隐藏自己是正确的。<hpage>那辆金属马车……我想这是你的？<page>哦，是的，是的！我正准备加入最近的跳蚤舰队，不是吗？安全号码，对吧？我厌倦了独自冒险。<page>而你...我相信我会在那里见到你？我的马车隐藏着一个特殊的秘密，下次见面时我很乐意与您分享！呵呵！
secondary_translated_text: My God, what a sweet face appeared in the darkness! Poor Clutter has been hiding here alone from those blackened beasts for too long!<hpage>Beasts and insects trapped by black lines are indeed dangerous. Sir, you were right to hide yourself from them.<hpage>That metal carriage... I think this is yours?<page>Oh, yes, yes! I'm about to join the nearest flea fleet, aren't I? Security number, right? I'm tired of taking risks alone.<page>And you... I believe I will see you there? My carriage hides a special secret that I will be happy to share with you the next time we meet! Hehe!

original_en_text: There are still many fleas for us to be united with though, and we’ve rested long enough. The caravan must head higher!<page>Oh, but stranger, how remiss of me! I introduced myself earlier without ever asking for your own name. Forgive me! Please, what shall we call you?<hpage>You may call me Hornet, Fleamaster. Know that I, like you, am glad to see your fellow fleas safe with your caravan. These are dangerous lands to travel alone.<hpage>I still have a long journey ahead of me. If I come across any more fleas, I will assist where I am able.<page>Oh, vavenda! That is to say, incredible! What a beautiful thing for me to hear!<page>Dear friend... Miss Hornet. Our caravan must be away now, toward the wide moor high above. Would you travel with us, as our honoured guest?
original_zh_text: 虽然还有许多同胞未归，但我们休整太久了。旅团该向高处进发了！<page>哎呀我真是失礼！之前只顾自报家门，还没请教您的姓名？<hpage>叫我大黄蜂即可。很高兴见你和同胞平安相聚，在这种地方独行确实太过凶险。<hpage>我的旅途尚未结束，如果再遇见跳蚤，会尽力帮助他们的。<page>哎呀！这可太好了！<page>亲爱的朋友……大黄蜂小姐。旅团即将前往上方辽阔沼地，您愿意作为贵宾与我们同行吗？
translated_text: 但还有很多跳蚤需要我们团结起来，我们已经休息够久了。团队必须走得更高！<page>哦，但是奇怪的是，我是多么疏忽啊！我之前自我介绍过，但我没有问你的名字。原谅我！拜托，我们应该叫你什么？<hpage>你可以叫我大黄蜂，Freymasters。你知道，我和你一样高兴看到你的跳蚤同伴在你的车队中安全。独自旅行是危险的土地。<hpage>我还有很长的路要走。如果我遇到更多跳蚤，我会尽一切努力提供帮助。<page>哦，瓦文达！换句话说，令人难以置信！对我来说听到这是多么美妙的事情啊！<page>亲爱的朋友们。大黄蜂小姐。我们的商队现在必须出发前往高处的广阔沼泽。作为我们的客人，您想和我们一起旅行吗？
secondary_translated_text: But there are still many fleas that need us to unite together, and we have rested long enough. The team must go higher!<page>Oh, but the strange thing is how negligent I was! I introduced myself before, but I didn't ask for your name. Forgive me! Please, what should we call you?<hpage>You can call me bumblebee, Freymasters. You know, I'm as happy as you are to see your flea companions safe in your fleet. Traveling alone is dangerous land.<hpage>I still have a long way to go. If I encounter more fleas, I will do everything I can to help.<page>Oh, Wavunda! In other words, unbelievable! What a wonderful thing for me to hear this!<page>Dear friends. Miss Bumblebee. Our caravan must now set out for the vast swamps high above. As our guest, would you like to travel with us?

original_en_text: So many awful places have us fleas travelled. Many times I almost die. But here is seems safe enough.<page>You will have rest too? Is space enough for us all now... friend.
original_zh_text: 旅团闯过了多少险地，好几回我都差点死了。但这里似乎很安全。<page>你也留下休息吧，朋友？现在地方够大。
translated_text: 我们跳蚤去过很多可怕的地方。很多次我差点死了。但这里似乎足够安全。<page>你也想休息吗？现在空间足够我们所有人吗？朋友
secondary_translated_text: We fleas have been to many terrible places. I almost died many times. But it seems safe enough here.<page>Do you want to rest too? Is there enough space for all of us now? friends

original_en_text: Welcome again, Miss Hornet! See how high our caravan has climbed, resting right on the doorstep of that mighty Citadel!<hpage>It is fortunate that all of your companions survived the trek, Fleamaster. The howling rise beside, and the tangled wood before it, have both claimed the lives of countless bugs.<page>Indeed! A perilous ascent! We have seen the many husks in passing. A mighty luck must shine on us, to journey with such success.
original_zh_text: 欢迎您，大黄蜂小姐！看我们攀得多高啊，就在圣堡大门旁！<hpage>你们能平安抵达这里实属万幸。旁边的峭壁和前边的丛林都葬送过无数旅行者。<page>确实凶险！沿途见到了无数空壳。我们定是受命运庇佑。
translated_text: 欢迎再次光临，大黄蜂小姐！看看我们的商队爬得多高，停在那座强大城堡的门口！<hpage>幸运的是，你所有的同伴都在漫长的旅程中幸存下来，弗赖马斯特。旁边的嚎叫和面前的纠结木头夺走了无数昆虫的生命。<page>确实如此！危险上升！我们过去见过很多贝壳。我们能取得这样的成功一定很幸运。
secondary_translated_text: Welcome again, Miss Bumblebee! Look how high our caravan climbed and stopped at the door of that powerful castle!<hpage>Fortunately, all your companions survived the long journey, Freimaster. The howling next to him and the tangled wood in front of him claimed the lives of countless insects.<page>Indeed! Danger rises! We have seen a lot of shells in the past. We must be very lucky to achieve such success.

original_en_text: Look, look! So many fleas have joined the caravan! What a miracle! We can not thank you enough for honouring our humble wish!
original_zh_text: 看呐！这么多跳蚤加入了旅团！真是奇迹！真不知该如何感激您实现愿望！
translated_text: 看，看！这么多跳蚤加入了车队！多么奇迹啊！我们非常感激您实现了我们微薄的愿望！
secondary_translated_text: Look, look! So many fleas joined the team! What a miracle! We are very grateful to you for fulfilling our modest wish!

original_en_text: You remain, bug not flea? Would you seek service of me, ehh? Mine is knowledge much, the places of the lost little ones, heard and smelt across the caves.<page>You help find! And bring! Best we come together, we fleas all... now that times turn dark...
original_zh_text: 你还在啊，外族虫？要我帮忙吗？我知道那些迷途小辈的踪迹，各处洞穴都有。<page>你来寻找！把它们带来！最好齐聚于此，全体跳蚤……趁黑暗未临......
translated_text: 你留下来，昆虫不是跳蚤吗？你会要求我的服务吗，嗯？我有很多知识，山洞里听到和闻到丢失的小东西的地方。<page>帮我找到它！拿过来我们最好能一起消灭所有人。现在时代已经黑了……
secondary_translated_text: If you stay, aren't insects fleas? Would you ask for my services, huh? I have a lot of knowledge about places in caves where I hear and smell lost little things.<page>Help me find it! Bring it over and we better destroy everyone together. The times are dark now...

original_en_text: As you wish, sweet one. Shall we just rest here together on the shore of eternity instead?
original_zh_text: 如你所愿，甜心。要不就和我在这岸边静静地守望末日？
translated_text: 如你所愿，甜心。我们是否会一起在永恒的海岸上安息？
secondary_translated_text: As you wish, sweetheart. Will we rest together on the eternal coast?

original_en_text: Mamashka! I am saying, let the game begin! Flea Juggle!
original_zh_text: 玛玛什卡！我是说，游戏开始！跳蚤耍耍！
translated_text: 妈妈志香！我的意思是，让游戏开始吧！跳蚤杂耍！
secondary_translated_text: Mom Jixiang! I mean, let the game start! Flea juggling!

original_en_text: What a beautiful spot you’ve gifted us, Miss Hornet! Safe apart from the dark and death of the lands beside. A place for fleas to grow smart and strong.<page>Here we shall see our travels end, for in Pharloom there could be no finer place to settle.<hpage>I am glad the location suits, Fleamaster. It is a calming thing to know these many fleas may survive. Most bugs of Pharloom seem destined for far bleaker fates.<page>Indeed! A hopeful future awaits! And only because of yourself and your efforts. To commemorate our arrival, it would be my pleasure to perform a small service for you.<page>I have been learning to sew, and the little fleas have been gathering materials for me. I thought I could add an extra pocket to your tool pouch, to make your travels just a little easier.<page>A trifling favour, much less than you deserve, but still I hope it meets to your satisfaction!
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐选的地方太好了！远离外面的危险，跳蚤们肯定能在这茁壮成长！<page>这里就是我们旅团的终点站了，纺络再找不到比这更好的归宿了！<hpage>合你们的心意就好。能有这么多跳蚤幸存，我也感到高兴。其他虫类大多没那么幸运。<page>没错！未来充满希望，这全仰赖您的帮助。为纪念乔迁之喜，请收下这份纪念品。<page>我最近学了缝纫，小家伙们也帮我收集材料。想给你的工具袋加个口袋，让旅途轻松些。<page>区区薄礼不足挂齿，希望您别失望！
translated_text: 大黄蜂小姐，您给了我们一个多么美丽的地方啊！远离黑暗和死亡之地。跳蚤变得聪明和强壮的地方。<page>我们将在这里结束我们的旅行，因为法鲁姆没有更好的定居地点了。<hpage>我很高兴地点是对的，跳蚤大师。知道这些跳蚤能存活下来是一件平静的事。大多数的法鲁昆虫似乎注定要面临更悲惨的命运。<page>确实如此！充满希望的未来正在等待！只是因为你自己和你的努力。为了纪念我们的到来，我很高兴为您提供一项小型服务。<page>我一直在学习缝纫，小跳蚤一直在为我收集材料。我想我可以在你的工具包里多加一个口袋，让你的旅行更轻松一些。<page>一个小忙，比你应得的要少得多，但我仍然希望它让你满意！
secondary_translated_text: Miss Bumblebee, what a beautiful place you have given us! Stay away from darkness and death. A place where fleas become smart and strong.<page>We will end our trip here because there is no better place to settle in Faroum.<hpage>I'm glad the place is right, flea master. It's a peaceful matter to know that these fleas can survive. Most Faro insects seem destined to face a more tragic fate.<page>Indeed! A promising future is waiting! Just because of yourself and your efforts. In honor of our arrival, I am pleased to provide you with a small service.<page>I have been learning to sew, and little fleas have been collecting materials for me. I think I can add an extra pocket to your kit to make your travel easier.<page>A small favor, much less than you deserve, but I still hope it satisfies you!

original_en_text: My dear Flea Bounce champion, will you play with us again? Let us dance and fly above the waters until the world itself falls away!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的蹦蹦冠军，要再玩一次吗？在水面上飞舞直至世界崩塌吧！
translated_text: 我亲爱的跳蚤弹跳冠军，你还会和我们一起玩吗？让我们在水上跳舞、飞翔，直到世界本身消失！
secondary_translated_text: My dear flea bounce champion, will you still play with us? Let us dance and fly on the water until the world itself disappears!

original_en_text: Sweet one! What a delight to see you emerge from the horrible darkness now enveloping the world!<page>Poor Kratt feared he would have only his mangy fellow fleas for company at the end of everything. How kind of you to spend your last moments here with me!
original_zh_text: 甜心！没想到世界末日还能和你见面，真高兴！<page>可怜的克拉特本以为最后只能和脏跳蚤们作伴，多谢你在这最后时刻陪着我！
translated_text: 甜心！很高兴看到你从笼罩世界的可怕黑暗中走出来！<page>可怜的克拉特担心最终他只剩下肮脏的跳蚤同伴。很高兴你能在这里和我一起度过你的最后时刻！
secondary_translated_text: Sweetheart! It's good to see you emerging from the terrible darkness that has shrouded the world!<page>Poor Clutter feared that in the end he would be left with only his filthy flea companions. I'm so happy you can spend your last moments here with me!

original_en_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, I took your request from the wishwall in the pilgrim camp. You are seeking fleas to join your caravan? I have found and freed many throughout my travels.<page>Oh yes, indeed! And look here, they all have made their way to us! So many gathered, it seems a miracle. Our wishes granted before even your promise was known!
original_zh_text: <hpage>跳蚤首领，我在朝圣营地祈愿墙接下你的委托。你在召集跳蚤加入旅团？我在旅途中已经解救了许多跳蚤。<page>没错！看啊，它们全都归队了！我们的祈愿尚未传达，就已然实现，真是个奇迹！
translated_text: <hpage>Fleamaster，我从朝圣者营地的愿望墙上收到了你的请求。您正在寻找跳蚤加入您的舰队吗？在我的旅行中，我找到并释放了很多人。<page>哦，是的，是的！看这里，他们都向我们走来了！这么多人聚集在一起，简直是一个奇迹。甚至在你的承诺还没有被知晓之前，我们的愿望就实现了！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, I received your request from the wall of wishes at the Pilgrim Camp. Are you looking for fleas to join your fleet? During my travels, I have found and released many people.<page>Oh, yes, yes! Look here, they're all coming towards us! It is a miracle that so many people gathered together. Even before your promise was known, our wish came true!

original_en_text: Vikna! The game is now ended, but you can play again, as much you wish... until the end of the world comes for us all!
original_zh_text: 维克纳！我是说，游戏结束，但随时可以重玩……直到世界末日！
translated_text: 维克纳！游戏现已结束，但如果您愿意的话可以再玩一次。直到世界末日到来！
secondary_translated_text: Vickner! The game is now over, but you can play it again if you want. Until the end of the world comes!

original_en_text: Stranger, will you hear my worry? The time has come for us fleas to find each other and travel together, as has happened through generations before.<page>The many fleas of this kingdom should be flocking to our caravan, but times have become dangerous. You feel it too, yes? Our poor cousins, out there, in hiding!<page>Would you, could you, help us find these poor, lost fleas? We daren’t continue our journey until some of the poor dears have found their way here to us!
original_zh_text: 旅者，愿意跟我聊聊么？我们跳蚤的祖辈曾相聚同行，现在我想是时候召集同胞了。<page>本该有无数同胞来投奔旅团，可如今危机四伏，您也感受到了吧？可怜的同胞们还在外躲藏！<page>您……愿意帮忙寻找迷途的跳蚤们吗？同胞没有到齐我们不敢上路啊！
translated_text: 陌生人，你能听到我的担忧吗？现在是我们跳蚤互相寻找并共同旅行的时候了，就像前几代人所发生的那样。<page>这个王国中的许多跳蚤应该涌向我们的商队，但时代已经变得危险了。你也感觉到了，不是吗？我们可怜的表兄弟，就在那里，躲藏起来了！<page>你能帮助我们找到这些可怜的迷失跳蚤吗？我们不敢继续我们的旅程，直到一些可怜的亲爱的人在这里找到我们！
secondary_translated_text: Stranger, can you hear my concerns? It's time for us fleas to find each other and travel together, as has happened in previous generations.<page>Many fleas in this kingdom should flock to our caravans, but times have become dangerous. You felt it, too, didn't you? Our poor cousins, right there, in hiding!<page>Can you help us find these poor lost fleas? We dare not continue our journey until some poor dear ones find us here!

translated_text: 与跳蚤大篷车一起旅行？

original_en_text: Alas, Miss Hornet! Until our paths cross again, our dearest wishes go with you.<hpage>Safe travels to you and your troupe, Fleamaster.
original_zh_text: 那好吧，大黄蜂小姐！愿好运常伴您左右，下次再见！<hpage>也祝你们一路平安。
translated_text: 唉，大黄蜂小姐！在我们的道路再次相遇之前，我们最深切的祝愿与您同在。<hpage>Fleamaster，祝您和您的剧团旅途平安。
secondary_translated_text: Alas, Miss Bumblebee! Before our paths meet again, our deepest wishes are with you.<hpage>Fleamaster, wish you and your troupe a safe journey.

original_en_text: And so the great ceremony has reached its climax and its grand champion has emerged!<page>Thank you for spending your last moments with us here, Miss Hornet.<page>Though the world will soon end, and our paradise will crumble, the memories of friendship we all shared shall surely echo through the oncoming void for all eternity!<hpage>Fleamaster, your sentiment is kind, but this world will not end.<page>Oh? How good of you to speak words of hope for our benefit, but we have accepted our fate. Come, let us forget the past and revel together!<hpage>It is not merely hope that I offer you, sir, but a promise. This kingdom’s suffering has a singular cause, and by my own claw will it be cleansed.<hpage>Perhaps not every flea will survive what is coming... but the world will not die, and your settlement may still see chance to prosper.<page>Ahh? You speak... with such conviction. But I cannot bring myself to hope such, I am sorry.<page>Come what may, we fleas will be here until the end. And the games will continue, of course! Celebrate with us for as long as you wish, dear friend.
original_zh_text: 加冕仪式结束，庆典高潮已过，总冠军诞生！<page>大黄蜂小姐，感谢您与我们共度最后的时光。<page>纵使世界即将毁灭，乐园即将倒塌，我们的友谊也会永存于虚空之间！<hpage>谢谢你，跳蚤首领。但世界不会终结的。<page>感谢您在这最后关头还给我们希望，但我们认命了。还是及时行乐吧！<hpage>我给的并非虚无缥缈的希望，而是承诺。纺络的苦难都有源头，而我一定会亲手将其终结。<hpage>或许不是所有跳蚤都能幸存……但只要世界不毁灭，旅团终将再次启程。<page>啊哈哈，您这话……信念坚定。但我已不敢奢望。<page>无论如何，跳蚤们会坚持到最后。游戏永不停止！您想在这里玩多久都行，朋友！
translated_text: 盛大的仪式进入高潮，伟大的冠军出现了！<page>感谢您在这里与我们共度最后的时光，大黄蜂小姐。<page>尽管世界即将毁灭，我们的天堂即将崩溃，但我们共同的友谊的记忆将永远在即将到来的虚空中回响！<hpage>Fleamaster，你们的关系很好，但世界不会终结。<page>哦？你为我们的利益说出了充满希望的话，这真是太好了，但我们已经接受了我们的命运。来吧，让我们忘记过去，一起狂欢吧！<hpage>先生，我给你的不仅仅是希望，还有一个承诺。这个王国的苦难有其独特的原因，我将用自己的爪子净化它。<hpage>也许不是每个跳蚤都能在即将到来的事情中幸存下来。但世界不会消亡，你的定居点可能仍然有机会繁荣。<page>啊？说出来。带着这个信念。但我无法让自己抱有希望，我很抱歉。<page>无论发生什么，我们跳蚤都会在这里直到最后。当然，游戏还会继续！亲爱的朋友们，如果你愿意，就和我们一起庆祝吧。
secondary_translated_text: The grand ceremony reached its climax and the great champion appeared!<page>Thank you for spending your last moments with us here, Miss Bumblebee.<page>Although the world is about to end and our paradise is about to collapse, the memory of our common friendship will always echo in the coming void!<hpage>Fleamaster, you have a good relationship, but the world will not end.<page>Oh? It's great that you spoke hopeful words for our good, but we have accepted our destiny. Come on, let's forget the past and party together!<hpage>Sir, I give you not only hope, but also a promise. The suffering of this kingdom has its own unique causes, and I will purify it with my claws.<hpage>Maybe not every flea will survive what is to come. But the world will not die, and your settlement may still have a chance to prosper.<page>Huh? Say it. With this belief. But I couldn't bring myself hope, and I'm sorry.<page>No matter what happens, we fleas will be here until the end. Of course, the game will continue! Dear friends, if you like, celebrate with us.

original_en_text: Vikna! The game is ended, and we have a new Flea Juggle champion! Incredible!<page>You have proven yourself the champion at each of our flea games!<page>I am confident now that the grand champion of our festival has emerged. It is none other than yourself, of course!<page>And thusly, must our final ceremony begin. Fleas, prepare yourselves!
original_zh_text: 维克纳！游戏结束，新的耍耍冠军诞生！太强了！<page>您已称霸所有跳蚤游戏！<page>是当之无愧的庆典总冠军！<page>最终仪式现在开始！跳蚤们，做好准备！
translated_text: 维克纳！游戏结束了，我们有了一个新的跳蚤杂耍者！难以置信！<page>您已经证明自己是我们赢得的每一场跳蚤游戏的冠军！<page>我现在相信我们音乐节的总冠军已经出现。你当然是！<page>因此，我们最后的仪式必须开始。跳蚤，准备好！
secondary_translated_text: Vickner! The game is over and we have a new flea juggler! Unbelievable!<page>You have proven yourself to be the champion of every flea game we have won!<page>I now believe that the overall champion of our music festival has emerged. Of course you are!<page>Therefore, our final ceremony must begin. Flea, get ready!

original_en_text: You not want my learnings, bug not flea? Rare it is we share such things with ones outside our own.
original_zh_text: 不想要我情报？我们可很少愿意和外族分享这些。
translated_text: 你不想要我的知识，蠕虫不是跳蚤吗？我们很少与外面的人分享这样的事情。
secondary_translated_text: You don't want my knowledge, aren't worms fleas? We rarely share such things with people outside.

original_en_text: Miss Hornet, you are the greatest of us all in the Flea Juggle! But will you challenge yourself to ever higher achievements?
original_zh_text: 大黄蜂小姐是耍耍之王！要挑战更高记录吗？
translated_text: 大黄蜂小姐，你是跳蚤剧团里最好的！但你会挑战自己以取得更高的成绩吗？
secondary_translated_text: Miss Bumblebee, you are the best in the flea troupe! But would you challenge yourself to achieve higher results?

original_en_text: Dodeshna, stranger. You are looking a little... tired, is it? Unhealthy?<page>You can rest with us here, if wish. Is nice and dark, and warmth from below brings good health.<page>Still, you should make care not to stay much long. You are not flea, after all.
original_zh_text: 多德什纳，旅者。你看着……有点累？<page>想休息可以留下。这儿又暗又暖，很适合休养。<page>但别待太久，毕竟你终究不是跳蚤。
translated_text: 多德什纳，一个陌生人。你看起来有点。累了吧？不健康？<page>如果你愿意，可以和我们一起在这里休息。天气晴朗黑暗，下方的温暖带来健康。<page>尽管如此，您还是要小心，不要停留太久。毕竟，你不是跳蚤。
secondary_translated_text: Dodeshner, a stranger. You look a little. Are you tired? Unhealthy?<page>If you want, you can rest here with us. The weather is clear and dark, and the warmth below brings health.<page>Still, you should be careful not to stay too long. After all, you are not a flea.

original_en_text: You still here, bug? Is rest I need before I travel. Not chat. You is trouble-type. Make my shell tense.<hpage>I shall take my leave, madam. Stay strong on your own journey. May we meet again in more hospitable surrounds.
original_zh_text: 你怎么还在？我休息够了就走。别啰嗦，感觉你身上麻烦事不少，让我甲壳发紧。<hpage>那就告辞了，女士。祝你路上顺利，我们下次再见。
translated_text: 你还在这里吗，虫子？这是我旅行前需要的休息。不聊天。你很麻烦。让我的壳紧张起来。<hpage>我该走了，女士。在旅途中保持坚强。愿我们在更加好客的环境中再次见面。
secondary_translated_text: Are you still here, bug? This is the rest I need before traveling. No chatting. You're troublesome. Make my shell tense.<hpage>I should go, ma 'am. Stay strong during the journey. May we meet again in a more hospitable environment.

original_en_text: Look, Miss Hornet! See the many lively fleas that form our caravan. Thanks to you and your hunting, so many are here! And all are eager again to travel!<page>We had once wished to match the numbers of our fabled past, yet now, we may even have exceeded them!<hpage>It is a welcome sight, Fleamaster, and the playful cheer about the caravan suggests you are a fine steward to the troupe.<page>Such kind words, Miss Hornet! How lucky we are to have found a friend so fair!<page>But now, we must away! These moors have been our host long enough. It is time to climb and hoist towards drier caves!<page>Good friend to fleas, would you join us on this next journey?
original_zh_text: 请看，大黄蜂小姐！这么多活蹦乱跳的同胞加入！多亏您帮忙，队伍越来越壮大。大家都盼着再度启程！<page>我们曾奢望恢复传说中的旅团规模，而现在或许已经超越了传说！<hpage>看见这么多跳蚤平安无事，我也很欣慰。他们的欢声笑语也证明了你是个称职的领队。<page>大黄蜂小姐过奖了！能结交您这样的朋友才是旅团的幸运！<page>但现在该启程了！沼地虽好，但不应久留，该向更干燥的洞窟进发了！<page>跳蚤之友，愿意与我们一起出发吗？
translated_text: 看，大黄蜂小姐！看看组成我们舰队的许多活泼的跳蚤。谢谢你们和你们的狩猎，这里有这么多人！每个人都想再次旅行！<page>我们曾经希望能够追平过去的传奇数字，但现在我们甚至可能超越他们！<hpage>Fleamaster，这是一个受欢迎的景象，商队顽皮的欢呼声表明你是剧团出色的管家。<page>你太好了，大黄蜂小姐！我们多么幸运，能找到这么美丽的朋友啊！<page>但现在，我们必须离开！这些荒地已经成为我们的主人很久了。是时候攀登并攀登到干燥的洞穴了！<page>跳蚤的好朋友，你想加入我们的下一段旅程吗？
secondary_translated_text: Look, Miss Bumblebee! Check out the many lively fleas that make up our fleet. Thank you and your hunting, there are so many people here! Everyone wants to travel again!<page>We used to hope to match the legendary numbers of the past, but now we may even surpass them!<hpage>Fleamaster, this is a popular sight, and the playful cheers of the caravan indicate that you are an excellent steward of the troupe.<page>That's so kind of you, miss bumblebee! How lucky we are to find such beautiful friends!<page>But now, we must leave! These wastelands have been our masters for a long time. It's time to climb and climb into the dry cave!<page>Good friend of fleas, would you like to join us on the next journey?

original_en_text: Marvellous! We fleas shall be overjoyed to have your company on the road.<page>Now! Our new home is calling. We must travel!
original_zh_text: 太好了！跳蚤们肯定会为与你同行而欢呼！<page>现在！该向着新家进发了！
translated_text: 太好了！我们跳蚤会很高兴有您的陪伴。<page>现在！我们的新家正在召唤。我们必须旅行！
secondary_translated_text: Great! Our flea club is happy to have you company.<page>Now! Our new home is calling. We have to travel!

original_en_text: I’m wonder at this land... Something heavy hangs above, like shadow. I’m hope the little fleas have not much danger here...
original_zh_text: 这地方不对劲……总觉得天上有黑影压着。但愿小家伙们别出事……
translated_text: 我对这片土地很好奇。上面挂着一些沉重的东西，就像影子一样。希望小跳蚤在这里不要遇到太大的危险.
secondary_translated_text: I am very curious about this land. There were some heavy things hanging on it, like shadows. I hope the little flea won't encounter too much danger here.

original_en_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, I took your request from the wishwall in the pilgrim camp. You are seeking fleas to join your caravan?<page>Oh, yes! The time has come for us fleas to find each other and travel together, as has happened through generations before.<page>The many fleas of this kingdom should be flocking to our caravan, but times have become dangerous. You feel it too, yes? Our poor cousins, out there, in hiding!<page>But... do I understand you rightly, stranger? You will help find the poor, lost fleas? Truly?
original_zh_text: <hpage>跳蚤首领，我在朝圣营地看到了你的祈愿。你要召集跳蚤加入旅团？<page>正是！跳蚤们该像祖辈那样聚首同行了。<page>本该有无数同胞来投奔旅团，可如今危机四伏，您也感受到了吧？可怜的同胞们还在外躲藏！<page>但……您真的愿帮忙寻找我们迷途的同胞？当真？
translated_text: <hpage>Fleamaster，我从朝圣者营地的愿望墙上收到了你的请求。您正在寻找跳蚤加入您的舰队吗？<page>哦，是的！现在是我们跳蚤互相寻找并共同旅行的时候了，就像前几代人所发生的那样。<page>这个王国中的许多跳蚤应该涌向我们的商队，但时代已经变得危险了。你也感觉到了，不是吗？我们可怜的表兄弟，就在那里，躲藏起来了！<page>但是...陌生人，我懂你吗？您会帮助寻找可怜的、迷失的跳蚤吗？真的吗？
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Fleamaster, I received your request from the wall of wishes at the Pilgrim Camp. Are you looking for fleas to join your fleet?<page>Oh, yes! It's time for us fleas to find each other and travel together, as has happened in previous generations.<page>Many fleas in this kingdom should flock to our caravans, but times have become dangerous. You felt it, too, didn't you? Our poor cousins, right there, in hiding!<page>but... Stranger, do I understand you? Will you help find poor, lost fleas? Really?

original_en_text: That great vein of bells there... some of the fleas wanted to shelter inside, but I was not so sure. The whole creaking mass seems unstable! It makes me tremble!<hpage>You were wise not to head inside, Fleamaster. A silken curse has taken hold of the settlement within. Advise your fellows to avoid that place.<page>A curse, you say?! W-well then! Our thanks are owed again. I shall let all fleas know they must not venture closer.
original_zh_text: 那串巨钟……有些跳蚤想躲进去，但我总觉得不牢靠！看着就发颤！<hpage>不在里面扎营是明智之举。那里已被丝咒侵蚀，告诫同胞远离为妙。<page>丝咒？！那……那可要多谢提醒！我这就通知大伙别靠近。
translated_text: 那里那个巨大的钟脉冲.一些跳蚤试图躲在里面，但我不太确定。整个吱吱作响的事情似乎不稳定！它让我颤抖！<hpage>Freymaster，你不进去是明智的。丝绸诅咒已经占领了里面的定居点。建议你的同伴避开那个地方。<page>你称之为诅咒？！好吧！我们再次感谢您。我会让所有跳蚤知道，他们不能冒险靠近。
secondary_translated_text: That huge clock pulse there. Some fleas tried to hide inside, but I wasn't so sure. The whole squeaking thing seems unstable! It makes me tremble!<hpage>Freymaster, you would be wise not to go in. The Silk Curse has occupied the settlements inside. Recommend your companions to avoid that place.<page>You call it a curse?! Okay! We thank you again. I'll let all fleas know that they can't risk getting close.

original_en_text: Vikna. The trial has ended. Your score can be seen on the board beside me.
original_zh_text: 维克纳，试炼结束。成绩在我身旁的榜上。
translated_text: 维克纳。审判结束了。你的分数可以在我旁边的黑板上看到。
secondary_translated_text: Vickner. The trial is over. Your score can be seen on the blackboard next to me.
Learn the melody of the beast

original_en_text: Ah, miss! Course you’d be one to survive through all this! Capable as you seem and all. <page>It’s a sad thing, but I can’t say most folk down here’ve fared so fortunate. And our once fine camp below ain’t no longer safe for any bug, all crushed and consumed by this black calamity.<hpage>Nowhere is safe, sir, but I am glad you few remain. Know I shall work to fix this, as best I’m able.<page>Calming our raging world? That’s a lofty goal, miss. I’m not thinkin’ any one bug’d be able to stop these happenings, but it’s heartenin’ knowing you’ve still got fire enough to feel different.<page>Rest here with us, long as you like. A little company’s about the best thing we few’re wishin’ for now.
original_zh_text: 啊！小姐。就知道您能挺过来！看着就靠谱。<page>可惜底下多数虫没这运气。咱们的好营地也被黑灾碾碎吞没了，没一处安全。<hpage>无处安全，先生，但各位幸存值得庆幸。我必会竭力修补这残局。<page>平息这混乱世道？志向够远大的，小姐。我不信单凭一虫能办到，但您有这份心总是好的。<page>您想歇多久都行，眼下能期盼的也就是有个陪伴。
translated_text: 啊，小姐！当然，你会是唯一一个能度过这一切的人！尽管你看起来很有能力。<page>这是一件悲伤的事情，但我不能说这里的大多数人都这么幸运。我们下面曾经美丽的营地不再适合任何虫子，所有的虫子都被这场黑色的灾难压垮和吞噬。<hpage>没有地方是安全的，先生，但我很高兴您很少留下来。你要知道我会尽我所能来解决这个问题。<page>去安抚我们愤怒的世界？这是一个崇高的目标，小姐。我不认为任何错误都能阻止这些事情的发生，但很高兴知道你仍然有足够的热情让你感觉不同。<page>如果你愿意的话，就在这里休息吧。小公司是我们现在很少有人希望的最好的事情。
secondary_translated_text: Ah, miss! Of course, you will be the only one who can get through all this! Even though you seem capable.<page>It's a sad thing, but I can't say that most people here are so lucky. The once-beautiful camp below us is no longer suitable for any bugs, and all bugs are crushed and swallowed by this black disaster.<hpage>No place is safe, sir, but I'm glad you rarely stay. You need to know that I will do everything I can to solve this problem.<page>To appease our angry world? That's a noble goal, miss. I don't think any mistake can stop these things from happening, but it's nice to know you still have enough enthusiasm to make you feel different.<page>Rest here if you want. Small companies are the best thing few of us hope for right now.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I bring supplies from the town of bells up above, to aid your camp and its residents.<page>Ah! Mighty thankful these folks’ll be. Most arrive here with nothin’ but their shell. Your delivery there’ll make things a little easier on ‘em.
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生，我从钟心镇带来物资支援此营地和住民。<page>啊！大伙会感激不尽的。多数虫来到这时就剩个空壳，你这趟可算解了燃眉之急。
translated_text: <hpage>先生，我从上面的贝尔镇带来了物资来帮助您的营地及其居民。<page>啊！非常感谢这些人。大多数人到达这里时除了贝壳什么也没有。您在那里的送货将让他们的事情变得更容易。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Sir, I have brought supplies from the town of Bell above to help your camp and its residents.<page>Ah! Thank you very much to these people. Most people arrive here with nothing but shells. Your delivery there will make things easier for them.

original_en_text: Mm. Mmm! Who is it? An intruder! Terrible! To interrupt a humble druid as they work!<hpage>I meant no intrusion, druid. The sound of your laughter drew me to investigate.<page>What? Laughter? No idea what you mean. Nonsense!
original_zh_text: 嗯。嗯嗯！谁在那儿？入侵者！可恶！竟敢打扰德鲁伊修行！<hpage>无心冒犯，德鲁伊。你的笑声引我前来探查。<page>什么？笑声？不知所云！荒唐！
translated_text: 嗯.嗯！是谁？入侵者！太可怕了！打断卑微的德鲁伊工作！<hpage>我的意思是，我无意打扰，德鲁伊。你的笑声吸引了我去调查。<page>什么？笑？我不知道你的意思。胡说八道！
secondary_translated_text: hmm. Hmm! Who is it? Intruders! It's terrible! Interrupting humble druid work!<hpage>I mean, I don't mean to interrupt, Druid. Your laughter attracted me to investigate.<page>What? Laugh? I don't know what you mean. Bullshit!

original_en_text: May your travels bring you fortune, hunter. And may the Citadel come to fear your freedom in our land.
original_zh_text: 祝你一路顺风，猎手。愿圣堡因你在这片土地上行走而战栗。
translated_text: 愿你的旅程给你带来财富，猎人。愿堡垒害怕你们在我们土地上的自由。
secondary_translated_text: May your journey bring you wealth, hunter. May the fortress fear your freedom in our land.

original_en_text: Hrm? Oh, it’s you again. Please, no more talk of bells or travel. I’m trying to stay hidden.<hpage>I mean no intrusion, ma’am. Are you composing yourself here before you leave on your own journey?<page>Like all the others, my brothers and sisters who trudged off to die? No, I think I’ll linger here a little longer with my thoughts...
original_zh_text: 什……又是你啊。别提钟啊路啊的了，我正躲清净呢。<hpage>无意打扰，女士。是在为启程做准备？<page>像其他送死的兄弟姐妹一样？我看还是在这多琢磨会儿……
translated_text: 嗯？哦，又是你。请停止谈论钟声或旅行。我试图保持隐藏。<hpage>我的意思是，没有打扰，女士。在开始自己的旅程之前，您准备好了吗？<page>和所有其他人一样，我的兄弟姐妹死得很艰难？不，我想我会带着我的想法在这里多呆一段时间……
secondary_translated_text: Hmm? Oh, you again. Please stop talking about bells or travel. I tried to stay hidden.<hpage>I mean, no interruption, ma 'am. Are you ready before embarking on your own journey?<page>Like everyone else, my brothers and sisters died hard? No, I think I'll stay here for a while longer with my thoughts...

original_en_text: Must be terrifying out there, beyond the settlement. Nothing but monsters and madness lurking in the darkness.<page>I’ve heard tales of a safe place, though. Just up above here, where the moss paints the stones green, there’s an old village. Bit of a holy place, apparently, well protected.<hpage>I’ve visited the settlement you speak of. It was built around a burial spire, corpse-home to an ancient Weaver.<hpage>It is hardly safe though. The terrain is treacherous, and predators prowl its commons. I advise you avoid that place.<page>Oh... I see. Of course. Nowhere is really free of danger, is it? That’s just the way for us pilgrims...
original_zh_text: 外面肯定很可怕，黑暗里潜伏着怪物与疯狂。<page>不过听说上面有安身所。青苔覆石的地方有古村，据说是受庇护的圣地。<hpage>我到过那村落。它围着一座葬仪尖塔而建，是古代织者的安息之所。<hpage>那里并不安全。地势险恶，又有掠食者出没，劝你最好避开。<page>唉……果然。没有真正安全之处。朝圣者命该如此。
translated_text: 那里一定很可怕。黑暗中潜伏着怪物和疯狂。<page>但我听到了一个安全地方的故事。就在这里上方，苔藓将石头染成绿色，有一个古老的村庄。显然，这是一个神圣的地方，而且保护得很好。<hpage>我参观了你提到的定居点。它建在墓地尖塔周围，墓地是古代编织者尸体的住所。<hpage>但这并不安全。地形崎岖，掠食者在其公共场所徘徊。我建议你避开那个地方。<page>哦...我明白了.当然到处都有危险，对吧？对于我们朝圣者来说.
secondary_translated_text: It must be scary there. Monsters and madness lurk in the darkness.<page>But I heard the story of a safe place. Just above here, moss dyed the stones green, there is an ancient village. Obviously, this is a sacred place and well protected.<hpage>I visited the settlement you mentioned. It was built around the steeple of the cemetery, which was home to the corpses of ancient weavers.<hpage>But it's not safe. The terrain is rugged and predators wander in its public places. I suggest you avoid that place.<page>Oh... I see. Of course there are dangers everywhere, right? For us pilgrims.

original_en_text: For though, as pilgrims, we aim our sights high and never waver from our path, the loss of a brother or sister still stops our trembling limbs in place.
original_zh_text: 纵然身为朝圣者需心志坚定，但手足殒命仍令我等颤足难行。
translated_text: 尽管作为朝圣者，我们的目标很高，我们的道路从不动摇，但失去兄弟姐妹仍然让我们的四肢颤抖。
secondary_translated_text: Although as pilgrims our goals are high and our path never wavers, the loss of our brothers and sisters still makes our limbs tremble.

original_en_text: Few are as foreign as you, hunter dear. Visit me when you care.<page>I’ll look forward to hearing how your steps might shake our world. Oho. Yes!
original_zh_text: 鲜少有虫如你这般，俏丽的异乡猎手。有空的话不妨再来。<page>我期待听到你的针刃撼动这片土地的那天。嚯，定会如此！
translated_text: 像你这样的外国人很少，亲爱的猎人。当你关心我的时候来看我。<page>我期待着听到你的脚步将如何震撼我们的世界。哦是的！
secondary_translated_text: There are very few foreigners like you, dear hunter. Come and see me when you care about me.<page>I look forward to hearing how your footsteps will shake our world. Oh yes!

original_en_text: Ohh, the world trembles! But we can hear it... beating steady... beating free...
original_zh_text: 噢，大地战栗！但我们听见了……平稳的搏动……自由的搏动……
translated_text: 哦，世界在颤抖！但我们能听到。节奏很稳定。自由跳舞。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, the world is shaking! But we can hear it. The rhythm is very stable. Dance freely.

original_en_text: Granter refuses! I understand. Granter is petty, evil. Misguided! When your mind clears, return here. Return here and grant my wish!
original_zh_text: 授愿者拒绝！我懂。授愿者小气，邪恶。误入歧途！待你清醒，再来此地。应我祈愿！
translated_text: 格兰特拒绝了！我知道格兰特既卑鄙又邪恶。误导了！当你的头脑清醒时，回到这里。回到这里实现我的愿望！
secondary_translated_text: Grant refused! I know Grant is despicable and evil. Misguided! When your mind is clear, come back here. Come back here and realize my wish!

original_en_text: Oh... you’ve come to hide down here too, then? ‘Tis a fearful world out there. If you can keep quiet, I don’t mind you joining me.<hpage>You’ve chosen a curious place to rest, ma’am. This pit of bells and the structure around it... they suggest a station for travel, though one long abandoned.<page>Aye. Rumours in the camp say these bells run throughout the lands, great veins of them, forged by our ancient kin.<page>And some even say bugs used to travel through them, in gilded carriages no less!<page>Surely such fanciful travel would be a sin for us pilgrims. We must walk and climb and crawl using only our own meagre claws... Only thus can we prove our devotion.
original_zh_text: 哦……这位小姐也来躲难？外头真是可怕。你不出声的话，可以一起躲藏。<hpage>女士，你选了个怪地方歇脚。这钟坑与周遭构造……似是废弃驿站。<page>是啊。营地传言说古虫铸就钟脉贯穿大地。<page>还有虫说以前能乘镀金车厢穿行其间！<page>这般奢靡行径对朝圣者可是大不敬！我们该用卑微虫爪攀爬跋涉……唯有如此方能证虔心。
translated_text: 哦...你也是来这里躲的吗外面的世界很可怕。如果你能保持安静，我不介意你加入我。<hpage>女士，您选择了一个奇怪的地方休息。这个钟楼及其周围的建筑。他们建议建立一个旅行站，尽管它是一个废弃已久的车站。<page>是的，营地里有传言说这些钟遍布大地，它们巨大的纹路是我们古老的亲戚锻造的。<page>有人甚至说昆虫曾经穿过它们，甚至坐在镀金的马车里！<page>对于我们朝圣者来说，这种异想天开的旅程无疑是一种罪过。我们必须只用我们自己微薄的爪子行走、攀登、爬行……只有这样我们才能证明我们的奉献精神。
secondary_translated_text: Oh... Are you here to hide, too? The world out there is a scary place. If you can keep quiet, I don't mind if you join me.<hpage>Ma 'am, you chose a strange place to rest. This bell tower and the buildings around it. They suggested building a travel station, even though it was a long-abandoned station.<page>Yes, there are rumors in the camp that these clocks are spread across the earth, and their huge lines were forged by our ancient relatives.<page>Some even say that insects once walked through them and even sat in gilded carriages!<page>For us pilgrims, this whimsical journey is undoubtedly a sin. We must walk, climb, crawl with only our own meager claws... Only then can we prove our dedication.

original_en_text: Did you take a look at the wishwall? You might’ve noticed I added a cheeky little wish of my own.<page>Fair’s fair, I did build the thing. Seems like the kingdom should be granting my wish before anyone else’s.
original_zh_text: 看过许愿墙了？应该注意到我加的小私心了吧。<page>公平嘛，墙是我造的，圣堡该先实现我的愿望才对。
translated_text: 你见过愿望墙吗？你可能注意到我添加了一个自己厚脸皮的小愿望。<page>公平公平，我确实建造了这个东西。看来王国应该先满足我的愿望。
secondary_translated_text: Have you ever seen a wish wall? You may have noticed that I added a cheeky little wish of my own.<page>Fair and fair, I did build this thing. It seems that the kingdom should satisfy my wish first.

original_en_text: You keep the berries to yourself? All for you? Mmm. Promise breaker! Promise breaker!
original_zh_text: 私藏莓果？全归你？嗯。背信者！背信者！
translated_text: 你把浆果留给自己吗？都是为了你？嗯.叛徒！叛徒！
secondary_translated_text: Do you keep the berries for yourself? All for you? hmm. Traitor! Traitor!

original_en_text: Never shared my name with you, did I? Awfully remiss of me.<page>It’s Pilby. Been nice spending time with you, miss.<hpage>Likewise, sir. It’s been some time since I had such ample opportunity for friendly conversation.<hpage>My name is Hornet. It is good to be properly acquainted at last.<page>Hornet, eh? Strong name, that. It certainly suits you, miss. Heh heh...
original_zh_text: 我还未说过姓名吧？真是失礼。<page>我叫皮尔比。和你相处很愉快，小姐。<hpage>我也是，先生。很久没有过友善交谈了。<hpage>我名为大黄蜂。幸会。<page>大黄蜂？好气魄的名字，和你很相配，哈哈……
translated_text: 我从来没有和你分享过我的名字，不是吗？我太疏忽了。<page>是皮尔比。很高兴和你共度时光，小姐。<hpage>同样，先生。我已经有一段时间没有如此充足的机会进行友好的交谈了。<hpage>我的名字是大黄蜂。终于正式了解彼此真是太好了。<page>大黄蜂，嗯？很强的名字，那个。小姐，真的很适合你。呵呵。
secondary_translated_text: I never shared my name with you, did I? I was so negligent.<page>It's Pierby. It was a pleasure spending time with you, miss.<hpage>Likewise, sir. It has been a while since I have had such ample opportunities to have a friendly conversation.<hpage>My name is Bumblebee. It's great to finally get to know each other officially.<page>Bumblebee, huh? Strong name, that. Miss, it really suits you. Hehe.

original_en_text: The Mossberries. Do you still hunt them, little you? My wish was granted, but clear now that more are needed! More!<page>Bring more Mossberries here. Mmm. Yes, we will trade. Precious rosaries for fresh berries!
original_zh_text: 苔莓。仍在猎取吗，小小虫？我祈愿已实现，但需要更多！更多！<page>带更多苔莓来。嗯。以念珠换鲜果！
translated_text: 莫斯。你还在追捕他们吗，小你？我的愿望实现了，但现在很明显还需要更多！更多！<page>多带点苔藓来这里。嗯.是的，我们会交易。新鲜浆果的珍贵念珠！
secondary_translated_text: Moss. Are you still hunting them, little you? My wish came true, but now it is clear that more is needed! More!<page>Bring more moss here. hmm. Yes, we will deal. Precious rosary beads for fresh berries!

original_en_text: <hpage>As promised, druid, I have your berries. What is your need for such common fruits?<page>Common!? No. No... Special. Cherished. Only a druid knows it! The berries bright! For my wish. My wish so dear!
original_zh_text: <hpage>如约而至，德鲁伊。莓果在此。要这寻常果实有何用？<page>寻常！？不，不……特别。珍贵。只有德鲁伊知晓！莓果明艳！为我祈愿。珍贵祈愿！
translated_text: <hpage>我答应过你的，德鲁伊，你的浆果在我手上您对这种常见水果有什么需求？<page>常见！？不。不。特别。珍惜。只有德鲁伊知道！浆果很明亮！为了我的愿望。我的愿望是如此珍贵！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I promised you, Druid, I have your berries. What do you need from this common fruit?<page>Common!? No. No. special. Cherish. Only the druids know! The berries are bright! For my wish. My wish is so precious!

original_en_text: I’ll soon be making my way up to the great Citadel. As holy as I am with rosaries, I’m sure my path will not be an arduous one...
original_zh_text: 很快要上圣堡了。揣着这么多念珠，肯定能一路顺畅……
translated_text: 我很快就会前往伟大的城堡。虽然我对念珠是神圣的，但我确信我的道路不会很困难……
secondary_translated_text: I will soon be heading to the great castle. Although I am sacred to the rosary beads, I am sure my path will not be difficult...

original_en_text: Oh! And you can’t be leavin’ without some reward for your work. Take these beads for labour.<page>Rosaries ain’t provin’ much use to us lot anymore, but hopefully you in all your journeyin’ can still put ‘em to use.
original_zh_text: 噢！您可不能白忙活。这些念珠当工钱收下吧。<page>念珠对我们这群家伙早没用了，但您四处奔波说不定还用得上。
translated_text: 哦！如果你的工作没有得到奖励，你就不能离开。将这些珠子带到送货处。<page>玫瑰对我们来说不再有太大用处，但希望您仍然可以在整个旅程中使用它们。
secondary_translated_text: Oh! If your work is not rewarded, you cannot leave. Take these beads to delivery.<page>Roses are no longer of much use to us, but hopefully you can still use them throughout the journey.

original_en_text: You’re here, in here, so why did you send you? Hm? Did you hear my wish? Granter of wishes? You?<hpage>Granter of wishes?<page>Wishes, yes! My wish! I need fruits of the world, three little darlings. I need them, so I wish! Does the kingdom not send you, little you, to grant my desire?
original_zh_text: 你在此处，在此处，为何派你来？嗯？听到我的祈愿了？授愿者？是你？<hpage>授愿者？<page>祈愿，对！我的祈愿！我要这世间的三枚果实，小宝贝果实。我需要，所以祈愿！小小虫，王国没派你来满足我的祈愿？
translated_text: 你在这里，在这里，那你为什么派你去？嗯？你听到我的愿望了吗？愿望实现？你？<hpage>愿望实现？<page>希望，是的！我的愿望！我需要世界的果实，三个小婴儿。我需要他们，所以我希望！小你，王国派你来完成我的愿望吗？
secondary_translated_text: You're here, you're here, why did you send you? Hmm? Did you hear my wish? Wish come true? You?<hpage>Wish come true?<page>Hope, yes! My wish! I need the fruits of the world, three little babies. I need them, so I hope! Little you, did the kingdom send you to fulfill my wish?

original_en_text: Your travels have taken you far, haven’t they? While I’m yet to even start my journey. Shameful behaviour for a pilgrim, really, to tarry here so long.<hpage>I see no shame in it, sir. Your life is your own, and need not be squandered at the ghostly call of the Citadel. Journey out for your own sake, or not at all.<page>Heh... you truly aren’t a pilgrim, that’s for certain. That’s blasphemy, spoken with friendly intentions or not.<page>And yet... I don’t recoil from what you say. Perhaps I’m not much of a pilgrim either.
original_zh_text: 你已去过许多地方，而我尚未启程。作为朝圣者却在此踌躇不前，实在可耻。<hpage>先生，我未见可耻之处。生命属于你，不必为了圣堡幽灵般的召唤虚掷。你可以为己而行，也可以就此止步。<page>呵……你确实不是朝圣者，这种亵渎之言，无论善意与否都不能说。<page>但……我不抗拒这话。或许我也不是合格的朝圣者。
translated_text: 你的旅行花了你很长的路，不是吗？我的旅程还没有开始。对于一个朝圣者来说，在这里呆这么长时间确实是一种可耻的行为。<hpage>我不认为这有什么羞耻，先生。你的生命是你自己的，不需要在城堡鬼魂的召唤下浪费。自己旅行，或者根本不旅行。<page>嘿...你绝对不是朝圣者，无论你是不是认真的，这都是亵渎。<page>然而...我不会害怕你说的话。也许我也不是朝圣者。
secondary_translated_text: Your trip took you a long way, didn't it? My journey has not yet begun. For a pilgrim, staying here for such a long time is indeed a shameful act.<hpage>I don't think there's any shame in that, sir. Your life is your own and does not need to be wasted under the call of the ghost of the castle. Travel yourself, or not travel at all.<page>Hey... You are definitely not a pilgrim, and whether you are serious or not, this is blasphemy.<page>However... I will not be afraid of what you say. Maybe I am not a pilgrim either.

original_en_text: This stone’s a beauty, isn’t it? They say it’ll help you gather up rosaries on the road ahead. You’ll come back and share some with me, won’t you?
original_zh_text: 这石头美极了吧？据说能助你在路上收集念珠。等你回来可要分我一些！
translated_text: 这块石头很漂亮，不是吗？他们说这将帮助您在通往未来的路上收集念珠。你会回来和我分享一些的，不是吗？
secondary_translated_text: This stone is beautiful, isn't it? They say it will help you collect rosary beads on your way to the future. You'll come back and share some with me, won't you?

original_en_text: Ah, thank you for sharing, sister. For the honourable and steadfast Pilby, we will sing.
original_zh_text: 啊，多谢相告，姐妹。我们将为坚定可敬的皮尔比歌唱。
translated_text: 啊，谢谢你的分享，姐姐。我们将为光荣而坚定的皮尔比歌唱。
secondary_translated_text: Ah, thank you for sharing, sister. We will sing for the glorious and determined Pierby.

original_en_text: Mmm. You can hear it, yes? Listen close. Weak, but precious. A pulse, a beat! Faint... Our very own...
original_zh_text: 嗯。听见了吗？……细听。微弱，但珍贵。搏动，节拍！但渐弱……吾等独有的……
translated_text: 嗯.你能听到，不是吗？仔细听着软弱，但宝贵。一次脉搏，一次心跳！晕倒了我们自己的.
secondary_translated_text: hmm. You can hear it, can't you? Listen carefully and sound weak, but precious. One pulse, one heartbeat! fainted our own.

original_en_text: Loose rosaries filling your pockets? I can string ‘em up safe, so you won’t go losing them. Might seem a simple art, but it takes some talent to keep ‘em properly secure.
original_zh_text: 兜里念珠装满了？我可将其编织成串以防遗失。这手艺看着简单，没点天赋可编不牢靠。
translated_text: 口袋里塞满了松散的念珠？我可以把它们安全地串在一起，这样你就不会失去它们。这可能看起来像是一门简单的艺术，但需要一些天赋来确保他们的安全。
secondary_translated_text: Pocket stuffed with loose rosary beads? I can string them together safely so you don't lose them. It may seem like a simple art, but it takes some talent to ensure their safety.

original_en_text: Hm? I recognise you. You’ve returned to the camp, then? Are you a pilgrim, or just a wanderer?<hpage>I am no pilgrim, sir, though I have travelled their paths.<page>Not a pilgrim? Well, it makes no difference, I suppose. We all must walk the roads, up and up, though most of us will fall long before we see the grand gates.<page>If you’re wise, you’ll stop here and rest a while before heading back out into that dangerous world...
original_zh_text: 嗯？我认得你。重返营地了？是朝圣者还是流浪者？<hpage>我并非朝圣者，先生，但走过他们路途。<page>不是？也罢。众生皆须行路攀爬，但大多未睹圣门便殒命。<page>你若明智，再入险地前应该在此休整……
translated_text: 嗯？我认出你了。你回到营地了吗？你是朝圣者还是流浪者？<hpage>先生，我不是朝圣者，尽管我走过了他们的道路。<page>他们不是朝圣者吗？好吧，我想这没什么区别。我们都必须在路上走来走去，尽管我们中的大多数人在看到宏伟的大门之前都会摔倒。<page>如果你聪明，你就会在这里停下来休息一会儿，然后回到那个危险的世界。
secondary_translated_text: Hmm? I recognize you. Are you back at camp? Are you a pilgrim or a wanderer?<hpage>Sir, I am not a pilgrim, although I have walked their path.<page>Aren't they pilgrims? Well, I guess it makes no difference. We all have to walk up and down the road, although most of us fall before we see the majestic gate.<page>If you were smart, you would stop here and rest for a while, and then return to that dangerous world.

original_en_text: Mmm, the precious fruit! Yes, fragrant and round. So round! For you, you who finds berries, a nice reward of rosaries!
original_zh_text: 嗯，珍果！芬芳饱满，如此圆润！给你，寻果者，念珠回报！
translated_text: 嗯，珍贵的水果！是的，又香又圆。这么圆！对于你们，那些找到浆果的人，一个很好的念珠奖励！
secondary_translated_text: Hmm, precious fruit! Yes, fragrant and round. So round! For you, those who find berries, a great rosary reward!

original_en_text: O-oh! Traveller! Destined for the Citadel, yes? Well, before you embark, won’t you stop and make trade with an old pilgrim?<hpage>I’d see your wares, madam, though I fear I may have nothing worthy to offer in return.<page>Oh, worry not! If you lack fine goods to trade, we can barter still. In this devout land, we deal in the currency of faith!<page>Rosaries! Those finely carved beads of prayer! If you will only share some with me, I will trade you something fair.
original_zh_text: 噢！旅者！要上圣堡吧？启程前不如和我这个老朝圣者做笔生意？<hpage>我确实想看看货品，女士，但恐怕没有等价之物。<page>没事！没有等价货物，仍可交易。虔信之地，信仰就是通货！<page>我是说念珠！为祈祷精雕细琢的念珠！要是愿意分享，我肯定给与公道的报酬。
translated_text: 哦！旅行者！目的地是城堡，对吧？好吧，在出发之前，你不会停下来和一位老朝圣者进行交易吗？<hpage>女士，我想看看您的商品，尽管我担心我可能没有什么可偿还的。<page>哦，别担心！如果您缺乏优质商品可供贸易，我们仍然可以易货。在这片虔诚的土地上，我们交易信仰的货币！<page>念珠！那些雕刻精美的念珠！如果你愿意和我分享一些，我会给你一些公平的东西。
secondary_translated_text: Oh! Traveler! The destination is the castle, right? Well, before you set out, wouldn't you stop and make a deal with an old pilgrim?<hpage>Ma 'am, I'd like to see your merchandise, although I'm afraid I may have nothing to repay.<page>Oh, don't worry! If you lack quality goods to trade, we can still barter. In this pious land, we trade the currency of faith!<page>Rosary beads! Those beautifully carved rosary beads! If you are willing to share some with me, I will give you something fair.

original_en_text: Seems like just a key, but who knows what it’ll unlock? I reckon it’s come from the Citadel, so it must open the way to something holy!
original_zh_text: 看着是把普通钥匙，说不定能打开什么？这东西肯定是来自圣堡的，所以肯定也能开启通往圣物的道路！
translated_text: 它可能看起来只是一把钥匙，但谁知道它会打开什么呢？我猜它来自城堡，所以它一定为某种神圣的东西开辟了道路！
secondary_translated_text: It may seem like just a key, but who knows what it will open? I guess it came from the castle, so it must have opened the way for something sacred!

original_en_text: A rare find, this. Shinier than faith and harder than a Craggler’s hide. A skilled craftsbug could fashion something nice out of it, if they’ve got the knowledge.
original_zh_text: 这可是稀罕物。比信仰耀眼，比岩甲坚硬。要是有个懂得门道的巧匠，就能将其打造成宝物。
translated_text: 这是一个罕见的发现。比信仰更闪亮，比克拉格勒的皮肤更坚硬。如果你有知识，一个熟练的宇航员可以从中做出一些美丽的东西。
secondary_translated_text: This is a rare discovery. Shinier than faith, harder than Kragler's skin. If you have knowledge, a skilled astronaut can make something beautiful out of it.

original_en_text: For comin’ all this way, take a few beads. You’ve well earned ‘em.
original_zh_text: 大老远跑来，拿几颗念珠走吧，这是你应得的。
translated_text: 沿途带一些珠子。你应得的
secondary_translated_text: Bring some beads along the way. what you deserve

original_en_text: <hpage>Druid, I require a pitcher of your Mossberry Stew to satiate a gourmand of the Citadel. Will you pass some to me?<page>Mmmm! A bug who’ll consume my berry brew? Strong they’d be to bear a taste so sharp!<page>Here is a flavour so ripe! Searing! Flavour of pleasure and pain! They too may see the visions if they taste it strong. The visions, could they see?<page>Grant the stew! For your bug, mmmm... to share the visions. Yes! We shall pass it!
original_zh_text: <hpage>德鲁伊，我需要一些苔莓浓汤满足圣堡饕客。可否分享？<page>嗯嗯！有虫愿意喝我的莓酿？肯定是强者才能接受这等烈味！<page>这风味！炽烈！痛楚与愉悦交织！多喝可见幻象。他们能见得到吗？<page>拿好！给你那虫……分享幻象。对！应当分享！
translated_text: <hpage>德鲁伊，我需要一锅你的莫斯贝里炖肉来满足城堡的需要。你能递给我一些吗？<page>嗯！喝我的浆果饮料的虫子？它们一定很强大，才能承受这么强烈的味道！<page>这个味道太熟了！烧焦了！幸福与痛苦的味道！如果他们尝到了浓烈的味道，他们也可能会看到这些幻象。他们能看到这些幻象吗？<page>授予炖菜！对于你的虫子来说，嗯。分享愿景。是的！我们会通过的！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Druid, I need a pot of your Mosberry stew to meet the castle's needs. Can you hand me some?<page>Hmm! The bug drinking my berry drink? They must be strong to withstand such a strong smell!<page>This taste is too ripe! It's burnt! The taste of happiness and pain! If they taste a strong taste, they may also see these visions. Can they see these visions?<page>Grant the stew! For your bug, yeah. Share the vision. Yes! We will pass!

original_en_text: Ahhh! Ahhh-ohhhh! The smell again! Stronger, stronger now! But still young yet! Listen to your sisters, little one, and grow! Oh, grow!
original_zh_text: 啊啊！啊——噢！气息再现！浓烈！但仍稚嫩！聆听你的姐妹之声，小家伙，生长吧！啊，生长！
translated_text: 啊！啊！又臭了！更强，现在更强！但还年轻！听你姐妹们的话，小家伙，长大吧！哦，成长！
secondary_translated_text: Ah! Ah! It stinks again! Stronger, stronger now! But still young! Listen to your sisters, little one, and grow up! Oh, grow!

original_en_text: Oh... mmm. Do they hurt you also, the visions? The stink? Nasty, horrible fruits. The pain!<page>Enough berries. We need no more. For you though, my one and only friend. My beloved. A reward!<page>Your amulet. Let me... transfuse. Yes. Your amulet’s tears will flow stronger still!
original_zh_text: 噢……嗯。幻象可有伤你？腐臭味？是秽果，可憎。痛楚！<page>莓果已足够，无需更多。但为你，我唯一挚友。馈赠！<page>你的护符。让我……灌注。嗯，护符的眼泪将更加汹涌！
translated_text: 哦...嗯.这些幻象也伤害到你了吗难闻的气味？令人作呕、可怕的水果。痛！<page>浆果够多了。我们不需要更多了。但对于你，我唯一的朋友。亲爱的奖励！<page>你的护身符。让我...输血是的，你的护身符会流下更多的眼泪！
secondary_translated_text: Oh... hmm. Did these visions hurt you, too? The bad smell? Disgusting, terrible fruit. It hurts!<page>Enough berries. We don't need any more. But for you, my only friend. Dear Reward!<page>Your amulet. Let me... Blood transfusion Yes, your amulet will shed more tears!

original_en_text: Mmm, the precious fruit! So precious! And perhaps now, we have enough. Enough, enough! For our work often begins, but never ends!
original_zh_text: 嗯，珍果！如此珍稀！或许……已足够。足够，够了！大业常启，但无终时！
translated_text: 嗯，珍贵的水果！如此珍贵！也许我们现在已经足够了。够了，够了！因为我们的工作经常开始，但永远不会结束！
secondary_translated_text: Hmm, precious fruit! So precious! Maybe we have enough now. Enough, enough! Because our work often begins, but never ends!

original_en_text: Ah, hello again! What a blessing to see a familiar face on this treacherous climb.<hpage>Greetings, sir. I see you have begun your pilgrimage, or else set out for your own sake. Either way, I am glad to see you here unharmed.<page>Not quite unharmed... I’ve suffered my share of scrapes and burns. That’s just the nature of the journey, I suppose.<page>But I’ve seen so much! Great metal structures and vast scorched fields! The grandeur of it all is humbling indeed, even for one like me who was so humble to begin with.<page>I’ll rest here just a little longer before resuming my climb.
original_zh_text: 啊，又见面了！能在这险途中看到熟面孔，感谢圣堡庇佑。<hpage>幸会，先生。见你安然无恙，无论为了朝圣，抑或是为了自己，我都感到欣慰。<page>倒也不是安然无恙。多少有些小伤，攀登之路上难免擦碰。<page>但这一路真是大开眼界！巨型造物、焦黑旷野，宏伟又令人敬畏！<page>我打算休息片刻就继续攀登。
translated_text: 啊，我们又见面了！在这段危险的攀登上看到一张熟悉的面孔真是一件幸事。<hpage>你好先生我看到你已经开始朝圣了，或者是为了自己而出发了。不管怎样，我很高兴看到你毫发无伤。<page>并非完全毫发无伤。我还遭受过瘀伤和烧伤。我认为这就是旅程的本质。<page>但我见过这么多！伟大的金属结构和广阔的焦土！这一切的宏伟确实令人谦卑，即使对于像我这样从一开始就如此谦虚的人来说。<page>我会在这里休息一会儿然后继续攀登。
secondary_translated_text: Ah, we meet again! It's a blessing to see a familiar face on this dangerous climb.<hpage>Hello sir, I see that you have embarked on a pilgrimage, or set out for yourself. Anyway, I'm glad to see you unscathed.<page>Not completely unscathed. I also suffered bruises and burns. I think this is the nature of the journey.<page>But I have seen so many! Great metal structure and vast scorched earth! The grandeur of all this is truly humbling, even for someone like me who has been so humble from the beginning.<page>I will rest here for a while and continue to climb.

original_en_text: Mmm! Mmm! This is them, the precious, promised fruits!<page>Drop them in, there they go, and now at last we can begin!
original_zh_text: 嗯嗯！嗯嗯！就是它们，许诺的珍果！<page>投入其中，终于……可以开始！
translated_text: 嗯！嗯！这就是他们，珍贵而应许的果实！<page>把它们放进去就走了，现在我们终于可以开始了！
secondary_translated_text: Hmm! Hmm! This is their precious and promised fruit!<page>Put them in and leave, and now we can finally get started!

original_en_text: Just a piece of something greater, but finely crafted. You should take it with you, traveller, for luck.
original_zh_text: 虽然只剩残片，却很精巧。带上吧旅者，图个吉利。
translated_text: 只是一些更伟大的东西，但制作精良。旅行者，您应该随身携带它，以获得好运。
secondary_translated_text: Just something greater, but well-made. Traveler, you should carry it with you for good luck.

original_en_text: Farewell, little pilgrim. May your shell harden the path for others to tread.
original_zh_text: 安息吧，小朝圣者。愿你的甲壳为后来者铺路。
translated_text: 再见了，小朝圣者。愿你的身体为他人铺平道路。
secondary_translated_text: Farewell, little pilgrim. May your body pave the way for others.

original_en_text: Times like this, all we can do is put our heads down and try to rebuild.
original_zh_text: 这种时候，除了埋头重建还能干啥？
translated_text: 在这种时候，我们能做的就是低下头，努力重建。
secondary_translated_text: At times like this, all we can do is lower our heads and work hard to rebuild.
