Someone wished the thing dismantled, but showed respect enough to see it stored safe.<page>That heart is an inspired form, conceived by the first of my line for a knight of cog and blade.<page>In it, I see my predecessor’s talent, immense, now lost-forgotten. I could never create-copy a work s-s-so fine.<hpage>And the knight that once bore the heart? Tell me of them.<page>A gleaming order, cogwork sentinels, so impressive-majestic in function they were charged-b-b-bound to the highest holy duty.<page>Long before the c-c-creation of the core, the sentinels ventured, even beyond these walls, to see all bugs brought-forced safe to serve the Citadel.<page>If the h-h-h-heart were restored within the sentinel’s shell, would it give thanks for the awakening? Or would it grieve those lands now l-l-lost?<hpage>In time, maker, I may find out...
original_zh_text: 您携带的心-心-脏残片，您是怎么找到如此珍贵造物的？<hpage>它们散落在圣堡各处，似乎是被刻意安置。虽然被拆解，却有妥善保管。<page>这心脏构造精妙，出自我的先辈之手，为机枢骑士所铸造。<page>我能在其中看到先辈才华，如今却已失-失-传。我无法复刻这份神工。<hpage>那曾经承载这颗心的骑士？我想了解详情。<page>光辉教团，机枢戍卫。他们曾经威仪赫赫，掌管圣职。<page>远在核心铸-铸-造之前，戍卫就远征墙外，强掳众虫效忠圣堡。<page>如果将此心-心-脏重新装入戍卫甲中，它会为苏醒而感激？还是为圣堡衰颓哀伤？<hpage>假以时日，大师，或许我能知晓……
translated_text: 您是如何获得并恢复您随身携带的那些核心碎片的？<hpage>他们散布在城堡周围，每个人似乎都有目的地躺着。有人想把这个东西拆开，但表现出足够的尊重以保证它的安全。<page>那颗心是我的第一个系列构思的一种灵感形式，为齿轮和刀片的骑士设计。<page>在其中，我看到了我前任的才华，他的才华巨大，但现在却被遗忘了。我永远无法复制如此美丽的作品。<hpage>曾经有心的骑士呢？告诉我关于他们的事。<page>闪闪发光的命令，犬齿哨兵，功能如此令人印象深刻和雄伟，以至于它们被赋予了最高的神圣职责。<page>早在核心创建之前，哨兵们就冒着风险，甚至在这些墙壁之外，看到所有虫子被迫安全地为城堡服务。<page>如果心脏在哨兵的壳中恢复，它会感谢觉醒吗？或者这会让那些现在失去的土地悲伤吗？<hpage>随着时间的推移，制造者，我可能会发现。
secondary_translated_text: How did you obtain and recover those core fragments you carry with you?<hpage>They were scattered around the castle, and everyone seemed to lie with purpose. Someone wanted to take this thing apart, but showed enough respect to keep it safe.<page>That Heart was a form of inspiration for my first series idea, designed for the knight of gears and blades.<page>In it, I saw the talent of my predecessor, whose talent was huge but now forgotten. I will never be able to replicate such a beautiful work.<hpage>What about the knight who once cared? Tell me about them.<page>The shining orders, the canine teeth sentinel, function so impressive and majestic that they are given the highest sacred duty.<page>Long before the creation of the core, the sentries took risks and even beyond these walls saw all the bugs forced to safely serve the castle.<page>If the heart recovers in the sentinel's shell, will it thank the awakening? Or will this make those lands sad now lost?<hpage>Over time, the maker, I may discover.

original_en_text: This band of metal teeth, sharp and light-fine. It could be woven within your red outer layer? A hidden weapon.
original_zh_text: 金属齿环，轻便锐利。可编入您的红色披风？作为暗器。
translated_text: 这个金属牙带又锋利又轻。它能织进你的红色外层吗？暗器
secondary_translated_text: This metal tooth band is sharp and light. Can it weave into your red outer layer? hidden weapons

original_en_text: <page=S>You seem displeased, Old One. We only did as you asked, yes? The snare is sprung, the creature consumed.<hpage>You bound it to that void!<page=S>Don’t play daft. You should well know our family’s fixations. Surely you had a hunch?<page=B>How else could we hope to trap one of your pale kin? Or see her consumed with such insatiable efficiency?<hpage>Then you have miscalculated, gravely. The white knight, she fell with the mother...<page=M>Oh ho... The quakes, yes? We have felt their force, even here. So the mother resists the dark... to save the child?<hpage>That is my guess. I must descend to the void below, and see clear that truth for myself.<page=M>Ohhhh. How… unfortunate. All of Pharloom will fall to her flailing.<hpage>So it may, but I will not watch idle while it crumbles.
original_zh_text: <page=S>古老者，您似乎不太高兴？我们不过照您吩咐行事罢了。陷阱已发，猎物入彀。<hpage>你们把它和虚空捆在了一起！<page=S>别装傻了。您该清楚我们家族对力量百无禁忌，难道没料到这步？<page=B>不然怎困得住您那苍白同族？又怎教她贪婪吞噬得这般彻底？<hpage>那你们可大错特错了，那苍白骑士也随其母亲一同坠落了……<page=M>哦嚯嚯……是说那些震颤？即便在这里也能感知到。所以是母亲正抵抗黑暗……为了救孩子？<hpage>我是这么猜想的。但必须亲自下去深渊，看清真相。<page=M>哎呀呀……这可……不妙。整个纺络都要被她垂死挣扎掀翻。<hpage>或许吧，但我不会坐视王国崩塌。
translated_text: <page=S>你看起来不高兴，老头。我们只是按你说的做，对吧？陷阱弹出，生物被吞下。<hpage>你把它绑在虚空里了！<page=S>别傻了你应该很了解我们家的运作方式。你确定你有预感吗？<page=B>否则我们怎么才能困住你苍白的亲戚呢？或者看到她被如此贪得无厌的效率所吞噬？<hpage>然后你犯了严重的误判。白衣骑士，她和她的母亲一起倒下了……<page=M>哦嗬。地震了，对吧？即使在这里，我们也感受到了他们的力量。所以母亲们抵制黑暗……为了拯救他们的孩子？<hpage>这是我的猜测。我必须潜入下面的虚空，亲眼目睹这个真相。<page=M>哦怎么...不幸了整个法鲁都会落入她手中。<hpage>可能是这样，但我不会袖手旁观。
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>You don't look happy, old man. We're just doing what you say, right? The trap popped out and the creature was swallowed.<hpage>You tied it in the void!<page=S>Don't be silly. You should know a lot about how our family works. Are you sure you have a hunch?<page=B>How else can we trap your pale relatives? Or see her swallowed by such insatiable efficiency?<hpage>Then you made a serious misjudgment. The white knight, she fell with her mother...<page=M>Oh ho. There was an earthquake, right? Even here, we feel their power. So mothers resist the darkness... to save their children?<hpage>This is my guess. I had to dive into the void below and witness the truth with my own eyes.<page=M>Oh, how... Unfortunately, the whole of Faro will fall into her hands.<hpage>That may be the case, but I will not sit back and watch.

original_en_text: This lump here is well heavy, and shiny too, so it’s surely worth somethin’!
original_zh_text: 这块沉甸甸的，还闪着光，肯定值点钱儿！
translated_text: 这里的这个肿块又重又有光泽，所以绝对值得！
secondary_translated_text: This lump here is heavy and shiny, so it's definitely worth it!

original_en_text: Desperate times make for desperate customers, heh heh! So let’s get to tradin’, eh?
original_zh_text: 世道混乱，方便宰客！嘿嘿！赶紧的！
translated_text: 绝望的时刻造就绝望的顾客，嘿！那么让我们开始交易吧？
secondary_translated_text: Desperate moments create desperate customers, hey! So let's start trading?

original_en_text: Again... Huu... Huu. Truly incredible!<page>Was it the course? Did I lose focus? Or are you simply the bug I have waited so long for? Her of such skill that my wish could, at last, be granted?<page>Another reward must be given for your speed, nimble bug. One deserved in full!
original_zh_text: 又输了……呼……真不可思议！<page>是我分心了？还是你太强？我的心愿终于有机会实现了吗？<page>我得再送你个奖励，你应得的！
translated_text: 再次...呼。呼。太不可思议了！<page>这是课程吗？我失去了注意力吗？或者你只是我一直在等待的虫子？她的技术这么高，我的愿望终于可以实现了？<page>您必须为您的速度、敏捷的错误提供另一个奖励。一个人应得的！
secondary_translated_text: Again... Hoo. Hoo. It's unbelievable!<page>Is this a course? Have I lost focus? Or are you just the bug I've been waiting for? Her skills are so high, my wish can finally come true?<page>You must provide another reward for your speed, agility mistakes. One deserves it!

original_en_text: Have you heard, miss grown-up? Beyond the moss, in the crumbled caverns filled with worms, much change is happening, different to the horrid, stretching dark outside.<page>What brings such bright and bold transformation? Is it a beast? Or a bug unseen? How wondrous it would be to discover them, hidden away in some deep corner!<page>You must go searching, miss grown-up! You and that sharp, sharp blade. Think of the strange and succulent shell waiting to be added to your journal?
original_zh_text: 大姐姐听说了吗？苔原深处满是蠕虫的崩塌洞窟里，正在发生剧变，与外界的恐怖黑灾截然不同。<page> 是什么带来这种鲜明蜕变？是巨兽？还是未知虫类？要是能知道它们是什么，藏在哪里，该多奇妙呀！<page> 你一定要去探索，大姐姐！带上你那锋利的针刃，给记录册里多添上几份奇异的甲壳记录！
translated_text: 您听说了吗，大人？苔藓之外，在蠕虫出没的破碎洞穴里，正在发生很多变化，不像外面延伸的可怕黑暗。<page>是什么促成了这样一个光明而大胆的转变？是野兽吗？或者这是一个看不见的错误？如果能发现它们藏在一个很深的角落里，那该是多么美妙啊！<page>大人，小姐，您一定要找一下！你和那把锋利的刀。想想那些等待添加到你日记中的奇怪而多汁的贝壳吗？
secondary_translated_text: Have you heard, my Lord? Beyond the moss, in the broken caves infested with worms, a lot of changes are happening, unlike the terrible darkness that stretches outside.<page>What contributed to such a bright and bold transformation? Is it a beast? Or was it an invisible mistake? How wonderful it would be to find them hidden in a deep corner!<page>My lord, miss, you must look for it! You and that sharp knife. Think about the strange and juicy shells waiting to be added to your diary?

original_en_text: Now, isn’t this a wondrous place! Golden bells, for weary shells! Ha ha ha!<hpage>This settlement offers safety now, little pilgrim. Perhaps you should make a home here?<hpage>You’ve done well to make it this far, and the roads ahead will only be more dangerous.<page>Oh, dangerous they surely are! But I will gladly tread any path that holds wonders as magnificent as this, red maiden!
original_zh_text: 这地方太妙了！金钟给累瘫的虫子报时！哈哈哈！<hpage>小朝圣者，此处暂时安全，为何不在此安家？<hpage>走到这里实属不易，前方只会更加凶险。<page>凶险又如何！能见到这般奇景，刀山火海我也愿前往！
translated_text: 现在，这不是一个很棒的地方吗？金钟，为疲惫的贝壳敲响！哈哈哈！<hpage>这种和解现在为小朝圣者提供了安全保障。也许你应该在这里定居？<hpage>你做得很好，到了这一步，前面的路只会变得更加危险。<page>哦，他们真的很危险！但我很乐意踏上任何有如此壮丽奇迹的道路，红小姐！
secondary_translated_text: Now, isn't this a great place? The golden bell rings for the tired shells! Hahaha!<hpage>This reconciliation now provides safety for the young pilgrims. Maybe you should settle here?<hpage>You have done a good job. At this point, the road ahead will only become more dangerous.<page>Oh, they're really dangerous! But I would love to embark on any path with such a magnificent miracle, Miss Red!

original_en_text: <hpage>You have keen sight for my skill, bug, but my childhood has long since passed. What has happened here? I see signs of battle all around.
original_zh_text: <hpage>你的眼力不错，我确是一名战士，但早已称不上是孩子。这是怎么回事？到处是打斗痕迹。
translated_text: <hpage>你对我的技能很有洞察力，虫子，但我的童年已经过去了。这里发生了什么？我看到我周围到处都是战斗的迹象。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>You have great insight into my skills, bug, but my childhood is over. What happened here? I saw signs of fighting all around me.

original_en_text: <hpage>The time is close, Shakra. The cost was grave, and the challenge steep, but I have claimed a power that can put end to this disaster. <page>Gendaa... This is good, Hornet Wielding Needle, essential. My own strength has near reached its limit, and the dark husks continue their assault unceasing.<page>Take your final action, and let us all see the end of this.
original_zh_text: <hpage>时机到了。虽然代价惨重，但我找到了终结灾祸的方法。<page>哏嗒……太好了，小姑娘。我正好快撑不住了，黑虫的攻势永不停歇。<page>放手去干吧，让我们一起见证结局。
translated_text: <hpage>时间快到了，夏克拉。代价是巨大的，挑战是巨大的，但我已经有能力结束这场灾难。<page>远大...这很好，大黄蜂挥针，这是必不可少的。我自己的力量已经达到了极限，黑暗的外壳继续攻击。<page>采取最后的行动，让我们都看到这一切的结局。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>The time is almost up, Shakla. The cost is huge, the challenge is huge, but I am already capable of ending this disaster.<page>Yuanda... That's good, the bumblebee wields a needle, it's essential. My own strength had reached its limit, and the outer shell of darkness continued to attack.<page>Take the final action and let us all see the end of this.

original_en_text: Your achievements in the games are inspiring! In time, I may have to challenge those impressive scores...
original_zh_text: 你创下的记录真令我激动！改天我要挑战看看！
translated_text: 你在游戏中的成就令人鼓舞！随着时间的推移，我可能不得不挑战那些令人印象深刻的成绩。
secondary_translated_text: Your achievements in the game are inspiring! Over time, I may have to challenge those impressive results.

original_en_text: <hpage>Good luck on your quest Garmond. If you hope to claim justice for your fellows passed, I suspect you’ve some challenge yet ahead.<page>Aye! Zaza and I’ll fight to cavern’s end if it need be, for the bugs held in our hearts, and our honour as knights!
original_zh_text: <hpage>祝你们好运，要找圣堡讨公道可不容易。<page>为了心中的记忆，为了骑士的荣耀！就算要杀遍每处洞穴我们也在所不惜！
translated_text: <hpage>祝你的任务Garmond好运。如果你想为死去的同胞伸张正义，我怀疑你仍然面临一些挑战。<page>是的！如果有必要，扎扎和我将战斗到洞穴的尽头，为了我们心中的虫子和我们作为骑士的荣誉！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Good luck with your mission Garmond. If you want to do justice for your dead compatriots, I suspect you still face some challenges.<page>Yes! If necessary, Zaza and I will fight to the end of the cave, for the bug in our hearts and our honor as knights!

original_en_text: Ahh, can you feel it too? The thralls of the Citadel are gathered close, in overwhelming numbers!<page>Together though, the three of us would be more overwhelming still! Would you allow us to fight by your side, brave sister?
original_zh_text: 啊哈，感觉到了吗？圣堡的傀儡在集结，非常多！<page>咱们三个联手，肯定不可阻挡！要一起战斗吗，勇敢的姐妹？
translated_text: 啊，你也能感觉到吗？城堡里的奴隶们势不可挡地聚集在一起！<page>然而，我们三个人在一起，将会更加势不可挡！勇敢的姐姐，你愿意让我们和你并肩作战吗？
secondary_translated_text: Ah, can you feel it too? The slaves in the castle gathered together unstoppable!<page>However, together, the three of us will be even more unstoppable! Brave sister, will you let us fight side by side with you?

original_en_text: Well, well! See what happens to nasty bully-bugs when they come after poor old Grindle? That’s a well-deserved end, we reckon.<page>We heard this old Sitty-dell was nice and quiet and burstin’ with goodies. So what’s happened, eh? Why’s it crawlin’ with bullies and busybodies?<hpage>The creature that haunts this place is stirring, little thief. The Citadel’s caste now roam the halls. You would do well to leave soon, if you mean to survive.<page>What what? You bein’ mirthful? We’re stayin’ here ‘til we’re done pilfering! You should be the one leavin’ if you’re so afeared!
original_zh_text: 啧啧！瞧瞧那些欺负格林德尔恶霸虫是什么下场？真是活该！<page>都说圣堡既清净，宝贝又多，怎么全是打手？<hpage>掌控此地的怪物正在苏醒，圣堡的守卫四处游荡，想活命就快逃吧，小毛贼。<page>怕什么！起码得等偷够本再说！你要是害怕了，那就自己逃吧！
translated_text: 嗯，嗯！看看当这个讨厌的恶霸追上可怜的老格林德尔时会发生什么？我们相信这是一个当之无愧的结局。<page>我们听说这个古老的锡蒂代尔很好、安静，而且充满了美好的东西。那么发生了什么，嗯？为什么这个地方到处都是恶霸和爱管闲事的人？<hpage>困扰这个地方的生物都很兴奋，小偷。城堡的种姓现在在大厅里游荡。如果你想活下去，最好尽快离开。<page>什么？你在笑吗？我们要留在这里直到完成盗窃！如果你这么害怕，你就应该离开！
secondary_translated_text: Hmm, hmm! See what happens when this pesky bully catches up with poor old Grindel? We believe this is a well-deserved ending.<page>We heard that this ancient Sitidale was nice, quiet and full of beautiful things. So what happened, huh? Why is this place full of bullies and nosy people?<hpage>The creatures that plague this place are excited, thieves. The caste of the castle now roams the halls. If you want to survive, you'd better leave as soon as possible.<page>What? Are you smiling? We will stay here until the theft is completed! If you're so scared, you should leave!

original_en_text: High up, above the caverns all of crust, Nuu has been told of a hole, filled with writhing things, all zipping and zapping.<page>But so sad! Nuu cannot herself see it. The lands quake and rattle. The savage threads stretch. The dangers are too much.<page>It must be you, miss grown-up, older, stiffer, a shell less precious. Seek the cave, and the things within. How else will the journal be complete?
original_zh_text: 努努听说，在布满硬壳的洞窟高处，有个满是扭动生物的洞穴，噼啪作响。<page> 但好可惜！努努不能去看。大地震动，凶暴丝线蔓延，太危险了。<page> 必须靠你了，大姐姐，你甲壳厚实，经验丰富。去探查那个洞穴吧！不然记录册怎么完整呢？
translated_text: 在那里，在地壳的所有洞穴之上，努被告知有一个洞，里面装满了扭曲的东西，所有的拉链和拉链。<page>但这太悲伤了！努自己看不到。大地震动，嘎嘎作响。野蛮主义的线索不断延伸。危险太大了。<page>一定是您，大人和小姐。你越来越老，越来越辛苦，你的壳也不再那么珍贵了。寻找洞穴和里面有什么。否则日记该如何完成？
secondary_translated_text: There, above all the caves in the earth's crust, Nu was told there was a hole filled with twisted things, all the zippers and zippers.<page>But it's so sad! Nu couldn't see it himself. The earth shook and rattled. The clues of barbarism continue to stretch. The danger is too great.<page>It must be you, my lord and miss. You are getting older and harder, and your shell is no longer so precious. Find the cave and what's inside. Otherwise, how should the diary be completed?

original_en_text: Ahh miss grown-up, Nuu hoped you would return here. For clever Nuu can track well where you have been, she sees your cut-marks and sniffs out your fragrant trail!<page>And look where the trail has led sweet Nuu! A thick wriggler lived in this nest, rumbling and crackling in the darkness.<page>Its sour juices still line these rocky insides, and patient Nuu will gather it all up!<hpage>There is much to learn in these crusted highlands Nuu, but much danger as well. Indulge your curiosity if you must, but keep your senses trained on the darkness.
original_zh_text: 大姐姐！努努跟着你的刀痕和体香找到这啦！<page>这个巢穴住着条乱扭的胖家伙，在黑暗里咔咔响！<page>岩壁上还粘着它的酸液，努努要全部收集！<hpage>这里虽然知识多，但也很危险，别只顾着好奇，也要小心黑暗中的动静。
translated_text: 啊，大人，努希望您能回到这里。Smart Nuu可以跟踪您去过的地方。她会看到你的割伤痕迹，嗅出你的香味！<page>看看这条路把甜蜜的Nuu带到了哪里！巢穴里住着一只矮胖的鳄鱼，在黑暗中隆隆作响。<page>这些岩石里面仍然到处都是它的酸味，Nuu患者会把它们全部收集起来！<hpage>在努这些硬皮高原上，有很多东西需要学习，但也有很多危险。如果有必要，请满足你的好奇心，但让你的感官在黑暗中训练。
secondary_translated_text: Ah, my lord, I wish you could come back here. Smart Nuu can track where you have been. She will see your cut marks and smell your scent!<page>Look where this road has taken sweet Nuu! In the nest lived a stocky crocodile, rumbling in the darkness.<page>These rocks are still full of its sour taste, and Nuu patients will collect them all!<hpage>On these crusty plateaus of Nu, there are many things to learn, but there are also many dangers. If necessary, satisfy your curiosity, but let your senses train in the dark.

original_en_text: Don’t let defeat weigh on you, nimble bug! If strength remains, simply step again to the challenge. Let us soar swift together!
original_zh_text: 别灰心！还有力气就再比一次！
translated_text: 不要让失败压垮你，敏捷的虫子！如果力量仍然存在，那就再次迎接挑战吧。让我们一起翱翔！
secondary_translated_text: Don't let failure crush you, agile bug! If power still exists, then meet the challenge again. Let us soar together!

original_en_text: Oh! Those horrible beasty-beasts are gone! Much and many thanks for you, mighty warrior!<hpage>It was a simple thing, small bug. I assume you are Tipp, the courier?<hpage>Frey, the Bellhart trader, seemed concerned for your safety... and for the cargo you carry.<page>She sent you?! Bah! She needs to learny-learn a little patience! I’m is barely been away! But still... is lucky-lucky for me you came.
original_zh_text: 哇！那些丑、丑八怪全被干掉了！多谢勇士！<hpage>举手之劳。你是蒂普？<hpage>钟心镇的芙蕾很担心你……还有你带的货。<page>她找的你？切！让她学、学着点耐心！我才离开一会儿！
translated_text: 噢！那些可怕的野兽消失了！非常感谢你，伟大的士兵！<hpage>这是一件简单的事情，虫子。我猜你是快递员蒂普吧？<hpage>伯哈特的交易员弗雷似乎很担心你的安全……以及您携带的货物。<page>她派你来的？！呸！她需要学会--学会有耐心！我几乎从不离开！但仍然...我很幸运你在这里。
secondary_translated_text: Oh! Those terrible beasts have disappeared! Thank you very much, great soldier!<hpage>It's a simple thing, bug. I assume you're Tipp, the courier?<hpage>Frey, a trader at Burhart, seems concerned about your safety... and the cargo you are carrying.<page>She sent you?! Bah! She needs to learn-learn to be patient! I almost never leave! But still... I'm lucky you're here.

original_en_text: Well, I’m is be off now. That old grubly-grub in the bell will come after me herself if she not get her goods!
original_zh_text: 好吧，我这就送货去。再不回去那个老、老财迷要亲自追来了！
translated_text: 好吧，我现在就走。如果钟声里那个顽固的老家伙拿不到东西，她就会亲自来找我！
secondary_translated_text: All right, I'm leaving now. If that stubborn old fellow in the bell can't get anything, she'll come to me herself!

original_en_text: Now I must train, and strive, further and faster by your example. Your skill upon these tracks has roused my spirit, nimble bug. You shall forever have my thanks.
original_zh_text: 现在，我要以你为榜样加倍训练！你点燃了我的斗志！我会永远感谢你的！
translated_text: 现在我必须按照你的榜样训练和奋斗，才能走得更远、更快。你在这些赛道上的技能唤醒了我的精神，敏捷的虫子。我将永远感谢你。
secondary_translated_text: Now I must train and strive according to your example to go further and faster. Your skills on these tracks awaken my spirit, agile bug. I will always thank you.

original_en_text: A town built within the thick vein of bells that runs through Pharloom’s core. One wonders who would craft so many, and for what purpose?
original_zh_text: 建在钟脉上的小镇。谁造的这么多钟？图什么？
translated_text: 一座小镇建在贯穿法鲁核心的茂密钟声脉中。人们想知道是谁制作了这么多以及出于什么目的？
secondary_translated_text: A small town is built in the dense vein of bells that runs through the core of Faro. People want to know who made so many and for what purpose?

original_en_text: Hornet Wielding Needle! With my master’s passing, I have resolved to improve my skills that, in time, I may match her prime.<page>Much work I must do to achieve that goal. I have found this wide bare stone fine ground on which to train.<page>Would you spar with me now? Raise that blade and test my rings! You may prove my greatest challenge yet.
original_zh_text: "使针的小姑娘！导师不在了，我决定要练到她巅峰水平。<page>这块裸岩地正适合特训。<page>来比划比划？亮兵器吧！你或许是我最大的挑战。"
translated_text: 大黄蜂挥舞着针！随着主人去世，我决心提高自己的技能，假以时日，我可能会赶上她的鼎盛时期。<page>为了实现这个目标，我必须做很多工作。我找到了这片宽阔、光秃秃的石头般的良好地面，可以在上面训练。<page>你现在想和我竞争吗？举起刀片来测试我的戒指！你可能会证明我迄今为止最大的挑战。
secondary_translated_text: The bumblebee waved the needle! With the death of my master, I am determined to improve my skills, and over time, I may catch up with her heyday.<page>In order to achieve this goal, I have to do a lot of work. I found this wide, bare stone-like good ground on which to train.<page>Do you want to compete with me now? Lift up the blade and test my ring! You may prove my biggest challenge yet.

original_en_text: <hpage>Your charts and tools show fine skill, Shakra. I’ve met few who’d match your talent.<page>Cartography! Peh. Bakallo! It is a craft-skill common amongst my tribe. Most important to keep one’s mind sharp when on a journey.<page>The charting of caverns, the memory of travel, the knowing of one’s place within the kingdom, an engaging task for a warrior’s mind.<page>An unfortunate thing that my great mentor never learnt the skill. Her talent at getting lost... I should almost be impressed...
original_zh_text: <hpage>你的图纸工具很专业，很少见过这般手艺。<page>测绘？呵！吧咔咯！这是我们部落必学的手艺，最重要的是能在旅途中保持专注。<page>记山洞、画路线、辨方位，最适合战士动脑子的活计。<page>可惜我得导师没这本事。她迷路的本事……反而令我佩服……
translated_text: <hpage>Shakla，你的图表和工具展现了精湛的技巧。我遇到的人很少能与你的才华相媲美。<page>制图！裴巴卡罗！这是我部落常见的工艺技能。旅途中保持头脑敏锐最重要的是。<page>绘制洞穴、旅行记忆、了解自己在王国中的位置对于战士的头脑来说是一项迷人的任务。<page>不幸的是，我的伟大导师从未学会过这项技能。她迷路的天赋。我几乎应该印象深刻。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Shakla, your charts and tools demonstrate superb skill. Few people I have met can match your talents.<page>Cartography! Pebacaro! This is a common craft skill in my tribe. The most important thing to keep your mind sharp during the journey.<page>Drawing caves, traveling memories, and understanding one's place in the kingdom are fascinating tasks for the warrior's mind.<page>Unfortunately, my great mentor never learned this skill. Her gift of getting lost. I should almost have been impressed.

original_en_text: Lots of good stuff tucked away in this old prison... lovely place to bring a lucky little snitchbug like Grindle! What a favour those lugs did us! O-hoho!
original_zh_text: 这破监狱藏着不少好货呀……格林德尔就爱关在这种地方！哦嚯嚯！
translated_text: 这个旧监狱里有很多好东西……可爱的地方，适合接待像格林德尔这样的幸运小告密者！这些耳朵对我们有多大帮助！哦嗬嗬！
secondary_translated_text: There are a lot of good things in this old prison... lovely place to receive lucky little snitches like Greendale! How helpful these ears are to us! Oh ho ho!

original_en_text: Oooh, ma. Miss grown-up, you deny poor Nuu? So sour!<hpage>I am sorry, Nuu. Though I recognise the value in your wish, my own task is too pressing.
original_zh_text: 呜呜，天啊。大姐姐，你拒绝可怜的努努？好伤心！<hpage>抱歉，努努。我知道你这份祈愿的价值，但我的使命更为紧迫。
translated_text: 哦，妈妈。大人，你否认可怜的努吗？好酸！<hpage>对不起，努。虽然我意识到你愿望的价值，但我自己的任务太紧迫了。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, mom. My lord, do you deny poor Nu? So sour!<hpage>I'm sorry, Nu. Although I realize the value of your wishes, my own task is too urgent.

original_en_text: Come to rest here, miss grown-up? Then let Nuu see our journal, for she is eager to see your cuts!
original_zh_text: 大姐姐来这休息？那快让努努看看记录册，等不及要看你的战果啦！
translated_text: 大人，您为何不来这里休息呢？然后让Nuu读我们的日记，因为她渴望看到你的剪辑！
secondary_translated_text: My lord, why don't you come here to rest? Then let Nuu read our diary because she is eager to see your clips!

original_en_text: This great structure... It would have taken the lifetimes of so many bugs to build it. Now its wounds run deep, and I can hear the groaning of its final breaths.<page>Everything that grows must pass, I suppose. Still, to witness even its current state is a privilege I’ll not squander.<page>And what of you, friend Hornet? Where are your travels taking you?<hpage>They have taken me deep, and will take me yet deeper still. I have a responsibility to cut this land free of its dark fate.<hpage>That is no concern of yours though, sir. You should continue your own journey, albeit with a claw on your weapon at all times.
original_zh_text: 这宏伟建筑……不知耗费了多少代虫的心血。如今却只能发出垂死呻吟。<page>盛极必衰吧，大概。不过能见证这最后的余晖也是荣幸。<page>你呢？你的旅途通向哪里？<hpage>我要往更深处去，我有责任斩断这片土地的诅咒。<hpage>但这与你无关。继续你的旅程吧，但要记得握紧武器。
translated_text: 这个伟大的结构。它花了一生的时间来构建这么多错误。现在它的伤口如此之深，我可以听到它最后一口气的呻吟声。<page>我认为一切成长都必须过去。尽管如此，能够看到它的本来面目是我不会浪费的特权。<page>你呢，大黄蜂朋友？你的旅行将带你去哪里？<hpage>他们深深地吸引了我，并且会让我更深。我有责任将这片土地从黑暗的命运中解放出来。<hpage>但这不关你的事，先生。你应该继续自己的旅程，即使你的武器总是有爪子。
secondary_translated_text: This great structure. It took a lifetime to build so many mistakes. Now its wound is so deep that I can hear its last breath groan.<page>I think all growth must pass. Still, being able to see it for what it really is is a privilege I will not waste.<page>What about you, friend bumblebee? Where will your trip take you?<hpage>They attract me deeply and will make me deeper. It is my responsibility to liberate this land from its dark destiny.<hpage>But it's none of your business, sir. You should continue on your journey, even if your weapon always has claws.

original_en_text: To our safe haven? Our home... This is what’s left of it after the great breaking began.<page>There was that terrible noise from above. Everything shook and fell apart, and the black threads sprung up from beneath. Many a poor pilgrim has already been lost to the destruction.<page>You might have been too, if not for some fleeing pilgrims who found you fallen and carried you back to us.<hpage>The black threads... I may understand their source.<hpage>I must speak with the old Caretaker. Do you know what has become of him? I see he has left you his garb.<page>Oh, yes. He charged me with looking after those remaining here, said he had to confer with his family down below.<hpage>Down below... Then they have slunk away to hide in their ruined chapel.<hpage>I must pay them a visit. Thank you, Sherma. Stay safe, and take care of your fellow pilgrims.
original_zh_text: 这里原本是我们的避难所……大崩塌之后就变成这样了。<page>头顶传来可怕的巨响，天花板塌了，地下还冒出黑丝，好多同袍都被卷走了。<page>要不是几个逃难的同袍发现你昏倒在路边，恐怕你也……<hpage>那些黑丝……我大概知晓其源头。<hpage>我得去找老看守者。你可知道他去哪了？你穿着他的衣服。<page>他让我照顾留下的人，说要去下面和家人商量事情。<hpage>下面……肯定是躲到破教堂里了。<hpage>我得去找他们。你多保重，照顾好大家。
translated_text: 去我们的避风港？我们的家这是大破裂开始后剩下的。<page>上面传来可怕的声音。一切都在颤抖，分崩离析，黑色的线条从下面冒出来。许多贫穷的朝圣者在破坏中丧生。<page>如果不是一些逃离的朝圣者发现你摔倒并将你带回我们身边，你可能也是一样的。<hpage>黑线。我可能会明白他们的来源。<hpage>我必须和老看守人谈谈。你知道他怎么了吗？我看到他把衣服留给你了。<page>哦，是的，他让我照顾留在这里的人，并说他必须与下面的家人协商。<hpage>下面然后他们偷偷溜进了被毁的教堂。<hpage>我必须去拜访他们。谢谢你，谢尔曼。保持安全并照顾好您的朝圣者同胞。
secondary_translated_text: To our safe haven? Our home. This is what's left of since the big rupture began.<page>There was a terrible sound from above. Everything was shaking and falling apart, and black lines emerged from below. Many poor pilgrims lost their lives in the destruction.<page>You might be the same if it weren't for some fleeing pilgrims who discovered you fell and brought you back to us.<hpage>Black line. I might understand their source.<hpage>I have to talk to the old caretaker. Do you know what happened to him? I saw he left your clothes.<page>Oh, yes, he asked me to take care of the people who stayed here and said he had to consult with the family below.<hpage>Below and then they sneaked into the destroyed church.<hpage>I must visit them. Thank you, Sherman. Stay safe and take good care of your fellow pilgrims.

original_en_text: Bakkana! A battle well won! The haunted bugs have been defeated and the way forward is yours. Let us meet again soon, away from this dreadful Citadel.
original_zh_text: 啵咔呐！赢得漂亮！迷途虫都被消灭了，你可以继续前行了。后会有期，离这鬼圣堡远点。
translated_text: 巴卡纳一场胜利的战斗！闹鬼的虫子已经被击败，前进的道路属于你。让我们很快再见面，远离这座可怕的城堡。
secondary_translated_text: A victorious battle in Bakana! The haunted bug has been defeated, and the way forward belongs to you. Let us meet again soon, far away from this terrible castle.

original_en_text: Huge caves ascending to Pharloom’s Citadel. The roads are slowly being devoured by sand and howling wind.
original_zh_text: 通向圣堡的巨洞，风沙正在逐渐吞噬这里的道路。
translated_text: 巨大的洞穴延伸到法勒姆城堡。这条路正慢慢地被沙子和呼啸的风吞没。
secondary_translated_text: Huge caves extend to Farham Castle. The road is slowly being swallowed up by sand and howling winds.

original_en_text: <hpage>Farewell, tall bug, until we cross again.<page>Or until death calmly claims us both...
original_zh_text: <hpage>再会，下次碰面……<page>或许就是我们的死期……
translated_text: <hpage>再见，高冲，直到我们再次穿越。<page>或者直到死亡平静地带走我们俩……
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Goodbye, Gao Chong, until we cross again.<page>Or until death takes us both peacefully...

original_en_text: Again and again you prove your mastery, nimble bug, yet still I never tire of the challenge!<page>As reward for such an impressive feat of endurance, I have only this small trophy, a memento given by my own speed teacher, now fairly passed to you.
original_zh_text: 你一次又一次证明了自己！但我永不厌倦挑战！<page>对这份惊人耐力的奖励，我只有这小奖杯了，是我师父给我的，现在传给你了！
translated_text: 你已经一次又一次地证明了你的能力，敏捷的错误，但我仍然喜欢挑战！<page>作为对如此令人印象深刻的耐力壮举的奖励，我只有这个小奖杯，这是我自己的速度老师送给你的纪念品，现在公平地交给了你。
secondary_translated_text: You have proven your abilities, agility mistakes over and over again, but I still love the challenge!<page>As a reward for such an impressive feat of endurance, I only have this little trophy, a souvenir given to you by my own speed teacher and now fairly handed over to you.

original_en_text: <page=S>Bring us the hearts, Old One. Make’em beat, fierce and final. See for yourself the forgotten strength of this land of bugs before we burn those memories in its saving.
original_zh_text: <page=M>把心带来，古老者。通过它们的搏动，见证这片虫族土地被遗忘的伟力，再焚尽这些记忆换取救赎。
translated_text: <page=S>老家伙，把你的心交给我们。让他们最终惨败。在我们拯救这些记忆之前，请亲眼看看这个被遗忘的虫子之地的力量。
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Old man, give us your heart. Let them finally lose miserably. Before we save these memories, see for yourself the power of this forgotten land of bugs.

original_en_text: Tch... Hahahaa. Marvelous! So the spider knows something of fathomless beings, and still it hopes to stand against one, a god... <page>Where do you hide this boundless strength you claim, spider? I’ve watched your struggle towards us. Yours was a painful, broken trek. One needs grace to stand before the divine.<hpage>Then best you keep watching, child. I’ve found those who claim themselves a god can rarely match the title.<hpage>And experience tells me, even gods can fall.
original_zh_text: 哈！有意思！明知对手是神还妄想反抗？<page>你的底气在哪？爬得又慢又狼狈，谒见神明要优雅！<hpage>那你就继续看好了。自封为神的存在往往名不副实。<hpage>何况经验告诉我，即使是神也会陨落。
translated_text: 切哈哈哈哈。太好了！所以蜘蛛对无意识的生物有所了解，但它仍然想与一个，一个神战斗。<page>蜘蛛，你说的无穷力量藏在哪里？我看到了你与我们的斗争。你的旅程是一段痛苦而破碎的旅程。一个人需要恩典才能站在上帝面前。<hpage>那你最好继续看着孩子们。我发现很少有自称神的人能与这个头衔相媲美。<hpage>经验告诉我，即使是神也会陨落。
secondary_translated_text: Chehahahaha. Great! So the spider knows something about unconscious creatures, but it still wants to fight one, one god.<page>Spider, where is the infinite power you mentioned hidden? I saw your struggle with us. Your journey has been a painful and broken journey. A person needs grace to stand before God.<hpage>Then you better keep watching the children. I have found that few people who claim to be God can match this title.<hpage>Experience tells me that even gods can fall.

original_en_text: <hpage>Shakra, you look well at home in these wilds.<page>Poshanka! These scorched fields offer many paths and much combat. To leap from vantage upon the red-shells or to meet them face-front with rings ready? These are decisions to live for!<page>I am much surprised those soft pilgrims ever safely climbed this scorched and savage place.
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉，我看你在这荒野中自在的很。<page>啵尚咔！这片荒野多的是战斗机会。是从高处突袭红壳怪？还是正面对决？这才是战士的生活！<page>那些软脚的朝圣者能爬上这鬼地方，倒是让我吃惊。
translated_text: <hpage>沙克拉，你在这片荒野里看起来很舒服。<page>博尚卡！这些烧焦的田野提供了许多道路和许多战斗。我们应该从有利的位置跳上红色贝壳，还是戴上戒指正面迎接它们？这些是我们赖以生存的决定！<page>我很惊讶柔软的朝圣者能够安全地攀登这个烧焦而野蛮的地方。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Shakra, you look comfortable in this wilderness.<page>Boshanka! These charred fields provide many roads and many battles. Should we jump on the red shells from a favorable position, or should we put on a ring to welcome them head-on? These are the decisions we rely on for survival!<page>I was surprised that the soft pilgrim was able to climb this charred and barbaric place safely.

original_en_text: Here, the proof of our majesty... mark of our divine right...
original_zh_text: 这是王权之证……神授之印……
translated_text: 在这里，我们威严的证明。我们神圣权利的象征。
secondary_translated_text: Here is a proof of our majesty. A symbol of our sacred rights.

original_en_text: Hoi hoi! A nimble opponent appears. At last! At last!<hpage>If you are seeking challengers, sir, you should choose a location less far afield. It is rare chance I, or any bug, would come upon this distant cavern.<page>True! Though once discovered, could there be a more perfect spot? This giant, boney body, so distant from Pharloom’s ails.<page>Here, freely, we can test our speed and our sleek shells. Here we may race!<page>You must be eager to step to the task, challenger? Fulfil my wish! Let us discover our limits together!
original_zh_text: 哟嚯！终于来个能跑的！<hpage>先生，若想找虫比试，不该待在如此偏远之地。<page>有道理，但最棒的赛道就在这！还远离纺络的破事。<page>这里能尽情展现速度与甲壳之美！来赛一场吧！<page>你也等不及了吧？快来满足我的愿望，一起测试极限！
translated_text: 呵呵！灵活的对手出现了。终于！终于！<hpage>先生，如果您正在寻找挑战者，您应该选择一个不太远的地点。我或任何昆虫几乎没有机会来到这个偏远的洞穴。<page>真的！虽然一旦被发现，还有更完美的地方吗？这具巨大、骨瘦如柴的身体距离法鲁姆的病情非常遥远。<page>在这里，我们可以自由测试我们的速度和光滑的外壳。我们可以在这里竞争！<page>挑战者，你一定很渴望完成任务吧？完成我的心愿！让我们一起发现自己的极限！
secondary_translated_text: Hehe! Flexible opponents emerged. Finally! Finally!<hpage>Sir, if you are looking for a challenger, you should choose a location that is not too far away. There is little chance for me or any insect to come to this remote cave.<page>Really! Although once discovered, is there anything more perfect? This huge, scrawny body is far away from Farum's condition.<page>Here, we can freely test our speed and smooth shell. We can compete here!<page>Challenger, you must be eager to complete the task, right? Fulfill my wish! Let us discover our limits together!

original_en_text: Our capital, built grand... The seat of our sovereignty... slipped from my mind...<page>Why does it fade? Why can I not recall that sacred place?
original_zh_text: 我的宏伟的都城……我的王座……为什么记不清了……<page>为什么消失了……为什么想不起圣地模样……
translated_text: 我们的首都是宏伟的。我们主权所在的地方。它从我的脑海中消失了。<page>为什么它会褪色？为什么我想不起那个神圣的地方了？
secondary_translated_text: Our capital is magnificent. Where our sovereignty lies. It disappeared from my mind.<page>Why does it fade? Why can't I remember that sacred place?

original_en_text: Zaza and I will tarry here a little longer... These pilgrims need watching over, and we are committed to the task.
original_zh_text: 我和扎扎会在这多待一会……这些朝圣者需要照看。
translated_text: 扎扎和我会在这里再呆一段时间……这些朝圣者需要照顾，我们致力于这一使命。
secondary_translated_text: Zaza and I will be here for a while longer... these pilgrims need care and we are committed to this mission.

original_en_text: Delicious! I like you already!<page>But what a bore it would be to cut you down now, when you’re so achingly close to our grand Citadel...<page>Climb higher, little spider. I want to savour your struggle just a little longer!
original_zh_text: 有意思！我开始喜欢你了！<page>但现在杀你太无聊了，离圣堡就差一步……<page>继续爬吧小蜘蛛！让我想多看看你挣扎的样子！
translated_text: 美味！我已经喜欢你了！<page>但是现在把你砍倒是多么无聊啊，当你离我们宏伟的城堡如此之近的时候……<page>爬得更高，小蜘蛛。我想再次享受你的奋斗！
secondary_translated_text: Delicious! I already like you!<page>But how boring it is to cut you down now, when you are so close to our magnificent castle...<page>Climb higher, little spider. I want to enjoy your struggle again!

original_en_text: But Nuu is sensible, she understands. Miss grown-up has purpose, she must be away.<page>The cleaning can wait for another time. Nuu is patient... always patient.
original_zh_text: 但努努很懂事，知道大姐姐有正事要忙。<page>清洁可以等下次，努努很耐心……最有耐心了……
translated_text: 达努很聪明，她明白。这位女士有目的，她必须离开。<page>清洁可以等到下次。Nuu非常有耐心。始终保持耐心。
secondary_translated_text: Danu is smart, she understands. This lady has a purpose and she has to leave.<page>Cleaning can wait until next time. Nuu is very patient. Always be patient.

original_en_text: <hpage>You seem to have some familiarity with this prison and its guards. Do you know a path to escape?<page>Escape! A little jailbug like you ain’t ever escapin’ anything! Get out of here, will you? Stop bothering us! You got nothing to steal, so we got nothing to talk about!
original_zh_text: <hpage>你看起来对这里很熟，知道越狱路线吗？<page>想逃？就你？下辈子吧！别烦我们了，身上什么也没有，没资格跟爷说话！
translated_text: <hpage>你似乎对这座监狱和它的看守很熟悉。你知道逃跑的方法吗？<page>快跑！像你这样的小囚犯永远无法逃脱任何东西！离开这里，好吗？别再打扰我们了！你没什么可偷的，所以我们没什么可聊的！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>You seem to be familiar with the prison and its guards. Do you know how to escape?<page>Run! A little prisoner like you can never escape anything! Get out of here, okay? Don't bother us again! You have nothing to steal, so we have nothing to talk about!

original_en_text: Though the dust has not yet settled over our battle here, Zaza and I must soon be away. The memory of our village calls us ever onward. Farewell, brave sister!
original_zh_text: 虽然战斗激起的尘埃还没落定，但我们该走啦。村里的大伙催着我们前进呢，保重，姐妹！
translated_text: 虽然这里的战斗尚未结束，但我和扎扎必须尽快离开。我们村庄的回忆召唤我们继续前进。再见了，勇敢的妹妹！
secondary_translated_text: Although the battle here is not over yet, Zaza and I must leave as soon as possible. Memories of our village call us to move on. Farewell, brave sister!

original_en_text: <page>You would challenge again, nimble bug? You have proven yourself time and again.<hpage>Your course can still provide understanding, sir. Upon it, I see my own limits clearer and learn to push them further. <page>Of course! Of course! And I can learn much following behind your fair form.<page>I’d need only a moment, and the track would again be ready.
original_zh_text: <page>还要比？你已经证明实力了。<hpage>还需练习，你的赛道让我能看清自己的极限。<page>那当然好！跟在你这矫健身姿后面也能学到很多！<page>稍等，马上就能布置好新赛道！
translated_text: <page>你还要再次挑战吗，敏捷的错误？你一次又一次地证明了自己。<hpage>先生，您的课程仍然提供了理解。此后，我更清楚地看到了自己的极限，并学会了进一步推动它们。<page>当然！当然！在你美丽的外表背后，我可以学到很多东西。<page>我只需要一点时间，赛道就会再次准备好。
secondary_translated_text: <page>Are you going to challenge again, agile mistakes? You proved yourself time and time again.<hpage>Sir, your course still provides understanding. Since then, I saw my limits more clearly and learned to push them further.<page>Of course! Of course! Behind your beautiful appearance, I can learn a lot.<page>I just need a little time and the track will be ready again.

original_en_text: <hpage>Your threats are worthless, child. If you are my foe, stay your voice and raise your blade.
original_zh_text: <hpage>不必多费口舌，孩子，要打的话，就亮兵器吧。
translated_text: <hpage>你的威胁毫无意义，儿子。如果你是我的敌人，请保持你的声音并举起你的剑。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Your threats are meaningless, son. If you are my enemy, please keep your voice and raise your sword.

original_en_text: I can save you, little spider. All the trouble you’d face above. All the suffering. It’s so simple.<page>I’ll just skewer you here and now, pluck that flickering life right out of you.
original_zh_text: 我能救你哦~小蜘蛛。只要现在刺穿你，把那点小火星掐灭……<page>所有的苦痛，所有的折磨，就都能解脱了。
translated_text: 我可以救你，蜘蛛。你将在那里面临的所有麻烦。所有的苦难。很简单<page>我现在要把你绑在一起，拉出你体内闪烁的生命。
secondary_translated_text: I can save you, spider. All the trouble you will face there. All the suffering. very simple<page>I'm going to tie you together now and pull out the life that shines inside you.

original_en_text: How sad. A little spider has fallen from its cage. So lost. So weak. Poor little morsel.
original_zh_text: 可怜的小蜘蛛从笼中跌落。多迷茫，多脆弱，真是令人心疼。
translated_text: 一只小蜘蛛从笼子里掉了出来，真是令人悲伤。所以我输了。太弱了。可怜的小家伙。
secondary_translated_text: It's sad that a little spider fell out of its cage. So I lost. Too weak. Poor little thing.

original_en_text: Ooooh ma, is well-begun. Many creatures have been recorded, but many many more still to be learned of!<page>Miss grown-up, you should rest quick and venture out to hunt again soon, thinks Nuu!
original_zh_text: 哇哇，开了个好头！记了好多生物，但还有更多等着发现！<page>大姐姐赶紧休息完再去打猎呀！
translated_text: 哦，妈妈，这是一个好的开始。许多生物体已经被记录下来，但还有更多生物需要了解！<page>女士，你应该快点休息，尽快去打猎，努想！
secondary_translated_text: Oh, mom, that's a good start. Many organisms have been recorded, but there are many more that need to be understood!<page>Ma 'am, you should rest quickly and go hunting as soon as possible. Think about it!

original_en_text: Well fought sister, well fought! Though terrible and tenacious, the beast was no match for us.<page>Be proud! The bugs of this land will sing of our victory to their offspring, and their offspring’s offspring, forever more!
original_zh_text: 打得漂亮！这畜生虽然强悍，但不是我们的对手！<page>等着听这儿的虫子们传唱咱们的战绩吧！
translated_text: 姐姐，打得好！这头野兽虽然可怕、顽强，但根本不是我们的对手。<page>感到自豪！这片土地上的虫子们将永远为他们的后代歌唱我们的胜利，也为他们的后代歌唱！
secondary_translated_text: Sister, good fight! Although this beast is terrifying and tenacious, it is no match for us at all.<page>Be proud! The insects of this land will always sing our victory for their descendants, and sing for their descendants!

original_en_text: Hah... aha ha ha ha ha!<page>Congratulations, spider. Finally, I felt your sting, and you’ve bared the truth of my pathetic empty shell.<hpage>You always had the scent, child. You are no bug. Yours is a life born entirely from thread.<page>Life? You’re too generous! This weak, wasting existence. This was not life, just a husk shaped to act as a child.<hpage>Yours was life, pale one. Do not confuse your unique creation with its absence. I have seen others make the same mistake.<page>Platitudes, spider? From you? Don’t be gross.<page>Head on. Climb up, up and away. You’ve earned your audience with the divine.<page>Face the holy mother who would fashion so cruel and crude a daughter as me.
original_zh_text: 哈……哈哈哈哈！<page>恭喜啊小蜘蛛，你终于刺痛了我……也知道了我是具可悲的空壳。<hpage>我早察觉到了，孩子。你根本不是虫类，纯粹是丝线捏造的生命。<page>生命？你还真是心善！这种虚弱、日渐腐朽的身躯……这算什么生命，就是具空壳罢了。<hpage>你确实活着，苍白之子。我见过与你类似的存在……即便内里空无一物，你也是独一无二的生命。<page>少说漂亮话了，我只觉得恶心。<page>上去吧，你赢得觐见神明的资格了。<page>去面见那位造出我这般残次品的'圣母'吧……
translated_text: ha.啊哈哈！<page>恭喜你，蜘蛛。最后，我感受到了你的刺痛，你暴露了我悲伤外壳的真相。<hpage>你身上总是这样，孩子。你不是虫子。你的生命完全从线中诞生。<page>生活？你太慷慨了！这种软弱而浪费的存在。这不是生命，这只是一个充当孩子的身体。<hpage>你的就是生命，苍白的生命。不要将您独特的创造与它的缺席混淆。我见过别人犯同样的错误。<page>陈词滥调，蜘蛛？从你那里？别恶心了。<page>抬头。爬起来，站起来离开。你赢得了一个神圣的观众。<page>面对圣母玛利亚，她会创造出一个像我这样残忍粗暴的女儿。
secondary_translated_text: ha. Ah-ha!<page>Congratulations, spider. Finally, I felt your sting, and you exposed the truth of my sad shell.<hpage>It's always like this with you, kid. You are not a bug. Your life is born entirely from the thread.<page>Life? You are so generous! This weak and wasteful existence. This is not life, this is just a body serving as a child.<hpage>Yours is life, pale life. Don't confuse your unique creation with its absence. I've seen others make the same mistake.<page>Cliché, spider? From you? don't be disgusting.<page>Head up. Get up, stand up and leave. You have won a sacred audience.<page>Facing the Virgin Mary, she would create a daughter as cruel and violent as me.

original_en_text: Conversing is a pleasure, but I must return to my observance. Try not to leave too much of a trail when you leave, please.
original_zh_text: 和你聊天很愉快，但我得继续去观察了。离开时注意别留太多痕迹。
translated_text: 谈话是一种乐趣，但我必须回到我的仪式。离开时请尽量不要留下太多痕迹。
secondary_translated_text: Talking is fun, but I have to get back to my rituals. Please try not to leave too many traces when leaving.

original_en_text: <page=M>Enough chatting, Old One. Best you get heading below. Whatever action you’re planning, time is against you.
original_zh_text: <page=M>那么闲话少叙，古老者。赶紧下去吧，您的计划可拖不起。
translated_text: <page=M>别说了，老头。你最好开车下来。无论你打算采取什么行动，时间都在与你作对。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>Stop it, old man. You'd better drive down. No matter what action you plan to take, time is against you.

original_en_text: For sharing this moment I shall have you accept a gift, one I had believed I would never pass. <page>You would take these rings, and the learnings to make more.<page>They are built of a clever method devised by my master and will crush hard this kingdom’s toughest shell. Use them, and she is remembered!<hpage>My thanks, Shakra. To gain a tool so defined by its owner, I am much grateful. They shall prove a great aid on my own journey.
original_zh_text: 谢谢你陪我度过这一时刻，这些东西我本想永远留着……你当作谢礼收下吧。<page>这些环刃和制法都传给你。<page>它们是按我导师的巧思打造的，能击碎最硬的壳。希望你用得上，以此纪念她！<hpage>感激不尽，沙克拉。能继承如此珍贵的武器，对我的旅程大有帮助。
translated_text: 为了分享这一刻，我将请您接受一份我相信我永远不会传递的礼物。<page>您将拿走这些戒指并了解更多信息。<page>它们是用我主人设计的巧妙方法建造的，可以粉碎王国最坚硬的外壳。使用它们，她就会被记住！<hpage>谢谢你，沙克拉。我很感激能够使用由其所有者定义的工具。他们将对我自己的旅程有很大的帮助。
secondary_translated_text: To share this moment, I will ask you to accept a gift that I believe I will never pass on.<page>You will take away these rings and learn more.<page>They were built using ingenious methods designed by my master to crush the hardest shells of the kingdom. Use them and she will be remembered!<hpage>Thank you, Shakra. I am grateful to be able to use tools defined by their owners. They will be of great help to my own journey.

original_en_text: The warmth of these caverns keeps many smells alive! Is good for Nuu, who is always searching carefully for learnings!
original_zh_text: 洞窟里的余温保留着气味！正适合努努慢慢探索！
translated_text: 这些洞穴的温暖让许多气味依然存在！这对于总是仔细寻找知识的Nuu来说是一件好事！
secondary_translated_text: The warmth of these caves keeps many odors alive! This is a good thing for Nuu, who is always carefully looking for knowledge!

original_en_text: <hpage>Little pilgrim, these baths provide some respite from the dangers without, but even so you should not let down your guard.<hpage>You must have seen now that the bugs of this Citadel are long fallen to the Haunting.<page>Ahh... some of my brothers and sisters have seemed... lost somehow, yes. But to be lost is to be sometime found, is it not sung?<page>Yes... The Citadel will provide for them. It is a holy place indeed, that holds wonders such as this lovely warm bath!
original_zh_text: <hpage>小家伙，别因为泡澡放松警惕。<hpage>你也看到了，此地的虫民多半被丝咒侵蚀。<page>有些同袍确实……看着不太对劲。但迷途终有归时，对吧？<page>圣堡自会庇佑他们。能有这么舒服的暖泉，肯定是圣地没错！
translated_text: <hpage>小朝圣者，这些沐浴可以暂时缓解外面的危险，但即便如此，您也不应放松警惕。<hpage>你现在一定看到了，这座城堡里的昆虫早已落入鬼魂手中。<page>啊...我的一些兄弟姐妹似乎。不知何故迷失了，是的。但丢失的总有一天会找到的，对吧？<page>是的...城堡将为他们提供服务。这确实是一个神圣的地方，有像这个可爱的热水浴缸这样的奇迹！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Little pilgrim, these baths can temporarily alleviate the dangers outside, but even so, you should not let down your vigilance.<hpage>You must see by now that the insects in this castle have long fallen into the hands of ghosts.<page>Ah... Some of my brothers and sisters seem. Somehow lost, yes. But what is lost will be found one day, right?<page>Yes... The castle will provide services for them. This is indeed a sacred place with miracles like this lovely hot tub!

original_en_text: Hoi! Let our mighty contest of shells commence again!
original_zh_text: 哟嚯！再战一轮！<page>我马上布置新的赛道！
translated_text: 嘿！让我们再次开始强大的贝壳比赛！
secondary_translated_text: Hey! Let's start the powerful shell competition again!

original_en_text: Hoy! We thought one of them buzzing bullies was sneakin’ up on us, but it’s just a mangy jailbug!<page>Why you in here, then? Caught thievin’ were you? Greedy, greedy!<hpage>I’ve stolen nothing. Rather, I suspect the wardens are servants of the Citadel. The cage used in my capture bore similar runes to the one that first brought me to this land.<hpage>Bound in that cage, I’d have proved a fine gift were they to deliver me to their masters.<page>Pah, there ain’t nothin’ fine about you, jailbug. We recognised a fellow thief soon as we saw you!<page>Now, don’t be lingerin’ around here. Those guards’ll be wanting to pop you back in your cage quick quick!<hpage>They’ll not get the chance. I will reclaim my belongings and leave this grim place with haste.
original_zh_text: 还当是狱卒呢，结果是只脏老鼠！<page>你是因为偷什么进来的？贪心鬼！<hpage>我没偷东西。这儿的狱卒应该侍奉于圣堡，抓我的笼子和最初那个有相同印记。<hpage>如此执着于我，看来它们真的认为我是一份献给主人的好礼物。<page>呸，你身上有什么好的！少装蒜，我一看你就一脸贼相！<page>快走快走！别在附近瞎晃悠，小心又被关回笼子！<hpage>他们没机会的，我取回自己的东西就走。
translated_text: 嘿！我们以为有个嗡嗡作响的恶霸在偷偷接近我们，但这只是一次肮脏的越狱！<page>那你为什么来这里？你抓到小偷了吗？贪婪，贪婪！<hpage>我没有偷任何东西。相反，我怀疑典狱长是城堡的仆人。用来囚禁我的笼子上刻着类似于第一次带我来到这片土地的笼子的符文。<hpage>如果他们把我交给他们的主人，而我被锁在笼子里，我将被证明是一份很棒的礼物。<page>呸，你没有什么好东西，狱卒。我们一看到你就认出了小偷！<page>现在，不要在这里逗留了。那些警卫会想把你放回笼子里。快点！<hpage>他们没有机会。我想找回我的东西，尽快离开这个阴暗的地方。
secondary_translated_text: Hey! We thought a buzzing bully was sneaking up on us, but it was just a dirty escape!<page>Then why are you here? Did you catch the thief? Greed, greedy!<hpage>I didn't steal anything. Instead, I suspect the warden is a servant of the castle. The cage used to imprison me is engraved with runes similar to the cage that brought me to this land for the first time.<hpage>If they hand me over to their master and I am locked in a cage, I will prove to be a great gift.<page>Bah, you have nothing good, jailer. We recognized the thief as soon as we saw you!<page>Now, don't linger here. Those guards will want to put you back in the cage. Hurry up!<hpage>They have no chance. I want to get my things back and get out of this dark place as soon as possible.

original_en_text: You recover quickly. Already, my ring-marks have faded from your shell. If you are prepared, let us duel again.
original_zh_text: 你恢复真快，我留下的环印都消了。准备好了我们就再战。
translated_text: 你恢复得很快。我戒指的印记已经从你的壳上褪色了。如果你准备好了，让我们再次战斗。
secondary_translated_text: You recover quickly. The mark of my ring has faded from your shell. If you are ready, let's fight again.

original_en_text: ...Yes, communication is the heart of it. The grandest boasts and the tiniest murmurings all have their meanings...<page>...Your point is well made. Even the flowers have their stories to tell. Light can be cast anywhere...<hpage>I’ve no desire to interrupt your meditations, Herald, but I am eager to speak with you, if you would listen...<page>...Take note of it all, render it in line, you’ll be glad that you did. You can take the journey home with you...
original_zh_text: ……沟通至关重要。无论豪言壮语还是呢喃低语皆有深意……<page>……此言甚是。野花亦在诉说故事。光明无处不在...<hpage>使者大人，无意打扰冥思，但我急盼能与您交谈，您……<page>……记录所见所闻，他日必将受用。故乡之路存于心……
translated_text: ...是的，沟通是核心。最大的吹嘘和最小的嘀咕都有意义...<page>...你的观点很好。甚至花朵也有自己的故事要讲。光线可以投射到任何地方。<hpage>我不想打断你的想法，先驱者，但我渴望和你说话，如果你愿意听的话..<page>...把这一切都写下来，按顺序呈现，你会很高兴你做到了。你可以踏上回家的旅程。
secondary_translated_text: ... Yes, communication is the core. Both the biggest boasting and the smallest muttering make sense...<page>... You have a good point. Even flowers have their own stories to tell. Light can be projected anywhere.<hpage>I hate to interrupt your thoughts, pioneer, but I am eager to talk to you if you will listen..<page>... Write it all down and present it in order, and you'll be happy you did it. You can embark on a journey home.

original_en_text: Oooh, but the scroll is so heavy with beautiful beasts! Could it be that the works is almost complete? Miss grown-up, you must keep your preyings up. No time for rest!
original_zh_text: 哎呀，记录册都快写满了！是不是快完成了？大姐姐不能偷懒哦！
translated_text: 哦，但是卷轴上有很多美丽的野兽！项目快完成了吗？大人，小姐，您必须继续狩猎。没有时间休息！
secondary_translated_text: Oh, but there are many beautiful beasts on the scroll! Is the project almost completed? My lord, miss, you must continue hunting. No time to rest!

original_en_text: The myth we made... by grace... by blade...<page>All bowed before we princes green...
original_zh_text: 我们缔造的传说……凭恩泽……凭利刃……<page>万虫皆向绿王臣服……
translated_text: 我们创造的神话。感谢您的恩典。使用刀片。<page>每个人都向我们的绿色王子鞠躬……
secondary_translated_text: The myth we create. Thank you for your grace. Use a blade.<page>Everyone bows to our green prince...

original_en_text: So many moments spent simple... joyful... free...
original_zh_text: 那些简单……快乐……自由的时光……
translated_text: 很多时刻都很简单。开心免费的...
secondary_translated_text: Many moments are simple. Happy free...

original_en_text: Do you see? How crass and frail that Citadel’s machines! This one groans in pain at its very existence.<hpage>Its mechanism is likely jammed. If the gears were unstuck its clamorous complaints would soon cease, and it could become a useful place to rest.<page>A place to rest or no, I desire only for the noise to stop!
original_zh_text: 瞧见没？圣堡的破机器嘎吱乱叫，活着都费劲。<hpage>齿轮卡住了。修好应该能当个歇息的好地方，噪音也能停。<page>歇不歇息无所谓，我只想赶紧让这破响动停下来！
translated_text: 你看到了吗？堡垒的机器是多么简陋和脆弱啊！男人因为它的存在而痛苦地呻吟着。<hpage>它的机制可能会卡住。如果齿轮被解开，它的嘈杂的抱怨很快就会停止，它可以成为一个有用的休息场所。<page>无论有没有地方休息，我只想让噪音停下来！
secondary_translated_text: Did you see that? How crude and fragile the fortress's machines are! The man groaned painfully because of its presence.<hpage>Its mechanism may get stuck. If the gear is unfastened, its noisy complaints will soon stop and it can become a useful resting place.<page>Whether there is a place to rest or not, I just want the noise to stop!

original_en_text: These root-woven roads show evidence of my master’s passage. A thrice-crushed bug, gouged wood, score-prints of sharp claws passing. Small signs that only I can read.<page>Though the trail is cold, it eases me to know she is still within this land.
original_zh_text: 这附近有导师踪迹：尖锐的爪痕、凿开的树木、压扁的虫尸……只有我看得懂。<page>虽然痕迹都挺久了，但知道她还在纺络我就安心了。
translated_text: 这些树根编织的道路是我主人通行的证据。一条蠕虫被压碎了三次，木头被凿成，爪子留下锋利的痕迹。一个只有我能读的小标志。<page>尽管小路很冷，但我知道她还在陆地上，这让我放心了。
secondary_translated_text: These roads woven by tree roots are evidence of my master's passage. A worm was crushed three times, the wood was chiseled, and the claws left sharp marks. A little sign that only I can read.<page>Although the path was cold, I knew she was still on land, which relieved me.

original_en_text: <hpage>These are dangerous fields, young one, not for casual wandering. What task sees you brave them?<page>A treacherous quest! But a crucial one! Upon the last wish of my father, I’ve taken up the study of these wild caves.<page>These fields still display life and growth, even as the lands around erode to dust.<page>There is a hot harmony here that eludes the grey wastes above and the dry Marrow beside. With time and study, I shall uncover why.
original_zh_text: <hpage>小虫子，这片荒野很危险，你怎么有胆子进来闲逛？<page>虽然危险，但很重要！我是继承父亲遗志在研究这些洞穴！<page>即便到处都是腐蚀和灰烬，这片荒野却还显露着生机。<page>这里肯定有特殊热源维系，我要找出原因！
translated_text: <hpage>年轻人，这是危险的领域，不仅仅是闲逛。是什么任务让你勇敢地面对他们？<page>危险的任务！但这至关重要！按照父亲的意愿，我开始研究这些野生洞穴。<page>即使周围的土地被侵蚀成灰尘，这些田地仍然充满活力和不断增长。<page>这里有一种火热的和谐，避免了上面的灰色废物和旁边的干燥骨髓。随着时间和研究，我会发现原因。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Young people, this is dangerous territory, not just hanging out. What task made you face them bravely?<page>Dangerous mission! But this is crucial! At my father's wishes, I began to study these wild caves.<page>Even as the surrounding land is eroded into dust, the fields remain vibrant and growing.<page>There is a fiery harmony here that avoids the gray waste above and the dry bone marrow next to it. Over time and research, I will discover why.

original_en_text: Track your location throughout these winding lands with a bone compass. Each member of our tribe can craft them. I would pass you mine, for a small price.
original_zh_text: 这个骨制罗盘能让你分辨自己的位置。我们部落都会做，付点小钱就给你。
translated_text: 使用骨指南针追踪您在这些蜿蜒的土地上的位置。我们部落的每个成员都可以制作它们。我会花一小笔钱把我的给你。
secondary_translated_text: Use a bone compass to track your position in these winding lands. Every member of our tribe can make them. I'll give you mine for a small sum of money.

original_en_text: Ooooh, ma ma! Even young Nuu never guessed that Pharloom held so many fascinating creatures! Soft ones, hard ones, small ones, big ones! Nuu is greedy to see what remains!
original_zh_text: 哇！连努努都没想到纺络有这么多神奇生物！软的硬的大的小的！好贪心，好想看剩下的！
translated_text: 哦，妈妈！就连年轻的努也没想到法鲁岛上竟然有这么多令人着迷的生物！软、硬、小、大！Nuu贪婪地想看看还剩下什么！
secondary_translated_text: Oh, mom! Even young Nu didn't expect that there would be so many fascinating creatures on the island of Faro! Soft, hard, small, big! Nuu greedily wanted to see what was left!

original_en_text: You see this idol before us, red maiden? I have passed its like before. They mark our pilgrimage well.<page>If we sing to it, a miraculous shrine will rise from the ground, and we will have a place to rest! Such a wonder!<hpage>It is not song that rouses this shrine, but payment in rosaries.<hpage>Without rosaries, the shrine remains hidden. I have encountered similar constructs on Pharloom’s paths. This kingdom does not grant rest lightly.
original_zh_text: 看见这圣像了吗？沿途都有标记。<page>对着它歌唱，圣椅就会升起供我们歇息！多神奇！<hpage>唤醒长椅的不是歌声，谢尔玛，而是念珠。<hpage>无念珠者不得休憩，纺络从不轻易施恩。
translated_text: 你看到我们面前的这个偶像红女孩了吗？我以前经历过这个。他们很好地纪念了我们的朝圣之旅。<page>如果我们对着它唱歌，一座神奇的寺庙就会升起，我们就有地方休息了！多么奇迹啊！<hpage>唤醒这座寺庙的不是歌声，而是念珠中的奖励。<hpage>没有念珠，神社仍然隐藏着。我在Farham的路上遇到过类似的建筑。这个王国不会轻易安息。
secondary_translated_text: Do you see this idol red girl in front of us? I've been through this before. They commemorated our pilgrimage well.<page>If we sing to it, a magical temple will rise and we will have a place to rest! What a miracle!<hpage>What awakened this temple was not the song, but the reward in the rosary beads.<hpage>Without rosary beads, the shrine remains hidden. I have encountered similar buildings on the road to Farham. This kingdom will not rest easily.

original_en_text: You can use these to mark places of importance or reminders on your map.<br><br>These I have fashioned from the husks of old bells. A hard task to make, so the cost reflects the extra effort.
original_zh_text: 你可以用这个在地图上标记重要地点或提醒事项。<br><br>用古钟的壳打磨成的，可费劲了。
translated_text: 您可以使用这些标记地图上的重要地点或提醒。<br><br>我用旧钟壳做了这些。这是一项艰巨的任务，因此成本反映了额外的努力。
secondary_translated_text: You can use these to mark important places or reminders on the map.<br><br>I made these out of old clock shells. This is a huge task, so the cost reflects the extra effort.

original_en_text: Poshanka! Here we meet, high atop this twisted steel structure. I can sense fierce enemies ahead.<page>It seems you too draw closer to your trail’s end. With my own task now resolved, my rings call for combat.<page>Hornet Wielding Needle, shall we fight forward together?
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔！你好啊，又见面了。我能感受到前面有强大的敌人在呢。<page>看来你的旅途也走了很远了。现在我的任务也完成了，正手痒呢。<page>使针的小姑娘，怎么说，我们一起上吧？
translated_text: 博尚卡！我们在这里见面，就在这个扭曲的钢结构上方。我能感觉到前方有凶猛的敌人。<page>看来你离小路的尽头越来越近了。现在我自己的任务已经解决，我的戒指需要战斗。<page>黄蜂挥舞着针，我们一起战斗吗？
secondary_translated_text: Boshanka! We meet here, right above this twisted steel structure. I can feel the fierce enemy ahead.<page>Looks like you're getting closer and closer to the end of the path. Now that my own task has been solved, my ring needs fighting.<page>Wasps waving needles, shall we fight together?

original_en_text: All of these marvellous healing supplies... Surely they, at least, are some proof of the Citadel’s holy nature?
original_zh_text: 这么多神奇药品……至少说明圣堡还是灵验的吧？
translated_text: 所有这些美妙的治疗。至少，它们是城堡神圣本质的一些证据吗？
secondary_translated_text: All these wonderful treatments. At the very least, are they some evidence of the sacred nature of the castle?

original_en_text: H-hoy red m-maiden! Have no f-fear, ‘tis only I, Sherma!<page>I found healing supplies, b-but then the way back collapsed... and I heard moaning from the dark... oh, how thankful I am to see you!
original_zh_text: 红、红衣姑娘！是我是我！<page>我找到药，可是路塌了……又听见黑暗里有怪声……见到你太好了！
translated_text: 嘿嘿红女孩！别害怕，是我，谢尔曼！<page>我找到了治疗用品，但回来的路却塌陷了……我听到黑暗中的呻吟声，见到你我是多么感激啊！
secondary_translated_text: Hey, red girl! Don't be afraid, it's me, Sherman!<page>I found treatment supplies, but the way back collapsed... I heard groans in the dark, how grateful I am to see you!

original_en_text: The great Citadel is so close, I can hear the voices of our brother and sister pilgrims calling out to us!
original_zh_text: 圣堡近在咫尺！兄弟姐妹的呼唤已传到我耳中了！
translated_text: 伟大的城堡如此之近，我可以听到我们的兄弟姐妹朝圣者在呼唤我们！
secondary_translated_text: The great castle is so close that I can hear our brothers and sisters pilgrims calling to us!

original_en_text: What a battle, brave warrior! You’re the first I’ve seen who could match the red-shells and emerge victorious.<hpage>They are deadly foes indeed, and seemingly keen hunters. You did well to keep yourself hidden from them, young bug.<page>I did, didn’t I? Disguise and subterfuge are skills I’ve honed keenly, all in aid of my most important work!
original_zh_text: 打得太漂亮了！我还是头回见有虫能干掉红壳怪！<hpage>它们确实是狠角色，狩猎本能很强。你躲得挺好。<page>是吧？伪装潜行可是我的绝活，都是为了伟大研究！
translated_text: 多么伟大的战斗啊，勇敢的士兵！你是我见过的第一个能够与红壳竞争并获胜的人。<hpage>他们确实是致命的敌人，而且似乎是热情的猎人。你做得很好，让自己远离他们，小虫子。<page>我做到了，不是吗？伪装和诡计是我精心磨练的技能，所有这些都是为了帮助我完成我最重要的工作！
secondary_translated_text: What a great battle, brave soldier! You are the first person I have ever met who can compete with the Red Shell and win.<hpage>They are indeed deadly enemies and seem to be passionate hunters. You're doing a good job of keeping yourself away from them, little bug.<page>I did it, didn't I? Disguise and trickery are skills I have honed carefully, all to help me do my most important job!

original_en_text: Mind yourself while you travel this grim land. A great winged beast has been stalking the heights, swooping without warning and tearing the life out of unwary travellers!<hpage>I believe I have seen the creature you speak of. It may have marked me as prey, and followed me down onto the lower roads of the moor.<page>What what! Gurrrooo! The beast has been spotted! Once Zaza has fully rested, we’ll set to tracking it down!
original_zh_text: 当心天上，有只长翅膀的畜生专抓路人！<hpage>我见过它，多半是盯上我了，还跟到了沼泽这边。<page>你说什么！嘎噜！那畜生就在附近！等扎扎歇够了就去宰了它！
translated_text: 在这片严酷的土地上旅行时请注意自己。一只巨大的带翅膀的野兽一直在高空徘徊，毫无预兆地潜水，夺走了粗心旅行者的生命！<hpage>我相信我见过你所说的生物。它可能会把我标记为猎物，并跟随我沿着荒野的较低道路行驶。<page>什么？什么！咕噜！野兽被发现了！一旦扎扎完全休息，我们就会开始追踪它！
secondary_translated_text: Please pay attention to yourself while traveling through this harsh land. A huge winged beast has been wandering high in the sky, diving without warning, and taking the lives of careless travelers!<hpage>I believe I have seen the creatures you speak of. It may mark me as prey and follow me along the lower roads of the wilderness.<page>What? What! Gollum! The beast has been discovered! Once Zaza is fully rested, we will start tracking it!

original_en_text: Welcome back red maiden, and thank you again for coming to my aid.<page>I’m no healer, but with the supplies we found in the ward below even my unlearned claws can ease the suffering of our brothers and sisters.<page>That such darkness could creep into this most holy of places, even though we pilgrims kept our promise to ascend...<page>I confess, I wonder at the meaning of it all. But enlightenment does not come easily, or all at once... I should just continue my task in the meantime.
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘回来啦！再次感谢你帮忙。<page>我本来不懂医术，不过从下面拿来了药，简单包扎也能止痛。<page>我们千辛万苦爬上来，黑暗还是钻进了圣地……<page>实在想不通！但悟道要慢慢来……先做好手头的事吧！
translated_text: 欢迎回来，红女，再次感谢你帮助我。<page>我不是治疗师，但有了我们在下面病房找到的用品，即使是我不学会的爪子也可以减轻我们兄弟姐妹的痛苦。<page>尽管我们朝圣者信守攀登的承诺，但这样的黑暗却可以潜入这个最神圣的地方。<page>我承认，我想知道这一切的意义。但启蒙并不容易，或者突然到来……与此同时，我应该继续我的使命。
secondary_translated_text: Welcome back, Red Girl, thank you again for helping me.<page>I'm no therapist, but with the supplies we found in the ward below, even the claws I didn't learn could alleviate the pain of our brothers and sisters.<page>Although we pilgrims keep our promise to climb, such darkness can sneak into this most sacred place.<page>I admit, I want to know the meaning of all this. But enlightenment is not easy, or comes suddenly... In the meantime, I should continue my mission.

original_en_text: Hrm...? Oh, hoy there! I was hoping we would meet here, red maiden.<page>Rising at last to the heights of the Citadel and being amongst so many of my brothers and sisters... it is a blessing indeed. Yes, a blessing.<hpage>Your voice belies some hesitation in that belief, little pilgrim. You have seen now the reality of this broken place. What do you make of it, truly?
original_zh_text: 嗯？红衣姑娘！没想到在这儿碰上了！<page>能登上圣堡和这么多同袍团聚……真是恩赐……嗯，是恩赐。<hpage>你听起来有些犹豫？想必你已看清此地的破败真相，有什么感想？
translated_text: 嗯。？哦，嘿，那里！希望我们能在这里见面，红女。<page>最后我在城堡里爬得很高，成为了我众多兄弟姐妹的中间人。这确实是一种祝福。是的，祝福。<hpage>小朝圣者，你的声音隐藏着这种信念中的一些犹豫。你现在已经看到了这个破碎地方的现实。您对此到底有何看法？
secondary_translated_text: Hmm.? Oh, hey, there! I hope we can meet here, Red Girl.<page>In the end I climbed high in the castle and became the middleman for my many brothers and sisters. This is indeed a blessing. Yes, blessings.<hpage>Little pilgrim, your voice hides some hesitation in this belief. You have now seen the reality of this broken place. What exactly do you think about this?

original_en_text: Safely-saved is Pill! But who is this rare carer for the shell of another? Name yourself, good bug!<hpage>I am Hornet, Pill. Your brother wished for your return to Bellhart, where he waits now. I’m sure he will be eager to see you alive.<page>Young Tipp! How he worries always. Blessed I am for the care, him and you Miss Hornet! A lucky bug is me!
original_zh_text: 皮尔安、安全了！这位好心女士怎么称呼？<hpage>我叫大黄蜂。你的兄弟蒂普在钟心镇等你，快回去吧。<page>小蒂普！总是瞎操心。多谢你啦大黄蜂小姐！我运气真好！
translated_text: 药丸才是安全的！但这个罕见的照顾另一具人体壳的人是谁呢？说出你自己的名字，好虫子！<hpage>我是黄蜂，皮埃尔。你的兄弟希望你回到伯哈特，他现在正在那里等待。我确信他会想看到你活着。<page>年轻的小费！他总是多么担心。我很幸运能够照顾他和你，大黄蜂小姐！幸运虫是我！
secondary_translated_text: Pills are safe! But who is this rare person taking care of another human shell? Say your own name, good bug!<hpage>I am the wasp, Pierre. Your brother wants you back to Burhart, and he's waiting there now. I'm sure he'll want to see you alive.<page>Young tip! How worried he is always. I'm lucky to take care of him and you, Miss Bumblebee! I am the lucky one!

original_en_text: I pray my dice bring you luck on your final climb, sister. And I pray that by parting with them, my own ascent shall be made lighter.
original_zh_text: 愿骰子保佑你登顶，姐妹。送走它们，我身上的负担也轻了。
translated_text: 姐姐，我祈祷我的骰子能给你最后的攀登带来好运。我祈祷通过与他们分离，我自己的上升会变得更容易。
secondary_translated_text: Sister, I pray that my dice will bring you good luck on your final climb. I prayed that by being separated from them, my own ascent would become easier.

original_en_text: See here, this old statue. I’ve been thinking long on it, what clues it might hold.<page>The claw-work seems beyond the other structures throughout these caves. Who was she I wonder, to deserve such refined remembrance?<hpage>Hers is the form of a dancer, and the craft is indeed exquisite. There must once have been more to these ants, before the Haunting snared their shells and minds.
original_zh_text: 看这尊古雕像！我盯着它看了好久。<page>工艺比周围建筑精细多了。她到底是谁呢，值得被这样铭记？<hpage>看样子是名舞者，造型确实精美。看来蚁族被丝咒控制前肯定辉煌过。
translated_text: 看这里，这座古老的雕像。我想了很长一段时间它可能包含什么线索。<page>爪子似乎超越了这些洞穴中的其他结构。我想知道她是谁，值得如此精致的纪念？<hpage>她的风格是舞者的形式，而且工艺确实精湛。这些蚂蚁在闹鬼困住它们的壳和思想之前肯定还有更多的东西。
secondary_translated_text: Look here, this ancient statue. I wondered for a long time what clues it might contain.<page>The claws seem to transcend other structures in these caves. I want to know who she is and deserves such exquisite remembrance?<hpage>Her style is the form of a dancer, and the craftsmanship is truly superb. These ants must have something more before the ghosts trap their shells and thoughts.

original_en_text: Holy water, nice and hot,<br>Makes a perfect swimming spot,<br>Heals your worries in a flash,<br>So jump on in... splash splash splash! Ha ha ha!
original_zh_text: 圣水暖又清，<br>泡澡好舒心，<page>烦恼顷刻散，<br>扑通跳进来！哈哈哈！
translated_text: 圣水，又好又热，<br>一个完美的游泳场所，<br>立即治愈您的担忧，<br>所以跳进去吧。飞溅！哈哈哈！
secondary_translated_text: Holy water, nice and hot,<br>A perfect swimming spot,<br>Cure your worries immediately and<br>So jump in. Splash! Hahaha!

original_en_text: Very, very lucky little trinket we got ‘ere! Pulls ‘em little clickie-clackies right into yer waitin’ claws!
original_zh_text: 超级幸运的招财符！把叮当响都吸过来！
translated_text: 我们这里有非常非常幸运的小饰品！把它们拉到你的爪子里！
secondary_translated_text: We have very, very lucky trinkets here! Pull them into your paws!

original_en_text: Gurrroo! A fellow warrior braves this blighted place! Know you stand before the honoured knight Garmond, and brave companion Zaza.<page>Together, Zaza and I are wish bound to scale this Citadel, and vanquish the horrors at its heart!<hpage>Then good luck to you, sir bug. It is heartening to meet another of sound mind and fortitude enough to fight back against the many haunted husks.<page>Aye! Never-ending, these unnatural opponents! This Citadel seems its twisted source, and honour decrees we must fight on, until we rend the heart of its decay!
original_zh_text: 嘎噜！又来个勇士！我乃荣耀骑士加蒙德，这位是忠仆扎扎！<page>我们要杀上圣堡，端了诅咒的老巢！<hpage>那祝你好运。难得能遇见敢反抗丝咒傀儡的清醒者。<page>是啊，这些傀儡，杀都杀不完！圣堡似乎就藏着祸根，必须捣毁！
translated_text: 咕噜！战友勇敢地面对这个破旧的地方！知道你站在受人尊敬的骑士加蒙德和他勇敢的同伴扎扎面前。<page>扎扎和我希望一起攀登这座城堡，消除其核心的恐怖！<hpage>好吧，祝你好运，巴格先生。看到另一个头脑健全、意志坚强、足以反击许多闹鬼的贝壳的人，真是令人兴奋。<page>是的！永无休止的，这些不自然的对手！这座城堡似乎是它扭曲的根源，我们必须遵守荣誉勋章，直到撕裂它腐烂的心脏！
secondary_translated_text: Gollum! Comrades faced this dilapidated place bravely! Knowing that you stand before the respected knight Gammond and his brave companion Zaza.<page>Zaza and I hope to climb this castle together and eliminate the terror at its core!<hpage>Well, good luck, Mr. Bagger. It's exciting to see another person with a sound mind and strong will enough to fight back against the many haunted shells.<page>Yes! Never-ending, these unnatural opponents! This castle seems to be the source of its distortion, and we must honor the Medal of Honor until it tears its rotten heart!

original_en_text: <hpage>I found the well in the hidden chambers beyond. The power that remained at its base I have taken for myself.<page=S>Bound yourself a new nature, aye? And from the shells of our ancestors, no less, all those many who’ve called these lands their own.<page=S>You make it seem so simple-like. All o’that learning, all o’that strength... sucked up in a whirl of Silk.<page=M>We’d call you a thief, Old One, and cruel for the taking, but its all coming down soon if you can’t stop it.<page=M>If there’s advantage in your act that might see these caves safe, then it’s better you make your claim.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我在密室深处找到了那口井。已将其底部的力量纳为己用。<page=S>给自己添了一种新本源，嗯？用的还是我们先祖的躯壳——那些曾以此地为家的无数先祖。<page=S>你说得轻巧。所有学识，所有力量……都被灵丝漩涡吸走了。<page=M>我们本该骂你是小偷，古老者，如此残忍夺取……但若你阻止不了黑暗，一切马上都要崩塌了。<page=M>若你真能保全这些洞窟，那还是由你取走为好。
translated_text: <hpage>我在远处的一个隐蔽的房间里发现了这口井。我已经在此基础上夺取了剩余的权力。<page=S>给自己一个新的本性，对吧？同样，从我们祖先的壳里，所有许多自称这些土地的人。<page=S>你让它看起来如此简单。所有的学习，所有的力量……被丝绸的漩涡吞没了。<page=M>我们会称你为小偷，老头，夺取是残酷的，但如果你无法阻止它，事情很快就会发生。<page=M>如果你的行为对确保这些洞穴的安全有优势，那么你最好提出自己的主张。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I found the well in a hidden room in the distance. I have seized the remaining power on this basis.<page=S>Give yourself a new nature, right? Likewise, from the shells of our ancestors, all the many who call themselves these lands.<page=S>You make it seem so simple. All learning, all power... was swallowed up by the whirlpool of silk.<page=M>We will call you a thief, old man, and seizing is cruel, but if you can't stop it, things will happen quickly.<page=M>If your actions have an advantage in ensuring the safety of these caves, then you'd better make your own claims.

original_en_text: Best keep your visits brief, Hornet Wielding Needle. Without swift action taken, our world’s ruin seems certain.<page>If you cannot calm Pharloom’s tortured throes, then certainly no other bug could face the task. <hpage>As you say, Shakra. I shall do what I must.
original_zh_text: 别逗留太久，小姑娘。不快点解决，世界就要完蛋了。<page>如果你都搞不定，更没虫能行。<hpage>我会尽力而为。
translated_text: 最好保持访问简短，大黄蜂挥舞着针。如果不迅速采取行动，我们的世界似乎肯定会被摧毁。<page>如果你无法平息法勒姆的痛苦，那么肯定没有其他错误可以承担这项任务。<hpage>正如你所说，沙克拉。我会做我必须做的事情。
secondary_translated_text: It's best to keep the interview brief, the bumblebee wielding a needle. Without quick action, our world seems certain to be destroyed.<page>If you can't calm Farham's pain, then surely there is no other mistake that can take on the task.<hpage>As you said, Shakra. I will do what I have to do.

original_en_text: Near the edge of those lands swept by wind and sand, Nuu has seen it, a single bug, watching, waiting.<page> Too scared was Nuu to crawl close, for fear it would wake, and its big blade might mark this perfect shell.<page>For the journal’s sake, you should seek the bug, up on edge, through a tall tunnel hidden by crust.<page>A hard find, that one, but Nuu is not worried! She knows your adult cunning will see you there quick!
original_zh_text: 在风沙之地的边缘，努努曾看见一只虫子在守望等待。<page> 努努怕它醒来，怕它的巨刃划破我的漂亮甲壳，所以不敢靠近。<page> 但为了使记录册完整，大姐姐去找它吧——就在高处边缘，穿过一段硬壳掩藏的高耸隧道就到了。<page> 虽然难找，但努努不担心！以成年虫的机灵劲儿肯定能很快找到！
translated_text: 在被风和沙席卷的土地边缘，努看到了它，一只昆虫，正在观看和等待。<page>Nu太害怕了，不敢靠近，担心它会醒来，它的大刀片可能会标记出完美的外壳。<page>为了日记，你应该通过地壳隐藏的高大隧道从边缘寻找虫子。<page>这是一个困难的发现，但Nuu并不担心！她知道你成年后的狡猾会让你很快到达那里！
secondary_translated_text: At the edge of the land swept by wind and sand, Nu saw it, an insect, watching and waiting.<page>Nu was too scared to get close, fearing that it would wake up and its large blade might mark the perfect shell.<page>For the sake of a diary, you should look for bugs from the edge through tall tunnels hidden in the earth's crust.<page>It was a difficult find, but Nuu was not worried! She knows your adult cunning will get you there quickly!

original_en_text: For my mapping stock, we have traded all the charts and tools I can provide. While this new threat remains, I shall not make more.<page>My cartography may be a simple sort, but I hope that my craft shared has made your travels easier.
original_zh_text: 我的存货都卖光了。危机不解除，我也没法做新的。<page>我绘制的图纸可能有些简略，但希望能帮上你的忙。
translated_text: 对于我的地图股票，我们已经交易了我能提供的所有图表和工具。尽管这个新威胁仍然存在，但我不会制造更多威胁。<page>我的画可能很简单，但我希望我分享的工艺能让您的旅行更轻松。
secondary_translated_text: For my maps stock, we have traded all the charts and tools I can provide. Although this new threat still exists, I will not create more threats.<page>My paintings may be simple, but I hope the craftsmanship I share will make your travel easier.

original_en_text: Lead on, sister! Zaza and I will be close behind!
original_zh_text: 带路吧姐妹！我和扎扎自会跟上！
translated_text: 姐姐，带路！我和扎扎会密切关注！
secondary_translated_text: Sister, lead the way! Zaza and I will pay close attention!

original_en_text: Hoy! Did you see it, red maiden? The great gate heard my song and, in its infinite and ancient kindness, has opened the way forward for us!
original_zh_text: 瞧见没？骨门听到歌声，为我们让路了！
translated_text: 嘿！你看到了吗，红女孩？伟大的大门听到了我的歌声，以无限古老的仁慈为我们开辟了道路！
secondary_translated_text: Hey! Did you see that, red girl? The great gates have heard my song, opening the way for us with infinite ancient kindness!

original_en_text: <hpage>Must you not press on, sirs?<page>Oh, yes! We will be off at once. Very soon. I fear though, that Zaza must rest a little longer...
original_zh_text: <hpage>二位还不出发么？<page>马上！这就出发！我就是觉得，扎扎可能要多休息一会……
translated_text: <hpage>先生们，你们不能继续吗？<page>哦，是的！我们立即离开。很快但我担心扎扎还要再休息一段时间……
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Gentlemen, can't you continue?<page>Oh, yes! We left immediately. Soon, but I'm worried that Zaza will have to rest for a while...

original_en_text: Poshanka! Edges sharp and senses keen!
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔！握紧兵刃，保持警惕！
translated_text: 博尚卡！锋利的边缘和敏锐的感官！
secondary_translated_text: Boshanka! Sharp edges and keen senses!

original_en_text: <page=M>Even knowing her motivation, it is a shock the monarch can resist so long. We’d thought none could survive that void.<hpage>She will have retreated within her protective form, that cocoon of thread. Even as the dark eats its outer, she will spin its Silk anew.<hpage>The effort would be immense and it will strain her soul thin, but what other choice remains?<hpage>This is the desperate act of a dying god. A defiance that, left unchallenged, will bring your kingdom’s ruin.
original_zh_text: <page=M>就算清楚她的动机，君主能撑这么久也是令我们惊讶。本以为生物不可能在虚空中存活。<hpage>她必是缩进了护体茧壳。这样即便外层被黑暗啃噬，也能重织新丝。<hpage>但这样耗力巨大，魂魄都将稀薄，但还有得选吗？<hpage>这是垂死神明的困兽之斗。若不阻止，必会让王国化为废墟。
translated_text: <page=M>即使知道她的动机，这也是君主可以长期忍受的震惊。我们以为没有人能在那种空虚中生存。<hpage>她会退回到她的保护形态--茧中。即使黑暗吞噬了它的外表，她也会重新纺出它的丝绸。<hpage>努力将会是巨大的，会耗尽她的灵魂，但还有什么其他选择呢？<hpage>这是垂死之神的绝望之举。这种抵抗，如果不受到挑战，将给你的王国带来毁灭。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>Even knowing her motives, this is a shock that the monarch can endure for a long time. We thought no one could survive in that emptiness.<hpage>She will retreat into her protective form-the cocoon. Even if the darkness consumes its appearance, she will re-spin its silk.<hpage>The effort will be huge and will drain her soul, but what other options are there?<hpage>This was a desperate move by the dying god. This resistance, if not challenged, will bring destruction to your kingdom.

original_en_text: <page=M>The quakes... This collapse will take Pharloom all.<hpage>If the void doesn’t claim it first. Surely you’ve seen them, the black threads that wrack your lands? The dark leeches up, possessed upon the fallen monarch’s Silk.<hpage>Pharloom’s roads were not safe before. Now they’ll prove impassable. Those pilgrims still alive in your lands best huddle and hope. <hpage>If there can be another end to this, it is up to us to discover it.
original_zh_text: <page=M>这震颤……纺络要全塌了。<hpage>怕不是会被虚空先吞了去。没见那些撕裂大地的黑丝么？黑暗正顺着坠落君王的灵丝涌上来。<hpage>纺络的道途本就不安稳，如今更是绝路，残存的朝圣者只能抱团等死。<hpage>但若还有转机，唯有靠我们能寻得。
translated_text: <page=M>地震这次崩溃将夺走法鲁的一切。<hpage>如果空白没有首先占据它。你一定见过它们，那些摧毁你土地的黑线吗？黑暗吸血鬼，吸血鬼，附着在堕落君主的丝绸上。<hpage>法鲁的道路以前并不安全。现在它们将被证明是不可逾越的。那些仍然生活在你的土地上的朝圣者最好挤在一起，抱有希望。<hpage>如果这还有另一个结局，那就由我们来发现了。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>The earthquake and the collapse will take everything from Faro.<hpage>If the blank space does not occupy it first. You must have seen them, the black lines that destroy your land? Dark vampires, vampires, attached to the silk of a fallen monarch.<hpage>The roads in Faro were not safe before. Now they will prove insurmountable. Those pilgrims still living in your land had better huddle together and have hope.<hpage>If there is another ending to this, it is up to us to discover it.

original_en_text: <hpage>Why do you sing, little one? This bony gate seems like a poor audience.
original_zh_text: <hpage>小家伙，为何对着骨门歌唱？这可不是什么知音。
translated_text: <hpage>小家伙，你为什么唱歌？瘦骨嶙峋的大门似乎是一群可怜的观众。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Little guy, why are you singing? The bony gate seemed to be a poor audience.

original_en_text: <hpage>Can you safely make your way back to the settlement, little one? I could escort you if need be.<page>Oh no, I’ll lay no more of my troubles upon you, red maiden. With the way cleared I can return under my own guidance.<page>After all, what’s another pilgrimage, eh? Ha ha!<page>Oh! And I have something for you as well. I found it buried amongst the broken relics down here in the darkness, glowing with a pale light.<page>’Tis an odd-looking thing... not exactly holy-seeming... but I would be honoured if you accepted it all the same!
original_zh_text: <hpage>需要我护送你回去吗？<page>不能再给你添麻烦了！路通了我就自己走。<page>就当再朝圣一回呗！哈哈！<page>对了，这个送你。在黑乎乎的地方挖到的，会发光。<page>虽然看着不像圣物……但请你收下吧！
translated_text: <hpage>小家伙，你能安全返回定居点吗？如果你愿意，我可以护送你。<page>哦，不，我不会再把麻烦推到你身上了，红女。道路畅通后，我就可以在我的带领下返回。<page>毕竟，什么是另一次朝圣，嗯？哈哈！<page>噢！我也有东西给你。我发现它埋在黑暗中，在破碎的遗物中，发着苍白的光芒。<page>这是看起来很奇怪的东西……似乎并不完全神圣。但如果你仍然接受，我将感到荣幸！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Boy, can you return to the settlement safely? If you want, I can escort you.<page>Oh, no, I won't blame you again, red girl. Once the road is clear, I can return under my leadership.<page>After all, what is another pilgrimage, huh? Haha!<page>Oh! I have something for you, too. I found it buried in the darkness, glowing pale among the shattered relics.<page>This is something that seems strange... doesn't seem entirely sacred. But if you still accept, I will be honored!

original_en_text: The challenge! The course! It shall be improved. Yes! Yes! The truest test is still to come. We shall fly fast together once more!
original_zh_text: 赛道还要改良！没错，真正的考验在后头！
translated_text: 挑战！当然！它将会得到改进。是的！是的！真正的考验尚未到来。我们将再次一起飞翔！
secondary_translated_text: Challenge! Of course! It will be improved. Yes! Yes! The real test has not yet come. We will fly together again!

original_en_text: I’ve learnt too that travelling is not without its dangers... but I find myself wielding my weapon quite adeptly.<page>It’s curious, the way our instincts can guide us with such precision.
original_zh_text: 我现在知道旅途中总伴有危险……不过我武器用得倒挺顺手。<page>本能的指引竟如此精准，真奇妙。
translated_text: 我还了解到旅行并非没有危险。但我发现自己非常熟练地挥舞着武器。<page>奇怪的是，我们的直觉能够如此准确地引导我们。
secondary_translated_text: I also learned that travel is not without risks. But I found myself waving the weapon very skillfully.<page>What's strange is that our instincts can guide us so accurately.

original_en_text: Un-Daak... well struck. To face the fury of your weapon in a true battle would be an experience indeed. I would gladly duel again, if you have the time for it.
original_zh_text: 唔-嗒克……打得好。跟你打一架真是受益匪浅，等你有空我们再练。
translated_text: 温达克打得好在实战中面对武器的愤怒确实是一种体验。如果你有时间，我很乐意再次战斗。
secondary_translated_text: Wendak plays well. The anger of facing weapons in actual combat is indeed an experience. If you have time, I'd love to fight again.

original_en_text: Hoho sister, my whiskers are still quivering! That’s how you know you had a rousing battle!<page>You go on ahead. Zaza and I will keep guard here and catch any stragglers.
