original_zh_text: 嚯嚯，真是一场酣畅淋漓的战斗！我的胡子都还在颤抖呢！<page>你先前进吧，我和扎扎在这守着一会，看看有没有漏网之虫。
translated_text: 嘿嘿姐姐，我的胡子还在冒烟！这就是你知道自己经历了一场激动人心的战斗的方式！<page>去吧我和扎扎将在这里站岗，抓捕任何落后的人。
secondary_translated_text: Hehe sister, my beard is still smoking! This is how you know you have been in an exciting battle!<page>Go ahead, Zaza and I will stand guard here and arrest anyone who falls behind.

original_en_text: Hoy, red maiden. ‘Tis a prayer answered to see you safely wake.<hpage>Little Sherma? What has happened here?
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘！圣堡庇佑，你醒了！<hpage>小谢尔玛，此处发生了什么？
translated_text: 嘿，红女孩。这是对看到你安全醒来的祈祷的回应。<hpage>小谢尔曼？这里发生了什么？
secondary_translated_text: Hey, red girl. It's in response to prayers to see you wake up safely.<hpage>Little Sherman? What happened here?

original_en_text: Poshanka! So you found my calling ring, Child Wielding Needle. I recognised the sound of your weapon’s foreign metal against it.<page>On the hunt for my master, I am often away, but I still use this place as camp. Use the ring to call me whenever you wish to make trade.
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔！发现我的传讯了？听到你武器发出的那异域的金属声就知道是你。<page>我把这当作据点，但常外出寻找导师。想找我交易就摇铃。
translated_text: 博尚卡！所以你找到了我的召唤戒指，孩子挥舞着针。我意识到异物和金属对你武器的影响。<page>我经常出去寻找主人，但我仍然把这个地方当作营地。每当您想进行交易时，请使用铃声给我打电话。
secondary_translated_text: Boshanka! So you found my calling ring, and the child waved the needle. I am aware of the impact of foreign objects and metals on your weapons.<page>I often go out looking for owners, but I still use this place as a camp. Whenever you want to make a transaction, please call me using your ringtone.

original_en_text: <hpage>Gladly I will accept your aid Shakra. Let us cut closer to this Citadel’s haunted heart.<page>Garrok! Hornet Wielding Needle. Beside you, I will gladly raise my rings!
original_zh_text: <hpage>求之不得。一起杀进圣堡里去吧。<page>嘎咯克！使针的姑娘。能和你并肩作战，我的战环乐意至极！
translated_text: <hpage>我很高兴接受你的帮助，沙克拉。让我们更接近这座城堡闹鬼的中心。<page>Garrok！大黄蜂挥舞着针。在你旁边，我很想举起我的戒指！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I'm happy to accept your help, Shakra. Get us closer to the haunted center of this castle.<page>Garrok! The bumblebee waved its needle. Next to you, I want to hold up my ring!

original_en_text: I’d hoped to never step these hateful halls, yet here I stand, as all those hapless bugs before.<hpage>You’ve journeyed far from that damp cell, tall bug. If you would oppose the minions of this Citadel, you have my respect.<page>Hmph. Then we share a rare stance, warrior. Few others seem possessed of will enough to resist.<page>So many weak minds, drawn up and strung, in love with the great golden leech atop their lands.
original_zh_text: 我本不想踏入这憎恶之地，却还是步了前虫的后尘。<hpage>你既然从潮湿牢笼走到这里，若是想反抗圣堡，我愿助一臂之力。<page>哼，倒是难得。鲜少有虫能生出抵抗之心。<page>大多数都意志薄弱，沉溺受缚，被上头那黄金监牢所蛊惑。
translated_text: 我曾希望永远不要踏进这些可恶的大厅，但我站在这里，就像我面前所有不幸的虫子一样。<hpage>你已经离开那个潮湿的牢房了，高虫子。如果你反对这座城堡的爪牙，我尊重你。<page>哈你然后我们分享了一个罕见的位置，士兵。似乎很少有其他人有足够的意志来抵抗。<page>那么多心灵脆弱、紧张的人，爱上了他们土地上的巨大金韭葱。
secondary_translated_text: I had hoped never to set foot in these hateful halls, but I stand here like all the unfortunate bugs in front of me.<hpage>You've left that damp cell, Gao Bug. If you oppose the pawns of this castle, I respect you.<page>Ha you and then we shared a rare location, soldier. Few others seem to have enough will to resist.<page>So many fragile and nervous people fell in love with the huge golden leeks in their land.

original_en_text: Ho there, brave sister! What poetry has fate writ, that we should meet here at the peak of this ghastly Citadel!<page>Beasts and fiends, all here are lost to that horrid Haunting! And out from this golden corpse it seeps to plague the good bugs of the land below. Well, no more we say!<hpage>You should beware brave sirs, the creature that commands this curse is a foe far beyond bug. I would not see your lives given in vain.<page>Pah! We beware nothing! We would give our lives a hundred times over to finally cut away the evil that clutches our kingdom!
original_zh_text: 哟，勇敢的姐妹！真有缘，能在这鬼圣堡顶上见面！<page>那些被邪丝牵着走的虫兽，就是从这金色死城跑出去祸害纺络的，但到此为止了！<hpage>当心，萦绕于圣堡之上的存在远非虫类能敌，不要白白丢了性命。<page>呸！我们才不怕！只要能斩断缠住这破地方的丝线，死一百回都值！
translated_text: 嘿，勇敢的姐姐！什么诗写着命运？我们应该在这座可怕城堡的顶峰见面！<page>野兽和恶魔，这里的一切都消失在可怕的闹鬼中了！它从这具金色的尸体中渗出，瘟疫之下的土地上的好虫子。好了，我们别说话了！<hpage>勇敢的先生们，你们要小心，发出这个诅咒的生物是远远超出蠕虫的敌人。我不会看到你们白白牺牲生命。<page>呸！我们什么都不小心！我们愿意牺牲一百倍的生命，最终消除围绕我们王国的邪恶！
secondary_translated_text: Hey, brave sister! What poem writes about destiny? We should meet at the summit of this terrible castle!<page>Beasts and demons, everything here has disappeared into the terrible haunting! It seeps out of this golden corpse, the good insect of the land under the plague. Okay, let's stop talking!<hpage>Be careful, brave gentlemen, the creature issuing this curse is an enemy far beyond the worm. I will not see you sacrifice your lives in vain.<page>Bah! We're not careful about anything! We are willing to sacrifice a hundred times of our lives to ultimately eliminate the evil that surrounds our kingdom!

original_en_text: Goodness! This is just too embarrassing! Detected even through my perfect cover! What tell? What error? Surely something gave me away!<hpage>It was no one thing, young bug. Your disguise is near faultless. I’ve merely spent a long life being watchful.<page>Gah! Then I’ll just have to hope the beasts about don’t share such keen sight. It’ll be so much harder to accomplish my work if I’m detected, or eaten!
original_zh_text: 哎呀！太丢脸了！完美伪装都被识破！哪里露馅了？<hpage>你没露出破绽，小虫子。只是我活得够久，眼神也比较好。<page>好吧！但愿怪物们没这么眼尖。万一被发现或被吃掉都会耽误我工作！
translated_text: 天哪！这太尴尬了！即使通过我完美的掩护！告诉什么？什么错误？一定有什么东西暴露了我！<hpage>这不是一个东西，小虫子。你的伪装几乎完美无瑕。我只是花了很长一段时间保持警惕。<page>啊！那我只能希望周围的野兽不要有这么敏锐的眼光。如果我被发现或吃掉，完成工作就会困难得多！
secondary_translated_text: Jesus! This is so embarrassing! Even through my perfect cover! Tell what? What mistake? Something must have exposed me!<hpage>This is not a thing, little bug. Your disguise is almost flawless. I just spent a long time being vigilant.<page>Ah! Then I can only hope that the beasts around me will not have such sharp eyes. If I were found or eaten, it would be much more difficult to complete the work!

original_en_text: <hpage>The battle ahead may indeed be arduous. I accept your offer of aid, sirs.<page>Gurrrro! Yes! No force in the kingdom can withstand our might! Lead on, sister! Zaza and I will be close behind!
original_zh_text: <hpage>前方战斗凶险，有劳二位了。<page>嘎噜！咱们联手肯定所向披靡！带路吧姐妹！我和扎扎自会跟上！
translated_text: <hpage>未来的战斗可能确实是艰巨的。先生们，我接受你们的援助提议。<page>咕噜！是的！王国中没有任何力量能够抵抗我们的力量！姐姐，带路！我和扎扎会密切关注！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>The battle ahead may indeed be arduous. Gentlemen, I accept your offer of assistance.<page>Gollum! Yes! No power in the kingdom can resist our power! Sister, lead the way! Zaza and I will pay close attention!

original_en_text: Sister, sister, tired and glum,<br>We will sing, and you can hum,<br>Together we shall overcome!
original_zh_text: 姐妹同袍，圣途相聚，<br>齐声歌唱，忘却忧伤，<br>同心协力，共度难关！
translated_text: 姐姐，姐姐，又累又沮丧，<br>我们可以唱歌，你可以哼歌，<br>我们一起失败！
secondary_translated_text: Sister, sister, tired and depressed,<br>We can sing, you can hum,<br>We failed together!

original_en_text: <page=M>Oh ho! Back from the depths with nary a scratch! Is it as you feared?<hpage>It is, and worse. Your snare has sunk the monarch deep, deeper than I can safely descend.<hpage>To cut Pharloom free, I must plunge below the surface of that lake of liquid nothing.<page=B> No shell survives submersion in that void, Old One, not even yours.<hpage>Not without aid, certainly. Though aid may exist. The flower that resists the dark. Do you know of it?<page=M>The Everbloom?... We’ve heard the tale, but had thought it a myth. If ever it sprouted in our lands we would surely have known?<hpage>I would not seek it in these lands. I need its power full, and it is too fragile to sustain here long. I would seek it in my memory.<page=S> Oh ho ho! So you’d have us wrench open your soul, to retrieve the fabled bloom? Can such a thing be done?<hpage>For another bug, no, but I am Weaver enough to attempt it.<hpage>In the distant past, I knew the flower. My thread still holds its faint memory. If the Everbloom was grasped strongly enough within my Silk, it could be made to manifest.<page=M>Ah! So you’re asking another spell of us? To reveal the flower clear?... But to illuminate one of your kind’s old memories, so acutely... This is no easy thing, even for us...<page=M>Old One, you must give us a moment to confer...
original_zh_text: <page=M>哦嚯！毫发无损从深渊归来！情况果真如您所料？<hpage>比预料的更糟。你们的陷阱将君主沉得极深，深过我安全下潜的极限。<hpage>要斩断纺络的枷锁，须要直入虚无之湖深处。<page=B>古老者，没有躯壳能在虚空浸泡中幸存，您也不例外。<hpage>单凭自己当然不成，但若有助力……那朵抗暗之花，你们知道吗？<page=M>永绽花？……听说过，但只当是传说。如果曾在此地绽放过，我们怎会不知？<hpage>此地当然找不到，我需要完全盛放的花，此地养不活。得去我的记忆中找。<page=S>哦嚯嚯！是要我们撕开您魂魄，取出那朵神花？这真能成功？<hpage>其他虫不行，但我有织者血脉，可以一试。<hpage>在遥远过去，我记得此花，灵丝中尚存其残影。若能在记忆中紧紧抓住，或许能使其显形。<page=M>啊！所以又要我们施法？让花影清晰？……可要照彻您这一族的古老回忆……就算是我们也……<page=M>古老者，请让我们商议一下……
translated_text: <page=M>哦吼！毫发无伤地从深处回来了！真的像你担心的那样吗？<hpage>是的，而且更糟。你的陷阱已经深深地落入了国王的手中，比我安全落入的还要深。<hpage>为了解放法鲁，我不得不潜入空荡荡的湖下。<page=B>没有贝壳能在那个虚空中生存，老头，即使是你的。<hpage>当然，没有帮助也是如此。援助可能存在。抵制黑暗之花。你知道吗？<page=M>永恒的绽放？。我们听说过这个故事，但认为它是一个神话。如果它在我们的土地上发芽，我们一定会知道。<hpage>我不会在这片土地上寻找它。我需要它变得强大，但它太脆弱了，在这里撑不了多久。我会在记忆中寻找它。<page=S>哦嗬嗬！所以你想让我们打开你的灵魂并取回传说中的花朵吗？这样的事情可以做吗？<hpage>对于另一个错误，不，但我是韦弗，足以尝试它。<hpage>在遥远的过去，我认识这朵花。我的线程仍然保留着微弱的记忆力。如果我的丝绸足够强烈地抓住永恒的花朵，它就能显现出来。<page=M>啊！所以你要求我们再次施展魔法？我应该把花露弄清楚吗？但却能照亮你们种族的旧记忆，如此清晰。即使对我们来说，这也不是一项容易的任务。<page=M>老头子，你得给我们点时间商量...
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>Oh ho! Came back from the depths unscathed! Is it really as you feared?<hpage>Yes, and worse. Your trap has fallen deeply into the King's hands, deeper than I have safely fallen into.<hpage>In order to liberate Faro, I had to dive under the empty lake.<page=B>No shell can survive in that void, old man, not even yours.<hpage>Of course, this is true even without help. Aid may exist. Resist the flowers of darkness. You know what?<page=M>Eternal bloom? We have heard of this story, but think it is a myth. If it germinated in our land, we would know.<hpage>I will not look for it in this land. I need it to be strong, but it's too fragile to last long here. I will look for it in memory.<page=S>Oh ho ho! So you want us to open your soul and retrieve the legendary flower? Can such a thing be done?<hpage>For another mistake, no, but I was Weaver, enough to try it.<hpage>In the distant past, I knew this flower. My threads still retain a weak memory. If my silk grasps the eternal flower strongly enough, it will manifest itself.<page=M>Ah! So you're asking us to do magic again? Should I clarify the flower dew? But it can illuminate the old memories of your race, so clearly. Even for us, this is not an easy task.<page=M>Old man, you have to give us some time to discuss...

original_en_text: My wish is granted... and now everything I love is lost...
original_zh_text: 愿望实现了……可我珍视的一切都消失了……
translated_text: 我的愿望实现了...现在我所爱的一切都失去了。
secondary_translated_text: My wish came true... Now everything I loved is lost.

original_en_text: Gara Takana! What has happened to you, Child Wielding Needle, to cause you such brutal weakening?<hpage>You are seeing the effects of a parasite, Shakra, a writhing entity implanted by force. It will not kill me, not quickly at least, but its presence wears greatly on my shell.<page>It is a horrid state you suffer. Fight yourself free, or find help with haste. I would not wish to see you defeated by such deceitful strength.
original_zh_text: 加拉塔卡纳！使针的小姑娘，你怎么了？竟变成这副惨状？<hpage>是寄生物的影响，沙克拉。它被强行植入了我的躯壳。虽不会立刻致命，但持续侵蚀着我。<page>这状态太可怕了。要么挣脱它，要么快去寻求援助。我可不愿见你败给如此诡诈的力量。
translated_text: 高加纳！童真，你到底发生了什么事，让你如此虚弱？<hpage>你看到的是寄生虫Shakra的影响，Shakra是一种强行植入的扭曲实体。它不会杀死我，至少不会很快，但它的存在对我的外壳造成了巨大的磨损。<page>你所遭受的是一种可怕的状态。争取自由或尽快寻求帮助。我不想看到你被这样的欺骗力量打败。
secondary_translated_text: Gao Garner! Tongzhen, what happened to you that made you so weak?<hpage>What you see is the influence of the parasite Shakra, a distorted entity that is forcibly implanted. It won't kill me, at least not quickly, but its presence causes tremendous wear and tear on my shell.<page>What you are suffering from is a terrible state. Fight for freedom or seek help as soon as possible. I don't want to see you defeated by this deceptive power.

original_en_text: Hoi! Let our mighty contest of shells commence again!
translated_text: 嘿！让我们再次开始强大的贝壳比赛！
secondary_translated_text: Hey! Let's start the powerful shell competition again!

original_en_text: You’re in the habit of craftin’ all kinds’a nasty tools’n traps, aint’cha? This kit’ll let you build ‘em even nastier, heh heh...
original_zh_text: 你这家伙成天捣鼓些工具跟陷阱，是吧？这匣子能帮你更进一步，嘿嘿……
translated_text: 你有使用各种烦人的工具和陷阱的习惯，不是吗？这个套件会让你把它们建造得更糟，呵呵。
secondary_translated_text: You have a habit of using all kinds of annoying tools and traps, don't you? This kit will make you make them worse, huh?

original_en_text: Poshanka, Child Wielding Needle. This heart-home is cut free of its curse.<page>Tell me, was it your blade that brought its saving? My shock would be great if another here managed the feat.<hpage>I slew a tall creature above the town, a Weaver I suspect, though one twisted in purpose.<hpage>By voice and claw it aided, perhaps guided, the thread that strung the town. <page>Weaver? Those vicious old things! To our young we tell the tales, but had thought them long dead, only corpses bound in spires. <hpage>This one still lived, though if it was a Weaver, it was broken in a savage way.<hpage>Its own Silk was bound, pinned deep within its shell. A cruel punishment I’ve not before witnessed. <page>Even broken, my envy remains. A Weaver’s fabled skills... To meet one in combat means great challenge, and great pride in victory.
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔，使针的小姑娘。这镇子的诅咒解除了？<page>是你干的？别的虫可没这本事。<hpage>我斩了镇子上头的高个怪物，像是个变异的织者。<page>是它用声音和利爪操控缠绕镇子的丝线。<page>织者？那群老毒物！还以为早死绝了，只剩塔里的干尸。<hpage>这只还活着，但被折磨得不成样。<hpage>灵丝被钉在壳里，残忍的刑罚。<page>就算残了我也羡慕。织者的本事……能交手是幸运，能得胜更是荣耀。
translated_text: 波尚卡的孩子们挥舞着针。这座灵魂之屋已经从诅咒中解放出来。<page>告诉我，你的剑带来了救赎吗？如果这里的另一个人能做到这一壮举，我会非常震惊。<hpage>我在小镇上空杀死了一个高大的生物，我怀疑它是一个织布工，尽管它是故意扭曲的。<hpage>它通过声音和爪子帮助，也许引导连接城镇的电线。<page>韦弗？那些恶毒的老东西！我们给年轻人讲故事，但以为他们早就死了，尖塔上只有尸体。<hpage>这台还活着，尽管如果它是织机，它就会被野蛮地损坏。<hpage>它自己的丝绸被捆绑并深深钉在壳里。这是我以前从未见过的残酷惩罚。<page>即使破碎了，我的嫉妒仍然存在。编织者的传奇技能。在战斗中遇到挑战意味着对胜利充满自豪感。
secondary_translated_text: Bosanca's children waved needles. This house of souls has been freed from the curse.<page>Tell me, does your sword bring redemption? I would be very shocked if another person here could do this feat.<hpage>I killed a tall creature over the town that I suspected was a weaver, even though it was deliberately distorted.<hpage>It helps through sound and claws, perhaps guiding the wires that connect towns.<page>Weaver? Those vicious old things! We told stories to young people, but thought they were long dead and there were only bodies on the steeple.<hpage>This one is still alive, although if it were a loom, it would have been savagely damaged.<hpage>Its own silk is bundled and nailed deep into its shell. This was a cruel punishment I had never seen before.<page>Even though it was broken, my jealousy still existed. The legendary skills of the weaver. Meeting challenges in battle means feeling proud of victory.

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair greetings, Shakra. You are a welcome sight amidst the sodden gloom of these caverns. <page>Child Wielding Needle, your aspect is still sharp. My respect remains. Heed a warning, many fierce bugs roost nearby.<page>On the lake beyond this cave nest a ragged horde atop an old watermound. Their mastery of flight makes them dangerous. My shell will forever carry the score of their pins.<page>If you’re seeking a safer path, head back, towards this land’s core.
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，沙克拉。能在这阴湿洞穴里见到你真好。<page>使针的小姑娘，身手还是那么利索。提醒你，附近猛虫可不少。<page>前面湖心住着群飞虫，我壳上被它们的针弄得全是伤。<page>想走安全点的路就就回头，往这地方的中心走。
translated_text: <hpage>问候，沙克拉。在这些潮湿的洞穴中，你是一个受欢迎的景象。<page>童震，你的外表还是犀利的。我的尊重仍然存在。注意到警告，附近生活着许多凶猛的昆虫。<page>洞穴后面的湖面上，一座古老的水丘顶上，坐落着一群衣衫褴褛的部落。他们对飞行的精通使他们变得危险。我的贝壳将永远带有他们徽章的分数。<page>如果您正在寻找一条更安全的道路，请返回并前往这片土地的中心。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Greetings, Shakra. In these moist caves, you are a welcome sight.<page>Tong Zhen, your appearance is still sharp. My respect still exists. Taking note of the warning, there are many ferocious insects living nearby.<page>On the lake behind the cave, on top of an ancient water mound sits a group of ragged tribes. Their mastery of flying makes them dangerous. My shells will always bear the points of their badges.<page>If you are looking for a safer path, return and head to the center of the land.

original_en_text: Nuu is a long way from her safe lodging... perhaps she will stay in this nice, dark little squeezy place a little longer.
original_zh_text: 努努离家好远……暂时在这个黑暗小缝里窝会儿吧。
translated_text: Nu距离她的安全屋还有很长的路要走。也许她会在这个美好、黑暗、拥挤的小地方再呆一段时间。
secondary_translated_text: Nu is still a long way from her safe house. Maybe she'll stay a little longer in this nice, dark, crowded little place.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sherma, I bring supplies from the town of bells below. Since you are now caretaker here, I entrust them to you.<page>Oh, what a blessing! This will surely raise the hopes of our poor brothers and sisters.
original_zh_text: <hpage>小谢尔玛，我从下面镇子带了补给。既然现在你是看守者，就交给你了。<page>真是雪中送炭！兄弟姐妹们肯定会振作起来的！
translated_text: <hpage>谢尔曼，我从下面的贝尔镇带来了物资。既然你现在是这里的守护者，我就把它们托付给你。<page>哦，多么幸运啊！这一定会给我们可怜的兄弟姐妹带来希望。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Sherman, I brought supplies from Bell Town below. Since you are now the guardian of this place, I will entrust them to you.<page>Oh, how lucky! This will definitely bring hope to our poor brothers and sisters.

original_en_text: Red maiden, you have some great task ahead of you, do you not? If so, then I fear the time of our final parting draws near.<hpage>You sense it true, Sherma. I shall soon descend to the darkness below the kingdom and quell the source of Pharloom’s rending.<hpage>If that task is achieved, my future may take me far from Pharloom, but know I have faith that you will hold these bugs together, and see them prosper.<page>Ah! In truth, I’m still only a fool, but I’ll hold dearly to your faith in me. That warmth will help me to endure whatever challenges lie ahead!<page>Now let me pray for you, dear friend, and may my hopes follow you into the deepest darkness and beyond!
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘，您身负重大使命，对吧？若是如此，恐怕我们分别的时刻临近了。<hpage>你的直觉得没错，谢尔玛。我即将深入王国底部的黑暗，平息撕裂纺络的源头。<hpage>若使命达成，我或许会远行。但我坚信你能团结这些虫子，带领他们重建繁荣。<page>哈！说得对，说得对！毕竟我虽然攀登至此，但终究只是个愚者，而看护这些虫民同胞的生涯才刚开始。<page>现在我要为您祈祷，亲爱的红衣姑娘，静待我们齐声歌颂您凯旋的时刻！
translated_text: 红女，你还有一些伟大的任务要做，不是吗？如果是这样的话，那么我担心我们最后一次分别的时刻即将到来。<hpage>你感觉这是真实的，谢尔曼。我很快就会潜入王国下方的黑暗中，平息法鲁毁灭的根源。<hpage>如果这项任务完成了，我的未来可能会让我远离法勒姆，但我相信你会把这些错误团结起来并看到它们蓬勃发展。<page>啊！事实上，我仍然只是一个傻瓜，但我会深深相信你对我的信心。这种温暖将帮助我经受住未来的任何挑战！<page>亲爱的朋友们，现在让我为你们祈祷，愿我的希望跟随你们进入最深的黑暗和更远的地方！
secondary_translated_text: Red girl, you still have some great tasks to do, don't you? If that is the case, then I fear that the moment for our last parting is coming.<hpage>You feel real, Sherman. I will soon infiltrate the darkness below the kingdom and quell the source of Faro's destruction.<hpage>If this task is accomplished, my future may keep me away from Farham, but I am sure you will unite these mistakes and see them flourish.<page>Ah! In fact, I am still just a fool, but I will deeply believe in your confidence in me. This warmth will help me withstand any challenges in the future!<page>Dear friends, let me pray for you now, and may my hope follow you into the deepest darkness and further places!

original_en_text: The way forward is yours. Let us meet again soon.
translated_text: 前进的道路是你的。让我们很快再见面吧。
secondary_translated_text: The way forward is yours. Let's meet again soon.

original_en_text: <hpage>Shakra, you pit yourself against the black-threaded bugs? They are dangerous foes, even for a hardened warrior.<page>I relish such danger, and have little choice besides. These creatures besiege the town within. They are relentless, and empowered. <hpage>...It is the void, stretched up into this world and its husks. I know it well, this force, its nature. If it senses soul within, it will drive voracious towards it.<page>As you say! Many bugs now huddle within the bells. Nowhere else is safe with this black threat rising.<page>Some luck, at least, that I chose to remain, and can offer my rings’ defence.<hpage>Shakra, I seek to end this new disaster, for in it I share much blame, but know, I shall need time to complete my task.<hpage>I ask you hold fast till then. This town and its bugs need a guardian, and I can think of none better.<page>Very well, Hornet Wielding Needle. A pact made strong. If you are working towards the venom’s end, I shall fight with faith renewed.
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉，你在独自抵挡黑灾虫群？再强悍的战士面对它们也很危险。<page>我享受这份危险，但也没得选择。它们在围攻小镇，没完没了，还有邪力加持。<hpage>……是虚空，侵入现世操纵躯壳。我很了解这东西，它的力量，和本质。它只要嗅到灵魂就会想要吞噬。<page>话是这么说，现在虫民都躲钟里……但别处更危险。<page>我选择留下已经算他们走运，至少还能挡一阵。<hpage>沙克拉，我会想办法终结这场灾难，毕竟我也有责任。但我需要时间，请你坚守下去。<hpage>小镇需要守卫，没有虫比你更合适。<page>好吧，使针的小姑娘。我答应你，只要你能解决源头，我会死守到底。
translated_text: <hpage>Shakra，你允许自己对抗黑线错误吗？即使对于一名强壮的士兵来说，他们也是危险的敌人。<page>我喜欢危险，我别无选择，只能这样做。这些生物包围了小镇内部。他们无情而强大。<hpage>...正是空虚延伸到世界及其外壳中。我很了解它，这种力量，它的本质。如果它感觉到其中的灵魂，它就会贪婪地向它前进。<page>正如你所说！现在钟里挤满了很多昆虫。随着这种黑色威胁的上升，其他一切都是安全的。<page>至少幸运的是，我选择留下来，并且可以提供我的戒指防御。<hpage>沙克拉，我寻求结束这场新的灾难，因为我对此负有很大责任，但要知道我需要时间来完成我的任务。<hpage>我要求你坚持到那时。这个小镇和它的虫子需要一个守护者，我想不出更好的了。<page>好，大黄蜂挥舞着针。一个强有力的协议。如果你正在努力结束毒药，我将以新的信念战斗。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Shakra, do you allow yourself to fight black line errors? Even for a strong soldier, they are dangerous enemies.<page>I love danger, and I have no choice but to do it. These creatures surrounded the interior of the town. They are ruthless and powerful.<hpage>... It is the emptiness that extends into the world and its outer shell. I know it well, this power, its nature. If it feels the soul in it, it will greedily advance towards it.<page>Just as you said! Now the clock is crowded with many insects. As this black threat rises, everything else is safe.<page>At least fortunately, I chose to stay and could provide my ring defense.<hpage>Shakra, I seek to end this new disaster because I have a lot of responsibility for it, but know that I need time to complete my task.<hpage>I ask you to persevere until then. This town and its bugs need a guardian, and I can't think of a better one.<page>Okay, the bumblebee wields the needle. A strong agreement. If you are working to end the poison, I will fight with new beliefs.

original_en_text: Let us charge on. My rings shall sing loud on the shells of our enemies.
original_zh_text: 冲吧！让我用战环在敌人的壳上奏响战歌！
translated_text: 让我们冲锋。我的戒指将在敌人的外壳上大声歌唱。
secondary_translated_text: Let us charge. My ring will sing loudly on the shell of the enemy.

original_en_text: And now, miss grown-up, the task is done! Nuu must be away.<page>But do not be sour! Just think! Pharloom is only one land. So many more must hide out there, filled full with beasts and scents and tastes, all waiting to be discovered.<page>For Nuu, her journey is only at its start. And for you, miss grown-up, Nuu wishes too your happy hunting, much and more!
original_zh_text: 任务完成了！那么大姐姐，努努要出发了。<page>别难过！纺络只是开始！外面还有无数大地等着探索呢！<page>努努的旅程刚开始，祝大姐姐也狩猎愉快！
translated_text: 大人小姐任务完成了努一定走了。<page>但别酸了！考虑一下！法鲁只是一块土地。那里肯定隐藏着更多的东西，充满了野兽、气味和气味，一切都在等待被发现。<page>对于努来说，她的旅程才刚刚开始。大人，努也祝您狩猎愉快！
secondary_translated_text: Your excellency and miss, the mission is completed and Nun must be gone.<page>But don't be sour! Think about it! Faro is just a piece of land. There must be something more hidden there, full of beasts, smells and odors, everything waiting to be discovered.<page>For Nu, her journey has just begun. My lord, Nu also wishes you a pleasant hunting!

original_en_text: <hpage>Shakra, what has happened here? For these masses to huddle so amongst such destruction?<page>The dark-spun bugs, they besiege the town, relentless. I have defended against each wave anew, but they are empowered in foul ways, and I am much fatigued.<hpage>...It is the void, stretched up into this world and its husks. I know it well, that force, its nature. If it senses soul, it will drive voracious towards it.<page>As you say! All these bugs, gathered close within the bells... but nowhere else is safe with this black threat rising.<hpage>Shakra, I seek to end this new disaster, for in it I share much blame, but know, I shall need time to complete my task. I would ask you hold fast till then.<hpage>This town and its bugs needs a guardian, and I can think of none better.<page>Very well, Hornet Wielding Needle. A pact made strong. If you are working towards the venom’s end, I shall fight with faith renewed.
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉，这是怎么回事？废墟里挤着这么多虫？<page>黑虫围攻小镇，击退一波又来一波。它们有邪力加持，我快顶不住了。<hpage>……是虚空，侵入现世操纵躯壳。我很了解这东西，它的力量，和本质。它只要嗅到灵魂就会想要吞噬。<page>话是这么说，现在虫民都躲钟里……但别处更危险。<hpage>沙克拉，我会想办法终结这场灾难，毕竟我也有责任。但我需要时间，请你坚守下去。<hpage>小镇需要守卫，没有虫比你更合适。<page>好吧，使针的小姑娘。我答应你，只要你能解决源头，我会死守到底。
translated_text: <hpage>沙克拉，这里发生了什么？这些人是否在这样的破坏中挤在一起？<page>黑暗的昆虫无情地围攻小镇。我重新捍卫了每一波浪潮，但它们以邪恶的方式被赋予力量，我感到非常累。<hpage>...正是空虚延伸到世界及其外壳中。我很了解它，它的力量，它的性质。如果它感觉到灵魂，它就会贪婪地向灵魂前进。<page>正如你所说！所有这些虫子，都聚集在钟声里……但随着这种黑人威胁的上升，其他地方都不安全。<hpage>沙克拉，我寻求结束这场新的灾难，因为我对此负有很大责任，但要知道我需要时间来完成我的任务。我要求你坚持到那时。<hpage>这个小镇和它的虫子需要一个守护者，我想不出更好的了。<page>好，大黄蜂挥舞着针。一个强有力的协议。如果你正在努力结束毒药，我将以新的信念战斗。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Shakra, what happened here? Are these people huddled together in such destruction?<page>Dark insects ruthlessly besieged the town. I re-defended each wave, but they were empowered in evil ways and I felt very tired.<hpage>... It is the emptiness that extends into the world and its outer shell. I know it well, its power, its nature. If it feels the soul, it will greedily advance towards the soul.<page>Just as you said! All these bugs, gathered in the bells... but with this black threat rising, nowhere else is safe.<hpage>Shakra, I seek to end this new disaster because I have a lot of responsibility for it, but know that I need time to complete my task. I ask you to persevere until then.<hpage>This town and its bugs need a guardian, and I can't think of a better one.<page>Okay, the bumblebee wields the needle. A strong agreement. If you are working to end the poison, I will fight with new beliefs.

original_en_text: Eugh. Is it gettin’ hotter down here? Mustier? Grindle’s been down here too long. Reckon it’s time to climb back up soon, to where all the serious treasures is!
original_zh_text: 呃。这底下是不是越来越热了？格林德尔在这底下待太久了，该上去淘真宝贝了！
translated_text: Uh.这里越来越热了吗？穆斯捷？格林德尔在这里太久了我想是时候尽快爬回来并到达所有重要的宝藏了！
secondary_translated_text: Uh. Is it getting hotter in here? Mustier? Greendale has been here for too long and I think it's time to climb back and reach all the important treasures as soon as possible!

original_en_text: So this is... defeat? Can it be? Huu... A shell so fast! Wonder of Pharloom! A bug whose pace could match my own.<page>Though I set a simple course, you have proven its match and more. Take this small reward, nimble bug, and remember well our grand contest!
original_zh_text: 居然……输了？怎么可能？呼……太快了！真是神奇！<page>虽然这条赛道不难，但你证明了自己！收下这个奖励，纪念我们的巅峰对决！
translated_text: 这就是。失败？可以吗？呼。炮弹太快了！法罗奇迹！一只速度能和我一样快的虫子。<page>虽然我设置了一个简单的路线，你已经证明了它的兼容性和更多。接受这个小小的奖励吧，敏捷的虫子，记住我们的伟大游戏！
secondary_translated_text: This is it. Failure? Is that okay? Hoo. The shells are too fast! Farrow Miracle! A bug that can go as fast as me.<page>Although I set up a simple route, you have demonstrated its compatibility and more. Accept this little reward, agile bug, and remember our great game!

original_en_text: Oh, hoy there! Why, I must have dropped off to sleep as soon as I arrived!<page>Certainly, the pilgrim’s way is exhausting, but a good rest is a reward unto itself!
original_zh_text: 哎呀！刚到这地方就睡着了！<page>朝圣虽累，但一场美梦就是最好的犒赏！
translated_text: 哦，嘿，那里！为什么，我一定是一到就睡着了！<page>当然，朝圣之路令人筋疲力尽，但好好休息本身就是一种奖励！
secondary_translated_text: Oh, hey, there! Why, I must have fallen asleep as soon as I arrived!<page>Of course, the pilgrimage is exhausting, but a good rest is a reward in itself!

original_en_text: That was a battle well-fought, Child Wielding Needle. Your master would be proud of you.<hpage>The one who trained me long ago... I never called her master. Whether she would be proud of what has become of me, I cannot say.<page>Nu-Hakkata! Whether she is dead or alive, have faith! Nothing a pupil does escapes their master’s sight!
original_zh_text: 打得好！你的导师肯定很骄傲。<hpage>教导我的……我从没叫过她导师。她会不会以我为荣……我不知道。<page>努-哈咔嗒！不管她是死是活，你都要自信！徒弟干的事，师傅都看在眼里！
translated_text: 这是一场打得很好的战斗，孩子们挥舞着针头。你的主人会为你感到自豪。<hpage>很久以前训练过我的人.我从未称她为主人。我不知道她是否会为我的遭遇感到骄傲。<page>空方！无论她是死是活，她都要有信念！学生所做的一切都逃不过老师的注意！
secondary_translated_text: It was a well-fought battle, with the children waving needles. Your owner will be proud of you.<hpage>Someone who trained me a long time ago. I never called her master. I don't know if she would be proud of what happened to me.<page>Empty side! Whether she dies or lives, she must have faith! Everything a student does cannot escape the teacher's attention!

original_en_text: Wide, dim hollows, choked by rag and dust. The bugs who once tended these lands have clearly lost their way.
original_zh_text: 昏暗广袤的洞窟塞满破布灰尘，原本照料这里的虫早已迷失了方向。
translated_text: 宽阔而黑暗的空洞被破布和灰尘堵住了。曾经照顾这些土地的昆虫显然已经迷失了方向。
secondary_translated_text: The wide and dark void was blocked by rags and dust. The insects that once cared for these lands have clearly lost their way.

original_en_text: Red maiden! Dear sister! At last, our great pilgrimage is at its end!<page>Our faith never wavered, and now here awaits our glorious reward, the shining Citadel! Where all sing as one!<hpage>I will not tell you to turn back, for I know you will not, but I urge you at least to be cautious. Terrible things lurk within this Citadel, little pilgrim.<page>Oh, sister! There is no need for caution, and no need for fear. Let us step forward under guidance of our faith!
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘！好姐妹！我们终于到了！<page>守住信念不容易，现在终于看到圣堡了！大家齐声歌颂的地方！<hpage>我知道劝不动你回头，但千万小心。这里头藏着可怕的东西。<page>用不着小心！跟着信仰往前走就对了！
translated_text: 红女孩！亲爱的姐姐！终于，我们伟大的朝圣之旅结束了！<page>我们的信仰从未动摇过，现在这里等待着我们光荣的回报，闪亮的城堡！大家齐声唱歌！<hpage>我不会告诉你回去，因为我知道你不会回去，但我敦促你至少要谨慎。小朝圣者，这座城堡里潜伏着一些可怕的东西。<page>哦，姐姐！没有必要谨慎或恐惧。让我们在信仰的指引下前进！
secondary_translated_text: Red girl! Dear sister! Finally, our great pilgrimage is over!<page>Our faith has never wavered, and now here awaits our glorious reward, the shining castle! Everyone sang in unison!<hpage>I won't tell you to go back because I know you won't, but I urge you to at least be cautious. Little pilgrim, there is something terrible lurking in this castle.<page>Oh, sister! There is no need for caution or fear. Let us move forward under the guidance of faith!

original_en_text: This vein of gilded bells creates an effectively defended settlement. I can see it once gave a long time of peace to its bugs.<page>And yet, look at their numbers now. Stricken by cursed thread. Only a few have survived.<page>We must learn from them, Child Wielding Needle. Peace is a slow poison that would wither even the hardiest bug.
original_zh_text: 这金钟钟脉易守难攻，以前肯定十分安全。<page>看看现在，大半被丝咒侵蚀了，虫民也所剩寥寥。<page>要从这镇子上吸取教训，使针的小姑娘。安逸最腐蚀虫心。
translated_text: 这些镀金的钟声构成了有效的防御解决方案。我可以看出它曾经给了它的虫子很长一段时间的平静。<page>然而，看看他们目前的数字。被诅咒的线困住了。只有少数人幸存下来。<page>我们必须向他们学习，孩子针。和平是一种缓慢的毒药，即使是最顽强的昆虫，它也会蔓延开来。
secondary_translated_text: These gilded bells constitute an effective defensive solution. I can see it once gave its bugs a long period of peace.<page>However, look at their current numbers. Trapped by the cursed thread. Only a few survived.<page>We must learn from them, children. Peace is a slow poison that spreads even the most tenacious insects.

original_en_text: <hpage>Your camp here looks comfortably set, Shakra. Are you planning to stay a time?<page>Perhaps, yes. This heart-home makes a fine base for now and later if needed.<page>Still! I must take care not to rest overlong. My shell would soften and my senses dull.<page>
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉，我瞧你营地布置得不错，打算长住？<page>或许吧，这镇子看来能暂时当个据点。<page> 但不能久待，会钝了爪子和脑子。
translated_text: <hpage>沙克拉，你的营地看起来很舒服。您打算住一段时间吗？<page>也许，是的。如果需要的话，这个心脏之家现在和未来都是一个良好的基地。<page>仍然！我必须小心，不要休息太久。我的外壳会软化，我的感官会迟钝。<page>
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Shakra, your camp looks comfortable. Do you plan to stay for a while?<page>Maybe, yes. This Heart Home is and will be a good base if needed.<page>Still! I must be careful not to rest too long. My shell will soften and my senses will dull.<page>

original_en_text: Oh, hullo again! This time, I most certainly do recognise you! ‘Tis a pleasure to bump into you here, deep in this serene wood.<page>Do you have a name, like I do? Would you share it with me?<hpage>Certainly, sir. I am Hornet.<hpage>I notice you gazing at the buds above us... are they familiar to you, perhaps?<page>Hm? No, not at all. Very beautiful though! Perhaps I should gather some up before venturing on...
original_zh_text: 又见面了！这次绝对认得你！能在这林中深处偶遇也是缘分。<page>能告诉我你的名字吗？<hpage>我名为大黄蜂。<hpage>你在看那些苍白花苞……莫非曾经见过？<page>那倒没有，但它们很美！出发前或许该采些带着……
translated_text: 哦，我们又来了！这次我绝对认出你了！“很高兴在这片宁静的森林深处见到你。<page>你有和我一样的名字吗？你想和我分享一下吗？<hpage>当然可以先生.我是大黄蜂。<hpage>我注意到你盯着我们头顶上的花蕾.也许你对他们很熟悉？<page>嗯？一点也不，但非常漂亮！也许我应该在冒险之前收集一些……
secondary_translated_text: Oh, here we go again! I definitely recognized you this time! "It's nice to see you deep in this peaceful forest.<page>Do you have the same name as mine? Do you want to share it with me?<hpage>certainly, Sir. I am a bumblebee.<hpage>I noticed you staring at the buds above our heads. Maybe you are familiar with them?<page>Hmm? Not at all, but very beautiful! Maybe I should collect some before taking the risk...

original_en_text: You can use these to mark places of importance or reminders on your map.<br><br>These markers I have modelled after the sheen of my own shell. Perhaps you will think of me when you use them.
original_zh_text: 你可以用这个在地图上标记重要地点或提醒事项。<br><br>按我的壳抛光做的，用的时候会想起我吧？
translated_text: 您可以使用这些标记地图上的重要地点或提醒。<br><br>我做这些标记是为了模仿我自己壳的光泽。也许你在使用它们的时候会想起我。
secondary_translated_text: You can use these to mark important places or reminders on the map.<br><br>I made these marks to imitate the shine of my own shell. Maybe you will think of me when using them.

original_en_text: There are signs that pilgrims once travelled even these crumbling paths, long ago. Now only the voracious worms nest here.
original_zh_text: 这破路早年也有朝圣者走，现在只剩贪吃蠕虫。
translated_text: 有迹象表明，很久以前，朝圣者甚至会走过这些摇摇欲坠的道路。现在只有贪婪的蠕虫在这里筑巢。
secondary_translated_text: There are signs that long ago, pilgrims would even walk these crumbling roads. Now only greedy worms nest here.

original_en_text: Hoi! Nimble bug! Surely you have reconsidered? Let us discover our limits together!
original_zh_text: 嘿！改变主意没？来一起突破极限！
translated_text: 嘿！聪明的错误！你确定你已经重新考虑过了吗？让我们一起发现自己的极限！
secondary_translated_text: Hey! Smart mistake! Are you sure you've reconsidered it? Let us discover our limits together!

original_en_text: You have purchased the last of my mapping stock, for now. Stay alive on your journey, and when our paths next cross we may trade again.
original_zh_text: 你把我的货买光啦，小姑娘。多保重，下次碰面再做交易。
translated_text: 目前，您已经购买了我的最后一批地图库存。在旅程中保持活力，下次我们相遇时可能会再次进行交易。
secondary_translated_text: So far, you have purchased the last batch of my maps in stock. Stay alive on the journey and may trade again the next time we meet.

original_en_text: Don’t be lingerin’ here too long! We got snitchin’ to do and we ain’t keen on company!
original_zh_text: 别在这儿磨蹭太久！我们还要干活呢，不欢迎围观！
translated_text: 别在这里呆太久！我们想举报，但我们不热衷于陪伴！
secondary_translated_text: Don't stay here too long! We want to report it, but we are not keen on companionship!

original_en_text: If you venture further and higher into these caverns, beware. The sickly air only grows thicker.
original_zh_text: 如果你要往高处的话，走小心，那儿的瘴气更浓。
translated_text: 如果您冒险进入这些洞穴，请小心。病态的空气只会变得更浓。
secondary_translated_text: If you venture into these caves, be careful. The sick air will only get thicker.

original_en_text: I’ll be off soon, once I’m good and rested. Beyond the wood lies the final climb, and then at last we shall reach the Citadel!<page>Which of us will reach the Grand Gate first? If it’s me, I shall wait for you so we can enter together!
original_zh_text: 歇够了我就出发，穿过甲木林就是最后攀登，圣堡就在眼前！<page>看我们谁先到巨门？要是我先到，肯定会等你一起进去！
translated_text: 一旦我状态好并休息好，我就会很快离开。树林后面是最后一次攀登，然后我们终于到达了城堡！<page>我们中谁会先到达大门？如果是我，我会等你，然后我们一起进去！
secondary_translated_text: As soon as I'm in shape and rested, I'll be gone. Behind the trees was the last climb, and then we finally reached the castle!<page>Which one of us will get to the gate first? If it were me, I would wait for you, and then we would go in together!

original_en_text: If you would fight alone, I will say nothing more.
original_zh_text: 你要自己上的话，我也没意见。
translated_text: 如果你愿意独自战斗，我就不再多说了。
secondary_translated_text: If you're willing to fight alone, I won't say anything more.

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair meeting again, sir knight. I see this bell has drawn you too towards its safety.<page>Who would have guessed, sister! A safe corner, hidden so high atop Pharloom’s cursed crown!<page>Our fair village may have fallen, but for these fellows... these scared few, our honour charges us to keep them safe. Our hornlance shall raise for them! After some rest, of course.<hpage>Hold fast to your new charge, Garmond. See these bugs survive, and know I aim, in time near, to cut down this curse at its core.
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了，骑士。看来这钟也把你吸引过来了。<page>谁能想到呢，圣堡顶上还有避难所！<page>村子没了，但这些吓坏了的……为了荣耀，我会拿起长枪保护好他们！不过得先歇会。<hpage>守好他们，加蒙德。我会斩断诅咒的核心，不会让你等太久的。
translated_text: <hpage>又是一次公平的会面，骑士爵士。我看到这个钟声也吸引你注意它的安全性。<page>谁能猜到，姐姐！一个隐藏在法罗被诅咒的王冠上方的安全角落！<page>我们美丽的村庄可能已经陷落，但对于这些家伙来说。我们的荣誉要求我们确保这些令人恐惧的少数人的安全。我们的号角将为他们吹响！当然，休息一会儿之后。<hpage>紧紧抓住你的新冲锋，加蒙德。看到这些错误幸存下来，并知道我的目标是在不久的将来基本上消除这个诅咒。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Another fair meeting, sir knight. I see this bell also attracts your attention to its safety.<page>Who can guess, sister! A safe corner hidden above Farrow's cursed crown!<page>Our beautiful village may have fallen, but for these guys. Our honor requires us to ensure the safety of these feared few. Our clarion horn will be sounded for them! Of course, after a short rest.<hpage>Hold tight to your new charge, Gamond. Seeing these mistakes survive and knowing that my goal is to basically eliminate the curse in the near future.

original_en_text: O-hoho! Into Grindle’s pockets they go! And for you, a secret to remember us by...<page>Beneath here and further on, the burly bellheads have a big, hot, gleaming hive! Full of all sorts of tasty snitchables!<page>But there’s this big gate they got down in its belly... shut tight, locked up. If you could wriggle through, you’d get your claws on all kindsa goodies!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！都进我们的口袋啦！那就送你个秘密当纪念……<page>底下更深的地方，那些钟头怪物有个又大又亮的宝库！全是好东西！<page>但最底下有道大门被锁死了。要是能溜进去就发啦！
translated_text: 哦嗬嗬！他们进了格林德尔的口袋！对你来说，一个能记住我们秘密的人。<page>在这里和其他地方，在这喧嚣的时刻，有一个又大又热、闪闪发光的蜂巢！充满了美味的举报人！<page>但他们在它的肚子里放了一扇门……紧紧地关着，锁着。如果你能蠕动过去，你的爪子就会抓住一切！
secondary_translated_text: Oh ho ho! They're in Greendale's pocket! For you, someone who can remember our secrets.<page>Here and elsewhere, in this noisy moment, there is a big, hot, shining beehive! Full of delicious whistleblowers!<page>But they put a door in its belly... tightly closed, locked. If you can wriggle over, your claws will grab everything!

original_en_text: You see this idol before us, red maiden? I have passed its like before, they mark our pilgrimage well.<page>If we sing to it, a miraculous shrine will rise from the ground, and we will have a place to rest! Such a wonder!<hpage>I suspect it is not song that rouses this shrine, but payment in rosaries.<hpage>I have encountered similar constructs on Pharloom’s paths. It seems this kingdom does not grant rest lightly.
original_zh_text: 看见这圣像了吗？沿途都有标记。<page>对着它歌唱，圣椅就会升起供我们歇息！多神奇！<hpage>我认为唤醒长椅的不是歌声，谢尔玛，而是念珠。<hpage>我在路上曾遇到过此类长椅，看来纺络从不轻易施恩。
translated_text: 你看到我们面前的这个偶像红女孩了吗？我和以前一样经历过，他们很好地标记了我们的朝圣之旅。<page>如果我们对着它唱歌，一座神奇的寺庙就会升起，我们就有地方休息了！多么奇迹啊！<hpage>我怀疑唤醒这座寺庙的不是歌声，而是念珠的奖励。<hpage>我在Farham的路上遇到过类似的建筑。看来这个王国并不容易安息。
secondary_translated_text: Do you see this idol red girl in front of us? I have experienced it as before, and they marked our pilgrimage well.<page>If we sing to it, a magical temple will rise and we will have a place to rest! What a miracle!<hpage>I suspect that what awakened this temple was not the song, but the reward of the rosary beads.<hpage>I have encountered similar buildings on the road to Farham. It seems that the kingdom did not rest easily.

original_en_text: O-hoho! Into Grindle’s pockets they go! And for you, a secret to remember us by...<page>There’s lots of pickings round here, right? Well, it’s all nothing compared to what they got hidden up, up above us. The great big Sitty-del they calls it!<page>A golden place, groaning with goodies! Could never steal it all in a thousand snitch-bug lifetimes they reckon!<page>Oh yes, that’s where ol’ Grindle is headin’. Don’t you dare follow us, though! We want it all for us-selves!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！都进我们的口袋啦！那就送你个秘密当纪念……<page>这附近好东西不少对吧？但跟上边的圣堡比，什么都不是！<page>听说那是金山银山，几辈子都掏不完！<page>格林德尔这就去捞个够！你可别跟来抢！
translated_text: 哦嗬嗬！他们进了格林德尔的口袋！对你来说，一个能记住我们秘密的人。<page>这里有很多采摘，对吧？好吧，与他们隐藏在我们头顶上的东西相比，这算不了什么。他们称之为伟大的西蒂德尔！<page>一个充满美丽呻吟的金色地方！他们相信举报人一千辈子都不可能偷走这一切！<page>哦，是的，这就是“Grindle”的目的地。但你敢跟着我们！我们希望这一切都是我们的！
secondary_translated_text: Oh ho ho! They're in Greendale's pocket! For you, someone who can remember our secrets.<page>There's a lot of picking here, right? Well, this is nothing compared to what they hide above our heads. They call it the great Sitidel!<page>A golden place full of beautiful groans! They believe that the whistleblower will never be able to steal all this in a thousand lifetimes!<page>Oh, yes, this is the destination of "Grindle". But you dare to follow us! We want it all to be ours!

original_en_text: O-hoho! Into Grindle’s pockets they go! And for you, a secret to remember us by...<page>You know where all them dreary raggedies are camping? Back near the ol’ chapel? Well, beyond that chapel is a dirty great grave!<page>Not much in there but husks, right? But but! My sniffer tells me there’s something worth the trouble buried down at the bottom!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！都进我们的口袋啦！那就送你个秘密当纪念……<page>你知道那处破破烂烂的朝圣者营地吧？那附近的破教堂后头有个大坟场！<page>那乍一看都是尸壳对吧？但是但是！我能嗅到底下埋着值钱货，我鼻子灵得很！
translated_text: 哦嗬嗬！他们进了格林德尔的口袋对你来说，一个能记住我们秘密的人。<page>你知道那些沉闷的废话在哪里露营吗？回到老教堂？嗯，那座教堂后面是一座肮脏的坟墓！<page>里面什么也没有，只有贝壳，对吧？但是但是！我的嗅探器告诉我底部埋着一些值得担心的东西！
secondary_translated_text: Oh ho ho! They're in Greendale's pockets. To you, someone who can remember our secrets.<page>Do you know where that dreary crap camps? Back to the old church? Well, behind that church is a filthy tomb!<page>There's nothing in it but shells, right? But but! My sniffer tells me there is something to worry about buried in the bottom!

original_en_text: <hpage>The groaning docks, beyond the caverns of bone. There I have seen a vessel able to pass below, a heavy bell built for descent.<hpage>I need only gain access, and an operator to assist. I will investigate the docks, and uncover the means.<page=M>You’d be the first in an age to dive so deep, Old One. That space below remains long unseen, even to our family. <hpage>For those depths, I am more prepared than most. I will reach the base of this land, and know the truth of the new disaster we, together have wrought.
original_zh_text: <hpage>穿越骸骨洞窟，那锈蚀的深坞中停着一口沉钟，专为下潜打造。<hpage>只需寻得入口与操钟人。我会探查深坞，找出通路。<page=M>古老者，您是数个纪元以来第一个敢下潜的。那片黑暗连我们家族都未曾窥见。<hpage>对于深渊，我早有准备。我会抵达此地根基，看清你我共酿的新灾祸。
translated_text: <hpage>骨头洞外呻吟的码头。我看到那里有一艘船可以从下面通过，这是一个为下降而建造的沉重的钟声。<hpage>我只需要访问权限和接线员来协助。我会调查码头并找到方法。<page=M>老头子，你将是这个时代第一个潜得这么深的人。下面的空间一直是未知的，即使是我们的家人。<hpage>对于这些深度，我比大多数人做好了更充分的准备。我将到达这片土地的底部，了解我们共同造成的新灾难的真相。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>The groaning dock outside the bone hole. I saw there was a ship there that could pass below, a heavy bell built to descend.<hpage>I just need access and an operator to assist. I'll investigate the docks and find a way.<page=M>Old man, you will be the first person in this era to dive so deeply. The space below has always been unknown, even for our families.<hpage>I am better prepared for these depths than most people. I will reach the bottom of this land and learn the truth about the new disaster we have caused together.

original_en_text: Why does it fade? Why can I not recall that sacred place?
original_zh_text: 为什么消失了……为什么想不起圣地模样……
translated_text: 为什么它会褪色？为什么我想不起那个神圣的地方了？
secondary_translated_text: Why does it fade? Why can't I remember that sacred place?

original_en_text: <hpage>Here you lie, monarch. Sunk so deep, yet still you cling to life. <hpage>Would you let your lands be choked black... to protect just her?
original_zh_text: <hpage>苍白之主，沉沦至此也要苟活么？<hpage>你宁愿让纺络被黑暗吞噬……只为护着她？
translated_text: <hpage>主啊，你躺在这里。沉得这么深，但你仍然坚守着生命。<hpage>你会窒息你的土地吗……只是为了保护她？
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Lord, you lie here. Sinking so deep, but you still hold on to life.<hpage>Would you suffocate your land... just to protect it?

original_en_text: <hpage>Take care, Garmond. Whatever dangers these lands present, I’m sure what waits in that Citadel will be worse.<page>Aye, sister! Until that Citadel is reached and justice is served, Zaza and I shall not fall.
original_zh_text: <hpage>保重，加蒙德。圣堡必然比外面更加危险。<page>你也保重，姐妹！不跟圣堡之主讨个公道，我和扎扎不会倒下的！
translated_text: <hpage>保重，加蒙德。无论这些土地上有什么危险，我相信城堡里等待的将会更糟。<page>是的，姐姐！在到达堡垒并伸张正义之前，扎扎和我不会倒下。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Take care, Gamond. Whatever dangers lie in these lands, I believe what awaits in the castle will be worse.<page>Yes, sister! Zaza and I will not fall until we reach the fortress and justice is done.

original_en_text: Letting you live was my rebellion, spider. I’ve denied my mother your silken strength. I’ve won.<page>She can thrash, and waste, and know her pathetic, broken child caused the mortal wound.<page>Rejoice! And let it all come down.<hpage>I will not. I have already stood the sentinel for one dying land. That role... I will never play again.<hpage>While I live, and possess the strength to resist, this kingdom, and the bugs within it, shall not fall.
original_zh_text: 留着你的性命就是我的反叛。母亲得不到你的灵丝，是我赢了。<page>让她抓狂吧！知道是我这残次品带给她致命伤！<page>欢呼吧！一切都将崩塌！<hpage>恕难从命。我曾守望过一个将死的国度，同样的角色……我不想再扮第二次。<hpage>只要我还活着，还有力气反抗，这个王国与其子民就不会陨落。
translated_text: 让你活下去是我的抵抗，蜘蛛。我没有给我母亲你丝滑的力量。我赢了<page>她可以鞭打、浪费，并知道她悲伤、破碎的孩子造成了致命的伤害。<page>开心点！让一切都下来吧。<hpage>我不会的我已成为垂死之地的哨兵。这个角色。我再也不会玩了。<hpage>只要我活着，有力量抵抗，这个王国和其中的昆虫就不会陷落。
secondary_translated_text: Letting you live is my resistance, spider. I didn't give my mother your silky strength. I win<page>She can whip, waste, and know that her sad, broken child has done fatal harm.<page>Be happy! Let everything come down.<hpage>I won't. I've become a sentry in a dying place. This role. I will never play again.<hpage>As long as I live and have the strength to resist, this kingdom and the insects within it will not fall.

original_en_text: Hahahhaa! Spider. Spider. What a marvellous specimen you are! You fight and fight, heedless as the world crumbles around you.<page>Pharloom and her bugs will be crushed to dust, and still you’ll be vainly swinging your blade.<hpage>...There may still be a way to prevent that fate. I will claim the hidden power, the bloom that repels the dark.<hpage>Those snails share some fault in the snare, and their callous use of the void. They shall help me now to seek its counter.<hpage>I will return, child, when I bear the strength to dive below, and cut this land finally free of your mother’s grasp.
original_zh_text: 哈哈哈哈！顽固的小蜘蛛！即便你继续挣扎，这个世界一样会崩塌！<page>一切都将化为尘埃，继续挥舞那针刃还有什么用<hpage>……或许还有转机。我会取得驱散黑暗的永绽花。<hpage>蜗牛一族滥用虚空难辞其咎，现在它们得帮我找到破局之法。<hpage>等我取得力量，就来斩断你母亲的掌控。
translated_text: 哈哈哈哈！蜘蛛蜘蛛，你真是个好榜样！当你周围的世界崩溃时，你会在不知不觉中战斗和战斗。<page>法鲁和她的虫子会被碾成灰尘，而你仍然徒劳地挥舞着你的刀片。<hpage>...也许仍然有办法防止这种命运。我将拥有隐藏的力量并拒绝黑暗之花。<hpage>这些蜗牛的陷阱也有一些缺点，它们对虚空的无情利用。现在他们将帮助我找到它的反击。<hpage>孩子，当我有力量潜入大海，最终将这片土地从你母亲手中解放出来时，我就会回来。
secondary_translated_text: Hahahaha! Spider Spider, you are a good role model! When the world around you collapses, you fight and fight without realizing it.<page>Faro and her bugs will be crushed to dust while you still wiggle your blade in vain.<hpage>... There may still be ways to prevent this fate. I will have hidden powers and reject the flower of darkness.<hpage>These snail traps also have some drawbacks, their ruthless use of the void. Now they will help me find its counterattack.<hpage>Child, when I have the strength to dive into the sea and finally liberate this land from your mother, I will come back.

original_en_text: After some tasty goodies? We never say no to a fair trade, heh heh! Take a look at what we’s got...
original_zh_text: 想要宝贝？只接受公平交易！随便看看吧……
translated_text: 吃完好吃的东西后？我们从不对公平贸易说不，嘿!让我们看看我们有什么。
secondary_translated_text: After eating delicious food? We never say no to fair trade, hey! Let's see what we have.

original_en_text: We could add a little pocket to yer tool pouch for you. You could pack even more goodies in there! All your shards’n sharp things!
original_zh_text: 给你工具包加个兜，能多装点好宝贝。
translated_text: 我们可以在您的工具包中添加一个小口袋。你可以把更多好东西放进去!你所有的碎片都是锋利的东西!
secondary_translated_text: We can add a small pocket to your kit. You can put more good things in it! All your fragments are sharp things!

original_en_text: <hpage>Shakra, if I may, I’d ask a small task of your carving talents.<hpage>Within the halls of the Citadel, I encountered a means of travel new to me, a network of pipes traversed in vessels propelled by steam and air.<hpage>That Citadel is a labyrinth, and pins to mark each station would prove useful to me.<page>What you describe sounds as hideous and unnatural as anything in that place. Still, if it will aid you, I shall craft the pins.<page>Seek me at a moment not long from now. The pins will be carved, and we may trade.
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉，方便的话，借你的手艺办件小事。<hpage>圣堡里有种我没见过的蒸汽管道交通网。<hpage>但那跟一座迷宫一样，因此我需要标记站点的图钉。<page>圣堡里都是这种难看又不自然的玩意。但你要就给你做吧。<page>过阵子再来找我，图钉做好了才能交易。
translated_text: <hpage>夏克拉，如果可以的话，我想请你的雕刻天赋完成一个小任务。<hpage>在城堡的大厅里，我遇到了一种我不熟悉的旅行方式，一个由蒸汽和空气推动的船只通过的管道网络。<hpage>城堡就像一个迷宫，标记每个车站的别针对我来说都很有用。<page>你所描述的听起来和那个地方的任何东西一样可怕和不自然。但如果对你有帮助，我会做别针。<page>尽快找到我。别针将被雕刻，我们可以交易它们。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Shakla, if it's okay, I'd like to ask your carving talent to complete a small task.<hpage>In the castle's lobby, I encountered an unfamiliar way of travel, a network of pipes through which ships propelled by steam and air pass.<hpage>The castle is like a maze, and the pins marking each station are useful to me.<page>What you describe sounds as scary and unnatural as anything in that place. But if it helps you, I'll make pins.<page>Find me as soon as possible. The pins will be carved and we can trade them.

original_en_text: These overgrown caves offer little challenge to a skilled warrior. A place for reflection, perhaps.
original_zh_text: 这长满苔藓的洞穴对高手没挑战性，适合发呆。
translated_text: 这些杂草丛生的洞穴对熟练的士兵来说几乎没有什么挑战。也许是一个反思的地方。
secondary_translated_text: These weed-overgrown caves pose few challenges for skilled soldiers. Perhaps a place for reflection.

original_en_text: Fear not, red maiden! This shrine will surely rise for us, we only need to patiently wish for it!
original_zh_text: 别担心！只要诚心祈愿，圣椅定会为我们显现！
translated_text: 别害怕，红女孩!这个圣地一定会为我们崛起，我们只需要耐心地祝愿它!
secondary_translated_text: Don't be afraid, red girl! This holy land will definitely rise for us, we just need to patiently wish it!

original_en_text: <page=M>In the heights of the great wood, nestled deep in its roots, vines and branches, find the one who sowed the first seed.<page=S>They’re the very essence of the place, the nub of it all. Ain’t really a bug, to be told, but a powerful presence nonetheless.<page=M>We’d heard the Citadel once made grudging accord with that creature, sent their servants in reverence, even built a shrine up there somewhere. Maybe it’s worth you searching for it?
original_zh_text: <page=M>甲木林最深处，根枝藤蔓之间，埋着最初播种者。<page=S>那是纺络的精华所在，虽算不得虫子，但也十分强大。<page=M>听说圣堡曾与之立约，建造圣所供奉，还派遣仆从侍奉。或许值得一探？
translated_text: <page=M>在森林的高处，在根部、藤蔓和树枝的深处，找到播下第一粒种子的人。<page=S>他们是这个地方的本质，也是一切的核心。我要说的是，这不是一个真正的错误，但它仍然是一个强大的存在。<page=M>我们听说城堡曾经与这个生物达成了不情愿的协议，派仆人去吊唁，甚至在那里的某个地方建了一座寺庙。也许值得寻找？
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>High in the forest, deep in the roots, vines and branches, find the person who sown the first seed.<page=S>They are the essence of this place and the core of everything. All I would say is that this is not a real mistake, but it is still a powerful presence.<page=M>We heard that the castle once made a reluctant agreement with the creature, sent servants to pay condolences, and even built a temple somewhere there. Maybe it's worth looking for?

original_en_text: Old roads and passages overrun by roaches and their keepers. The ways are covered thick with filth.
original_zh_text: 被蟑螂及其饲主侵占的古道，路面上覆满污秽。
translated_text: 古老的道路和通道被蟑螂及其饲养员占据。路上全是脏东西。
secondary_translated_text: Ancient roads and passages are occupied by roaches and their keepers. The road is full of dirt.

original_en_text: In this moment, I have no more items to trade. Perhaps, if we meet again on the roads ahead, I shall have crafted new goods to sell.
original_zh_text: 暂时没货了，小姑娘。下次碰面会准备好新玩意的，保重。
translated_text: 目前，我没有更多的物品可以交易。也许以后我们在路上再见面，我会制作新产品来卖。
secondary_translated_text: Currently, I have no more items to trade. Maybe when we meet again on the road in the future, I will make new products to sell.

original_en_text: You like this gleaming spinner I snitched from the big Sitty-dell? There’s a way to make it sing to you, or so they says!
original_zh_text: 从圣堡顺来的转轮！据说用某种方法能让它唱歌呢！
translated_text: 你喜欢我从锡蒂代尔大教堂举报的这个闪亮的旋转器吗？有一种方法可以让它为你歌唱，至少他们是这么说的！
secondary_translated_text: Do you like this shiny spinner I reported from Sitidale Cathedral? There is a way to make it sing for you, at least that's what they say!

original_en_text: You can use these to mark places of importance or reminders on your map.<br><br>This dark-shell material is cold to the touch, and more resilient than it looks.
original_zh_text: 你可以用这个在地图上标记重要地点或提醒事项。<br><br>黑壳材质冷冰冰的，比看着结实。
translated_text: 您可以使用这些标记地图上的重要地点或提醒。<br><br>这种深壳材料感觉很冷，而且比看起来更有弹性。
secondary_translated_text: You can use these to mark important places or reminders on the map.<br><br>This deep-shell material feels cold and is more elastic than it looks.

original_en_text: Crumbling roads built upon the shells of ancient bugs. All of Pharloom rests upon these fragile foundations.
original_zh_text: 建在古虫壳上的破路，整个纺络都靠这些脆架子撑着。
translated_text: 这条摇摇欲坠的道路是建在古代昆虫的壳上的。整个法鲁都建立在这些脆弱的基础上。
secondary_translated_text: This crumbling road was built on the shells of ancient insects. The whole of Faro is built on these fragile foundations.

original_en_text: Crusted heights above those howling steps. Signs suggest great warriors once ruled this winding place, though the sand has eroded much of their mark.
original_zh_text: 风蚀台阶上的矿脉高地。迹象表明曾有强族统治，现已被沙尘掩埋。
translated_text: 轰鸣的台阶顶部布满了硬皮。有迹象表明，伟大的战士曾经统治过这个蜿蜒的地方，尽管沙子已经侵蚀了他们的大部分印记。
secondary_translated_text: The top of the roaring steps was covered with crust. There are signs that great warriors once ruled this meandering place, although the sand has eroded most of their mark.

original_en_text: <hpage>To search these lands so thoroughly, Shakra... I wonder, who is it you hope to find?<page>Okklu-Din... a perceptive question. I travel in search of my mentor, the greatest of my tribe. I have followed her trail throughout this kingdom, but have so far failed to catch her.<page>She will have travelled much farther by now, but if I keep moving and stay vigilant, we shall reunite.
original_zh_text: <hpage>又见面了。我看你把这片地区都找遍了……你到底在找谁？<page>唉……问得好。我在找导师，我们部落的最强者。我追着她的踪迹跑遍了王国，还是没找到。<page>她肯定走得更远了，但只要保持警惕总能重逢。
translated_text: <hpage>彻底搜查了这片土地，夏克拉。我想知道，你希望找到谁？<page>奥克鲁丁很有见地的问题。我旅行是为了寻找我的导师，我部落中最伟大的导师。我在这个王国里跟随她，但到目前为止我还没有抓住她。<page>她现在走得更远了，但如果我继续前进并保持警惕，我们就会团聚。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Searching the land thoroughly, Shakla. I want to know, who do you hope to find?<page>Okrudin's insightful question. I travel to find my mentor, the greatest mentor in my tribe. I have followed her in this kingdom, but so far I have not caught her.<page>She's gone further now, but if I keep moving and stay vigilant, we'll be reunited.

original_en_text: The stone structures of this place suggest clear waters once ran throughout.<page>What fantasy that now seems! Even this swamp’s inhabitants seem spawned of its noxious nature.
original_zh_text: 这里的石制结构说明以前有清水流过。<page>现在呢？连原本栖居在这里的虫都像是从毒瘴里孕育出来的。
translated_text: 这个地方的石头结构表明曾经有清水流过。<page>现在看来是多么幻想啊！就连这片沼泽中的人们似乎也是因为它的有毒性质而崛起的。
secondary_translated_text: The stone structure of this place suggests clear water once flowed through it.<page>What a fantasy it seems now! Even the people in this swamp seem to have risen because of its toxic nature.

original_en_text: But look here! As soon as our sacred journey begins, we are tested. This huge gate stands between us and the way forward.<page>Only holy prayer and song will open the way! In this kingdom, even mighty bone is moved by music!
original_zh_text: 可你看看！朝圣之路刚启程就遇到考验，被这道巨大骨门拦住了去路。<page>唯有圣歌能够撼动它！在纺络，最顽固的骨头都会为旋律让道！
translated_text: 但是看这里！当我们的神圣旅程开始时，我们将接受考验。这扇巨大的门挡住了我们和前进的道路。<page>只有神圣的祈祷和歌曲才能开辟道路！在这个王国里，即使是强壮的骨头也会被音乐感动！
secondary_translated_text: But look here! When our sacred journey begins, we will be tested. This huge door blocks us and our way forward.<page>Only sacred prayers and songs can open the way! In this kingdom, even the strong bones are moved by music!

original_en_text: You win again! Never have I met a luckier pilgrim...<hpage>You mistake, sir. It was skill that won me this game. One must be careful not to rely merely on luck.<page>Hmph. Fairly said, sister.<page>I must confess something though. Truth is, I already lost the last of my rosaries. I can’t pay our last wager.<page>I do have something small for you, at least. These dice. They certainly seem to have taken a liking to you. Take them, in memory of our meeting.
original_zh_text: 你又赢了！没见过运气这么好的朝圣者……<hpage>错了，我是靠技术赢的，别光指望运气。<page>哼，倒也说得在理。<page>其实……我已经输光家底了。最后这把的赌注我给不起。<page>但我可以把这些小玩意送你。这对骰子跟你有缘，收下当纪念吧。
translated_text: 你又赢了！我从未见过如此幸运的朝圣者..<hpage>您错了，先生。正是技术让我赢得了这场比赛。必须小心，不要仅仅依靠运气。<page>哈你说得好，姐姐。<page>但我必须承认一些事情。事实是，我丢失了我的最后一本念珠书。我没能支付我们最后的赌注。<page>至少我确实有一些小东西给你。他们似乎真的很喜欢这些骰子上的你。带他们来纪念我们的相遇。
secondary_translated_text: You win again! I have never seen such a lucky pilgrim..<hpage>You are wrong, sir. It was technology that allowed me to win this game. You must be careful not to rely solely on luck.<page>Well said, sister.<page>But I have to admit something. The truth is, I lost my last rosary book. I couldn't pay our last bet.<page>At least I do have something little for you. They really seem to like you on these dice. Bring them to commemorate our meeting.

original_en_text: <page>Who are you hoping you’ll find down there, spider? An ailing child and a Silk starved beast? <page>If so, I’m afraid we may sorely disappoint. What waits below is me no longer.
original_zh_text: <page>小蜘蛛，你指望能在下面见到谁？虚弱的傀儡还是饥渴的空壳？<page>要让你失望了，在下面等着的早已不是我。
translated_text: <page>蜘蛛，你希望在那里找到谁？生病的孩子和饥饿的野兽？<page>如果是这样的话，恐怕我们可能会非常失望。不再是我在那里等待。
secondary_translated_text: <page>Spider, who do you hope to find there? Sick children and hungry beasts?<page>If this is the case, I'm afraid we may be very disappointed. I'm no longer waiting there.

original_en_text: Hoy, you’re still hanging around then? Quiet in here. Good for hidin’ out.<page>You gots the li’l clicky-clackies on you then, eh? The rolly-roundies? What the shops like to swap for?
original_zh_text: 哟，还在附近晃悠呢？这很安静，适合躲藏。<page>带叮当响了没？就是商店爱换的那种小圆珠？
translated_text: 嘿，你还在闲逛吗？这里很安静。适合隐藏。<page>所以你有叮当声，是吧？那些包子铺喜欢兑换什么？
secondary_translated_text: Hey, are you still hanging out? It's very quiet here. Suitable for hiding.<page>That's why you have jingles, right? What do those steamed bun shops like to exchange for?

original_en_text: You... So, it is done... My wish granted before ever I arrived...<hpage>The bronze pair that danced this chamber, it is clear, tall bug, how closely they mimicked your shell. Was it you who provided their inspiration?<page>Not I, warrior. For this place, my heart holds only loathing...<page>The dancers... they were the last free act of my partner... Always hopeful. Always naive.<page>His whole he gave, in desperate trade to see our own caves left safe. His shell and soul became the mould.<page>So long, I dared not visit... Even as our lands fell to thread and ruin... Instead I wasted, a coward caged, too weak to witness his grace bound in parody so cruel.<hpage>Take some solace, tall bug. His soul is now free from that shell of iron, and the fate that befell your lands, this Citadel too has been claimed full by it.<page>Aye... Slim consolation, warrior, now that everything I loved is lost...
original_zh_text: 你……这样啊……竟然在我抵达前就完成了……<hpage>厅里那对铜像，分明是照着你的模样铸的。是你给的灵感？<page>与我无关。对这地方……我只剩恶心……<page>舞者……是我伴侣最后的自由创作……他总是满怀天真与希望。<page>为保我们故土平安，他献出了全部。躯壳和灵魂都成了铸模。<page>这么久以来，我不敢来看……哪怕故土被丝咒吞噬……懦弱地困在牢里，不敢面对他的优雅被如此践踏……<hpage>宽心吧，至少现在他的灵魂挣脱铁壳了。你们故土遭受的厄运，圣堡也逃不过。<page>是啊……但这不过是无力的安慰……如今我爱的一切都化为乌有……
translated_text: 你...所以就这么定了在我到达之前，我的愿望实现了..<hpage>青铜搭档在这个房间里跳舞，非常清晰和高大，他们模仿你的贝壳有多接近。你为他们提供了灵感吗？<page>不是我，士兵。我只讨厌这个地方.<page>舞者。他们是我搭档最后的自由表演。总是充满希望。总是天真。<page>他付出了一切，不顾一切地想要获得我们自己洞穴的安全。他的身体和灵魂变成了一个模具。<page>这么久，我不敢看。即使我们的土地陷入困境，废墟……相反，我浪费了它，一个被关在笼子里的懦夫，太虚弱了，无法亲眼目睹他的优雅被如此残酷的模仿所束缚。<hpage>安慰一下吧，高虫子。他的灵魂现在已经摆脱了铁壳的束缚，它的命运降临到了你的土地上，这座城堡也被它占领了。<page>是的微薄的安慰，士兵，现在我所爱的一切都失去了……
secondary_translated_text: you... So it was settled. Before I arrived, my wish came true..<hpage>Bronze partners dance in this room, very clear and tall, and they imitate how close your shells are. Do you provide inspiration for them?<page>Not me, soldier. I just hate this place.<page>Dancers. They were my partner's last free act. Always full of hope. Always naive.<page>He gave everything, desperate to gain the safety of our own cave. His body and soul became a mold.<page>For so long, I dare not look. Even if our land was in trouble, ruins... instead, I wasted it, a coward in a cage, too weak to witness with my own eyes his grace bound by such cruel imitation.<hpage>Comfort yourself, Gao Bug. His soul has now been freed from the shackles of its iron shell, its fate has fallen on your land, and this castle has been occupied by it.<page>Yes, meager comfort, soldier, now that everything I love is lost...

original_en_text: <page=M>What’s this? That’s an unexpected heart you’re holding, Old One...<page=M>We can guess to its source, though we’d believed it long gone from these lands. <hpage>The heart of a graceful lord. In its taking I was able to witness his caves and kingdom as once they flourished.<hpage>A stunning sight. Unique. All gone... Lost to the pale monarch... and the system to keep her caged.
original_zh_text: <page=M>咦？这颗心出乎意料啊，古老者……<hpage>一位优雅领主的心。取心时我见到了其洞窟王国昔日繁盛景象。<hpage>真是瑰丽无双。但都消逝了……毁于苍白君主……以及囚困她的体系。
translated_text: <page=M>这是什么？老头，你手里拿着一颗意想不到的心……<page=M>我们可以猜测它的起源，尽管我们相信它早已离开这些土地了。<hpage>优雅领主的心。在拍摄过程中，我亲眼目睹了他的洞穴和王国曾经的繁荣。<hpage>令人惊叹的景象。独特.他们都走了。输给苍白的君主……以及将她关在笼子里的系统。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>What is this? Old man, you have an unexpected heart in your hand...<page=M>We can speculate on its origin, although we believe it has long left these lands.<hpage>Elegant lord's heart. During the filming, I witnessed firsthand the prosperity of his cave and kingdom.<hpage>An amazing sight. unique. They're all gone. Losing to the pale monarch... and the system that kept her in a cage.

original_en_text: A beat of rosaries is our wager. Once you find enough, I’d be happy to play.
original_zh_text: 赌注是一奏念珠。等你攒够了，我很乐意再陪你玩。
translated_text: 我们的赌注是一拍念珠。一旦你找到足够的东西，我很乐意玩。
secondary_translated_text: Our bet is a beat of rosary beads. Once you find enough things, I'm happy to play.

original_en_text: Nimble bug, you return refreshed! And so perfectly timed, for I have a new challenge prepared.<page>The course shall remain the same as last, but length, the laps, will greatly extend.<hpage>You propose a test of endurance? I have undertaken many in my time.<page>Excellent! Excellent! Though know, for this race, I can only provide slight reward for victory.<page>What say you, nimble bug? Let us stride fast forth!
original_zh_text: 你看起来状态绝佳！正好我准备了新的挑战！<page>赛道和上次一样，但长度、圈数大幅增加！<hpage>要比耐力？我平时可没少锻炼。<page>那太好了！不过这次如果你赢了，奖励价值或许不高。<page>怎么说？一起冲刺吧！
translated_text: 灵巧的昆虫，你精神抖擞地回来了！时机恰到好处，因为我准备好了新的挑战。<page>比赛将与上次相同，但长度（圈数）将大幅延长。<hpage>您建议测试耐力吗？我一生中做过很多事情。<page>太好了！太好了！虽然我知道对于这场比赛，我只能为胜利提供微薄的奖励。<page>你说呢，敏捷的错误？让我们大踏步前进！
secondary_translated_text: Dexterous insect, you are back full of energy! The timing was just right because I was ready for a new challenge.<page>The race will be the same as last time, but the length (number of laps) will be significantly extended.<hpage>Do you recommend testing endurance? I have done many things in my life.<page>Great! Great! Although I know that for this game, I can only provide a modest reward for victory.<page>What do you say, agile mistakes? Let us move forward in great strides!

original_en_text: <hpage>Another time, Shakra. I am always eager to learn, but for now my tasks call me away. <page>Bakelo! Answer to your tasks, then. My rings shall await your return.
original_zh_text: <hpage>改天吧。虽然想锻炼技艺，但要事在身。<page>吧咔咯！那忙你的去吧！我的战环随时恭候。
translated_text: <hpage>下次，夏克拉。我总是渴望学习，但现在我的使命召唤我离开了。<page>巴克洛，然后完成你的任务。我的戒指会等你回来。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Next time, Shakla. I always longed to learn, but now my duty calls me away.<page>Baklow, then complete your mission. My ring will be waiting for you to come back.

original_en_text: Gurrroo! Fellow warrior, if you are wishing to lock blades, know you stand before the honoured knight Garmond, and brave companion Zaza. Together we will face bold to any challenge!<hpage>I have no wish to fight you, sir bug. It is heartening to meet another on these roads of sound mind, and with fortitude enough to fight back against the haunted husks.<page>Aye! Too many, these unnatural opponents! We did hope Pharloom’s vast expanse would still possess some place free of that tainted thread. <page>Alas, so far we’ve encountered only violence and decay. We greatly fear the Haunting afflicts this kingdom all.
original_zh_text: 嘎噜！想打架？先报上名来！我乃荣耀骑士加蒙德，这位是忠仆扎扎！<hpage>没兴趣比武。只是难得能遇见敢反抗丝咒傀儡的清醒者。<page>是啊！到处都是被操控的傀儡！还以为纺络如此广袤，说不定能有片净土……<page>唉，结果走到哪都是腐烂和杀戮！这诅咒怕是蔓延全境了！
translated_text: 咕噜！战友们，如果你们想锁上剑，请知道你们站在受人尊敬的骑士加蒙德和他勇敢的同伴扎扎面前。我们将共同勇敢地面对任何挑战！<hpage>我不想和你打架，巴格先生。在这些理智的道路上遇到另一个人，他有足够的毅力来反击闹鬼的外壳，这是令人兴奋的。<page>是的！太多了，这些不自然的对手！我们确实希望法勒姆广阔的土地上仍然有一些没有污染线的地区。<page>唉，到目前为止我们只遇到了暴力和衰败。我们非常担心这种困扰会困扰这个王国的每个人。
secondary_translated_text: Gollum! Comrades, if you want to lock your swords, please know that you stand before the respected knight Gammond and his brave companion Zaza. We will face any challenge bravely together!<hpage>I don't want to fight with you, Mr. Bagger. It's exciting to meet another person on these sensible paths who has enough perseverance to fight back against the haunted shell.<page>Yes! Too many, these unnatural opponents! We do hope that there will still be some areas in the vast land of Farham that have no pollution lines.<page>Alas, so far we have only encountered violence and decay. We are very concerned that this obsession will haunt everyone in this kingdom.

original_en_text: Poshanka! Edges sharp and senses keen!<page>In my land, that is the way warriors greet each other. For though you are a child barely hatched, you are also a warrior. Your stance, your weapon, your movements all proclaim it so.<page>I am a navigator amongst my tribe, and have been making maps of these lands. I can trade them with you, and supplies, if you wish.
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔！握紧兵刃，保持警惕！<page>在我们部落，战士们都这么打招呼。虽然你看着像个刚破卵的娃娃，但架势、武器、动作都像个战士。<page>我是部落的测绘师，一直在画这里的地图。想要可以拿物资来换。
translated_text: 博尚卡！锋利的边缘和敏锐的感官！<page>在我的土地上，士兵们就是这样互相问候的。因为虽然你是一个刚孵化的孩子，但你也是一个战士。你的立场、你的武器和你的行动都表明了这一点。<page>我是部落的领航员，一直在绘制这些土地的地图。如果你愿意的话，我可以与你交换它们和物资。
secondary_translated_text: Boshanka! Sharp edges and keen senses!<page>This is how soldiers greet each other in my land. Because although you are a newly hatched child, you are also a soldier. Your stance, your weapons and your actions all show this.<page>I am the pilot of the tribe and have been mapping these lands. If you want, I can exchange them and supplies with you.

original_en_text: Rest below while you can. In the lands beyond these bells, it is rare to see such safety.
translated_text: 尽可能在那里休息。在这些钟声之外的土地上，如此安全的情况很少见。
secondary_translated_text: Rest there as much as possible. In the land beyond these bells, such security is rare.

original_en_text: <hpage>Child, if your wish is to gain learning of this land’s creatures, why not hunt them yourself?<page>Ma? Nuu, herself to hunt? No, no! Is not Nuu’s nature to hunt, is hers to come later and learn. Such is the way of things!<page>But you... a predator! Know it from your smells can clever Nuu! So Nuu asks you to cut and record, so we both may learn!
original_zh_text: <hpage>小丫头，想了解生物怎么不自己去抓？<page>啊？努努自己去？不行不行！努努的天职是研究，这是规矩！<page>但你……是掠食者！努努闻得出来！所以拜托你砍怪记录，我们一起学习！
translated_text: <hpage>孩子，如果你的愿望是了解这片土地上的生物，为什么不狩猎自己呢？<page>妈妈？努，她想狩猎自己吗？不，不！努的本性不是狩猎，而是以后学习。事情就是这样！<page>但是你--掠夺者！从你的气味就知道它可以很聪明Nuu！所以Nuu要求您编辑并录制它，以便我们都可以学习！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Boy, if your wish is to understand the creatures in this land, why not hunt yourself?<page>Mom? Nu, does she want to hunt herself? No, no! Nu's nature is not to hunt, but to learn later. This is the way it is!<page>But you-the predator! You know from your smell that it can be smart Nuu! So Nuu asks you to edit and record it so that we can all learn!

original_en_text: <hpage>Little pilgrim, these baths provide some respite from the dangers without, but there is a still safer place high on the other side of the Citadel.<hpage>A settlement has formed around the old shrine there. The bell housed within seems to provide some sanctuary from the dangers of the Haunting.<hpage>Your brother and sister pilgrims who now huddle around it would be glad of your company, I am sure.<page>Oh, how wonderful! Yes, I will make my way over there with haste... after I have bathed a little longer. I want to arrive fresh and clean to such a holy place!
original_zh_text: <hpage>小家伙，温泉虽然舒服，但圣堡另一边更安全。<hpage>老钟殿旁边有个新聚落，那里的钟声能抵御丝咒。<page>逃到那边的同伴肯定欢迎你。<page>太好了！等我泡舒服了就过去……拜见圣地前得收拾体面！
translated_text: <hpage>作为小朝圣者，这些浴场提供了一些减轻外界危险的机会，但在城堡的另一边，有一个更安全的地方。<hpage>那里的旧神殿周围已经形成了一个定居点。里面的钟似乎可以躲避闹鬼的危险。<hpage>我相信，现在挤在其中的朝圣者兄弟姐妹会很高兴有你的陪伴。<page>哦，太好了！是的，我马上就到.我洗完澡后。我想到达这样一个神圣的地方，清新干净！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>As small pilgrims, these baths provide some opportunities to mitigate dangers from the outside world, but on the other side of the castle, there is a safer place.<hpage>A settlement has formed around the old shrine there. The clocks inside seem to escape the dangers of haunting.<hpage>I am sure that the pilgrim brothers and sisters now crowded among them will be very happy to have your company.<page>Oh, great! Yes, I'll be right there. After I took a shower. I want to reach such a sacred place, fresh and clean!

original_en_text: You hold many charts, Child Wielding Needle. You should consider trading for a quill.<page>With a quill in claw, your maps can be further extended from your own travels. Record enough and you may, in time, come to know this kingdom all.
original_zh_text: 你身上的图纸不少，使针的小姑娘，该买支笔了。<page>带着笔就能边走边画。画够多了，迟早能摸清纺络的全貌。
translated_text: 你有很多图表，孩子挥舞着针。您应该考虑使用羽毛笔进行交易。<page>用你的爪子上的羽毛笔，你的地图可以从你自己的旅行进一步扩展。记录足够多，你就可以及时了解王国。
secondary_translated_text: You have a lot of charts, and children are waving needles. You should consider using a quill for trading.<page>With a quill on your paw, your map can be expanded further from your own travels. Keep enough records and you can learn about the kingdom in time.

original_en_text: Poshanka! Child Wielding Needle. You too have discovered this haven of bells.<page>For a long time, I avoided this place for sense of something strange. Now arrived, I find it free, and its few remaining residents offering trade and welcome.<hpage>I slew a tall creature above the town, a Weaver I suspect, though one twisted in purpose.<hpage>It was her you may have sensed. A formidable force, even aged. By voice and claw she aided, perhaps guided, the haunted thread that grasps these lands. <page>Weaver? Those vicious things. To our young we tell the tales, but had thought them long dead, only corpses bound in spires. <hpage>This one still lived, though if it was a Weaver, it was broken in a savage way.<hpage>Its own Silk was bound, pinned deep within its shell. A cruel punishment I’ve not before witnessed. <page>Even broken, my envy remains. A Weaver’s fabled skills... To meet one in combat means great challenge, and great pride in victory.
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔！使针的小姑娘。你也找到这镇子了？<page>之前总能察觉到这儿的古怪，就一直避开。现在诅咒没了，剩下的住民还挺热情。<hpage>我斩了镇子上头的高个怪物，像是个变异的织者。<page>你此前察觉到的应该就是它。是它用声音和利爪操控缠绕镇子的丝线，很难对付。<page>织者？那群老毒物！还以为早死绝了，只剩塔里的干尸。<hpage>这只还活着，但被折磨得不成样。<hpage>灵丝被钉在壳里，残忍的刑罚。<page>就算残了我也羡慕。织者的本事……能交手是幸运，能得胜更是荣耀。
translated_text: 博尚卡！孩子们挥舞着针。您还发现了这个钟声的避风港。<page>很长一段时间，我因为一些奇怪的感觉而回避这个地方。现在我已经到达了，我发现这里是免费的，剩下的少数居民也提供贸易和欢迎。<hpage>我在小镇上空杀死了一个高大的生物，我怀疑它是一个织布工，尽管它是故意扭曲的。<hpage>你可能已经感觉到了她。一种强大的力量，即使是在老年人身上也是如此。通过声音和爪子，她帮助，也许是引导，抓住这些土地上闹鬼的线索。<page>韦弗？那些恶毒的事情。我们给年轻人讲故事，但以为他们早就死了，尖塔上只有尸体。<hpage>这台还活着，尽管如果它是织机，它就会被野蛮地损坏。<hpage>它自己的丝绸被捆绑并深深钉在壳里。这是我以前从未见过的残酷惩罚。<page>即使破碎了，我的嫉妒仍然存在。编织者的传奇技能。在战斗中遇到挑战意味着对胜利充满自豪感。
secondary_translated_text: Boshanka! The children waved needles. You have also discovered this safe haven for bells.<page>For a long time, I avoided this place because of some strange feelings. Now that I have arrived, I find it is free and the few remaining residents also provide trade and welcome.<hpage>I killed a tall creature over the town that I suspected was a weaver, even though it was deliberately distorted.<hpage>You may already feel her. A powerful force, even in the elderly. Through sounds and claws, she helps, perhaps guides, seize clues about the haunting of these lands.<page>Weaver? Those vicious things. We told stories to young people, but thought they were long dead and there were only bodies on the steeple.<hpage>This one is still alive, although if it were a loom, it would have been savagely damaged.<hpage>Its own silk is bundled and nailed deep into its shell. This was a cruel punishment I had never seen before.<page>Even though it was broken, my jealousy still existed. The legendary skills of the weaver. Meeting challenges in battle means feeling proud of victory.

original_en_text: This outpost that the shambling pilgrim-bugs have built for themselves... Dondakku!<page>Where are the armaments? The watch-poles? Never have I seen such a poorly defended encampment!<hpage>The pilgrims here seem to have no mind for war, Shakra. I suspect most depart for the Citadel soon after their arrival.<page>Hmph. If they persist in their carelessness, they will find only death in these harsh lands.
original_zh_text: 朝圣虫建的这破营地……东达库！<page>防御工事呢？瞭望塔呢？没见过这么不设防的营地！<hpage>朝圣者们不懂争斗，估计刚到就奔着圣堡去了。<page>哼！继续这么马虎，迟早死在纺络的险地里。
translated_text: 这个摇摇欲坠的前哨基地是由朝圣者为自己建造的.东区！<page>军备在哪里？杆子？我从未见过防守如此薄弱的营地！<hpage>这里的朝圣者似乎没有战争的概念，沙克拉。我怀疑大多数人在到达后不久就会前往城堡。<page>哈你如果他们坚持粗心大意，他们只会在这些贫瘠的土地上找到死亡。
secondary_translated_text: This ramshackle outpost was built for themselves by pilgrims. East District!<page>Where are the armaments? Pole? I have never seen a camp with such weak defenses!<hpage>The pilgrims here seem to have no concept of war, Shakra. I suspect most people head to the castle shortly after arriving.<page>If they persist in being careless, they will only find death in these barren lands.

original_en_text: What’s this? The little spider climbs so high, here to stand aquiver at our startling Citadel.<hpage>Pale child, you return only to mock? Neither you nor your land have proven my match. This sleeping Citadel shall be no different.<page>Spider, dear. Why must you remain so distressingly... optimistic? The power that waits above, you cannot conceive, her who would snuff that hope with barely a glance.<hpage>Fool child. You still think me blind to the form of your liege? Having come this far?<hpage>This land’s grandeur, the devotion of its bugs, and the curse that befalls them. The signs are clear.<hpage>Your kingdom is in the thrall of a creature beyond bug, one of that higher caste.<hpage>Whatever its desire for my Silk and my shell, it shall find I’m quite attached to both.
original_zh_text: 瞧瞧？小蜘蛛抖抖索索爬到圣堡脚下了。<hpage>苍白之子，你只是来废话的么？纺络没有虫能阻挡我，圣堡也不例外。<page>亲爱的，你怎么还傻乐呢？上面那位吹口气就能灭了你那点希望。<hpage>傻孩子，真以为我现在还看不出你主子的真身吗？<hpage>这地方的辉煌、虫民的虔诚、还有他们的诅咒……线索太明显了。<hpage>这个王国被超脱虫类的存在掌控，属于更高阶的存在。<hpage>但无论它多想要我的灵丝和躯壳，我都不会给。
translated_text: 这是什么？这只小蜘蛛爬得这么高，站在我们令人惊叹的城堡里。<hpage>苍白的孩子，你回来只是为了笑吗？你和你的土地都没有证明我是对手。这座沉睡的城堡也不会有任何不同。<page>蜘蛛，亲爱的。为什么你想这么痛苦……乐观？你无法想象上面有力量在等着。她一眼就能浇灭这个希望。<hpage>傻孩子。你还以为我看不到你的国王长什么样吗？有这么远吗？<hpage>土地的壮丽，昆虫的忠诚，以及降临在它们身上的诅咒。迹象很明显。<hpage>你的王国受到一种超越蠕虫的生物的束缚，这种生物是更高的种姓之一。<hpage>无论它对我的丝绸和贝壳有何渴望，它都会发现我对两者都非常依恋。
secondary_translated_text: What is this? This little spider climbed so high and stood in our amazing castle.<hpage>Pale child, did you come back just to laugh? Neither you nor your land has proved me an opponent. This sleeping castle would not be any different.<page>Spider, dear. Why do you want to be so miserable... optimistic? You can't imagine the power waiting up there. She could extinguish this hope with a glance.<hpage>Silly kid. You still think I can't see what your king looks like? Is it that far?<hpage>The grandeur of the land, the loyalty of the insects, and the curse that befalls them. The signs are obvious.<hpage>Your kingdom is bound by a creature beyond worms, one of the higher castes.<hpage>Whatever its desire for my silk and shells, it will find me very attached to both.

original_en_text: Aren’t those solemn judge-bugs nice? They do not speak or sing, but I sense great wisdom behind their gleaming gazes!<hpage>Beware them, little one. Wise or not, their judgements are often followed by violence. Many of your fellow pilgrims have fallen to them on these great steps.<page>Oh...? But even the fallen will sometimes stand again, and all pilgrimages will be completed, yes? That’s how I’ve heard it!
original_zh_text: 看那些肃穆的判官虫多亲切！虽然他们不言语也不歌唱，但眼中却闪着智慧！<hpage>要小心，小家伙。他们的判决常伴暴力，不知多少朝圣者倒在这些石阶上。<page>可是……倒下者终会再起，朝圣终将完成，不是吗？
translated_text: 那些严重的法官虫子不是很棒吗？他们不说话也不唱歌，但我感觉到在他们闪烁的眼睛后面隐藏着巨大的智慧！<hpage>小心他们，小家伙们。无论明智与否，他们的判断往往伴随着暴力。你们的许多朝圣者在这些伟大的台阶上拜倒在他们的脚下。<page>哦。？但即使是倒下的人有时也会重新站起来，所有的朝圣都会完成，对吧？这就是我听到的！
secondary_translated_text: Aren't those serious judge bugs great? They don't speak or sing, but I feel a great wisdom hidden behind their shining eyes!<hpage>Be careful of them, little ones. Whether wise or not, their judgments are often accompanied by violence. Many of your pilgrims prostrate themselves at their feet on these great steps.<page>Oh.? But even fallen people sometimes get back on their feet, and all pilgrimage will be completed, right? That's what I heard!

original_en_text: These twisting tunnels hide many worthy opponents, but many traps as well. Watch your footing closely.
original_zh_text: 这些弯道里藏着不少好对手，但陷阱也多。走路看着点。
translated_text: 这些扭曲的隧道隐藏着许多有价值的对手，但也隐藏着许多陷阱。仔细观察您的步骤。
secondary_translated_text: These twisted tunnels hide many valuable opponents, but they also hide many traps. Observe your steps carefully.

original_en_text: As you requested, these pins will mark the travel stations within that hideous structure of steel and steam.
original_zh_text: 按你要求的，这些图钉能标记那些铁皮蒸汽管的站点。
translated_text: 应您的要求，这些别针将标记那个可怕的钢铁和蒸汽结构内的旅行站。
secondary_translated_text: At your request, these pins will mark the travel station inside that terrible steel and steam structure.

original_en_text: <hpage>Head fast for Bellhart, Pill. These lands are not for travelling without a sharp blade in claw.<page>Aye! Yes! To Bellhart, and my brother, I shall fly quickly-quick. If you pass that way again, stop and give greeting!
original_zh_text: <hpage>回钟心镇吧，这地方没武器别乱跑。<page>这就回！我飞得可、可快了！你要是经过钟心镇记得和我打招呼！
translated_text: <hpage>快速前往贝尔哈特和皮尔。这些土地不适合没有利爪的旅行。<page>是的！是的！为了伯哈特和我的兄弟们，我会飞得非常快。如果您再次过马路，请停下来打个招呼！
