secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Make quick trips to Berhart and Peel. These lands are not suitable for travel without claws.<page>Yes! Yes! For Burhart and my brothers, I will fly very fast. If you cross the road again, please stop and say hello!

original_en_text: <hpage>Who are you calling for, Shakra? Your voice echoes through the caverns.<page>I came deeper into Pharloom in search of my mentor, the greatest of my tribe. I could not keep pace though, and her trail grew cold.<page>She will have travelled much farther by now, but if I keep moving and stay vigilant I will reunite with her.
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉，你在喊谁？整个山洞都是你回声。<page>我来纺络深处寻找导师，我们部落的最强者。可惜跟丢了。<page>她肯定走得更远了，但只要保持警惕总能重逢。
translated_text: <hpage>沙克拉，你在打电话给谁？你的声音在山洞里回响。<page>我深入法鲁寻找我的导师，我部落中最伟大的导师。但我跟不上，她的踪迹变得冰冷。<page>她现在已经走得更远了，但如果我继续前进并保持警惕，我就会和她团聚。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Shakra, who are you calling? Your voice echoed in the cave.<page>I went deep into Faro to find my mentor, the greatest mentor in my tribe. But I couldn't keep up, and her trail became cold.<page>She's gone further now, but if I keep moving forward and stay vigilant, I'll be reunited with her.

original_en_text: We must never let our shells soften, or Pharloom’s sharp teeth will sink in quick.<page>Would you duel with me, Hornet Wielding Needle? Together we shall sharpen one another’s skill.
original_zh_text: 战士不能养尊处优，纺络到处藏着危险。<page>来切磋吧？我们互相磨练技艺。
translated_text: 我们决不能让我们的壳软化，否则法鲁的锋利牙齿很快就会陷进去。<page>马蜂窝针，你愿意与我战斗吗？我们将共同努力提高彼此的技能。
secondary_translated_text: We must not let our shells soften, otherwise Faro's sharp teeth will soon sink in.<page>Hornet's nest needle, will you fight me? We will work together to improve each other's skills.

original_en_text: I’ll wish you success in your grand task, miss, but forgive me my sadness for knowing the cruel cost...
original_zh_text: 我希望你能成功，女士。但一想到代价这么沉重，还是很难过。
translated_text: 小姐，我祝愿你完成伟大的使命，但请原谅我的悲伤，因为我知道残酷的代价……
secondary_translated_text: Miss, I wish you a great mission, but please forgive my sadness, because I know the price of cruelty...

original_en_text: Hurry it up, let us out quickly then! We got places to go, bugs to see, trinkets to pilfer!
original_zh_text: 快点放人！我们还要去捞宝贝呢！
translated_text: 快点，然后快点放我们出去！我们有地方要去，有虫子要看，有小饰品要偷！
secondary_translated_text: Come on, and let us out! We have places to go, bugs to see, trinkets to steal!

original_en_text: Warrior... I heard your approach. Why do you come? Surely you’ve no desire to see these long collapsed caves?<hpage>The way was open, sir. I merely followed the path through. Am I correct to guess you were once a resident of these borderlands?<page>Aye... and glorious they were, in their time. Pharloom’s end approaches, but my caves, these caves, fell to fate long before. <page>Of that fair land, I am the last... Now to remain till the end, and remember the splendour that was...
original_zh_text: 战士……我听见你的脚步了。来这废墟做什么？<hpage>道路通畅，我只是顺路而来。你曾是边境之民？<page>曾是……昔日辉煌……不复存在。如今纺络快完了，但我的家园……早就覆灭了。<page>我是故土最后的遗民……要守到末日，铭记曾经的荣光……
translated_text: 士兵.我听到你走近了。你为什么来这里？你不会想看到这些长长的塌陷洞穴吧？<hpage>道路是开放的，先生。我只是沿着这条路走。我想你曾经是这些边境地区的居民吧？<page>是的他们在他们的时代是光荣的。法鲁的末日即将来临，但我的洞穴，这些洞穴，早已落入命运之手。<page>在那片美丽的土地上，我是最后一个。现在我们必须坚持到最后，铭记辉煌。
secondary_translated_text: soldier. I heard you approaching. Why are you here? You don't want to see these long cave-in caves, do you?<hpage>The road is open, sir. I'm just going down this road. I assume you were once a resident of these border areas?<page>Yes, they are glorious in their time. The end of Faro is coming, but my caves, these caves, have long fallen into the hands of destiny.<page>In that beautiful land, I was the last one. Now we must persevere until the end and remember the glory.

original_en_text: Miss grown-up, you have hunted long with little rest, thinks Nuu.<page>Perhaps you are covered in too many juices, weighed down by beastly filth? Let sweet Nuu clean you, make you fresh!
original_zh_text: 大姐姐，你一直狩猎，好久没休息了吧？<page>是不是浑身都沾满了黏液和血液？让努努帮你清洁吧！
translated_text: 大人，小姐，您狩猎了很长时间，几乎没有休息过。想想吧<page>也许你是覆盖在太多的果汁和粉碎的污垢的野兽？让甜蜜的Nuu清洁您，让您焕然一新！
secondary_translated_text: My lord, miss, you have been hunting for a long time and have hardly rested. think about it<page>Maybe you are the beast covered in too much juice and crushed dirt? Let the sweet Nuu clean you and make you look new!

original_zh_text: 有意思！我开始喜欢你了！

original_en_text: <page=M>We could do it. The spell can be cast, with enough power, enormous power, equal maybe to that monarch...<hpage>I cannot grant you mine, if it even were enough. My strength is still needed to face her below. Where else do you propose we seek a source?<page=M>From Pharloom! Ho ho ho! Remember, ours is a kingdom of wishes granted.<page=B>Pharloom was not born of that monarch, Old One. Power existed in these lands even before she bound them beneath her.<page=B>Grnk. Seek the old hearts of our kingdom and the last successors to bear their strength.<page=M>They’re still out there, hidden away, much faded by the pale one’s long dominion. You must make them stir.<page=M>We will teach you how, in the way befitting a Weaver, a sombre song to reach down into their memories and enliven them a final time.
original_zh_text: <page=M>我们或许能够施咒，但要有足够力量，堪比那君主的力量。<hpage>我给不了这份力，即便有也要留着对付她。还能从哪里获取？<page=M>纺络！嚯嚯！别忘了，我们的王国最擅长实现愿望。<page=B>纺络并非君主创造，古老者。在她到来之前，这片土地就存在着力量。<page=B>您该去寻找古老的纺络之心，与其最后的传承者。<page=M>虽然几乎被苍白统治消磨殆尽，他们仍在某处苟存。必须唤醒他们。<page=M>我们会教你织者的方法。用挽歌深入他们的记忆，激醒他们的力量。
translated_text: <page=M>我们可以做到，这个法术可以施展，而且威力足够大，威力巨大，说不定就相当于那个君主……<hpage>即使足够了，我也不能给你我的。面对她，我还需要力量。你认为我们还能在哪里找到线人？<page=M>来自Pharloom！嗬！请记住，我们的王国是一个愿望得到实现的王国。<page=B>法鲁并不是那位君主所生的。权力甚至在她将这些土地束缚在她之下之前就已经存在了。<page=B>Grnk。找到我们王国的元老和最终继承者来承受他们的力量。<page=M>他们仍然在那里，隐藏着，被苍白者的长期统治所褪色。你必须让它们搅拌。<page=M>我们将教您如何用一首适合编织者的忧郁歌曲最后一次让他们活跃起来。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>We can do it. This spell can be cast, and it is powerful enough. It may be equivalent to that monarch...<hpage>Even if it was enough, I couldn't give you mine. Facing her, I still need strength. Where else do you think we can find the informant?<page=M>From Pharloom! Ho! Remember that our kingdom is a kingdom where wishes are fulfilled.<page=B>Faro was not born of that monarch. Power existed even before she bound these lands under her.<page=B>Grnk。Find the elders and ultimate successors of our kingdom to bear their power.<page=M>They are still there, hidden, faded by the long rule of the pale one. You have to let them stir.<page=M>We will teach you how to enliven weavers up one last time with a melancholy song suitable for them.

original_en_text: Owoww, what a rotten turn! Keep your nasty junk to yourself, then!
original_zh_text: 哎哟！真倒霉！你就自个儿留着这些破烂货吧！
translated_text: 哇，多么可怕的转变啊！所以，把你烦人的垃圾留给自己吧！
secondary_translated_text: Wow, what a terrible transformation! So keep your annoying garbage to yourself!

original_en_text: O-hoho! Share some of your little clicky-clackies with us, help us fill our pockets. If you do, we’ll share a sneaky secret with you!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！分点叮当响给我们，就告诉你个秘密！
translated_text: 哦嗬嗬！与我们分享一些你的小叮当，帮助我们填满口袋。如果您这样做，我们将与您分享一个秘密！
secondary_translated_text: Oh ho ho! Share some of your jingles with us and help us fill our pockets. If you do, we will share a secret with you!

original_en_text: Miss grown-up, for your continued huntings you should climb up, up above here, above the tallest spinning towers!<page>Hidden in the dark thickets are strange bugs who call up dancing flames. So pretty! So warm!<page>But when Nuu tried to crawl near, the flames became angry and swooped all around! Poor Nuu was half roasted!<page>Nuu leaves it to you, miss grown-up, to climb up there and cut those flames apart. For our journal, such must be done.
original_zh_text: 大姐姐，要继续狩猎的话，你得往上爬，越过最高的纺塔！<page> 暗蕨丛里藏着会召唤舞焰的怪虫。好漂亮！好暖和！<page> 可努努刚靠近，火焰就发怒冲了上来！差点把努努烤焦啦！<page> 这事就交给你啦，大姐姐，上去把那些火焰斩碎吧。为了填满记录册，必须这么做！
translated_text: 大人，为了继续狩猎，您应该爬到这里，最高的旋转塔上方！<page>在黑暗的丛林中隐藏着奇怪的昆虫，它们召唤着舞动的火焰。太漂亮了！好温暖！<page>但当努试图爬得更近时，火焰变得愤怒起来，四处猛扑！可怜的Nuu已经半生不熟了！<page>小姐大人，努把责任留给了你，爬上去扑灭那些火焰。对于我们的杂志来说，这必须做到。
secondary_translated_text: My Lord, in order to continue hunting, you should climb here, above the highest revolving tower!<page>Hidden in the dark jungle are strange insects that call for dancing flames. So beautiful! So warm!<page>But as Nu tried to climb closer, the flames became angry and pounced around! Poor Nuu is half-baked!<page>Miss, Nu left the responsibility to you. Climb up and put out those flames. For our magazine, this must be done.

original_en_text: Poshanka! Child Wielding Needle, have you seen trace of my master nearby? I feel she was here only recently!<hpage>I cannot say for certain, Shakra, though if she travels seeking skilled opponents, these steps would serve her well. The warriors watching over them are formidable.<page>True! Impressive guardians they are, fighting defensively and loath to leave their stations. They swing their weapons with a cold brutality that should not be underestimated.
original_zh_text: 啵尚咔！见过我导师的踪迹吗？感觉她刚来过！<hpage>我不确定。但她若是想找高手过招，这台阶的守卫正合适。<page>没错！这些守卫死守岗位，出手狠辣，不能小瞧。
translated_text: 博尚卡！针小子，你在附近看到我师傅的踪迹了吗？感觉她最近才刚来！<hpage>沙克拉，我不能肯定，但如果她去寻找熟练的对手，这些步骤对她来说会有好处。保护他们的士兵很强大。<page>真的！他们是令人印象深刻的守护者，打防御战，不愿意离开自己的岗位。他们挥舞武器的无情和残酷不容低估。
secondary_translated_text: Boshanka! Needle boy, have you seen any trace of my master nearby? It feels like she just got here recently!<hpage>Shakra, I'm not sure, but these steps will be good for her if she goes looking for skilled opponents. The soldiers protecting them are powerful.<page>Really! They are impressive guardians, fighting defensive battles and unwilling to leave their posts. The ruthlessness and cruelty with which they wield weapons cannot be underestimated.

original_en_text: Poshanka, Hornet Wielding Needle. For that is your name, is it not? I have heard it spoken in this land with reverence.<page>I had hoped you would accept my summons. In these moments one is good, but two is best.<hpage>I would not deny the wish, Shakra. A sombre ceremony seemed likely at this trail’s end, and I am sadly proved correct. This then is your master?<page>The fiercest of my tribe, here she lies. I called her master, true, but she was mother just as much, more by far than the bug who bore me.<hpage>Among the many marvels of this kingdom, she found a fine place to meet her end.<page>Ended by age... My tribe would call that shame, but I see only strength unbeaten.<page>Even as her shell betrayed her, she walked this kingdom’s breadth. It was her trail followed that allowed me to share witness to its dignity.<page>Hornet Wielding Needle, you too have journeyed these many paths, as my master before us. Join me now for her song-sending.<page>It is time for her soul to walk beyond her shell...
original_zh_text: 你来啦，使针的小姑娘！你叫大黄蜂，对吧？最近可名气不小呢。<page>希望你别推辞我的请求，现在的情况，需要你搭把手，我自己一个不够。<hpage>我不会推辞的，沙克拉。看这情景，要是我没猜错……这是你的导师吧？<page>这里躺着的是我们部落的最强者。我叫她导师，但她其实更像我母亲。<hpage>她挑了个好地方长眠呢……<page>她是老死的……部落会觉得这很丢脸吧，但我只看到不败的强者。<page>拖着老旧的甲壳丈量大地，是跟着她的足迹我才能见证许多。<page>使针的小姑娘，你也走过这些路。陪我给她唱首送魂曲吧。<page>该送她的灵魂离壳了……
translated_text: 波尚卡，黄蜂挥舞着针。因为那是你的名字，不是吗？我在这片土地上听过这句话，并且恭敬地说了出来。<page>我希望你能接受我的传票。在这些时刻，一个是好的，但两个是最好的。<hpage>我不会拒绝这个愿望，沙卡拉。似乎道路的尽头可能会有一场阴沉的仪式，不幸的是，事实证明我是对的。这就是你的主人吗？<page>她是我部落中最凶猛的人，就躺在这里。我称她为主人，这是真的，但她也是一位母亲，远远超过了我的虫子。<hpage>在这个王国的众多奇迹中，她找到了一个结束生命的好地方。<page>以年龄结束。我的部落会称之为耻辱，但我只看到不可战胜的力量。<page>尽管她的身体背叛了她，但她走遍了王国。正是她的脚步让我见证了它的尊严。<page>大黄蜂挥舞着针，作为我在我们面前的主人，你也走过了很多路。现在就把这首歌发给我。<page>是时候让她的灵魂离开她的身体了……
secondary_translated_text: Pochanka, wasps wield needles. Because that's your name, isn't it? I have heard this sentence in this land and said it respectfully.<page>I hope you will accept my subpoena. In these moments, one is good, but two are the best.<hpage>I will not refuse this wish, Shakara. It seemed like there might be a somber ceremony at the end of the road, and unfortunately, I was proved right. Is this your master?<page>She is the fiercest person in my tribe, lying here. I call her master, it's true, but she's also a mother, far more than my bug.<hpage>Among the many miracles of this kingdom, she found a good place to end her life.<page>Ended by age. My tribe would call it a disgrace, but I only see invincible power.<page>Although her body betrayed her, she traveled across the kingdom. It was her footsteps that allowed me to witness its dignity.<page>Bumblebee wields a needle, and as my master before us, you have come a lot. Send me this song now.<page>It's time for her soul to leave her body...

original_en_text: From this safe vantage, I can keep watch for threats while I work. These lowlands are brittle and dangerous. Keep your weapon close.
original_zh_text: 这位置安全，能边干活边警戒。低处危险易碎，注意武器别离手。
translated_text: 从安全角度来看，我可以意识到工作中的威胁。这些低地脆弱而危险。将武器放在身边。
secondary_translated_text: From a security perspective, I can be aware of threats at work. These lowlands are fragile and dangerous. Keep weapons close to you.

original_en_text: Have you tried your claw at the games? Rollicking good fun, don’t you think?<page>I wonder if I could score a little higher if I tried again...
original_zh_text: 你玩过游戏没？超有意思！<page>不知道我再试几次能不能刷新记录……
translated_text: 你在游戏中尝试过爪子吗？这很有趣，你不认为吗？<page>不知道如果我再试一次，我的分数会不会更高……
secondary_translated_text: Have you ever tried claws in games? It's interesting, don't you think?<page>I wonder if my score will be higher if I try again…

original_en_text: After all... it’s you that she wants... is it not?
original_zh_text: 毕竟……她要的是你……不是吗？
secondary_translated_text: After all... She wants you. Isn't it?

original_en_text: Hoi! Magnificent! May our mighty contest of shells commence.<page>But a final note, nimble bug! If ever you run off course or desire a quick convene, simply play what music you’re able and my companion shall whisk you back to our starting line.<page>Now! The track calls us. Allow me a moment to assemble a course worthy to test our skill.<page>
original_zh_text: 哟嚯！太棒了！史诗对决即将开始！<page>最后提醒一下，要是跑岔道了或想集合，就随便来点音乐，我的跟班会带你回起点。<page>好了，等我布置条配得上咱们实力的赛道就开始！
translated_text: 嘿！宏伟的！愿我们伟大的贝壳竞赛开始。<page>但最后一件事，敏捷错误！如果您偏离了赛道或想快速集合，只需播放您能演奏的音乐，我的同伴就会带您回到我们的起跑线。<page>现在！歌曲在召唤我们。请允许我花点时间组织一门值得测试我们技能的课程。<page>
secondary_translated_text: Hey! Magnificent! May our great shell competition begin.<page>But one last thing, agility mistake! If you stray from the track or want to gather quickly, just play the music you can play and my companion will take you back to our starting line.<page>Now! The song is calling us. Please allow me to take a moment to organize a course worth testing our skills.<page>

original_en_text: <hpage>Hold your gratitude, little one. The dead are stirring.
translated_text: <hpage>收起你的感激之情吧，小家伙，死人都要沸腾了.
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Put away your gratitude, little guy, the dead are boiling.

original_en_text: <hpage>It is time, shamans. I have the hearts, enough as requested. Enough to build your spell, yes?<page=B>Aye. We’re ready. Still, it’s a sad set you’re holding there, strength such as few shall ever know... and all about to burn for Pharloom’s saving.<page=S>I’ll warn ya, Old One, this first part might not be pleasant, but we’ll get you in there, deep as needed.<page=M>Now you’ve only to ready yourself for what comes after. Lay up on the dais and we’ll begin.
original_zh_text: <hpage>时候到了，萨满们。三颗心已集齐，够施咒了吧？<page=B>足够了。唉，这几颗残心曾经承载何等伟力……如今却要为了救世燃尽。<page=S>我得提醒你，古老者。这法咒一开始可能不太舒服，但一定能把您送进记忆深处。<page=M>接下来就看你造化了。做好准备，躺在祭坛上，就可以开始了。
translated_text: <hpage>是时候了，萨满。我有这个意向，按照要求去做就足够了。足以建立你的咒语，对吧？<page=B>是的，我们已经准备好了，但你所持有的是一个悲伤的场景，一种很少有人知道的力量……为了法鲁的救赎，一切都即将被烧毁。<page=S>我警告你，老头，第一部分可能不愉快，但我们会根据需要让你参与其中。<page=M>现在您只需要为接下来发生的事情做好准备。躺在讲台上，我们开始了。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>It's time, Shaman. I have this intention, and it is enough to follow the requirements. Enough to establish your spell, right?<page=B>Yes, we are ready, but what you hold is a sad scene, a force few people know about... everything is about to burn for the redemption of Faro.<page=S>I warn you, old man, the first part may be unpleasant, but we will involve you as needed.<page=M>Now you just need to be prepared for what happens next. Lying on the podium, we began.

original_en_text: Charting the heights of this great mount would prove a mighty challenge. For now, I have seen only its base.<page>Once I have completed the search for my master, I would like to return and attempt the climb in full.
original_zh_text: 测绘这大山是个不小的挑战。现在我只探了山脚。<page>等找到导师，一定要回来爬个痛快。
translated_text: 绘制这座山的高度将是一个巨大的挑战。目前，我只看到它的底座。<page>一旦我完成寻找我的主人，我想回来尝试完整的攀登。
secondary_translated_text: Mapping the height of the mountain will be a huge challenge. Currently, I only see its base.<page>Once I'm done looking for my master, I want to come back and try the full climb.

original_en_text: Worm-ridden caverns, shaking and unstable. There remain faint signs that pilgrims once travelled these tight paths.
original_zh_text: 被蠕虫所蛀的摇晃洞穴。隐约能看出朝圣者曾走过这窄路。
translated_text: 虫子出没的洞穴，摇摇欲坠且不稳定。仍然有微弱的迹象表明朝圣者曾走过这些狭窄的道路。
secondary_translated_text: The burrows infested by insects are shaky and unstable. There are still faint signs that pilgrims have traveled these narrow roads.

original_en_text: Hooof... let us stop the duel there.<page>I... hoof... I hope in my excitement I did not... hoof... bring down my lance too heavy upon you, sister.<hpage>It was combat honourably conducted, sirs. But now, we should all of us keep moving. It will not remain quiet here for long.<page>Y-yes, of course. Our good works are never done, and we must press ever on. There is no time to waste!
original_zh_text: 呼……点到为止。<page>我……呼……希望我没……呼……下手太重。<hpage>二位打得很好，但此地不宜久留，我们该上路了。<page>对、对，正事要紧，不能浪费时间，该走了！
translated_text: 呼。让我们停止那里的决斗吧。<page>我...蹄子。我希望我没有感到兴奋。蹄子。姐姐，把我的长矛举到你身上，太重了。<hpage>先生们，这是一场光荣的战斗。但现在，我们都应该向前看。这里不会安静太久。<page>是的当然我们的善行永远不会完成，我们必须坚持下去。没有时间可以浪费！
secondary_translated_text: Hoo. Let's stop the duel there.<page>I... Hoof. I hope I'm not excited. Hoof. Sister, lift my spear on you, it's too heavy.<hpage>Gentlemen, this is a glorious battle. But now, we should all look forward. It won't be quiet here for long.<page>Yes, of course our good deeds will never be completed, and we must persevere. There is no time to waste!

original_en_text: Don’t let defeat weigh on you, nimble bug! Simply step to the challenge. Let us soar swift together again!
original_zh_text: 别灰心，输一次不算什么！振作起来再战！
translated_text: 不要让失败压垮你，敏捷的虫子！迎接挑战。让我们再次一起飞翔！
secondary_translated_text: Don't let failure crush you, agile bug! Meet the challenge. Let's fly together again!

original_en_text: <hpage>What cause saw you first ascend to this Citadel, Garmond?<page>Mine is only the most sacred quest, sister! One shared with my most trusted companion, dear Zaza.<page>We sought this Citadel, to stand before its rulers, and demand their answer! By force if necessary! All for our dear village to whom we pledge our shells. <page>The fearsome haunting of thread, it overcame our fair folk.... We are all that remain, left to carry their memory, and the hope to see some justice paid.
original_zh_text: <hpage>加蒙德，你们最初来圣堡要做什么？<page>我和扎扎肩负着神圣使命！<page>我们要为了村子，向圣堡的君主讨个公道！<page>该死的丝咒毁了村子，就剩下我们俩……带着大伙的记忆。无论如何我们都要找到答案！
translated_text: <hpage>加蒙德，你第一次爬上这座城堡的原因是什么？<page>我的追求只是最神圣的追求，姐姐！其中之一与我最信任的同伴，我亲爱的扎扎分享。<page>我们寻找这座城堡，站在它的统治者面前，要求他们给出答案！必要时使用武力！这一切都是为了我们心爱的村庄。我们向他们承诺我们的贝壳。<page>丝线的可怕麻烦，它征服了我们美丽的人民……我们是剩下的人，留下了他们的记忆，希望看到一些正义得到伸张。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Garmond, what was the reason why you climbed this castle for the first time?<page>My pursuit is only the most sacred pursuit, sister! One of them shared with my most trusted companion, my dear Zaza.<page>We searched for this castle, stood before its rulers, and demanded answers! Use force if necessary! All this is for our beloved village. We promised them our shells.<page>The terrible trouble of the silk thread, it conquered our beautiful people... We are the ones left behind, leaving their memories, hoping to see some justice done.

original_en_text: Ahh, a fellow pilgrim. I’ve been praying alone here too long, with only the wind’s voice to join mine.<page>We’re so close. Our pilgrimage is almost over. Just one final, brutal climb, hm?<hpage>The Citadel is near, pilgrim. You must have had some strength in you. Few of your fellows seem to reach these heights.<page>Aye, the roads become lonelier the longer they’re travelled and the higher we climb.<page>It takes a lot of luck and a lot of faith to make it this far, though I’m sure I don’t need to tell you that.
original_zh_text: 啊，又一个朝圣者。我在这独自祈祷太久了，只有风声作伴。<page>快到终点了。朝圣之旅即将结束，只剩最后这段险途了对吧？<hpage>圣堡就在眼前。你本事不错，能走到这的朝圣者没几个。<page>是啊，这路越走越长，越往上爬同伴越少。<page>走到这需要运气和信念，不过你肯定懂。
translated_text: 啊，朝圣者同胞们。我独自在这里祈祷太久了，只有风的声音增添了我的声音。<page>我们已经很接近了。我们的朝圣之旅即将结束。这只是最后一次残酷的攀登，哈？<hpage>城堡就在附近，朝圣者。你一定有一些力量。看来你的同伴中很少有人能达到这样的高度。<page>是的，路走得越长，爬得越高，路就会变得越孤独。<page>到达这里需要很大的运气和很大的信心，尽管我相信我不需要告诉你。
secondary_translated_text: Ah, fellow pilgrims. I have been praying here alone for too long, only the sound of the wind adds to my voice.<page>We're so close. Our pilgrimage is coming to an end. This is just the last brutal climb, huh?<hpage>The castle is nearby, pilgrim. You must have some power. It seems that few of your companions can reach such heights.<page>Yes, the longer the road you go and the higher you climb, the lonelier the road will become.<page>It took a lot of luck and a lot of confidence to get here, although I believe I don't need to tell you.

original_en_text: Huu... You have done it... Huu. Huu... Hoof.<page>Never would I have believed, a shell so fast in all of Pharloom! Wonder of wonders!<page>You have proven it, nimble bug, fulfilled my wish, seen my pace matched and beaten, my limits broken wide.
original_zh_text: 呼……你赢了……呼……呼……<page>难以置信！纺络还存在这般疾速！简直是奇迹！<page>你做到了！实现了我的夙愿，突破了我的极限！
translated_text: 呼。你已经做到了。呼。呼。蹄子。<page>我永远不会相信整个法勒姆的贝壳这么快！奇迹中的奇迹！<page>你证明了这一点，敏捷的虫子，完成了我的愿望，看到我的脚步匹配并被击败，我的极限被打破了。
secondary_translated_text: Hoo. You already did it. Hoo. Hoo. Hoof.<page>I would never believe that the whole of Farham shells will be so fast! Miracle among miracles!<page>You proved it, agile bug, fulfilled my wish, and saw that my footsteps matched and defeated, my limits were broken.

original_en_text: Gurro! I have a notion for you, sister. What say we cross our weapons here before we move on? Engage in some rollicking combat together? Have no fear, I will not strike a mortal blow!
original_zh_text: 嘎噜！我有个提议，走之前要不要切磋切磋，来场友谊赛热热身？别担心，保证不打死你！
translated_text: 咕噜！我有一个主意给你，姐姐。我们在这里交叉双臂然后继续前进怎么样？一起打一些搞笑的战斗吗？别害怕，我不会造成致命一击！
secondary_translated_text: Gollum! I have an idea for you, sister. How about we cross our arms here and move on? Fight some funny battles together? Don't be afraid, I won't deal a fatal blow!

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir knight, I am sorry... This was the only means to free you from the cursed threads.<page>Hohhhh... fret not.... little one...<page>Be proud... you’ve grown so strong!<page>Zaza... let us just rest a little... and then we’ll be away...
original_zh_text: <hpage>骑士先生，对不起……只有这样才能斩断你身上的黑丝诅咒……<hpage>咳……别难过……小姑娘……<page>你很强大……应该骄傲……<page>扎扎……可以休息了……
translated_text: <hpage>奈特爵士，对不起……这是将您从被诅咒的线程中解放出来的唯一方法。<page>呵呵...别担心小家伙.<page>要自豪。你变得这么强大了！<page>扎扎。我们休息一下然后我们就走
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Sir Knight, I'm sorry... this is the only way to free you from the cursed thread.<page>Hehe... Don't worry about the little one.<page>Be proud. You have become so powerful!<page>Zazha. Let's take a break and then we'll go

original_en_text: Nuu’s wish, it is granted. But miss grown-up will continue cutting creatures and adding them to our journal, of course?<hpage>I will. Knowing a creature’s form and habits is an advantage that can decide the outcome of a battle. Recording these details is worth the effort.<page>Oh yes! Is very much worth it! Nuu hopes you will share your new learnings with her often!<page>And take a gift to help with your huntings, miss grown-up! Nuu will add a pocket to your tool pouch, for the bringing of many tools on your hunts!<page>
original_zh_text: 努努的愿望达成了，但大姐姐会继续砍怪记录对吧？<hpage>会的。了解生物习性对战斗有帮助，值得记录。<page>超值得！要经常和努努分享新发现哦！<page>送你个狩猎礼物！给你的工具包加个口袋，多装点装备！
translated_text: 努的愿望实现了。但女士当然会继续切割生物并将它们添加到我们的日记中吗？<hpage>我会知道，了解生物的形状和习惯是决定战斗结果的优势。这些细节值得记录下来。<page>哦是的！非常值得！Nu希望你能经常与她分享你的新知识！<page>大人和小姐，带礼物来帮你们打猎吧！Nuu会在您的工具包中添加一个口袋，这样您就可以在狩猎时携带许多工具！<page>
secondary_translated_text: Nu's wish came true. But will women of course continue to cut creatures and add them to our diaries?<hpage>I would know that understanding the shapes and habits of creatures is an advantage in determining the outcome of a battle. These details are worth recording.<page>Oh yes! Very worth it! Nu hopes you can share your new knowledge with her often!<page>Ladies and gentlemen, bring gifts to help you hunt! Nuu will add a pocket to your kit so you can carry many tools while hunting!<page>

original_en_text: Just a piece of a mask, innit? Don’t ask us where the other bits are... you’ll have to sniff ‘em out for yourself!
original_zh_text: 只是一块面甲碎片。不知道剩下的在哪……自己找去！
translated_text: 只是一个面具，对吧？不要问我们其他人在哪里。你必须亲自嗅出它们！
secondary_translated_text: It's just a mask, right? Don't ask where the rest of us are. You must sniff them out yourself!

original_en_text: <hpage>Nuu, I have completed your request, recording many creatures of Pharloom in the journal.<page>Oooh, ooh! Ma ma ma! Look here at the marvelous beasts and bugs, all listed so beautifully!<page>Miss grown-up, so many creatures now you have cut and beat and smashed! Their essences linger on you, their scents mixing with your own!<page>Oooh, ma... Nuu simply must sample it for herself!
original_zh_text: <hpage>努努，你要的生态记录完成了。<page>哇！快看这些奇虫异兽，记录得好详细！<page>大姐姐砍了好多生物！它们的精华都沾在你身上，味道混在一起了！<page>啧啧……努努好想尝一口！
translated_text: <hpage>努，我已经满足了你的要求，并在日记中记录了法鲁的许多生物。<page>哦，哦！妈妈！妈妈！看看这里的神奇野兽和昆虫，都列得这么漂亮！<page>大人和小姐，现在你们砍了这么多生物，打了这么多！它们的精华萦绕在你身上，它们的香味与你自己的香味混合在一起！<page>哦，妈妈。Nuu一定要亲自尝尝！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Nu, I have satisfied your request and recorded many creatures of Faro in my diary.<page>Oh, Oh! Mom! Mom! Look at the magical beasts and insects here, they are all so beautifully listed!<page>Lord and miss, now you have cut down so many creatures and killed so many! Their essence lingers on you, and their fragrance mixes with your own!<page>Oh, mom. Nuu must try it yourself!

original_en_text: You go on ahead. Zaza and I will keep guard here and catch any stragglers.
original_zh_text: 你先前进吧，我和扎扎在这守着一会，看看有没有漏网之虫。
translated_text: 去吧我和扎扎将在这里站岗，抓捕任何落后的人。
secondary_translated_text: Go ahead, Zaza and I will stand guard here and arrest anyone who falls behind.

original_en_text: Nuu understands, ma. To sup on such a fierce predator’s juices would be divine... but is not right to do. Such behaviour is unfriendly.<page>Nuu’s wish to see many fine beasts, though... miss grown-up, you have surely granted it! All of Nuu’s thanks goes to you!
original_zh_text: 对不起嘛……虽然掠食者的汁液很诱人……但这样不礼貌。<page>不过见识了这么多神奇生物……太感谢大姐姐了！
translated_text: 不明白，妈妈。享受如此凶猛的捕食者的果汁真是太棒了。但这样做是不对的。这种行为是不友好的。<page>努希望看到很多好野兽，但是。老爷，小姐，您一定会同意的！Nuu的一切都要感谢你！
secondary_translated_text: I don't understand, mom. It's great to enjoy the juice of such a fierce predator. But it's wrong to do so. This behavior is unfriendly.<page>Nu hopes to see many good beasts, but. Master, miss, you will definitely agree! Thanks to you for everything Nuu does!

original_en_text: I will soon leave these crumbling roads, but if you stop by the settlement below we may meet again. I pass there often to trade with the pilgrims.
original_zh_text: 我马上要离开这段破路了，但我常去下面的聚落交易，或许还会碰面。
translated_text: 我很快就会离开这些摇摇欲坠的道路，但如果你在下面的定居点停下来，我们可能会再次见面。我经常经过那里与朝圣者进行贸易。
secondary_translated_text: I'll be off these crumbling roads soon, but if you stop at the settlement below, we may meet again. I often pass through there to trade with pilgrims.

original_en_text: Here, the trail of the stag touched pale... We hunted her, felled her, as none before were able...<page>Proof it became, of our majesty... mark of our divine right...
original_zh_text: 这里留有苍白苜鹿的痕迹……我们猎杀了无虫能及的传说……<page>这是王权之证……神授之印……
translated_text: 在这里，雄鹿的踪迹变得苍白……我们追捕她并砍倒她，因为以前没有人能做到。<page>证明它是我们的陛下。我们神圣权利的象征。
secondary_translated_text: Here, the trail of the buck turns pale... We hunted her down and cut her down because no one could have done that before.<page>Prove that it is our majesty. A symbol of our sacred rights.

original_en_text: Beautiful this, a glowy little piece of somethin’. Stinks of them horrid crawling whisperers a bit, so might be dangerous. You should take it! Give us your rosaries and lighten my claws of it!
original_zh_text: 亮晶晶的，漂亮的很！就是带着点难闻的织者味儿。危险货，快买走！
translated_text: 这很漂亮，一个发光的小东西。它们有一点可怕的爬行耳语气味，所以它们可能很危险。你应该接受它！把你的念珠给我们，照亮我的爪子！
secondary_translated_text: It's beautiful, a glowing little thing. They have a bit of a scary crawling whisper smell, so they can be dangerous. You should accept it! Give us your rosary beads and illuminate my paws!

original_en_text: Ho, sister! A grand victory achieved, again. The haunted might of this place cannot stand against our pure hearts!
original_zh_text: 哈！又赢一场！圣堡的空壳子挡不住我们的正义之心！
translated_text: 嗬，姐姐！又是一场伟大的胜利。这个地方的闹鬼力量无法阻挡我们纯洁的心！
secondary_translated_text: Ho, sister! Another great victory. The haunted power of this place cannot stop our pure hearts!

original_en_text: <page=M>This task before you... This is mortal power you would claim, the hearts of bugs. It will cost their last strength to save this land.<page=M>Even we have some hesitation in this. Despite our desire to touch their power, we’d never wished to see it expended so utterly.<hpage>Better to leave your land weak in wonder, if it means your shells, and those of your fellows, stay intact.
original_zh_text: <page=M>您需要明白……这方法需要夺取凡虫之心，也会耗尽它们最后一丝力气。<page=M>即便是我们也心有不忍。虽然渴望见识这份力量，但并不希望看到它燃尽。<hpage>让这片土地虚弱而存，总好过让虫族壳裂身死。
translated_text: <page=M>摆在您面前的任务。这就是你所说的凡人力量，昆虫之心。拯救这片土地将花费他们最后的力量。<page=M>就连我们也对此犹豫不决。尽管我们非常渴望触摸他们的力量，但我们从来不想看到它如此完全耗尽。<hpage>最好让你的土地变得脆弱，因为这意味着你和同伴的贝壳完好无损。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>The task before you. This is what you call mortal power, the heart of insects. Saving this land will cost the last of their strength.<page=M>Even we hesitate about it. As eager as we are to touch their power, we never want to see it so completely exhausted.<hpage>It's best to make your land fragile, because it means that your shells and your companions 'shells are intact.

original_en_text: Gurrrooooo! Gallantly answered, sister! Prepare your weapon!
translated_text: 咕噜！勇敢地回答，姐姐！准备好武器！
secondary_translated_text: Gollum! Answer bravely, sister! Prepare your weapons!

original_en_text: Uaahhhhh! Miss grown-up... your journal is bursting with every sort of creature! Overflowing! Surely, we can call this complete!<page>To think, that such a task could even be done! So clever is Nuu, to have set such a fierce predator onto the work!<hpage>These vast lands hold so much life, and to catalogue it all has taught me greatly. It is an effort worth continuing even after I leave this kingdom.<page>Ooh ma, such a hunger is worthy indeed! You and I are of accord, miss grown-up, hunters both. Our methods are different but our appetites have become very similar!<page>Nuu has for you this token, a symbol of all your efforts, and a marker of your true nature. It carries with it her sweet, sweet smell!
original_zh_text: 啊啊啊！记录册要满出来了！绝对算完成了吧！<page>没想到真能做完！努努真聪明，找对帮手了！<hpage>这片大地生机勃勃，记录它们让我受益匪浅。以后我会保留这个习惯。<page>哇！这才是真正的饥渴！大姐姐和我都是合格的猎手！方法不同但胃口一样大！<page>送你一个象征努力的标记，沾着努努的体香哦！
translated_text: 啊！大人，您的日记里充满了各种生物泄漏！当然，我们可以称之为完整！<page>想想看，这样的任务是可以完成的！Nu是如此聪明，让这样一个凶猛的捕食者工作！<hpage>这片广袤的土地上生活着如此多的生命，将它们一一编目让我受益匪浅。即使我离开了这个王国，它也值得继续下去。<page>这饥饿真的是值得的！你和我都是同一个成年女士，都是猎人。我们的方法不同，但我们的胃口却变得非常相似！<page>Nuu为你准备了这个信物，象征着你所有的努力，象征着你的本性。它带有她的甜味！
secondary_translated_text: Ah! My Lord, your diary is full of all kinds of biological leaks! Of course, we can call it complete!<page>Think about it, such a task can be accomplished! Nu is so smart to let such a fierce predator work!<hpage>There are so many lives living in this vast land, and cataloguing them one by one has benefited me a lot. Even if I leave this kingdom, it will be worth continuing.<page>The hunger is really worth it! You and I are both the same adult lady, both hunters. Our methods are different, but our appetites have become very similar!<page>Nuu has prepared this token for you, symbolizing all your efforts and your nature. It has her sweetness!

original_en_text: All bowed before we princes green...
translated_text: 每个人都向我们的绿色王子鞠躬……
secondary_translated_text: Everyone bows to our green prince...

original_en_text: <hpage>What cause sees you travelling these blighted lands, Garmond? Do you also seek the Citadel above?<page>Aye! But do not mistake a valorous adventurer for a mere pilgrim. Mine is a sacred quest, shared with my most trusted companion, dear Zaza.<page>We seek that Citadel not for its gifts. Nay, sister! We seek its rulers, to demand their answer! By force if necessary! For our dear village to whom we pledge our shells. <page>The fearsome haunting of thread, it overcame our fair folk... We are all that remain, left to carry their memory, and the hope to see some justice paid.
original_zh_text: <hpage>加蒙德，你们因何来到这里，莫非也是要去圣堡？<page>对，但我们可不是来朝圣的！我和扎扎肩负着神圣使命！<page>我们去那圣堡，是想为村子讨个公道！<page>该死的丝咒毁了村子，就剩下我们俩……带着大伙的记忆。无论如何我们都要找到答案！
translated_text: <hpage>你为什么来到这片荒凉的土地，加蒙德？您也在寻找上面的城堡吗？<page>是的！但不要将勇敢的冒险家误认为是纯粹的朝圣者。我的任务是一项神圣的任务，由我最信任的同伴、我亲爱的扎扎完成。<page>我们寻找城堡并不是为了它的礼物。不，姐姐！我们寻找它的统治者并要求他们的答案！必要时使用武力！为了我们心爱的村庄，我们向他们承诺我们的贝壳。<page>丝线的可怕麻烦，它征服了我们美丽的人民……我们是剩下的人，留下了他们的记忆，希望看到一些正义得到伸张。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Why have you come to this desolate land, Gamond? Are you also looking for the castle above?<page>Yes! But don't mistake brave adventurers for pure pilgrims. My task is a sacred task, completed by my most trusted companion, my dear Zaza.<page>We do not seek the castle for its gifts. No, sister! We seek its rulers and demand their answers! Use force if necessary! For our beloved village, we promise them our shells.<page>The terrible trouble of the silk thread, it conquered our beautiful people... We are the ones left behind, leaving their memories, hoping to see some justice done.

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, Shakra. It was a welcome surprise to hear your call echo through these crumbling tunnels. How goes the search for your master?<page>Poshanka! It is a difficult task to track anything in these caverns while the worms ceaselessly churn the rock.<page>Still, I can see that my master has travelled here. Her path within this land winds strangely... I wonder at her intent.<page>It is no matter though. She can enlighten me when again we meet. Until then, I will continue in her shadow.
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，沙克拉。听到你喊声从塌方隧道传来很是惊喜。寻找导师有进展吗？<page>啵尚咔！虫子拱得这附近摇来晃去，追踪太难。<page>但她肯定来过这里，行踪诡异……猜不透意图。<page>无所谓。跟她重逢时自然就明白了。在此之前，先继续追。
translated_text: <hpage>你好，沙克拉。听到你的呼叫在这些摇摇欲坠的隧道中回响，真是令人惊喜。寻找主人的工作进展如何？<page>博尚卡！随着蠕虫继续搅动岩石，追踪这些洞穴中的任何东西都可能是一项艰巨的任务。<page>我可以看到我的主人来到这里。她在这片土地上蜿蜒的道路……我想知道她的意图。<page>但没关系。当我们再次见面时，她可以激励我。在那之前，我将继续处于她的阴影下。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Hello, Shakra. It was a surprise to hear your call echoing through these crumbling tunnels. How is the search for the owner going?<page>Boshanka! As the worms continue to stir the rocks, tracking anything in these caves can be a daunting task.<page>I can see my master coming here. Her winding path through this land... I want to know her intentions.<page>But that's okay. When we meet again, she can inspire me. Until then, I will continue to be in her shadow.

original_en_text: Lockin’ us up in a place like this... what a shameful act!
original_zh_text: 把我们关在这种地方……太缺德了！
translated_text: 把我们锁在这样的地方……多么可耻的行为啊！
secondary_translated_text: Locking us in a place like this... what a shameful act!

original_en_text: Come now beast, let us hear your voice! Sing with me, sing with me, sing sing sing! Make caverns echo and great roads ring!
original_zh_text: 来吧大块头，亮开嗓子，与我同唱！让洞窟共鸣，让圣道震颤！
translated_text: 来吧，野兽，让我们听到你的声音！和我一起唱，和我一起唱，唱！让洞穴回响，让大道环起！
secondary_translated_text: Come on, beast, let us hear your voice! Sing with me, sing with me, sing! Let the cave echo and let the great road ring!

original_en_text: Very well, sister. Perhaps it is better that we all just rest here a little longer.
original_zh_text: 好吧，姐妹。就在这歇会儿也行。
translated_text: 很好，姐姐。也许我们最好在这里多休息一段时间。
secondary_translated_text: Very well, sister. Maybe we'd better rest here for a while longer.

original_en_text: Nimble bug! You forfeited the race? It is true that sometimes a reset is needed, for the health of mind and shell.<page>But what say you now? Surely you are eager to return to the track. Let us soar swift together again!
original_zh_text: 怎么中途退赛了？确实，有时为了身心健康，重头再来是必要的。<page>现在怎么说？你肯定渴望重返赛道，那就让我们再次一同飞驰吧！
translated_text: 聪明的错误！你输了比赛？事实上，为了思想和外壳的健康，有时需要重置。<page>但你现在说什么？你当然想回到赛道上。让我们再次一起飞翔！
secondary_translated_text: Smart mistake! You lost the game? In fact, resetting is sometimes necessary for the health of the mind and shell.<page>But what are you saying now? Of course you want to get back on the track. Let's fly together again!

original_en_text: These black threads... they reach upwards with such a powerful longing. No wonder they can force themselves through even mighty stone!
original_zh_text: 这些黑色丝线……向上的渴求如此强烈，难怪能穿透坚岩！
translated_text: 这些黑线。他们带着如此强烈的愿望伸出援手。难怪他们甚至可以强行穿过巨石！
secondary_translated_text: These black lines. They lend a helping hand with such a strong desire. No wonder they could even force their way through the boulder!

original_en_text: Us snitchbugs can wriggle into any place we want, but with this key even a big oafy bug like you can get through a locked door!
original_zh_text: 我们虽然能钻进任何地方，但有了这把钥匙，像你这样的大块头也能开锁！
translated_text: 我们举报人可以爬到任何我们想爬的地方，但有了这把钥匙，即使是像你这样的大傻瓜也可以穿过锁着的门！
secondary_translated_text: We whistleblowers can climb wherever we want, but with this key, even a big fool like you can get through a locked door!

original_en_text: <page=M>Through their march, at the far border of these lowlands, seek the last queen of the ant hunters. We can sense her still... just.<page=B>In youth, her voice united the wild tribes. Gave them the strength to resist the pale monarch’s will... longer than most at least.
original_zh_text: <page=M>穿越低地边境，寻找蚂蚁猎群最后的蚁后。虽然气息微弱，但我们仍能感知到……<page=B>年轻时她一声令下，野外部落群起反抗苍白君主……虽终究不敌。
translated_text: <page=M>他们穿过这些低地的偏远边境，寻找最后的蚂蚁猎人女王。我们仍然能感觉到她。只是.<page=B>当她年轻的时候，她的声音团结了野生部落。赋予他们抵抗苍白君主意志的力量……至少比大多数人都长。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>They cross these lowland remote borders in search of the last ant hunter queen. We can still feel her. just...<page=B>When she was young, her voice united wild tribes. Give them the strength to resist the will of the pale monarch... at least longer than most people.

original_en_text: Let us head on, sister! Together we shall step forward under guidance of our faith!
original_zh_text: 走吧姐妹！咱们一起跟着信仰进圣城！
translated_text: 姐姐，让我们继续前进！我们将在信仰的指引下共同前进！
secondary_translated_text: Sister, let us move on! We will move forward together under the guidance of faith!

original_en_text: Needle Child. Hakk! I encountered a settlement near here, at the core of a vein of old bells. The bugs there were snared silent on a web of Silk.<page>It seemed the pernicious trap of some unseen predator. I left quickly, making sure to avoid the glimmering threads.<hpage>I passed the town myself. The thread sickness, I’ve seen its like upon the roads, but there it does not discriminate.<hpage>The curse that strikes the town, it is driven, focused. A cold use of Silk at a concerning scale.<hpage>If the path permits, I will investigate its source.
original_zh_text: 使针的小姑娘！哈克！附近钟心镇被邪丝罩着，居民全中招了。<page>像是某种没见过的掠食者设的陷阱，我躲着丝溜走了。<hpage>我也路过了那里。路上丝咒多是个例，但那镇子上的邪丝却不挑目标。<hpage>这等规模和冷血手段，显然受到操纵。<hpage>我会顺路追查其源头。
translated_text: 针头，孩子。哈克！我在这里附近遇到了一个定居点，位于古代钟脉的中心。那里的昆虫被丝网悄然困住。<page>这似乎是隐形掠食者的某种致命陷阱。我迅速离开，确保避开闪烁的线程。<hpage>我亲自走过这个小镇。我在路上见过这种疾病，但那里没有歧视。<hpage>攻击小镇的诅咒是被驱使和集中的。感冒会使用相关规模的丝绸。<hpage>如果路径允许，我会调查其来源。
secondary_translated_text: Needle, kid. Huck! I came across a settlement nearby here, in the center of the ancient bell vein. The insects there are quietly trapped by the silk mesh.<page>This appears to be some kind of deadly trap for invisible predators. I quickly left, making sure to avoid the flashing threads.<hpage>I walked through this town myself. I have seen this disease on the road, but there is no discrimination there.<hpage>The curse that attacks the town is driven and concentrated. Silk of relevant size will be used for colds.<hpage>If the path permits, I will investigate its source.

original_en_text: What say you, nimble bug? Though no reward remains to give, I would delight to soar together with you again!
original_zh_text: 意下如何？虽然没有奖励可以赠予，但能再次与您一同疾驰，我仍乐意至极！
translated_text: 你说呢，敏捷的错误？虽然没有奖励可以给予，但我很高兴再次与你一起翱翔！
secondary_translated_text: What do you say, agile mistakes? Although there is no reward to give, I am very happy to soar with you again!

original_en_text: Snnnrk... Zaza... Snnnrnrrk... Look sharp my lad...
original_zh_text: 呼噜噜……扎扎……呼噜噜……盯紧点……
translated_text: Snnrk。扎扎。Snnnrnrrk。看起来很漂亮，我的孩子。
secondary_translated_text: Snnrk。Zazha. Snnnrnrrk。It looks beautiful, my child.

original_en_text: You haven’t enough rosaries for trading? The mad pilgrims in the overgrown village near here always carry some with them.<page>Will you take what you need from them? Leaving them to wander their path endlessly is a false mercy.
original_zh_text: 带的念珠不够？附近那些疯癫朝圣者身上多的是。<page>去抢点？让他们继续这么晃悠才是真残忍。
translated_text: 你没有足够的念珠可以交易吗？附近杂草丛生的村庄里的疯狂朝圣者总是随身携带一些东西。<page>你会从他们那里拿走你需要的东西吗？让他们无休止地游荡是一种虚假的善意。
secondary_translated_text: Don't you have enough rosary beads to trade? Crazy pilgrims in nearby overgrown villages always carry something with them.<page>Will you take what you need from them? Letting them wander endlessly is a false kindness.

original_en_text: Ho, what clever traps the red-shells lay out in defence of their lands!<page>Impressive that you managed to survive such a brutal blow. Your shell must be mighty thick!<hpage>Thick enough, though I’d rather have avoided the trap altogether.<hpage>I’ll let it be a reminder to remain wary, even when no foes are nearby.
original_zh_text: 红壳怪的陷阱真是防不胜防！<page>你真厉害，挨了这么重的一击还能活，壳一定很厚！<hpage>厚归厚，但还是别中招为好。<hpage>吃一堑长一智，以后没敌人也得保持警惕。
translated_text: 哦，红色贝壳为保卫他们的土地设置了多么巧妙的陷阱啊！<page>你在如此残酷的打击中幸存下来真是令人印象深刻。你的壳一定很厚！<hpage>足够厚，尽管我宁愿完全避免陷阱。<hpage>即使附近没有敌人，我也要提醒大家保持警惕。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, what an ingenious trap the red shells set to defend their land!<page>It's impressive that you survived such a brutal blow. Your shell must be very thick!<hpage>Thick enough, although I would rather avoid the trap completely.<hpage>Even if there are no enemies nearby, I would remind everyone to be vigilant.

original_en_text: Well, what a pleasure. The road has carried you back to me.<page>Care for a few games of dice, while we’re here? For the same wager, a beat of rosaries? Just sit here beside me and we’ll begin.
original_zh_text: 真是有缘，又见面了。<page>既然如此，再玩几局骰子？还是老规矩，一奏念珠？想玩的话就坐我旁边吧。
translated_text: 嗯，多么荣幸啊。路把你带回到了我身边。<page>我们在这里想玩几个骰子游戏吗？为了同样的赌注，击败念珠？只要坐在我旁边，我们就开始了。
secondary_translated_text: Well, what an honor. The road brought you back to me.<page>Do we want to play some dice games here? Beat the rosary for the same bet? Just sit next to me and we start.

original_en_text: These docks, I thought them small when first I passed. Now I feel the structure’s true bulk hides below the molten lake.
original_zh_text: 原以为码头很小，结果熔岩湖下还藏着大家伙。
translated_text: 第一次路过的时候，我以为这些码头很小。现在我感觉结构的真实体积隐藏在熔岩湖之下。
secondary_translated_text: When I first passed by, I thought these docks were very small. Now I feel like the true volume of the structure is hidden under the lava lake.

original_en_text: The bellways, gilded veins that run throughout the lands. Supposedly, they were once used for travel?<br><br>These pins will mark stations on your map.
original_zh_text: 遍布各地的鎏金钟道，据说以前是交通线路？<br><br>这些图钉能够标记钟脉站点。
translated_text: 钟楼，遍布地球的镀金矿脉。据说它们曾被用于旅行吗？<br><br>这些别针将在地图上标记车站。
secondary_translated_text: Bell Tower, a gold-plated vein all over the earth. Are they said to have been used for travel?<br><br>These pins will mark stations on the map.

original_en_text: Again... to see... this land abandoned... betrayed...<page>...And a throne I could not sit alone...<hpage>You were mortal bugs, caught beneath a being pale... Devotion or destruction... these are the only fates my kind allow.
original_zh_text: 再次见证……故土荒废……王座空悬……独坐无味……<hpage>你们只是凡虫，屈身于苍白存在脚下……臣服或毁灭……是我的族群唯二的“恩赐”。
translated_text: 再次...看...土地被遗弃了。背叛了。<page>...一个我无法独坐的王座<hpage>你们是被困在苍白之中的凡人..给予或摧毁.这是我的人民唯一允许的命运
secondary_translated_text: Again... Look... The land was abandoned. Betrayed.<page>... A throne I cannot sit alone<hpage>You are mortals trapped in the pale.. Give or destroy. This is the only fate my people will allow.

original_en_text: The world has grown much dangerous, but still we must learn! Cut through the black threads, miss grown-up, and hunt down every beast of Pharloom!
original_zh_text: 世界变危险了，但研究不能停！大姐姐快斩断黑灾诅咒，把纺络的野兽全砍遍！
translated_text: 世界变得越来越危险，但我们还是要学习！切断黑线，想念上帝，猎杀法罗的每一只野兽！
secondary_translated_text: The world is becoming more and more dangerous, but we still have to learn! Cut the black line, miss God, and hunt every beast in Farrow!

original_en_text: <hpage>Shakra, you too brave these bogs? The heights of Pharloom offer harsh welcome.<page>So winds my master’s path, and so I follow. Yet true you speak! This is no place for me.<page>That Citadel’s shadow falls heavy here. I can sense its horrid bulk besides.<page>It is no surprise to see it choke these caverns dank and stagnant. That monstrosity of metal and stone cares not for the lands it consumes.
original_zh_text: <hpage>沙克拉也来闯沼泽？圣堡脚下可没好地方。<page>导师走过这，我只能跟上。但你说得对，这破地真不适合我。<page>圣堡的阴影笼罩着这里，走在路上都能感觉到它的存在。<page>把洞穴都憋得发霉了，但那堆又大又丑的石头可不会管脚下这片土地。
translated_text: <hpage>沙克拉，你在这些沼泽里太勇敢了吗？法鲁姆的高地提供了一个严厉的欢迎。<page>我主人的路就这样蜿蜒，我也跟着走。但你确实说话了！这不是我的位置。<page>城堡的影子在这里隐约可见。此外，我还能感觉到它可怕的大小。<page>看到它窒息这些潮湿而停滞的洞穴并不奇怪。怪物的金属和石头并不关心它消耗的土地。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Shakra, are you too brave in these swamps? The highlands of Farum provided a stern welcome.<page>My master's path winds like this, and I follow. But you did speak! This is not my place.<page>The shadow of the castle can be vaguely seen here. In addition, I can feel its terrible size.<page>It's not surprising to see it suffocating these moist and stagnant caves. The monster's metal and stone do not care about the land it consumes.

original_en_text: My master would have found her way to these wilds, I am sure. Her warrior’s sense has no equal. Surely, I must be drawing closer to her!
original_zh_text: 导师肯定来过这片荒野。她战斗直觉无虫能及，我快追上她了！
translated_text: 我相信我的主人会找到去这些荒野的路。她的战士意识无与伦比。当然，我一定离她越来越近了！
secondary_translated_text: I believe my master will find his way to these wilderness areas. Her warrior consciousness is unmatched. Of course, I must be getting closer and closer to her!

original_en_text: Leave us to our noble hunt, sister! The Citadel’s twisted bugs still infest these gilded halls. Many are their numbers, but we shall see their life’s thread severed.
original_zh_text: 姐妹不必管我们！即便圣堡余孽众多，但来多少我们也能杀多少！
translated_text: 姐姐，让我们继续我们高贵的狩猎吧！城堡里扭曲的昆虫仍然生活在这些镀金的大厅里。他们有很多人，但我们会看到他们生活的绳索被切断。
secondary_translated_text: Sister, let us continue our noble hunting! The twisted insects of the castle still live in these gilded halls. There are many of them, but we will see the ropes of their lives cut.

original_en_text: You can use these to mark places of importance or reminders on your map.<br><br>The shell of the red-hunters makes for a vivid marker indeed.
original_zh_text: 你可以用这个在地图上标记重要地点或提醒事项。<br><br>用红猎手的壳做的标记，足够醒目。
translated_text: 您可以使用这些标记地图上的重要地点或提醒。<br><br>红色猎人的贝壳确实是一个生动的象征。
secondary_translated_text: You can use these to mark important places or reminders on the map.<br><br>The red hunter's shell is indeed a vivid symbol.

original_en_text: How dank and fetid are these ancient roads, sister! My delicate whiskers are nearly overcome by the stench of evil in the air.<page>Woe betide those with delicate senses, such as poor Zaza here. The shadow of that ghastly Citadel falls heavily upon this place!<hpage>I’ve seen many mighty structures fall to decay in my time. Such places often become home to predators. Keep your sights trained on what lurks in the fog, sirs.
original_zh_text: 这破路又暗又臭！我的漂亮胡子都沾上味了！<page>像扎扎这样鼻子灵的，都快被熏坏了！<hpage>我见过不少腐朽崩塌的宏伟建筑，常沦为掠食者巢穴。当心雾里藏着的东西。
translated_text: 姐姐，这些古老的道路多么潮湿、多么臭啊！我精致的胡须几乎被空气中邪恶的恶臭淹没了。<page>不幸的是，感官敏感的人，就像这里可怜的扎扎一样。那座可怕城堡的阴影重重地落在这里！<hpage>在我这个时代，我见过许多宏伟的建筑衰落。这些地方经常成为掠食者的家园。先生们，请关注雾中潜伏的东西。
secondary_translated_text: Sister, how wet and smelly these ancient roads are! My delicate beard was almost drowned out by the evil stench in the air.<page>Unfortunately, people with sensitive senses, like poor Zazha here. The shadow of that terrible castle falls heavily here!<hpage>In my time, I have seen many magnificent buildings decline. These places often become home to predators. Gentlemen, please pay attention to what lurks in the fog.

original_en_text: Hoy, you been creepin’ around this dusty old place for while then, eh? You must be carryin’ a lot of goodies with you! Let a poor old snitchfly ‘ave a quick look!
original_zh_text: 哟，你在这附近转悠了半天，捞到不少好东西吧？让我瞧瞧！
translated_text: 嘿，你在这个尘土飞扬的老地方爬了一段时间了，嗯？你身上一定有很多好东西吧！让一个可怜的老告密者快速看看！
secondary_translated_text: Hey, you've been crawling in this dusty old place for a while, huh? You must have a lot of good things on you! Let a poor old snitch take a quick look!

original_en_text: I’m Sherma, by the way. Just another humble pilgrim like yourself. If you ever need assistance on the road ahead, sing out my name and I’ll be sure to find you. Me and my lucky chime are at your service!
original_zh_text: 我叫谢尔玛，和你一样是朝圣者。路上需要帮忙就喊我！我和幸运铃铛随叫随到！
translated_text: 顺便说一句，我是谢尔曼。只是像你一样卑微的朝圣者。如果您在未来的道路上需要帮助，请唱我的名字，我一定会找到您。我和我的幸运铃为您服务！
secondary_translated_text: By the way, I'm Sherman. Just humble pilgrims like you. If you need help on the road ahead, please sing my name and I will definitely find you. My lucky bell and I are at your service!

original_en_text: We ain’t leavin’ ‘til we’re done pilfering! You be off, if you’re so scared!
original_zh_text: 我才不走，还没偷够呢！怕死就自己跑！
translated_text: 不偷就走！如果你这么害怕，就走开吧！
secondary_translated_text: Steal or leave! If you're so scared, go away!

original_en_text: Please take some rosaries in exchange, red maiden!<page>Though in these dark times their promise of holy reward may never be met, still they carry with them our fondest well-wishes.
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘，请收下这些念珠吧！<page>虽然现在形势不好，但这些念珠装着我们最真诚的祝福！
translated_text: 红姑娘，请拿一些念珠来交换！<page>尽管他们对神圣奖励的承诺在这些黑暗时期可能永远无法兑现，但他们承载着我们最美好的祝愿。
secondary_translated_text: Miss Hong, please exchange some rosary beads!<page>Although their promise of divine rewards may never be fulfilled during these dark times, they carry our best wishes.

original_en_text: Gate, gate, gate! Nicest gate I’ve met!<br>Gate, gate, gate! Greatest miracle yet! Ha ha ha!
original_zh_text: 骨门骨门最贴心！<br>骨门骨门真神迹！哈哈哈！
translated_text: 门，门，门！我见过的最好的门！<br>门，门，门！迄今为止最伟大的奇迹！哈哈哈！
secondary_translated_text: Door, door, door! The best door I have ever seen!<br>Door, door, door! The greatest miracle to date! Hahaha!

original_en_text: <page=M>Those docks, atop the lake of flame, they still possess the means to pass below, though you’d be the first in an age to dare the descent.<hpage>Then my path is clear. Remain in your sanctuary and await my return. If this land can be saved, you may have a part to play yet.
original_zh_text: <page=M>熔岩湖上的深坞仍保有通往下层的手段，但长久以来无虫敢试。<hpage>前路已明，你们就守着圣所等我归来吧。若此地尚存生机，或许还用得上各位。
translated_text: <page=M>那些码头位于火焰湖的顶部，下面仍然有设施可以通过，尽管你将是这个时代第一个敢于下降的人。<hpage>那么我的路就明确了。留在你的避难所里等待我的归来。如果这片土地能够挽救，你可能还有一部分可以发挥。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>Those docks are on top of Flame Lake, and there are still facilities to pass through underneath, although you will be the first person in this era to dare to descend.<hpage>Then my path is clear. Stay in your refuge and wait for my return. If this land can be saved, you may still have a part of it that you can use.

original_zh_text: 要挑战飞毛腿斯威夫特吗？

original_en_text: Ho, what clever traps the red-shells lay in defence of their lands!<page>I’ve narrowly avoided a few nasty ends myself. It certainly adds a thrill to my investigations...
original_zh_text: 呀！红壳怪的陷阱真阴险！<page>我好几次都差点中招。调查工作有点刺激过头了……
translated_text: 哦，红贝壳在保护它们的土地上设下了多么巧妙的陷阱啊！<page>我差点丧命。这确实给我的调查增加了刺激。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, what clever traps the red shells have set in the land that protects them!<page>I almost died. This really added excitement to my investigation.

original_en_text: Well now! How brilliant! In all these fine games you have matched my scores and more!<page>What wonder to be here, and able to witness a display of such profound talent.<hpage>Besting your scores proved an immense challenge, Seth, and yet you seem to have achieved them yourself with relative ease.<page>You flatter me! But yes, my own aptitude continues to surprise me. So many skills I cannot recall learning... <page>But do not underplay your own achievements, for they too are significant, inspiring even!<page>In fact, for my deep respect I insist you take this small medallion. I found it within my belongings, and know not where I came upon it, but it has a most pleasant sense.<page>Let it serve as marker of a friendship I feel has only just begun.<hpage>Thank you, Seth. I shall keep it close.
original_zh_text: 太精彩了！所有游戏你都破了我的记录！<page>能在这见证这么惊艳的表演，真是幸运。<hpage>破你纪录可不容易，但你达成记录时却挺轻松？<page>我自己都惊讶！很多技巧根本不记得学过……<page>但你的成就更能激励我！<page>为表敬意，请收下这枚勋章。不知从哪来的，但带着令人安心。<page>就当我们友谊的信物吧。<hpage>多谢，我会珍藏。
translated_text: 好了！多么美妙啊！在所有这些精彩的游戏中，你的分数与我的分数不相上下，甚至更多！<page>在这里见证如此深刻的才华展示真是太奇怪了。<hpage>塞斯，打破你的分数被证明是一个巨大的挑战，但你似乎可以相对轻松地自己取得结果。<page>你夸我了！但是是的，我自己的才华仍然让我感到惊讶。我不记得学到了这么多技能。<page>但不要低估你的成就，因为它们也很重要，甚至鼓舞人心！<page>事实上，出于我的尊重，我坚持让你持有这枚小奖章。我在我的随身物品中找到了它，不知道在哪里找到的，但它给我的感觉最好。<page>让它作为友谊的标志，我认为这只是一个开始。<hpage>谢谢你，塞思，我会把它放在身边。
secondary_translated_text: Okay! How wonderful! In all these wonderful games, your scores are on par with mine, or even more!<page>It's weird to witness such a profound display of talent here.<hpage>Seth, breaking your scores has proven to be a huge challenge, but you seem to be able to achieve results on your own with relative ease.<page>You praised me! But yes, my own talent still amazes me. I don't remember learning so many skills.<page>But don't underestimate your achievements, because they are also important and even inspiring!<page>In fact, out of my respect, I insist that you hold this little medal. I found it among my belongings, I don't know where I found it, but it gave me the best feeling.<page>Let it serve as a sign of friendship, I think this is just the beginning.<hpage>Thank you Seth, I'll keep it close to me.

original_en_text: While we rest for the journey ahead, care to test your luck with a game of dice? You know how to play, I trust?<hpage>I’m sure I can grasp the rules quickly enough, sir. What is the wager?<page>A beat of rosaries on each roll. What say you? Sound fair? Let our worries roll away with the dice!
original_zh_text: 休息时要来玩玩骰子吗？你应该知道规则吧？<hpage>我学得快，要赌什么？<page>每次押一奏念珠。公平吧？让骰子带走烦恼！
translated_text: 在我们休息的时候，你想玩个骰子游戏来试试你的运气吗？我确信你知道怎么玩吧？<hpage>先生，我确信我能很快掌握规则。赌什么<page>每一卷都有念珠的节拍。你说什么？这听起来公平吗？让我们的担忧随着骰子一起滚去吧！
secondary_translated_text: While we're resting, would you like to play a game of dice to try your luck? I'm sure you know how to play it?<hpage>Sir, I'm sure I can master the rules quickly. bet on what<page>Each roll has the beat of a rosary. What did you say? Does that sound fair? Let our worries roll away with the dice!

original_en_text: Hrm...? Oh, hoy there! ‘Tis a pleasure to meet you here at the end of our long journey, sister.<page>I am Sherma, a simple pilgrim like yourself. What a wonder to find ourselves finally here, eh?<page>Rising at last to the heights of the Citadel and being amongst so many of our brothers and sisters... it is a blessing indeed. Yes, a blessing.<hpage>Your voice belies some hesitation in that belief, little pilgrim. To have travelled this far is to have seen the reality of this broken place. What do you make of it, truly?
original_zh_text: 哎呀！姐妹！走了这么远终于碰面了！<page>我是谢尔玛，和你一样的朝圣者。能走到这儿太不容易了！<page>和这么多同袍登上圣堡……真是恩赐……嗯，是恩赐。<hpage>你听起来有些犹豫？既已走到这里，想必你也看清了此地的破败真相，有什么感想？
translated_text: 嗯。？哦，嘿，那里！“很高兴在我们漫长的旅程结束时在这里见到你，姐姐。<page>我是谢尔曼，和你一样是一个简单的朝圣者。终于在这里找到自己真是太棒了，不是吗？<page>最终爬到了城堡的高处，成为了我们众多兄弟姐妹中的一员。这确实是一种祝福。是的，祝福。<hpage>小朝圣者，你的声音隐藏着这种信念中的一些犹豫。走了这么远，我看到了这个破碎地方的现实。您对此到底有何看法？
secondary_translated_text: Hmm.? Oh, hey, there! "It's nice to see you here at the end of our long journey, sister.<page>I am Sherman, a simple pilgrim like you. It's great to finally find yourself here, isn't it?<page>Eventually I climbed high in the castle and became one of our many brothers and sisters. This is indeed a blessing. Yes, blessings.<hpage>Little pilgrim, your voice hides some hesitation in this belief. Having traveled so far, I saw the reality of this broken place. What exactly do you think about this?

original_en_text: Hoy! You again? This place used to be nice and quiet, but now we can’t get a moment’s peace!
original_zh_text: 喂！又是你？这地方本来安安静静的，现在连喘口气都难！
translated_text: 嘿！又是你？这个地方曾经很好很安静，但现在我们却得不到一刻的平静！
secondary_translated_text: Hey! You again? This place used to be nice and quiet, but now we can't get a moment of peace!

original_en_text: Ahh, sister! You have awoken. I hope that our powerful strikes did not leave you in too weak a condition.<page>We would even be willing to duel again, if you still have the strength!
original_zh_text: 啊哈哈，姐妹，你醒啦？没打疼你吧？<page>你要还有力气想再打一轮，我们随时奉陪！
translated_text: 啊，姐姐！你醒了希望我们强大的攻击没有让你太弱。<page>如果你还有实力，我们甚至愿意再战一场！
secondary_translated_text: Ah, sister! You wake up and hope that our powerful attack has not made you too weak.<page>If you still have the strength, we are even willing to fight again!

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir Guardian... I scarcely thought we would meet again after our encounter.<page>Hm? Apologies friend, I fear I don’t recognise you. And I’m sure I would remember such a striking figure!<hpage>...Pay no heed, sir. It seems I mistook you for another.<hpage>You are... a traveller through these quaking lands, I take it?<page>I suppose I am indeed! I was born into this world not long ago, waking beside a lake with only this weapon laying beside me.<page>Seth is my name, though I know not who gave it to me.<page>The custom of the newly-born is to explore the world, is it not? So that is what I have set out to do! I will rest here a moment, then continue my journey.
original_zh_text: <hpage>守卫者先生……没想到能再见。<page>抱歉朋友，我们见过吗？像你这样的虫我肯定忘不掉。<hpage>……抱歉，是我认错了。<hpage>你是……旅行者？<page>算是吧！我刚降生不久，就在湖边，身边还有这些武器。<page>我叫赛斯，但不知谁取的名。<page>新生儿就该探索世界对吧？我休息一会儿就继续上路。
translated_text: <hpage>守护者爵士。见面后，我几乎没想到我们会再次见面。<page>嗯？抱歉，朋友，恐怕我不认识你。我相信我会记住这样一个了不起的人物！<hpage>...忽略它，先生。看来我把你当成别人了。<hpage>你...我想是一位穿越这些颤抖土地的旅行者吧？<page>我想我是！我出生在这个世界不久前，醒来在湖边，只有这把武器在我身边。<page>塞斯是我的名字，尽管我不知道是谁给我的。<page>新生儿的习俗是探索世界，对吧？这就是我开始做的事情！我会在这里休息一段时间，然后继续我的旅程。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Sir the keeper. After meeting, I hardly thought we would meet again.<page>Hmm? Sorry, friend, I'm afraid I don't know you. I believe I will remember such a great person!<hpage>... Ignore it, sir. Looks like I mistook you for someone else.<hpage>you... A traveler through these trembling lands, I suppose?<page>I think I am! Not long before I was born in this world, I woke up by the lake, with this weapon beside me.<page>Seth is my name, although I don't know who gave it to me.<page>The custom of newborns is to explore the world, right? This is what I started doing! I will rest here for a while and then continue my journey.

original_en_text: Miss grown-up! What sweet surprise for Nuu! The world rumbles and the black threads stretch. Not safe now to wander.<page>But you! You are adult yes? Fully grown? Ready to hunt, no matter the darkness?<hpage>Certainly I am no child, young one.<page>Perfect then! Nuu must ask a wish! For her, you would seek Pharloom’s many fabulous bugs and cut them.<page>Cut them with your blade! Cut them with your mature spirit! Cut them with your savage adult heart!<page>Would you help Nuu? Before it all ends? Could you take her scroll, and fill its pages with the learnings of your cuts?
original_zh_text: 大姐姐！努努好惊喜！世界在震颤，黑灾在蔓延。现在独自游荡可不安全。<page>但你！你是成虫对吧？完全长大了？准备好狩猎了，无惧黑暗？<hpage>我显然不是个小孩子，小家伙。<page>太好啦！努努有个愿望！帮我去砍纺络的各种神奇虫子吧！<page>用你的刀砍！用长大的力气砍！用成熟的狂野之心砍！<page>帮帮努努好不好？趁着一切还没有终结，收下这本册子，用打架心得写满它！
translated_text: 大人，小姐！这对Nuu来说是多么甜蜜的惊喜啊！世界隆隆作响，黑线延伸。现在到处走走不安全。<page>但是你！你是成年人了吧？完全长大了？准备好天黑或狩猎了吗？<hpage>当然，我不是一个孩子，还年轻。<page>太完美了！Nuu必须问一个愿望！对于她来说，你会发现Pharloom的许多奇妙的虫子并将它们剪掉。<page>用你的刀切它们！用你成熟的精神来消灭他们！用你野蛮的成年之心切割它们！<page>你会帮助Nuu吗？在结束之前？你能拿着她的卷轴并用你的编辑知识填满页面吗？
secondary_translated_text: My lord, miss! What a sweet surprise this was for Nuu! The world rumbles and the black line stretches. It's not safe to walk around now.<page>But you! Are you an adult? Fully grown? Ready for dark or hunting?<hpage>Of course, I am not a child, I am still young.<page>It's perfect! Nuu must ask a wish! For her, you will discover Pharloom's many wonderful bugs and cut them off.<page>Cut them with your knife! Use your mature spirit to destroy them! Cut them with your barbaric adult heart!<page>Will you help Nuu? Before it's over? Can you take her scroll and fill the page with your editing knowledge?

original_en_text: ...Great strides move the world, but small steps shouldn’t be overlooked...<page>...One mystery leads to another. Scrutinising the belly of the thing will prove useful...<hpage>The meaning behind your musings is as opaque as ever. Would you converse with me directly, sir?<page>...Trust yourself. And each other. The solution is always within grasp...
original_zh_text: ……大变革撼动天地，但小细节亦不容忽视……<page>……谜题环环相扣。剖开事物本质方能解惑……<hpage>先生高论依旧晦涩，能否直言相告？<page>……信己信人。答案触手可及……
translated_text: ...大步触动世界，但小步也不容忽视……<page>...一个谜团引发另一个谜团。仔细检查某物的腹部可能很有用。<hpage>冥想背后的意义仍然一如既往地不透明。先生，您可以直接和我谈谈吗？<page>... Believe in yourself.而且彼此的答案总是掌握在掌控之中……
secondary_translated_text: ... Big steps touch the world, but small steps cannot be ignored...<page>... One mystery leads to another mystery. It may be useful to carefully examine the abdomen of something.<hpage>The meaning behind meditation remains as opaque as ever. Sir, could you talk to me directly?<page>... Believe in yourself. and each other's answers are always under control...

original_en_text: The creatures of this wood can disguise themselves amongst the many branches. Watch for unexpected movement and be prepared to strike.
original_zh_text: 林子里虫子会伪装成树枝。注意周围动静，随时准备出手。
translated_text: 这片森林中的生物可以在众多的树枝中伪装自己。注意意外动向，做好进攻准备。
secondary_translated_text: Creatures in this forest can disguise themselves among the numerous branches. Pay attention to unexpected movements and be prepared to attack.

original_en_text: Spider dear, what a delight to have you visit! It is oh so lonely here at the bottom of the world.<hpage>I cannot share your mirth, child. Your small rebellion above now causes this kingdom’s collapse.
original_zh_text: 小蜘蛛，你来啦！真高兴，独自在这世界之底，好寂寞呢~<hpage>我可高兴不起来，孩子。你那点小小的反叛就要毁灭上方的王国了。
translated_text: 亲爱的蜘蛛，你能来真是太好了！在世界的尽头，太孤独了。<hpage>我无法分享你的幸福，儿子。你上面的小叛乱现在导致了这个王国的崩溃。
secondary_translated_text: Dear Spider, it's so good of you to come! At the end of the world, it's so lonely.<hpage>I cannot share your happiness, son. The little rebellion above you has now led to the collapse of this kingdom.

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, Shakra. I had a sense I would find you in these winding tunnels, filled as they are with the marks of combat.<page>Poshanka! You trust your instincts rightly. The red-shelled warriors who carved out these roads make for excellent opponents indeed.<page>I would gladly spend much time here, testing myself against their blades and cunning traps, but I must keep to my task. As should you!
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，沙克拉。看到那些打斗痕迹，我就知道能在附近碰上你。<page>啵尚咔！你直觉真准。那些红壳战士真够厉害，打得痛快！<page>真想多待会儿练练手，但任务要紧。你也别耽搁！
translated_text: <hpage>你好，沙克拉。我有一种感觉，我会在这些蜿蜒的隧道中找到你，因为它们充满了战斗的痕迹。<page>博尚卡！你正确地相信你的直觉。开辟这些道路的红甲士兵确实是出色的对手。<page>我很高兴在这里花很多时间，考验自己对抗他们的刀锋和狡猾的陷阱，但我必须坚持我的使命。你也应该这样做！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Hello, Shakra. I have a feeling that I will find you in these winding tunnels because they are full of traces of battle.<page>Boshanka! You correctly trust your instincts. The red-armored soldiers who opened up these paths are indeed excellent opponents.<page>I am happy to spend a lot of time here, testing myself against their blades and cunning traps, but I must stick to my mission. You should do the same!

original_en_text: Hahhh... hahhh... oh, sister. What a toll it exacts on us... this endless combat! Certainly when peace finally comes, we will be in the right mind to appreciate it...<hpage>You place too much burden upon yourself, sir.<hpage>Though I share your ambition to free this land from its curse, I counsel you to rest, even if only for a short while.<page>Us, rest? While you, my dear sister, fight on so gallantly? Hahhhh... we cannot.<page>What would our old village think of us, were we to quit our charge? No, regardless of what you may believe, there’s strength enough still in these old shells!
original_zh_text: 哈……哈……噢，姐妹。这架打得骨头都快散架了……等太平了可得好好睡一觉……<hpage>别把担子全压自己身上。<hpage>我也想终结诅咒，但该休息还是得休息。<page>休息？你也还在拼命，我们哪能躺下？<page>要是半途而废，村里的大伙会怎么想！别看我们一身旧壳，里头可有劲呢！
translated_text: 哈哈.哈哈.哦，姐姐。这给我们造成了多么大的损失..这无休止的战斗！当然，当和平最终到来时，我们会以正确的心态欣赏它。<hpage>先生，您给自己带来了太多的负担。<hpage>尽管我和你一样雄心勃勃，希望将这片土地从诅咒中解放出来，但我建议你休息一下，即使只是很短的一段时间。<page>我们休息吧？亲爱的姐姐，你怎么敢这么勇敢地战斗？哈哈.不行<page>如果我们放弃冲锋，我们的老村庄会怎么看我们？不，无论你相信什么，这些旧壳里仍然有足够的力量！
secondary_translated_text: ha ha. ha ha. Oh, sister. What a great loss this has caused us.. This endless battle! Of course, when peace finally comes, we will appreciate it with the right mindset.<hpage>Sir, you have put too much burden on yourself.<hpage>Although I share your ambition to liberate this land from its curse, I suggest you take a break, even if it's just for a short time.<page>Shall we rest? Dear sister, how dare you fight so bravely? ha ha. no<page>If we give up the charge, what will our old village think of us? No, no matter what you believe, there is still enough power in these old shells!

original_en_text: <hpage>Child, I hold the means to descend. Let us meet one final time, and quell this black ruin of our making.
original_zh_text: <hpage>孩子，我有办法下潜。我们再最后见一面，终结这黑暗吧。
translated_text: <hpage>孩子，我有办法下去。让我们最后一次见面，平息我们创造的黑色废墟。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Boy, I have a way to get down. Let us meet one last time and calm down the black ruins we have created.

original_en_text: <hpage>Learning about a land’s inhabitants is a worthwhile undertaking. Perhaps you are more grown than you realise, Nuu.<page>Ma! Such delicious praise will make Nuu shrivel! Go now! Hunt, and prey, and begin our learning!
original_zh_text: <hpage>研究生态是好事，努努。或许你比看起来要成熟。<page>呀！这么夸人家要害羞啦！快去打猎，开始我们的研究！
translated_text: <hpage>了解一个国家的人民是一项值得的工作。也许你比你想象的更成熟，努。<page>妈妈！如此美味的赞美会让Nuu枯萎！现在就走！狩猎，狩猎，开始我们的学习！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Getting to know the people of a country is a worthwhile job. Maybe you are more mature than you think, Nu.<page>Mom! Such delicious praise will wither Nuu! Go now! Hunting, hunting, start our learning!

original_en_text: Child Wielding Needle. What do you make of this huge, groaning structure?<hpage>The scale of it all impresses me. If this is merely an outpost of the Citadel above, then their capital must be grand beyond measure.<page>Yokkala... Perhaps so. They must have prized indeed the work done here, to build something so vast in such a dangerous place.
original_zh_text: 使针的小姑娘，你怎么看这吱呀乱响的大家伙？<hpage>规模惊人。若这仅是圣堡的一处前哨，那主城的宏伟难以想象。<page>哟咔啦……或许吧。在这种险地修这么大工程，肯定费了不少劲。
translated_text: 孩子们挥舞着针。您如何看待这个巨大的、呻吟的结构？<hpage>我对这一切的规模印象深刻。如果这只是上面城堡的前哨基地，那么他们的首都一定大得无法估量。<page>约克卡拉。也许吧他们必须珍惜他们在这里所做的工作，在如此危险的地方建造了如此巨大的东西。
secondary_translated_text: The children waved needles. What do you think of this huge, groaning structure?<hpage>I was impressed by the scale of all this. If this was just an outpost for the castle above, then their capital must be immeasurably large.<page>Yorkkara. Maybe they must cherish the work they do here, building such a huge thing in such a dangerous place.

original_en_text: Seek swift to calm our crying land, Hornet Wielding Needle. And know that I shall remain here, to stand against these husks gone dark.
original_zh_text: 快去平息纺络的哀嚎，使针的小姑娘。我会保护这里的虫民。
translated_text: 黄蜂挥舞着针，试图迅速平息我们哭泣的土地。我知道我会留在这里，与这些变黑的贝壳作斗争。
secondary_translated_text: The wasp waved its needle and tried to quickly calm the land where we cried. I knew I would stay here and fight these blackened shells.

original_en_text: I’ll bring the healing supplies to the settlement with all haste, red maiden.<page>Fear not on my behalf. My fellow pilgrims are all praying for me, and thereby no harm will befall me!
original_zh_text: 我这就把药送回去。<page>别担心我！大伙都在为我祈祷，不会有事的！
translated_text: 红女，我会尽快将治疗物资带到定居点。<page>别担心我。我的朝圣者正在为我祈祷，所以我不会受到伤害！
secondary_translated_text: Red Girl, I will bring treatment supplies to the settlement as soon as possible.<page>don't worry about me. My pilgrims are praying for me, so I won't be harmed!

original_en_text: ‘Tis now my charge to care for those who stay here, including yourself. If I can aid you in any way, please let me know!
original_zh_text: 现在我负责照顾大伙，包括你在内。有什么需要尽管说！
translated_text: “现在我的责任是照顾留在这里的人，包括你自己。如果我能以任何方式帮助您，请告诉我！
secondary_translated_text: "Now my responsibility is to take care of those who remain here, including yourself. If I can help you in any way, please let me know!

original_en_text: Oh, what a shock! Discovered again so easily! Like a hapless little hatchling!<page>If you’re going to make a sport of tracking me, I’ll have to redouble my efforts at camouflage!
original_zh_text: 吓我一跳！又被发现了！跟刚破壳的小虫似的！<page>你要是想拿我当猎物练手，我可要升级伪装术了！
translated_text: 哦，太震惊了！如此容易再次被发现！就像一只倒霉的小幼崽！<page>如果你想追随我作为一项运动，我就得更加努力地伪装它！
secondary_translated_text: Oh, what a shock! So easy to be discovered again! Like an unlucky little cub!<page>If you want to follow me as a sport, I'll have to work harder to disguise it!

original_en_text: The jagged crest looming over all of Pharloom. Its whipping winds and bitter cold would pierce the strongest shell.
original_zh_text: 俯瞰纺络的尖峰，寒风能刺穿最坚硬的外壳。
translated_text: 锯齿状的山峰覆盖了整个法鲁岛。它的强风和刺骨的寒冷会刺穿最坚固的贝壳。
secondary_translated_text: Jagged peaks cover the entire island of Faro. Its strong winds and biting cold will pierce the strongest shells.

original_en_text: Ahh, the shining bench has risen for us! Pharloom’s kindness to we pilgrims is inexhaustible!<page>Please rest, red maiden, and fear not. Our kingdom watches over us all!
original_zh_text: 看！圣椅为我们升起了！纺络永远眷顾朝圣者！<page>安心歇息吧，王国在庇护我们呢！
translated_text: 啊，闪亮的长凳为我们举起了！法鲁对我们朝圣者的善意是无尽的！<page>请休息吧，红女孩，不要害怕。我们的王国保护我们所有人！
secondary_translated_text: Ah, the shining bench is lifted for us! Faro's kindness to us pilgrims is endless!<page>Please rest, red girl, and don't be afraid. Our kingdom protects us all!

original_en_text: Join your voice with mine, red maiden! You, me, and my lucky chime will sing together until the great gate opens!
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘，快加入合唱！你我加上幸运铃铛，肯定能用歌声叩开大门！
translated_text: 加入你和我的声音，红女孩！你、我和我的幸运钟声将一起歌唱，直到门打开！
secondary_translated_text: Join you and my voice, red girl! You, me and my lucky bell will sing together until the door opens!

original_en_text: Hrm? Hoy there! I was looking for somewhere to rest my weary shell and found this cosy station!<hpage>These lands are dangerous. I had thought perhaps some harm had come to you.<page>Harm? O red maiden, have faith! No harm can come to us on this holy ascent! We only need to keep our gaze upwards.<page>Isn’t this all so terribly grand? The great stone steps, the winds lifting us up like the voices of a choir, and just beyond it all is our pilgrimage’s end. The great Citadel at last!
original_zh_text: 嗯？红衣姑娘！我正在找地方歇脚，这驿站多舒适啊！<hpage>此处很凶险，我担心你遭遇不测。<page>不测？要对圣途有信心！只要仰望圣堡，灾祸自会远离！<page>这景象多壮丽啊！巨大石阶，乘着风声，宛如圣歌，终点就在眼前了！
translated_text: 嗯？你好啊我正在寻找一个地方来休息我疲惫的身体，并找到了这个舒适的车站！<hpage>这些土地很危险。我以为你可能受伤了。<page>伤害？哦，红女孩，有信心！在这次神圣的攀登中，我们不会遭受任何伤害！我们只需要保持警惕。<page>这是不是太宏伟了？巨大的石阶，风像唱诗班的声音一样将我们举起，经过这一切，我们朝圣之旅结束了。伟大的城堡终于到来了！
secondary_translated_text: Hmm? Hello I was looking for a place to rest my tired body and found this comfortable station!<hpage>These lands are dangerous. I thought you might be hurt.<page>Hurt? Oh, red girl, have confidence! We will not suffer any harm on this sacred climb! We just need to be vigilant.<page>Isn't this too grand? The huge stone steps, the wind lifted us like the voice of a choir, and after all this, our pilgrimage ended. The great castle has finally arrived!

original_en_text: She and her like have red-rocky shells to protect their softnesses. Inside is very sweet! Very hard to crack them open though, so is best to wait. Is always best to wait!
original_zh_text: 它们用红岩壳保护内部的软肉。里面超甜！但壳太难撬，最好等自然腐烂！
translated_text: 她和她的同类有红色的岩石壳来保护它们的柔软性。里面太甜了！但破解它们很困难，所以最好等待。最好等待！
secondary_translated_text: She and her kind have red rock shells to protect their softness. It's so sweet inside! But cracking them is difficult, so it's best to wait. Better wait!

original_en_text: <hpage>Gladly, Shakra. Upon this stone, let us test our shells.
original_zh_text: <hpage>求之不得。就在此石台上一较高下吧。
translated_text: <hpage>非常高兴，沙克拉。在这块石头上，让我们测试一下我们的贝壳。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Very happy, Shakra. On this stone, let's test our shells.

original_en_text: Well met, sister. Though the beastly Citadel has finally been slain, still the lands caught beneath it suffer!<page>The evils long done by that cursed place have sunk into the kingdom’s very foundations, and now they rise up as a black sickness.<hpage>This darkness, it is a curse deadlier than the Haunting... a force from far below that will consume all if given the opportunity.<page>Hmm... Just so! And while wickedness still stalks these lands, our hornlance shall not rest!
original_zh_text: 又见面了，姐妹。圣堡祸根虽除，但下面的土地还在遭罪！<page>诅咒早已根植在纺络的各处，现在化作黑暗冒了出来。<hpage>这黑暗远比丝咒致命……来自最深的邪恶，一有机会就会吞噬一切。<page>哼……果然！只要邪恶还没除净，我们的长枪就放不下！
translated_text: 你好，姐姐。尽管这座野兽般的城堡最终被屠杀，但它下方的土地仍然遭受了苦难！<page>这个被诅咒之地的邪恶长期以来已经沉入了王国的根基，现在却像黑色的疾病一样崛起。<hpage>这种黑暗是一个比幽灵更致命的诅咒--一种来自远低于它的力量，只要有机会，就会吞噬一切。<page>呃...没错！当邪恶仍然笼罩着这些土地时，我们的仇恨不会停止！
secondary_translated_text: Hello, sister. Although this beast-like castle was eventually slaughtered, the land below it still suffered!<page>The evil of this cursed land, long sunk into the foundations of the kingdom, now rises like a black disease.<hpage>This darkness is a curse more deadly than ghosts-a power that comes from far below it that will devour everything given the opportunity.<page>Uh... That's right! While evil still hangs over these lands, our hatred will not stop!

original_en_text: Sturdy gaaaaa-aaate, I don’t ask you break or beee-eeend,<br>Just open a little for me, and my tall maiden frieeee-eeend!
original_zh_text: 骨门呀骨门，不求你折断，<br>只要开条缝让咱过，我和高个姑娘谢你恩典！
translated_text: 强庸医，我不会要求你打破或哔声，<br>只要为我和我高大的处女朋友打开它就行了！
secondary_translated_text: Qiang quack, I will not ask you to break or beep,<br>Just open it for me and my tall virgin friend!

original_en_text: These waters, at land’s edge... and the shrine atop... our furtive escape... our brief retreat from rule...<page>So many moments spent simple... joyful... free...
original_zh_text: 这片水岸……我们暂时远离王权的休憩……<page>那些简单……快乐……自由的时光……
translated_text: 这些水域位于陆地的边缘。还有上面的神社。我们偷偷溜走了，我们短暂地逃离了统治<page>很多时刻都很简单。开心免费的...
secondary_translated_text: These waters are located on the edge of the land. There is also the shrine above. We slipped away, we briefly escaped the rule<page>Many moments are simple. Happy free...

original_en_text: What say you, sister? Shall we join together in valiant combat?
translated_text: 姐姐，你说什么？我们应该一起勇敢战斗吗？
secondary_translated_text: Sister, what did you say? Should we fight bravely together?

original_en_text: Oh red maiden, sorry to have lured you into such danger!<page>And those poor bugs, bewitched by the thread. No sin could possibly warrant such a fate...<hpage>Your pity is not misplaced, but better suited for another time. For now, you should look to your own care.<page>Ah... yes. I should get these healing supplies back to the pilgrims’ settlement above. My brothers and sisters have waited long enough.
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘，对不起把你卷进来！<page>那些被丝线控制的同伴……他们犯了什么错……<hpage>有怜悯之心固然好，但要先顾好自己。<page>对……我得把药送回聚落。他们等太久了。
translated_text: 哦，红女，对不起，把你引到如此危险的境地！<page>还有那些可怜的虫子，对线程着迷。没有什么罪可以保证这样的命运。<hpage>你的怜悯没有什么错，但更适合下次。目前，你应该照顾好自己。<page>啊...是的，我应该把这些治疗用品带回上面的朝圣者定居点。我的兄弟姐妹已经等得够久了。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, Red Girl, I'm sorry to put you in such a dangerous situation!<page>There are also those poor bugs who are obsessed with threads. No crime can guarantee such a fate.<hpage>There's nothing wrong with your pity, but it's better for next time. For now, you should take care of yourself.<page>Ah... Yes, I should take these treatment supplies back to the pilgrim settlement above. My brothers and sisters have waited long enough.

original_en_text: <hpage>The parasite writhing within my shell has a violent aversion to the void. <hpage>Despite the protection granted by the Everbloom, even now I can feel those wretched roots preventing my descent.<hpage>If I’m to dive, and cut this land from its black thread curse, I must first find means to extract the intruder within.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我壳里的寄生物极度抗拒虚空。<hpage>虽然有永绽花保护，但那些根须还是在阻止我下潜。<hpage>要斩断诅咒，得先除掉体内这玩意。
translated_text: <hpage>寄生虫在我的壳里蠕动，对虚空有着强烈的厌恶。<hpage>尽管有永恒的花朵的保护，即使现在我也能感觉到那些可怜的根阻止我的衰落。<hpage>如果我要潜水并将这片土地从黑线诅咒中切断，我首先必须找到一种方法将入侵者从其中撤出。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>The parasite wriggled in my shell, with a strong aversion to the void.<hpage>Despite the protection of eternal flowers, even now I can feel those poor roots holding back my decline.<hpage>If I were to dive and cut this land from the Black Line Curse, I would first have to find a way to withdraw the invaders from it.

original_en_text: Many foes await us. Shall we duel with one another before moving on?
original_zh_text: 前方有不少恶战等着，先来场热身赛？
translated_text: 许多敌人正在等待我们。我们在前进之前应该先决斗吗？
secondary_translated_text: Many enemies are waiting for us. Should we duel before moving forward?

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, Nuu. You have travelled far from your lodgings, I was not expecting to meet you in these lowlands.<page>Oh, hello again miss grown-up! Yes, Nuu is not the fastest, but she goes great distances to follow the scent of learnings.<page>And look what Nuu has found! A great big beast, cracked open and broken apart! There is much to learn from him, so Nuu will savour it all slowly.
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，努努。你跑得真远，没想到在低地遇见你。<page>大姐姐！努努虽然腿短，但跟着知识气味能走超远！<page>看努努发现了什么！这个被肢解的大家伙！慢慢研究肯定能学到好多！
translated_text: <hpage>你好，nu。你已经远离你的居住地，没想到会在这些低地遇见你。<page>哦，你好，我的主！是的，Nuu不是最快的，但她已经走了很长的路来追随学习的气息。<page>看看Nuu发现了什么！一头巨兽裂开，支离破碎！有很多东西值得向他学习，所以Nuu会慢慢品味这一切。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Hello, nu. You have been far away from your place of residence and never expected to meet you in these lowlands.<page>Oh, hello, my Lord! Yes, Nuu is not the fastest, but she has come a long way to follow the breath of learning.<page>Look what Nuu found! A giant beast split open and shattered! There are many things to learn from him, so Nuu will slowly savor it all.

original_en_text: With this quill, you can add any new areas you discover to the maps that you own. We pluck these quills from Golpeni hunted by my tribe. Their hollowed shafts make the perfect charting tool.
original_zh_text: 用这羽毛笔能把新发现的区域补到地图上。羽毛是从我们部落猎的高尔佩尼鸟身上拔的，中空的羽管最适合拿来绘图。
translated_text: 使用此笔，您可以将发现的任何新区域添加到您拥有的地图中。我们从戈尔佩尼那里拿走了这些羽毛笔，他正在我的部落里打猎。它们的空心轴是完美的绘图工具。
secondary_translated_text: Using this pen, you can add any new areas you discover to the map you have. We took these quill pens from Golpenny, who was hunting in my tribe. Their hollow shafts are the perfect drawing tool.

original_en_text: Child Wielding Needle, how far our wanderings take us! The cold air here bites through our shells as true as any blade.
