Warm yourself by my lantern while I call. <hpage>Pharloom is a land of harsh extremes. Perhaps that is, in part, why the pilgrims have a culture of testing themselves against it so fervently.<page>Perhaps. When I first encountered them, I had little respect for the weak, rag-bundled bugs. Too cowardly to even carry a weapon!<page>But... Dondakku. Sometimes we judge too quickly. There is a subtle strength to them, though it is difficult for me to truly understand it.
original_zh_text: 使针的小姑娘，咱们跑得真远！这里寒气刺骨，来灯笼边暖暖。<hpage>纺络环境真是极端，或许这也是朝圣者们测试信仰的一部分。<page>也许吧。当初觉得他们是群软蛋，连武器都不敢带！<page>但……咚嗒库！也算是我看走眼吧，他们有种我说不清的韧劲。
translated_text: 挥舞着针头的孩子们，我们的流浪者带我们走了多远！这里的冷空气就像任何刀片一样刺穿我们的外壳。我打电话时用灯笼取暖。<hpage>法鲁是一片充满残酷极端的土地。也许这就是朝圣者如此热情地测试文化的部分原因。<page>也许当我第一次见到它们时，我对这些虚弱、破烂的昆虫并不尊重。他太懦弱了，连武器都不敢携带！<page>但是...东达库。有时我们判断得太快。他们有一种微妙的力量，尽管我很难真正理解它。
secondary_translated_text: Children wielding needles, how far have our wanderers taken us! The cold air here pierces our shells like any blade. I use a lantern to keep me warm when I talk on the phone.<hpage>Faro is a land full of cruel extremes. Perhaps this is part of the reason why pilgrims test culture so enthusiastically.<page>Perhaps when I first met them, I had no respect for these weak, tattered insects. He is too weak to even carry a weapon!<page>but... Dongdaku. Sometimes we judge too quickly. They have a subtle power, although it's difficult for me to really understand it.

original_en_text: Ahh, the caress of this warm water on my weary limbs is welcome indeed. As soothing as a psalm, haha!<page>Will you splishy-splash in the holy bath with me, red maiden? We can sing together to aid in our rejuvenation!
original_zh_text: 泡着热水澡真舒服！比唱圣歌还解乏，哈哈！<page>要和我一起泡吗？边泡边唱歌更解乏！
translated_text: 啊，这温水抚摸着我疲惫的四肢，真的很受欢迎。就像一首诗一样舒缓，哈哈!<page>红女孩，你愿意和我一起洗圣浴吗？我们可以一起唱歌，帮助我们的复兴!
secondary_translated_text: Ah, this warm water caresses my tired limbs. It's really popular. It's as soothing as a poem, haha!<page>Red girl, would you like to take the holy bath with me? We can sing together and help our rejuvenation!

original_en_text: Want yer clicky-clackies threaded nice and tight? Old Grindle will do it gladly, if you let ‘im snitch a few for hisself...
original_zh_text: 要把叮当响串稳当？格林德尔来帮你！抽点佣金就行！
translated_text: 想要你的咔嗒声又好听又紧吗？如果你让老格林德尔自己举报，他会很高兴……
secondary_translated_text: Want your clicks to be nice and tight? If you let old Greendale report it himself, he would be happy...

original_en_text: D-do not judge me a doubter! The Citadel is a holy place indeed, resplendent and vast beyond my wildest hopes!<page>But yet... the grand halls ache with silence, and I see suffering in the shadows wherever I peer too deeply.<page>Fear, and pain... why were these things allowed into our paradise? Have my brothers and sisters not yet earned their holy reward?
original_zh_text: 别当我是叛信者！圣堡确实是圣地，比我想的还壮观！<page>可是……大殿里死气沉沉，角落里到处都藏着苦痛。<page>恐惧啊伤痛啊……为什么让这些脏东西进圣地？我们还不够虔诚吗？
translated_text: 不要认为我是一个怀疑者!这座城堡确实是一个神圣的地方，辉煌而广阔，超出了我最疯狂的希望!<page>但是。雄伟的大厅因寂静而痛苦，无论我凝视得多深，我都能看到阴影中的痛苦。<page>恐惧，还有痛苦……为什么这些东西被允许进入我们的天堂？我的兄弟姐妹还没有收到神圣的奖励吗？
secondary_translated_text: Don't think I'm a skeptic! This castle is indeed a sacred place, glorious and vast, beyond my wildest hopes!<page>But. The majestic hall was in pain with silence, and no matter how deeply I stared, I could see the pain in the shadows.<page>Fear, and pain... why are these things allowed into our paradise? Haven't my brothers and sisters received the sacred reward yet?

original_en_text: ...Crossed weapons, sleeping of course, but shaped unlike any you’ve seen before...<page>...To travel underneath is one thing, but travelling up above may require a different sort of sight...<hpage>Sir Herald... It seems rare coincidence for us to meet in this distant land. Unless, perhaps, you followed me here?<page>...A path that meets itself is an ill portent indeed. Those who peer sideways know well enough...<page>
original_zh_text: ……崇山深谷，却非你所熟知的形态……<page>……穿行地底是一回事，但翱翔天际需另种眼界……<hpage>使者大人……在这偏远之地重逢，是巧合还是您尾随而来？<page>……道途相逢并非吉兆。小家伙还是别多嘴了……
translated_text: ...交叉的武器，当然是睡觉的，但形状与你以前见过的任何东西都不同。<page>...在下面旅行是一回事，但在上面旅行可能需要不同的视角..<hpage>先锋爵士。我们在这片遥远的土地上相遇，似乎是一个罕见的巧合。也许除非你跟着我到这里？<page>...一条遇见自己的道路确实是一个不祥的预兆。从旁边看的人都知道.<page>
secondary_translated_text: ... Crossed weapons, of course, for sleeping, but in a different shape than anything you've ever seen before.<page>... Traveling below is one thing, but traveling above may require a different perspective..<hpage>Pioneer knight. It seemed a rare coincidence that we met in this distant land. Maybe unless you followed me here?<page>... A path to meet yourself is indeed an ominous omen. Anyone looking from the side knows it.<page>

original_en_text: Nice little pair of rolly-rollies we got ‘ere. Sure to bring luck to any snitchin’ expedition...
translated_text: 我们有一对漂亮的小滚筒。它肯定会给任何告密者的探险带来好运。
secondary_translated_text: We have a pair of beautiful little rollers. It will surely bring good luck to any whistleblower's expedition.

original_en_text: ...The elements do not conspire against you. They have their own desires...<page>...When one spies a great peak, the natural inclination is to begin climbing...<page>...The little left-behind... you’ve decided, then? A companion for the journey...
original_zh_text: ……万物并非与你为敌，它们自有渴求……<page>……望见高峰，攀爬便是本能……<page>……那个被遗弃的小家伙……你决定带他同行了？……
translated_text: ...这些元素不会密谋反对你。他们有自己的欲望。<page>...当一个人发现一座大山，自然的趋势是开始攀登...<page>...小呆在后面。那么你决定了吗？旅途中的伙伴。
secondary_translated_text: ... These elements will not conspire against you. They have their own desires.<page>... When one discovers a mountain, the natural tendency is to start climbing...<page>... Stay behind. So have you decided? Companions on the journey.

original_en_text: <hpage>Feel guilt at your absence, sir, but know the end was inexorable, the outcome set, whether you remained or not.<page>Do not seek to console me, warrior... This memory is mine alone... I’ll not brook your brutish intrusion...<page>You who dare trespass this sacred chamber, ready yourself... to see us, and know us, Verdania’s rulers, together in our finest form...
original_zh_text: <hpage>无需为自己的缺席感到愧疚，结局早已注定，无关你的去留。<page>少来安慰我……战士……这是我的回忆……容不得莽夫插嘴……<page>擅闯圣殿者……准备见证翠庭国双王的最强形态吧！
translated_text: <hpage>先生，为您的缺席感到内疚，但要知道，无论您留下与否，结果都是不可避免的，结果也是注定的。<page>别试图安慰我，士兵。这段记忆只属于我一个人我不能容忍你的野蛮入侵……<page>请为那些敢于入侵这个神圣房间的人做好准备..看到我们，认识我们，维尔达尼亚的统治者，以我们最好的形式聚集在一起..
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Sir, I feel guilty for your absence, but know that whether you stay or not, the outcome is inevitable and doomed.<page>don't try to comfort me, soldier. This memory belongs to me alone. I cannot tolerate your brutal invasion...<page>Please be prepared for those who dare to invade this sacred room.. See us, know us, rulers of Verdania, gather together in our best form..

original_en_text: If you choose to rest here, I will watch over you, Child Wielding Needle. These charts require long attention, and my own sleep is far off yet.
original_zh_text: 想休息的话，我给你放哨。我暂时不睡，还得多琢磨琢磨图纸。
translated_text: 如果你选择在这里休息，我会照顾你，针线男孩。这些图表需要长时间的关注，而我自己的睡眠还很遥远。
secondary_translated_text: If you choose to rest here, I will take care of you, needle boy. These charts require long attention, and my own sleep is still far away.

original_en_text: Beasty, beastly, big fat beast! Strong as a boulder, or a rock at least! Let’s sing together ‘til you’re released!<page>Oh! Look here red maiden, this poor creature is all tangled up in white bindings! Surely you know a song for unsticking such stickiness?<hpage>It will take a power greater than song to break these bindings, little one. In my current diminished state even I can not cut through them.<page>Well, worry not! If something is needed, the road will bring it to us!
original_zh_text: 大块头啊大块头，壮如磐石力无穷！与我合唱放你走！<page>红衣姑娘快看！这可怜家伙被白丝缠住了！你会解缚之歌吗？<hpage>这束缚并非歌唱能解。凭我现在的气力，也斩不断这些丝线。<page>不必担心！所需之物肯定就在圣途之上！
translated_text: 野兽，野兽，又大又胖的野兽！像巨石一样坚固，至少像岩石一样！让我们一起唱，直到你被释放！<page>噢！看这里，红女孩，这个可怜的生物被白色束缚缠住了！你确定你知道一首歌可以打破这种粘性吗？<hpage>小家伙，你需要比歌曲更多的力量来打破这些束缚。在我现在虚弱的状态下，即使是我也无法切断它们。<page>好的，别担心！如果有什么需要，道路会给我们！
secondary_translated_text: Beast, beast, big fat beast! As strong as a boulder, at least as rock! Let's sing together until you are released!<page>Oh! Look here, red girl, this poor creature is entangled in the white shackles! Are you sure you know a song that can break that stickiness?<hpage>Little guy, you need more power than songs to break these shackles. In my current weak state, even I cannot cut them off.<page>Okay, don't worry! If there is anything needed, the road will be given to us!

original_en_text: Nimble bug! You abandoned the race? Surely it was only an error?<page>In the pursuit of speed all reason can ofttimes be lost, left in the wind as it were.<page>At least you seem recovered of your lapse. And surely you are eager now?<page>We must sprint on! Let us soar swift together!
original_zh_text: 怎么中途退赛？肯定是失误了对吧？<page>专注追求速度经常会忘记思考。<page>看来你已经调整好了，继续吧？<page>让我们一起继续冲刺！
translated_text: 聪明的错误！你放弃了比赛？这肯定只是一个错误吗？<page>在追求速度的过程中，所有的理性往往都会消失，就像被扔进风中一样。<page>至少你已经从错误中恢复过来了你确定你现在想要吗？<page>我们必须冲刺！让我们一起翱翔！
secondary_translated_text: Smart mistake! You gave up the game? Is this definitely just a mistake?<page>In the pursuit of speed, all rationality often disappears, just like being thrown into the wind.<page>At least you've recovered from your mistake. Are you sure you want it now?<page>We must sprint! Let us soar together!

original_en_text: Child Wielding Needle. These are stale roads, ill-fitted for warriors such as ourselves.<page>There is fair combat here against the roach-beasts and their keepers, but the air is sickly and the water writhes with parasites.<hpage>This environment is harsh indeed, though life seems to adapt itself to many hardships. Do you believe your master travelled these roads?<page>I had thought not at first, but upon closer search I found the fragments of a trail winding through these fetid ruins.<page>Perhaps she saw something here that I did not? Her senses are often keen where mine are clouded.
original_zh_text: 使针的小姑娘。这路太安稳了，配不上咱们战士。<page>打打蟑螂和饲者还行，但空气污浊，水里全是寄生虫。<hpage>环境糟糕，但生命总能适应。你觉得你的导师来过这儿？<page>本来觉得不会，结果在废墟里找到了些许踪迹。<page>难道她发现了什么我没注意到的东西？她的眼光总是比我毒辣。
translated_text: 孩子们挥舞着针。这些路很旧，不适合我们这样的士兵。<page>与蟑螂及其饲养员的斗争是公平的，但空气是病态的，水中充满了寄生虫。<hpage>环境确实恶劣，尽管生活似乎适应了很多困难。你相信你的主人走过了这些道路吗？<page>一开始我并不这么认为，但经过仔细寻找，我发现了一条蜿蜒穿过恶臭废墟的小路的碎片。<page>也许她在这里看到了一些我没有看到的东西？在我感官失明的地方，她的感官常常很敏锐。
secondary_translated_text: The children waved needles. These roads are old and not suitable for soldiers like us.<page>The battle against cockroaches and their keepers is fair, but the air is sick and the water is full of parasites.<hpage>The environment is indeed harsh, although life seems to adapt to many difficulties. Do you believe that your master has traveled these paths?<page>I didn't think so at first, but after careful searching, I found fragments of a path winding through the stench of ruins.<page>Maybe she saw something here that I didn't see? In places where my senses are blind, her senses are often sharp.

original_en_text: Hold there, sister! A great beast stalks this land, swooping and screeching like an ill-mannered tyrant!<page>Zaza has been following the creature’s scent, and now I’m sure we’re almost upon it! We’re so close my whiskers are bristling!<page>Such a beast is worthy quarry for the valiant, aye? What say you, shall we hunt the creature together?
original_zh_text: 姐妹留步！附近藏着一只大家伙，俯冲尖啸，不好对付！<page>扎扎一路闻着它的味道呢，肯定就在附近！我的胡子都翘起来了！<page>那是个难得的好对手。怎么说，要不要联手干掉它？
translated_text: 停下来，姐姐！一头巨兽徘徊在这片土地上，像一个粗鲁的暴君一样俯冲、尖叫！<page>扎扎一直在追踪这种生物的气味，现在我确信我们快到了！我们离得太近了，我的胡子都竖起来了！<page>这样的野兽值得勇敢的人去猎杀，不是吗？你说怎么样，我们一起猎杀这个生物？
secondary_translated_text: Stop it, sister! A giant beast lingered in the land, swooping and screaming like a rude tyrant!<page>Zaza has been tracking the scent of this creature, and now I am sure we are almost there! We were so close that my beard stood up!<page>Such a beast is worth the brave man's kill, isn't it? What do you say, we hunt this creature together?

original_en_text: Many of Pharloom’s bugs have useful equipment and items to trade. It would do you well to keep track of their locations with this pin.<br><br>These pins will mark vendors on your map.
original_zh_text: 达罗穆有很多虫带着好货，最好记下他们的位置。<br><br>这些图钉能够标记商贩位置。
translated_text: Pharloom的许多虫子都有有用的设备和物品可供交易。用这个别针跟踪他们的位置对您有好处。<br><br>这些别针将在您的地图上标记供应商。
secondary_translated_text: Many of Pharloom's bugs have useful equipment and items to trade for. It's good for you to track their position with this pin.<br><br>These pins will mark the supplier on your map.

original_en_text: Basic tool’o the job, here. Throw your big needle and scratch shinies straight off your target’s shell!
original_zh_text: 干我们这行的基础道具，直接从目标身上把宝贝钩下来！
translated_text: 基本的工作工具就在这里。扔出你的大针，直接从目标外壳上抓住闪亮的光芒！
secondary_translated_text: The basic working tools are here. Throw your big needle and grab the shining light directly from the target shell!

original_en_text: ...Oh. Wyrm child. No surprise it’s you who meets me here.<page>Following me are you? Or calling me? It is true I would not have sought the lands below if not for your grand actions within them.<page>But now, having journeyed their breadth, what singular sights I beheld... Flaming lakes, tangled woods, caves consumed by sand and frost...<page>Remarkable things all, though given their void claimed state it seems you and I may be the last to hold those memories.<hpage>I cannot allow that outcome, Herald. I act now to save that place, both for myself and for those bugs still alive within.<hpage>As one who has seen so much, tell me simply, do you believe my efforts in vain?<page>Me? Certainly you can ask, but I cannot provide good answer. I’ve no mind for outcomes. Always my vision is too clouded by the present.<page>Only the journey... the now. For myself, that is the purpose, and as far as my sight can see.<page>If any other could come to understand that state, Wyrm child, I suspect it may be you... <page>Though maybe not yet, not this present, hmmm? Maybe in a future far, when your actions might hail me so again?<page>Alas, from these quaking caves it is past time I made my swift exit. Ours each may be long and winding roads, but I hope you too come to know the many joys upon the path...
original_zh_text: ……哦。沃姆后裔。在此相遇倒也不意外。<page>尾随还是召唤？若非你在地底闹出大动静，我本不会来此。<page>如今游历四方，得见何等奇景……熔岩湖、缠藤林、冰封沙穴……<page>叹为观止，然虚空侵蚀之下，唯你我留存此间记忆。<hpage>我无法坐视，使者大人。此刻行动既为自救，也为庇佑残存生灵。<hpage>作为见证者，请您直言相告，我等努力是否为徒劳？<page>问我？答不上来。未来迷雾重重，我目光唯见当下。<page>唯有旅程……此时此刻。于我而言，此即意义，也即我目之能视。<page>沃姆之女，或许唯你能懂此心境……<page>也许尚非此时？待你功成之日再唤我来？<page>唉，该离开这震颤洞穴。前路漫漫，愿你亦能领略沿途风光……
translated_text: ...哦恶魔。难怪你在这里遇见我。<page>你在跟踪我吗？或者打电话给我？事实上，如果不是你在下面的土地上的宏伟行动，我不会寻求下面的土地。<page>但现在，我穿越了他们广阔的世界，看到了多么奇怪的景象……炎热的湖泊、纠结的树林、被沙子和霜冻吞没的洞穴……<page>所有这些令人惊奇的事情，尽管它们声称是空洞的状态，但似乎你和我可能是最后一个拥有这些记忆的人。<hpage>我不能让这种事发生先驱者我现在正在采取行动拯救这个地方，既为了我自己，也为了里面仍然活着的虫子。<hpage>作为一个见多识广的人，告诉我，你相信我的努力是徒劳的吗？<page>我？你当然可以问，但我无法提供一个好的答案。我不在乎结果。我的视野总是被现在蒙蔽。<page>只有一次旅程。现在据我所知，对我自己来说，这就是目的。<page>如果还有人能理解这种状态，维隆孩子，我怀疑可能就是你……<page>虽然可能还没有，但这不是这个礼物，嗯？也许在遥远的未来，当你的行动可能会再次向我致敬时？<page>唉，我快速逃离这些颤抖的洞穴的时间已经过去了。我们走的每一条路都可能漫长而曲折，但我希望你也能理解这条路的诸多乐趣。
secondary_translated_text: ... Oh devil. No wonder you met me here.<page>Are you following me? Or call me? In fact, I would not seek the land below if it weren't for your magnificent actions on the land below.<page>But now, as I traveled through their vast world, I saw what strange sights... hot lakes, tangled woods, caves swallowed by sand and frost...<page>All these amazing things, despite their claims to be hollow states, it seems that you and I may be the last people to have these memories.<hpage>I can't let this happen. Pioneering I'm now taking action to save this place, both for myself and for the bugs that are still alive in it.<hpage>As a well-informed person, tell me, do you believe my efforts are in vain?<page>Me? Of course you can ask, but I can't provide a good answer. I don't care about the outcome. My vision is always blinded by the present.<page>There is only one journey. Now as far as I know, for myself, that is the purpose.<page>If anyone can understand this state, Veron child, I suspect it may be you...<page>Maybe not yet, but this is not the gift, huh? Perhaps in the distant future, when your actions may pay tribute to me again?<page>Alas, the time for me to quickly escape these trembling caves is over. Every road we take can be long and tortuous, but I hope you can understand the many joys of this road.

original_en_text: You would fight alone, sister? You would be undefeatable with me by your side! And Zaza also! You need only ask, and our hornlance would be yours.
original_zh_text: 你想单打独斗？有我和扎扎助阵肯定能百战百胜！需要帮忙就开口，我们的长枪自会跟上！
translated_text: 姐姐，你会独自战斗吗？有我在你身边，你将无敌！还有扎扎！只要提出要求，我们的仇恨就会属于你。
secondary_translated_text: Sister, will you fight alone? With me by your side, you will be invincible! And Zaza! Just ask for it, and our hatred will belong to you.

original_en_text: ...Do they realise it would only be the beginning? If they cleave themselves free, they would need to find their way anew...
original_zh_text: ……他们可知这只是开端？即使能得解脱，众生仍需寻觅新途……
translated_text: ...他们是否意识到这只是开始？如果他们挣脱束缚，他们需要再次找到路……
secondary_translated_text: ... Do they realize this is just the beginning? If they break free, they need to find their way again...

original_en_text: My hopes go with you, red maiden. They will follow you into the deepest darkness, and beyond!
original_zh_text: 我的希望与您同在，红衣姑娘。它将随您深入至暗，直至彼岸！
translated_text: 我的希望与你同在，红女孩。他们将跟随你进入最深的黑暗甚至更远的地方！
secondary_translated_text: My hope is with you, red girl. They will follow you into the deepest darkness and beyond!

original_en_text: Fierce red-shells nest across these wide caverns. Battle with them is most intense. Impressive are the warriors of Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 红壳怪占满荒野洞穴，它们是个好对手。这里的生物也比髓骨地更凶残。
translated_text: 燃烧的红色贝壳在这些宽阔的洞穴中筑巢。与他们的战斗最为激烈。法鲁的士兵令人印象深刻。
secondary_translated_text: Burning red shells nest in these broad caves. The battle with them is the fiercest. Faro's soldiers are impressive.

original_en_text: <hpage>Even if only your shadow remains, to release your mother’s grip my blade would see it slain.<page>Then why hold, even this moment? Surely terror hasn’t suddenly claimed your hardened heart?<page>Take the final plunge, spider. Join us in my drowning palace, and let oblivion swallow us all.<hpage>Oblivion may take you, child. My own life, I shall not sacrifice.<hpage>I have survived the fury of your land. I have borne its barbs and its blades, and I have seen wonder behind its dangers.<hpage>But always, child, I remain a daughter of Hallownest. And the void below all things, that darkness I will fear no longer...
original_zh_text: <hpage>就算你只剩一道暗影，我也会斩断你母亲的丝线。<page>那还犹豫什么？难道你害怕了？<page>跳下来啊，小蜘蛛！和我一同沉溺，让虚无吞噬我们！<hpage>虚无或许能吞噬你，但我绝不献祭自己。<hpage>我熬过了纺络的无数荆棘，也在危机中见证过奇迹。<hpage>但我永远是圣巢之女。对万物之底的虚空……再无畏惧！
translated_text: <hpage>即使只剩下你的影子，我的剑也会杀死它，以解开你母亲的束缚。<page>那么为什么即使是现在还要坚持呢？恐怖会突然夺走你冰冷的心吗？<page>最后一枪，蜘蛛。加入我们，加入我溺水的宫殿，让遗忘吞没我们所有人。<hpage>孩子，你可能会被遗忘，我自己的生命，我不会牺牲它。<hpage>我在你们国家的愤怒中幸存下来。我忍受了它的倒刺和刀锋，我看到了它危险背后的奇迹。<hpage>但永远，儿子，我仍然是肯尼思的女儿。万物之下的空虚，我将不再害怕黑暗……
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Even if only your shadow remains, my sword will kill it to untie your mother's bonds.<page>So why persist even now? Will terror suddenly take away your cold heart?<page>Last shot, spider. Join us, join my drowning palace, and let forgetting swallow us all.<hpage>Child, you may be forgotten, my own life, I will not sacrifice it.<hpage>I have survived the anger of your country. I endured its barbs and blades, and I saw the miracle behind its dangers.<hpage>But always, son, I will still be Kenneth's daughter. The emptiness under all things, I will no longer be afraid of darkness...

original_en_text: Oooh! Greedy are you? Mean to poor li’l snitchbugs like us? Won’t survive out there without our secrets, oh no no!
original_zh_text: 小气鬼！欺负老实虫？没我们的秘密帮衬你在外头活不过三天！
translated_text: 噢！你贪心吗？对于我们这样可怜的小举报人来说，这是卑鄙的吗？如果没有秘密，我们就无法生存，哦不不！
secondary_translated_text: Oh! Are you greedy? Is this despicable for poor little whistleblowers like us? If there were no secrets, we would not be able to survive, oh no!

original_en_text: Our last race was grand, yes? But I see now I set too mild a challenge for one as spritely as yourself!<page>I prepared only to race, but you arrived bringing destiny! In you my wish may finally be granted, the barriers of speed broken wide!<page>Are you prepared nimble bug? The time is upon us. The final test for the swift and spry!
original_zh_text: 上回比赛还不错吧？但我还是低估你了！<page>原本只想跑个痛快，但你说不定能实现我突破速度极限的愿望！<page>灵巧的虫子，时候到了！准备好突破速度的桎梏了吗？
translated_text: 我们的上一场比赛很精彩，不是吗？但我现在发现，对于像你这样精力充沛的人来说，我提出的挑战太温和了！<page>我只准备比赛，你却带来了命运！在你身上，我的愿望终于实现了，速度的障碍也被打破了！<page>你准备好了吗？最后的测试时间到了！
secondary_translated_text: Our last game was great, wasn't it? But I now find that the challenge I posed was too gentle for someone as energetic as you!<page>I only prepared to compete, but you brought fate! In you, my wish has finally been realized, and the barrier to speed has been broken!<page>Are you ready? It's time for the final test!

original_en_text: Miss grown-up has hunted much, so soon is time for Nuu to venture out, she thinks. Keep your sights keen, for to meet in the wilds would be a delight!
original_zh_text: 大姐姐这么能干，努努也该出门探险了！期待在荒野偶遇哦！
translated_text: 她相信成年人和年轻女士已经狩猎了很多，所以很快就到了Nuu冒险外出的时候了。保持敏锐的眼光，因为在荒野中相遇将是一种乐趣！
secondary_translated_text: She believes adults and young ladies have hunted a lot, so it will soon be time for Nuu to venture out. Keep a sharp eye, because meeting in the wilderness will be a pleasure!

original_en_text: O-hoho! You’re lookin’ a little stuck there! What a pity!<hpage>Are you too a prisoner here, small bug? If we ally our efforts, escape could be made that much easier.<page>Hoho, you jestin’? There ain’t no allies in prison! Just throw yourself against the walls in there while I go sniffin’ for goodies!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！锁住了吧？真可怜！<hpage>又见面了，小毛贼。你也被关起来了？我们联手的话，越狱容易得多。<page>哦嚯嚯！想得美，监狱哪有盟友！你撞墙玩去吧，我找宝贝去咯！
translated_text: 哦嗬嗬！你看起来有点卡住了！多么可惜啊！<hpage>巴格，你也是这里的囚犯吗？如果我们齐心协力，逃跑就会容易得多。<page>呵呵，你在开玩笑吗？监狱里没有盟友！当我去闻东西的时候，你把自己扔到墙上！
secondary_translated_text: Oh ho ho! You look a little stuck! What a pity!<hpage>Bug, are you a prisoner here too? If we work together, it will be much easier to escape.<page>Hehe, are you kidding? There are no allies in prison! When I went to smell something, you threw yourself against the wall!

original_en_text: A scroll detailing the scents and tastes of Pharloom’s various bugs and beasts.
original_zh_text: 这本册子记录着纺络虫兽的气味与口感。
translated_text: 一幅详细描述了法鲁各种昆虫和野兽的气味和味道的卷轴。
secondary_translated_text: A scroll detailing the smells and tastes of various insects and beasts in Faro.

original_en_text: Miss grown-up! Nuu had fear that the awful rumblings of the world or sticky black threads had snatched you away from her!<hpage>I have survived, Nuu, and shall fight on while my strength remains.<hpage>The kingdom has grown darkly dangerous, but this hearth-home seems to still provide some safety. I suggest you remain here for now.<page>Of course! Nuu shall stay inside. The sickening sense of those twisted threads has spoilt the joy of my venturings.<page>You though, miss grown-up... is now not the perfect time to fully complete our journal?<page>The world-rumblings will surely have scared up many creatures from their hiding places! So go and hunt, and show sweet Nuu what you learn!
original_zh_text: 大姐姐！还以为你被地震或黑灾吃掉啦！<hpage>就差一点，不过我没事。<hpage>外面愈发混乱，但这还算安全。你暂时别出去。<page>努努才不出去！那些扭曲的丝线太讨厌了，毁了探险的兴致！<page>但大姐姐……现在不正是完善记录的好时机？<page>地震肯定把怪物都吓出洞了！快去打猎给努努开眼界吧！
translated_text: 大人，小姐！Nu担心世界的可怕噪音或粘粘的黑线会把你从她身边带走！<hpage>我活下来了，努，我会在我的力量还在的时候继续战斗。<hpage>王国变得更加危险，但壁炉似乎仍然提供了一些安全。我建议你在这里待一段时间。<page>当然！小奴应该待在里面。那些扭曲的线条的令人作呕的感觉毁了我冒险的乐趣。<page>但是你，我的主，小姐。这难道不是完整完成日记的最佳时机吗？<page>世界末日肯定会吓跑许多生物，不敢躲藏！所以去打猎吧，向可爱的Nuu展示你所学到的东西！
secondary_translated_text: My lord, miss! Nu is worried that the terrible noise of the world or the sticky black lines will take you away from her!<hpage>I live, Nu, and I will continue to fight while my strength is still there.<hpage>The kingdom has become more dangerous, but the fireplace still seems to provide some security. I suggest you stay here for a while.<page>Of course! Xiaonu should stay inside. The sickening feeling of those twisted lines ruined the joy of my adventure.<page>But you, my Lord, miss. Isn't this the best time to complete the diary?<page>The end of the world will definitely scare away many creatures and dare not hide! So go hunting and show lovely Nuu what you have learned!

original_en_text: Why spurn a little duel, sister? Surely it would put us in good stead for the trials ahead!<hpage>If we were to duel it would doubtless be illuminating. Unfortunately, I lack the time for such frivolity. Farewell, sirs.
original_zh_text: 干嘛拒绝呢，切磋下嘛！就当战前热身！<hpage>切磋的好处……对你更多。我没空陪你玩，告辞。
translated_text: 为什么拒绝一场小小的决斗呢，姐姐？这无疑对我们未来的测试有利！<hpage>如果我们战斗，无疑会很有启发性。不幸的是，我没有时间争论这样的争论。再见，先生们。
secondary_translated_text: Why refuse a little duel, sister? This will undoubtedly be beneficial to our future tests!<hpage>If we fight, it will undoubtedly be very enlightening. Unfortunately, I don't have time to argue such an argument. Goodbye, gentlemen.

original_en_text: <hpage>Cowards. Here you hide, even as you cause your own land’s demise.
original_zh_text: <hpage>懦夫。你们亲手葬送自己的土地，却躲在此处。
translated_text: <hpage>懦夫即使你破坏了自己的土地，你也躲在这里。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Coward Even if you destroy your own land, you hide here.

original_en_text: Ka, va! Your shell is ridden with those gruesome maggots. It was a foolish choice of yours to swim in their sickly pools.<hpage>This was by no means desired, Shakra. For now, I think it best you remain at limb’s length. <hpage>I shall not abide this infestation long. By Silk or by rest I shall soon see myself cleansed.
original_zh_text: 咔呀！你的壳上爬满了恶心的蛆虫。在那些毒水池子里游泳真是太蠢了。<hpage>我也不想这样，沙克拉。你最好离远点。<hpage>我不会让这些蛆虫待太久的，靠灵丝或休整自会清除。
translated_text: 咔，哇！你的壳上布满了那些可怕的蛆虫。在他们的病态泳池游泳是你愚蠢的选择。<hpage>这绝对不是我们想要的，夏克拉。目前，我认为最好保持距离。<hpage>我不会长期忍受这种入侵。无论是丝绸还是安息，我很快就会看到自己得到净化。
secondary_translated_text: Cut, wow! Your shell is covered with those terrible maggots. Swimming in their sick pool is your stupid choice.<hpage>This is definitely not what we want, Shakla. For now, I think it's best to keep a distance.<hpage>I will not endure this intrusion for long. Whether it is silk or rest, I will soon see myself purified.

original_en_text: Nimble bug! You seem to have lost your way upon the course. Surely it was only an error? You already seem recovered of your lapse.<page>You are eager to run again, yes, yes? Let us soar swift together!
original_zh_text: 看来你迷路了，肯定是小失误！<page>调整好了？那就再比一次吧！
translated_text: 聪明的错误！你似乎在课程中迷失了方向。这肯定只是一个错误吗？你似乎已经从错误中恢复过来了。<page>你渴望再次参选，不是吗？让我们一起翱翔！
secondary_translated_text: Smart mistake! You seem to have lost your way in the course. Is this definitely just a mistake? You seem to have recovered from your mistake.<page>You're eager to run again, aren't you? Let us soar together!

original_en_text: ...One can visit the past, but then memories become contradictory...<page>...When the call rings out again, will you let your previous actions cloud your vision?<page>...By claw, by voice... History always rises to meet us...
original_zh_text: ……即便往昔可以重访，但记忆终将悖逆……<page>……当唤声再起，你会让昔日的抉择蒙蔽双眼么？<page>……以爪为刃，以声为引……历史永远不会等候我们……
translated_text: ...人们可以回顾过去，但记忆却变得矛盾……<page>...当电话再次响起时，你会让之前的行为蒙蔽你吗？<page>...通过爪子，通过声音……历史总是崛起欢迎我们……
secondary_translated_text: ... People can look back, but memories become contradictory...<page>... When the phone rings again, will you let your previous behavior blind you?<page>... Through claws, through sound... history always rises to welcome us...

original_en_text: Oooh, ma. Miss grown-up, you deny poor Nuu? So sour!<page>Think of all the delectable learnings can we dig out of the creatures living here!
original_zh_text: 哎呀，大姐姐拒绝努努？好狠心！<page>想想能从这些生物身上挖出多少美味的知识啊！
translated_text: 哦，妈妈。大人，你否认可怜的努吗？好酸！<page>想想我们可以从生活在这里的生物身上学到的所有有趣的知识！
secondary_translated_text: Oh, mom. My lord, do you deny poor Nu? So sour!<page>Think of all the interesting things we can learn from the creatures living here!

original_en_text: But wait! Before you depart. Your exceptional skill requires an equally fine reward!<page>This shining shard of ancient mask is yours! Take it. Cherish it. And know, you shall forever have my thanks.
original_zh_text: 等等，临走前再送个配得上你的宝贝！<page>这块远古面甲碎片归你了！谢谢你，希望你永远铭记这场较量！
translated_text: 但是等等！在你离开之前。您的出色技能需要同样丰厚的奖励！<page>这个闪亮的古代面具碎片是你的！接受它。珍惜它。知道我会永远感谢你。
secondary_translated_text: But wait! Before you leave. Your outstanding skills require the same generous rewards!<page>This shining ancient mask fragment is yours! Accept it. Cherish it. Knowing that I will always thank you.

original_en_text: This is a fine shiny-shiny, ain’t it? Those dirty old raggedies like to carry these around, and we like to snitch ‘em away when we can! O-ho-ho!
original_zh_text: 亮晶晶的小玩意！那些破烂朝圣者喜欢带这个，就从他们身上顺的！哦嚯嚯！
translated_text: 这是一个漂亮闪亮的，不是吗？那些肮脏的旧垃圾喜欢随身携带这些东西，我们喜欢在可能的时候举报它们！哦嗬嗬！
secondary_translated_text: It's a beautiful shiny one, isn't it? Those dirty old garbage likes to carry these things around, and we like to report them when possible! Oh ho ho!

original_en_text: Ooooh ma, you make Nuu so happy! Hunt down the creatures of this land, and record them in this scroll!
original_zh_text: 哇大姐姐你真好！猎杀这里的生物，把见闻记在本子上！
translated_text: 哦，妈妈，你让Nu太高兴了！追捕这片土地上的生物并将它们记录在这张卷轴上！
secondary_translated_text: Oh, Mom, you make Nu so happy! Hunt down the creatures of this land and record them on this scroll!

original_en_text: <hpage>Fair greetings Shakra, in these drifts consumed by crust and sand.<hpage>These caverns have returned to nature, but I see evidence of bold structures buried throughout.<page>The shells of their builders rest in a tower above. A grand tribe they seemed, and strong fighters I’m sure. Alas, they exist now only as hardened husks.<page>Lament, Child Wielding Needle! We lived too late to match their claws.
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，沙克拉。这里已被沙岩吞没了。<hpage>洞穴虽然复归原貌，但岩层里似乎埋着宏伟建筑。<page>建造者的尸壳堆在上面的塔里呢。当年肯定是强盛部落，也有不少勇士。可惜都只剩下空壳了。<page>可惜啊，使针的小姑娘，我们生不逢时，无缘与他们较量。
translated_text: <hpage>在这些被地壳和沙子吞没的漂移中，向释迦拉致以美丽的问候。<hpage>这些洞穴已经回归自然，但我看到了隐藏在整个洞穴中大胆结构的证据。<page>建造者的外壳坐落在上面的一座塔楼上。他们似乎是一个伟大的部落，我相信他们是坚强的战士。唉，它们现在只作为硬壳存在。<page>哀叹，孩子针！我们活得太晚了，配不上他们的爪子。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>In these drifts swallowed by the earth's crust and sand, send beautiful greetings to Sakyala.<hpage>These caves have returned to nature, but I see evidence of bold structures hidden throughout the caves.<page>The builder's shell sits on a tower above it. They seem to be a great tribe, and I believe they are strong fighters. Alas, they now exist only as hard shells.<page>lament, child needle! We live too late to deserve their claws.

original_en_text: Don’t despair, pilgrim frieeeee-eeend,<br>Lift your sight and raise your voice!<br>Have no fear, pilgrim truuuuu-uuuuue,<br>Believing is a happy choice!<page>Hoy there! Aren’t these fields marvellous? And above us are the bountiful moors, where every pilgrim can fill their belly!<hpage>These hot fields are a wonder indeed, but hunters prowl the long grass. Playing your instrument will only alert them to your presence.<page>Well then, alert them I shall! For where many gather, great songs are sung!
original_zh_text: 莫沮丧啊朝圣友，<br>昂首放歌莫踌躇！<page>别畏惧啊同道虫，<br>心怀信念最幸福！<page>看这原野多壮美啊！上方沼地还能让每个朝圣者饱腹！<hpage>原野虽好，长草中却有猎手潜伏。奏乐只会暴露行踪。<page>暴露又何妨！聚在一块，正好一起高歌！
translated_text: 不要绝望，朝圣者朋友，<br>抬起眼睛，提高声音！<br>别害怕，朝圣者Truuuuu@uuuu<br>相信这是一个幸福的选择！<page>你好啊这些领域不是很神奇吗？我们头顶上是肥沃的荒野，每个朝圣者都可以在这里填饱肚子！<hpage>这些炎热的田野确实是一个奇迹，但猎人们在长长的草丛中徘徊。演奏你的乐器只会提醒他们你的存在。<page>我会提醒他们的！在许多人聚集的地方，伟大的歌曲被唱了！
secondary_translated_text: Do not despair, friend pilgrim,<br>Raise your eyes and raise your voice!<br>Don't be afraid, Pilgrim Truuu @ uu<br>I believe this is a happy choice!<page>Hello, aren't these areas amazing? Above us is fertile wilderness where every pilgrim can fill his stomach!<hpage>These hot fields are indeed a miracle, but the hunters lingered among the long grass. Playing your instrument will only remind them of your existence.<page>I will remind them! Where many people gather, great songs are sung!

original_en_text: <hpage>Some pilgrims have made an encampment in a safer place than this, high on the other side of the Citadel.<hpage>They would surely allow you to stay there, if you could resist causing them mischief.<page>An en-camp-ment, eh? Sounds like a jolly place for old Grindle! Mayhaps we’ll have a sniff around later.<page>That’s a good tip, that. And you’ve just done given it to us for free! O-hoho, head fulla muck you got!
original_zh_text: <hpage>圣堡另一边的高处，朝圣者们新建了安全营地。<hpage>你老实点的话，他们应该能留你。<page>朝圣者的营地？听着像个能偷光光的好地方！<page>这情报不赖，还是白送的！你个蠢脑袋！
translated_text: <hpage>一些朝圣者在城堡的另一边，一个比这里更安全的地方扎营。<hpage>如果你能抵制给他们恶作剧，他们一定会允许你留在那里。<page>营地，嗯？听起来像是老格林德尔的快乐地方！梅西克，我们稍后再四处查看。<page>这是一个很好的提示，这一点。你刚刚免费送给我们的！你脑子里全是狗屎
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Some pilgrims camped on the other side of the castle, in a safer place than here.<hpage>If you can resist giving them practical jokes, they will definitely allow you to stay there.<page>Camp, huh? Sounds like a happy place for old Greendale! Mesick, we'll check around later.<page>That's a good reminder for this. You just gave it to us for free! Your head is full of shit

original_en_text: Well well! Seems I won the last of your rosaries. Luck is granted to the faithful, it is sung, so I must be very faithful indeed.<page>If you happen on any more rosaries though, I’d be well happy to play you again.
original_zh_text: 哎呀！赢光你的念珠了。都说运气眷顾虔诚者，看来我够虔诚。<page>等你再带着念珠的时候，我很乐意跟你再玩几局。
translated_text: 好吧，好吧！看来我赢得了你的最后一串念珠。幸运是给信徒的，是唱出来的，所以我真的必须非常忠诚。<page>如果你再次出现在念珠上，我很想再次和你一起玩。
secondary_translated_text: Okay, okay! Looks like I won your last rosary. Luck is for believers and sung, so I really have to be very loyal.<page>If you appear on the rosary again, I would love to play with you again.

original_en_text: <hpage>Already, I have cut down many of this lands inhabitants, but I agree, documenting those creatures is a worthwhile undertaking.<hpage>If time still permits, I shall do as you wish.<page>Ma! How wonderful for Nuu! Go now! Hunt, and prey, and begin our learning!
original_zh_text: <hpage>我的确已斩杀这片土地上的许多住民，但记录这些生物是值得的。<hpage>若时间允许，我会尽力帮你。<page>好呀！努努太高兴啦！去吧！狩猎吧，掠食吧，开始我们的研究吧！
translated_text: <hpage>我杀死了这片土地上的许多居民，但我同意记录这些生物是一项值得的事业。<hpage>如果时间允许，我会按照你的意愿行事。<page>妈妈！Nuu太棒了！现在就走！狩猎，狩猎，开始我们的学习！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I have killed many of the residents of this land, but I agree that documenting these creatures is a worthwhile undertaking.<hpage>If time permits, I will act as you wish.<page>Mom! Nuu is great! Go now! Hunting, hunting, start our learning!

original_en_text: Hoho, free at last! Locked up in here much too long, we was. Nasty place to keep a poor little snitchbug like Grindle.<page>Hoy, you’re smellin’ fancy! You got some pockets under your cloak? Hidin’ away some goodies for us to pilfer?<hpage>Beware your greed, thief. You’d be dead before your claw reached my cloak.<page>O-hoho! Never mind then, bully. Plenty of tasties lying around for us down here. We smells ‘em!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！终于自由啦！这破牢房关了格林德尔大爷太久啦！<page>你身上有股阔气味儿！斗篷里藏啥好东西了？<hpage>管好你的爪子，小偷。碰到我斗篷前你就会没命。<page>哎哟！开个玩笑嘛！底下好东西够多了，犯不着冒险！
translated_text: 呵呵，终于自由了！我们被锁在这里太久了。对于培养像格林德尔这样可怜的小举报人来说，这是一个烦人的地方。<page>嘿，你闻起来真香！你的斗篷下有口袋吗？藏一些好东西让我们偷？<hpage>小心你这个贪婪的小偷，在你的爪子触及我的斗篷之前，你就已经死了。<page>哦嗬嗬！没关系，恶霸。这里有很多好吃的东西等着我们。我们闻到了！
secondary_translated_text: Hehe, finally free! We've been locked in here for too long. This is an annoying place to cultivate poor little whistleblowers like Greendale.<page>Hey, you smell so good! Do you have pockets under your cloak? Hide some good things for us to steal?<hpage>Be careful, you greedy thief, you will be dead before your claws touch my cloak.<page>Oh ho ho! It's okay, bully. There are many delicious things waiting for us here. We smell it!

original_en_text: <hpage>Your master has been found, Shakra. Your task in these lands is finished. Will you now return to your tribe? <page>I shall not return, Hornet Wielding Needle... I cannot. To leave my tribe’s nest-plains, that journey has only one direction. <page>This has always been our way, our long leaving, for those few who survive till age seeks to claim their shell, and those fewer who choose to send them on.<page>But these lands, Pharloom... My nest-plains I once saw so grand, now they become small. A place for birth, and growing, but a place too narrow to live a bug’s life full.
original_zh_text: <hpage>既然你已经找到导师，任务完成，打算回部落吗？<page>回不去了……离开部落只有一条路可走。<page>这是我们传统，我们的远行。活够了的年长者自行出走，少数选择送行的亲属也不能再回。<page>从前觉得部落很大，但到了纺络，才知道部落有多小。那是我出生、成长的地方，但容不下虫活一辈子。
translated_text: <hpage>你的主人已经找到了，沙克拉。你在这些土地上的任务已经完成。你现在会回到你的部落吗？<page>我不会回来了，马蜂窝针……我不能我要离开我部落巢穴的平原，旅程只有一个方向。<page>这一直是我们的方式，我们漫长的离开，因为少数活到老年的人寻求认领自己的尸体，而少数人则选择将它们送走。<page>但这些土地，法鲁。我曾经看到我的巢穴平原如此壮丽，现在它们变得更小了。一个你出生和长大的地方，但一个太狭窄的地方，无法像昆虫一样过上充实的生活。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Your master has been found, Shakra. Your mission in these lands is complete. Will you return to your tribe now?<page>I won't come back, hornet's nest needle... I can't. I'll leave the plains of my tribe's nest. The journey has only one direction.<page>This has always been our way, and we leave for a long time, as the few who live to old age seek to claim their bodies, and the few choose to send them away.<page>But these lands, Faro. I used to see my nest plains so magnificent, and now they have become even smaller. A place where you were born and raised, but a place too narrow to live a fulfilling life like an insect.

original_en_text: This giant, old ant... Her death seems recent, but her presence here... <page>Was it her? Could it be? The strength that sustained these caves? If so, what will happen now?<hpage>They will wither and fade... And you may sadly know it was my needle that brought her end.<page>You, miss? But why? Why destroy something so vital? <hpage>It is a difficult thing to explain simply... Her strength was needed, what was left, to cut Pharloom free of its black thread threat. It was a savage act, no doubt, but the reason was just.<hpage>Know, in time, these caves may see opportunity to regrow, flourish even, though that rebirth is itself a task enormous... longer than a lifetime, many lifetimes.<hpage>For that task to succeed, it will fall to bugs like you to sow the first seeds.
original_zh_text: 这只巨型古蚁才刚死不久……但她的存在……<page>难道是她？是她在维持这里的生态？……但既然她死了，接下来会怎么样？<hpage>会枯萎，并消逝……而她是死在我针下。<page>你？为什么？为什么要杀掉这么关键的存在？<hpage>这说来话长……我需要她的力量来斩断黑灾诅咒。这虽然残忍，但有必要。<hpage>假以时日，这些洞穴或许能重生、繁盛……但需几代虫的努力。<hpage>这份重任，就要靠你这样的小虫播撒下第一颗种子了。
translated_text: 这只巨大的老蚂蚁.她的死似乎最近才过去，但她在这里的出现……<page>是她吗？可能是吗？支撑这些洞穴的力量是什么？如果是这样，现在会发生什么？<hpage>它们会枯萎和褪色……你可能悲伤地知道，是我的针杀死了她。<page>你，小姐？但为什么？为什么要毁掉如此重要的东西？<hpage>这是很难简单解释的事情……剩下的需要她的力量来消除法鲁姆的黑线威胁。毫无疑问，这是野蛮的行为，但原因是公正的。<hpage>请注意，随着时间的推移，这些洞穴可能会看到再次生长甚至繁荣的机会，尽管重生本身就是一项艰巨的任务..比一生还要长，很多辈子<hpage>如果你想成功，你就必须依靠像你这样的虫子来播下第一颗种子。
secondary_translated_text: This huge old ant. Her death seems to have passed recently, but her presence here...<page>Is that her? Could it be? What are the forces that support these caves? If so, what would happen now?<hpage>They will wither and fade... You may know sadly that it was my needle that killed her.<page>You, miss? But why? Why destroy something so important?<hpage>It's something that's difficult to explain simply... what's left requires her power to eliminate Farum's black line threat. There is no doubt that this was barbaric behavior, but the reasons are just.<hpage>Please note that over time, these caves may see opportunities to grow and even prosper again, although rebirth itself is a difficult task.. Longer than a lifetime, many lifetimes<hpage>If you want to succeed, you have to rely on bugs like you to plant the first seed.

original_en_text: <page=M>Hold it, Old One! That intruder writhing within your shell... <page=S>Our ritual ain’t gonna work while that cruel creature’s present. We’d be tugging at its memories as much as your own.<hpage>Then free me of the affliction. Surely you have the skill?<page=S>Not for this! Our power’s all of soul and that thing’s all physical. You’re gonna need more traditional tools of healing.<page=B>Seek the one exiled from Bellhart, little Yarnaby. She was chased out into those soaked moors, last I heard.<page=B>She’d have the tools for the task, and the cunning to have survived till now.
original_zh_text: <page=C>慢着！古老者，您壳里那扭动的异物……<page=S>有这东西在，仪式会同时拽出它的记忆。<hpage>那就替我除了它，你们不是擅长各种法术吗？<page=S>治不了！我们擅灵魂之术，这东西却是实体。您得去找传统医具。<page=B>去灰沼找被钟心镇放逐的小雅纳碧，听说她在那片湿地里苟活。<page=B>她有工具，也足够机灵，肯定能活到现在。
translated_text: <page=M>等等，老头！入侵者在你的壳里蠕动……<page=S>当那个残酷的生物出现时，我们的仪式就不可行了。我们将像你提取自己的记忆一样提取它的记忆。<hpage>那就把我从苦难中解放出来。你一定有这个技能吧？<page=S>这不是原因！我们所有的力量都来自灵魂，所有的力量都来自身体。您需要更多传统的治疗工具。<page=B>寻找伯哈特的流放者尤纳比。据我所知，她是被赶出那些湿透的荒野的。<page=B>她拥有完成任务的工具，也拥有生存到现在的狡猾。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>Wait, old man! The intruder squirms in your shell...<page=S>When that cruel creature appeared, our rituals were no longer feasible. We will extract its memory just as you extract your own memory.<hpage>Then liberate me from suffering. You must have this skill, right?<page=S>This is not the reason! All our strength comes from the soul, and all our strength comes from the body. You need more traditional treatment tools.<page=B>Unabi, the exile who sought Burhart. As far as I know, she was driven out of those sodden wilderness.<page=B>She has the tools to complete tasks and the cunning to survive until now.

original_en_text: When travelling in unfriendly lands, it is important to remember safe places to camp.<br><br>These pins will mark benches and other rest spots on your map.
original_zh_text: 在险地旅行要记好安全营地。<br><br>这些图钉能够标记长椅和休息点。
translated_text: 当在不友好的土地上旅行时，记住安全的露营地点很重要。<br><br>这些大头针将在地图上标记长凳和其他休息点。
secondary_translated_text: When traveling in unfriendly land, it is important to remember safe camping locations.<br><br>These pins will mark benches and other resting spots on the map.

original_en_text: Nuu takes time with her creatures, she must inspect closely. Thick arms, flakey hair, delicate eyes... Nuu will inspect it all!
original_zh_text: 努努研究可仔细了！粗胳膊、鳞片毛发、精致眼睛……全要检查！
translated_text: Nuu花时间和她的生物在一起，她必须仔细检查。粗壮的手臂、蓬乱的头发、精致的眼睛……Nuu会检查一切！
secondary_translated_text: Nuu spends time with her creatures, which she has to check carefully. Thick arms, unkempt hair, exquisite eyes... Nuu will check everything!

original_en_text: Maiden, strong, wreathed in red,<br>Shield her shell, bless her thread!<br>She fights for us until the end,<br>Please protect my dearest friee-end!
original_zh_text: 红绸披身的坚强战士啊，<br>为我们奋战至最终时刻！<br>护佑她的甲壳，祝福她的灵丝，<br>我们的辉光，我的宝贵挚友！
translated_text: 女孩，坚强，戴着红色花环，<br>保护她的壳，保佑她的线！<br>她为我们奋斗到最后，<br>请保护我最亲爱的朋友！
secondary_translated_text: Girl, strong, wearing a red wreath,<br>Protect her shell and bless her thread!<br>She fought for us until the end,<br>Please protect my dearest friend!

original_en_text: If chance allows, visit the tower above. It is an impressive sight, not overgrown by the crust upon these caverns, but rather formed full of the material itself. <page>If the old tribe of this place were able to guide its growth to such grand degree... then they possessed a power to rival even that Citadel.
original_zh_text: 有空的话去上面塔楼看看，挺壮观的。那可不是岩壳自然生长形成的，而是用整块材料塑造而成。<page>如果这里的古老部落能引导砂岩生长至这等规模……那他们拥有的力量不逊于圣堡。
translated_text: 如果有机会，可以参观上面的塔。这是令人印象深刻的景象，这些洞穴中的地壳并没有杂草丛生，而是充满了物质本身。<page>如果这里的古老部落能够如此大程度地引导它的发展……那么他们的力量甚至堪比堡垒。
secondary_translated_text: If you have the opportunity, you can visit the tower above. This is an impressive sight. The crust in these caves is not overgrown with weeds, but filled with matter itself.<page>If the ancient tribes here can guide its development to such a large extent... then their power is even comparable to a fortress.

original_en_text: These strange, shuffling pilgrims... In the camp below they were docile enough, but up here they seem to have lost their senses. They cry out to the darkness and attack their fellow travellers.<page>Yakkanesh! Keep your weapon drawn and your bearings true! The way ahead is winding, and to lose one’s way invites only death.<page>I am a navigator amongst my tribe and have been making maps of these lands. I can trade them with you, and supplies, if you wish.
original_zh_text: 那些朝圣者……在下面还算安分，到这上面就发疯了。对着黑暗哭喊，还攻击路人。<page>雅卡内什！握紧你的武器，可别走神了！前面的路曲折危险，迷路就是死。<page>我是部落的测绘师，一直在画这里的地图。想要可以拿物资来换。
translated_text: 这些奇怪的、拖着脚步的朝圣者……他们在下面的营地里很温顺，但在这里他们似乎失去了理智。他们对着黑暗大喊并袭击了同伴。<page>亚卡内什拔出你的枪对准正确的方向！前面的路是曲折的，迷路只会导致死亡。<page>我是部落的领航员，一直在绘制这些土地的地图。如果你愿意的话，我可以与你交换它们和物资。
secondary_translated_text: These strange, shuffling pilgrims... they are docile in the camp below, but here they seem to have lost their senses. They shouted into the darkness and attacked their companions.<page>Yakanesh pulls your gun and points it in the right direction! The road ahead is tortuous, and getting lost will only lead to death.<page>I am the pilot of the tribe and have been mapping these lands. If you want, I can exchange them and supplies with you.

original_en_text: Ma, ma! Much hunting has you done, and so many sweet little creatures in our records!<page>Nuu is drooling from such excess of learnings! Please keep working, miss grown-up!
original_zh_text: 呀呀！砍了这么多可爱小生物！<page>知识多到流口水！大姐姐继续努力呀！
translated_text: 妈妈，妈妈！你经常打猎，我们的记录中有很多可爱的小生物！<page>Nuu对这么多的学习垂涎欲滴！请继续工作，我的主小姐！
secondary_translated_text: Mom, mom! You hunt a lot, and we have a lot of cute little creatures in our records!<page>Nuu is salivating for so much learning! Please keep working, my lady!

original_en_text: In my land, that is the way warriors greet each other. For though you are a child barely hatched, you are also a warrior. Your stance, your weapon, your movements all proclaim it so.
original_zh_text: 在我们部落，战士们都这么打招呼。虽然你看着像个刚破卵的娃娃，但架势、武器、动作都像个战士。
translated_text: 在我的土地上，士兵们就是这样互相问候的。因为虽然你是一个刚孵化的孩子，但你也是一个战士。你的立场、你的武器和你的行动都表明了这一点。
secondary_translated_text: This is how soldiers greet each other in my land. Because although you are a newly hatched child, you are also a soldier. Your stance, your weapons and your actions all show this.

original_en_text: O-hoho! You’re lookin’ a little stuck there! What a pity!<hpage>We meet again, little thief. Are you familiar with this place?<hpage>If we ally our efforts, our escape could be made that much easier.<page>Hoho, you jestin’? There ain’t no allies in prison! You can just throw yourself against the walls in there while I go sniffin’ for goodies!
original_zh_text: 哦嚯嚯！锁住了吧？真可怜！<hpage>又见面了，小毛贼。你对这里很熟么？<hpage>我们联手的话，越狱容易得多。<page>哦嚯嚯！想得美，监狱哪有盟友！你撞墙玩去吧，我找宝贝去咯！
translated_text: 哦嗬嗬！你看起来有点卡住了！多么可惜啊！<hpage>我们又见面了，小偷。你对这个地方熟悉吗？<hpage>如果我们共同努力，逃跑就会容易得多。<page>呵呵，你在开玩笑吗？监狱里没有盟友！你可以把自己扔到墙上，而我去闻东西！
secondary_translated_text: Oh ho ho! You look a little stuck! What a pity!<hpage>We meet again, thief. Are you familiar with this place?<hpage>If we work together, it will be much easier to escape.<page>Hehe, are you kidding? There are no allies in prison! You can throw yourself against the wall and I smell!

original_en_text: <hpage>Safe journey, tall bug.<page>This is Pharloom, warrior. Safety is a myth.
original_zh_text: <hpage>祝你一路平安。<page>此地是纺络，战士。安全只是虚妄。
translated_text: <hpage>一路平安，高虫。<page>这是法罗，士兵。安全是一个神话。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Have a safe journey, Gao Chong.<page>This is Farrow, soldier. Security is a myth.

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, Seth. It is a welcome surprise to see you here amongst these festivities.<page>Hullo, hullo! Yes, my wandering was long, and I began to fear I would meet my end in those sticky swamps below.<page>How lucky I was to stumble upon the home of these friendly revellers!<page>They said I could be a flea here with them, so of course I agreed. Seems as good a place as any to call home, at least for a time.<page>Now I just need to grow a little fur and sprout some wings, eh? Ha ha!
original_zh_text: <hpage>幸会，赛斯。没想到在庆典能遇见你。<page>是啊！之前在下面粘糊沼泽差点没命了。<page>幸亏遇到这群办庆典的好心虫！<page>他们说我可以当个跳蚤住下，我当然同意！这地方看着很适合安家<page>现在就只差长点毛和翅膀了！哈哈！
translated_text: <hpage>你好，塞斯。很高兴在这些庆祝活动中见到你。<page>你好，你好！是的，我的流浪时间很长，我开始担心自己会死在下面那些粘稠的沼泽里。<page>我多么幸运，偶然发现了这些友好的狂欢者的家！<page>他们说我可以在这里和他们一起做跳蚤，所以我当然同意了。对于任何人来说，这似乎是一个打电话回家的好地方，至少在一段时间内是这样。<page>现在我只需要长一点皮毛和一些翅膀，嗯？哈哈！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Hello, Seth. It's nice to see you during these celebrations.<page>Hello, hello! Yes, I had been wandering for a long time, and I began to worry that I would die in those sticky swamps below.<page>How lucky I am to have stumbled upon the home of these friendly revellers!<page>They said I could make fleas with them here, so of course I agreed. For anyone, this seems like a good place to call home, at least for a while.<page>Now I just need to grow a little fur and some wings, huh? Haha!

original_en_text: Swamps born in the Citadel’s shadow. There is evidence the waters here once ran clear.
original_zh_text: 圣堡阴影下的沼泽，这里的水曾经清澈过。
translated_text: 城堡阴影下诞生的沼泽。有证据表明，这里的水曾经是清澈的。
secondary_translated_text: A swamp born in the shadow of the castle. There is evidence that the water here was once clear.

original_en_text: Tangled roads choked beneath bramble and root. The flora is often as deadly as the creatures who call this place home.
original_zh_text: 荆棘盘踞的险路。这里的植物和住民一样要命。
translated_text: 纠结的道路被荆棘和树根堵住了。这些植物通常与栖息的生物一样致命。
secondary_translated_text: The tangled road was blocked by thorns and tree roots. These plants are often as deadly as the creatures they inhabit.

original_en_text: What say you, nimble bug? The test of endurance remains at your ready! Let us stride fast forth!
original_zh_text: 要比赛吗？耐力测试随时恭候！
translated_text: 你说呢，敏捷的错误？准备好迎接耐力的考验！让我们大踏步前进！
secondary_translated_text: What do you say, agile mistakes? Get ready for the test of endurance! Let us move forward in great strides!

original_en_text: Zaza and I will fight through these cursed lands until every last one of the black-twisted fiends has been cut down!
original_zh_text: 扎扎和我会杀遍这些鬼地方，直到怪物一个不剩！
translated_text: 扎扎和我将在这些被诅咒的土地上战斗，直到所有黑色扭曲恶魔被杀死！
secondary_translated_text: Zaza and I will fight in these cursed lands until all black twisted demons are killed!

original_en_text: <page=M>Hurry, Old One. The ritual can’t commence while you remain host to that writhing root.<page=B>Seek the one exiled from Bellhart, little Yarnaby. She was chased out into those soaked moors, last I heard.<page=B>She’d have the tools for the task, and the cunning to have survived till now.
original_zh_text: <page=C>快去吧，古老者。有那根须在你体内，仪式没法开始。<page=B>去灰沼找被钟心镇放逐的小雅纳碧。她有工具，也足够机灵，肯定能活到现在。
translated_text: <page=M>来吧，老头。当你还是那个扭动的根的主人时，仪式就无法开始。<page=B>寻找伯哈特的流放者尤纳比。据我所知，她是被赶出那些湿透的荒野的。<page=B>她拥有完成任务的工具，也拥有生存到现在的狡猾。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>Come on, old man. When you are the owner of the writhing root, the ritual cannot begin.<page=B>Unabi, the exile who sought Burhart. As far as I know, she was driven out of those sodden wilderness.<page=B>She has the tools to complete tasks and the cunning to survive until now.

original_en_text: The red-shells, hiding through the fields, stalking the boney beasts. They are part of it, somehow, the life that flourishes here.<page>Even haunted, they seem to lose less of themselves... What anchor allows them to retain such strength?
original_zh_text: 红壳怪潜伏猎杀骨兽，是这里生态的一部分。<page>被丝咒侵蚀，它们却还能基本保持神智……靠的是什么？
translated_text: 红贝壳躲在田野里，追踪骨头野兽。不知何故，他们是这里蓬勃发展生活的一部分。<page>即使他们被闹鬼，他们似乎也不太经常迷失自我……什么锚可以让他们保持这种力量？
secondary_translated_text: Red Shell hides in the fields, chasing bone beasts. Somehow, they are part of the thriving life here.<page>Even if they are haunted, they don't seem to lose themselves too often... what anchor will allow them to maintain this power?

original_en_text: Oh, but of course I sing! I am Sherma, a pilgrim just like you. I hear the call of the great Citadel just like every other devout soul.
original_zh_text: 当然要唱！我是谢尔玛，和你一样的朝圣者。圣堡在召唤每个虔诚信徒，你我都听见了！
translated_text: 哦，但是我当然会唱歌！我是谢尔曼，和你一样的朝圣者。我像任何虔诚的灵魂一样听到了伟大城堡的召唤。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, but of course I can sing! I'm Sherman, a pilgrim like you. Like any pious soul, I heard the call of the great castle.

original_en_text: Hoy! Hoyyyy! You there! Get us out of here! Since when’s a little light thievery worth a lifelong sentence?
original_zh_text: 喂！喂喂！那边的！快放我们出去！偷点小东西至于关一辈子吗？
translated_text: 嘿！嘿！你在这里！带我们离开这里！从什么时候开始，一件小盗窃案值得终身监禁？
secondary_translated_text: Hey! Hey! There you are! Get us out of here! Since when does a petty theft warrant life imprisonment?

original_en_text: Our great Citadel has lost its voice, and now the black threads rise up to tear its shell apart. I fear holy Pharloom is truly dying...<page>But I still have hope, red maiden! Though kingdoms may fall, life endures still, and we bugs can build our lands anew!<hpage>I share your hope, Sherma. Remember though that whatever is built next belongs not to the past, but to you.<hpage>Your instincts are strong. Let it be those that guide you, rather than any reverence toward a kingdom’s corpse.<page>Oho, you flatter me so! But it is my fellows who shall guide me, those whose voices sing out still, even in these ruined times...
original_zh_text: 我们伟大的圣堡已失却歌声，如今黑丝翻涌要撕裂它的躯壳。恐怕神圣的纺络真要灭亡了……<page>但我仍怀希望，红衣姑娘！王国可以倾覆，但生命将延续，我们虫子能重建家园！<hpage>我与你同怀希望，谢尔玛。但记住，新建之物不属于过去，而属于你们。<hpage>你的直觉很强。让它指引你和这些虫子，别再膜拜王国的残骸。<page>噢，您过誉了！但指引我的该是我的同胞们——那些在废墟中仍放声歌唱的同胞……
translated_text: 我们伟大的城堡已经失去了声音，现在黑线升起，撕裂了它的外壳。我担心神圣的法罗真的会死……<page>但我仍然有希望，红女！虽然王国可能会灭亡，但生命仍然存在，我们虫子可以重建我们的土地！<hpage>我和你一样希望，谢尔曼。但请记住，你接下来建造的一切都不属于过去，它属于你。<hpage>你的直觉很强烈。让那些引导你的人，不要对王国的尸体有任何敬畏。<page>哦，你这样夸我！但引导我的是我的同伴，即使在这个毁灭的时代，他们的声音仍然歌唱。
secondary_translated_text: Our great castle has lost its sound, and now black lines rise, tearing its shell. I fear that the holy Farrow will really die...<page>But I still have hope, red girl! Although the kingdom may perish, life still exists, and we bugs can rebuild our land!<hpage>I hope as much as you do, Sherman. But remember, everything you build next does not belong to the past, it belongs to you.<hpage>Your instincts are strong. Ask those who guide you not to have any reverence for the corpses of the kingdom.<page>Oh, you praise me like that! But it is my companions who guide me, whose voices still sing even in this era of destruction.

original_en_text: Hahhh... well met, sister. The task of hunting down these black-twisted fiends is no small one, eh? Still, we must not rest! Not while the cries of the innocent echo from every corner of the kingdom!
original_zh_text: 哈……又见面了。清剿这些黑怪可不轻松，对吧？但只要王国还有哭喊声，我和扎扎就不能歇！
translated_text: 哈哈.你好，姐姐。追捕这些黑魔是一项艰巨的任务吧？但是，我们不能休息！当无辜者的哭声在王国的每个角落回响！
secondary_translated_text: ha ha. Hello, sister. Hunting these dark devils is a difficult task, right? But we cannot rest! When the cries of innocent people echo in every corner of the kingdom!

original_en_text: Sign yourself as a snitch! And scoop up more rosaries from your bested foes. Just watch it when you’re snitchin’ that you don’t lose sum’a your own...
original_zh_text: 带上这个我们就是一伙的了。打赢了多赚，打输了赔本！
translated_text: 作为举报人签名！从你的宿敌那里获得更多的念珠。当您报告您不会失去自己的东西时，请注意。
secondary_translated_text: Sign as a whistleblower! Get more rosary beads from your old enemy. Pay attention when you report that you will not lose something of yours.

original_en_text: What’s this? The spider arrives at last, here to stand acquiver at our startling Citadel.<hpage>Pale child, you return only to mock? Your lands have yet to prove my match. This sleeping Citadel shall be no different.<page>Spider, dear. Why must you remain so distressingly... optimistic? The power that waits above, you cannot conceive, her who would snuff that hope with barely a glance.<hpage>Fool child. You still think me blind to the form of your liege? Having come this far?<hpage>This land’s grandeur, the devotion of its bugs, and the curse that befalls them. The signs are clear.<hpage>Your kingdom is in the thrall of a creature beyond bug, one of that higher caste.<hpage>Whatever its desire for my Silk and my shell, it shall find I’m quite attached to both.
original_zh_text: 瞧瞧这是谁？小蜘蛛终于到了，在伟大的圣堡面前瑟瑟发抖。<hpage>苍白之子，你只是来废话的么？纺络没有虫能阻挡我，圣堡也不例外。<page>亲爱的，你怎么还傻乐呢？上面那位吹口气就能灭了你那点希望。<hpage>傻孩子，真以为我现在还看不出你主子的真身吗？<hpage>这地方的辉煌、虫民的虔诚、还有他们的诅咒……线索太明显了。<hpage>这个王国被超脱虫类的存在掌控，属于更高阶的存在。<hpage>但无论它多想要我的灵丝和躯壳，我都不会给。
translated_text: 这是什么？蜘蛛终于到来了，成为我们令人惊叹的城堡的购买者。<hpage>苍白的孩子，你回来只是为了笑吗？你的土地还没有证明我的对手。这座沉睡的城堡也不会有任何不同。<page>蜘蛛，亲爱的。为什么你想这么痛苦……乐观？你无法想象上面有力量在等着。她一眼就能浇灭这个希望。<hpage>傻孩子。你还以为我看不到你的国王长什么样吗？有这么远吗？<hpage>土地的壮丽，昆虫的忠诚，以及降临在它们身上的诅咒。迹象很明显。<hpage>你的王国受到一种超越蠕虫的生物的束缚，这种生物是更高的种姓之一。<hpage>无论它对我的丝绸和贝壳有何渴望，它都会发现我对两者都非常依恋。
secondary_translated_text: What is this? Spiders have finally arrived and become buyers of our amazing castle.<hpage>Pale child, did you come back just to laugh? Your land has not proved my opponent. This sleeping castle would not be any different.<page>Spider, dear. Why do you want to be so miserable... optimistic? You can't imagine the power waiting up there. She could extinguish this hope with a glance.<hpage>Silly kid. You still think I can't see what your king looks like? Is it that far?<hpage>The grandeur of the land, the loyalty of the insects, and the curse that befalls them. The signs are obvious.<hpage>Your kingdom is bound by a creature beyond worms, one of the higher castes.<hpage>Whatever its desire for my silk and shells, it will find me very attached to both.

original_en_text: Is hard work, learning so much from creatures, but for Nuu is very fulfilling. Now go and hunt, and prey, miss grown-up!
original_zh_text: 研究生物很辛苦，但努努超满足！快去打猎吧大姐姐！
translated_text: 这是一项艰苦的工作，从生物学中学到了很多东西，但这对Nuu来说非常有成就感。现在去打猎吧，我的主人和夫人！
secondary_translated_text: It was hard work and learned a lot from biology, but it was very fulfilling for Nuu. Now go hunting, my master and lady!

original_en_text: Hoy there, fancy bug! How you farin’, now that the ‘ole world’s creakin’ and crackin’ around us? Desperately needin’ some supplies, I’ll wager! Heh heh!<hpage>You seem in good spirits, thief. Are you not disturbed by the great rending of the kingdom?<page>Heh, end of the world don’t bother ol’ Grindle none. We’ll just go find another one to plunder, won’t we?
original_zh_text: 哟！阔气虫来啦！外面世界要完蛋了，急需补给吧？哦嚯嚯！<hpage>你看着倒挺精神，不怕王国崩塌？<page>王国崩塌关我们屁事！大不了换个地方偷！
translated_text: 嘿，美丽的虫子！现在“旧世界”在我们周围吱吱作响，你好吗？我敢打赌急需一些物资！呵呵！<hpage>小偷，你看起来精神不错。你不为王国的崩溃而烦恼吗？<page>嘿，世界末日不要打扰格林德尔。我们再找一个战利品吧？
secondary_translated_text: Hey, beautiful bug! Now the "old world" is squeaking around us, how are you? I bet we need some supplies urgently! Hehe!<hpage>Thief, you look in good spirits. Aren't you troubled by the collapse of the kingdom?<page>Hey, the end of the world don't bother Greendale. Shall we find another trophy?

original_en_text: <page=M>Our spells’re woven, our parts prepared. Whenever you’re ready, lay up on the dais and we’ll begin.<page=M>Best you don’t dawdle now. Pharloom’s time is short, and those hearts won’t go on beating forever.
original_zh_text: <page=M>我们已经准备好施咒，您躺上祭坛便可开始。<page=M>劝您别再耽搁了，纺络时日无多，这些心也跳不了多久。
translated_text: <page=M>我们的咒语已经编织，我们的部分也准备好了。准备好后，只需躺在讲台上，我们就开始了。<page=M>你现在最好别再磨蹭了。法罗的时间很短，那些心不会永远继续跳动。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>Our spell is woven and our part is ready. When you are ready, just lie on the podium and we will begin.<page=M>You'd better stop dawdling now. Farrow's time is short, and those hearts will not continue to beat forever.

original_en_text: No more talk, warrior. Permit me this final moment of memorial.<hpage>As you wish, sir. I shall disturb you no longer.
original_zh_text: 别说了，战士。让我在这最后时刻安静怀念吧。<hpage>如你所愿，不再打扰。
translated_text: 别说话了，士兵。请允许我纪念这最后一刻。<hpage>如您所愿，先生。我不会再打扰你了
secondary_translated_text: Stop talking, soldier. Please allow me to commemorate this last moment.<hpage>As you wish, sir. I won't bother you anymore.

original_en_text: <hpage>Another time perhaps, sir. My own tasks cannot be easily ignored.<page>Then I shall continue to train in anticipation of that future moment!<page>Having met, it is inevitable. Fate calls us to compete!
original_zh_text: <hpage>下次吧，我有要事在身。<page>我会继续特训等着比赛那天！<page>命运注定我们要一决高下！
translated_text: <hpage>也许下次吧，先生。我自己的任务不能轻易忽视。<page>那么我会继续训练，展望未来！<page>遇到，这是必然的。命运召唤我们去竞争！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Maybe next time, sir. My own task cannot be easily ignored.<page>Then I will continue to train and look to the future!<page>Encounter, this is inevitable. Fate calls us to compete!

original_en_text: Oh, welcome miss grown-up! Come to inspect the red-rocky creatures, like Nuu? We have found a very big one. Fresh, but not too fresh!<hpage>A pair of beasts attacked me here, burrowing through the stone with their spiral shells. I cut this one down, and the other fled.<page>Ooooh ma! Really? Nuu wishes that she had the pair! She could have studied much. Unlucky, to miss such a big feast of learnings!
original_zh_text: 噢！欢迎大姐姐！也来研究红石头吗？我发现个大家伙！还算新鲜！<hpage>两只带螺旋壳的怪物用石头攻击我。斩了一只，跑了一只。<page>哎呀！努努好想要一对！能学好多东西呢！真可惜！
translated_text: 哦，欢迎，我的主，小姐！来看看像Nu这样的红石生物吗？我们发现了一个很大的。新鲜，但不要太新鲜！<hpage>一对野兽在这里袭击了我，用螺旋壳在石头上凿了洞。我把这个砍倒了，另一个跑了。<page>哦，妈妈！真的吗？努希望她有一双！她本可以学到很多东西。不幸的是，我错过了这样一场学术盛宴！
secondary_translated_text: Oh, welcome, my Lord, miss! Come and see red stone creatures like Nu? We found a big one. Fresh, but not too fresh!<hpage>A pair of wild beasts attacked me here, using their spiral shells to cut holes in the stone. I cut this one down and the other one ran away.<page>Oh, mom! Really? Nu hopes she has a pair! She could have learned a lot. Unfortunately, I missed such an academic feast!

original_en_text: We must press on... There is so much more... for us to do...
original_zh_text: 必须继续……我们还有……很多事要做……
translated_text: 我们必须继续前进。还有更多。我们必须做什么。
secondary_translated_text: We must move forward. There are more. What we must do.

original_en_text: I see much wasted effort in these docks. There is too much flourish to the form of it all. The ways of others are strange indeed...
original_zh_text: 码头修得花里胡哨，净是浪费。外族人的路子真怪……
translated_text: 我看到这些码头浪费了很多能源。所有这些形式都有太多的繁荣。别人的做法真的很奇怪……
secondary_translated_text: I see that these docks waste a lot of energy. All these forms have too much prosperity. What others do is really strange...

original_en_text: Nimble bug! We both know our previous run was only warm-up, yes? Only a tiny test to prepare for the real match, Hoi hoi!<page>Well that match is now! A new track worthy of your skill, and mine. No longer merely a test!<page>Meet the challenge and my speed full. Let us break through our limits and see what waits beyond!
original_zh_text: 上次只是热身对吧？真正的好戏现在开始！<page>新的挑战，新的赛道！配得上你我的实力！<page>接受我的全速挑战，一起冲刺突破极限吧！
translated_text: 聪明的错误！我们都知道我们之前的跑步只是热身，对吧？为真正的比赛做准备只是一个小考验，呵呵！<page>好了，游戏开始了！一首值得你我技能的新曲目。不再只是测试！<page>迎接挑战，全速前进。让我们突破极限，看看还有什么在等着我们！
secondary_translated_text: Smart mistake! We all know our previous runs were just warm up, right? Preparing for the real competition is just a small test, hehe!<page>Okay, the game starts! A new song worthy of your skills and mine. No longer just testing!<page>Meet the challenge and move forward at full speed. Let's push our limits and see what else is waiting for us!

original_en_text: You can use these to mark places of importance or reminders on your map.<br><br>With these I often mark the locations of worthy foes.
original_zh_text: 你可以用这个在地图上标记重要地点或提醒事项。<br><br>我常用它标强力敌人的位置。
translated_text: 您可以使用这些标记地图上的重要地点或提醒。<br><br>我经常用这些标记来评估敌人的位置。
secondary_translated_text: You can use these to mark important places or reminders on the map.<br><br>I often use these markers to assess enemy positions.

original_en_text: Hoi hoi! A nimble opponent appears. At last! At last!<hpage>I was intrigued by the challenge you issued on the bell settlement’s wishwall, sir, though having reached this place I wonder at your choice of location.<hpage>If you seek challengers you should choose somewhere less far afield. It is rare chance any bug would journey to a cavern so distant.<page>True, perhaps. Though once discovered, could there be a more perfect spot? This giant, boney body, so distant from Pharloom’s ails.<page>Here, freely, we can test our speed and our sleek shells. Here we may race!<page>You must be eager to step to the task, challenger? Fulfil my wish! Let us discover our limits together!
original_zh_text: 哟嚯！终于来个能跑的！终于啊！<hpage>先生，我对您在钟心镇祈愿墙下的战书很感兴趣。不过抵达此地后，倒对您选的位置有些疑惑。<hpage>若想找虫比试，不该待在如此偏远之地。<page>有道理，但最棒的赛道就在这！还远离纺络的破事。<page>这里能尽情展现速度与甲壳之美！来赛一场吧！<page>你也等不及了吧？快来满足我的愿望，一起测试极限！
translated_text: 呵呵！灵活的对手出现了。终于！终于！<hpage>先生，我对您在贝尔定居点的愿望墙上提出的挑战非常感兴趣，虽然我们已经到达了这个地方，但我想知道您选择的地点。<hpage>如果您正在寻找挑战者，您应该选择一个不太远的地方。很少有昆虫会前往如此遥远的洞穴。<page>也许这是真的。虽然一旦被发现，还有更完美的地方吗？这具巨大、骨瘦如柴的身体距离法鲁姆的病情非常遥远。<page>在这里，我们可以自由测试我们的速度和光滑的外壳。我们可以在这里竞争！<page>挑战者，你一定很渴望完成任务吧？完成我的心愿！让我们一起发现自己的极限！
secondary_translated_text: Hehe! Flexible opponents emerged. Finally! Finally!<hpage>Sir, I am very interested in the challenge you posed on the Wall of Wishes at Bell Settlement, and although we have reached this place, I would like to know the location you have chosen.<hpage>If you are looking for a challenger, you should choose a place not too far away. Few insects would travel to such distant caves.<page>Maybe this is true. Although once discovered, is there anything more perfect? This huge, scrawny body is far away from Farum's condition.<page>Here, we can freely test our speed and smooth shell. We can compete here!<page>Challenger, you must be eager to complete the task, right? Fulfill my wish! Let us discover our limits together!

original_en_text: Uahhhhh... So close... Nuu could almost taste it.
translated_text: 啊...如此接近。Nu几乎能尝到它的味道。
secondary_translated_text: Ah... So close. Nu can almost taste it.

original_en_text: Ho! Are you observing them too, hunter? The red-shells are plentiful here, stalking these vast grassy plains and the last of its bony beasts.<page>Compared to the caves below, this lush growth feels even greater. Have we crawled close to the source of their sustenance?<page>I must discover its secret! I will! By my father’s wish, and for hope that our dying lands might find means to endure.<hpage>Just be careful, young one. I urge you. Here you’ve reached the ants’ heart-domain.<hpage>There may be discoveries worth making, but a single mistake will see your shell’s sharp end.
original_zh_text: 嘿！你也在观察红壳怪吗？它们在这片原野上猎杀最后的骨兽。<page>这里的植物比下面的洞穴更茂盛，难道接近能量源了？<page>我必须找到源头！对！不止是为了父亲的遗愿，也是为了这片大地存续的希望！<hpage>要小心，小虫子。此处是蚁族的核心区域。<hpage>或许能有宝贵发现，但走错一步就会丢了性命。
translated_text: 嗬！你也在观察他们吗，猎人？这里的红色贝壳丰富，徘徊在广阔的草原和最后的骨兽之间。<page>与下面的洞穴相比，这种郁郁葱葱的生长感觉更好。我们接近它们的食物来源吗？<page>我一定要发现它的秘密！我会的！按照我父亲的愿望和希望，我们垂死的土地能够找到生存之道。<hpage>小心点，年轻人。我劝你。在这里，你已经到达了蚂蚁的心脏。<hpage>也许有一个值得去做的发现，但一个错误就能让你的外壳变得锋利。
secondary_translated_text: Ho! Are you observing them, too, hunter? The red shells here are rich, wandering between the vast grassland and the last bone beast.<page>This lush growth feels better compared to the caves below. Are we close to their food sources?<page>I must discover its secret! I will! In accordance with my father's wishes and hopes, our dying land can find a way to survive.<hpage>Be careful, young man. I advise you. Here, you have reached the heart of the ant.<hpage>There may be a discovery worth making, but one mistake can sharpen your shell.

original_en_text: Hoy! Did you see it, red maiden? The great gate heard my song and, in its infinite and ancient kindness, opened the way forward for us!<page>What luck for us to meet at this moment! We can set off on the great road together!<page>Or p’raps I’ll tarry here just a little longer. I want to sing a song of gratitude to this noble gate!
original_zh_text: 红衣姑娘快看！骨门听见歌声，为我们让路了！<page>能在这相遇多有缘呀！我们可以结伴踏上圣途！<page>不过我想再再待会儿，给这好骨门唱首感恩曲！
translated_text: 嘿！你看到了吗，红女孩？伟大的大门听到了我的歌声，以无限古老的仁慈为我们开辟了道路！<page>我们现在能见面是多么幸运啊！我们可以共同踏上一条伟大的道路！<page>或者我会在这里多呆一会儿。我要唱一首感谢这座高贵的大门的歌！
secondary_translated_text: Hey! Did you see that, red girl? The great gates have heard my song, opening the way for us with infinite ancient kindness!<page>How lucky we are to meet now! We can walk a great path together!<page>Or I'll stay here a little longer. I will sing a song of thanks for this noble gate!

original_en_text: In these lands names are given freely, are they not? I am Shakra, Wielding Rings. If our hunts intertwine again, I will have new maps to trade.<page>Until then, farewell, Child Wielding Needle.
original_zh_text: 在这地方，名字都起的很随意，对吧？我是沙克拉，驭环者。要是能再碰上，会准备好新地图卖给你。<page>后会有期，使针的小姑娘。
translated_text: 在这些土地上，名字是免费的，对吧？我是Shakra，Warding Rings。如果我们的狩猎再次交织在一起，我将有新的地图可以交易。<page>在此之前，再见了，挥舞着针头的孩子们。
secondary_translated_text: In these lands, names are free, right? I'm Shakra, Warding Rings. If our hunting intertwined again, I'll have a new map to trade.<page>Until then, goodbye to the needle-wielding children.

original_en_text: This place is holy, yes... but I worry at the suffering of our fellow pilgrims. So many are hurt or exhausted!<hpage>Your doubts and worries will not heal them, little one.<hpage>If you would aid your fellows, you can start by dressing their wounds. The simple rags found around the settlement will do for bandages.<page>Oh, that’s an excellent idea, red maiden! Normally I’d think a song would suffice, but... yes, more direct action is certainly needed.<page>And the Citadel itself shall provide the materials! Praise be to this holiest of holy places!
original_zh_text: 这里虽然是圣地……可看着同袍受苦真难受！<hpage>光着急没用。<hpage>若想帮忙，可以先从包扎开始。找点破布当绷带吧。<page>好主意！我平常就知道唱歌……这次得动真格了！<page>材料圣堡里随便找！圣地就是灵验！
translated_text: 这个地方是神圣的，是的……但我对我们朝圣者同胞的苦难感到担忧。很多人受伤或精疲力尽！<hpage>你的怀疑和担忧无法治愈它们，小家伙。<hpage>如果你想帮助你的同伴，你可以从包扎他们的伤口开始。定居点周围发现的简单破布可以用作绷带。<page>哦，这是个好主意，红女孩！通常我认为一首歌就足够了，但是.是的，当然需要采取更直接的行动。<page>而且堡垒提供自己的材料！赞美这个最神圣的地方！
secondary_translated_text: This place is sacred, yes... but I am concerned about the suffering of our fellow pilgrims. Many people are injured or exhausted!<hpage>Your doubts and worries will not cure them, little man.<hpage>If you want to help your companions, you can start by dressing their wounds. Simple rags found around settlements can be used as bandages.<page>Oh, that's a great idea, red girl! Normally I think one song is enough, but... Yes, of course more direct action is needed.<page>And the fort provides its own materials! Praise this most sacred place!

original_en_text: Fear not, brothers and sisters! If we work hard and keep our faith, the Citadel will provide for us... I have no doubt!
original_zh_text: 兄弟姐妹别怕！只要我们勤勉且守住信念，圣堡不会亏待我们……肯定不会！
translated_text: 兄弟姐妹们，不要害怕！如果我们努力工作并保持信仰，城堡就会提供我们。我毫不怀疑！
secondary_translated_text: Brothers and sisters, don't be afraid! If we work hard and keep our faith, the castle will provide for us. I have no doubt!

original_en_text: <page=M>The hearts you seek, we can share their locations as best we know.<page=M>Three will be needed to construct our spell and draw clear memory of the flower from your Silk.<page=S>Bring us the hearts, Old One. Make’em beat, fierce and final. See for yourself the forgotten strength of this land of bugs before we burn those memories in its saving.
original_zh_text: <page=M>我们会把知道的古心位置尽数相告。<page=M>我们需要三颗心来施咒，从您的灵丝中抽出花影。<page=S>把心带来，古老者。通过它们的搏动，见证这片虫族土地被遗忘的伟力，再焚尽这些记忆换取救赎。
translated_text: <page=M>您正在寻找的心脏，我们可以尽最大努力分享它们的位置。<page=M>需要三个人来构建我们的咒语，并从你的丝绸上汲取花朵的清晰记忆。<page=S>老家伙，把你的心交给我们。让他们最终惨败。在我们拯救这些记忆之前，请亲眼看看这个被遗忘的虫子之地的力量。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>The hearts you are looking for, and we can do our best to share their location.<page=M>It takes three people to build our mantra and draw the clear memories of flowers from your silk.<page=S>Old man, give us your heart. Let them finally lose miserably. Before we save these memories, see for yourself the power of this forgotten land of bugs.

original_en_text: This giant, old ant... Her death seems recent, but her presence here... <page>Was it her? Could it be? The strength that sustained these caves? If so, what will happen now?<hpage>They will wither and fade... And you may sadly know it was my needle that brought her end.<page>You, miss? But why? Why destroy something so vital? <hpage>It is a difficult thing to explain simply... A test was needed, to ensure my strength before a greater challenge soon to come.<hpage>Know, in time, these caves may see opportunity to regrow, flourish even, though that rebirth is itself a task enormous... longer than a lifetime, many lifetimes.<hpage>For that task to succeed, it will fall to bugs like you to sow the first seeds.
original_zh_text: 这只年迈的巨蚁……她刚死没多久，可她却出现在这里……<page>那是她本人吗？难道真是她？支撑这些洞穴的力量究竟是什么？若真如此，如今会发生什么？<hpage>它们终将枯萎凋零……你也许会含泪明白，是我手中的针了结了她的生命。<page>这位姑娘，你？可为什么？为什么要摧残这般珍贵的东西？<hpage>这事难以三言两语解释……在更大的考验来临前，我必须通过试炼，证明自身的力量。<hpage>终有一日，这些洞穴或许能重新焕发生机，甚至繁盛昌荣。但那重生之路，漫长艰难，超越一生又一生。<hpage>而这份重任，便要靠你这样的小虫播撒下第一颗种子。
translated_text: 这只巨大的老蚂蚁...她的死似乎最近才过去，但她在这里的出现……<page>是她吗？可能是吗？支撑这些洞穴的力量是什么？如果是这样，现在会发生什么？<hpage>它们会枯萎和褪色……你可能悲伤地知道，是我的针杀死了她。<page>你，小姐？但为什么？为什么要毁掉如此重要的东西？<hpage>这是很难简单解释的事情……需要一次测试来确保我在即将到来的更大挑战面前的实力。<hpage>请注意，随着时间的推移，这些洞穴可能会看到再次生长甚至繁荣的机会，尽管重生本身就是一项艰巨的任务..比一生还要长，很多辈子<hpage>如果你想成功，你就必须依靠像你这样的虫子来播下第一颗种子。
secondary_translated_text: This huge old ant... Her death seems to have passed recently, but her presence here...<page>Is that her? Could it be? What are the forces that support these caves? If so, what would happen now?<hpage>They will wither and fade... You may know sadly that it was my needle that killed her.<page>You, miss? But why? Why destroy something so important?<hpage>It's something that's hard to explain simply... it takes a test to ensure my strength in the face of the bigger challenges that are coming.<hpage>Please note that over time, these caves may see opportunities to grow and even prosper again, although rebirth itself is a difficult task.. Longer than a lifetime, many lifetimes<hpage>If you want to succeed, you have to rely on bugs like you to plant the first seed.

original_en_text: Burrowed paths of the red-shells. Their stores and shrines are frequent throughout. These tunnels must grant them swift passage about the fields below.
original_zh_text: 红壳怪的隧道网。到处是他们的仓库和冥想室，方便在野地快速移动。
translated_text: 红壳的洞穴路径。他们的商店和神社散布在各处。隧道必须允许他们快速穿过下面的田野。
secondary_translated_text: The cave path of the red shell. Their shops and shrines are scattered everywhere. The tunnel must allow them to quickly cross the fields below.

original_en_text: <hpage>If I’m to dive, and cut this land from its black thread curse, I must first find means to extract the intruder within.
original_zh_text: <hpage>要下潜并斩断诅咒，得先除掉体内这玩意。
translated_text: <hpage>如果我要潜水并将这片土地从黑线诅咒中切断，我首先必须找到一种方法将入侵者从其中撤出。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>If I were to dive and cut this land from the Black Line Curse, I would first have to find a way to withdraw the invaders from it.

original_en_text: So I am freed, despite no request of mine for aid.<hpage>And I do not ask gratitude. The key merely fit the lock. If you choose, stay in here and wait till your shell hardens to crust.<page>No. I shall depart shortly. With my way clear, my wish again propels me, though I tried to avoid it.<hpage>Then safe journey, tall bug. I’ll not pry further. Clearly you bear your own burden.
original_zh_text: 我未曾求救，倒也被放出来了。<hpage>不必道谢，钥匙碰巧能用罢了。若想留在这，请自便。<page>不，我这就走。前路已通，纵使逃避，他的遗愿仍会推着我前行。<hpage>那便祝你一路顺利。看得出你有重担在身，我无意深究。
translated_text: 所以我被释放了，尽管我没有请求帮助。<hpage>我并不是要求感激。这把钥匙只能打开这把锁。如果你愿意，就留在这里等待你的外壳变硬。<page>不。我一会儿就走。我的道路是明确的，我的欲望再次推动了我，尽管我试图避免它。<hpage>那么一路平安吧，高大的昆虫。我不会再打探了。显然你自己承担了这个负担。
secondary_translated_text: So I was released, even though I didn't ask for help.<hpage>I'm not asking for gratitude. This key can only open this lock. If you want, stay here and wait for your shell to harden.<page>No. I'll be leaving in a minute. My path was clear, and my desire pushed me again, even though I tried to avoid it.<hpage>Then have a safe journey, tall insect. I won't pry anymore. You obviously bear the burden yourself.

original_en_text: Mm, mrm? Oh, hoy again!<page>I hadn’t meant to drop off like that. It’s hard to stay awake in such a cosy place, isn’t it?
original_zh_text: 唔嗯？哎呀又睡着了！<page>这地方太舒服了，让人犯困，你说是吧？
translated_text: 呃，先生？哦，嘿，我们又来了！<page>我不是故意这样摔倒的。在这样舒适的地方保持清醒很难，不是吗？
secondary_translated_text: Uh, sir? Oh, hey, here we go again!<page>I didn't mean to fall like this. It's hard to stay awake in such a comfortable place, isn't it?

original_en_text: Oh hear me pray, please hear me sing,<br>My path’s ahead, but here’s the thing,<br>I can’t squeeze past, o gate of bone,<br>So please wake up, and help...oh?
original_zh_text: 听我祈祷，听我歌唱，<br>前路虽近骨门却挡，<br>求您醒来助我闯荡……哦？
translated_text: 哦，听我祈祷，请听我唱歌，<br>我的路就在前面，但事情是这样的，<br>骨门，我挤不过去，<br>所以请醒醒并提供帮助。哦？
secondary_translated_text: Oh, hear me pray, please hear me sing,<br>My road is right ahead, but here's the thing,<br>I can't squeeze through the bone door,<br>So please wake up and help. Oh?

original_en_text: <page=M>Up top of those caves lost to wind and sand rests a crusted old ruler, a once great warrior king.<page=M>In their prime, they and their order held half of Pharloom under hardened claw. Some bugs relished that strength. Most lived in fear of it.
original_zh_text: <page=M>在风沙侵蚀的洞窟顶端，藏着位甲壳斑驳的老暴君。<page=M>全盛时他与部族以铁爪统治半个纺络。有人仰慕其强权，更多则活在恐惧中。
translated_text: <page=M>在那些被风沙淹没的洞穴顶上，躺着一位饱经风霜的老统治者，一位曾经伟大的武士国王。<page=M>在鼎盛时期，他们和他们的命令控制了一半的Fallum与硬爪。有些昆虫喜欢这种力量。大多数人生活在恐惧中。
secondary_translated_text: <page=M>On top of those sand-submerged caves lies a weather-beaten old ruler, a once-great warrior king.<page=M>At its peak, they and their orders controlled half of Fallum with Hard Claws. Some insects like this power. Most people live in fear.

original_en_text: Oooh ma! Sweet surprise for Nuu! You are adult, yes? Fully grown? Ready to hunt?<hpage>Certainly I am no child, young one.<page>Perfect then! Nuu must ask a wish! For her, you would seek Pharloom’s many fabulous bugs and cut them.<page>Cut them with your blade! Cut them with your mature spirit! Cut them with your savage adult heart!<page>Would you help Nuu? Could you take her scroll, and fill its pages with the learnings of your cuts?
original_zh_text: 哇哦大姐姐！努努好惊喜！你已经长大了对吧？完全体？能打猎了吧？<hpage>我显然不是个小孩子，小家伙。<page>太好啦！努努有个愿望！帮我去砍纺络的各种神奇虫子吧！<page>用你的刀砍！用长大的力气砍！用成熟的狂野之心砍！<page>帮帮努努好不好？收下这本册子，用打架心得写满它！
translated_text: 哦妈妈！给Nuu的甜蜜惊喜！你已经成年了，不是吗？完全长大了？准备好狩猎了吗？<hpage>当然，我不是一个孩子，还年轻。<page>太完美了！Nuu必须问一个愿望！对于她来说，你会发现Pharloom的许多奇妙的虫子并将它们剪掉。<page>用你的刀切它们！用你成熟的精神来消灭他们！用你野蛮的成年之心切割它们！<page>你会帮助Nuu吗？你能拿着她的卷轴并用你的编辑知识填满页面吗？
secondary_translated_text: Oh mom! A sweet surprise for Nuu! You're an adult, aren't you? Fully grown? Ready for hunting?<hpage>Of course, I am not a child, I am still young.<page>It's perfect! Nuu must ask a wish! For her, you will discover Pharloom's many wonderful bugs and cut them off.<page>Cut them with your knife! Use your mature spirit to destroy them! Cut them with your barbaric adult heart!<page>Will you help Nuu? Can you take her scroll and fill the page with your editing knowledge?

original_en_text: Guurroooo! Scoundrel! Fiend! Who dares wake brave Garmond from his well needed kip?<hpage>I’ve no intent to disturb, sir bug. I am merely passing these towers and sought to better understand the lay of the place.<page>Hmmph! Knowing the battlefield? A warrior’s reason! Just look at you! Your stance and blade, almost alone they declare a fight.<page>As the bravest of knights, if direct challenge were offered, honour would see noble Garmond accept!<page>Fortunate that seems not your intent. In truth, I’m still sleeping off something of an altercation myself. Had our meeting called for a knightly duel, you’d not have had the luck to behold my finest form.
original_zh_text: 嘎噜！歹徒！谁敢打扰勇者加蒙德的美梦？<hpage>无意冒犯，只是路过这座塔想探探路。<page>哼！勘察战场？战士的借口！看你这架势就是来找架打的！<page>作为最勇猛的骑士，要决斗我奉陪！<page>算你走运，我还没睡醒。真要决斗你可打不过全盛期的我！
translated_text: Guurrooooo！恶棍！恶魔！谁敢将勇敢的加蒙德从他迫切需要的睡眠中唤醒？<hpage>我无意打扰，巴格先生。我只是路过塔楼，以便更好地了解这个地方。<page>哼！了解战场？士兵的理由！看看你！你的位置和刀刃几乎是唯一宣战的人。<page>作为最勇敢的骑士，如果他直接挑战他，高贵的加蒙德就会接受！<page>愤怒似乎不是你的本意。事实上，因为争论，我自己正在睡觉。如果我们的会面是为了一场骑士决斗，你就不会这么幸运地看到我最好的一面了。
