secondary_translated_text: Guurrooooo! Villain! Demon! Who dares to awaken brave Gamond from the sleep he sorely needed?<hpage>I don't mean to interrupt, Mr. Bagger. I just passed by the tower to get to know the place better.<page>Hmph! Understand the battlefield? Soldiers 'reasons! Look at you! Your position and blade are almost the only one who declares war.<page>As the bravest knight, if he challenges him directly, the noble Gamond will accept it!<page>Anger doesn't seem to be your intention. In fact, I was sleeping myself because of the argument. If our meeting was for a knight's duel, you wouldn't be so lucky to see my best side.

original_en_text: Hoy then, what’s a fancy-prancy bug like you creepin’ into Grindle’s cosy little nook for?<page>Heard we had some nice stuff, did ya? O-hoho! All kinds of tasty goodies find their way here, that’s for sure.<hpage>I care little for how you procured your goods, thief. If you have something worth trading, I may part with my rosaries.<page>Well, we never say no to a fair swap, heh heh! Now take a look at what we’s got...
original_zh_text: 哦嚯！阔气虫，你溜进格林德尔的宝窝想干嘛？<page>是不是听说我这有好货？哦嚯嚯！那可不，宝贝们都是自己溜进来的！<hpage>我不在乎你的货怎么来的，如果有好东西，我拿念珠来换。<page>成交！不过我们可不做赔本买卖，嚯嚯！你先随便看看吧……
translated_text: 嘿，那么，当你爬进格林德尔舒适的小角落时，幻想虫是什么样子的？<page>听说我们有一些好东西，对吧？哦嗬嗬！这里可以找到各种美味的食物，这是肯定的。<hpage>我不在乎你怎么买东西，小偷。如果你有值得交易的东西，我可能会放弃我的念珠。<page>好吧，我们从不对公平交换说不，嘿！现在让我们看看我们有什么。
secondary_translated_text: Hey, so, what does fantasy bugs look like when you climb into Greendale's cozy little corner?<page>Heard we have some good stuff, right? Oh ho ho! You can find all kinds of delicious food here, that's for sure.<hpage>I don't care how you buy, thief. If you have something worth trading for, I might give up my rosary beads.<page>Well, we never say no to a fair exchange, hey! Now let's see what we have.

original_en_text: Now I shall remain, and train. And know! Though I have no more rewards to give, you are welcome to grace my track, as many times as you wish.
original_zh_text: 我要继续训练了！不过记着，虽然没其他奖品了，但随时欢迎你来赛道上奔跑！
translated_text: 现在我要留下来训练。并且知道！虽然我没有更多的奖励可以给予，但只要你愿意，欢迎你加入我的行列。
secondary_translated_text: Now I'm going to stay and train. And know! Although I have no more rewards to give, you are welcome to join me as long as you are willing.

original_en_text: The sharp-faced bugs of these drizzled caves love to swoop and play, don’t they? If only I could understand their beautiful language...
original_zh_text: 这些尖脸虫就爱在雨里扑腾。要是能听懂它们的语言多好……
translated_text: 这些在细雨蒙蒙的洞穴里的尖脸虫子喜欢潜水和玩耍，不是吗？如果我能理解他们美丽的语言就好了……
secondary_translated_text: These pointy-faced bugs in drizzly caves like to dive and play, don't they? If only I could understand their beautiful language…

original_en_text: ...At the bottom of a well, you can only look up. The past is hidden from those who look forward...<page>...Those echoes may guide you still. Yes, that’s true. For the kind-hearted, a weapon can also be a friend...<page>...You’re so eager to follow in her footsteps. But what are you leaving for those who come next?
original_zh_text: ……身居井底唯见上方。沉湎过往者难窥前路……<page>……余音仍可指明方向。善者手中，利器亦可为友……<page>……你执着追随她的足迹。可曾为后来者留有余地？……
translated_text: ...在井底，你只能抬头。过去对那些展望未来的人来说是隐藏的……<page>...这些回声仍然可以引导你。是的对于善良的人来说，武器也可以成为朋友……<page>...你非常想追随她的脚步。但你想为下一个人留下什么呢？
secondary_translated_text: ... At the bottom of the well, you can only look up. The past is hidden from those looking to the future...<page>... These echoes can still guide you. Yes, for kind people, weapons can also be friends...<page>... You really want to follow in her footsteps. But what do you want to leave for the next person?

original_en_text: Hoof... Always you impress... nimble bug...<page>As many times as you may, let us speed forth! Gladly will I strive to match your spritely grace.
original_zh_text: 呼……每次都被你惊艳……<page>想再比赛的话随时奉陪！我一定要追上你！
translated_text: 蹄子。你总是让人印象深刻。敏捷的昆虫。<page>尽可能多的时间来加速！我很乐意尝试与你的优雅相配。
secondary_translated_text: Hoof. You always make an impression. Agile insects.<page>Take as much time as possible to speed up! I would love to try and match your elegance.

original_en_text: This poor traveller finds her resolve waning. When I first greeted her, her voice was so hoarse I scarcely heard it!<page>’Tis no cause for worry, though. My song will lift her from her torpor! Join your voice with mine, red maiden, and together we shall rouse our fellow pilgrim!
original_zh_text: 这位同袍意志消沉，初遇时她嗓音沙哑，几乎听不见！<page>莫慌！我的歌声能唤醒她！红衣姑娘一起唱，唤起这位同路人！
translated_text: 这位可怜的旅行者发现她的决心正在减弱。当我第一次和她打招呼时，她的声音嘶哑得几乎听不见！<page>但没什么可担心的。我的歌会让她摆脱麻木！红女，加入你我的声音，我们将共同唤醒我们的朝圣者同胞！
secondary_translated_text: The poor traveler found her determination waning. When I first greeted her, her voice was so hoarse that it was almost inaudible!<page>But there's nothing to worry about. My song will shake her off her numbing! Red Girl, join you and me, and we will jointly awaken our fellow pilgrims!

original_en_text: In time, even these great steps will be swept away by the sands. Nothing is immovable.
original_zh_text: 再大的台阶也迟早被风沙埋了，没有什么是永恒的。
translated_text: 随着时间的推移，即使是这些巨大的台阶也会被沙子冲走。没有什么是不可移动的。
secondary_translated_text: Over time, even these huge steps will be washed away by sand. Nothing is immovable.

original_en_text: Ooh ma ma! Look here, miss grown-up! Very fascinating creature here, all dead in bits now, but still good!<page>She takes the shape of the woods for her body, and her hair like bitter leaves! Clever, thinks Nuu!<hpage>This creature staked its territory here and attacked as I passed through.<hpage>You should not linger long. Her tribe remains hidden amongst the branches, disguised and waiting to strike.<page>Oooh! So the cutting-up was done by you? Nuu gives her warm thanks! Now Nuu can inspect this creature well, all its gooey insides and crunchy shell!
original_zh_text: 哇！大姐姐快看！这只死透的怪物超有趣！<page>身体像树干，头发像苦叶子！努努觉得它超聪明！<hpage>这生物占据此处，袭击路人。<hpage>别久留，它的同族还在树丛里埋伏呢。<page>哇！是你干掉的？太感谢啦！现在可以好好研究它的粘液和脆壳了！
translated_text: 哦妈妈！看这里，我的主人和小姐！这里非常迷人的生物现在已经死了，但仍然很好！<page>她的身体形状像森林，她的头发像苦叶！聪明，Nuu认为！<hpage>这个生物在这里建立了自己的领地，并在我经过时发起了攻击。<hpage>你不应该呆太久。她的部落仍然隐藏在树枝上，伪装着，等待着受到攻击。<page>噢！所以你剪了吗？Nuu向她致以热烈的感谢！现在Nuu可以很好地检查这种生物，包括它所有粘稠的内部和脆脆的外壳！
secondary_translated_text: Oh mom! Look here, my master and miss! The very charming creature here is now dead, but still fine!<page>Her body is shaped like a forest, her hair like bitter leaves! Smart, Nuu thinks!<hpage>This creature established its own territory here and attacked as I passed by.<hpage>You shouldn't stay too long. Her tribe is still hidden in branches, disguised, waiting to be attacked.<page>Oh! So did you cut it? Nuu extended her warm thanks to her! Now Nuu can do a good job inspecting the creature, including all of its sticky interior and crunchy outer shell!

original_zh_text: 《空洞骑士：丝之歌》的奖杯列表。

original_en_text: {0} out of {1} PS4™ save files were successfully imported.<br>Clear save slots to import PS4™ save files.
original_zh_text: 成功导入{0}/{1}个PS4™存档。<br>请释放存档槽位以继续导入PS4™存档。
translated_text: {0}出来{1}PS4™保存的文件已成功导入。<br>清除保存插槽以导入PS4™保存文件。
secondary_translated_text: {0}out{1}The files saved by PS4™ have been successfully imported.<br>Clear the save slot to import PS4™ save files.
Press any button to get started.

original_en_text: Change language in the Main Menu
secondary_translated_text: Change the language in the main menu

original_en_text: Reduce to improve performance on lower end systems.
original_zh_text: 降低此项可提升低配设备性能。
translated_text: 减少以提高低端系统的性能。
secondary_translated_text: Reduce to improve the performance of low-end systems.

original_en_text: Higher frame rate mode for displays that support 120Hz. Resolution will be reduced.
original_zh_text: 为支持120Hz的显示设备提供更高帧数模式，但会降低分辨率。
translated_text: 支持120 Hz显示器的更高帧率模式。分辨率将会降低。
secondary_translated_text: Supports higher frame rate mode for 120 Hz displays. Resolution will decrease.
(The The main save will be deleted)

translated_text: 空心骑士：丝绸之歌奖杯
secondary_translated_text: Hollow Knight: Song of Silk Trophy

original_en_text: Adjust slider until the frames touch the edges of the screen
original_zh_text: 调整滑块，直到方框触及屏幕边缘
translated_text: 调整滑块，直到框架接触到屏幕边缘
secondary_translated_text: Adjust the slider until the frame touches the edge of the screen

translated_text: 饰演《空心骑士：丝绸之歌》
secondary_translated_text: Playing "The Hollow Knight: Song of Silk"

translated_text: 没有复兴。死亡是永久性的。
secondary_translated_text: There is no revival. Death is permanent.

original_en_text: Prevents screen tearing. Leave on for a smoother experience.
original_zh_text: 消除屏幕撕裂，提供更平滑的体验。
translated_text: 防止屏幕撕裂。继续享受更流畅的体验。
secondary_translated_text: Prevent the screen from tearing. Continue to enjoy a smoother experience.

original_en_text: Limit maximum frame rate for a consistent experience.
original_zh_text: 限制最高帧率以保证稳定体验。
translated_text: 限制最大帧率以获得一致的体验。
secondary_translated_text: Limit the maximum frame rate for a consistent experience.

original_en_text: Show names of Kickstarter backers alongside their contributions.
translated_text: 显示Kickstarter支持者的姓名及其贡献。
secondary_translated_text: Displays the names of Kickstarter supporters and their contributions.

original_en_text: Adjust the scale of the HUD. Will reset on game exit if set to ‘Off’.
original_zh_text: 调整HUD缩放比例。设为“关闭”时，退出游戏自动还原默认比例。
translated_text: 调整HUD的大小。如果设置为“关闭”，则游戏退出时将重置。
secondary_translated_text: Adjust the size of the HUD. If set to "Off", it will be reset when the game exits.

original_en_text: This game saves data automatically at certain points.<br>Please do not turn off the software while this symbol is displayed.
original_zh_text: 本游戏在某些情况下会自动存档。<br>如果屏幕上出现此标志，请不要强行关闭游戏。
translated_text: 游戏会自动保存某些点的数据。<br>显示此符号时请勿关闭软件。
secondary_translated_text: The game automatically saves data for certain points.<br>Do not close the software while this symbol is displayed.

original_en_text: Hear the hero’s voice during exploration and combat.
original_zh_text: 探索与战斗时播放主角声音。
translated_text: 聆听探索和战斗中英雄的声音。
secondary_translated_text: Listen to the voices of heroes in exploration and battle.

original_en_text: Reduce to improve performance on lower end systems.
original_zh_text: 降低此项可提升低配设备性能。
translated_text: 减少以提高低端系统的性能。
secondary_translated_text: Reduce to improve the performance of low-end systems.

original_en_text: Failed to find compatible save data.
translated_text: 无法找到兼容的保存数据。
secondary_translated_text: Unable to find compatible saved data.

original_en_text: {0} out of {1} PS4™ save files were successfully imported.
translated_text: {0}出来{1}PS4™保存的文件已成功导入。
secondary_translated_text: {0}out{1}The files saved by PS4™ have been successfully imported.

original_zh_text: 《空洞骑士：丝之歌》的成就列表。
secondary_translated_text: Achievements of "Hollow Knight: Song of Silk".

original_en_text: Reduces colour banding, but may effect performance on lower end systems.
original_zh_text: 减少色彩断层，但可能影响低配设备的流畅度。
translated_text: 减少色带，但可能影响低端系统的性能。
secondary_translated_text: Reduce the ribbon, but may affect the performance of low-end systems.

original_en_text: Press a button on the controller or connect a new controller to activate
original_zh_text: 按下手柄上的按钮或连接新手柄以激活
translated_text: 按下控制器上的按钮或连接新控制器以激活
secondary_translated_text: Press the button on the controller or connect a new controller to activate

original_en_text: Adjust brightness to your desired level.
original_zh_text: 将亮度调整到所需的程度。
translated_text: 将亮度调整到所需的水平。
secondary_translated_text: Adjust the brightness to the desired level.

original_en_text: Continue playing without a user?<br>Your progress will not be saved
original_zh_text: 不选择用户继续游戏？<br>你的进度不会被保存。
translated_text: 在没有用户的情况下继续玩？<br>您的进度不会被保存
secondary_translated_text: Continue playing without users?<br>Your progress will not be saved

original_en_text: Show in-game messages when completing a feat.
original_zh_text: 完成任务时显示游戏内提示。
translated_text: 完成专长时显示游戏内消息。
secondary_translated_text: Display in-game messages when completing a feat.

original_en_text: Show in-game messages when earning an achievement.
original_zh_text: 获得成就时显示游戏内提示。
translated_text: 当您获得成就时显示游戏内消息。
secondary_translated_text: Display in-game messages when you achieve achievements.

original_en_text: Oi! I’m wishin’ for that bothersome bellringer! That you readin’ this? Then head up top beside the shrine. Might be we two should have a little chat...
original_zh_text: 喂！我有事找那个烦人的敲钟者！你有看到吗？看到了就来上面钟殿找我。我们得聊两句……
translated_text: 嘿！我希望那个烦人的敲钟人！你读过这个吗？然后前往神社旁边的顶部。也许我们两个应该谈谈。
secondary_translated_text: Hey! I hope that annoying bell ringer! Have you read this? Then head to the top next to the shrine. Maybe the two of us should talk.

original_en_text: One part of the Threefold Melody, entrusted to the industrious Architects.
original_zh_text: 三重旋律之一，托付给了勤劳的建筑师。
translated_text: 三重旋律的一部分委托给勤奋的建筑师。
secondary_translated_text: Part of the triple melody is entrusted to hard-working architects.

original_en_text: The Pollen Heart has been claimed from Nyleth.
original_zh_text: 已从花语之喉处获得花粉之心。
translated_text: 花粉的核心已经从尼尔斯手中夺走了。
secondary_translated_text: The core of the pollen had been snatched from Niels.

original_en_text: Return to the Citadel’s Stage, beside the Whispering Vaults.
original_zh_text: 返回低语书库旁的圣堡剧台。
translated_text: 返回低语金库旁边的城堡舞台。
secondary_translated_text: Return to the castle stage next to the Whisper Treasury.

original_en_text: That the age may pass, this shroom its witness.
translated_text: 愿时光流逝，这就是它的见证。
secondary_translated_text: May time pass by, this is its testimony.

original_en_text: Flintbeetles have awoken in the Marrow. The gems that grow in their bellies provide a pure, constant warmth. Harvest these treasures and be rewarded!
original_zh_text: 髓骨洞窟的燧甲虫苏醒了，它们腹中的宝石能提供纯净恒温。收割这些宝物换取奖励吧！
translated_text: 甲虫在骨髓中醒来。生长在它们肚子里的宝石提供纯粹、持续的温暖。收获这些宝藏并获得奖励！
secondary_translated_text: The beetle wakes up in the bone marrow. The gemstones that grow in their bellies provide pure, continuous warmth. Harvest these treasures and receive rewards!

original_en_text: Confront the one who haunts the lands of Pharloom.
translated_text: 面对困扰法鲁姆土地的人们。
secondary_translated_text: Facing the people who troubled the land of Faroum.

original_en_text: Find aid in Deep Docks to access its diving bell and descend beneath Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 在深坞寻求帮助并找到潜钟以潜入纺络之下。
translated_text: 在深码头寻求帮助，进入潜水钟并下降到法鲁下方。
secondary_translated_text: Ask for help at the deep pier, enter the diving bell and descend below Faro.

original_en_text: If the world is truly ending, I would test my pin in combat one last time. Come to my home at border’s edge and accept my challenge!
original_zh_text: 若世界真要终结，我希望最后一次用针证明自己。来边境小屋接受挑战！
translated_text: 如果世界真的要毁灭了，我会在战斗中最后一次测试我的徽章。来到我边境边缘的家，接受我的挑战！
secondary_translated_text: If the world was really about to end, I would test my badge one last time in battle. Come to my home on the edge of the border and accept my challenge!

original_en_text: Investigate the resting sites marked by Steel Seer Zi to uncover the location of her vassal.
original_zh_text: 调查钢之先知·梓标记的安息地并寻找其侍从。
translated_text: 调查甘塞尔标记的安息地，找出她的附庸所在地。
secondary_translated_text: Investigate the resting place Gansel marked and find out where her vassals are located.
The female priest who blew up the stairs

original_en_text: Speak to Creige of the Halfway Home in Greymoor.
original_zh_text: 前往灰沼中途酒馆与克雷吉对话。
translated_text: 正在与克里奇交谈，克里奇正在走到格雷莫尔的半路回家。
secondary_translated_text: Talking to Crikey, who was walking home halfway to Greymore.

original_en_text: Turn in the Horn Fragment to Bellhart’s wishwall and collect the reward.
original_zh_text: 向钟心镇祈愿墙提交兽角碎片领取奖励。
translated_text: 将号角碎片交给伯哈特的愿望墙并接受奖励。
secondary_translated_text: Hand over the horn fragment to Burhart's Wall of Wishes and accept the reward.

original_en_text: Ascend through the lands of Pharloom and reach the Citadel at the kingdom’s peak.
original_zh_text: 穿越纺络大地，抵达王国巅峰的圣堡。
translated_text: 穿过法勒姆之地，到达王国山顶的城堡。
secondary_translated_text: Pass through the land of Farham to the castle on the top of the Kingdom.

original_en_text: Hunt Hokers in the Far Fields and collect Spine Cores.
original_zh_text: 在远野猎杀棘背虫并收集棘刺芯。
translated_text: 在遥远的田野中狩猎老鹰并收集脊柱核心。
secondary_translated_text: Hunt eagles in distant fields and collect spinal cores.

original_en_text: Return to Steel Seer Zi and inform her of Sula’s escape.
original_zh_text: 返回告知梓关于苏拉逃脱的消息。
translated_text: 回到冈塞尔茨，通知她苏拉逃跑的消息。
secondary_translated_text: Go back to Ganselz and inform her of Sulla's escape.

original_en_text: Crull and Benjin of Sinner’s Road
original_zh_text: 罪途 克鲁尔与班金
translated_text: 克鲁尔和罪人之路的校长
secondary_translated_text: Principal of Krull and the Path of Sinners

original_en_text: Those blasted crawbugs are fouling up my roof! I’ve come up with a clever solution to keep them away, but I’ll need some help. Enquire at the Halfway Home if you’re fit for the task.
original_zh_text: 那些该死的腐囊虫弄脏了我的屋顶！我有个绝妙的解决办法，但需要帮助。有能力者请来中途酒馆洽谈。
translated_text: 那些该死的小虫子正在弄脏我的屋顶！我想出了一个聪明的解决方案来让他们远离，但我需要一些帮助。请中途回家询问您是否适合这项任务。
secondary_translated_text: Those damn little bugs are smearing my roof! I came up with a clever solution to keep them away, but I needed some help. Please go home halfway to ask if you are suitable for this task.

original_en_text: Search for traces of the courier, Tipp, and track his location.<br><br>Tipp was last seen in lower Shellwood.
original_zh_text: 寻找送货员蒂普的踪迹。<br><br>他最后出现在甲木林下层。
translated_text: 搜索快递员提示并跟踪他的位置。<br><br>蒂普最后一次出现是在下谢尔伍德。
secondary_translated_text: Search for courier tips and track his location.<br><br>Tip was last seen in Lower Shelwood.

original_en_text: Those mad, violent pilgrims who haunt the great path... we could make use of their shawls here in Bone Bottom. And felling them would surely be a mercy!
original_zh_text: 那些在外游荡的癫狂朝圣者……其披肩对骸底镇大有用处。诛灭此等暴虐之徒，实为赐予慈悲解脱！
translated_text: 那些在路上出没的疯狂、暴力的朝圣者……我们可以在骨头底部使用他们的披肩。把他们砍下来也是一种仁慈！
secondary_translated_text: Those crazy, violent pilgrims who haunt the road... we can use their shawls at the bottom of the bones. It would be a kind of kindness to cut them down!

original_en_text: In Deep Docks, find a way to descend beneath Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 在深坞找到方法潜入纺络之下。
translated_text: 在深码头，找到一种方法下降到法鲁姆下面。
secondary_translated_text: At the Deep Pier, find a way to descend below Farum.

original_en_text: Enliven and acquire the old hearts of Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 激活并获取纺络的古老心脏。
translated_text: 激活并获得法鲁的旧心。
secondary_translated_text: Activate and gain Faro's old heart.

original_en_text: One part of the Threefold Melody, entrusted to the Conductors.
original_zh_text: 三重旋律之一，托付给了指挥家。
translated_text: 三重旋律的一部分委托给指挥。
secondary_translated_text: Part of the triple melody is entrusted to the conductor.

original_en_text: Turn in the Broodmother’s Eye to Songclave’s wishwall and collect the reward.
original_zh_text: 向圣歌盟地祈愿墙提交育母之眼领取奖励。
translated_text: 将你养母的目光转向桑克拉夫的愿望墙并接受你的奖励。
secondary_translated_text: Turn your adoptive mother's eyes to Sankraft's wish wall and accept your reward.

original_en_text: Fragile egg containing a young Silkeater Queen. Though the Queen cannot gather Silk itself, with time and care it could be raised to breed more Silkeaters.
original_zh_text: 内含噬丝蛆女王的脆弱虫卵。虽不能自行收集灵丝，但培养后可繁殖更多噬丝蛆。
translated_text: 一个脆弱的蛋里面有一个年轻的丝绸女王。皇后虽然不能自己采集蚕丝，但只要有时间和细心，就可以把它养大，繁殖出更多的蚕丝。
secondary_translated_text: A fragile egg contains a young silk queen. Although the queen couldn't collect silk herself, as long as she had time and care, she could raise it and reproduce more silk.

original_zh_text: 将扭曲的畸芽缚于体内。

original_en_text: Child Wielding Needle, I have caught fresh scent of my master in those stricken swamps beside the Citadel. I ask you now to follow, to meet together at trail’s end.
original_zh_text: 使针的小姑娘，我在圣堡旁的沼泽嗅到了导师的新踪迹。请随我一同前往踪迹终点。
translated_text: 男孩针，我在城堡旁边受灾的沼泽里闻到了主人的新鲜气味。我现在请你们跟随并在道路的尽头相遇。
secondary_translated_text: Boy needle, I smelled the fresh smell of my owner in the disaster-stricken swamp next to the castle. I now ask you to follow and meet each other at the end of the road.

original_en_text: Return to Fleamaster Mooshka of the Flea Caravan, in the Marrow.
original_zh_text: 返回髓骨洞窟向穆什卡复命。
translated_text: 回到跳蚤大篷车中Fleamaster Mooshka的骨髓中。
secondary_translated_text: Back in the flea caravan, in the bone marrow of Fleamaster Mooshka.

original_en_text: As was warned long ago, the black times have come. There is one last act to perform. Meet us at what was once called Fleatopia.
original_zh_text: 正如古老预言警示，黑暗时代已至，但尚存最后一幕等待上演。请前往曾经的蚤托邦。
translated_text: 正如很久以前所警告的那样，黑人时代已经到来。还有最后一个场景要拍。在曾经被称为跳蚤乌托邦的地方与我们见面。
secondary_translated_text: As warned long ago, the black age has arrived. There is one last scene to shoot. Meet us in what was once called flea utopia.

original_en_text: Search for traces of the merchant, Jubilana, and track her location.<br><br>Jubilana was last seen near the Citadel’s Memorium.
original_zh_text: 寻找朱比拉娜的踪迹。<br><br>她最后出现在圣堡忆廊附近。
translated_text: 搜索商人Jubilana并跟踪她的位置。<br><br>朱比拉纳最后一次出现是在城堡纪念馆附近。
secondary_translated_text: Search for businessman Jubilana and track her location.<br><br>Jubilana was last seen near the Castle Memorial.

original_en_text: Our dear merchant left to scavenge treasures from the Citadel’s Memorium. She’s been gone far too long. Please make sure she’s safe!
original_zh_text: 我们的商人去圣堡忆廊寻宝后失踪太久，请确认她的安全！
translated_text: 我们亲爱的商人去挖掘城堡纪念馆的宝藏了。她离开太久了。请确保她是安全的！
secondary_translated_text: Our dear businessman has gone to dig up the treasures of the castle memorial. She's been gone too long. Please make sure she is safe!

original_en_text: Seek out the distressed bug near the Blasted Steps Bellway.
original_zh_text: 在蚀阶钟道附近寻找遇险者。
translated_text: 在贝尔威爆炸台阶附近寻找麻烦的虫子。
secondary_translated_text: Look for troublesome bugs near the Bellevue explosion steps.

original_en_text: Give the Spine Cores to the Seamstress waiting in Far Fields.
original_zh_text: 将棘刺芯交给在远野等待的裁缝。
translated_text: 将脊柱核心交给远场等待的压力源。
secondary_translated_text: Hand over the core of the spine to the pressure source waiting in the far field.

original_en_text: Collect Plasmium from Plasmium buds in the lower Wormways.<br><br>Plasmium can be extracted from buds using a fully charged stab from the Needle Phial tool.
original_zh_text: 在沙噬虫道下层的生质花苞上收集生质液。<br><br>使用蓄满力的储液注射器抽取。
translated_text: 在下面的Wormways从Plasmium芽中收集Plasmium。<br><br>使用Needle Phial工具带电荆棘可以从花蕾中提取血浆。
secondary_translated_text: Collect Plasmium from Plasmium buds at Wormways below.<br><br>Use the Needle Phial tool to electrify thorns to extract plasma from flower buds.

original_en_text: Play the Threefold Melody before the statues at the Citadel’s heart.
original_zh_text: 在圣堡核心的雕像前演奏三重旋律。
translated_text: 在城堡中心的雕像前播放《三重旋律》。
secondary_translated_text: Play "Triple Melody" in front of the statue in the center of the castle.

original_en_text: Donate rosaries to aid the Songclave’s residents.
original_zh_text: 捐献念珠援助圣歌盟地居民。
translated_text: 捐赠念珠帮助松克拉夫居民。
secondary_translated_text: Donate rosary beads to help Sonclave residents.

original_en_text: Travel to Pinstress’s home at the far edge of Blasted Steps and accept her challenge.
original_zh_text: 前往蚀阶边缘的针姬居所，接受她的挑战。
translated_text: 前往位于Blasted Steps边缘的Pinstress家并接受她的挑战。
secondary_translated_text: Head to Pinstress's home on the edge of the Blasted Steps and accept her challenge.

original_en_text: Deliver to Mask Maker on Mount Fay.
original_zh_text: 将物资送至费耶山的面甲匠。
translated_text: 交付给费伊山的口罩制造商。
secondary_translated_text: Delivered to the mask manufacturer in Mount Fay.

original_en_text: Donate shell shards to aid the construction of an icon of hope.
original_zh_text: 捐献甲壳碎片帮助建造希望丰碑。
translated_text: 捐赠贝壳碎片帮助打造希望偶像。
secondary_translated_text: Donate shell fragments to help create an idol of hope.

original_en_text: Turn in the Grass Doll to Bellhart’s wishwall and collect the reward.
original_zh_text: 向钟心镇祈愿墙提交草娃娃领取奖励
translated_text: 将草娃娃交给伯哈特的愿望墙并获得奖励。
secondary_translated_text: Hand over the grass doll to Burhart's Wish Wall and receive a reward.

original_en_text: Sweetness! Sourness! Bitterness! I need it all with hastiness! If you have the precious fruits, come to me in Mosshome and share all you have!
original_zh_text: 甜味！酸味！苦味！我要所有莓果！如果有珍果，到苔栖乡找我分享！
translated_text: 亲爱的酸味！苦！我急着要！如果你有珍贵的水果，来Mosshome找我，分享你的一切！
secondary_translated_text: Dear sour taste! Suffering! I need it in a hurry! If you have precious fruits, come to Mosshome to find me and share everything you have!

original_en_text: Present the filled out Hunter’s Journal to Nuu at the Halfway Home in Greymoor.
original_zh_text: 向灰沼中途酒馆的努努出示完整猎手日志。
translated_text: 在格里莫的中途之家向努展示完成的《猎人日记》。
secondary_translated_text: Show Nu the completed "Hunter's Diary" at Grimaud's halfway house.

original_en_text: Speak to Fleamaster Mooshka of Fleatopia.
original_zh_text: 与蚤托邦的跳蚤首领穆什卡交谈。
translated_text: 去寻找跳蚤乌托邦的跳蚤大师穆斯卡
secondary_translated_text: Go find Muska, the flea master of flea utopia

original_zh_text: 远野的飞毛腿斯威夫特
translated_text: 远场冲刺大师斯威夫特

original_en_text: Search the gilded heights of the Citadel for the melody of the Conductors.
original_zh_text: 在圣堡鎏金穹顶寻找指挥家的旋律。
translated_text: 在城堡的镀金高地上找到指挥的旋律。
secondary_translated_text: Find the melody of conduct on the gilded heights of the castle.

original_en_text: Give the Plasmified Blood to the Alchemist at the top of the Wormways.
original_zh_text: 将生质血交给沙噬虫道顶部的炼金师。
translated_text: 将血浆化的血液交给蠕虫岛顶部的炼金术士。
secondary_translated_text: Give the plasmatized blood to the alchemist on top of worm island.

original_en_text: Deliver to the Survivors’ Camp in the Marrow.
original_zh_text: 将物资送至髓骨洞窟的幸存者营地。
translated_text: 被送往骨髓中的幸存者营地
secondary_translated_text: A survivor camp sent to the bone marrow

original_en_text: Learn the Threefold Melody and open the path to the Citadel’s crest.
original_zh_text: 学会三重旋律的三个部分，开启通往圣堡核心的道路。
translated_text: 学习三重旋律，开辟通往城堡顶峰的道路。
secondary_translated_text: Learn the triple melody and open up the road to the peak of the castle.

original_en_text: Confront the Caretaker and his family in the Ruined Chapel beside Bone Bottom.
original_zh_text: 在骸底镇旁的颓败教堂直面看守者及其家族。
translated_text: 骨头底部旁边的被毁教堂面对着看守人和他的家人。
secondary_translated_text: The destroyed church next to the bottom of the bone faces the caretaker and his family.

original_en_text: The Architect’s Melody has been learned.
translated_text: 我学会了建筑师的曲调。
secondary_translated_text: I learned the tune of an architect.

original_en_text: Deliver to Mergwin in Choral Chambers.
original_zh_text: 将物资送至圣咏殿的梅尔格温。
translated_text: 在合唱团中向梅尔·格温致敬。
secondary_translated_text: Tribute to Mel Gwen in the choir.

original_en_text: Hunt Crawbugs in Greymoor and collect their Ragpelt.
original_zh_text: 猎杀灰沼腐囊虫并收集破毛皮。
translated_text: 在格雷穆尔捕猎小龙虾并收集它们的破布。
secondary_translated_text: Hunt crayfish and collect their rags at Greymoor.

original_en_text: The Conductor’s Melody has been learned.
translated_text: 指挥的旋律已经学会了。
secondary_translated_text: The melody of the conductor has been learned.

original_en_text: Our settlement sits defenceless! No more! When the worst comes, we must stand ready. Bring us pins of the choirbugs, those blades still sharp and strong.
original_zh_text: 我们的聚落需要防卫！带来机枢咏者的锋利尖钉。
translated_text: 我们的定居点毫无防御能力！不再！当最坏的情况到来时，我们必须做好准备。给我们带来了唱诗班昆虫的别针，那些刀片仍然锋利而坚固。
secondary_translated_text: Our settlements are defenceless! No more! When the worst comes, we must be prepared. Brought us choir insect pins, those blades are still sharp and strong.

original_en_text: Track down Flintbeetles in the Marrow and defeat them to collect Flintgems.<br><br>Flintbeetles can be tracked by their stone-sheddings and their aromatic dung.
original_zh_text: 在髓骨洞窟追踪并击败燧甲虫收集燧晶。<br><br>可通过石屑和带香味的粪便追踪。
translated_text: 在骨髓中追踪Flintbeets并击败它们以收集Flintgem。<br><br>甲虫可以通过它们的石屑和芳香粪便来追踪。
secondary_translated_text: Track Flintbees in the bone marrow and defeat them to collect Flintgems.<br><br>Beetles can be traced through their stone chips and aromatic dung.

original_en_text: Search for traces of the merchant, Jubilana, and track her location.<br><br>Jubilana was last seen in the lower Choral Chambers.
original_zh_text: 寻找商人朱比拉娜的踪迹。<br><br>她最后出现在圣咏殿下层。
translated_text: 搜索商人Jubilana并跟踪她的位置。<br><br>朱比拉娜最后一次出现是在下层合唱室。
secondary_translated_text: Search for businessman Jubilana and track her location.<br><br>Jubilana was last seen in the lower choir room.

original_en_text: Donate rosaries to complete the rebuilding of Bellhart.
original_zh_text: 捐献念珠完成钟心镇重建。
translated_text: 捐赠念珠，以完成重建伯哈特。
secondary_translated_text: Donate rosary beads to complete the rebuilding of Burhart.

original_en_text: Acquire Steel Spines from Crull and Benjin in Sinner’s Road so Yarnaby can remove the parasite.
original_zh_text: 从罪途的克鲁尔与班金身上获取钢棘用于寄生体清除。
translated_text: 从Sinner ' s Road的Crull和Benjin购买Steel Spones，这样Yarnaby就可以去除寄生虫。
secondary_translated_text: Buy Steel Spones from Crull and Benjin on Sinner's Road so Yarnaby can remove the parasites.

original_en_text: Deliver supplies to the Caretaker in Songclave.
original_zh_text: 向盟地看守者运送补给。
translated_text: 向松克拉夫的典狱长运送物资。
secondary_translated_text: Delivery of supplies to the warden in Sonkrav.

original_en_text: Give the Ragpelt to Creige of the Halfway Home in Greymoor.
original_zh_text: 将破毛皮交给灰沼中途酒馆的克雷吉。
translated_text: 把抹布递给克里奇，克里奇正穿过格雷莫尔的半路回家。
secondary_translated_text: Hand over the rag to Crikey, who was halfway home through Greymore.

original_en_text: Give Pale Oil to Plinney of Bellhart.
original_zh_text: 将苍白油交给钟心镇的普林尼。
translated_text: 将轻质油送到贝尔哈特的普林尼。
secondary_translated_text: Send light oil to Pliny in Bellhart.

original_en_text: Horrible cries have been heard from that prison beside the Citadel. What profanities must be happening within to cause such awful sound?
original_zh_text: 圣堡旁的监狱传出可怕哀嚎，里面究竟发生了什么？
translated_text: 城堡旁边的监狱里传来可怕的哭声。里面一定有什么东西发出如此可怕的声音？
secondary_translated_text: There was a terrible cry from the prison next to the castle. There must be something in there making such a terrible sound?

original_en_text: Use the diving bell in Deep Docks to descend beneath Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 使用深坞的潜钟潜入纺络之下。
translated_text: 使用深码头的潜水钟下降到法鲁姆下方。
secondary_translated_text: Use the diving bell at the deep dock to descend below Farum.

original_en_text: How do all of these wretched, lost bugs keep finding their way here?! Each hungry and squalling for shelter! We need more rosaries, so empty your pockets.
original_zh_text: 为什么总有迷途的可怜虫找到这里？！我们需要更多念珠，快掏空你的口袋！
translated_text: 这些可怜的、迷失的虫子是如何不断在这里找到它的？！每个人都饿了，尖叫着寻求庇护！我们需要更多的念珠，所以清空你的口袋。
secondary_translated_text: How do these poor, lost bugs keep finding it here?! Everyone was hungry and screaming for shelter! We need more rosary beads, so empty your pockets.

original_en_text: Track down the wailing creature in the Slab and slay it.<br><br>The creature can be tracked by its slime trail.
original_zh_text: 追踪并击杀罪石牢狱的哀嚎生物。<br><br>可以通过生物的黏液痕迹追踪。
translated_text: 追踪石板中哭泣的生物并杀死它。<br><br>可以通过粘液痕迹追踪这种生物。
secondary_translated_text: Track the crying creature in the slate and kill it.<br><br>The creature can be traced through mucus traces.

original_en_text: Hard forged spines, intended for use in heavy machinery and able to pierce through even the toughest shell.
original_zh_text: 锻造尖刺，专门用在重型机械上，连最硬的甲壳都能扎穿。
translated_text: 用于重型机械的坚硬锻造脊柱甚至可以刺穿最硬的外壳。
secondary_translated_text: The hard forged spine used in heavy machinery can pierce even the hardest shells.

original_en_text: Return to the Snail Shamans in the Ruined Chapel beside Bone Bottom.
original_zh_text: 返回骸底镇旁的颓败教堂寻找蜗牛萨满。
translated_text: 蜗牛萨满回到骨头底部旁边的教堂废墟。
secondary_translated_text: The snail shaman returned to the bottom of the bone next to the ruins of the church.

original_zh_text: 清除纺络各地的虚空聚合体。
translated_text: 摧毁整个法鲁市的虚空。
secondary_translated_text: Destroy the entire void in Faro city.

original_en_text: Hunt pin-wielding choirbugs of the Citadel and collect Fine Pins.
original_zh_text: 猎杀机枢咏者并收集精致刺针。
translated_text: 在城堡中追捕挥舞别针的唱诗班歌手并收集细别针。
secondary_translated_text: Hunt down pin-wielding choir singers in the castle and collect thin pins.

original_en_text: Deliver supplies to the Fleamaster Mooshka in Fleatopia.
original_zh_text: 向跳蚤首领穆什卡运送补给。
translated_text: 向跳蚤乌托邦的Fleamaster Mooshka运送物资。
secondary_translated_text: Delivery of supplies to Fleamaster Mooshka in Flea Utopia.

original_zh_text: 沙噬虫道炼金师奇洛托。

original_en_text: Deliver the Steel Spines to Yarnaby in Greymoor so they can remove the parasite.
original_zh_text: 将钢棘交给灰沼的雅纳碧进行手术。
translated_text: 将钢刺运往格雷穆尔的亚纳比，以便清除寄生虫。
secondary_translated_text: Ship the steel thorns to Yanabi, Greymoor, for removal of parasites.

original_en_text: Turn in the Shining Cogs to Songclave’s wishwall and collect the reward.
original_zh_text: 向圣歌盟地祈愿墙提交闪亮齿轮领取奖励。
translated_text: 将您闪亮的牙齿交给Songclave的愿望墙并获得奖励。
secondary_translated_text: Hand over your shining teeth to Songclave's Wish Wall and receive a reward.

original_en_text: I’ve heard tell pilgrims sometimes fall down that big hole beside the settlement. Nasty way to end your journey, before it even begins. I could build a bridge, if I only had the materials!
original_zh_text: 听说有些朝圣者会掉进聚居地旁边的大坑里，还没开始旅程就悲惨结束。如果有材料，我可以造座桥！
translated_text: 我听说朝圣者有时会掉进定居点旁边的大洞里。在旅程开始之前结束旅程是一种烦人的方式。只要有材料，我就能造一座桥！
secondary_translated_text: I heard that pilgrims sometimes fall into big holes next to settlements. Ending a journey before it starts is an annoying way to end it. As long as I have materials, I can build a bridge!

original_en_text: One part of the Threefold Melody, entrusted to the secretive Vaultkeepers.
original_zh_text: 三重旋律之一，托付给了神秘的书库管理员。
translated_text: 三重旋律的一部分被托付给神秘的保管员。
secondary_translated_text: Part of the triple melody is entrusted to the mysterious keeper.

original_en_text: Our haunted brethren wandering the great halls still wear their fine white cloaks. This settlement would greatly benefit from their protection. Please fetch some for us!
original_zh_text: 那些游荡在外的同袍们，至今仍披完好的白色外衣。如果能拿到这些外衣，大家就更安全了！请帮我们带一些回来！
translated_text: 我们那闹鬼的兄弟们在大厅里徘徊，仍然穿着他们精致的白色斗篷。该解决方案将大大受益于他们的保护。请给我们带来一些！
secondary_translated_text: Our haunted brothers lingered around the hall, still wearing their exquisite white capes. The solution will greatly benefit from their protection. Please bring us some!

original_en_text: Turn in the Flintgems to Bone Bottom’s wishwall and collect the reward.
original_zh_text: 向骸底镇祈愿墙提交燧晶领取奖励。
translated_text: 将Flintgem提交到Bone Bottom ' s Wish Wall并获得您的奖励。
secondary_translated_text: Submit Flintgem to Bone Bottom's Wish Wall and receive your reward.

original_en_text: Deliver the Roach Guts to Crull and Benjin of Sinner’s Road.
original_zh_text: 将蟑螂内脏交给罪途的克鲁尔与班金。
translated_text: 将蟑螂的器官交给克鲁尔和罪人之路校长。
secondary_translated_text: Give the cockroach organs to Krull and Principal of Sinners Path.
Claiming to be wrapped in his heart.

original_en_text: Give the Pollip Hearts to Greyroot of Shellwood.
original_zh_text: 将花芯交给壳木林的灰蕨。
secondary_translated_text: Give Pollip Hearts to Greyroot at Shellwood.

original_en_text: Collect Pollip Hearts from the purple flowers of Shellwood.
original_zh_text: 从甲木林的紫色花朵中收集花芯。
translated_text: 从Shellwood的紫色花朵中收集Pollip Heart。
secondary_translated_text: Collect Pollip Heart from Shellwood's purple flowers.

original_en_text: Give the collected Plasmium to the Alchemist at the top of the Wormways.
original_zh_text: 将生质液交给沙噬虫道顶部的炼金师。
translated_text: 将收集到的高原交给Wormways顶部的炼金术士。
secondary_translated_text: Hand over the collected plateau to the alchemist at the top of Wormways.

original_en_text: The old merchant pilgrim, Jubilana, was seen wandering down in the Choral Chambers, but she never made it up here. Has some foul fortune befallen her?
original_zh_text: 据说老商贩朱比拉娜在圣咏殿下层徘徊，但她从未到达这里。她遭遇不幸了吗？
translated_text: 人们看到古代商人朝圣者朱比拉娜在唱诗班室里散步，但她从未出现在这里。她有什么不幸的命运吗？
secondary_translated_text: Ancient merchant pilgrim Jubilana was seen walking in the choir room, but she never appeared here. Does she have any unfortunate fate?

original_en_text: A huge red-shell stole my precious keepsake and disappeared into the fields! Please chase down the thief and recover my treasure!
original_zh_text: 有个红壳大块头偷走了我的草娃娃并逃进原野！请追回我的宝物！
translated_text: 一个巨大的红色贝壳偷走了我珍贵的纪念品，消失在田野里！请追捕小偷并取回我的宝藏！
secondary_translated_text: A huge red shell stole my precious souvenirs and disappeared into the fields! Please chase down the thief and retrieve my treasure!

original_en_text: Find Pinstress on the stormward side of Mount Fay and defeat her in battle.
original_zh_text: 在费耶山风暴面找到针姬并击败她。
translated_text: 在费伊山暴风雨的一侧找到平茨，并在战斗中击败她。
secondary_translated_text: Find Pintz on the side of the storm on Mount Fay and defeat her in battle.

original_en_text: Harken, ye holy! Our home has been cleansed of evil, but now we are tasked with restoring its former glory! Share your rosaries with us, that the work may begin.
original_zh_text: 聆听吧虔信者们！我们的家园净化了邪恶，现在要重现昔日荣光！捐献念珠助力重建吧！
translated_text: 听着，你神圣的！我们的家园已经被清除了邪恶，但现在我们的任务是让它恢复昔日的辉煌！与我们分享您的念珠，以便工作开始。
secondary_translated_text: Listen, you holy! Our homeland has been purged of evil, but now our task is to restore it to its former glory! Share your rosary beads with us so the work can get started.

original_en_text: Deliver the rare delicacies to Mergwin in the dining chamber of the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 将稀有美食交给圣堡餐厅的梅尔格温。
translated_text: 城堡的餐厅为梅尔格温提供稀有美食。
secondary_translated_text: The castle's restaurant serves Melgwyn rare delicacies.

original_en_text: Search the mechanised core of the Citadel for the melody of the Architects.
original_zh_text: 在圣堡机械核心寻找建筑师的旋律。
translated_text: 在城堡的机械化核心中找到建筑师的旋律。
secondary_translated_text: Find the architect's melody in the mechanized core of the castle.

original_en_text: Venture inside the Citadel and confront the veiled bugs.
original_zh_text: 潜入圣堡内部，直面覆面之虫
translated_text: 冒险进入城堡并对抗隐藏的虫子。
secondary_translated_text: Adventure into the castle and fight against hidden bugs.

original_en_text: Attend this Sentinel’s request, Hunter in Red. Meet in halls high, the chamber of its fellows. The way shall be marked.
original_zh_text: 红衣猎手，应戍卫要求前往高庭，在其族裔群聚之厅会面，路径已有标记。
translated_text: 接受哨兵的请求，红色猎人。在大厅里见面，这是它同伴的房间。道路应该有标记。
secondary_translated_text: Accept the sentry's request, red hunter. Meet in the hall, this is the room of its companions. Roads should be marked.

original_en_text: I am Mooshka, humble stranger to this land and master of the Flea Caravan! I wish for aid, that all fleas may travel safely together!
original_zh_text: 我是穆什卡，这片土地的新来者，也是跳蚤旅团的主事！希望能得到帮助，让所有跳蚤都能安全同行！
translated_text: 我是穆斯卡，这片土地的一个卑微的陌生人，跳蚤商队的主人！我需要帮助，以便所有跳蚤都能安全地一起旅行！
secondary_translated_text: I am Muska, a humble stranger in this land, owner of the flea caravan! I need help so that all fleas can travel safely together!

original_en_text: Speak to Fleamaster Mooshka of the Flea Caravan, in the Marrow.
original_zh_text: 在髓骨洞窟与跳蚤旅团的穆什卡对话。
translated_text: 与骨髓中跳蚤车队中的Fleamaster Mooshka交谈。
secondary_translated_text: Talk to Fleamaster Mooshka from the flea caravan in bone marrow.

original_en_text: For the sake of our ailing brothers and sisters, I will descend into the holy Whiteward and search for healing supplies. If you are able, please join me! Company will make the work much merrier.
original_zh_text: 为了生病的同伴，我将前往圣堡白愈厅寻找治疗物资。如果愿意，请与我同行！
translated_text: 为了我们生病的兄弟姐妹，我将潜入神圣的怀特沃德寻找治疗用品。如果可以的话，请加入我！公司让工作变得更愉快。
secondary_translated_text: For the sake of our sick brothers and sisters, I will sneak into the sacred Whiteward to find healing supplies. If you can, please join me! Companies make work more enjoyable.

original_en_text: Deliver supplies to Mort in Pilgrim’s Rest.
original_zh_text: 向憩所的莫特运送补给。
translated_text: 向朝圣者休息的莫特运送物资。
secondary_translated_text: Delivery of supplies to Mott, where the pilgrims rested.

original_en_text: Acquire the necessary components to build a powerful trap.
original_zh_text: 收集必要组件制作强力陷阱。
translated_text: 获取必要的组件来构建强大的陷阱。
secondary_translated_text: Get the necessary components to build powerful traps.

original_en_text: Use tools to acquire organs of various types so Huntress may feed her brood.
original_zh_text: 使用工具获取各类器官喂养幼兽。
translated_text: 使用工具获取各种类型的器官，以便女猎人可以喂养她的孩子。
secondary_translated_text: Use tools to obtain various types of organs so that the huntress can feed her children.

original_en_text: Retrieve Pale Oil from the Citadel.
Heavy cloth sack containing tools, trinkets and medical aids.
original_zh_text: 装有工具、饰品和药品的厚实布袋。
translated_text: 沉重的布袋，里面装有工具、小饰品和医疗辅助工具。
secondary_translated_text: Heavy cloth bag containing tools, trinkets and medical aids.

original_en_text: Turn in the Silver Bells to Bellhart’s wishwall and collect the reward.
original_zh_text: 向钟心镇祈愿墙提交银光铃铛领取奖励。
translated_text: 将银铃交给伯哈特的愿望墙并领取奖励。
secondary_translated_text: Hand over the silver bell to Burhart's Wish Wall and receive the reward.

original_en_text: Up towers spinning, near the surgeon spurned,
translated_text: 塔楼旋转，附近的外科医生被拒绝，
secondary_translated_text: The tower rotated, nearby surgeons were turned down,

original_en_text: Return to Huntress with the organs.
secondary_translated_text: Bring the organs back to the huntress.

original_en_text: Deliver Liquid Lacquer to the Mask Maker upon Mount Fay.
original_zh_text: 将液状漆交给费耶山的面甲匠。
translated_text: 将液体油漆交付给费伊山的口罩制造商。
secondary_translated_text: Deliver the liquid paint to the mask manufacturer in Mount Fay.

original_en_text: Deliver supplies to the fixer Flick in Bone Bottom.
original_zh_text: 向骸底镇的维修师弗利克运送补给。
translated_text: 向Bone Bottom修复商Flick运送物资。
secondary_translated_text: Shipping supplies to Bone Bottom restorer Flick.

original_en_text: Donate rosaries to aid the rebuilding of Bellhart.
original_zh_text: 捐献念珠帮助重建钟心镇。
translated_text: 捐赠念珠帮助伯哈特的重建。
secondary_translated_text: Donated rosary beads to help Burhart's reconstruction.

original_en_text: Find a means to play the Sacred Cylinder within the Whispering Vaults.
original_zh_text: 找到在低语书库演奏音筒的方法。
translated_text: 找到一种方法来玩低语金库中的圣柱。
secondary_translated_text: Find a way to play with the sacred pillars in the Whisper Treasury.

original_en_text: The work of restoring our sacred home is almost complete! May those blessed with rosaries share them with us for this holy purpose!
original_zh_text: 重建家园的工程即将完成！请为这神圣事业捐献念珠！
translated_text: 恢复我们神圣家园的工作即将完成！愿那些拥有念珠的人为了这个神圣的目的与我们分享它们！
secondary_translated_text: The work of restoring our sacred homeland is almost complete! May those who have rosary beads share them with us for this sacred purpose!

original_en_text: O Beastfly, raging through the scorching wildlands below! May you hinder good pilgrims no longer! May you be struck down by a holy fury!
original_zh_text: 在焦热远野横冲直撞的兽蝇啊！愿你不再阻碍虔信者！愿你被神圣怒火击溃！
translated_text: 啊，野兽苍蝇，在下面灼热的荒野中肆虐！愿您不再阻碍优秀的朝圣者！愿你被神怒击倒！
secondary_translated_text: Ah, wild beasts and flies, raging in the scorching wilderness below! May you no longer hinder excellent pilgrims! May you be knocked down by the wrath of God!

original_en_text: Collect Plasmified Blood from infected creatures in the Wormways.<br><br>Plasmified Blood can be extracted with a fully charged stab from the Needle Phial tool.
original_zh_text: 从沙噬虫道感染生物身上收集生质血。<br><br>使用蓄满力的储液注射器抽取。
translated_text: 从蠕虫中受感染的生物体收集血浆和血液。<br><br>等离子化血液可以通过充满电的刺穿针从针头工具中提取。
secondary_translated_text: Plasma and blood are collected from infected organisms in worms.<br><br>Plasmatised blood can be extracted from the needle tool through a fully charged piercing needle.

original_en_text: Turn in the Fine Pins to Songclave’s wishwall and collect the reward.
original_zh_text: 向圣歌盟地祈愿墙提交精致刺针领取奖励。
translated_text: 将细别针交给Songclave的愿望墙并领取奖励。
secondary_translated_text: Hand the thin pin to Songclave's Wish Wall and receive the reward.

original_en_text: The Hunter’s Heart has been claimed from Skarrsinger Karmelita.
original_zh_text: 已从斯卡尔歌后卡梅莉塔处获得猎手之心。
translated_text: 猎人的心已从斯卡辛格·卡梅丽塔手中夺走。
secondary_translated_text: The hunter's heart has been taken from Scarsinger Camelita.

original_en_text: If this place must provide shelter for every ragged bug who wanders in, we’ll need supplies and currency. So if you’re reading this, empty your pockets!
original_zh_text: 如果要收容每个流浪至此的可怜虫，我们需要大量物资。看到这条就掏空你的口袋吧！
translated_text: 如果这个地方必须为每一只游荡的流氓虫子提供庇护所，我们就需要物资和金钱。因此，如果您正在阅读这篇文章，请清空您的口袋！
secondary_translated_text: If this place had to provide shelter for every rogue bug wandering around, we would need supplies and money. So if you are reading this article, please empty your pockets!

original_en_text: Donate shell shards to aid the building of a bridge.
original_zh_text: 捐献甲壳碎片帮助建造桥梁。
translated_text: 捐赠贝壳碎片帮助搭建桥梁。
secondary_translated_text: Donate shell fragments to help build bridges.

original_en_text: Search the cloistered wing of the Citadel for the melody of the Vaultkeepers.
original_zh_text: 在圣堡隐秘区域寻找书库管理员的旋律
translated_text: 在城堡的封闭侧翼中找到金库管理员的旋律。
secondary_translated_text: Find the melody of the vault keeper in the enclosed flank of the castle.

original_en_text: Hunt a Skull Tyrant of the Marrow.
original_zh_text: 猎杀髓骨洞窟的骷髅暴君。

original_en_text: Search for traces of the courier, Pill, and track his location.<br><br>Pill was last seen in lower Greymoor.
original_zh_text: 寻找送货员皮尔的踪迹。<br><br>他最后出现在灰沼下层。
translated_text: 搜索快递药丸并跟踪他的位置。<br><br>皮尔最后一次出现是在下格雷穆尔。
secondary_translated_text: Search for delivery pills and track his location.<br><br>Peel was last seen in Lower Greymoor.

original_en_text: Turn in the Pilgrim Shawls to Bone Bottom’s wishwall and collect the reward.
original_zh_text: 向骸底镇祈愿墙提交朝圣者披肩领取奖励。
translated_text: 将朝圣者披肩上交到Bone Bottom ' s Wish Wall并领取奖励。
secondary_translated_text: Hand in the pilgrim shawl to Bone Bottom's Wish Wall and receive a reward.

original_en_text: Defeat the many creatures of Pharloom and fill out the Hunter’s Journal.
original_zh_text: 击败纺络众多生物完善猎手日志。
translated_text: 击败法鲁的许多生物并填写猎人日记。
secondary_translated_text: Defeat many creatures in Faro and fill the Hunter's Diary.

original_en_text: The road is hard for we pilgrims. I want to build a beautiful symbol of hope, to stand beside Bone Bottom and welcome all those who are about to begin their long journey.
original_zh_text: 朝圣之路太过艰难。我想建造一座希望的象征，矗立在骸底镇用以指引即将开始艰苦旅程的朝圣者。
translated_text: 对于我们朝圣者来说，道路是艰难的。我想建造一个美丽的希望象征，站在Bone Bottom旁边，欢迎所有即将踏上漫长旅程的人们。
secondary_translated_text: For us pilgrims, the road is difficult. I want to build a beautiful symbol of hope to stand next to Bone Bottom and welcome all those who are about to embark on a long journey.

original_en_text: Donate shell shards to aid repairs around Bone Bottom.
original_zh_text: 捐献甲壳碎片帮助骸底镇修缮。
translated_text: 捐赠贝壳碎片以帮助修复骨底周围。
secondary_translated_text: Donation of shell fragments to help repair around the bone base.

original_en_text: Donate rosaries to aid the growing Songclave.
original_zh_text: 捐献念珠帮助圣歌盟地建设。
translated_text: Songclave捐赠了念珠来帮助成长。
secondary_translated_text: Songclave donated rosary beads to help grow.

original_en_text: Dive into the void and cut Pharloom free.
original_zh_text: 进入虚空，切断纺络的枷锁。
secondary_translated_text: Dive into the void to save Farum.

original_en_text: Hunt haunted pilgrims of Pharloom and collect Pilgrim Shawls from their bodies.
original_zh_text: 猎杀在纺络游荡的咒蚀朝圣者并收集披肩。
translated_text: 追捕困扰法勒姆的朝圣者并从他们那里收集朝圣者的披肩。
secondary_translated_text: Hunt down the pilgrims who haunt Farham and collect pilgrims 'shawls from them.

original_en_text: In the darkest of shadows, all is made clear. Pharloom draws its final breath, and we few remaining must bear its dying pain. Come to the Citadel’s Stage and let us suffer together.
original_zh_text: 在最黑暗的阴影中，真相终将显现。王国正咽下最后一口痛苦之气，而我们仍要完成演出。来圣堡剧台共赴苦难……
translated_text: 在最黑暗的阴影中，一切都变得清晰。法鲁咽下了最后一口气，我们唯一剩下的人必须承受死亡的痛苦。来到城堡舞台，让我们一起受苦吧。
secondary_translated_text: In the darkest shadows, everything becomes clear. Faro breathed his last breath. The only one left of us must endure the pain of death. Come to the castle stage and let us suffer together.

original_en_text: Hunt the Muckroaches of Sinner’s Road and collect Roach Guts from their bodies.
original_zh_text: 猎杀罪途的淤秽蟑螂并收集内脏。
translated_text: 追捕罪人之路的蟑螂并收集它们的内脏。
secondary_translated_text: Hunt down the roaches of Sinners 'Path and collect their entrails.

original_en_text: Seek fleas across the lands of Pharloom and guide them to the Flea Caravan.
original_zh_text: 寻回纺络各地的迷途跳蚤并引至旅团。
translated_text: 在法鲁姆的土地上寻找跳蚤并引导它们前往跳蚤商队。
secondary_translated_text: Find fleas in the land of Farum and guide them to flea caravans.

original_en_text: Speak to the Druid in Mosshome.
original_zh_text: 与苔栖乡的德鲁伊对话。
translated_text: 与莫肖梅的德鲁伊交谈。
secondary_translated_text: Talk to the druids of Moshaome.

original_en_text: Scale the Citadel and ensnare its monarch in a deadly trap.
original_zh_text: 攀登圣堡，用致命陷阱禁锢其君主。
translated_text: 爬上城堡，将其君主推入致命的陷阱。
secondary_translated_text: Climb the castle and push its monarch into a deadly trap.

translated_text: 将其送到朝圣者安息之处。
secondary_translated_text: Send it to the pilgrims 'resting place.

original_en_text: Deliver supplies to Flick at the Survivors’ Camp.
original_zh_text: 向幸存者营地的弗利克交付补给品。
translated_text: 向幸存者营地的弗立克运送物资。
secondary_translated_text: Delivery of supplies to Flick in the survivor camp.

original_en_text: Meet with Sprintmaster Swift at the furthest border of the Far Fields.
original_zh_text: 与飞毛腿斯威夫特在远野边际见面。
translated_text: 在远场的最远边缘与斯威夫特会面。
secondary_translated_text: Meet Swift on the farthest edge of the far field.

original_en_text: Turn in the Crown Fragment to Bone Bottom’s wishwall and collect the reward.
original_zh_text: 向骸底镇祈愿墙提交王冠碎片领取奖励。
translated_text: 将王冠碎片交给骨头底部的愿望墙即可领取奖励。
secondary_translated_text: Hand over the crown fragment to the Wish Wall at the bottom of the bone to receive the reward.

original_en_text: Collect Mossberries from the moss-covered areas of Pharloom’s lowlands.
original_zh_text: 在纺络低地的苔藓区域收集苔莓。
translated_text: 苔藓浆果是从法勒姆低地苔藓覆盖的地区采集的。
secondary_translated_text: Moss berries were collected from moss covered areas in the Farham Lowlands.

original_en_text: The Vaultkeeper’s Melody has been learned.
original_zh_text: 已学会书库管理员的旋律。
translated_text: 金库保管人的旋律已经学会了。
secondary_translated_text: The melody of the vault keeper has been learned.

original_en_text: Need help-help quick! Me brother Pill is gone missing, vanished somewhere in Greymoor! Please, to help me find-find him!
original_zh_text: 急需帮助！我兄弟皮尔在灰沼某处失踪了，请帮我找到他！
translated_text: 需要帮助-快来帮助！我的兄弟皮尔在格雷穆尔的某个地方失踪了！拜托，帮我找到他。
secondary_translated_text: Need help-help quickly! My brother Peel is missing somewhere in Greymoor! Please, help me find him.
in the heart of the wilderness

original_en_text: Race Sprintmaster Swift to discover Pharloom’s fastest bug.
original_zh_text: 挑战飞毛腿斯威夫特，看看谁是纺络最快的虫子。
translated_text: 与Sprintmaster Swift竞争并发现Pharloom最快的错误。
secondary_translated_text: Compete with Sprintmaster Swift and discover Pharloom's fastest mistakes.

original_en_text: Cage of one who raged against the silken lie,
translated_text: 一个笼子里躺着一个人对丝绸生气，
secondary_translated_text: A man lying in a cage was angry at silk,

original_en_text: Past cradle’s peak, last test of fitness,
translated_text: 经过摇篮的顶峰，最后的身体测试，
secondary_translated_text: After the peak of the cradle and the final physical test,

original_en_text: Fell heart of frost, who soars on high,
translated_text: 从霜心坠落，翱翔在高处，
secondary_translated_text: Falling from the heart of the frost, soaring high,

translated_text: 首页>外国文献>文学>西方文学>半路回家
secondary_translated_text: Home> Foreign Documents> Literature> Western Literature> Home halfway

original_en_text: Scorched field on edge, shells black and burned,
translated_text: 焦土边缘，贝壳黑色燃烧，
secondary_translated_text: On the edge of the scorched earth, the shells burned black,

original_en_text: Over camp collapsed to the black thread plight,
secondary_translated_text: The camp was in a black line dilemma,

original_en_text: Search for traces of the pilgrim, Sherma, and track his location.<br><br>Sherma was travelling to the Citadel’s Whiteward.
original_zh_text: 寻找朝圣者谢尔玛的踪迹。<br><br>他正在前往圣堡白愈厅。
translated_text: 寻找朝圣者谢尔曼并追踪他的位置。<br><br>谢尔曼正前往城堡的怀特沃德。
secondary_translated_text: Find Pilgrim Sherman and track his location.<br><br>Sherman was heading to Whiteward at the castle.

original_en_text: Speak to Fleamaster Mooshka and commence the final ceremony.
original_zh_text: 与跳蚤首领穆什卡交谈，开启最终仪式。
translated_text: 与Fleamaster Mooshka交谈并开始最后的仪式。
secondary_translated_text: Talk to Fleamaster Mooshka and begin the final ceremony.

original_en_text: Awaken the old bells throughout the lands.
secondary_translated_text: Wake up the ancient clock on the earth.

original_en_text: Return to Runt with the organs.
secondary_translated_text: Return to long with the organs.

original_en_text: When searching the bellveins carefully, you can sometimes find rare, silver bells. If we can salvage some, the material would be of great use!
original_zh_text: 仔细探索钟脉，有时能找到稀有的银光铃铛。收集它们会很有用！
translated_text: 当仔细寻找钟声时，您有时可以发现罕见的银铃。如果我们能节省一些，这些材料就大用了！
secondary_translated_text: When looking carefully for bells, you can sometimes find rare silver bells. If we can save some, these materials will be of great use!

original_en_text: Return to Bellhart’s wishwall to collect the reward.
original_zh_text: 返回钟心镇祈愿墙领取奖励。
translated_text: 返回伯哈特的愿望墙领取奖励。
secondary_translated_text: Return to Burhart's Wall of Wishes to collect your rewards.

original_en_text: Rise above the Citadel and confront the one who haunts the lands of Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 跨越圣堡之巅，直面灾厄之源。
translated_text: 爬上城堡，面对困扰法鲁姆土地的人们。
secondary_translated_text: Climb up the castle and face the people who plague the land of Faroum.

original_en_text: Track down the Savage Beastfly in the Far Fields and defeat it.<br><br>The Beastfly can be tracked by its shell sheddings and claw marks.
original_zh_text: 在远野追踪并击败兽蝇。<br><br>可通过外壳脱落物和爪痕追踪。
translated_text: 追踪远处飞翔的野兽并击败它。<br><br>兽蝇可以通过脱落的壳和爪痕来追踪。
secondary_translated_text: Track the flying beast in the distance and defeat it.<br><br>Beast flies can be tracked by falling shells and claw marks.

original_en_text: Search for Shakra and her master in Bilewater.<br><br>Shakra can be tracked by her trail of rings.
original_zh_text: 在腐汁泽寻找沙克拉与其导师。<br><br>可通过她遗留的环状痕迹追踪。
translated_text: 在比勒沃特找到Shakra和她的主人。<br><br>夏克拉可以通过戒指的痕迹追踪她。
secondary_translated_text: Find Shakra and her owner in Billerwater.<br><br>Shakra can trace her through the traces of the ring.

original_en_text: Be you nimble? Be you quick? If you would prove yourself Pharloom’s fastest bug, meet me at the furthest border of the Far Fields! With all haste!
original_zh_text: 身法够快？动作迅捷？若想证明自己是纺络最快的虫子，就来远野边际见我！刻不容缓！
translated_text: 你快吗？你能快点吗？如果您想证明您是法鲁最快的虫子，请在法菲尔德最远的边境与我会合！快点！
secondary_translated_text: Are you fast? Can you hurry it up? If you want to prove that you are the fastest bug in Faro, please meet me at the farthest border of Farfield! Hurry up!

original_en_text: Give the Mossberries to the Druid of Mosshome.
original_zh_text: 将苔莓交给苔栖乡的德鲁伊。
translated_text: 将苔藓浆果送给莫肖姆的德鲁伊。
secondary_translated_text: Give moss berries to the druids of Mosham.

original_en_text: A distressed bug was heard calling for help near the Bellway atop the great sandy steps. Will no one come to the sad wretch’s aid?
original_zh_text: 在蚀阶顶部的钟道附近听到了求救声，难道没有能者帮助那个可怜虫吗？
translated_text: 贝尔维尤附近巨大的沙阶上，听到一只痛苦的昆虫呼救。没有人来帮助这个悲伤的可怜生物吗？
secondary_translated_text: On the huge sand steps near Bellevue, a painful insect was heard calling for help. No one came to help this sad, poor creature?

original_en_text: Reach the source of the black threads within the Abyss.
original_zh_text: 在深渊中找到黑灾的源头。
secondary_translated_text: Arrive at the source of the abyss black line.

original_en_text: Bring the old hearts to the Snail Shamans in the Ruined Chapel beside Bone Bottom.
original_zh_text: 将古老心脏带给颓败教堂的蜗牛萨满。
translated_text: 把这颗旧心带到骨头底部旁边废墟教堂里的蜗牛萨满那里。
secondary_translated_text: Take this old heart to the snail shaman in the ruined church next to the base of the bone.

original_en_text: Achieve the high score in all Flea Games and become the Grand Champion.
original_zh_text: 在所有跳蚤游戏中夺得最高分，成为终极冠军。
translated_text: 在所有跳蚤游戏中获得高分并成为冠军。
secondary_translated_text: Get high scores in all flea games and become a champion.

original_en_text: Break the silken curse ensnaring the town of Bellhart.
original_zh_text: 破除缠绕钟心镇的丝缚诅咒。
translated_text: 打破困扰伯哈特镇的丝绸诅咒。
secondary_translated_text: Break the silk curse that has plagued the town of Burhart.

original_en_text: Descend into the bellway and defeat the hostile creature within.
original_zh_text: 深入钟道，击败其中的凶恶生物。
translated_text: 潜入钟楼并击败里面的敌对生物。
secondary_translated_text: Dive into the Bell Tower and defeat hostile creatures inside.

original_en_text: Fatty meat of indeterminate origin. Once prepared it will quickly spoil if not stored properly.
original_zh_text: 来源不明的肥肉，若不妥善保存会快速变质。
translated_text: 来源不明的脂肪肉。一旦准备好，如果储存不当，它就会很快变质。
secondary_translated_text: Fatty meat of unknown origin. Once prepared, it will quickly deteriorate if stored improperly.

original_en_text: Under chapel fallen to the monarch’s might,
translated_text: 在君主的权力落入教会手中后，
secondary_translated_text: After the monarch's power fell into the hands of the Church,

original_en_text: Deliver the Queen’s Egg to Styx of Sinner’s Road.
original_zh_text: 将女王之卵交给罪途的奴仆。
translated_text: 斯蒂克斯，将女王的蛋交付给罪人的道路。
secondary_translated_text: Stix, the way to deliver the queen's eggs to sinners.

original_en_text: Hunt Cogworks in Cogwork Core and collect Shining Cogs.
original_zh_text: 猎杀机枢核心的机械虫并收集闪亮齿轮。
translated_text: 在Cogwork Core中查找Cogworks并收集Shanning Cogs。
secondary_translated_text: Find Cogworks in Cogwork Core and collect Shanning Cogs.

original_en_text: Hunt cloaked choirbugs of the Citadel and collect Choir Cloaks from their bodies.
original_zh_text: 猎杀圣堡游荡的圣咏机兵并收集外衣。
translated_text: 在城堡里追捕唱诗班的鸟儿并从它们身上收集唱诗班斗篷。
secondary_translated_text: Hunt down choir birds in the castle and collect choir cloaks from them.

original_en_text: Return to the Grand Gate and open the way to the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 返回巨扉圣门，叩启通往圣堡的道路。
translated_text: 返回大门，打开通往城堡的道路。
secondary_translated_text: Return to the gate and open the road to the castle.

original_en_text: Investigate the ritual site beside Bonegrave.
original_zh_text: 调查骸冢旁的仪式地点。
translated_text: 调查博尼格雷夫旁边的仪式现场。
secondary_translated_text: Investigate the ceremony scene next to Bonigrave.

original_en_text: The Encrusted Heart has been claimed from Crust King Khann.
original_zh_text: 已从壳王卡汗处获得壳王之心。
translated_text: 《包裹的心》已从贝壳之王卡恩手中夺走。
secondary_translated_text: "The Wrapped Heart" has been taken away from Kahn, the king of shells.

original_en_text: A Skull Tyrant, largest of the Marrow’s loathsome bony predators, prowls the caves above the great path. Slay the beast and keep us all safe!
original_zh_text: 髓骨洞窟最巨大的骸骨掠食者——骷髅暴君正在上层洞穴游荡。斩杀它以保大家平安！
translated_text: 骷髅暴君，骨髓中最大的令人厌恶的骨掠食者，徘徊在大道上方的洞穴中。杀死这只野兽，保证我们所有人的安全！
secondary_translated_text: The skeleton tyrant, the largest repulsive bone predator in bone marrow, lingers in the cave above the avenue. Kill this beast and keep us all safe!

original_en_text: Track the one who stole Gilly’s keepsake near the Bellshrine between Deep Docks and Far Fields.
original_zh_text: 追踪在深坞与远野之间的钟殿附近偷走吉莉纪念品的窃贼。
translated_text: 在新海和法尔巴之间的贝尔神社附近追查偷走吉莉令牌的人。
secondary_translated_text: Track down the person who stole the Gilly token near the Bell Shrine between Xinhai and Farba.

original_en_text: Scale the Citadel and confront the one who haunts the lands of Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 攀登圣堡，直面萦绕纺络的灾厄。
translated_text: 登上城堡，面对困扰法鲁姆土地的人们。
secondary_translated_text: Climb to the castle and face the people who plague the land of Faroum.

original_en_text: Pale glaze used in the preparation and protection of bone masks.
original_zh_text: 用于骨甲面甲制备和防护的苍白涂料。
translated_text: 用于骨面具的制备和保护的轻釉。
secondary_translated_text: Light glaze for the preparation and protection of bone masks.

original_en_text: Give the collected components to the Caretaker of Songclave.
original_zh_text: 将收集的组件交给圣歌盟地看守者。
translated_text: 将收集到的零件移交给松卡夫的看守。
secondary_translated_text: Hand over the collected parts to Songkafu's guards.

original_en_text: A lotta repairs to be done around here, but I need more materials! All I wish for is some shell shards so I can get to work. Not asking too much, am I?
original_zh_text: 这里有很多东西要修理，但我需要更多材料！我只想要些甲壳碎片来开工，这要求不过分吧？
translated_text: 这里有很多地方需要修复，但我需要更多材料！我只是希望有一些贝壳碎片，这样我就可以开始工作了。我要求太多了吗？
secondary_translated_text: There are a lot of places here that need to be repaired, but I need more materials! I just wish there were some shell fragments so I could get started. Am I asking too much?

original_en_text: My dear little courier was last seen in Shellwood. Please someone, find Tipp and send him home, along with all of his precious stock!
original_zh_text: 我的小送货员最后一次出现在甲木林，请帮忙找到蒂普并送他回家，还有他那些珍贵的货物！
translated_text: 我亲爱的小信使最后一次出现是在谢尔伍德。拜托，有人，找到蒂普，把他和他所有的珍贵股票送回家！
secondary_translated_text: My dear little messenger was last seen in Shelwood. Please, someone, find Tip and send him and all his precious stocks home!

original_en_text: Such horror upon the roads! Those black mounds formed of husks and bugs, corrupting everything around. If only someone would cut them down and grant the poor souls their rest!
original_zh_text: 道路上的恐怖景象！那些由空壳与虫尸堆成的黑色肿块，正腐蚀周边一切。希望有人能斩除它们，让可怜的灵魂安息！
translated_text: 路真的很可怕！由贝壳和昆虫组成的黑色土丘腐蚀着周围的一切。要是有人能把他们砍倒，让可怜的灵魂安息就好了！
secondary_translated_text: The road is really terrible! Black mounds of shells and insects corrode everything around them. If only someone could cut them down and let the poor soul rest in peace!

original_en_text: Turn in the Choir Cloaks to Songclave’s wishwall and collect the reward.
original_zh_text: 向圣歌盟地祈愿墙提交圣咏外衣领取奖励。
translated_text: 将唱诗班斗篷交到松克拉夫的愿望墙上并领取奖励。
secondary_translated_text: Hand over the choir cloak to Sonkraf's Wish Wall and receive the reward.

original_en_text: Track the Second Sentinel by their markers left near Songclave.
original_zh_text: 通过圣歌盟地附近的标记追踪次席戍卫。
translated_text: 通过松卡夫附近留下的标记追踪第二个哨兵。
secondary_translated_text: Track the second sentry through the markings left near Sonkaf.

original_en_text: Collect Silver Bells in the bellvein tunnels above and below Bellhart.
original_zh_text: 在钟心镇上下的钟脉收集银光铃铛。
translated_text: 在伯哈特上方和下方的钟脉隧道中收集银铃。
secondary_translated_text: Collect silver bells in the bell vein tunnel above and below Burhart.

original_en_text: Deliver to Styx of Sinner’s Road.
original_zh_text: 将物资送至罪途的奴仆。
translated_text: 斯蒂克斯交付给罪人的道路。
secondary_translated_text: The path that Stix delivered to sinners.

original_en_text: Use tools to acquire organs of various types so Runt may feed.
original_zh_text: 使用工具获取各类器官喂养幼兽。
translated_text: 使用工具获取各种类型的器官，以便伦特可以进食。
secondary_translated_text: Use tools to obtain various types of organs so that Lent can eat.

original_en_text: Here they limply lay, the castaways and the disillusioned and the used-up.<page>It’s a sorry settlement you’ve summoned, miss bellringer, and a blasted bother for me. Not sure we have anything to offer ‘em... Not even hope.
original_zh_text: 看看这些疲惫的虫子，不是漂泊一生，就是失去信念。<page>敲钟者小姐，你搞出来的这个避难所真是大麻烦，我还得伺候这帮难民……我们连丁点希望都给不起。
translated_text: 他们躺在这里无能为力、受害者、幻灭、精疲力尽。<page>贝林格小姐，你提出的和解令人遗憾，对我来说也是一个巨大的麻烦。不知道我们能为他们提供什么……甚至没有希望。
secondary_translated_text: They lie here powerless, victims, disillusioned, exhausted.<page>Miss Bellinger, your proposed settlement is regrettable and a great inconvenience to me. Not sure what we can offer them…not even hope.

original_en_text: Ready the Needle Phial... find the plasmified bugs below...<page>Charge the Phial to full strength... Pierce them deep... Extract the Plasmified Blood...
original_zh_text: 拿上储液针管……找到因生质液进化的生物……<page>蓄满力……扎入它们体内……提取生质血……
translated_text: 准备针头。找到下面的血浆化细菌。<page>让菲尔尽力而为。深深地刺穿它们。抽取血浆化的血液。
secondary_translated_text: Prepare the needle. Find the plasmatized bacteria below.<page>Let Phil do his best. Piercing them deeply. Draw plasmatised blood.

original_en_text: Assistant... to learn more of Plasmium’s wonders... I know what we must do... <page>The bugs below... who have imbibed the substance... and evolved... their bodies are full with Plasmified Blood...<page>You must use the Needle Phial and extract this precious nectar... only by scrutinising it... can we attain higher knowledge...
original_zh_text: 助手……想更了解生质液……我知道该怎么办了……<page>下面那些……吸收生质液进化的生物……体内有生质血……<page>用储液针管提取……分析后……我们就能获得高阶知识……
translated_text: 助手了解更多有关Plasmium奇迹的信息。我知道我们必须做什么。<page>以下错误。他们摄入了这种物质。并进化。他们的身体充满了血浆化的血液。<page>你必须使用Phial针来提取这种珍贵的花蜜。仔细检查一下即可。我们能否获得更高的知识.
secondary_translated_text: Assistants learn more about the miracle of Plasmium. I know what we have to do.<page>The following errors. They ingested this substance. and evolve. Their bodies are filled with plasmatized blood.<page>You must use a Phial needle to extract this precious nectar. Just check it carefully. Can we gain higher knowledge?

original_en_text: The bugs below who have imbibed the substance and evolved... their bodies are filled with Plasmified Blood...<page>You must use the Needle Phial and extract this precious nectar... only by scrutinising it... can we attain higher knowledge...
original_zh_text: 那些……吸收生质液进化的生物……体内有生质血……<page>用储液针管提取……分析后……我们就能获得高阶知识……
translated_text: 下面的昆虫吸收了这些物质并进化了。他们的身体充满了血浆化的血液。<page>你必须使用Phial针来提取这种珍贵的花蜜。仔细检查一下即可。我们能否获得更高的知识.
secondary_translated_text: The insects below absorbed these substances and evolved. Their bodies are filled with plasmatized blood.<page>You must use a Phial needle to extract this precious nectar. Just check it carefully. Can we gain higher knowledge?

original_en_text: What fear arrests you...? This must be done... or we will never learn the deeper truth... Never become what is needed...
original_zh_text: 怕什么？……不这么做……永远不懂真相……永远无法进化……
translated_text: 是什么恐惧逮捕了你？这必须这样做。否则我们永远无法理解更深层次的真相。永远不要成为你需要成为的人。
secondary_translated_text: What fear arrested you? This must be done this way. Otherwise, we will never be able to understand the deeper truth. Never be what you need to be.

original_en_text: Ahhhh. Yes... Assistant. So loyal... Take the Needle Phial... find the plasmified bugs below...<page>Charge the Phial to full strength... Pierce them deep... Extract their Plasmified Blood.<page>Once we have it... we can peer deeper... learn more... enlighten ourselves fully...
original_zh_text: 啊……好助手……拿上储液针管……找到因生质液进化的生物……<page>蓄满力……扎入它们体内……提取生质血。<page>有了它……我们能更深入……学习……完全开悟……
translated_text: 啊是的...助理太忠诚了。握住针套。找到下面的血浆化细菌。<page>让菲尔尽力而为。深深地刺穿它们。抽取他们的血浆血液。<page>一旦我们拿到了它。我们就可以仔细看看了。了解更多...充分激发自己。
secondary_translated_text: Ah yes... The assistant is too loyal. Hold the needle hub. Find the plasmatized bacteria below.<page>Let Phil do his best. Piercing them deeply. Draw their plasma and blood.<page>Once we have it. We can take a closer look. learn more... Fully stimulate yourself.

original_en_text: <hpage>The roaches outside, why are they kept in pens? They seem a dangerous creature to cage or tame.<page=S>Us moorbugs gotta eat, don’t we? They’re wild fast breeders, them Muckroaches. Hard shells and tough meat, if you can even crack ‘em open, but options ain’t plentiful so we ain’t choosy.<page=S>Ain’t so bad to eat, once you’re used to it. The guts is the best bit, but them’s a choice cut and we ain’t had it for ages now.<page=L>Har har, life is tough all right! Benj’n here’s wasting away before us, poor wretch!<page=L>Tugs at your emotions, eh missy? How ‘bout you put that poker to good use? Go poach some of them roaches and get us some tasty guts. There’d be fair trade waitin’ for you.
original_zh_text: <hpage>外头的蟑螂为何要圈养？此等凶兽关起来有什么好处？<page=S>我们这些沼地的虫子总得吃饭吧？淤秽蟑螂繁殖得贼快。虽然壳硬肉糙，破开都费劲，但我们也没得挑嘛。<page=S>吃惯了也倒还行。内脏最香，但这种精贵部位我们早八百年没尝过了。<page=L>哈！日子苦啊！瞧班金这体格，已经饿得瘦骨伶仃了！<page=L>是不是很可怜我们啊，小姐？要不用你那根烧火棍帮我们开开荤？去宰几只蟑螂，把内脏取来，我们会给你个公道价！
translated_text: <hpage>外面有蟑螂，为什么把它们锁在围栏里？它们似乎是一种危险的生物，无法关在笼子里或驯服。<page=S>我们沼泽蠕虫必须吃东西，不是吗？它们是野外快速繁殖的动物，它们是蟑螂。硬壳和硬肉，如果你可以打开的话，但选择不多，所以我们并不挑剔。<page=S>一旦习惯了，味道就不会那么糟糕了。内脏是最好的部分，但它们是精选的，我们很久没有吃过了。<page=L>哈哈，生活真的很艰难！本杰明在我们面前日渐消瘦，可怜的家伙！<page=L>拉扯你的情绪，嗯，小姐？你好好利用那把扑克牌怎么样？去挖一些蟑螂，给我们买一些美味的内脏。公平贸易等待着您。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>There are cockroaches outside, why lock them in the fence? They appear to be a dangerous creature that cannot be kept in cages or tamed.<page=S>We swamp worms have to eat, don't we? They are fast-breeding animals in the wild. They are cockroaches. Hard shells and hard meats, if you can open them, but there are not many choices, so we're not picky.<page=S>Once you get used to it, it won't taste so bad. The viscera are the best part, but they are a selection and we haven't eaten them in a long time.<page=L>Haha, life is really difficult! Benjamin is wasting away in front of us, poor fellow!<page=L>Pull your emotions, huh, miss? How about you make good use of that poker hand? Go dig up some roaches and buy us some delicious entrails. Fair trade awaits you.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I have brought a Queen’s Egg, at request of Bellhart’s couriers. It was a hazardous journey, but the creature inside has made it here alive.<page>Sssssss! How sss-ssublime! To think that my dear misss-stress would be the one to deliver the preciousss package! I had feared for the competence of those feeble couriersss...<hpage>It surprises me to know you correspond with them. I must wonder where else you go and who else you speak to after you scurry back up into the darkness...<page>Ssss. My whispersss-ss travel far, misstressss. You need not worry yourssself with my comingsss and goingss-ss. All I do... is in your sssss-service.<page>And now, pleasssse... give her to me... the little queen!
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生，我应钟心镇送货员之请，带来了一枚女王之卵。路途虽险，但卵内的生物尚且还活着。<page>咝——！何等殊荣！竟然由主人亲自护送这样宝贵的包裹！奴才我早就觉得这些送货员无能了……<hpage>你与他们有过联系？这倒是让我惊讶。不知道你遁入这片黑暗后，还与哪些虫往来过……<page>咝——奴才的低语声能传得很远，主人您无需担心我的行踪。奴才所为……皆为效忠于您。<page>现在，恳请您……将小女王……交给我！
translated_text: <hpage>先生，应贝尔·哈特信使的要求，我带来了一颗女王蛋。这是一次危险的旅程，但里面的生物让它活了下来。<page>嘶嘶声！什么sss-sssublime！我想我亲爱的压力女士将是提供珍贵包裹的人！我曾经担心快递员能力薄弱。<hpage>我很惊讶地知道你与他们通信。我一定想知道你跑回黑暗后去了哪里，和谁说过话……<page>嘘我的耳语者已经长途跋涉了，女主人。你不用担心我的来来去去。我所做的。为您服务。<page>现在，请。把她给我。小女王！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Sir, at the request of Bell Hart's messenger, I have brought a queen's egg. It was a dangerous journey, but the creatures inside kept it alive.<page>Hiss! What sss-sssublime! I think my dear Ms. Stress will be the one providing the precious package! I used to worry that the couriers were weak.<hpage>I was surprised to know that you corresponded with them. I must want to know where you went after you ran back into the darkness, who you talked to...<page>My whisperer has traveled a long way, mistress. You don't have to worry about my coming and going. What I did. At your service.<page>Now, please. Give her to me. Little queen!

original_en_text: <hpage>The beasts outside and their masters alike are all ensnared by this land’s silken affliction. You are lucky bugs to have not succumbed.<page=L>The Haunting? Oh, we’s got that all worked out. Benj’n and me are a right pair of philosophers when we bend our minds to it.<page=L>It’s faith that gets you. It’s all caused by being too devout!<page=S>Yeah! Or maybe not bein’ devout enough!<page=L>Or maybe it’s safest not to think about it at all. Har har!
original_zh_text: <hpage>外头那些虫兽与其饲主都遭受丝咒侵蚀。二位未被沾染，实属侥幸。<page=L>丝咒？早研究透啦！班金和我可是哲学大师！<page=L>信仰过头的才会中招！全是虔诚惹的祸！<page=S>对！但如果不够虔诚，兴许也会中招！<page=L>要我说，最安全的办法就是别去瞎琢磨！哈！
translated_text: <hpage>外面的野兽和它们的主人都陷入了这片土地丝般的痛苦之中。你很幸运，错误没有屈服。<page=L>闹鬼？哦，我们都锻炼了。当我们关注这一刻时，本杰明和我是正确的哲学家。<page=L>吸引你的是信仰。都是太虔诚造成的！<page=S>耶!或者也许不够虔诚！<page=L>或者也许最安全的事情就是根本不去想它。哈哈！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>The wild beasts outside and their owners are plunged into the silky pain of this land. You are lucky that your mistakes have not succumbed.<page=L>Haunted? Oh, we all worked out. Benjamin and I are the right philosophers when we focus on this moment.<page=L>What attracts you is faith. It's all caused by being too pious!<page=S>Yeah! Or maybe not pious enough!<page=L>Or maybe the safest thing is not to think about it at all. Haha!

original_en_text: While you sss-stalk through the black-ravaged world, morsss-ssels will I grow. For the promiss-sse of what my misss-tress will become... I will toil, alwayssss...
original_zh_text: 只要主子您还在黑灾肆虐之地穿行，咝——奴才便会辛勤劳作，为主人进行培育。为主人脱胎换骨的承诺……咝——奴才至死方休！
translated_text: 当你偷偷穿越饱受蹂躏的黑人世界时，我就会成长。为了我女朋友会成为什么样的人.我会永远努力工作。
secondary_translated_text: I grow up when you sneak through the ravaged black world. For what my girlfriend will become. I will always work hard.

original_en_text: <page=S>It’s said the moors used to grow a bounty of fresh food, way back befores that Citadel set us about catchin’ their fallin’ thread.<page=S>Sounds right lovely, eh missy? Always eatin’, never troubled by no grumblin’ belly?<page=L>Har har! Yer like a hatchling, Benj’n! So given to fancies! <page=L>Now breedin’ roaches is what keeps us from starvin’. Dangerous work, and not the finest diet, but we ain’t complainin’.<page=L>Specially as more and more of them keepers are succumbing to the strange sickness. Only means more meat for us. Har!
original_zh_text: <page=S>传说在圣堡逼我们捡拾掉落的丝线之前，沼地也曾盛产新鲜美食。<page=S>听着多美啊，小姐。一天到晚地吃，不用担心饿肚子。<page=L>哈！班金，你是刚破卵的吗？净做白日梦！<page=L>现在我们只能靠养蟑螂混口饭吃。这活危险，伙食差，但我们从不抱怨。<page=L>你看吧，越来越多的监管者都染上怪病。但往好处想，对我们来说，肉倒是更加管够了！哈！
translated_text: <page=S>据说，早在城堡让我们发现他们的线索之前，摩尔人就曾种植大量新鲜食物。<page=S>听起来不错，不是吗，小姐？总是吃饭，从不担心不发脾气？<page=L>哈哈！你就像一只小鸟，本杰明！如此沉迷于幻想！<page=L>如今，养殖蟑螂是我们免于饥饿的原因。工作很危险，饮食也不是最好的，但我们不会抱怨。<page=L>特别是，越来越多的饲养者死于这种奇怪的疾病。这对我们来说只是意味着更多的肉。哈！
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>It is said that the Moors had grown large amounts of fresh food long before the castle allowed us to discover their clues.<page=S>Sounds good, doesn't it, miss? Always eat, never worry or lose your temper?<page=L>Haha! You're like a bird, Benjamin! So addicted to fantasy!<page=L>Nowadays, breeding cockroaches is the reason why we are safe from hunger. Work is dangerous and the diet is not the best, but we don't complain.<page=L>In particular, more and more breeders are dying from this strange disease. It just means more meat for us. Ha!

original_en_text: <page=L>We’re all fine here, miss. Content, like. P’raps it were time you made your way, eh?<page=S>Yeah, be on your way! And, erm, thanks for yer help there.
original_zh_text: <page=L>我俩在这儿好得很，小姐。差不多该动身了吧？<page=S>对，赶紧走！另外，呃……多谢帮忙。
translated_text: <page=L>我们都很好，小姐。内容，就像。现在是你按照你的方式做的时候了，嗯？<page=S>好吧，我们走吧！另外，感谢您的帮助。
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>We're all fine, miss. Content, like. Now it's time for you to do it your way, huh?<page=S>All right, let's go! Also, thank you for your help.

original_en_text: Sssss. Your hunger betrayssss-ss you, misstress. The morsel was not yet grown, but let it anger you not. I will grow you another... for I am your sss-ssslave.
original_zh_text: 咝——您看起来饥饿难耐了，主人。食物还未养成，请您息怒。奴才我继续努力……因为我永远是您的仆从。
translated_text: 嘘你的饥饿背叛了你，压力太大了。这还没有长大，但不要让它激怒你。我再给你种一个。因为我是你的奴隶
secondary_translated_text: Shh. Your hunger betrays you. The pressure is too great. It hasn't grown up yet, but don't let it irritate you. I'll plant another one for you. Because I am your slave

original_en_text: Ssss! You have come to claim me, and I am yourssss. I am your humble sss-ssslave!<hpage>I’ve no interest in mastery over you, sir. If my cutting down of those black masses aided you, it was merely by chance. Farewell.<page>Farewell...? No... the sss-strong claim the weak, and the weak must sss-ssserve! I am yoursss, my mistress, and you muss-sst protect me!<page>Sss-ssee what I have built here! Prepared, for the coming of my mistressss. My powerful missssss-tress!<page>While you are away hunting, I will grow you... ssss-something good. But the work takesss time. Return to me sssss-soon, and you may have what I grow...
original_zh_text: 咝——！您来收服奴才了！奴才是您的，卑微的仆从！<hpage>我无意当你的主人。若清除那些黑暗之物帮助了你，仅是机缘巧合。告辞。<page>告辞……？不行不行……咝——强者当纳弱者，弱者理应侍奉！奴才归您了，主人您必须庇护我！<page>快瞧奴才为您建的巢穴！专为恭迎您的到来！我强大的主人！<page>您外出狩猎时，奴才将为您培育……一些好东西。但奴才我需要一些时间。等您回来，就能得到我培育的成果……
translated_text: 嘘！你来认领我，我就是你的。我是你卑微的奴隶<hpage>我没有兴趣控制你，先生。如果我的黑人记录帮了你，那只是偶然。再见<page>再见。？不。强者自称弱者，弱者必须sss-ssserve！我是你的，我的情妇，你必须保护我！<page>嘘--看看我在这里建了什么！准备好迎接我情妇的到来。我强大的女士！<page>你去打猎的时候，我会帮你种……ssss-一些好东西。但这项工作需要时间。快点回到我身边，你就可以拥有我种的东西……
secondary_translated_text: Shh! You come and claim me, and I am yours. I am your humble slave<hpage>I have no interest in controlling you, sir. If my black record helps you, it's just accidental. goodbye<page>Bye.? No. The strong call themselves the weak, and the weak must sss-ssserve! I am yours, my mistress, and you must protect me!<page>Shh-look what I built here! Get ready for my mistress. My powerful lady!<page>When you go hunting, I will help you grow... ssss-something good. But this work takes time. Come back to me quickly, and you can have what I grow...

original_en_text: <page=S>Wh... why the delay? You keepin’ them guts for yourself? Here, Crull, she’s goin’ back on her promise!<page=L>Har. Promises is easily broken. But then, so’s a lot of other things. How ‘bout you reconsider yer greed there, missy?
original_zh_text: <page=S>啧……怎么磨磨蹭蹭的？你想私吞内脏？克鲁尔，她反悔啦！<page=L>哈，承诺不就是易碎。虽然其他东西也挺易碎的。小姐，要不重新掂量下你这贪心值不值当？
translated_text: <page=S>什...为什么延迟？你会把他们的勇气留给自己吗？在这里，克鲁尔，她要食言了！<page=L>哈尔承诺很容易被打破。但许多其他事情也是如此。小姐，你重新考虑一下你的贪婪怎么样？
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Wha... Why the delay? Will you keep their courage to yourself? Here, Krull, she's going to break her word!<page=L>Hal's promises can easily be broken. But the same is true for many other things. Miss, how about you rethink your greed?

original_en_text: <page=S>Oi! You ain’t got the beads? Or you just not wantin’ to part with ‘em? <page=L>Hardly the time to be a miser, missy. You’re gonna be livin’ sick till you buy these spines from us.
original_zh_text: <page=S>喂！你是身上没念珠，还是舍不得花？<page=L>小姐，现在可不是抠门的时候！不买这些钢棘，你就只能继续病着了！
translated_text: <page=S>嘿！你没有珠子吗？或者你只是不想和他们分开？<page=L>小姐，现在不是守财奴的时候。在您从我们这里购买这些脊柱之前，您会生病。
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Hey! Don't you have beads? Or do you just don't want to be separated from them?<page=L>Miss, this is not the time to be a miser. You will get sick before you buy these spines from us.

original_en_text: Ssss! You have come to claim me, and I am yourssss. I am your humble sss-ssslave!<hpage>I’ve no interest in mastery over you, sir. If my slaying of these creatures aided you, it was merely by chance. Farewell.<page>Farewell...? No... the sss-strong claim the weak, and the weak must sss-ssserve! I am yoursss, my mistress, and you muss-sst protect me!<page>Sss-ssee what I have built here! Prepared, for the coming of my mistressss. My powerful missssss-tress!<page>While you are away hunting, I will grow you... ssss-something good. But the work takesss time. Return to me sssss-soon, and you may have what I grow...
original_zh_text: 咝——！您来收服奴才了！奴才是您的，卑微的仆从！<hpage>我无意成为你的主人。若杀掉这些虫兽帮助了你，仅是机缘巧合。告辞。<page>告辞？不行不行……咝——强者接纳弱者，弱者应当侍奉！奴才归您，主人您必须保护我！<page>看奴才我建的巢穴！专为恭迎主人的到来！强大的主人！<page>您外出狩猎时，奴才将为您培育……一些好东西。但奴才我需要一些时间。等您回来，就能得到我培育的成果……
translated_text: 嘘！你来认领我，我就是你的。我是你卑微的奴隶<hpage>我没有兴趣控制你，先生。如果它能帮你杀死这些生物，那只是意外。再见<page>再见。？不。强者自称弱者，弱者必须sss-ssserve！我是你的，我的情妇，你必须保护我！<page>嘘--看看我在这里建了什么！准备好迎接我情妇的到来。我强大的女士！<page>你去打猎的时候，我会帮你种……ssss-一些好东西。但这项工作需要时间。快点回到我身边，你就可以拥有我种的东西……
secondary_translated_text: Shh! You come and claim me, and I am yours. I am your humble slave<hpage>I have no interest in controlling you, sir. If it can help you kill these creatures, it's just an accident. goodbye<page>Bye.? No. The strong call themselves the weak, and the weak must sss-ssserve! I am yours, my mistress, and you must protect me!<page>Shh-look what I built here! Get ready for my mistress. My powerful lady!<page>When you go hunting, I will help you grow... ssss-something good. But this work takes time. Come back to me quickly, and you can have what I grow...

original_en_text: A cage with a simple lock.
translated_text: 一个带有简单锁的笼子。
secondary_translated_text: A cage with a simple lock.

original_en_text: Sssss! I saw you. I sssss-saw what you did!
original_zh_text: 咝——！我看见了。奴才我看见您的手段了！
translated_text: 嘶嘶声！我看到你了我看到你做了什么。
secondary_translated_text: Hiss! I saw you. I saw what you did.
