original_en_text: <hpage>Good bugs, I am here on request of the doctor Yarnaby. She requires spines forged of steel for a crucial operation.<page=L>Argh! Look at ‘er, Benj’n. She’s all sick like! Coiled up tight with somethin’ weird. I reckon that operation’s for her herself!<page=S>She’s a sad sight for sure Crull, but sick or not our scrap’s hard-found. If she’s wantin’, we’s gotta be gettin’ paid!<page=L>Ah! ‘Fraid the little one speaks true, missy. You might be ailin’, but we can’t be offerin’ charity. <page=L>We’re stockin’ the spines you need. You just gotta be ready to part with some beads!
original_zh_text: <hpage>二位，我受雅纳碧医生所托来到此处。她需要一些钢棘来完成一场重要的手术。<page=L>啊呀！班金快看，她病恹恹的！壳里缠着怪东西，手术是要给自己做的吧！<page=S>惨是惨，但咱的废料也是辛辛苦苦收集来的。想要就得掏钱！<page=L>唉！班金说得对，小姐。您虽然是病患，但我们不做慈善。<page=L>只要念珠够，钢棘有的是！
translated_text: <hpage>好虫子，我是应Yarnaby博士的要求来到这里的。她需要一根钢制脊柱来进行关键手术。<page=L>啊！看看呃，本杰明。她病得很重！用一些奇怪的东西紧紧地把它卷起来。我想手术是为了她！<page=S>克鲁尔，她确实是一幅悲伤的景象，但不管有没有病，我们的废物都很难找到。如果她想要，我们就必须得到报酬！<page=L>啊！“小姐，恐怕小家伙说的是真的。您可能生病了，但我们无法提供慈善服务。<page=L>我们正在储存您需要的脊柱。你只需要准备好放弃一些珠子！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Good bug, I am here at the request of Dr. Yarnaby. She needed a steel spine for critical surgery.<page=L>Ah! Look at uh, Benjamin. She is very sick! Roll it tightly with something strange. I think the surgery is for her!<page=S>Krull, she is indeed a sad sight, but sick or not, our waste is hard to find. If she wants it, we must get paid!<page=L>Ah! "Miss, I'm afraid what the little guy said is true. You may be sick, but we cannot provide charitable services.<page=L>We are storing the spine you need. You just need to be ready to give up some beads!

original_en_text: Strong you are, misstress! Sss-ssmall, but so so deadly. And your ssscent! Well-aged!
original_zh_text: 咝——您真强悍，主人！身形虽小，杀伐果决。还有这味道——古老的气息！
translated_text: 你很坚强，情妇！嘘--很小，但如此致命。还有你的ssscent！我老了！
secondary_translated_text: You are strong, mistress! Shh-small, but so deadly. And your ssscent! I am old!

original_en_text: Leave it, bug. I accept my place.<hpage>Very well, prisoner.
original_zh_text: 别管我了，小虫子。我已认命。<hpage>悉听尊便。
translated_text: 别管它，虫子。我接受我的位置。<hpage>很好，囚犯。
secondary_translated_text: Leave it alone, bug. I accept my place.<hpage>Very well, prisoner.

original_en_text: Sssss! Such sssss-sounds, plucked from the air and caught in your Silk! A marvel, my misss-stress...<hpage>It is a skill that any can learn. You could master this sound yourself, if you cared to.<page>No... a slave must grow morsels for his mistresssss. But the sssound... is so ssssss-soothing...
original_zh_text: 咝——！此等丝弦天籁，主人，这真是神迹……<hpage>这项技艺所有虫子皆可习得。你若愿意，也能精通。<page>不……仆从必须为主人培育食物。但这天籁之音……实在是令我感到抚慰……
translated_text: 嘶嘶声！这嘶嘶声是从空气中拔出来的，被你的丝绸捕捉到了！奇迹，我的压力女士<hpage>这是任何人都可以学习的技能。如果你愿意，你可以自己掌握声音。<page>不。奴隶必须为他的情妇种植一些东西。但sssound。这是一种解脱。
secondary_translated_text: Hiss! The hissing sound was pulled out of the air and captured by your silk! Miracle, my stress lady<hpage>This is a skill that anyone can learn. If you want, you can master the voice yourself.<page>No. A slave must grow something for his mistress. But sssound. This is a relief.

original_en_text: It is done. Our nessst is larger, and the little queen beginssss her toil. <page>More morsss-ssels can I grow for you now! Are you pleasss-sed with me, my missstress-ss?<hpage>You are diligent at your work, and have raised no claw against me. If it remains so, I will have no reason to be displeased.<page>Ssss! Then my work will continue! For I am ever your devoted sss-ssslave!
original_zh_text: 大功告成。巢穴已扩建完毕，小女王已经开始她的劳作。<page>现在奴才我可以为您培育更多的食物了！您对我满意吗，我的主人？<hpage>你工作勤勉，也从未对我起过任何歹意。若能保持如此，我便没有不满的理由。<page>咝——！奴才一定继续勤恳工作！因为我永远是您忠诚的仆从！
translated_text: 搞定了我们的女王更大了，小女王也在努力。<page>我现在可以为你种更多的苔藓了！你愿意留下来陪我吗，我的女士？<hpage>你努力工作，别碰我。如果你继续这样做，我没有理由不高兴。<page>嘘！那么我的工作将继续！因为我永远是你忠实的奴隶！
secondary_translated_text: The queen who has settled our case is getting bigger, and the little queen is also working hard.<page>I can grow more moss for you now! Will you stay with me, my lady?<hpage>You work hard, don't touch me. If you continue to do this, I have no reason to be unhappy.<page>Shh! Then my work will continue! Because I will always be your loyal slave!

original_en_text: Ssss! Mistress, is the morsss-sssel I grew worthy? You must conss-sume... conssss-sume and become sss-stronger.<page>Thissss is how I will sss-sserve my misstress-ss. While you hunt, I will prepare morsssels. Alwaysss, preparing them for my mighty misssss-tresss...<hpage>Continue this work if it pleases you sir, but do not call me your mistress, for I am not.<page>Sss... but you are... missstress. You are ssss-strong and I am weak.... a sss-sslave. Alwayss-sss, your ssss-slave...
original_zh_text: 咝——！主人，奴才培育的食物可还合您心意？请享用……变得更强大。<page>这就是奴才我的侍奉之道。您外出狩猎时，奴才准备食物。永远为主人效劳……<hpage>先生，若你乐于此道便请继续，但请不要称我为主人。我并非你的主人。<page>咝——可您就是……我的主人。您强大，我弱小……我永远是您的仆从……
translated_text: 嘘！情妇，我从小长大的混蛋值得吗？你必须意识到这一点。认识并变得更强大。<page>这就是我照顾情妇的方式。当你去打猎的时候，我会准备一些食物。总是让他们为我伟大的女士做好准备。<hpage>先生，如果你愿意的话，请继续这项工作，但不要叫我你的情妇，因为我不是。<page>嘘但你是...小姐你很坚强，我很软弱... sss-ssslave。永远是ssssss，你的ssssss奴隶。
secondary_translated_text: Shh! Is the mistress, the bastard I grew up with worth it? You have to be aware of this. Recognize and become stronger.<page>This is how I take care of my mistress. When you go hunting, I will prepare some food. Always make them ready for my great lady.<hpage>Sir, if you like, please continue this work, but don't call me your mistress, because I am not.<page>Shh, but you are... Miss, you are strong, I am weak... sss-ssslave。Always be ssssss, your ssssss slave.

original_en_text: <page=S>That smell! S’overwhelming! I ain’t never seen so many roach guts at once!<page=L>Benj’n, me old mate, get a grip on yerself. These guts still need cuttin’, and cleanin’, and stewin’. You got a lotta work ahead of you.<page=S>Fine by me, Crull, if it means such a feast! We’ll be eatin’ like they do up in the Citadel soon enough!<page=L>And what about you, missy? You be joinin’ us for this exquisite meal?<hpage>I’m afraid not, sirs. I must keep moving, and I fear the taste of such a delicacy is wasted on me.<page=L>I was hopin’ as much. Two can sing, but three’s too many, eh? Har har!<page=L>Still, maybe this tool is enough for you to ‘member us by? A pointed weapon of me own makin’, from when I used to wrangle the Muckroaches meself. I bet you’ll get some good use from it.
original_zh_text: <page=S>这味儿！够冲！我这辈子没见过这么多蟑螂内脏！<page=L>班金老伙计，稳住！这些内脏还得切洗炖煮，你的活还多着呢。<page=S>包在我身上，克鲁尔！我们能吃上圣堡级别的宴席啦！<page=L>小姐您呢？要赏脸和我们共进大餐不？<hpage>恕不奉陪，我得继续前行了。而且此等美味给我享用，实属浪费。<page=L>正合我意！俩虫享用正好，仨就嫌多！哈！<page=L>但我希望这工具能让您记住我俩。这是当年我还在驯蟑螂时亲手制作的武器，希望您用得顺手。
translated_text: <page=S>那个味道！压倒性的！我以前从未见过这么多蟑螂器官！<page=L>本杰明，我的老人，控制好自己。这些内脏还需要切开、清洗、炖煮。你还有很多工作要做。<page=S>克鲁尔，如果这意味着这样的盛宴，我没有问题！我们很快就会像他们在城堡里一样吃饭了！<page=L>小姐，你呢？想和我们一起吃这顿精致的饭菜吗？<hpage>恐怕不是，先生们。我必须继续前进，我担心这样的美味会被浪费。<page=L>但愿如此.两个人可以唱歌，但三个人太多了，不是吗？哈哈！<page=L>尽管如此，也许这个工具足以让您“加入我们”？这是我自己做的利器，因为我以前也经常和一只蟑螂争论。我打赌你会很好地利用它。
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>That smell! Overwhelming! I have never seen so many cockroach organs before!<page=L>Benjamin, my old man, control yourself. These internal organs also need to be cut, cleaned, and stewed. You still have a lot of work to do.<page=S>Krull, if this means such a feast, I have no problem! We'll soon be eating like they do in the castle!<page=L>Miss, what about you? Want to eat this exquisite meal with us?<hpage>I'm afraid not, gentlemen. I have to move on, and I am afraid that such delicacy will be wasted.<page=L>I hope so. Two people can sing, but three is too many, isn't it? Haha!<page=L>Still, maybe this tool is enough for you to "join us"? This is a weapon I made myself because I used to often argue with a cockroach. I bet you'll make good use of it.

original_en_text: Take. Ahhh, my reward. Give them.
original_zh_text: 我要拿走。啊……我的奖赏。给我。
translated_text: Take.啊，我的奖励。把它给他们。
secondary_translated_text: Take. Ah, my reward. Give it to them.

original_en_text: With thissss... ssso caringly delivered by the misstresss... our nesssst can be expanded!
original_zh_text: 咝——这是……主人亲自护送过来的……我们的巢穴可以扩建了！
translated_text: 跟这事女主人深情地传达……我们的需求可以扩大！
secondary_translated_text: Communicate affectionately with the hostess of this matter... our needs can be expanded!

original_en_text: Leave me be. This kingdom’s collapse has come. Better I stay here to accept it.<page>To die within a cage... A fitting finale for this shell, and a well deserved fate for these cursed lands.<hpage>As you wish, prisoner.
original_zh_text: 让我安安静静待在这里吧。这个王国即将倾塌，我应当待在这里，坦然接受一切。<page>在囚笼中死去……也算是我这副甲壳注定的命数了，这片诅咒之地亦是如此。<hpage>如你所愿。
translated_text: 离我远点这个王国的崩溃已经到来。我最好留在这里接受它。<page>笼子里的死亡.这是这个贝壳和这些被诅咒的土地应得的命运的合适结局。<hpage>如你所愿，囚犯。
secondary_translated_text: Get away from me. The collapse of this kingdom has come. I better stay here and accept it.<page>Death in a cage. This is a fitting ending to the fate that this shell and these cursed lands deserve.<hpage>As you wish, prisoner.

original_zh_text: 我能感知到你，藏起来的那位。

original_en_text: <page=L>Another trade fairly conducted, har. Those spines are sharp, and they’s hardly begun to rust. Better be gettin’ back to your doc to get yerself sorted out, eh?
original_zh_text: <page=L>又一笔公道买卖，哈。这些钢棘锋利如初，基本还没开始生锈。快去找您那位医生治病去吧！
translated_text: <page=L>另一笔交易公平，哈。荆棘很锋利，几乎没有开始生锈。最好回到医生那里治愈，嗯？
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>Another fair deal, huh. The thorns are very sharp and hardly begin to rust. Better go back to the doctor and heal it, huh?

original_en_text: <page=L>We’re still waitin’ on them roach guts you promised us, missy. Patiently, but not too patiently, you get me?<page=S>You can find the Muckroaches all ‘round these roads. Cut one down and reach inside its shell to pull out the tasty guts! Mmmmm!
original_zh_text: <page=L>小姐，我俩还等着您许诺的蟑螂内脏呢。耐着性子等，但也不太耐烦了，懂我意思吗？<page=S>淤秽蟑螂到处都是，找一只来宰了，破开外壳，把内脏取来。唔——我都流口水了！
translated_text: <page=L>小姐，我们还在等待您答应我们的蟑螂内脏。要有耐心，但不要太有耐心。你明白我吗？<page=S>你可以在这些道路周围找到蟑螂。切下一个，把手伸进它的壳里，取出美味的内脏！Mmmmm！
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>Miss, we are still waiting for the cockroach entrails you promised us. Be patient, but not too patient. Do you understand me?<page=S>You can find roaches around these roads. Cut one off, reach into its shell, and remove the delicious viscera! Mmmmm!

original_en_text: Give them. Take wrong. Ssssomeone, ssssave me.
translated_text: 把它给他们。误解了，请帮帮我
secondary_translated_text: Give it to them. I misunderstood, please help me

original_en_text: <hpage>I can sense you there, hidden in the darkness. Show yourself.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我能感知到你，隐匿于黑暗之中的那位。现身吧。
translated_text: <hpage>我能感觉到你在那里，隐藏在黑暗中。展示自己。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I can feel you there, hidden in the darkness. Show yourself.

original_en_text: <page=L>Refuse us, do you, missy? No matter then. We’ll just get back to slowly starving, har har!
original_zh_text: <page=L>小姐，你真要拒绝我们吗？无妨！继续慢慢饿死呗，哈！哈！
translated_text: <page=L>拒绝我们吗，小姐？没关系我们会慢慢回到饥饿状态，哈哈！
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>Reject us, miss? It doesn't matter. We will slowly return to hunger, haha!

original_en_text: <page=L>Ooh, someone’s carrying a delectable scent! Come to deliver us what you promised, missy?
original_zh_text: <page=L>噢，你身上有股好香的味道！小姐是来兑现承诺的吧？
translated_text: <page=L>哦，有人的香味很香！小姐，来兑现你的承诺吗？
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>Oh, someone smells so fragrant! Miss, are you here to fulfill your promise?

original_zh_text: 咝——食物……交出来。我要拿走。
translated_text: 莫塞尔苏斯。把它给他们。Take.
secondary_translated_text: Mosselsus. Give it to them. Take.

original_en_text: <page=L>Thinkin’ serious about the spines, missy? Surely your good health’s worth more than a few beads!
original_zh_text: <page=L>要不再考虑考虑买钢棘的事？小姐，您的健康可比几颗念珠金贵！
translated_text: <page=L>好好想想你的脊椎，小姐？当然，你的健康比几颗珠子更有价值！
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>Think about your spine, miss? Of course, your health is more valuable than a few beads!

original_en_text: <page=L>How ‘bout you put that poker to good use then, missy? Go poach some of them roaches and get us some tasty guts? There’d be fair trade waitin’ for yer!
original_zh_text: <page=L>小姐，要不用你那根烧火棍帮我们开开荤？去宰几只蟑螂，把它们美味的内脏取来，我们会给你个公道价！
translated_text: <page=L>那么，小姐，你好好利用那把扑克怎么样？去挖一些蟑螂，给我们弄点美味的内脏来吗？公平贸易正在等待您！
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>So, miss, how about you make good use of that poker? Go dig up some roaches and get us some delicious entrails? Fair trade is waiting for you!

original_en_text: Misstress, you called for your ssss-slave? I obey... for you are ssss-sstronger. My gatheringsss can wait.
original_zh_text: 咝——主人，您在召唤奴才我吗？奴才遵命……因您比我更强大。采集之事可以暂缓。
translated_text: 女主人，你叫你的奴隶？我服从..因为你更强大。我的孩子们可以等待。
secondary_translated_text: Mistress, you call your slave? I obey.. Because you are stronger. My children can wait.

original_en_text: <page=L>Har. I reckon you don’t know how much trouble you’ve promised yourself just now, missy.<page=L>Ah well, best you get to it. Muckroaches are everywhere along these old roads. Just find a few and pluck their guts out. Easy as sin!
original_zh_text: <page=L>哈！小姐，您可不知自个儿揽了个多大的麻烦。<page=L>算了，麻溜开工吧。淤秽蟑螂到处都是，找几只宰了，把它们内脏取来。简单得很！
translated_text: <page=L>哈尔我想你没有意识到你刚刚给自己带来了多大的麻烦，小姐。<page=L>啊好吧，你最好走吧。这些老路上到处都是蟑螂。只要找到一些并挖出它们的内脏即可。简单如罪恶！
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>Hal I don't think you realize how much trouble you've just caused yourself, miss.<page=L>Ah well, you'd better go. These old roads are full of roaches. Just find some and gut them. Simple as sin!

original_en_text: Leave me be, traveller. Better I accept this kingdom’s cruelty than rage helpless against it.<page>To waste in a cell, forgotten. ‘Tis no worse a fate than the Haunting that binds Pharloom’s many fragile minds.<hpage>As you wish, prisoner.
original_zh_text: 让我安安静静待在这里吧，旅行者。与其毫无意义地反抗这王国降下的残酷，不如选择接受它。<page>于囚笼钟腐朽，遗忘。总好过丝咒缠身，沦为纺络万千痴愚之一。<hpage>如你所愿。
translated_text: 别管我，旅行者。我宁愿接受这个王国的残酷，也不愿为此感到愤怒和无助。<page>监狱里的浪费被遗忘了。这并不比《闹鬼》更糟糕的命运，束缚着法勒姆许多脆弱的心灵。<hpage>如你所愿，囚犯。
secondary_translated_text: Leave me alone, traveler. I would rather accept the cruelty of this kingdom than feel angry and helpless about it.<page>Waste in prison is forgotten. This is no worse fate than "Haunted", binding many of Farham's fragile minds.<hpage>As you wish, prisoner.

original_en_text: Tending to the morss-ssels is a delicate tasssk, and requiresss much patience. Let me toil for you, missstresss, under your exquisite protection...
original_zh_text: 咝——培育食物需要精细耐心。请容奴才我在您的庇护下劳作……
translated_text: 照顾莫尔斯·塞尔是一个微妙的塔斯克，需要很大的耐心。让我在您精心保护下为您努力工作吧，小姐..
secondary_translated_text: Taking care of Morse Searle is a delicate Tasker and requires a lot of patience. Let me work hard for you under your careful protection, miss..

translated_text: 再次显示。为你自己说话。

original_en_text: A ss-sslave must feed his misstress-sss. Morsss-sels will I grow. While you hunt, I am working... alwaysss-sss...
original_zh_text: 咝——奴才应当伺候主人。奴才我会培育食物。您狩猎时，奴才劳作……永不停歇……
translated_text: ss-ssslave必须养活他的情妇ssss。我会成长。我在工作，而你在打猎。总是...
secondary_translated_text: ss-ssslave must feed his mistress ssss. I will grow. I'm working, and you're hunting. Always...

original_en_text: <page=S>S’a pleasure doin’ business, ma’am. It’s only the finest scrap we’re sellin’. Promise!<page=S>For your shell’s sake, we’ll be hopin’ all them spines can get the job done!
original_zh_text: <page=S>交易愉快，小姐。我们卖的绝对都是上等废料！我敢打包票！<page=S>希望这些钢棘能助你甲壳康复！
translated_text: <page=S>很高兴与您合作，女士。这是我们出售的最好的废品保证！<page=S>对于您的外壳，我们希望所有的脊柱都能完成任务！
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>It's a pleasure working with you, ma 'am. This is the best scrap guarantee we sell!<page=S>For your shell, we want all spines to get the job done!

original_en_text: Ssss! My misstress hasss returned to me! Under her protection, I have no fear of the ssslithering black sssss-sstringss!<page>How the world trembles in their terrible grassssp! In such times, only the mighty sssurvive... and those who loyally ss-sserve them...<hpage>I cannot remain here to protect you sir, but know that my aim is to cut this land free of the black threads. In the meantime, you should concern yourself with your own safety.<page>Ssss. I hear more than your words, misssstress. I hear your true dessiresss, pulsing within you. To see them met, I will continue to toil for you... alwaysssss.<page>
original_zh_text: 咝——！主人归巢，奴才拜伏！有您的护佑，奴才何惧那肆虐的黑灾！<page>天地在这恐怖攫握中战栗不休！咝——唯有强大者得以生存……以及附庸强者的忠仆……<hpage>我无法久留此地庇护你，先生。我此行是为了斩断此间黑灾的锁锢。各自珍重吧。<page>咝——奴才听到的岂止主人的言语，更识得您胸膛激荡的夙愿——必当达成！奴才唯有殚精竭虑……至死不渝！<page>
translated_text: 嘘！压力又回来了！在她的保护下，我不再害怕那些嘶嘶作响的黑色嘶嘶声！<page>世界如何在可怕的草丛中颤抖p！在这样的时代，只有强者才能生存。以及那些忠实为他们服务的人..<hpage>先生，我不能留在这里保护您，但您必须知道，我的目标是让这片土地摆脱黑线。同时，您应该关心自己的安全。<page>嘘我不仅仅听到你说的话，小姐。我听到了你真正的愿望，在你内心脉动。为了看到他们见面，我会继续为你努力……总是.<page>
secondary_translated_text: Shh! The pressure is back! Under her protection, I am no longer afraid of those hissing black hisses!<page>How the world trembles in the terrible grass p! In times like this, only the strong can survive. and those who serve them faithfully..<hpage>Sir, I cannot stay here to protect you, but you must know that my goal is to rid this land of black lines. At the same time, you should be concerned about your own safety.<page>Shh. I don't just hear what you say, miss. I hear your true wish, pulse within you. In order to see them meet, I will continue to work hard for you... always.<page>

original_en_text: <page=L>Oi, why you come in here, all treadin’ muck? With that nasty-lookin’ poker by yer side? Eh?<page=S>Yeah, why you comin’ in here? We ain’t done nothin’ wrong. We ain’t all twisted like them roachkeepers!<page=L>She’s come to kill us, Benj’n! S’the blimmin’ end for us, old mate! Har har!<hpage>I mean you no harm, good bugs. I cut down only those who bar my path.<page><page=L>That so? Well, them keepers outside ain’t inclined to let strangers pass by, so you’ll be makin’ good use of yer poker there, missy.
original_zh_text: <page=L>嘿，满脚泥污闯进来作甚？还带着根脏兮兮的烧火棍？嗯？<page=S>就是，来这儿干啥？我们可没干坏事，不像外头那群蟑螂看守者那样疯癫！<page=L>她是来宰咱们的，班金！老伙计，咱们要完犊子啦！哈哈！<hpage>二位，我无意加害你们。针刃只斩挡路之虫。<page><page=L>当真？外头的监管者可不爱放生面孔过路。小姐，你那烧火棍可要派上大用场咯！
translated_text: <page=L>嘿，你怎么在这里，一堆垃圾？旁边有那个难看的扑克吗？啊？<page=S>是的，你为什么进来？我们没有做错任何事。我们并不都像那些蟑螂饲养员那么扭曲！<page=L>她是来杀我们的，本杰明！这对我们来说是一个“愚蠢”的结局，老头！哈哈！<hpage>我的意思是，我没有伤害你，好虫子。我只会砍倒那些挡我道路的人。<page><page=L>真的吗？好吧，外面的门卫不会让陌生人经过，所以你要充分利用那里的扑克，小姐。
secondary_translated_text: <page=L>Hey, what are you doing here, a pile of garbage? Is there that ugly poker next door? Huh?<page=S>Yes, why did you come in? We didn't do anything wrong. We're not all as twisted as those cockroach breeders!<page=L>She's here to kill us, Benjamin! This is a "stupid" ending for us, old man! Haha!<hpage>I mean, I didn't hurt you, good bug. I will only cut down those who stand in my way.<page><page=L>Really? Well, the doorman outside won't let strangers pass by, so make the most of the poker there, miss.

original_en_text: Riprova. Se il problema dovesse persistere, visita hollowknightsilksong.com/help per ulteriori informazioni.
original_zh_text: 请再次尝试保存。如果问题仍未解决，请访问 hollowknightsilksong.com/help 获取技术支持。
translated_text: 里普罗瓦。Seil probleema dovesse persistere，visita hollowknightsilksong.com/help根据ulteriori informizioni。
secondary_translated_text: Riprova. Seil problema dovesse persistre, visita hollowknightsilksong.com/help based on ulteriori informizioni.

original_en_text: Impossibile leggere il file di salvataggio.
translated_text: 不可能的文件来自萨尔瓦多。
secondary_translated_text: The impossible document came from El Salvador.

original_en_text: Puoi provare a ripristinare un salvataggio automatico precedente usando l’opzione sottostante.
original_zh_text: 您可以通过下方选项尝试恢复之前的自动存档。
translated_text: 我可以提供一个自动化的解决方案来帮助您更好地使用我们的操作系统。
secondary_translated_text: I can provide an automated solution to help you make better use of our operating system.

original_en_text: Ready to reconsider my offer? Good for you! You won’t be going far without my help, dear.
original_zh_text: 回心转意了？明智的选择！没我帮忙你可走不远。
translated_text: 准备好重新考虑我的报价了吗？对你有好处！亲爱的，没有我的帮助你走不了多远。
secondary_translated_text: Ready to reconsider my offer? Good for you! Honey, you can't get far without my help.

original_en_text: I’ll grant you my courtesy, stray one. I’ll even offer aid where I’m able. Just don’t be hanging around too long.<page>I may not be a fan of that Citadel, but I’m smart enough to avoid its ire.
original_zh_text: 我愿意给你几分面子，浪游者。需要帮助时也会搭把手，但可别赖着不走。<page>我虽然厌恶圣堡，但可没傻到去触霉头。
translated_text: 我会向你表示我的礼貌，流浪者。我甚至会尽一切努力帮助不要在这里呆太久。<page>我可能不是这座城堡的粉丝，但我足够聪明，可以避免它的愤怒。
secondary_translated_text: I will show you my courtesy, wanderer. I will even do everything I can to help not stay here too long.<page>I may not be a fan of the castle, but I am smart enough to avoid its anger.

original_zh_text: 喀 玛阿克。诺库 格日？

original_en_text: Back here again? It’s a strange pilgrimage that bends and doubles back on itself. Still, you may as well take the opportunity to share your rosaries.
original_zh_text: 又绕回来了？没见过像你这样在朝圣路上兜兜转转的。不过正好把念珠拿来交易。
translated_text: 又回到这里？这是一次奇怪的朝圣之旅，弯曲后又会自我回归。尽管如此，你还是借此机会分享你的念珠。
secondary_translated_text: Back here again? It's a strange pilgrimage that bends and returns on its own. Still, you take the opportunity to share your rosary beads.

original_en_text: I’m loath to spoil the surprise, but curiosity begs me to ask. Do you know why they pursued you? Those Citadel bugs?<hpage>I have seen their Citadel and its state, and I have strong suspicion...<hpage>They hunt me for my nature. For the Silk produced within my shell. Not for themselves but for the one atop it all. <page>Ahh ha! Truth. In Pharloom, yours is a rare skill, prized beyond measure, to channel one’s soul within a thread. Soul and Silk inseparably linked.<page>It is a skill almost lost from Pharloom. Those old Weavers shared it, but they’re long dead now.<hpage>The one atop this kingdom... They share my nature, or some part of it. I’ve seen their Silk at work, in vast scale.<hpage>It snares the shells of those upon the roads, and guides with false life the many hollowed husks left to lapse.<page>Hmm... You’ve looked far towards the truth of it. Closer even than I’d dare to dig. But then you’re clearly of the countenance to be coping with such heady stuff...<page>Now! It’s past time you were going! Your style and your Silk sure are fine, but stay too long and you’ll only be trouble for me!
original_zh_text: 我本来不想多嘴，但实在好奇，圣堡的虫为何追你？<hpage>见过如今的圣堡后，我怀疑……<hpage>它们觊觎我甲壳产出灵丝的能力，而且是为了顶上那位。<page>哈！肯定是这样！在纺络，以魂注丝是无价神技，让魂与丝成为一体。<page>这技艺近乎失传。曾经的织者倒是会，如今早死绝了。<hpage>王国之上那位……与我同源，曾见识过相似的灵丝。<hpage>用丝线缠缚朝圣者，操纵空壳作为傀儡<page>嗯……你眼力不错！圣堡啊……答案都在那条路上，慢慢攀吧姑娘。<page>好了，你该走了！虽你长得英姿飒爽，但身负灵丝，久留只会给我惹祸！
translated_text: 我不想破坏这个惊喜，但好奇心让我问道。你知道他们为什么追捕你吗？那些城堡虫子？<hpage>我看过他们的城堡和它的状况，我有强烈的怀疑..<hpage>他们追捕我是谁。为了我壳中产生的丝绸。不是为了他们自己，而是为了凌驾于一切之上的人民。<page>啊哈！真相在Pharloom中，你的技能是一种价值无法估量的稀有技能，可以引导一个人的灵魂进入线程。灵魂与丝绸密不可分。<page>这是法鲁几乎失去的技能。那些老韦弗分享了它，但他们现在早已死了。<hpage>这个王国之上的那个。他们的本性与我相同，或者是其中的一部分。我看到他们的丝绸大规模工作。<hpage>它困住了路上人的贝壳，并引导许多留下虚假生命的空心贝壳。<page>呃...你已经远远地关注了真相。甚至比我敢挖的还要近。但你显然有能力应对如此令人兴奋的事情……<page>现在！你该走了！你的款式和丝绸确实很好，但是呆得太久只会给我带来麻烦！
secondary_translated_text: I didn't want to ruin the surprise, but curiosity made me ask. Do you know why they're hunting you? Those castle bugs?<hpage>I have seen their castle and its condition, and I have strong doubts..<hpage>They hunted me for who I was. For the silk produced in my shell. Not for themselves, but for the people who are above all else.<page>Aha! Truth In Pharloom, your skill is a rare skill of immeasurable value that can guide a person's soul into threads. Soul and silk are inseparable.<page>This is a skill that Faro has almost lost. Those old Weavers shared it, but they are long dead by now.<hpage>The one above this kingdom. Their nature is the same as mine, or part of it. I saw their silk work on a large scale.<hpage>It traps the shells of people on the road and guides many hollow shells that leave false life behind.<page>Uh... You have paid attention to the truth from afar. Even closer than I dared to dig. But you obviously have the ability to cope with something so exciting...<page>Now! It's time for you to go! Your style and silk are really good, but staying too long will only bring trouble to me!

original_en_text: A smart choice. Get out there and gather those spine cores, and best you be quick about it.<page>As nice as it is to have the company, if you hang around too long, those Citadel bugs’ll turn their gaze on me as well.
original_zh_text: 明智的选择。那就快去收集棘刺吧，最好手脚麻利点。<page>虽说有身边个伴也挺好，但你在这待太久会连累我也遭到圣堡注目。
translated_text: 明智的选择。出去收集那些脊椎核心，最好快点。<page>有同伴真好，但如果你待得太久，那些城堡虫就会把目光转向我。
secondary_translated_text: Smart choice. Go out and collect those spinal cores, better hurry.<page>It's nice to have company, but if you stay too long, those castle bugs will turn their eyes to me.

original_en_text: If you’re planning to ascend from these low fields, you’ll be needing some lift, and I’m just the bug to help.<page>Head for the caves beyond my home. The bugs within produce a spine with a marvellous core, flexible yet strong.<page>Cut their spines and collect the cores. Return to me, and I’ll soon have your old cloak transformed into something far more buoyant.
original_zh_text: 想从这低地往上去，得靠点助力，我正好能帮忙。<page>去我家附近的洞窟，里头的甲虫能产出一种奇妙棘刺，柔韧又结实。<page>收集棘刺交给我，保准把你的旧披风改造得轻巧如羽！
translated_text: 如果你打算从这些低洼的田野里爬起来，你需要一些电梯，我只会帮助虫子。<page>从我家去那边的山洞。里面的昆虫长出了一条脊柱，其核心很棒，灵活而坚固。<page>切割它们的脊柱并收集核心。回到我身边，我很快就会把你的旧斗篷变成更轻的东西。
secondary_translated_text: If you're going to get up from these low-lying fields and you need some elevators, I'll just help the bugs.<page>From my house to the cave over there. The insects inside have grown a spine with a great core, flexible and strong.<page>Cut their spines and collect the cores. Come back to me and I will soon turn your old cloak into something lighter.

original_en_text: Pale beast... bringing ruin... we had sensed it... you writing harsh our final fate...<page>If power... you come seeking... mine is faded.... mortal... time taken...<hpage>I seek only to save these lands, great one, to break them free from this fatal sickness born of thread and void.<page>Kcha! If you may... beast... If you can...
original_zh_text: 苍白异兽……携灾而至……吾等早有预感……汝书写的，是斯卡尔的终章……<page>若力量……是汝所求……吾已衰微……凡躯……时日无多……<hpage>我只为拯救这片土地而来，蚁后，将众生从丝线与虚空带来的灾厄中解放。喀嚓！……若汝能……异兽……若汝可……
translated_text: 苍白的野兽带来毁灭。我们感受到你写作的残酷，我们最终的命运...<page>如果权力。你来找它，我的已经褪色了普通人花时间。<hpage>伟人，我只寻求拯救这些土地免受这种由线和虚空产生的致命疾病的侵害。<page>Kcha！如果你可以的话。兽如果可以的话
secondary_translated_text: The pale beast brings destruction. We feel the cruelty of your writing, our ultimate destiny...<page>If power. You come to find it, mine has faded away, ordinary people spend time.<hpage>Great man, I seek only to save these lands from this deadly disease born of thread and void.<page>Kcha! If you can. Beasts if they can.

original_en_text: Well, then! I can tell by the rattling from within your cloak, your hunt was a success! If you’ll kindly pass over the cores, I can get to work.
original_zh_text: 嗯，我能听到你披风里的窸窣声，看来是满载而归！棘刺拿来，我马上开工。
translated_text: 好吧，那么！我从你斗篷的响声可以看出你的狩猎很成功！如果你能交出核心，我就可以开始工作了。
secondary_translated_text: Okay, then! I can tell by the sound of your cloak that your hunt was a success! If you can hand over the core, I can start working.

original_en_text: Save them... if you can... pale beast...
original_zh_text: 拯救他们……若汝可……苍白异兽……
translated_text: 拯救他们。如果可以的话。苍白的野兽。
secondary_translated_text: Save them. If it's okay. Pale beast.

original_en_text: Ahhh... I am so tired. But to tarry long would be sacrilege...
original_zh_text: 唉……太累……但久留便是渎神……
translated_text: 啊...我太累了但呆久了就可耻了……
secondary_translated_text: Ah... I'm too tired, but it's shameful to stay for a long time...

original_en_text: Very well, ssspiidderr. Keep your organsss, for now.
original_zh_text: 好吧，小蜘蛛……留着你的内脏，咝——暂时。
translated_text: 非常好，ssspiidderr。保留你的器官一段时间。
secondary_translated_text: Very good, ssspiidderr. Keep your organs for a while.

original_en_text: <page>Oooh! Stray one. Do tell, how goes the journey?<hpage>I have ventured high, seen the Citadel and its state. That place is long lost... generations lost, a gilded tomb, drowned in Silk dregs.<hpage>For its minions, so compelled in my capture, I now see clearly the source of their unity, and their strange strength... They are husks bound tight by the one who waits at its crest...<page>Agh! Look at you! Seeing right through to the truth of it! Closer even than I’d dare to dig. But then you’re clearly of the countenance to be coping with such heady stuff...<page>Now! Best you be heading. You’re clearly planning to stir up some serious trouble. I don’t want to be close when it kicks off!
original_zh_text: <page>哟！浪游者。最近怎么样？<hpage>我攀到了高处，见到了如今的圣堡。宛如一座镀金坟冢，浸在腐朽丝渣里。<hpage>那些想抓我的喽啰，我也看清了。都是被顶端那位用丝线操控的傀儡……<page>嗬！这就看清了真相！比我更敢深究。看你这副神情，摆明了是要碰一碰这硬茬……<page>那就赶紧上路！既然你要惹大麻烦，我可不想被波及！
translated_text: <page>噢！流浪的那个。请告诉我，旅程怎么样？<hpage>我冒险登上高处，参观了城堡及其状况。那个地方早已消失。一代人过去了，镀金的坟墓淹没在丝渣中。<hpage>对于它的爪牙来说，我是如此被迫去捕捉，以至于现在我清楚地看到了他们团结的源泉，以及他们奇怪的力量……它们是被那些在山顶等待的人紧紧束缚的贝壳……<page>啊！看看你！看穿真相！甚至比我敢挖的还要近。但你显然有能力应对如此令人兴奋的事情……<page>现在！你最好走吧。你显然计划制造一些严重的麻烦。比赛开始时我不想离得太近！
secondary_translated_text: <page>Oh! The wandering one. Please tell me, how was the journey?<hpage>I ventured up high and visited the castle and its condition. That place has long disappeared. A generation passed, and the gilded tomb was submerged in silk residue.<hpage>For its minions, I was so forced to capture that now I clearly see the source of their unity, and their strange power... they are shells tightly bound by those waiting on the mountaintop...<page>Ah! Look at you! See through the truth! Even closer than I dared to dig. But you obviously have the ability to cope with something so exciting...<page>Now! You'd better go. You're obviously planning on causing some serious trouble. I don't want to get too close when the game starts!

original_en_text: That pouch of yours... With the scraps left here and a little work, I could add some pockets for you, let you carry more tools and shards while on the road. That’d be nice, wouldn’t it?
original_zh_text: 你这工具袋……我能加点布料，让它能多塞工具。这样路上也方便，对吧？
translated_text: 你的那个包。有了这里剩下的废物和多一点的工作，我可以增加一些口袋，让你在路上携带更多的工具和碎片。那就太棒了，不是吗？
secondary_translated_text: Your bag. With the waste left here and a little more work, I can add some pockets to allow you to carry more tools and debris on the road. That would be great, wouldn't it?

original_en_text: All those gooey bugssss, all so reluctant to share their organs. Sssooo much coaxing and gnawing, and prodding.<page>They should be proud! Their ssmall sssacrifice would become much sssustenance for my ferocious young.
original_zh_text: 那些黏糊糊的虫子，个个抠门不肯掏出内脏给我。咝——连哄带骗，又咬又戳，才肯给我。<page>他们该骄傲！咝——这点小牺牲能养大我那群凶猛的孩子。
translated_text: 所有的粘虫都不愿意分享他们的器官。很多的哄骗，咀嚼和刺激。<page>他们应该感到自豪！他们的小小牺牲将成为我凶猛后代的主要食物。
secondary_translated_text: All armyworms are reluctant to share their organs. A lot of coaxing, chewing and stimulating.<page>They should be proud! Their little sacrifices will become the main food for my fierce descendants.

original_en_text: For your efforts, take these rosaries as payment. May they not lay too heavy upon your shell.
original_zh_text: 这是酬劳，但愿念珠不会压垮你的行囊。
translated_text: 请接受这些念珠作为对您努力的奖励。愿它们不会压在你的壳上太重。
secondary_translated_text: Please accept these rosary beads as a reward for your efforts. May they not weigh too heavily on your shell.

original_en_text: <hpage>I will not offer my own organs, hunter, though I may bring the meat of others slain.<page>Good ssspidderr! Ssskewered. Ssshredded. Ssseared! Bring it all. Much will be needed, enough to sate my brood to come.<hpage>Several of my tools can prepare the meats as you request. I have been fortunate to find so varied an arsenal within your lands.<page>My brood has not long till hatching, ssssspiddderrr. Do your duty ssswift, and you shall sssee reward for the sssslaughter.
original_zh_text: <hpage>猎手，我不会为你献上自己的内脏，但也许我能带给你其他猎物的血肉。<page>咝——！好啊，小蜘蛛！串烧、撕碎、炙烤！统统带来。我的孩子需要大量血肉才能饱足。<hpage>我带的工具能按你的要求处理血肉。你们这地界真像个武器库，各种装备种类齐全。<page>我的孩子就快孵化了，咝——小蜘蛛……动作快点，完成我的需求，必有重谢。
translated_text: <hpage>猎人，我不会牺牲自己的器官，尽管我可以带来其他被杀人的肉。<page>好ssspidderr！嘶嘶声。嘘。嘘，嘘！把它都带来。我需要很多东西来支持我即将到来的后代。<hpage>我有一些工具可以根据您的要求准备肉。我很幸运在你们的土地上找到如此多样化的军火库。<page>我的孩子即将孵化，ssspidddderr。履行您的责任ssssswift，您就会因ssssslaw而获得奖励。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Hunter, I will not sacrifice my own organs, although I can bring other slain meat.<page>Good ssspidderr! hissing. Shh. Shh, shh! Bring it all. I need a lot to support my future generations.<hpage>I have some tools to prepare meat according to your requirements. I am lucky to find such a diverse arsenal on your land.<page>My child is about to hatch, ssspidddderr. Fulfill your responsibilities ssssswift and you will be rewarded for ssssslaw.

original_en_text: <hpage>I’ll have the spine cores for you shortly, madam.<page>Good, good! The caves just beyond here are full of the creatures, floating carelessly in the warm air.<page>I’m sure your big needle there can coax them into sharing their spines. Then it’s only a quick matter of cutting them open and grabbing the cores.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我稍候就带来棘刺，女士。<page>好！附近的洞窟里到处是那种浮空的蠢虫。<page>你的长针肯定能"劝"它们献出棘刺。
translated_text: <hpage>女士，我很快就会为您准备好脊柱核。<page>好，好！这里遥远的洞穴里充满了这样的生物，随意漂浮在温暖的空气中。<page>我相信你那里的大针可以说服他们分享他们的脊柱。然后迅速切开并抓住核即可。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Ma 'am, I will have your spinal nucleus ready soon.<page>Good, good! The distant caves here are filled with such creatures, floating casually in the warm air.<page>I believe the big needle you have there can persuade them to share their spine. Then quickly cut open and grasp the nucleus.

original_en_text: A holy burden to help maintain your poise. Whether striking others or being struck yourself, you’ll remain firmly in place.
original_zh_text: 这份神圣负赘能帮助你维持姿态，无论攻守都能稳如磐石。
translated_text: 帮助你保持冷静的神圣责任。无论你是攻击别人还是被攻击自己，你都会坚定地呆在原地。
secondary_translated_text: A sacred responsibility to help you stay calm. Whether you are attacking others or being attacked yourself, you will stay firmly where you are.

original_en_text: Not interested in trade? I wonder, will your rosaries weigh you down during your ascent?
original_zh_text: 不做买卖？揣着念珠攀登不怕负担过重？
translated_text: 对贸易不感兴趣？我想知道你的念珠是否让你在上升时感到沉重？
secondary_translated_text: Not interested in trade? I wonder if your rosary beads make you feel heavy when you rise?

original_en_text: Perfect! These should be more than enough. Wait there just a moment and we’ll soon have you soaring up and away from these lowlands.
original_zh_text: 完美！这些够用了。稍等片刻，保你能够腾空而起，远离这破地方。
translated_text: 完美！这些应该足够了。在那里等一会儿，我们很快就会让你飞离这些低地。
secondary_translated_text: Perfect! These should be enough. Wait there for a while and we will soon have you flying away from these lowlands.

original_en_text: Rkraha. Uohk kha!<hpage>My apologies, sir. Though I can grasp the language of many bugs, your words are unfamiliar even to me.<page>Kha... kha mauak. Noku... gri?<hpage><hpage>These items you have collected. These are the wares of a warrior. Do you wish to trade?<page>Noku... noku!
original_zh_text: 尔克拉哈。乌奥赫克 喀！<hpage>抱歉，先生。虽然我略懂各族虫语，但你的语言我实在不熟。<page>喀……喀 玛阿克。诺库……格日？<hpage><hpage>你收集的这些东西……是战士的货。你想交易？<page>诺库……诺库！
translated_text: Rkraha。Uohk kha！<hpage>抱歉先生虽然我能听懂许多昆虫的语言，但连我也不熟悉你的话。<page>卡卡莫亚克。野外格里？<hpage><hpage>你收集的这些物品。这些都是战士的物品。你想交易吗？<page>野外狂野！
secondary_translated_text: Rkraha。Uohk kha!<hpage>Sorry, sir. Although I can understand the language of many insects, even I am not familiar with your words.<page>Kakamoak. Wild Gerry?<hpage><hpage>These items you collected. These are all warrior belongings. Do you want to trade?<page>Wild wild!

original_en_text: Get a move on, stray one! We’re all suffering for your conflict... Maybe next time you act towards calmer conclusions, aye?
original_zh_text: 快去吧！大伙都在遭罪……下次闹腾的时候悠着点行不？
translated_text: 继续前进，流浪者！我们都因为你们的冲突而受苦.也许下次你会得出一个更平静的结论，对吧？
secondary_translated_text: Keep moving, wanderer! We all suffer because of your conflict. Maybe next time you'll come to a calmer conclusion, right?

original_en_text: These humble shards can form together into something grand, if you possess the vision to shape them.
original_zh_text: 这些碎片应该能拼凑成形，但要看你有无打磨的技巧。
translated_text: 如果你有远见来塑造它们，这些卑微的碎片就可以聚集在一起形成宏伟的东西。
secondary_translated_text: If you have the vision to shape them, these humble fragments can come together to form something magnificent.

original_en_text: After all that hunting, you won’t trust me with your spoils? You’re a funny one. They won’t do you any good just filling up your pockets!
original_zh_text: 大费周折取来棘刺，却信不过我？你可真逗。揣着这些刺有什么用！
translated_text: 狩猎这么多，你还担心把战利品交给我吗？你是一个有趣的人。他们只是填满你的口袋，不会给你带来任何好处！
secondary_translated_text: After all the hunting, are you still worried about handing over your spoils to me? You are an interesting person. They just fill your pockets and won't do you any good!

original_en_text: That’s a fancy pin you’re flaunting upon your cloak there. Here’s hoping you didn’t have to kill to claim it.<hpage>The emblem was given freely, Seamstress, as reward for a fierce duel won fair.<page>Given freely!? My, my. So my sister’s welcomed another to the order... Sounds like age might’ve softened even her stoic style.<page>Can’t say I think too fondly on the old ways... but some rituals, and some memories... those are still worth preserving.
original_zh_text: 披风上别着的针徽挺漂亮嘛，但愿不是从尸壳上抢来的。<hpage>这针徽是公平比斗赢来的，女士。<page>她自愿给的？！哎呀呀，竟然纳新成员入团……岁月到底是软了她古板心肠。<page>我不待见那些古训……但有些仪式，有些回忆……还是值得留存。
translated_text: 你在斗篷上炫耀的是一枚漂亮的别针。我希望你能在不杀人的情况下得到它。<hpage>对于女主角来说，徽章是免费赠送的，因为激烈决斗的回报是公平的。<page>免费的！？天啊所以我姐姐又迎来了另一个人……听起来年龄甚至可能软化她坚忍的风格。<page>我不能说我对旧的方式想得太深情了……但一些仪式，一些回忆.这些仍然值得保存。
secondary_translated_text: What you're showing off on your cloak is a beautiful pin. I hope you can get it without killing anyone.<hpage>For the female lead, the badges are given away for free because the rewards of a fierce duel are fair.<page>Free!? Gosh, so my sister has another person... sounds like age may even soften her stoic style.<page>I can't say I'm thinking too fondly about the old ways…but some rituals, some memories. These are still worth saving.

original_zh_text: 尔克拉哈。滕克 乌奥肯。

original_en_text: Yes, that’s better. Sharing your devotion with me will surely bring you luck.
original_zh_text: 这就对了。分我一份虔信自会带来好运。
translated_text: 是的，这样更好。与我分享您的奉献精神一定会给您带来好运。
secondary_translated_text: Yes, it's better this way. Sharing your dedication with me will surely bring you good luck.

original_en_text: Well, aren’t you a sight! No, don’t tell me! You’re as odd as they come.<page>Your poise! Your form! Are you hunted? Pursued? The Citadel would see a fine prize in you.<hpage>It is as you say, madam. Veiled bugs of the Citadel brought me to your land. I now seek for one who would answer why, and will ask with force as needed.<page>Ha! Fierce too! These are bleak times, but a powerful stray like you could certainly cause some change.<page>Well then! I’ve no love for that holy caste, and I do worry for this kingdom’s ailing state. If you’re seeking to settle a score, perhaps I can lend some aid?
original_zh_text: 瞧瞧这模样！让我猜猜，你不是这里的虫吧？<page>这仪态！这身姿！你正被追杀？被通缉？圣堡肯定很重视你。<hpage>如你所言，女士。覆面虫将我带来此地，我打算向圣堡讨个说法。<page>哈！还挺凶！现在外面乱得很，你这般强悍的浪客肯定能搅出点动静。<page>正好！我也讨厌那群圣徒，也忧心王国的灾祸。你要找他们算账的话，或许我能帮衬？
translated_text: 好吧，你不是一个景象！不，别告诉我！你和他们一样奇怪。<page>你的举止！你的形式！你被追捕了吗？追击？城堡会视你为珍宝。<hpage>正如您所说，女士。城堡里的虫子把我带到了你的土地上。我现在正在寻找一个人谁可以回答的原因，并要求大力需要时。<page>哈！也很激烈！这是一个黯淡的时期，但像你这样强大的流浪者肯定会做出一些改变。<page>好了！我不爱那个神圣的种姓，我确实担心这个王国的糟糕状况。如果你想得分，也许我可以提供一些帮助？
secondary_translated_text: Well, you are not a sight! No, don't tell me! You are as strange as they are.<page>Your behavior! Your form! Are you being hunted? Pursuing? The castle will regard you as a treasure.<hpage>As you said, ma 'am. The bugs in the castle brought me to your land. I am now looking for someone who can answer the reasons and ask vigorously when needed.<page>Ha! It's also very intense! These are bleak times, but a powerful wanderer like you will definitely make some changes.<page>Okay! I do not love that sacred caste, and I do worry about the terrible state of the kingdom. If you want to score, maybe I can provide some help?

original_en_text: I await the meat, sspiidder. Bring me much. Enough to sate my brood to come.
original_zh_text: 我在等着血肉呢，小蜘蛛。咝——多带些，要够喂饱我的孩子们。
translated_text: 蜘蛛侠，我在等肉。给我带来了很多。足以养活我即将出生的孩子。
secondary_translated_text: Spider-Man, I'm waiting for meat. Brought me a lot. Enough to support my upcoming child.

original_en_text: Ssssppiidderr... Your ssstench is strange... yet similar. Your tension isss smelt strong. Do I ssseem a threat to you?<hpage>This whole land keeps me cautious, tall one, and your claws look to have seen much sharp use.<page>Yesss... I kill, gladly, but only to feed my ssshhhell, and my brood to come.<page>Your meat... much ssssustanence it could grant... but too hard to pry... Your long, false claw would ssslash back ssswift.<hpage>Good, so you can sense my skill, as I yours. A truce then, that we both shall live beyond our meeting.
original_zh_text: <page>咝——小蜘蛛……你的气味既陌生又熟悉……紧张感浓得刺鼻。我看你对我很戒备，是不是？<hpage>这片土地危机四伏，高个子，我自然得保持戒备。我看你刃爪锋利，想必是久经厮杀。<page>咝——没错……我乐于杀戮，但也只是为了喂饱自己，以及我即将出生的孩子们。<page>你的血肉……能为我提供不少给养……但太难撬开……咝——你那长针会立刻反击。<hpage>很好，看来你清楚我的手段，正如我知晓你的能耐。立个和平协议吧，高个子——让咱们都能活着离开这里。
translated_text: Ssssppiidderr..你的恶臭很奇怪。但相似。你很紧张。我对你构成威胁吗？<hpage>这整片土地让我小心翼翼，高个子，你的爪子似乎用了很多锋利的东西。<page>是的我很想杀人，但只是为了养活我的混蛋和我未来的后代。<page>你的肉。它可以提供很多保证。但它太难破解了。你的假爪子会反击ssswift。<hpage>很好，所以你可以感受到我的技能，就像我和你的一样。所以让我们休战吧，见面后我们将继续我们的生活。
secondary_translated_text: Ssssppiidderr.. Your stench is strange. But similar. You're nervous. Am I a threat to you?<hpage>The whole land makes me cautious, tall man, your claws seem to be using a lot of sharp things.<page>Yes, I would like to kill, but only to feed my assholes and my future descendants.<page>Your meat. It can provide many guarantees. But it's too difficult to crack. Your fake claws will fight back at ssswift.<hpage>Good, so you can feel my skills just like mine and yours. So let's call a truce, and we'll move on with our lives after we meet.

original_en_text: Stray one! Things were already falling grim when last you left. Now it’s worse! The whole world quaking and wailing, and all stretched through with blackened strands! <page>This wouldn’t be your doing, by chance?<hpage>...I am in part responsible, though know this outcome was not my intent, and that I shall work to calm it.<page>I knew it! Course it had to be you. Here I was, hoping you’d bring a shake up. Instead you’ve brought an ending!<page>Well, move it, I say! Get to your fixing. We’re all now suffering for the scale your conflict... Maybe this time you act towards calmer conclusions, aye?
original_zh_text: 浪游者！上次分别时外面就够乱的了，现在更糟！到处都在晃荡，到处都是黑丝！<page>该不会是你干的吧？<hpage>……我确实有责任，但这结果不在我预料之内。我定会平息这场灾祸。<page>就知道！盼着你能搅局，没想到竟是末日！<page>赶紧的！快去补救。大伙都在遭罪……下次闹腾的时候悠着点行不？
translated_text: 流浪者！当你上次离开时，事情变得很严重。现在更糟了！整个世界都在颤抖，都在哭泣，到处都是黑色的丝线！<page>你没有这么做，是吗？<hpage>...我对此负有部分责任，但我知道这个结果不是我的本意，我会努力让它平静下来。<page>我就知道！当然是你了。我在这里，希望你能带来一个冲击。相反，你带来了一个结局！<page>好吧，动起来，我说！开始修复。由于你们冲突的规模，我们现在都在受苦……也许这次你会走向一个更平静的结论，是吗？
secondary_translated_text: Wanderers! When you last left, things got serious. Now it's even worse! The whole world is shaking, crying, and black threads are everywhere!<page>You didn't do that, did you?<hpage>... I am partly responsible for this, but I know this result was not my intention and I will try to calm it down.<page>I knew it! Of course it's you. I'm here, hoping you can bring an impact. Instead, you brought an ending!<page>All right, move it, I say! Start repairing. We are all suffering now due to the scale of your conflict... maybe this time you will move towards a calmer conclusion, will you?

original_en_text: <hpage>In time, child, I may provide the meats, though first I must acquire tools appropriate to the task. My current arsenal will not grant your wish in full.<page>Sssss... Time, yesss?... Then usss too will grow?... Sharpsss clawss... hard shell... like siblings goness...
original_zh_text: <hpage>小不点，过阵子兴许能给你血肉，不过得先找合适的工具。我手上的家伙不够用。<page>咝……要等？……到时候我也能长壮了？……爪子尖利……甲壳坚硬……像离我而去的兄弟姐妹一样……
translated_text: <hpage>孩子，随着时间的推移，我可能会提供肉类，尽管首先我必须获得适合这项任务的工具。我目前的武器库无法完全满足您的愿望。<page>嘶嘶声.时间，对吧？那么usss也会成长吗？锋利的爪子。坚硬的外壳。就像兄弟姐妹离开一样。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Boy, over time, I may serve meat, although first I must obtain tools suitable for the task. My current arsenal cannot fully satisfy your wishes.<page>A hissing sound. Time, right? So will usss grow too? Sharp claws. Hard shell. Just like brothers and sisters leaving.

original_en_text: Yesss... Now. We’sss too growsss... feastsss... Be like brood... gone... all... far gone...<hpage>Good luck to you, small one. If this land can be saved, I hope you come to find your place within it.
original_zh_text: 咝——好……现在。我也能长壮了……也能大吃特吃了……像其他兄弟姐妹一样……远走高飞的兄弟姐妹……<hpage>祝你好运，小不点。若是我能拯救这片土地，希望你到时候能找到自己归属。
translated_text: 是的现在我们已经太长大了。盛宴。就像养小鸡一样。离开...所有...很远。<hpage>祝你好运小家伙如果这片土地能够被拯救，我希望你能在其中找到自己的位置。
secondary_translated_text: Yes, we are too grown up now. Feast. It's like raising chickens. Leave... All... Very far.<hpage>Good luck, little guy. If this land can be saved, I hope you find your place in it.

original_en_text: <hpage>I will not offer my own organs, tall one, though I may bring the meat of others slain.<page>Good ssspidderr! Ssskewered. Ssshredded. Ssseared! Bring it all. Much will be needed, enough to sssate my brood to come.<hpage>Your demand is extensive. First, I must acquire tools appropriate to the task. My current arsenal will not grant your wish in full.<page>My brood has not long till hatching, ssssspiddderrr. Find your tools. Do your duty ssswift, and you shall ssee reward for the sssslaughterrr.
original_zh_text: <hpage>猎手，我不会为你献上自己的内脏，但也许我能带给你其他猎物的血肉。<page>咝——！好啊，小蜘蛛！串烧、撕碎、炙烤！统统带来。我的孩子需要大量血肉才能饱足。<hpage>你的要求可不简单。我需要先找到合适的工具，眼下手中的家伙可不够用。<page>我的孩子就快孵化了，咝——小蜘蛛……动作快点，找到你需要的工具，完成我的需求，必有重谢。
translated_text: <hpage>我不会牺牲我自己的器官，高大的器官，虽然我可以带来其他被杀的人的肉。<page>好ssspidderr！嘶嘶声。嘘。嘘，嘘！把它都带来。我需要很多东西来支持我即将到来的后代。<hpage>您的需求是广泛的。首先，我必须获得适合该任务的工具。我目前的武器库无法完全满足您的愿望。<page>我的孩子即将孵化，ssspidddderr。找到您的工具。履行您作为ssssssslatterr的职责，您将获得ssssssslatterr的奖励。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I will not sacrifice my own organs, tall organs, although I can bring the flesh of other people who have been killed.<page>Good ssspidderr! hissing. Shh. Shh, shh! Bring it all. I need a lot to support my future generations.<hpage>Your needs are extensive. First, I had to obtain the right tools for the task. My current arsenal cannot fully satisfy your wishes.<page>My child is about to hatch, ssspidddderr. Find your tool. Fulfill your responsibilities as ssslatterr and you will be rewarded by ssslatterr.

original_zh_text: 咔啊克 赫。恩卡。乌克特 尔克。

original_en_text: That beast! What wicked punishments are sent to test us! Why must we pilgrims, who have done no evil, be so tormented?<page>Tell me, where is it written? This law that says we must suffer every hardship just to earn the merest hope of happiness?<hpage>Wild lands like these are ruled by instinct, not laws. You must rely on your own strength and skill to survive.<page>I have neither! If what you say is true, I may as well crawl outside and let myself be devoured right now. Save myself some worry!<hpage>Do as you wish, but I think perhaps you underestimate yourself. To climb this far and survive here so long is a task beyond most of your fellow pilgrims.<page>Hmph. I’m no better than any of them. It’s only luck that has gotten me this far, and it’s on luck that I shall continue to rely.
original_zh_text: 那头凶兽！肯定是降罪试炼！我们朝圣者未行恶事，为何要遭此折磨？<page>告诉我，哪本法典写着必须历尽苦难才配期盼幸福？<hpage>荒野奉行本能，而非法典。想要生存，唯有靠自己的能耐。<page>自己的能耐？如果真是如此，不如出去喂了野兽，省得煎熬！<hpage>请便。但别低估了自己，能攀登至此，你已强过多数同袍。<page>哼，我与他们无异。全凭运气苟活，往后也指望运气。
translated_text: 那个野兽！有什么邪恶的惩罚在考验我们！为什么我们这些从未做过错事的朝圣者会遭受这样的折磨？<page>告诉我，写在哪里？这部法律是否规定我们必须忍受一切苦难才能赢得幸福的希望？<hpage>这样的荒野是由本能而不是法律决定的。你必须依靠自己的力量和技能才能生存。<page>我两者都没有！如果你说的是真的，我还不如现在爬出去被吞没。别让我担心了！<hpage>适合你自己，但我认为你低估了自己。爬这么远并在这里生存这么久是大多数朝圣者无法完成的任务。<page>哈你我并不比他们中的任何人好。我能走到这里是因为运气，而且我将继续依靠运气。
secondary_translated_text: That beast! What evil punishment is testing us! Why do we pilgrims who have never done anything wrong suffer like this?<page>Tell me, where is it written? Does this law stipulate that we must endure all suffering to win the hope of happiness?<hpage>Such wilderness is determined by instinct rather than law. You must rely on your own strength and skills to survive.<page>I have neither! If what you say is true, I might as well climb out and be swallowed up now. Don't make me worry!<hpage>It suits you, but I think you underestimate yourself. Climbing this far and surviving here for so long is a task beyond the reach of most pilgrims.<page>You and I are no better than any of them. I got here because of luck, and I will continue to rely on it.

original_en_text: Suit yourself, stray one. Ascending above these fields will prove a tough task without my talent.
original_zh_text: 随你便，浪游者。没我的手艺，想攀出这片荒野可不是件容易的事。
translated_text: 随你便，流浪者。如果没有我的才华，超越这些领域将是一项艰巨的任务。
secondary_translated_text: Suit yourself, wanderer. Without my talent, transcending these areas would be a daunting task.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir pilgrim, I bring supplies from Bellhart, for the aid of travellers who pass this waystation.<page>Such service... It seems our prayers do not go completely unheard. Many a small wish will be granted by these supplies.
original_zh_text: <hpage>旅者，我带钟心镇的物资来援助此驿站。<page>这份恩赐……看来圣堡仍能回应我等祈祷。这些补给能实现许多小愿。
translated_text: <hpage>朝圣者爵士，我从伯哈特带来了物资来帮助通过这个中转站的乘客。<page>这种服务。看来我们的祈祷并没有被完全忽视。很多小愿望都可以通过这些物资实现。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Sir Pilgrim, I have brought supplies from Burhart to help passengers passing through this transfer station.<page>this service. It seems that our prayers have not been completely ignored. Many small wishes can be realized through these materials.

original_en_text: Would you gift organs for my brood, sssppiidderr? Upon first waking my children will be consumed with craving.
original_zh_text: 咝——要献出你的内脏喂我的孩子们吗，小蜘蛛？他们睁眼后可饿得慌，急需饱餐一顿。
translated_text: sssppiidderr，你会把器官捐献给我的孩子吗？当我第一次醒来时，我的孩子们就会被渴望吞没。
secondary_translated_text: sssppiidderr, will you donate your organs to my children? When I first woke up, my children would be swallowed by longing.

original_en_text: <hpage>I had promised organs for your mother, child. Though she has passed, I would provide them to you, if some small reward were traded?<page>The meatsss?... For ussss?... Yesss, hunter! We have giftssss... Clawsss long...<page>Bring meatssss... Givess meatsss... Usss’s wantss grow sssstrong... much... Be like siblingsss, sharp, hard...
original_zh_text: <hpage>孩子，我答应过给你母亲送来脏器血肉。她虽死了，你若是肯给我点报酬，我可以转送给你。<page>咝——血肉？……给我？……好啊，猎手！我有宝贝……长长的爪子……<page>咝——带血肉来……给我血肉……我要变强壮……像我的兄弟姐妹一样……壳硬爪利……
translated_text: <hpage>儿子，我答应过你母亲的器官。即使她死了，我会把它们交给你来换取一些小小的奖励吗？<page>肉？。对于ussss？..是的，猎人！我们有礼物。爪子很长。<page>带肉来。免费肉类。乌斯的愿望越来越强烈。更多...就像兄弟姐妹一样，敏锐，坚强……
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Son, I promised your mother's organs. Even if she died, would I give them to you in exchange for some small reward?<page>Meat?. For ussss?.. Yes, hunter! We have gifts. Long claws.<page>Bring the meat. Free meat. Uz's desire became stronger and stronger. more... Just like brothers and sisters, sharp, strong...

original_en_text: Even us’sss... Now we’sss too grow... Fiercesss... Hard...<page>We’sss becomesss hunter too...
original_zh_text: 咝——就连我……现在也能长壮了……变得凶猛起来……坚硬起来……<page>咝——我也要成为猎手……
translated_text: 甚至我们。现在我们长大了。帅哥。难。<page>我们也是公主猎人……
secondary_translated_text: Even us. Now we are grown up. Handsome. difficult.<page>We are also princess hunters…

original_en_text: I’m loath to spoil the surprise, but curiosity begs me to ask. Do you know why they pursue you? Those Citadel bugs?<hpage>No certainty, but I’ve a strong suspicion...<hpage>They hunt me for my nature. For the Silk produced within my shell.<page>Ahh ha! Truth, no doubt! In Pharloom, yours is a rare skill, prized beyond measure, to channel one’s soul within a thread. Soul and Silk inseparably linked.<page>It is a skill almost lost from Pharloom. Those old Weavers shared it, but they’re long dead now.<hpage>There is another alive in this kingdom that shares my nature, or some part of it. I’ve seen Silk similar to my own. It snares the shells of those upon the roads.<hpage>I’ve seen it wrap them, possess them whole. There is will within that thread, one that seems to come from somewhere above us. The Citadel...<page>Hmmmm... Good, sharp sight you’ve got. That Citadel... All roads towards and all answers waiting, and a long climb up there m’dear.<page>Now! It’s time you get going! Your style and your Silk sure are fine, but stay too long and you’ll only be trouble for me!
original_zh_text: 我本来不想多嘴，但实在好奇，圣堡的虫为何追你？<hpage>不确定，但我怀疑……<hpage>它们觊觎我甲壳产出灵丝的能力。<page>哈！肯定是这样！在纺络，以魂注丝是无价神技，让魂与丝成为一体。<page>这技艺近乎失传。曾经的织者倒是会，如今早死绝了。<hpage>此地尚存一虫与我同源，曾见到它用相似灵丝缠缚朝圣者。<hpage>用丝线操纵空壳，且其中藏有源自高处的意志，定是圣堡……<page>嗯……你眼力不错！圣堡啊……答案都在那条路上，慢慢攀吧姑娘。<page>好了，你该走了！虽你长得英姿飒爽，但身负灵丝，久留只会给我惹祸！
translated_text: 我不想破坏这个惊喜，但好奇心让我问道。你知道他们为什么追求你吗？那些城堡虫子？<hpage>不确定，但我强烈怀疑.<hpage>他们追捕我是谁。为了我壳中产生的丝绸。<page>啊哈！事实，毫无疑问！在Pharloom中，你的技能是一种价值难以估量的稀有技能，可以引导一个人的灵魂进入线程。灵魂与丝绸密不可分。<page>这是法鲁几乎失去的技能。那些老韦弗分享了它，但他们现在早已死了。<hpage>这个王国中还有另一个活着的人与我的本性相同，或者是其中的一部分。我见过与我相似的丝绸。它会困住路上人的贝壳。<hpage>我见过它包裹着他们，完全拥有他们。在这条线索中有意志，它似乎来自我们上面的某个地方。城堡<page>嗯.你的视力很好很敏锐。城堡所有的道路都在等待，所有的答案都在等待，亲爱的，还有很长的路要走。<page>现在！你该走了！你的款式和丝绸确实很好，但是呆得太久只会给我带来麻烦！
secondary_translated_text: I didn't want to ruin the surprise, but curiosity made me ask. Do you know why they pursue you? Those castle bugs?<hpage>Not sure, but I strongly doubt it.<hpage>They hunted me for who I was. For the silk produced in my shell.<page>Aha! The truth, no doubt! In Pharloom, your skill is a rare skill of immeasurable value that can guide a person's soul into threads. Soul and silk are inseparable.<page>This is a skill that Faro has almost lost. Those old Weavers shared it, but they are long dead by now.<hpage>There is another living person in this kingdom who shares my nature, or is part of it. I have seen silk similar to mine. It traps the shells of people on the road.<hpage>I've seen it wrap around them and have them completely. There is will in this thread, and it seems to come from somewhere above us. Castle<page>hmm. Your vision is very good and sharp. All roads in the castle are waiting, all answers are waiting, dear, there is still a long way to go.<page>Now! It's time for you to go! Your style and silk are really good, but staying too long will only bring trouble to me!

original_en_text: She keepsss?.. We’sss wants meatsss, hunter... We’sss need strengthsss... As much as othersss... As much as mothersss...
original_zh_text: 你要自己留着吗？……我要血肉，猎手……我要变壮……和其他兄弟姐妹一样……和母亲一样……
translated_text: 她保留着它？..我们想要肉，猎人。我们需要力量。就像其他人一样。就像妈妈一样。
secondary_translated_text: She kept it?.. We want meat, hunter. We need strength. Just like everyone else. Just like mom.

original_en_text: Memories only weigh us down, but some pilgrims still cling to them with unseemly devotion. This memory isn’t yours, but perhaps you could find some use for it?
original_zh_text: 记忆只会徒增负累，但有些同袍偏偏紧抓不放。这虽不是你的记忆，但或许有用？
translated_text: 回忆只能让我们感到沉重，但有些朝圣者仍然执着于他们的无私奉献。这个记忆不是你的，但也许你可以找到它的用处？
secondary_translated_text: Memories can only make us feel heavy, but some pilgrims are still obsessed with their selfless dedication. This memory is not yours, but maybe you can find use for it?

original_zh_text: 喀 乌奥肯。克尔卡 提赫。

original_en_text: Us needssss meatsss... hunter... finds... bringsss... So us’sss small does grow like siblingssss...
original_zh_text: 咝——我需要血肉……猎手……找来……带来……让我这个小个子也能长成其他兄弟姐妹那样……
translated_text: 我们需要肉。猎人找到了。带来。所以我们的孩子真的像兄弟姐妹一样长大。
secondary_translated_text: We need meat. The hunter found it. Bring. So our children really grow up like brothers and sisters.

original_en_text: The meatssss... smellsss... You bring?... To grow usss like siblings, strong in ssshellsss?
original_zh_text: 咝——血肉味……你带来了？……能让我像兄弟姐妹那样，长出强壮的甲壳？
translated_text: 肉.闻起来。你带来了？像兄弟姐妹一样长大，你坚强吗？
secondary_translated_text: meat. Smells. You brought it? Growing up like brothers and sisters, are you strong?

original_en_text: <hpage>Several of my tools can prepare the meats as you request, child. In time, I shall see your wish granted.<page>Sssss... Usss too will grow?... Sharps claws... hard shell... like siblings goness...
original_zh_text: <hpage>小不点，我带的工具恰好能按你的要求处理血肉。我会尽快让你吃上肉。<page>咝……我也能长壮了？……爪子尖利……甲壳坚硬……像离我而去的兄弟姐妹一样……
translated_text: <hpage>孩子，我有几种工具可以根据你想要的方式准备肉类。假以时日，我会看到你的愿望成真。<page>嘶嘶……Ussss也会增长吗？锋利的爪子。坚硬的外壳。就像兄弟姐妹离开一样。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Boy, I have several tools to prepare meat the way you want. Over time, I will see your wish come true.<page>Hiss... Will Ussss grow too? Sharp claws. Hard shell. Just like brothers and sisters leaving.

original_en_text: Just a moment, dear, before you scurry off!
original_zh_text: 等一等，亲爱的，先别急着走！
translated_text: 亲爱的，等一下，然后你快点离开！
secondary_translated_text: Honey, wait a minute, and then you leave quickly!

original_en_text: You’ve done well, sspppidderrr. Upon these fine meats my children will gorge and grow. <hpage>And better the organs of others than they feed upon your own, yes?<page>Sssssskkkk... One should not be surprised, for the sssspppider to perceive the truth of my requests. <hpage>A child of one like you, many times I’ve seen it similar. They will be born hungry, with sharp tooth and claw.<hpage>In their birth-craze, your own meat would delight as much as another bugs. This feast is distraction, in hope to save your shell.<page>Is that shameful? A mother who would not sacrifice herself for her children to grow sssstttrong? Is it wrong to want? To witnesss their first flight, their first hunt. To see them kill, and grow? <hpage>Your choice is your own, tall mother. You won’t be judged by me. I’ve seen enough sacrifice. I’ve no love for the act.
original_zh_text: 干得漂亮，小蜘蛛。咝——我的孩子们会啃着这些血肉长得壮壮实实。<hpage>用别的虫的内脏喂养总比用你自己的强，对吧？<page>咝……蜘蛛能看穿我的算盘倒也不稀奇。<hpage>像你这样的母亲生的孩子，我见得多了。他们生下来就张着嘴要进食，牙尖爪利的。<hpage>他们要是饿疯了，你的肉会和别的虫子一样香。现在这顿大餐算是替你保命了。<page>咝——不愿意舍身喂子的母亲，这丢脸吗？谁不想看他们第一次扑腾翅膀，第一次捕猎？<hpage>这是你自己的选择，高个子，我不评判。我已经见过够多牺牲了，没兴趣掺和。
translated_text: 你做得很好，sspppidderr。我的孩子们会吃着这种美味的肉长大。<hpage>吃别人的器官总比吃自己的器官好吧？<page>Sssssskkk。人们不应该对ssssspppspider感到惊讶。<hpage>我在像你这样的孩子身上见过很多次这种情况。它们生来就饥饿，牙齿锋利，爪子锋利。<hpage>在它们的诞生热潮中，你自己的肉会和任何其他昆虫一样令人愉悦。这场盛宴是为了转移注意力，希望拯救你的身体。<page>这可耻吗？一位不会为了孩子的成长而牺牲自己的母亲？想要它有错吗？为了纪念他们的第一次飞行，第一次狩猎。看着他们杀戮和成长？<hpage>你的选择是你自己的高大母亲。我不会评判你。我已经见过足够多的牺牲了。我不喜欢这个表演。
secondary_translated_text: You're doing well, sspppidderr. My children will grow up eating this delicious meat.<hpage>Eating other people's organs is better than eating your own, right?<page>Sssssskkk。People should not be surprised by ssssspppspider.<hpage>I've seen this happen many times with kids like you. They are born hungry, with sharp teeth and sharp claws.<hpage>In their birth craze, your own meat will be as pleasant as any other insect. This feast is a diversion in the hope of saving your body.<page>Is this shameful? A mother who would not sacrifice herself for the growth of her children? Is it wrong to want it? To commemorate their first flight and first hunting. Watching them kill and grow?<hpage>Your choice is your own tall mother. I will not judge you. I've seen enough sacrifices. I don't like this performance.

original_en_text: Pale beast... bringing ruin... we had sensed it... you writing, harsh, our final fate...<page>If power... you come seeking... mine is faded.... mortal... time taken...<hpage>Great one, I come not to see you as you are, rather I would know you as were, before the pale monarch, when once your heart beat bright and brave.<page>Kcha! Then see me... beast... Those distant memories... Mine once was power... wild... proud...
original_zh_text: 苍白异兽……携灾而至……吾等早有预感……汝书写的，是斯卡尔的终章……<page>若力量……是汝所求……吾已衰微……凡躯……时日无多……<hpage>蚁后，我来此并非为了觐见，而是追忆您昔年的英姿。在苍白君主降临前，当您的英勇之心仍炽烈搏动之时。<hpage>喀嚓！……那就见证……异兽……久远记忆……吾曾执掌……狂野……伟力……傲然……
translated_text: 苍白的野兽带来毁灭。我们感觉你写的，残酷，我们最终的命运……<page>如果权力。你来找它，我的已经褪色了普通人花点时间<hpage>伟人，我来不是为了看看你的真实面目，而是为了在苍白的君主面前认识你，当你的心曾经明亮而勇敢地跳动的时候。<page>咔嚓！那就来见我。野兽。那些遥远的记忆曾经是我的力量。野外自豪...
secondary_translated_text: The pale beast brings destruction. We feel that what you wrote, cruelty, our ultimate destiny...<page>If power. You come to find it, mine has faded, ordinary people take some time<hpage>Great man, I have not come to see your true colors, but to know you in front of the pale monarch, when your heart once beat bright and bravely.<page>Crack! Then come and see me. Beast. Those distant memories were once my strength. Proud in the wild...

original_en_text: My strength... my power... Could you claim it, pale beast? Are you so strong?...<hpage>Let us find out together, great one...
original_zh_text: 吾之伟力……吾之权柄……汝可承载？苍白异兽……汝够格否？……<hpage>共同见证吧，伟大的蚁后……
translated_text: 我的力量。我的力量。你能认领吗，苍白的野兽？你有那么强吗？<hpage>让我们一起找出答案，太好了。
secondary_translated_text: My power. My power. Can you claim it, pale beast? Are you that strong?<hpage>Let's find out together, great.

original_en_text: Bringsss meatsss... Hunter... many...<page>Usss too be strong... large... one of brood...
original_zh_text: 带血肉给我……猎手……多带些……<page>咝——我也要变壮……变强……像我兄弟姐妹那样……
translated_text: 带肉来。猎人更多...<page>我们也必须坚强。大...孩子
secondary_translated_text: Bring the meat. Hunters More...<page>We must also be strong. Big... children

original_en_text: <hpage>This is fine work, Seamstress. Your modifications will aid me greatly.<page>You’re quite welcome, dear. I’ve rare opportunity to practice such intricate sewing, and a warrior sort like you will be able to properly appreciate my additions.<page>Float away now, stray one, and do try not to die. I’d rather not have my hard work go to waste.
original_zh_text: <hpage>手艺很精湛，织女虫。这改装对我有很大帮助。<page>亲爱的，你太客气了！难得施展我这手艺，更难得有你这战士能懂欣赏。<page>快走吧，尽量别死，我可不爱白忙活。
translated_text: <hpage>这是缓解压力的好工作。你的改变对我会有很大的帮助。<page>非常欢迎，亲爱的。我有难得的机会练习如此复杂的缝纫，像你这样的战士将能够充分欣赏我的加入。<page>现在就消失吧，流浪者，尽量不要死。我宁愿不让我的辛勤工作白费。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>This is a good job to relieve stress. Your changes will help me a lot.<page>Very welcome, dear. I have a rare opportunity to practice such complex sewing, and a soldier like you will be able to fully appreciate my joining.<page>Disappear now, wanderer, and try not to die. I would rather not let my hard work go to waste.

original_en_text: Have you seen it... small sspidderrr.... that cruel Citadel, weighing heavy atop tthissss land?<page>My hunger may seem great, but that place... that is consumption unending...
original_zh_text: 咝——小蜘蛛，我仍能闻到你的紧张感。我还是让你觉得危险？<hpage>这片土地处处危机，高个子，我自然得保持戒备。你的利爪看起来没少沾血。<page>咝——我乐于杀戮，但也只是为了喂饱自己，以及我即将出生的孩子们。<page>那座圣堡压在这片土地之上。咝——那地方的“饥饿”与我的相比，可算是个无底洞。
translated_text: 你见过吗。小蜘蛛。那座残酷的城堡是否给这片土地带来了沉重的负担？<page>我的饥饿感似乎很强烈，但那个地方..那是无休止的消费.
secondary_translated_text: Have you seen it. Little spider. Has that cruel castle placed a heavy burden on the land?<page>My hunger seemed strong, but the place.. It's endless consumption.

original_en_text: We pilgrims provide for each other, living or dead. Sharing is a sign of devotion, particularly for those who give.
original_zh_text: 朝圣者互帮互助，生死不论。分享是信仰的表现，无私奉献更是虔信。
translated_text: 我们朝圣者互相照顾，无论是生是死。分享是奉献精神的标志，尤其是对于那些付出的人来说。
secondary_translated_text: We pilgrims take care of each other, whether in life or death. Sharing is a sign of dedication, especially for those who give.

original_en_text: You stay, ssppidderrr? My brood needsss meat, much.. the organsss of othersss, or would you instead offer your own?<page>Gift a sshhell’s warm insidess as sweet feast for my brood’sss birth-meal?
original_zh_text: 还在呢，小蜘蛛……？咝——我的孩子需要血肉，很多血肉……我需要其他虫子的内脏，或者你献上你自己的？<page>咝——要不把你热乎的内脏当作我孩子们的破卵宴？
translated_text: 你为什么不留下来呢，斯皮德雷尔？我的孩子们非常需要肉。别人的器官仍然是你自己的器官<page>给我的孩子一顿温暖的包容作为一顿甜蜜的盛宴？
secondary_translated_text: Why don't you stay, Spedrell? My children need meat very much. Other people's organs are still your own organs<page>Give my children a warm meal of tolerance as a sweet feast?

original_en_text: You have them, sspiiddderrr! The smell is upon you, all those organs, rich prepared for feasssting.
original_zh_text: 咝——！你做到了，小蜘蛛！瞧你满身的腥气。这么多内脏，足够给我的孩子开荤了。
translated_text: 你有他们，斯皮德尔！气味就在你身上，所有这些器官都已为盛宴做好准备。
secondary_translated_text: You have them, Speedel! The smell is on you, and all these organs are ready for the feast.

original_en_text: Come to rest your weary body? The climb is agonising, and even the devout must mind their limits.<hpage>I’m impressed to find any without firm claw upon a weapon that could ascend so far.<page>Indeed. We’re lucky to have made it here. Luckier than many others. Or perhaps the difference between the lucky and unlucky is merely faith?<page>Now, while we rest, shall we make trade? If you have rosaries, I’ll take them gladly.
original_zh_text: 是来歇息的么？攀登苦不堪言，再虔诚也要量力而行。<hpage>你赤手空拳能攀登至此，倒是少见。<page>是啊，能到此地实属侥幸，比许多同袍要幸运。或许所谓运气不过是信念之差？<page>既然在这休息，可要做买卖？你有念珠的话，我很乐意交换。
translated_text: 来休息一下疲惫的身体吗？攀登是痛苦的，即使是虔诚的人也必须注意自己的极限。<hpage>我很惊讶地发现了一种没有强大爪子的武器，可以到达这么远。<page>的确.我们很幸运能够来到这里。比许多其他人都幸运。或者也许幸运者和不幸者之间的唯一区别是信仰？<page>现在，休息期间，我们可以达成协议吗？如果你有念珠，我很乐意接受。
secondary_translated_text: Come to rest your tired body? Climbing is painful, and even pious people must pay attention to their limits.<hpage>I was surprised to find a weapon without powerful claws that could reach this far.<page>indeed. We are very lucky to be here. Luckier than many others. Or maybe the only difference between the lucky and the unlucky is faith?<page>Now, during the break, can we reach an agreement? If you have rosary beads, I'd be happy to accept them.

original_en_text: Hunter... stayss... Shining claw... still... Does themsss help... seek?<page>Usss need meatsss, much, too... Hunter... Usss wants many... Seared... Skewered... Shredded...<page>Usss’s wantss grow sssstrong... much... Be like siblingsss, sharp, hard.
original_zh_text: 咝——猎手……你还在这儿……闪亮的爪子……我需要……帮助……<page>咝——我需要血肉，很多血肉……猎手……我要很多……烤的……串的……撕碎的……<page>咝——我要变壮……要像其他兄弟姐妹那样……壳硬爪利……
translated_text: 猎人斯塔德。闪亮的爪子。仍然...他们有帮助吗。寻找？<page>我们也非常需要肉。猎人乌斯想要很多。烘烤的。烤肉串。已经碎了。<page>乌斯的愿望越来越强烈。更多...就像兄弟姐妹一样，敏锐而坚强。
secondary_translated_text: Hunter Stad. Shining claws. Still... Are they helpful? Looking for?<page>We also need meat very much. Hunter Uus wants a lot. Baked. Kebabs. It's shattered.<page>Uz's desire became stronger and stronger. more... Just like brothers and sisters, sharp and strong.

original_en_text: Well, aren’t you a sight! No, don’t tell me! You’re as odd as they come.<page>Your poise! Your form! Are you hunted? Pursued? The Citadel would see a fine prize in you.<hpage>It is as you say, madam. Veiled bugs brought me to your land. I seek them now, for answers.<page>Ha! Fierce too! These are bleak times, but a powerful stray like you could certainly cause some change.<page>Well then! I’ve no love for that holy caste, and I do worry for this kingdom’s ailing state. If you’re seeking to settle a score, perhaps I can lend some aid?
original_zh_text: 瞧瞧这模样！让我猜猜，你不是这里的虫吧？<page>这仪态！这身姿！你正被追杀？被通缉？圣堡肯定很重视你。<hpage>如你所言，女士。覆面虫将我带来此地，我正在寻找它们。<page>哈！还挺凶！现在外面乱得很，你这般强悍的浪客肯定能搅出点动静。<page>正好！我也讨厌那群圣徒，也忧心王国的灾祸。你要找他们算账的话，或许我能帮衬？
translated_text: 好吧，你不是一个景象！不，别告诉我！你和他们一样奇怪。<page>你的举止！你的形式！你被追捕了吗？追击？城堡会视你为珍宝。<hpage>正如您所说，女士。面纱上的蠕虫将我带到了你的土地。我现在正在寻找他们并寻求答案。<page>哈！也很激烈！这是一个黯淡的时期，但像你这样强大的流浪者肯定会做出一些改变。<page>好了！我不爱那个神圣的种姓，我确实担心这个王国的糟糕状况。如果你想得分，也许我可以提供一些帮助？
secondary_translated_text: Well, you are not a sight! No, don't tell me! You are as strange as they are.<page>Your behavior! Your form! Are you being hunted? Pursuing? The castle will regard you as a treasure.<hpage>As you said, ma 'am. The worm on the veil brought me to your land. I am now looking for them and seeking answers.<page>Ha! It's also very intense! These are bleak times, but a powerful wanderer like you will definitely make some changes.<page>Okay! I do not love that sacred caste, and I do worry about the terrible state of the kingdom. If you want to score, maybe I can provide some help?

original_en_text: Hunter... Shining claw... Do not killsss... Mine is ssshell thin. Taste is poor...<page>Me’sss born not like siblingsss, themsss large and hard... All themsss did feasted and flew.<hpage>I see it clear, child. The tall mother’s meat has fed the brood fresh hatched.<hpage>It was a common fate that found her. Too common, perhaps...<page>Gone... the mother, her meatsss... and lifesss... for siblingss strong... not for usss so small... Neverss for usss...
original_zh_text: 猎手……闪亮的爪子……别杀我……咝……我的壳薄……肉柴……<page>我生来不像其他兄弟姐妹……咝——他们甲壳又大又硬……吃饱就飞走了。<hpage>看出来了，小不点。你母亲把自己的肉喂给了其他刚破卵的孩子。<hpage>她命该如此。或许……这就是她的宿命……<page>没了……母亲，她的血肉……和生命……养壮了兄弟姐妹……咝……没我的份……永远没有……
translated_text: 猎人闪亮的爪子。别叫我的很薄。味道很糟糕。<page>我生来就不像兄弟姐妹，他们又大又硬。每个人都享受着盛宴，飞了起来。<hpage>我看得很清楚，儿子。高妈妈的肉喂了刚孵化的小鸡。<hpage>找到她的是共同的命运。也许太普通了……<page>离开...妈妈，她的肉.和生活永远不要为我们。
secondary_translated_text: The hunter's shining claws. Don't call mine thin. It tastes terrible.<page>I was not born like brothers and sisters, they are big and hard. Everyone enjoyed the feast and flew.<hpage>I can see clearly, son. Mama Gao's meat was fed to the newly hatched chickens.<hpage>What found her was a common destiny. Maybe it's too ordinary...<page>Leave... Mom, her meat. And life should never be for us.

original_en_text: Pale beast... bringing ruin... we had sensed it... you writing harsh our final fate...<page>If power... you come seeking... mine is faded.... mortal... time taken...<hpage>Great one, I come not to see you as you are, rather I would have you recall what you were, before the pale monarch, when once your heart beat bright and brave.<hpage>That beating heart I would take, though know my intent is worthy.<hpage>I seek it only to save these lands, to break them free from this fatal sickness born of thread and void.<page>Kcha! If you may... beast... If you can... Mine once was power... wild... proud...
original_zh_text: 苍白异兽……携灾而至……吾等早有预感……汝书写的，是斯卡尔的终章……<page>若力量……是汝所求……吾已衰微……凡躯……时日无多……<hpage>蚁后，我来此并非为了觐见，而是追忆您昔年的英姿。在苍白君主降临前，当您的英勇之心仍炽烈搏动之时。<hpage>我欲取得那份搏动之心，还请您相信我的初衷磊落。<hpage>只为拯救这片土地，斩断丝咒与虚空的腐毒。<page>喀嚓！……若汝能……异兽……若汝可……吾曾执掌……狂野……伟力……傲然……
translated_text: 苍白的野兽带来毁灭。我们感受到你写作的残酷，我们最终的命运...<page>如果权力。你来找它，我的已经褪色了普通人花时间。<hpage>伟人，我来不是为了看看你是什么样子，而是为了提醒你，当你的心曾经在苍白的君主面前明亮而勇敢地跳动时，你是什么样子。<hpage>我愿意夺走那颗跳动的心，尽管我知道我的意图是值得的。<hpage>我寻求它只是为了拯救这些土地免受这种由线和虚空产生的致命疾病的侵害。<page>咔嚓！如果你可以的话。兽如果可以的话。我的曾经是权力。野外自豪...
secondary_translated_text: The pale beast brings destruction. We feel the cruelty of your writing, our ultimate destiny...<page>If power. You come to find it, mine has faded away, ordinary people spend time.<hpage>Great man, I have not come to see what you are like, but to remind you what you were like when your heart once beat bright and bravely in the presence of a pale monarch.<hpage>I am willing to take away that beating heart, even though I know my intentions are worth it.<hpage>I seek it only to save these lands from this deadly disease born of thread and void.<page>Crack! If you can. Beasts if they can. Mine used to be power. Proud in the wild...

original_en_text: <hpage>Your land’s fate has turned too dire, child. I cannot delay now to help you in your growth.<page>Sssss... So huntersss live... kill... only for selvesss... same as siblings...
original_zh_text: <hpage>你们的这片土地危在旦夕，小不点。时间紧迫，我没法帮你长壮实了。<page>咝……猎手为了生存……而杀戮……只顾自己……和离我而去兄弟姐妹没什么两样……
translated_text: <hpage>孩子，你的土地的命运变得太可怕了。我不能再拖延了，来帮助你成长。<page>嘶嘶声.所以亨特现场。杀...只允许自拍。就像兄弟姐妹一样。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Boy, the fate of your land has become too terrible. I can't delay any longer to help you grow.<page>A hissing sound. So Hunter was on the scene. Kill... Only selfies are allowed. Like brothers and sisters.

original_en_text: These fields are hot and harsh, a miserable place for we pilgrims, and just above are the dreary moors, a place once of abundance lost to falling silt and murky rain.<page>The lands in every direction punish us, but such is our test. Above it all, the Citadel shines, our destination and our reward...<page>I’ll make it there, you’ll see. I’ve easily earned my place in such a paradise.
original_zh_text: <page>再往上，是一片阴雨连绵的沼地，过去的丰饶都化作了泥泞。<page>凶险又容易迷失，是对朝圣者的试炼。而圣堡就在上方，既是终点亦是奖赏……<page>我肯定能抵达，等着瞧。入那乐园我当之无愧。
translated_text: 这些田野又热又严酷，对我们朝圣者来说是一个悲惨的地方。他们上方是沉闷的荒地，这个地方曾经因飘落的淤泥和浑浊的雨水而失去了富饶的土地。<page>四面八方的土地惩罚我们，但这是我们的考验。最重要的是，城堡闪闪发光，我们的目的地和我们的回报。<page>我会到达那里，你会看到的。我很容易就在这样的天堂里赢得了一席之地。
secondary_translated_text: These fields are hot and harsh, making them a miserable place for us pilgrims. Above them is a dreary wasteland, a place that once lost its rich land to falling silt and turbid rainwater.<page>The land on all sides punishes us, but this is our test. Most importantly, the castle shines, our destination and our reward.<page>I'll get there and you'll see it. I easily earned a place in such a paradise.

original_en_text: <hpage>Is this place your permanent home, sir, or do you only make camp?<page>We pilgrims have no home, there is only the path. We climb, and suffer, and are thusly judged.<page>I will linger here only a moment, for the sake of trade. Once I’ve gathered enough rosaries, I’ll be holy enough to ascend without fear.
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生可是以此地为家，还是暂驻？<page>朝圣者居无定所，唯有攀登圣途。前路如何，谁能晓得。<page>我小憩片刻就会启程。等攒够念珠，自能无畏登顶。
translated_text: <hpage>先生，这个地方是您永久的家吗？或者你只是露营？<page>我们朝圣者没有家，只有路。我们攀登、受苦，并因此受到评判。<page>为了贸易，我只会在这里呆一段时间。一旦我收集到足够的念珠，我就会变得足够神圣，可以毫无恐惧地升天。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Sir, is this place your permanent home? Or are you just camping?<page>We pilgrims have no home, only roads. We climb, suffer, and are judged for it.<page>For trade, I will only stay here for a while. Once I collect enough rosary beads, I will become sacred enough to ascend without fear.

original_en_text: <hpage>On the far side of Pharloom, I chanced upon a bug starkly similar to yourself.<hpage>From her home, her dress, and her skill, I am guessing you share some relation?<page>Aye. Met my sister, you did, in order at least. Glad to hear she’s still among the living.<page>Last to hold true to the old ways of the pin, she was... I sure ain’t sharing many of those violent values no more.<page>I’ll warn you, stray one, my sister might seem all cheer and charm, but buried beneath there’s the soul of a killer.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我在纺络另一端遇见过与你极为相似的虫。<hpage>根据其居所、衣着和技艺，也许是你血亲？<page>是，那是我的姐妹。她还活着呢？也挺好。<page>她是最后恪守古训的针匠……我早就不玩那套杀戮把戏了。<page>提醒你，我那姐妹看着亲切，骨子里可是杀胚。
translated_text: <hpage>在法勒姆的另一边，我遇到了一个和你一模一样的虫子。<hpage>从她的家、她的衣服、她的技术来看，我猜你们有什么关系吧？<page>是的，你见过我妹妹，至少按顺序是这样。很高兴听到她还活着。<page>最后一个坚持旧别针方法的人，她是.我绝对不会再分享那些暴力价值观了。<page>我警告你，流浪汉，我姐姐可能看起来快乐而迷人，但她内心深处隐藏着杀手的灵魂。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>On the other side of Farham, I met a bug exactly like you.<hpage>Judging from her home, her clothes, and her technology, I guess you have some relationship?<page>Yes, you met my sister, at least in order. It's good to hear she's still alive.<page>The last person to stick to the old pin method, she was. I will never share those violent values again.<page>I warn you, hobo, my sister may seem happy and charming, but deep down she hides the soul of a killer.

original_en_text: You would deny my brood their strength, ssspiidderr? A cruel creature you are. Surely your sssmall shell needs hardly so much?
original_zh_text: 你准备饿着我的孩子吗，小蜘蛛？咝——心肠够硬啊。不过，你这小身板能独吞这么多？
translated_text: 你会否认我孩子们的力量吗，ssspiidderr？你是一个残酷的生物。你确定你的sssmall shell不需要这么多吗？
secondary_translated_text: Would you deny the power of my children, ssspiidderr? You are a cruel creature. Are you sure your sssmall shell doesn't need so much?

original_en_text: I’ll string your rosaries tight, for a modest fee. It’s the safest way to keep them close.
original_zh_text: 分我一些念珠，我帮你把它们串牢。贴身保管最稳妥。
translated_text: 我会把你的念珠系紧。不贵。这是让他们靠近的最安全的方法。
secondary_translated_text: I'll tie your rosary tightly. Not expensive. This is the safest way to get them close.

original_en_text: Uoohhh... Sister, my aching shell’s close to breaking. My voice weakens... I can hardly sing a word.<hpage>I fear the path ahead will be no easier for you, ma’am. If you can not abandon your pilgrimage, you should at least rest well before continuing.<page>Ahh... but impurities stalk our every step, sister. If we rest too long, they shall catch us. So... so it is sung...
original_zh_text: 啊……姐妹，我的甲壳快撑不住了……嗓子也哑……唱不动圣歌了……<hpage>前路只会更加凶险，女士。若不愿放弃朝圣，至少养足精神再走。<page>唉……可邪秽如影随形，歇久了必被追上……圣训……是这么唱的……
translated_text: 啊...姐姐，我的痛苦外壳即将破裂。我的声音减弱了。我几乎无法唱一句话。<hpage>女士，我担心您前面的路不会更容易。如果无法放弃朝圣之旅，至少应该休息一下再继续。<page>啊...但杂质伴随着我们的每一步，姐姐。如果我们休息太久，他们会抓住我们的。所以...所以就唱了.
secondary_translated_text: Ah... Sister, my shell of pain is about to burst. My voice weakened. I can hardly sing a word.<hpage>Ma 'am, I'm afraid the road ahead will not be easier. If you can't give up the pilgrimage, you should at least take a break before continuing.<page>Ah... But impurities accompany us every step of the way, sister. If we rest too long, they will catch us. So... So I sang it.

original_en_text: That golden knight’s out there, sister, cutting down the lost, keeping us safe.<page>Reckon this place would’ve already been overrun if not for them’n their noble blades.
original_zh_text: 小姐，那位金甲骑士在外面斩杀着被诅咒者，保护我们的安全。<page>没有他那伟大的刺刃，这地方早就败落了。
translated_text: 姐姐，黄金骑士就在那里，摧毁迷失的人，保护我们的安全。<page>如果不是他们的刀锋，这里早就被占领了。
secondary_translated_text: Sister, the Golden Knight is there, destroying the lost and protecting our safety.<page>If it weren't for their blades, this place would have been occupied long ago.

original_en_text: Take some beads for your effort, miss bellringer, and know this sad lot’ll be survivin’ a little longer thanks to you.
original_zh_text: 敲钟者小姐，拿些念珠当作辛苦费吧。多亏你，这些可怜虫又能多苟活几天了。
translated_text: Bell Ringer小姐，为你的努力拿一些珠子吧。你知道，多亏了你，这种悲伤的命运将持续一段时间。
secondary_translated_text: Miss Bell Ringer, get some beads for your efforts. You know, thanks to you, this sad fate will last for some time.

original_en_text: S’done! The parts are prepared. I’m headin’ up now to set the heavy thing.<page>Even with the trap laid, best be guessin’ her on top won’t go down so simple. She’ll sense what’s comin’.<page>That blade of yours is gonna have to do its work ‘fore this thing can snap.<hpage>I’d expected such, sir. And I am ready. Set your snare. I shall attend shortly.
original_zh_text: 搞定了！部件准备完毕。我这就上去布置。<page>就算陷阱就位，顶上那位也不会乖乖受死。她能预感到潜在的危机。<page>你得先用你的针刃削弱她，这玩意才能触发。<hpage>我早有预料，先生。我已准备就绪。布置陷阱吧，我随后就到。
translated_text: 结束了！零件已准备好。我现在要上去安装重物了。<page>即使设置了陷阱，最好假设她不会简单地从上面掉下来。她会感觉到即将发生的事情。<page>在这个东西坏之前，你的刀片必须工作。<hpage>我预料到了，先生。我准备好了设置你的陷阱。我很快就会参加。
secondary_translated_text: It's over! Parts are ready. I'm going to go up and install heavy weights now.<page>Even if a trap is set, it's best to assume she doesn't simply fall from it. She will feel what is about to happen.<page>Before this thing breaks, your blade must work.<hpage>I expected it, sir. I'm ready to set your trap. I will participate soon.

original_en_text: Everything is falling apart, my dear one. Be sure to share your rosaries with me before it’s too late!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的，这里的一切都在分崩离析。趁现在还来得及，把你的念珠分我一些吧！
translated_text: 一切都在分崩离析，亲爱的。一定要在为时已晚之前与我分享你的念珠！
secondary_translated_text: Everything's falling apart, honey. Be sure to share your rosary beads with me before it's too late!

original_en_text: Lots of stories being sung about you, dear one. Gathering supplies, saving lost bugs... all sorts of good deeds!<page>Very clever to craft such a reputation for yourself. If you keep it up, you’ll fast become a legend among these simple sorts.<hpage>I’ve no interest in becoming one, madam. In my long life, I’ve known enough legends, watched them rise and fall and fade away, many times.<page>Is that so, dear? How humble you are! You should know though, this old pilgrim has her sight keenly trained on you! Nothing gets by old Jubilana!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的，现在好多虫子都在传颂你的事迹呢。收集物资、拯救迷失的虫子……全是各种各样的善举！<page>你很聪明，给自己打造了这么好的名声。这样下去，你很快就会成为这些单纯的家伙们心中的传奇啦。<hpage>女士，我可没兴趣成为什么传奇。在漫长的一生中，我见识过足够多的传奇，无数次看着他们崛起、衰落、消逝。<page>这样啊？亲爱的，你可真谦逊！不过你要知道，我这个老朝圣者可一直密切关注着你呢！什么都逃不过老朱比拉娜的眼睛！
translated_text: 亲爱的，关于你的故事有很多。收集物资并拯救丢失的昆虫。各种善行！<page>为自己创造这样的声誉是明智的。如果你坚持下去，你很快就会成为这些简单人物中的传奇。<hpage>我对成为其中的一员不感兴趣，女士。在我漫长的一生中，我了解了足够多的传奇，并多次目睹了它们的兴衰和衰落。<page>是这样吗，亲爱的？你多么谦虚啊！但你要知道，这位老朝圣者的眼睛正热切地注视着你！老朱比拉纳什么都没做成！
