secondary_translated_text: Honey, there are many stories about you. Collect supplies and rescue lost insects. All kinds of good deeds!<page>It would be wise to create such a reputation for yourself. If you stick with it, you will soon become a legend among these simple characters.<hpage>I'm not interested in being a part of it, ma 'am. In my long life, I have learned enough legends and witnessed their rise and fall many times.<page>Is that so, dear? How humble you are! But you must know that the eyes of this old pilgrim are watching you eagerly! Old Jubilana did nothing!

original_en_text: It was you, wasn’t it? Ringin’ that great clanging bell just now! Right when I’m tryin’ to get some sleep!
original_zh_text: 刚才敲钟的是你吧？叮呤咣啷的！我正要补觉呢！
translated_text: 是你，不是吗？那巨大的叮当声刚刚响起！正当我试图睡觉的时候！
secondary_translated_text: It was you, wasn't it? The huge jingling sound had just sounded! Just as I tried to sleep!

original_en_text: Please don’t go too far, sister. Right here’s the only safety you’ll find within this whole cursed place.
original_zh_text: 小姐，千万别走远。在这片诅咒之地，这儿是唯一安全的地方。
translated_text: 姐姐，请不要走得太远。这是你在这个被诅咒的地方找到的唯一安全的地方。
secondary_translated_text: Sister, please don't go too far. This is the only safe place you will find in this cursed place.

original_en_text: There must be a few more goodies to gather up here, and I don’t need you lingering around in the meantime. Blessings, and farewell!
original_zh_text: 我这会儿可没法跟你一块回去，路上可能还有好东西等着我捡漏呢。愿你蒙福，再见！
translated_text: 这里肯定有一些好东西可以收集，这段时间我不需要你到处闲逛。祝福，再见！
secondary_translated_text: There must be some good things to collect here, and I don't need you wandering around during this time. Blessings, goodbye!

original_en_text: Well, well! See here what your brash behaviour has wrought, bellringer!<page>Just as I predicted, this once-peaceful sanctuary is now crawling with all sorts. We’ve the beginnings of a shabby little settlement, all huddled around this old shrine!<hpage>These poor bugs, all are victims of the Citadel and its insidious attraction. This place draws them up, into its maw, only to consume them, utterly.<page>Aye, inside and out, s’nothing but a grand, gilded lie. Well, at least these few stragglers can enjoy a moment’s safety. Poor fools...
original_zh_text: 瞧瞧你干的好事，敲钟者！<page>跟我料想的一样，这座本来平静的钟殿现在挤满了各色杂碎！一帮可怜虫围着那旧钟搭了个窝！<hpage>这些可怜虫都是圣堡的牺牲品，被它的谎话骗来，最终将被吞噬殆尽。<page>哼哼，这里就是个外表光鲜的巨大骗局。不过至少这群蠢货能享受片刻安宁……
translated_text: 嗯，嗯！敲钟人，看看你傲慢的行为造成了什么！<page>正如我所料，这个曾经平静的避难所现在挤满了各种各样的人。我们建立了一个简陋的小定居点，都挤在这个古老的神殿周围！<hpage>这些可怜的昆虫是城堡及其阴险吸引力的受害者。这个地方吸引它们，进入它的胃，只是为了完全消耗它们。<page>是的，从内到外，这只是一个宏伟的、镀金的谎言。好吧，至少这些掉队的人可以享受到安全的时刻。可怜的傻瓜。
secondary_translated_text: Hmm, hmm! Bell ringer, look what your arrogant behavior has caused!<page>As I expected, this once-peaceful refuge is now crowded with all kinds of people. We built a humble little settlement, all crowded around this ancient shrine!<hpage>These poor insects are victims of the castle and its insidious appeal. This place attracts them, enters its stomach, just to consume them completely.<page>Yes, from the inside out, it's just a grand, gilded lie. Well, at least these stragglers can enjoy a moment of safety. Poor fool.

original_en_text: A precious order passed down by the holy conductors. Rare now to find these old texts, and rarer still to find a bug able to read ‘em.
original_zh_text: 神圣指挥官亲笔签发的珍稀敕令。如今，这种古卷已经很难找到了，而能读懂它们的虫子就更少见了。
translated_text: 来自神圣指挥家的宝贵命令。现在很难找到这些旧文本，更难找到可以阅读它们的错误。
secondary_translated_text: Valuable orders from the sacred conductor. It is now difficult to find these old texts, and even harder to find mistakes that can read them.

original_en_text: Ooh, what a turn-up! I’d feared t’was naught but meself left sane about these halls. Seems this old bug’s luck has not yet worn thin!<hpage>It was more than luck that saw me to you, madam. I promised the wish of bugs concerned for your safety.<hpage>I urge you to head their way now, beside the old bell, up and over.<hpage>A small settlement has formed there, and the bell, reawakened, seems to ward away the worst of the Citadel’s many dangers.<page>A settlement? In these long-haunted halls? Are you telling naughty little lies, dear one? Well, I suppose there’s not too much danger in going and seeing the truth for meself.
original_zh_text: 哎呀呀！还以为这鬼地方只剩我没发疯呢！看来我这只老婆子运气还没用完！<hpage>我能找到你可不只是运气使然，女士，我是受其他虫子所托来确保你的安全。请尽快前往上方那座古钟，同那些虫子会合。<hpage>那古钟周围形成了一个小型庇护所，重鸣的钟声似乎能驱散圣堡的大部分危险。<page>庇护所？在这闹鬼的圣堡？亲爱的，你在编故事吧？不过亲眼去看看也无妨~
translated_text: 哦，太棒了！我担心会没事，但我把注意力集中在这些大厅上。看来这老虫子的运气还没有耗尽！<hpage>女士，见到您我不仅仅是幸运。我同意了关心你安全的虫子的愿望。<hpage>我敦促你现在就朝他们的方向走，在古老的钟声旁边，然后上去。<hpage>那里已经形成了一个小定居点，钟声再次被唤醒，似乎能够抵御城堡众多危险中最严重的。<page>和解？在这些长长的闹鬼大厅里？亲爱的，你是在撒一个顽皮的小谎吗？嗯，我认为亲眼目睹真相并不太危险。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, great! I was afraid it would be okay, but I focused on these halls. It seems that this old bug's luck has not been exhausted yet!<hpage>Ma 'am, I'm not just lucky to meet you. I agreed with the wishes of the bug who cares about your safety.<hpage>I urge you to go in their direction now, next to the ancient bells, and then go up.<hpage>A small settlement had been formed there, and the bells were awakened again, seemingly able to withstand the most serious of the castle's many dangers.<page>Conciliation? In these long haunted halls? Honey, are you telling a naughty little lie? Well, I don't think it's too dangerous to see the truth with my own eyes.

original_en_text: Be away then, dear one, and leave me to gather up my trinkets and baubles.<page>If this settlement of yours truly has bugs settled safe, I’ll be able to make some lucrative trades. Blessings and farewell!
original_zh_text: 快走吧，亲爱的。别耽误我收拾我的宝贝货物。<page>要是你那庇护所真能安生做生意，老婆子我定能大赚一笔！愿你蒙福，再见！
translated_text: 亲爱的，那就走开吧，让我收拾我的小玩意。<page>如果您的和解确实安全地解决了错误，我可以进行一些有利可图的交易。祝福与告别！
secondary_translated_text: Honey, then go away and let me pack my gadgets.<page>If your settlement does safely resolve the error, I can make some profitable transactions. Blessings and farewell!

original_en_text: It’s feelin’ almost time, eh, bellringer? You and her who waits up there. That fated meeting won’t hold forever... Ready to make your play, to oust one ruler and claim her place?<hpage>I’ll not deny some part of me desires that outcome... Dominance, it seems, is baked deep in my blood, as too, no doubt, for the one up top.<hpage>And yet, another part resists... A part, over time, I find myself siding with more...<hpage>That part wishes not to claim a monarch’s mantle, rather it would see my freedom regained, and this kingdom’s bugs unshackled from their pale chains.<page>...Remarkable idea you’re speakin’ there, bellringer, a world cut free. Not a wish I’ve had much cause to hope on, serious like... but I ain’t so surprised to hear you speak it.<page>For all your helpin’, I been seein’ it clearer. You’ve still got the monarch in you, alright, and the glare of a Weaver, but the ambition... that’s wild different from both.<hpage>If you have already guessed to my desire, sir, and share some part of it, would you offer me aid in the conflict to come?<page>Aye... Maybe, yes. I can barely bear to tell it... But there’s an idea, one rare discussed, for fear of her up there sensin’ the score.<hpage>You have conceived a method, I take it? A way to see a monarch... removed? And me left free from claiming her station?<page>...We have, me and what remains of my family. S’a trap, of a sort, beyond the skill of this Citadel, one to go further than just her binding. You’d be just the hunter to set it, if you’re dare enough to try...
original_zh_text: 时机快到了吧，敲钟者？你和顶上那位迟早要碰面……准备好推翻旧主，自己上位了吗？<hpage>一定程度上，我不否认自己渴求这样的结果……我的统治欲深植血脉，和顶上那位一样。<hpage>但另一部分的我在抗拒……而这一部分正变得愈发强烈……<hpage>不想戴上王冠，只盼重获自由，让这王国的虫民挣脱苍白的枷锁。<page>一个解脱束缚的世界……真是难以想象。我虽然不敢奢望，但从你嘴里说出来倒不意外。<page>看你四处救援，我也明白了。你确有君王的血统和织者的锋芒，但野心……和两者都截然不同。<hpage>先生，既然你已了解我的想法，可否在即将到来的纷乱中助我一臂之力？<page>啊……或许可以吧。我有一计……但这是一招险棋，鲜少被提及，唯恐被顶上那位察觉。<hpage>也就是说……你有能让我弑君并自由脱身的方法？<page>我们……我那残存的家族确实有个计划。那是一种陷阱，一种超越圣堡的陷阱。而你恰好能成为安放这个陷阱的猎手——如果你胆子够大的话……
translated_text: 感觉时间快到了，嗯，敲钟人？你和她在那里等着。那次决定命运的会面不会永远持续下去……准备好开始推翻统治者并夺取她位置的计划了吗？<hpage>我不会否认我内心有一部分渴望这个结果.主导地位似乎深深植根于我的血液中，毫无疑问，这是为了在高层占据主导地位。<hpage>然而，另一部分人抵制了。部分原因是，随着时间的推移，我发现自己站在了更多的一边。<hpage>这些人并不想获得君主的衣钵，而是想看到我重获自由，看到这个王国的昆虫挣脱苍白的枷锁。<page>...你在那里说的是一个多么好的主意啊，贝尔林格，一个自由的世界。这不是我有太多理由希望的愿望，认真地喜欢。但听到你这么说我并不感到惊讶。<page>谢谢你的帮助，我看得更清楚了。你仍然有君主的气质，嗯，和织布工的光芒，但野心。这与两者完全不同。<hpage>先生，如果您猜到了我的愿望并分享了其中的一些愿望，您会在即将到来的冲突中为我提供援助吗？<page>是的也许，是的。我不忍心告诉它。但有一个想法，一个很少被讨论的想法，因为担心她会感受到其中的分数。<hpage>我想你已经想出办法了吧？一种见到君主的方式。删除？我没有占据她的位置吗？<page>...只有我和我的家人。这是某种陷阱，超出了这座城堡的技能，一个比她的枷锁更远的陷阱。如果你有勇气尝试，你就是一个设置它的猎人。
secondary_translated_text: It feels like the time is almost up, huh, bell ringer? You wait there with her. That fateful meeting will not last forever... Ready to start the plan to overthrow the ruler and seize her place?<hpage>I will not deny that there is a part of me that desires this result. Dominance seems to be deeply rooted in my blood, and there is no doubt that it is about dominating at the top.<hpage>However, other people resisted. Part of the reason was that over time, I found myself on more sides.<hpage>These people do not want to gain the mantle of a monarch, but want to see me regain my freedom and see the insects of this kingdom break free from their pale shackles.<page>... What a great idea you were talking about there, Bellinger, a free world. This is not a wish I have too many reasons to wish for, seriously like. But I'm not surprised to hear you say that.<page>Thanks for your help, I can see more clearly. You still have the temperament of a monarch, well, and the brilliance of a weaver, but ambition. This is completely different from the two.<hpage>Sir, if you had guessed my wishes and shared some of them, would you have provided assistance to me in the upcoming conflict?<page>Yes maybe, yes. I couldn't bear to tell it. But there was one idea, one that was rarely discussed, for fear that she would feel the score in it.<hpage>I assume you've figured it out? A way to meet the monarch. Delete? Didn't I take her place?<page>... Just me and my family. This is some kind of trap, beyond the skills of this castle, a trap farther than her shackles. If you have the courage to try, you are a hunter to set it up.

original_en_text: What’s that you got there, bellringer? Stole someone else’s soul for yourself?<hpage>You speak of the remnant I found in the muck-choked caves beside the Citadel? This is soul siphoned from a once powerful bug.<hpage>It’s only a thin mix now, but there is still some strength left. At peak, their talents must have been impressive.<page>Aye, they was that. I knew the bug, in ‘is prime, long time back. Braver’n most, and as little a fan of this Citadel as you yourself.<page>Went seekin’ alliance with those basic bugs of the swamps. Thought they’d both gain from the union... Scheming defiance, or some such stupidity!<page>Now he’s as dead as he was daft! Don’t go tryin’ ta make friends in Pharloom, bellringer. Nothin’ good comes of it.
original_zh_text: 敲钟者，你手里攥着什么？偷了谁的灵魂？<hpage>你是说我在圣堡旁边泥沼洞穴里找到的灵魂？这是从一只强大的甲虫身上剥离出来的。<hpage>虽然稀薄但尚存力量，全盛时期定非等闲之辈。<page>啊，没错！我认识那虫子，当年也算条好汉，而且跟你一样厌恶圣堡。<page>居然想联合沼泽平民搞叛乱！以为能互利共赢……真是蠢到家的反抗计划！<page>现在死得渣都不剩！所以说，在纺络交朋友准没好下场！
translated_text: 你拿着什么，敲钟人？窃取别人的灵魂为自己所用？<hpage>你是说我在城堡旁边泥泞的洞穴里发现的残骸吗？这是从曾经强大的昆虫中汲取的灵魂<hpage>现在只是一个弱组合，但仍然有一定的力量。在他们的巅峰时期，他们的才华一定令人印象深刻。<page>是的，他们是。我知道这个错误很久以前就是一个黄金时代。最勇敢的人并不像你那么喜欢这座城堡。<page>与沼泽中的这些基本细菌找到联盟。以为他们都可以从工会中受益。阴谋挑衅，或者类似的事情！<page>现在他死了，和以前一样愚蠢！不要试图在法鲁交朋友，敲钟人。没有好的结果。
secondary_translated_text: What are you holding, bell ringer? Stealing other people's souls for your own use?<hpage>You mean the wreckage I found in the muddy cave next to the castle? This is the soul drawn from once powerful insects<hpage>Now it is just a weak combination, but there is still some strength. At their peak, their talent must have been impressive.<page>Yes, they are. I know this mistake was a golden age long ago. The bravest people don't like this castle as much as you do.<page>Find an alliance with these basic bacteria in the swamp. Thought they could all benefit from the union. Conspiracy and provocation, or something like that!<page>Now he's dead, as stupid as ever! Don't try to make friends in Faro, bell ringer. There are no good results.

original_en_text: Hmph. Bellringer, you might think me a dullard, but I understand this place and have well-good senses.<page>Brought here, weren’t you? From beyond the border of our lands?<hpage>You are correct. The one who waits atop this Citadel... Through their hospitality, I arrived in this kingdom. I seek now to return that welcome in kind.<page>Hmph. Beastly words, them. Finely spoken, but beastly all the same.<page>I just pray you don’t bring any more unneeded pain down on the heads of these gormless little pilgrims...
original_zh_text: 哼，敲钟者，别当我是蠢货。我对这地方算是知根知底，而且我的预感往往很灵验。<page>你是从纺络境外被“请”来的吧？<hpage>没错。圣堡顶端那位邀请我来到这个王国……盛情难却，现在轮到我回礼了。<page>冠冕堂皇的野兽做派！话说得再漂亮，骨子里还是透出兽性！<page>只希望你别再牵连这些呆头呆脑的朝圣者……
translated_text: 哈你Bellringer，你可能认为我是个傻瓜，但我了解这个地方并且有很好的感官。<page>被带到这里了，不是吗？来自我们土地的边界之外？<hpage>你是对的在城堡顶上等待的人们.通过他们的热情款待，我来到了这个王国。现在我试图以同样的方式回报这种欢迎。<page>哈你它们是像野兽一样的词语。他说得很好，但他仍然很野蛮。<page>我只是祈祷你不要给这些愚蠢的小朝圣者带来更多不必要的痛苦。
secondary_translated_text: Hey Bellringer, you may think I'm a fool, but I know this place and have good senses.<page>Were brought here, weren't they? From beyond the boundaries of our land?<hpage>You were right about the people waiting on the top of the castle. Through their warm hospitality, I came to this kingdom. Now I try to repay that welcome in the same way.<page>Ha, you are words like beasts. He spoke well, but he was still barbaric.<page>I just pray that you don't cause more unnecessary pain to these stupid little pilgrims.

original_en_text: Found it all, did ya, bellringer? Then join me and let’s get to preppin’! I’ll be askin’ both your Silk and your claws ‘fore the construction.
original_zh_text: 找齐了是吧？那就快来搭把手！我需要你的灵丝和利爪参与构建。
translated_text: 都找到了，不是吗，敲钟人？那就开始和我一起准备吧！施工前我会询问你的丝绸和爪子的情况。
secondary_translated_text: Found it all, didn't you, bell ringer? Then start preparing with me! I will ask you about your silk and claws before construction.

original_en_text: The Citadel chose us, granted us a little more living. For what purpose though, who could say?
original_zh_text: 圣堡选择了我们，赏我们多活两天。谁知道是出于什么目的呢？
translated_text: 城堡选择了我们，给了我们更多的生命。但谁能说得清是出于什么目的呢？
secondary_translated_text: The castle chose us and gave us more lives. But who can say for what purpose?

original_en_text: If’n your wantin’ that trap made, you’d best get to collectin’. I’ll point you toward what’s needed, best as I can.
original_zh_text: 如果决定要把那个陷阱造出来，就快去收集所需的部分。我会告诉你需要做什么。
translated_text: 如果你想要那个陷阱，最好把它收集起来。我会尽我所能告诉你你需要什么。
secondary_translated_text: If you want that trap, you'd better collect it. I will do my best to tell you what you need.

original_en_text: Heard you did the savin’ for our dear merchant there? I’ve seen her about, sneaking and scrounging, even a’fore you was ringing that bell.<page>She’s a useful sort, but don’t let her age be foolin’, she’s still the sharpest mind for a deal.<page>Won’t be long till there’s nary a rosary about this shrine that ain’t found its way into her pockets.
original_zh_text: 听说你救了那个奸商？早在你敲钟之前，我就瞧见她在这儿鬼鬼祟祟扒拉破烂了。<page>别看她老，坑钱手段多着呢！<page>要不了多久，这附近的念珠全得进她腰包！
translated_text: 我听说你帮我们亲爱的商人省钱了？甚至在你按门铃之前，我就看到她鬼鬼祟祟地乞讨。<page>她是一个有用的人，但不要让她的年龄太傻，她仍然是最聪明的人。<page>没过多久，寺庙里的一串念珠就进了她的口袋。
secondary_translated_text: I heard you helped our dear businessman save money? Even before you rang the doorbell, I saw her sneaking around begging.<page>She is a useful person, but don't let her age be too silly, she is still the smartest person around.<page>Not long after, a string of rosary beads from the temple entered her pocket.

original_en_text: Bellringer... Re-thinkin’ on that trap, are ya? It’s a mad method, for sure, but you’d be just the hunter to set it, if’n you’re dare enough to try...
original_zh_text: 敲钟者……有重新考虑过陷阱的事吗？这想法虽然疯狂，但对你来说最合适不过了……如果你胆子够大的话。
translated_text: 敲钟人。你正在重新考虑这个陷阱吗？当然，这是一个疯狂的方法，但如果你敢于尝试，你只是一个设置它的猎人。
secondary_translated_text: Bell ringer. Are you rethinking this trap? Sure, it's a crazy approach, but if you dare to try it, you're just a hunter setting it up.

original_en_text: <hpage>Grant me your aid, sir. If your trap provides a path to freedom, both for myself and your land’s bugs, I may indeed choose to trigger it.<hpage>What work do you require of me now to see your service made?<page>It’s my family’s strength you’ll need be seeking, bellringer, us three ol’ bugs still alive, spread ‘cross this kingdom, and one poor cousin dead and drained in swamps choked rotten.<page>Each has power. Raw, savage stuff! For you, they’ll give it, if for their fascination at the act, or the thrill of defiance... or because they have no choice at all.
original_zh_text: <hpage>请助我一臂之力，先生。若你的陷阱真能为这片土地的虫子和我带来自由，我愿成为那个安放它的猎手。<hpage>现在需要我做些什么？<page>去召集我家族的力量——三个苟活的老家伙，他们分散王国各处。还有个可怜的表弟，他死在了腐臭的沼泽。<page>我的家人每个都带着野蛮原始的力量！他们会把力量交给你——或是出于对你这种勇气的欣赏，或是享受反抗带来的的亢奋……抑或是别无选择。
translated_text: <hpage>帮帮我，先生。如果你的陷阱为我和你土地上的虫子提供了一条通往自由的道路，那么我确实可能会选择触发它。<hpage>您现在需要我做什么才能看到您的服务？<page>敲钟人，你需要找到我家庭的力量。我们王国各地都有三只仍然活着的“虫子”，还有一个可怜的表弟，死在沼泽里窒息。<page>每个人都有权力。原始、野蛮的东西！对于你，如果是因为他们对表演的迷恋，或者是因为叛逆的刺激，他们会给你……或者因为他们根本没有选择。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Help me, sir. If your trap provides me and the bugs on your land with a path to freedom, then I might indeed choose to trigger it.<hpage>What do you need me to do now to see your service?<page>Bell ringer, you need to find the strength of my family. There are three "worms" still alive across our kingdom, and a poor cousin who died suffocated in the swamp.<page>Everyone has power. Primitive, barbaric thing! For you, if it's because of their fascination with acting, or because of the excitement of rebellion, they'll give you…or because they don't have a choice at all.

original_en_text: Real fine key this. No doubt it’ll open the way to somewhere special. Somewhere full of goodies, I’ll bet. Find the lock, and it’ll practically pay for itself!
original_zh_text: 上等货色！毫无疑问，它准能打开某个特殊地方的通路。我敢打赌，那地方肯定堆满了好东西。找到对应的锁，这钥匙就物超所值啦！
translated_text: 这是一把非常好的钥匙。毫无疑问，它将开辟通往一个特殊地方的道路。我敢打赌这是一个充满好东西的地方。找到锁，它就可以有效地自我支付！
secondary_translated_text: This is a very good key. There is no doubt that it will open the way to a special place. I bet this is a place full of good things. Find the lock and it can effectively pay for itself!

original_en_text: <hpage>Caretaker, I bring supplies from the town of bells below the Citadel.<page>And badly needed they are, miss bellringer. Ain’t much finding or foraging happening with this mob, what with them choir types all stalkin’ about the chambers beside.
original_zh_text: <hpage>看守者先生，我从圣堡下方的钟心镇带了补给。<page>啊！真是雪中送炭！圣咏团在附近晃悠，这帮怂包根本不敢出去觅食。
translated_text: <hpage>管家，我从城堡下面的贝尔镇带来了补给。<page>而且他们是急需的，敲钟人小姐暴徒们没有找到太多东西或饲料，他们的唱诗班成员在附近的房间里徘徊。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Butler, I brought supplies from Bell Town below the castle.<page>And they were urgently needed, the Miss Bell Ringer thugs didn't find much or feed, and their choir members lingered in nearby rooms.

original_en_text: Buried in the warren of bells, at Pharloom’s core, seek my sullen uncle. That one has power to spare.
original_zh_text: 去纺络的核心地带，在到处是钟的地方找我那阴沉的叔叔，他的力量多得没处使。
translated_text: 埋在法鲁姆中心的钟声中，寻找我阴郁的叔叔。那个人有额外的权力。
secondary_translated_text: Buried in the bells in the center of Farum, looking for my gloomy uncle. That person has additional powers.

original_en_text: So you found this place too, sister? This Citadel’s grand promise has been strangled away by cursed thread, but at least the great bell here grants us some sanctuary.<page>We’re amongst the blessed few... granted just a little more living.
original_zh_text: 小姐，你也找到这个地方了啊？我们可真是走运。圣堡曾经的宏伟都因丝咒化为了泡影，但多亏了那座大钟，我们才能安全地待在这儿。<page>也许只是片刻安宁，但能多活一会儿……但在这病怏怏的鬼地方，多活片刻就是最好的福报了。
translated_text: 这么说你也找到了这个地方，姐姐？城堡的宏伟前景已被诅咒的丝线所窒息，但至少这里的巨大时钟给了我们一些庇护所。<page>我们是少数.只是多一点生命。
secondary_translated_text: So you found this place too, sister? The grand prospects of the castle have been choked by the cursed threads, but at least the giant clock here gives us some shelter.<page>We are in the minority. Just a little more life.

original_en_text: Off you go now, dear one. If it’s my trinkets you covet, you can trade me your rosaries up at the shrine. Blessings and farewell!
original_zh_text: 你该走了，亲爱的。如果你想要我的这些宝贝，就来钟殿用念珠跟我换！愿你蒙福，再见！
translated_text: 亲爱的，你现在可以走了。如果你垂涎的是我的小饰品，你可以把你的念珠带到神社给我。祝福与告别！
secondary_translated_text: Honey, you can go now. If you covet my trinkets, you can bring your rosary beads to the shrine and give them to me. Blessings and farewell!

original_en_text: Ooohh... If we’re no longer pilgrims... What are we?
original_zh_text: 噢……我们如果不再是朝圣者了……那会成为什么呢？
translated_text: 哦如果我们不再是朝圣者……我们是什么？
secondary_translated_text: Oh if we are no longer pilgrims... what are we?

original_en_text: Crafty types used to go all a’clamour for this metal. S’not much to look at, but I still remember its value.
original_zh_text: 当年被工匠们抢破头的金属材料。看着不起眼，但老婆子我记得它可金贵着呢。
translated_text: 狡猾的人曾经对这种金属赞不绝口。没什么可看的，但我仍然记得它的价值。
secondary_translated_text: Crafty people once raved about this metal. There was nothing to see, but I still remember its value.

original_en_text: This shrine, awakened... it calls out to ‘em, you see. “It’s safe here. Come on over!” ringing in the ears of every lost pilgrim and grubby so-and-so unlucky enough to have made it to this blasted Citadel with their wits intact.<page>Well, what’s done is done, and what’s rung is rung. Just make sure you come back here soon, you lout! I ain’t dealing with all the fresh intake myself!<hpage>If time permits, sir bug, I shall visit again.
original_zh_text: 只要这钟殿醒着，那些迷途的朝圣者和肮脏的食腐者就会收到召唤。<page>就像在那些家伙耳边低语“这里安全，快来！”，然后他们就会屁颠屁颠地涌向这座被诅咒的城堡。<page>事已至此，你最好尽快回来帮忙！我可不想独自应付这些新来的蠢货！<hpage>先生，若有空闲，我会再来。
translated_text: 这座寺庙已经苏醒了……它正在召唤他们，你看。“这里很安全。过来！“每一个迷失的朝圣者和肮脏的不幸者都在他们的耳边回响，他们的智慧完好无损地到达了这座废弃的城堡。<page>好吧，你所做的就是你所做的，你所做的就是你所做的。一定要快点回来，你这个傻瓜！我不会自己处理所有新鲜摄入的东西！<hpage>如果时间允许，巴格先生，我会再次拜访。
secondary_translated_text: This temple has awakened... it's calling them, you see. "It's safe here. Come here! "Every lost pilgrim and filthy unfortunate person echoes in their ears, and their wisdom reaches this abandoned castle intact.<page>Well, what you do is what you do, and what you do is what you do. Be sure to come back soon, you fool! I won't handle all the fresh food myself!<hpage>If time permits, Mr. Bagh, I will visit again.

original_en_text: Guess I shouldn’t be surprised. It’s a fool act to try such a thing... Maybe even to think on it. Your kind ain’t designed to die.
original_zh_text: 果然还是有所顾虑吗？企图弑君本就是蠢行……或许连想都不该想。你们这一族的命数本就不包括死亡。
translated_text: 我认为我不应该感到惊讶。尝试这样的事情是愚蠢的……也许甚至可以考虑一下。像你这样的人并不是为了死而设计的。
secondary_translated_text: I don't think I should be surprised. It would be foolish to try something like this... maybe even consider it. People like you are not designed to die.

original_en_text: For the last part, I’ll also be needin’ that rune setter you’re carryin’. Clever old Weaver tool, that thing, and the perfect base on which to stretch our power.<page>Once you’ve collected for yourself the other critical parts, I’ll ask you pass it over as well.
original_zh_text: 最后还需要你身上那个陷阱设置器。精巧的织者工具，正好可以用来作为我们陷阱的基底。<page>等你集齐了其他部分，就把这玩意也交给我。
translated_text: 对于最后一部分，我还需要“您随身携带的符文设置器”。聪明的老式韦弗工具，那东西，以及扩展我们力量的完美基础。<page>一旦您为自己收集了其他关键部件，我也会要求您将它们传递出去。
secondary_translated_text: For the last part, I also need the "Rune setter you carry with you". Clever old Weaver tools, that thing, and the perfect foundation for extending our power.<page>Once you have collected other key components for yourself, I will ask you to pass them on as well.

original_en_text: Find the husk of my cousin, claimed by the scorned bugs of the swamps. A careless fool to let himself be taken, and dead they might be, but some glimmer of his soul can still be sensed.
original_zh_text: 找到我表弟的躯壳，它被沼泽中满怀怨愤的虫子占据了。他粗心大意，才会被抓住并害死。但我仍能感受到他灵魂散发的的一丝微光。
translated_text: 找到我表弟的壳，它被沼泽里轻蔑的昆虫占据了。一个粗心的傻瓜，让自己被带走，他们可能已经死了，但你仍然可以感觉到他灵魂中的一些光芒。
secondary_translated_text: Find my cousin's shell, occupied by contemptuous insects in the swamp. A careless fool, letting himself be taken away, they may be dead, but you can still feel some light in his soul.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I have the items requested. Craft me your trap that we may see these lands free.
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生，所需物品已集齐。请为我制作陷阱，还此地自由。
translated_text: <hpage>先生，我有我需要的东西。让我成为你的陷阱，让我们看到这些土地自由。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Sir, I have something I need. Let me be your trap and let us see these lands free.

original_en_text: T’was a good deed you did up above, dear one, saving me from them screeching flocks. Not seen the like of it in a long, long time.<page>I’ve returned with all sorts of new goodies, too. Let’s see if anything I’ve scavenged will fit your fancy.
original_zh_text: 亲爱的，多亏你把我从那些可怕的家伙手上救了出来。我好久遭遇过那样的危险了。<page>我还带了各种各样新鲜的好东西回来。来看看我搜罗到的货物有没有合你心意的。
translated_text: 亲爱的，你在那里做了一件好事，把我从尖叫的羊群中救了出来。已经很久没有见过这样的事情了。<page>我回来时还带来了各种新东西。让我们看看我拿起的东西是否适合您的喜好。
secondary_translated_text: Honey, you did a good thing there, saving me from the screaming sheep. It's been a long time since I've seen anything like this.<page>I came back with all kinds of new things. Let's see if what I pick up suits your preferences.

original_en_text: Don’t think I ain’t see’in it, bellringer! A whole lotta helpin’ you’ve been up to, both here and down below!<page>S’a strange mantle you’re takin’ for yourself, seeing all them bugs saved and wishes promised.<hpage>You find it strange, sir? I’ve found some solace in the service, and the rewards received have proved a boon on my journey.<page>Aye! But it ain’t your place now, is it? I see well what you are, Weaver’n more! It’s below your station! You ain’t no common sort meant for carin’ on us low folk.<hpage>I could say the same for you, who still chooses to remain cowled. You continue to pose as only a simple pilgrim. Don’t you think it’s past time you ceased the performance?<page>Leave off, Old One! Permit a bug their small disguise! It’s been a pleasant thing to play simple. And I weren’t calling for change, even if you seem insistent on bringing it!<hpage>Change was unavoidable, sir, whether I arrived or not. The monarch stirs. Its threads stretch far. My presence only accelerates the inevitable.<page>So what’re you hopin’ for, eh? Planning to usurp, to perch above us all as queen? Build up our hopes only to string us all in your own beastly web? Such is the way of Weavers and gods both...
original_zh_text: 敲钟者！别当我没看见！你在这里和下层当活菩萨呢！<page>披着救世主的皮，到处行侠仗义，很别扭吧？<hpage>先生觉得我别扭？帮助其他虫子让我获得了某种慰藉。当然，获得的报酬也能助我前行。<page>呵！可这不是你该干的！我看得出来，你有织者血统！屈尊来操心我们这些贱民的死活，太掉价！<hpage>那你扮成普通朝圣者，不也是在演戏？是时候摘掉伪装了吧？<page>该死！就不能让我活个清净吗？安安静静的普通日子不好过吗？非得去寻求变革！<hpage>变革不可避免，无论我来与否。圣堡之主已然有所行动，其丝线已遍及全境。我的到来不过是加速了这过程。<page>所以你到底图什么？想夺权篡位，成为新的女皇？先点燃我们的希望，然后再把我们困入网中？你们织者和神灵都这副德行……
translated_text: 别以为我没看到，敲钟人！无论您在这里还是在那里，您都会得到很多帮助！<page>你给自己穿上的外套是一件奇怪的外套，看到所有的虫子都被拯救了，你的愿望也得到了承诺。<hpage>先生，您觉得这很奇怪吗？我在我的服务中找到了一些安慰，我收到的回报也证明了我旅程的福音。<page>是的！但那不是你现在的位置，不是吗？我很清楚你是什么，韦弗！就在你的位置下面！你不是一个专门挑剔我们下层阶级的普通人。<hpage>我可以对你说同样的话，但你仍然选择戴头巾。你继续假装自己只是一个简单的朝圣者。你不认为你应该停止表演吗？<page>走开，老头！允许一个小虫子伪装自己！简单地玩耍是一件愉快的事情。我并不是在呼吁改变，即使你似乎坚持这样做！<hpage>先生，无论我是否到达，改变都是不可避免的。君主非常兴奋。它的线条延伸得很远。我的存在只会加速不可避免的事情。<page>你想用什么计划来篡位凌驾于我们之上呢？是不是建立我们的希望只是为了把我们都绑在你自己的野兽网里？这就是韦弗和诸神的行事方式
secondary_translated_text: Don't think I didn't see it, bell ringer! Whether you are here or there, you will get a lot of help!<page>The coat you put on yourself is a strange coat, and seeing that all the bugs have been saved, your wish is promised.<hpage>Sir, do you find this strange? I found some comfort in my service, and the rewards I received proved the gospel of my journey.<page>Yes! But that's not where you are now, is it? I know exactly what you are, Weaver! Right below your position! You are not an ordinary person who specifically criticizes our lower class.<hpage>I could say the same to you, but you still chose to wear a turban. You continue to pretend you are just a simple pilgrim. Don't you think you should stop performing?<page>Go away, old man! Allow a little bug to disguise itself! Simply playing is a pleasure. I am not calling for change, even if you seem to insist on doing it!<hpage>Sir, whether I arrive or not, change is inevitable. The monarch was very excited. Its lines extend far. My presence only accelerates the inevitable.<page>What plan do you intend to use to usurp the throne over us? Is it building our hope just to tie us all to your own beast web? This is how Weaver and the gods do things.

original_en_text: You keep at all that helpin’, you’re gonna start inspiring it in others! Best you think serious about what effect you might be causin’, bellringer!<page>Too much hope could prove a dangerous thing, ‘specially for all these bugs starved so long of it.
original_zh_text: 敲钟者！你再这么当救世主，其他虫子都要学样了！你最好想清楚这样会引发什么后果！<page>让浑浑噩噩几辈子的虫子看到希望——这是非常危险的！
translated_text: 你继续提供帮助，你就会开始激励他人！敲钟人，你最好认真考虑一下你可能会产生什么影响！<page>太多的希望可能会被证明是一件危险的事情，尤其是对于所有这些渴望如此久的虫子来说。
secondary_translated_text: You continue to help, and you will start to inspire others! Bell ringer, you'd better seriously consider what impact you may have!<page>Too much hope can prove to be a dangerous thing, especially for all these bugs that have craved it for so long.

original_en_text: Now, why don’t you hurry back to the shrine and let them all know what a good job you’ve done?<page>There might be a few more goodies to gather up on my way back, and I don’t need you lingering around in the meantime. Blessings and farewell!
original_zh_text: 现在，快回去替我报平安吧！<page>我这会儿可没法跟你一块回去，路上可能还有好东西等着我捡漏呢。愿你蒙福，再见！
translated_text: 现在，你为什么不赶紧回到神社，让他们知道你做得有多好呢？<page>回来的路上可能有一些好东西要收拾，这段时间我不需要你到处闲逛。祝福与告别！
secondary_translated_text: Now, why don't you hurry back to the shrine and let them know how well you did?<page>There may be some good things to pack on the way back, and I don't need you wandering around during this time. Blessings and farewell!

original_en_text: Simply forged, and simply styled. Designed to open all sorts of different locks, if they be basic enough.
original_zh_text: 锻造工艺粗糙，样式也朴素。但能打开各种不同的锁——只要锁芯别太复杂。
translated_text: 简单锻造，简单成型。如果足够基本的话，它的设计目的是打开各种不同的锁。
secondary_translated_text: Simple forging, simple forming. If basic enough, it is designed to open various locks.

original_en_text: Sister, sister! Let me confide in you! As I ascended the Citadel’s chambers to reach this place, I swear I heard the laughter of a child!<page>Wasn’t much more than an echo, and I confess me fear’s been playing awful tricks on me... and yet that voice still keeps ringing in my head.<page>Surely though, no bug so young and lively could survive within those heartless halls?
original_zh_text: 小姐！你且听我说！在圣堡殿堂上来此地的路上，我分明听到了幼虫的嬉笑声！<page>肯定是回声作祟，要么就是我吓出幻觉了……但那笑声一直在我脑子里萦绕。<page>这鬼地方哪可能有活着的幼虫？你说对吧！
translated_text: 姐姐，姐姐！让我向你吐露心声！当我爬进城堡房间到达这个地方时，我发誓我听到了一个孩子在笑！<page>这只是一个回声，我承认恐惧在我身上发挥了很大作用……但那个声音仍然在我的脑海里响起。<page>当然，这么年轻、活泼的虫子不就能在那些无情的大厅里生存吗？
secondary_translated_text: Sister, sister! Let me confide in you! When I climbed into the castle room to reach this place, I could have sworn I heard a child laughing!<page>It was just an echo, and I admit that fear played a big role in me... but that voice was still ringing in my head.<page>Of course, wouldn't such a young and lively insect survive in those ruthless halls?

original_en_text: Sister, you seen ‘em out there? Our new champion, that golden knight stalking the Citadel’s crumbling halls?<page>Tall, righteous bug. Not much for conversing. Still! I’d be long dead if not for their appearance.<page>And I ain’t the only one. Others have spoken of the knight’s timely deeds and rare bravery.<page>We’re desperate for any protection we can get, and that gleaming champion’s been offering their aid almost as much as you yourself.
original_zh_text: 嘿，小姐，瞧见没？那位在圣堡摇摇欲坠的大厅里巡逻的金甲骑士！<page>高大正直，威风凛凛，不太爱说话。不过！要不是他，我早没命了！<page>不光是我！好多朝圣者都说曾被他及时搭救。<page>现在大伙就指望你和那位英雄护着咱了。
translated_text: 姐姐，你在那里看到他们了吗？我们的新冠军，在城堡摇摇欲坠的大厅中徘徊的黄金骑士？<page>高大、正义的虫子。没有太多谈话。仍然！如果不是他们的出现，我早就死了。<page>而且我不是唯一的一个。其他人则谈到了骑士及时的行为和罕见的勇气。<page>我们迫切需要任何能得到的保护，而这位闪亮的冠军提供了几乎和你们一样多的援助。
secondary_translated_text: Sister, did you see them there? Our new champion, the golden knight wandering through the crumbling halls of the castle?<page>Tall, righteous bugs. Not much conversation. Still! If it weren't for their appearance, I would have died long ago.<page>And I'm not the only one. Others spoke of the knight's timely behavior and rare courage.<page>We desperately need any protection we can get, and this shining champion has provided almost as much assistance as you have.

original_en_text: If you’re going to keep skulkin’ around here while I work, you may as well buy something. Take a look dear one, don’t be shy!
original_zh_text: 如果你打算在我干活的时候一直偷偷摸摸地在这儿晃悠，那你还不如找我买点东西。来看看吧，亲爱的，别害羞！
translated_text: 如果我工作的时候你要躲在这里，你还不如买点东西。亲爱的，看看，别害羞！
secondary_translated_text: If you want to hide here while I work, you might as well buy something. Honey, look, don't be shy!

original_en_text: And last, as the base, seek a weapon of Weavers past. Should still be one left, down there in their largest nest, a snare to set a rune’o searing Silk. Our own trap’ll be woven tight about it.
original_zh_text: 最后是陷阱的基底部分，去找到古织者的工具——陷阱设置器，它可以用来设下灼烧灵丝的符文。<page>应该还剩一个，就在织者最大的巢穴里。我们的陷阱将以它为核心进行制作。
translated_text: 最后，作为基地，寻找韦弗过去的武器。应该还剩下一个，一个用来在它们最大的巢穴中放置符文烧焦的丝绸的陷阱。我们自己的陷阱将围绕它旋转。
secondary_translated_text: Finally, as a base, look for Weaver's past weapons. There should be one left, a trap used to place rune-charred silk in their largest nest. Our own traps will spin around it.

original_en_text: Admit it! You done it! You shifty li’l bell-runger!<hpage>You have chosen a curious place to rest, sir. Do you perhaps know something of this shrine and its companions in the lands below?<page>Oh, so you ask funny questions as well as cutting bells free, eh? You certainly ain’t a pilgrim, but you’re clearly not of the Choir either. No! I know exactly what you are...<page>A bell-ringing lout! A weirdo! Don’t you realise what you’ve done, waking that shrine back up?<page>That bell has rung out far and wide! The wretched and the lost will have heard its call. They’ll be making their way here now.<page>Well, what’s done is done, and what’s rung is rung. Just make sure you come back here soon, you lout! You can help me deal with all the dirty little pilgrims and desperate scavengers who turn up.
original_zh_text: 承认吧！就是你干的！你这莽撞的敲钟者！<hpage>先生，你选了个有趣的地方歇脚。莫非知晓这处钟殿与下方各处钟殿的关联？<page>哈！又会问怪问题又会乱敲钟，既非朝圣者也不像圣咏团……我算看明白了——<page>你就是个扰我清梦的怪胎！知道唤醒这座钟殿会引来什么吗？<page>迷途的朝圣者和食腐者都会循钟声而来！<page>事已至此，你最好尽快回来帮忙对付那些脏兮兮的家伙！
translated_text: 承认吧！你做到了！你这个狡猾的小铃铛信使！<hpage>先生，您选择了一个奇怪的地方休息。您可能了解这座寺庙及其在下面土地上的同伴吗？<page>哦，所以你问了有趣的问题和免费的铃声，嗯？你当然不是朝圣者，但你显然也不是唱诗班的成员。不！我清楚地知道你是什么。<page>敲钟的傻瓜！奇怪的！你难道不知道你做了什么才让寺庙回来吗？<page>钟声已经在远方响起了！不幸和迷失的人将听到它的召唤。他们现在就来这里了。<page>好吧，你所做的就是你所做的，你所做的就是你所做的。一定要快点回来，你这个傻瓜！你可以帮我对付所有出现的肮脏小朝圣者和绝望的食腐动物。
secondary_translated_text: Admit it! You did it! You cunning little bell messenger!<hpage>Sir, you chose a strange place to rest. Do you possibly know about this temple and its companions in the land below?<page>Oh, so you asked interesting questions and free ringtones, huh? You are certainly not a pilgrim, but you are obviously not a member of the choir either. No! I know exactly what you are.<page>Fool who rings the bell! Strange! Don't you know what you did to bring the temple back?<page>The bell is already ringing in the distance! The unfortunate and lost will hear its call. They're here now.<page>Well, what you do is what you do, and what you do is what you do. Be sure to come back soon, you fool! You can help me deal with all the dirty little pilgrims and desperate scavengers that appear.

original_en_text: Oi! What’s this? Suddenly havin’ second thoughts? For sure it’s a frightful thing to attempt, but you’ve already put in all the leg work!<page>She up top’ll already be sensin’ your goal, vague-like maybe, but there ain’t no worth to backin’ out now.
original_zh_text: 喂！这就反悔了？虽然这计划确实骇人，但你都已经走到这一步了！<page>顶上那位早就隐隐约约地感应到了你的企图，现在退缩太迟了！
translated_text: 嘿！这是什么？突然改变主意？当然，尝试这是一件可怕的事情，但您已经投入了所有的体力工作！<page>她已经感觉到你在那里的目的了，也许像玛丽一样，但现在不值得放弃。
secondary_translated_text: Hey! What is this? Suddenly change your mind? Of course, it's a scary thing to try, but you've put all the physical work into it!<page>She already feels what you're doing there, maybe like Mary, but it's not worth giving up now.

original_en_text: Stretch a spool out nice and long with this fine-wrought tool. The perfect purchase if you’re planning to hoard a lot of Silk for yourself!
original_zh_text: 这件制作精良的工具能拓展你的灵丝轴容量。如果你打算为自己囤积大量灵丝，这件绝对是必买！
translated_text: 使用这个制作精良的工具来延长卷轴。如果您计划为自己储备大量丝绸，这是完美的购买！
secondary_translated_text: Use this well-made tool to extend the scroll. If you plan to stock up on a large amount of silk for yourself, this is the perfect purchase!

original_en_text: You keep at all that helpin’, you’re gonna start inspiring it in others! Best think serious about what effect you might be causin’, bellringer!<page>Too much hope could prove a dangerous thing, ‘specially for all these bugs starved so long of it.
original_zh_text: 你再这么当救世主，其他虫子都要学样了！最好想清楚这样会引发什么后果！<page>让浑浑噩噩几辈子的虫子看到希望，这是非常危险的！
translated_text: 你继续提供帮助，你就会开始激励他人！敲钟人，最好认真考虑你可能会产生什么影响！<page>太多的希望可能会被证明是一件危险的事情，尤其是对于所有这些渴望如此久的虫子来说。
secondary_translated_text: You continue to help, and you will start to inspire others! Bell ringer, it is best to seriously consider what impact you may have!<page>Too much hope can prove to be a dangerous thing, especially for all these bugs that have craved it for so long.

original_en_text: Ooohh... What new horror now besets us?<page>Is this fresh punishment for our sins, or yet another test to prove our faith?<hpage>It is neither, good bug. In this disaster you bear no blame.<hpage>Hold close to your companions, and I will work swift to see this madness stilled.
original_zh_text: 噢……现在又是什么新的灾祸降临到我们头上了？<page>这是对我们罪孽的报应，还是又一次考验我们信仰的试炼？<hpage>都不是。在这场灾厄中，你并无任何过错。<hpage>别离开你的同伴，我会尽快让这场狂乱平息下来。
translated_text: 哦现在有哪些新的恐怖正在困扰我们？<page>这是对我们罪的新惩罚，还是对我们信心的另一次考验？<hpage>两者都不是，好虫子。在这场灾难中，你没有责任。<hpage>紧紧抓住你的同伴，我会尽快平息这场疯狂。
secondary_translated_text: Oh, what new horrors are troubling us now?<page>Is this a new punishment for our sin, or is it another test of our confidence?<hpage>Neither, good bug. In this disaster, you have no responsibility.<hpage>Hold on to your companion tightly and I will put an end to this madness as soon as possible.

original_en_text: For the base, we’ll be needin’ a weapon of Weavers past. Search down low, aside the paths of bone, inside their largest nest. S’a snare device, one to set a rune’o searing Silk.
original_zh_text: 陷阱的基底部分需要用到一件古织者的工具——可以设下符文的陷阱设置器。往底层搜寻，就在满是骨头的道路旁，织者最大的巢穴里。
translated_text: 我们需要韦弗过去的武器。在它们最大的巢穴里，沿着骨头的路径往下看。这是一个可以设置符文燃烧丝绸的陷阱装置。
secondary_translated_text: We need Weaver's past weapons. In their largest nest, look down the path of the bones. This is a trap device that can set runes to burn silk.

original_en_text: I swear I heard it, sister... That laugh! It almost sounded like they were enjoying themself...
original_zh_text: 小姐，我真没幻听……那笑声……听着像是它们在嬉戏玩乐一样……
translated_text: 我发誓我听到了，姐姐……那个笑！听起来他们很享受……
secondary_translated_text: I swear I heard it, sister... that smile! It sounds like they're enjoying it…

original_en_text: Hold this while makin’ music and you’ll soon hear its function. Amplifies song, it does! Sends it out full and bright. Ideal if you’re ever planning on performing for a crowd.
original_zh_text: 演奏时握着这件宝贝，你就能很快体会到它的作用。它能放大乐声，让声音饱满又响亮。要是你打算登台表演，这东西再合适不过了
translated_text: 创作音乐时握住它，您很快就会听到它的功能。放大这首歌，确实如此！发出完整而明亮的声音。如果您计划为人群表演，这是您的理想选择。
secondary_translated_text: Hold it while creating music and you will soon hear its function. Zoom in on this song, it does! Make a complete and bright sound. If you plan to perform for a crowd, this is the ideal choice for you.

original_en_text: How about we get your loose beads all strung up safe? I’ll pinch a few for their braiding, but that’s surely worth it for the peace of mind.
original_zh_text: 我来帮你把零散的念珠穿起来，做成便携的链子怎么样？收点手工费不过分吧？图个心安嘛！
translated_text: 我们把所有松散的珠子安全地串在一起怎么样？我会捏一些，让他们编织，但为了安心，这绝对是值得的。
secondary_translated_text: What if we string all the loose beads together safely? I will pinch some and let them weave, but for peace of mind, it will definitely be worth it.

original_en_text: Ooh, I’m glad I wriggled my way over here! What a bounty’s been laid out by our benefactors, those generous Conductors! Giants amongst bugs they are, all-seeing and kind!<page>It’s beautiful here, and goodies are everywhere. Only enough for one though, deary, so don’t be greedy! You know I got here first. Blessings, and farewell!
original_zh_text: 啊哈！幸亏我一路摸到这儿来了！咱们的恩主——慷慨的指挥家们，可真是留下了丰厚的赏赐啊！他们全视全知，又心地善良！<page>这儿可真美，到处都是好东西。不过嘛，亲爱的，这些东西只够我拿哦，所以别贪心！你该懂得先来后到。愿你蒙福，再见！
translated_text: 噢，我真高兴我扭过来了！我们的捐助者、那些慷慨的售票员提供了多么大的回报啊！他们是昆虫中的巨人，无所不知，善良！<page>这里很美，到处都是好东西。老公，这只够一个人吃，你不要太贪心！你知道我先到的。祝福，再见！
secondary_translated_text: Oh, I'm so glad I turned around! What a return our donors, those generous ticket sellers, have provided! They are giants among insects, omniscient and kind!<page>It's beautiful here, with good things everywhere. Honey, this is only enough for one person. Don't be too greedy! You know I got here first. Blessings, goodbye!

original_en_text: You stay close, sister. Them halls beside are crawling with haunted husks.<page>Wandering will only bring death, pointed and painful!
original_zh_text: 小姐，你跟紧点。旁边的那些大厅里到处都是被丝咒附身的躯壳。<page>四处乱走只会带来痛苦的死亡。
translated_text: 跟紧点，姐姐。附近的大厅布满了闹鬼的贝壳。<page>流浪只会带来死亡，尖锐而痛苦！
secondary_translated_text: Stay close, sister. Nearby halls are covered with haunted shells.<page>Wandering will only bring death, sharp and painful!

original_en_text: Have you done it yet, bellringer? Wriggled deep? Discovered the depths of obsession that brought this place so low?<hpage>If you speak of this Citadel and its Silk, Caretaker, then yes, I now know the start of it. <hpage>In the ward down below, I saw it clear, the hollowed husks, and the many torturous implements... machines to instill a bug with thread, that would see their life extended.<page>Aye! That’s it, in part! But there’s more scale to it than all that. Just think of’em greedily shoving the Silk into their shells, the madness that overcame them, eternal life for mortal bugs! Then think on how long it’s all gone on...<hpage>...The children born of them, and all the pilgrims after... The Silk has seeded deep into this kingdom’s shells, generations deep...<hpage>No wonder Pharloom’s bugs proved such easy prey for that haunted thread. It had only to seek for itself to reach them.<page>Ho ho! Now you’re seein’ it, bellringer! These poor pilgrims, all born bound to the cruel system of our world, now stricken in its new cursed web.<page>You at least are free from it. And free to shake it all up... if’n that’s your choosing.
original_zh_text: 事情办成了吗，敲钟者？找出那些让圣堡堕落的疯狂执念没？<hpage>若是指圣堡的丝咒，是的，我已知晓其根源。<hpage>下层病房里尽是空壳，以及无数刑具般的器械……那些向甲壳灌注丝线延续生命的机器。<page>没错！但远不止如此！想想他们贪婪吞食灵丝的模样，凡虫妄图永生引发的癫狂！再想想这持续了多少世代……<hpage>……他们的子嗣，后来的朝圣者……灵丝早已深植于这个王国的甲壳内，代代相传……<hpage>难怪纺络的虫子会轻易沦为丝咒的猎物，那些邪丝只需稍加引诱就能侵蚀他们。<page>哈！现在你算看透了！这些可怜虫生来就被束缚在这个世界的残酷体制里，如今又陷进新的诅咒之网。<page>至少你是自由的，自由得足以颠覆这一切……若这是你的选择。
translated_text: 你做到了吗，敲钟人？深深地蠕动？发现让这个地方如此低落的痴迷之深吗？<hpage>如果你谈论这座城堡和它的丝绸，警卫，那么是的，我现在知道它从哪里开始。<hpage>在下面的病房里，我可以清楚地看到，被掏空的贝壳，还有许多折磨人的工具。机器使用线程来灌输错误，从而延长其寿命。<page>是的！一部分！但它的规模比这一切都要大。想想它们贪婪地将丝绸塞进壳中，疯狂地击败它们，凡人昆虫的永生！然后想想这种情况已经持续多久了……<hpage>...他们所生的孩子，以及此后所有的朝圣者。丝绸已经深深地扎根在这个王国的贝壳里，代代相传……<hpage>难怪法鲁的虫子很容易被闹鬼的线吃掉。它只需要寻求自己就能到达他们。<page>呵呵！现在你看到了，敲钟人！这些可怜的朝圣者生来就被我们这个世界的残酷制度束缚在一起，现在却被困在这个新的、受诅咒的网络中。<page>你至少可以摆脱它。而且你可以自由地改变一切……如果这是您的选择。
secondary_translated_text: Did you do it, bell ringer? squirming deeply? Discover the depth of the obsession that makes this place so low?<hpage>If you talk about this castle and its silk, its guards, then yes, I now know where it starts.<hpage>In the ward below, I could clearly see the hollowed shells and many torture tools. Machines use threads to instill errors, thereby extending their life.<page>Yes! Part! But its scale is bigger than all this. Think of them greedily stuffing silk into their shells and frantically defeating them, the eternal life of mortal insects! Then think about how long this has been going on…<hpage>... The children they bore, and all the pilgrims since then. Silk has been deeply rooted in the shells of this kingdom and passed down from generation to generation...<hpage>No wonder Faro's bugs are easily eaten by haunted threads. It only needs to seek itself to reach them.<page>Hehe! Now you see it, bell ringer! These poor pilgrims, born bound together by the cruel institutions of our world, are now trapped in this new, cursed network.<page>You can at least get rid of it. And you are free to change everything... if it is your choice.

original_en_text: Well, well, if it isn’t my very own shadow, the clever little red-cloak! You still following me around, trying to pinch away some of the goodies I sniff out?<hpage>You mistake my intent, ma’am, somewhat ungenerously. The pilgrims of the settlement below were worried by your long absence. It was on their behalf that I tracked you, again.<page>Is that so? What a worrying bunch of busybodies they are! I’m still able to fend for meself!<page>Hmph... and yet, perhaps ‘tis a warm thing that I remain in their thoughts so. I hadn’t expected that. And I can’t deny that you too have done me a good turn once more.<page>That awful flock almost had me, truth be told, and I still have to wonder at your intentions, dear one... but bless you, all the same!
original_zh_text: 啧啧，这不是小红斗篷嘛！还在惦记着老婆子我找到的的宝贝？<hpage>女士，你误会了。是庇护所的虫子们担心你的安危，我才再次前来找你。<page>是这样吗？瞎操心！老婆子我纵横圣堡的时候他们都还是虫卵呢！<page>不过……被惦记的感觉倒也不坏。这次算我又欠你一份情。<page>说实话，那群可怕的家伙差点就抓住我了，而你……不管怎样，还是要感谢你！
translated_text: 好吧，好吧，如果这不是我自己的影子，聪明的小红斗篷！你还在跟踪我，试图扼杀我嗅出的一些好事吗？<hpage>女士，您误解了我的意图，有点不慷慨。下面定居点的朝圣者对您长期缺席感到担忧。我代表他们再次追踪你。<page>是这样吗？他们真是一群爱管闲事的人！我还能养活自己！<page>哼……不过，像这样留在他们的思念中对我来说可能是一件温暖的事情。没想到会发生这种事。我不能否认你又帮了我一个忙。<page>说实话，那些可怕的羊群差点抓住我，我还是想知道你的意图，亲爱的……但祝福你！
secondary_translated_text: Well, well, if this is not my own shadow, clever little red cloak! Are you still stalking me and trying to kill some of the good things I smell?<hpage>Ma 'am, you misunderstand my intentions and are a little ungenerous. Pilgrims in the settlements below are concerned about your prolonged absence. I tracked you again on their behalf.<page>Is that so? They are really a group of nosy people! I can still support myself!<page>Hmm... However, it may be a warm thing for me to stay in their thoughts like this. I didn't expect this to happen. I can't deny that you've done me another favor.<page>To be honest, those terrible sheep almost caught me, I still want to know your intentions, dear... but bless you!

original_en_text: Looking for goodies of your own, dear one? You’d do well to avoid the dark vaults near here. They say the keepers inside were jealous hoarders even before the silken curse came down.<hpage>You have more familiarity with the Citadel than most, madam. How long have you spent here, surviving amongst the haunted corridors?<page>Oh, long enough. S’not such a bad lot, all told. The memories of my pilgrimage have all faded now, but a life spent in the Citadel’s golden halls was all I ever wished for.<page>And lo and behold, my humble wish was granted! Certainly, the place might be a bit past its prime, but it’d be churlish of me to complain now, wouldn’t it?
original_zh_text: 亲爱的，你也在找好东西吗？你最好避开这附近阴暗的书库。据说在丝咒降临之前，里面的管理员就已经是些抠门的守财奴了。<hpage>女士，你比大多数虫都更熟悉圣堡。这被诅咒的地方生存，肯定也不是件易事吧？你在这儿待了多久了？<page>唔，待了有够久了。总的来说，也不算太差。当初朝圣时的记忆如今已经模糊，但在这金色圣堡度过一生，这就是老婆子我的毕生所求。<page>你瞧啊，我这小小的愿望已经实现啦！当然，这地方或许已经过了鼎盛时期，但现在要是我还抱怨，那就太不识好歹了，不是吗？
translated_text: 亲爱的，你在寻找自己的好东西吗？你最好避开这里附近的黑暗金库。他们说，甚至在丝绸诅咒到来之前，里面的饲养员都是嫉妒的囤积者。<hpage>你比大多数人都了解城堡女士。你在这条闹鬼的走廊里住了多久了？<page>哦，够长了。总的来说，这不是一个坏人。我朝圣之旅的所有记忆现在都消失了，但我在城堡金色大厅里度过的生活才是我想要的。<page>看，我小小的愿望实现了！当然，这个地方可能已经过去了鼎盛时期，但我现在抱怨就太不礼貌了，不是吗？
secondary_translated_text: Honey, are you looking for something good for yourself? You'd better avoid the dark vaults around here. Even before the Silk Curse arrived, the keepers inside were jealous hoarders, they said.<hpage>You know the castle lady better than most people. How long have you lived in this haunted corridor?<page>Oh, long enough. Overall, this is not a bad person. All memories of my pilgrimage are now gone, but the life I spent in the golden halls of the castle is what I wanted.<page>Look, my little wish has come true! Of course, this place may have passed its heyday, but it would be rude of me to complain now, wouldn't it?

original_en_text: Part of an ancient mask, or a fractured shard of someone’s visage? With the full thing, you’d be better able to protect your shell.
original_zh_text: 古老面甲的一部分？还是谁的面部残片？要是能凑齐整套，肯定能更好地保护你的甲壳。
translated_text: 古代面具的一部分，还是某人脸部的碎片？有了完整的东西，你就可以更好地保护你的外壳。
secondary_translated_text: Part of an ancient mask, or a fragment of someone's face? With something complete, you can better protect your shell.

original_en_text: What a calamity has befallen our holy Citadel! I ain’t never seen anything like it in my long life.<page>Times like this, we must be sure to help each other. Dig deep, dear one, I’ll be needing a lot of rosaries to survive what’s comin’!
original_zh_text: 圣堡这次真是大难临头了！老婆子我活了这么久，这阵仗还是头回见！<page>这种时候，我们一定要相互帮助。帮帮忙，亲爱的，为了挺过即将到来的难关，我需要很多念珠！
translated_text: 我们的神圣城堡遭遇了多么大的灾难啊！在我漫长的一生中，我从未见过这样的事情。<page>在这种时候，我们必须互相帮助。亲爱的，深入挖掘，我需要很多念珠才能在即将发生的事情中幸存下来！
secondary_translated_text: What a disaster our sacred castle has suffered! In my long life, I have never seen anything like this.<page>At times like this, we must help each other. Dear, dig deeper, I need a lot of rosary beads to survive what is about to happen!

original_en_text: All your work, and look! They keep arrivin’. It’s bugs aplenty up here now. Hapless, weak, but alive they are!<hpage>More scared than weak, they seem to me. It is heartening knowing these few have survived safe for your care.<page>That’s your work, bellringer! Not mine. Ringin’ and helpin’! Hope they recognise your efforts, ‘cause I ain’t providing much, and I ain’t one for fighting if that Choir and their pins ever come callin’.
original_zh_text: 全是你折腾的后果！现在这儿挤满虫子了！又蠢又弱，畏畏缩缩地苟活！<hpage>更像是吓坏了，才显得羸弱。还得多亏有你在这儿照顾他们。<page>喂！别跟我扯上关系！这都是你干的好事，敲钟者！我可不会帮忙打架——要是圣咏团找上门，你自己扛！
translated_text: 你所有的作品，看！他们不断到达。现在这里有很多虫子。他们不幸而软弱，但他们还活着！<hpage>在我看来，他们更多的是害怕而不是软弱。很高兴知道这些人在您的照顾下安全幸存下来。<page>这是你的工作，敲钟人！不是我的铃声和帮助！我希望他们认可你的努力，因为我没有提供太多，如果合唱团和他们的徽章召唤，我不会战斗。"
secondary_translated_text: All your work, look! They keep arriving. There are a lot of bugs here now. They are unfortunate and weak, but they are still alive!<hpage>In my opinion, they are more afraid than weak. It's good to know that these people survived safely under your care.<page>This is your job, bell ringer! Not my ringtone and help! I hope they recognize your efforts because I haven't provided much, and if the choir and their badges call, I won't fight. "

original_en_text: Stop and share some of your rosaries before you go scurrying off again, dear one. I’m sure to have something that’s to your liking!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的，先别走，用你的念珠跟我做点小生意再离开也不迟呀。我这儿有各式各样的好货，绝对物超所值！
translated_text: 亲爱的朋友们，在你们再次匆忙出发之前，请停下来分享一些你们的念珠。我一定有你喜欢的东西！
secondary_translated_text: Dear friends, before you rush off again, please stop and share some of your rosary beads. I must have something you like!

original_en_text: Half a spider’s spool. You’d just have to find its match. Them ol’ Weavers built some fine things alright. They’re all long dead, but their craftwork still gleams bright.
original_zh_text: 织者的半个灵丝轴，你只需要找到与之匹配的另一半。古织者的手艺真不赖，虫死了这么多年，其造物还锃光瓦亮。
translated_text: 半张蜘蛛卷轴。你只需要找到匹配的。韦弗一家做了很多好事。他们已经去世很久了，但他们的作品仍然闪闪发光。
secondary_translated_text: Half a spider scroll. You just need to find a match. The Weavers have done a lot of good things. They have been long gone, but their work still shines.

original_en_text: A gleaming find for you climbing types. With this in your claw, you’ll be able to stick to walls for as long as you like!
original_zh_text: 对于你们这些攀爬爱好者来说，这可是个不可多得的宝贝。握在爪子里就能无限黏附峭壁——想挂多久挂多久！
translated_text: 您的闪亮发现适合攀岩类型。爪子里有了这个，你就可以粘在墙上多久就粘多久！
secondary_translated_text: Your shining discoveries are suitable for the type of rock climbing. With this in your paw, you can stick to the wall as long as you want!

original_en_text: Down in the mosslands, still clinging to her failed chapel, my sister’ll part with her power, if asked kind enough.
original_zh_text: 去苔地找我那守着破教堂的姐姐，态度客气点，她或许会分给你力量。
translated_text: 在苔藓田里，我姐姐仍然坚持她失败的教堂，如果有人好心地要求我，她就会放弃她的权力。
secondary_translated_text: In the moss fields, my sister still clings to her failed church and would give up her power if someone kindly asked me.

original_en_text: <hpage>Grant me your aid, sir. If your trap provides a path to freedom, both for myself and your land’s bugs, I may indeed choose to trigger it.<hpage>What work do you require of me now to see your service made?<page>It’s my family’s strength you’ll need be seeking, bellringer, us three ol’ bugs still alive, spread ‘cross this kingdom, and that sad soul you’re already carryin’ there, the last of my poor cousin, dead and drained in those rotten swamps.<page>Each of my family has power, raw, savage stuff. For you, they’ll give it, if for their fascination at the act, or the thrill of defiance... or because they have no choice at all.
original_zh_text: <hpage>请助我一臂之力，先生。若你的陷阱真能为这片土地的虫子和我带来自由，我愿成为那个安放它的猎手。<hpage>现在需要我做些什么？<page>去召集我家族成员的力量——三个苟活的老家伙，他们分散王国各处。还有一个正是你已找到的这悲惨灵魂的主人，他是我可怜的表弟，死在了腐臭的沼泽。<page>我的家人每个都带着野蛮原始的力量！他们会把力量交给你——或是出于对你这种勇气的欣赏，或是享受反抗带来的的亢奋……抑或是别无选择。
translated_text: <hpage>帮帮我，先生。如果你的陷阱为我和你土地上的虫子提供了一条通往自由的道路，那么我确实可能会选择触发它。<hpage>您现在需要我做什么才能看到您的服务？<page>你需要找到我家人的力量，敲钟人，三条仍然活着的老蠕虫，散布在这个王国里，还有你带到那里的悲伤灵魂，我可怜的表弟的最后一个，死在那些腐烂的沼泽里，干涸了。<page>我的每一个家庭都有一些强大，原始，野蛮的东西。对于你，如果是因为他们对表演的迷恋，或者是因为叛逆的刺激，他们会给你……或者因为他们根本没有选择。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Help me, sir. If your trap provides me and the bugs on your land with a path to freedom, then I might indeed choose to trigger it.<hpage>What do you need me to do now to see your service?<page>You need to find the strength of my family, the bell ringer, the three old worms still alive, scattered throughout this kingdom, and the sad soul you brought there, the last of my poor cousin, dead in those rotting swamps and dried up.<page>Every family I have has something powerful, primitive, barbaric. For you, if it's because of their fascination with acting, or because of the excitement of rebellion, they'll give you…or because they don't have a choice at all.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I have opened the way above these halls, and bested the white knight that stood as guardian.<hpage>Child of the monarch, she claimed herself at the end, and her shell suggested it true, a being born purely from Silk woven tight. <hpage>That such a feat is possible... I have seen life woven from Silk before, but tiny, transient... Never like this...<page>Aye, bellringer! You’ve slain a marvel indeed... Well, flawed marvel, at least.<page>One to keep far from she was, least for us mortal sorts. Look of a child and a mind to match, but her’s been up wanderin’ this Citadel longer’n most. Even in its long silence, way ‘fore you came and roused its ire. <page>Might’a seen herself this place’s protector, keepin’ it clean and quiet as she did. Course quiet meant most crossin’ her path found a painful end from her pin.<page>I’d be sayin’ thanks for the slaying, but with all the other husks now awoken and enraged, a bug’s chances ain’t grown by much.
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生，我已打通上层通路，击败了守卫的白骑士。<hpage>她自称君主子嗣，其甲壳构造显示此言非虚——纯粹由致密灵丝编织。<hpage>如此造物真是超乎寻常……灵丝编织的生命我倒也见过，但都渺小且残缺。和她相比，简直天差地别……<page>哈！敲钟者，看来你宰了个神迹一般的家伙……好吧，至少是个有瑕疵的神迹。<page>一直以来，对于我们来说，都是离她远点为妙。她长得孩童模样，心智也相仿，却已徘徊在圣堡多年——早在你到来并激怒她之前。<page>她自诩圣堡守护者，清扫所有“不洁者”。凡是靠近的都成了其针下亡魂。<page>本该谢谢你除掉她，但现在其他空壳都被唤醒并激怒了……咱们的处境可没变好。
translated_text: <hpage>先生，我已经在这些大厅上方扫清了道路，并击败了守护者白骑士。<hpage>她最终声称自己是君主的孩子，她的贝壳表明这是真的，一个纯粹由紧密编织的丝绸诞生的生物。<hpage>这样的壮举是可能的.我以前见过用丝绸编织的生命，但它又小又短……从来没有这样过。<page>是的，敲钟人！你确实杀死了一个奇迹……好吧，至少是一个有缺陷的奇迹。<page>离她很远的人是，至少对我们凡人来说是这样。她看起来像个孩子，思想也很匹配，但她已经在这座城堡里徘徊了很长时间。即使在它长时间的沉默中，在你来激怒它之前。<page>也许她认为自己是这个地方的保护者，像她一样保持它干净和安静。课程的沉默意味着大多数与她相遇的人都找到了痛苦的结局。<page>我想说谢谢你的杀戮，但现在所有其他贝壳都醒着并且愤怒了，虫子的机会并没有增加太多。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Sir, I have cleared the way above these halls and defeated the Guardian White Knight.<hpage>She eventually claimed to be the child of a monarch, and her shells showed that it was true, a creature born purely of tightly woven silk.<hpage>Such a feat is possible. I have seen life woven out of silk before, but it is small and short... never like this.<page>Yes, bell ringer! You did kill a miracle... well, at least a flawed miracle.<page>People far away from her are, at least for us mortals. She looked like a child and her thoughts matched, but she had been wandering around this castle for a long time. Even in its long silence, before you come and provoke it.<page>Maybe she considers herself the protector of the place, keeping it clean and quiet like she does. The silence of the course meant that most of the people she met found painful endings.<page>I want to say thank you for the killing, but now that all the other shells are awake and angry, the chances of the bug have not increased much.

original_en_text: Hello again, dear one. Looks like we both made it up here, safe as told. And what a shock to find you were speaking the truth about this place!<page>A settlement like this in the Citadel, nice and safe, cloistering so many bugs with minds intact! Never seen anything like it, nor even imagined such.<page>Makes trading away all of my nice bits and baubles much easier. After all, I want to take lots and lots of rosaries with me when my strength finally fails!
original_zh_text: 又见面啦，亲爱的。看来咱俩都如预想的那样平安到达这儿了。真没想到你说的这个地方居然是真的！<page>在这圣堡里有这么一处庇护所，既舒适又安全，还住着这么多心智健全的虫子！我从没见过这样的地方，连想都没想过会有。<page>在这儿做点小买卖可容易多啦！毕竟，等我老得不行的时候，我想带上好多好多念珠，风光下葬呢！
translated_text: 又见面了，亲爱的。看来我们在这里已经和解了，而且正如我们所说的那样安全了。发现你对这个地方说的是实话，真是令人震惊！<page>城堡里有这样的定居点，又好又安全，远离这么多虫子，而且思想完好无损！我从未见过这样的事情，甚至没有想象过这样的事情。<page>让我所有漂亮的小工具更容易交易。毕竟，当我的力量最终失败时，我想随身携带很多很多的念珠！
secondary_translated_text: Hello again, dear. It seems we have reconciled here and are as safe as we say we are. It's shocking to find out that you were telling the truth about this place!<page>There are settlements like this in the castle, which are nice and safe, away from so many bugs, and the mind is intact! I have never seen anything like this, or even imagined anything like it.<page>Make all my beautiful gadgets easier to trade. After all, when my power finally fails, I want to carry many, many rosary beads with me!

original_en_text: Oho? You linger here still? Perhaps, like myself, you have been bewitched by the Plasmium’s beautiful glow?<page>Then join me, you must! A new assistant is needed. Together we shall unlock the secrets of this wondrous substance!
original_zh_text: 哦哟？你还没走呢？难道你也迷上生质液的蓝光了？<page>那就加入我吧！正好缺新助手，我们一起揭开这宝贝的秘密！
translated_text: 哦？你还在这里闲逛吗？或许，你也和我一样，被高原的美丽光芒所迷惑？<page>那就加入我吧，你一定要加入！需要一名新助理。我们将共同揭开这种奇妙物质的秘密！
secondary_translated_text: Oh? Are you still hanging out here? Perhaps, like me, you are also confused by the beautiful light of the plateau?<page>Then join me, you must join! A new assistant is needed. Together, we will reveal the secret of this wonderful substance!

original_en_text: There, you are replete with wonderful Plasmium once more! You can begin injecting it at once. Now, off with you!
original_zh_text: 拿好，神奇生质液又重新装满了！你又可以注射了，快出发吧！
translated_text: 在那里，你再次充满了美妙的高原！您可以立即开始注射。现在，走吧！
secondary_translated_text: There, you are filled with the wonderful plateau again! You can start the injection immediately. Now, go!

original_en_text: Assistant... You will help, yes? The buds have ripened... The Plasmium harvest can begin...
original_zh_text: 助手……你会帮忙的对吧？花苞熟了……该收集生质液了……
translated_text: 助手你会帮忙的，不是吗？花蕾成熟了... Plasmium收获可以开始了……
secondary_translated_text: Assistant, you'll help, won't you? The buds are ripe... The Plasmium harvest can begin...

original_en_text: Leave your fear behind... Cast it off like an old shell. Give me what I need...
original_zh_text: 抛开恐惧……像蜕壳一样扔掉。把东西给我……
translated_text: 把恐惧抛在脑后。把它像旧壳一样扔掉。给我我需要的。
secondary_translated_text: Put your fears behind you. Throw it away like an old shell. Give me what I need.

original_en_text: Bring the Pure Plasmium. It must be tested... ingested.<page>Ready the Needle Phial to full charge... Strike deep the ripened buds. Return that precious liquid life to me... Assistant.
original_zh_text: 带纯净生质液来……必须测试……吸收……<page>把储液针管蓄满力……扎进成熟花苞……把生质液带回来……
translated_text: 带上纯血浆。必须进行测试。摄入<page>准备好给针叶充电并将成熟的芽深深拍打。把那宝贵的液体生命还给我……助理
secondary_translated_text: Bring pure plasma. Testing must be carried out. intake<page>Be ready to recharge the needles and tap the ripe buds deeply. Give me back that precious liquid life... assistant

original_en_text: Excellent! With two bugs at the task, the rate of discovery shall greatly increase!<page>Now! Before he up and vanished, my previous assistant seeded the warrens below with Plasmium buds.<page>The buds should be ripening as we speak, and the nectar within must be extracted before they reach maturity.<page>With the right tool in claw, collecting the nectar is an easy process. I’ll even lend you my own Needle Phial for the job.<page>Once you locate a bud, simply charge the Phial until readied, then release its needle into a bud’s core. Do it right, and it’ll suck out the nectar in one clean pop!<page>Return them to me when you’ve retrieved the necessary samples. With the right nectar, and the right testing, Plasmium can reveal even more of its wondrous properties!
original_zh_text: 太好了！效率翻倍！<page>我那前任助手在下面虫道种了生质液花苞。<page>现在应该快成熟了，得在成熟前提取生质液。<page>用储液针管采集，很简单的，我把我用的借给你。<page>找到花苞后蓄满力，把针头扎进核心，嗖的一下就能抽出来！<page>把带样本回来。有了它们做实验，生质液会更神奇！
translated_text: 太好了！如果任务中出现两个错误，发现率将大大提高！<page>现在！在他站起来消失之前，我的前助理在下面的棚子里种了寄生虫芽。<page>正如我们所说，花蕾应该正在成熟，其中的花蜜必须在成熟之前提取。<page>在爪子中使用正确的工具，收集花蜜是一个简单的过程。我甚至会借给你我自己的Needle Phial来完成这项工作。<page>找到花蕾后，只需给Phial充电直至准备好，然后将其针释放到花蕾的核心中。如果你做得对，它就会干净地弹出并吸出花蜜！<page>当您取回必要的样本时，请将其退还给我。通过正确的花蜜和正确的测试，Plasmium可以揭示其更多奇妙的特性！
secondary_translated_text: Great! If two errors occur in the task, the discovery rate will be greatly improved!<page>Now! Before he stood up and disappeared, my former assistant planted parasite sprouts in the shed below.<page>As we said, the buds should be maturing and the nectar in them must be extracted before they mature.<page>Using the right tools in the claws, collecting nectar is a simple process. I will even lend you my own Needle Phial to do the job.<page>After finding the bud, just charge Phial until ready, then release its needle into the core of the bud. If you do it right, it will pop out cleanly and suck out the nectar!<page>When you retrieve the necessary samples, please return them to me. With the right nectar and the right testing, Plasmium can reveal more of its wonderful properties!

original_en_text: Assistant, that odour... aahhh... you have the Plasmified Blood...
original_zh_text: 助手……这气味……你拿到生质血了……
translated_text: 助理，那味道...啊你有血浆。
secondary_translated_text: Assistant, that smell... Ah, you have plasma.

original_en_text: Keep using the Plasmium Phial, and enjoy all the wonderful effects it has on your body. Once your Plasmium reserve runs dry, visit me again.<page>I’ll charge a few rosaries for refills, but you can be confident that every bead goes towards our vital studies!
original_zh_text: 尽管用，好好感受生质液的神奇。用完再来找我。<page>如果要重新装满生质液，我得收点念珠当经费，都是为科研做贡献！
translated_text: 继续使用Plasmium Phial并享受它对您身体的所有美妙影响。一旦你的Plasmium储备耗尽，请再来找我。<page>我会收取一些念珠来补充它们，但你可以相信，每一颗珠子都将用于我们重要的研究！
secondary_translated_text: Continue using Plasmium Phial and enjoy all its wonderful effects on your body. Please come back to me once your Plasmium reserves are exhausted.<page>I will collect some rosary beads to replenish them, but you can trust that each bead will be used for our important research!

original_en_text: Do you fear the Plasmium, even now? Ahhh... Assistant... open your mind to the possibilities...
original_zh_text: 现在还怕生质液？啊……助手……敞开心扉接受可能……
translated_text: 即使是现在，你还害怕高原吗？啊...助手敞开心扉，接受可能性。
secondary_translated_text: Even now, are you still afraid of the plateau? Ah... The assistant opens his heart and accepts the possibility.

original_en_text: Assistant... What we might become... together.
translated_text: 助手我们可能会成为什么。一起
secondary_translated_text: Assisting what we might become. together

original_en_text: Ahhhh. Yes... Assistant. So loyal... Take the Needle Phial... find the buds below. They are ripe...<page>Charge the Phial to full strength... Pierce them deep... Extract that Pure Plasmium.<page>This shell shall become what you need it to be... Plasmium can cure all.
original_zh_text: 啊……对……助手……真忠诚……拿着储液针管……去下面找熟透的花苞……<page>蓄满力……扎透核心……提取纯净生质液……<page>这副躯壳将完成蜕变……生质液会治愈一切……
translated_text: 啊是的...助理太忠诚了。握住针套。找到下面的花蕾。他们成熟了。<page>让菲尔尽力而为。深深地刺穿它们。提取纯Plasmium。<page>这个外壳看起来正是您需要的。血浆可以治愈一切。
secondary_translated_text: Ah yes... The assistant is too loyal. Hold the needle hub. Find the buds below. They mature.<page>Let Phil do his best. Piercing them deeply. Extract pure Plasmium.<page>This shell looks exactly what you need. Plasma can cure everything.

original_en_text: Assistant! You’re still dallying about here? I’ve an eager need for pure Plasmium, fresh from the bud.<page>Just one fully charged stab of my Needle Phial straight into a ripe bud! You’ll suck the Plasmium right up!<page>Now, pop down into those worm warrens and extract it for me! What could possibly be more important?
original_zh_text: 助手！怎么还在这磨蹭？我要花苞里的新鲜生质液！<page>用储液针管扎成熟花苞，把生质液抽出来就行！<page>好了，快去虫道干活！还有什么比这更重要的？
translated_text: 助理！你还在这里闲逛吗？我迫切需要萌芽中的纯Plasmium。<page>只需将我的针充满电并直接刺穿成熟的花蕾即可！你会吸收Plasmium！<page>现在，跳到那些蠕虫区域并为我提取它！什么更重要？
secondary_translated_text: Assistant! Are you still hanging out here? I urgently need pure Plasmium in the bud.<page>Just fully charge my needle and pierce the ripe bud directly! You will absorb Plasmium!<page>Now, jump to those worm areas and extract it for me! What is more important?

original_en_text: <hpage>I am curious about the equipment you have here, and the blue liquid contained within. What study consumes you?<page>Ahh yes! So this miraculous substance intrigues you too! A wonder beyond wonders, miracle made material!<page>Plasmium! A naturally occurring elixir with no equal! It heals wounds and strengthens shells! I suspect it can even defy death itself!<hpage>Plasmium, you call it? I have encountered its like before, or else a substance of remarkable similarity...<page>Highly unlikely! The grey and barren soil of the mainland could never produce something as singular as this, and that is undisputable fact!<page>Plasmium was discovered by my master at the farthest edge of Pharloom, hidden deep in salt-stricken waters. I brought it to these caves under her direction, to study how it flourishes in a foreign place.<page>Perhaps, like myself, you have been bewitched by the Plasmium’s beautiful glow? Would you assent then, to assisting me in my studies?
original_zh_text: <hpage>我对这些仪器和蓝色液体有点好奇，你在研究什么？<page>啊哈！你也对这神奇物质感兴趣！这是奇迹中的奇迹，实体化的魔法！<page>生质液！无与伦比的天然灵药！疗伤健体，说不定还能起死回生！<hpage>生质液？我好像见过类似的……<page>不可能！纺络那贫瘠的灰土地产不出这种宝贝，这是铁的事实！<page>最初是我的导师在王国边陲的咸水深处发现了它。我奉命带到这山洞研究异地培育。<page>难道你也迷上生质液的蓝光了？要不要当我的研究助手？
translated_text: <hpage>我对您的设备和其中包含的蓝色液体很好奇。哪些学习消耗了你的精力？<page>啊，是的！所以这种神奇的物质也吸引着你！奇迹之外的奇迹，奇迹创造的材料！<page>Plasmium！无与伦比的天然灵丹妙药！它可以治愈伤口并增强贝壳！我怀疑它甚至可以抵抗死亡本身！<hpage>你称之为高原吗？我以前遇到过这样的东西，或者非常相似的物质。<page>非常不可能！大陆灰色贫瘠的土地永远不可能产生如此奇怪的东西，这是无可争议的事实！<page>Plasmium是我的主人在法罗岛最远的边缘发现的，隐藏在盐水深处。在她的指导下，我把它带到了这些洞穴，研究它如何在陌生的地方茁壮成长。<page>或许，你也和我一样，被高原的美丽光芒所迷惑？那么你愿意帮我学习吗？
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I am curious about your equipment and the blue liquid it contains. What studies consume your energy?<page>Ah, yes! So this magical substance attracts you too! Miracles beyond miracles, the materials created by miracles!<page>Plasmium! An unparalleled natural panacea! It heals wounds and strengthens shells! I suspect it can even resist death itself!<hpage>Do you call it the plateau? I've encountered something like this before, or something very similar.<page>Very impossible! It is an indisputable fact that the gray and barren land of the continent can never produce such a strange thing!<page>Plasmium was discovered by my owner on the farthest edge of the Faroe Island, hidden deep in the salt water. Under her guidance, I took it to these caves to study how it thrived in unfamiliar places.<page>Perhaps, like me, you are also confused by the beautiful light of the plateau? So would you like to help me study?

original_en_text: Plasmium is a marvel of nature! And a new assistant is sorely needed. Together, let us unlock its secrets!
original_zh_text: 生质液是自然奇迹！正好缺新助手，我们一起揭开它的秘密吧！
translated_text: 高原是大自然的奇迹！非常需要一名新助理。让我们一起揭开它的秘密！
secondary_translated_text: The plateau is a miracle of nature! A new assistant is in great need. Let's reveal its secrets together!

original_en_text: Oho? A new face! Not here to bother, I hope? I’ve critical studies underway in these twisting tunnels and can afford no distractions!<page>You haven’t met Zango, my assistant, by chance? An indolent sort? Short, slovenly, rather unreliable-seeming?<hpage>In a dark cave below here, I encountered a shell not dissimilar from your own. I suspect your assistant may have met an unfortunate end.<page>Ah ha! That careless buffoon. No surprises then. That lump never shone with the talent for true discovery.<page>Now! To my work I must return! With my assistant so rudely dying on me, I’ve tasks enough for two bugs.<page>Unless you have further interest in my precious Plasmium, kindly leave me in peace!
original_zh_text: 哦哟？新面孔！不是来捣乱的吧？我在这些弯弯绕绕的洞里搞重大研究，可经不起分心！<page>有见过我助手赞戈吗？懒骨头一个，矮个子邋遢样，看着就不靠谱？<hpage>我在下方一黑暗洞窟里见到过和你挺像的尸壳，看来你的助手可能遭遇了不幸。<page>哈！那个冒失鬼。一点也不意外，废物本来就没科研天赋。<page>好了！我得赶紧开始研究了！现在死了助手，我得干双份活。<page>除非你对生质液感兴趣，否则别打扰我！
translated_text: 哦？一张新面孔！我希望我不是来打扰你们的，对吧？我正在这些扭曲的隧道中做批判性研究，不能分心！<page>你没有碰巧见过我的助理赞戈吗？懒惰的那种？简短、草率、不可靠。<hpage>在下面一个黑暗的洞穴里，我发现了一个和你的贝壳没有什么不同。我怀疑你的助手可能遭遇了不幸。<page>啊哈！那个粗心的小丑。这并不奇怪。那个肿块从未表现出真正的发现天赋。<page>现在！我得回去工作了！由于我的助手对我如此粗鲁地死去，我的任务足以处理两个错误。<page>除非你对我珍贵的Plasmium有进一步的兴趣，否则请让我安息吧！
secondary_translated_text: Oh? A new face! I hope I'm not here to bother you, am I? I am doing critical research in these distorted tunnels and cannot be distracted!<page>Haven't you happened to meet my assistant Zango? The lazy kind? Short, sloppy and unreliable.<hpage>In a dark cave below, I found one no different from your shell. I suspect that your assistant may have encountered an unfortunate accident.<page>Aha! That careless clown. This is not surprising. That lump never showed a true gift for discovery.<page>Now! I have to get back to work! Since my assistant died so rudely to me, my task was sufficient to deal with two mistakes.<page>Unless you have a further interest in my precious Plasmium, please let me rest in peace!

original_en_text: Oh? Those who hesitate learn nothing, you know! The wondrous bright glow of Plasmium makes all things clear!
original_zh_text: 哦？犹豫可学不到新知识！生质液的美丽蓝光会照亮一切！
translated_text: 哦？那些犹豫不决的人什么也学不到，你知道的！等离子体奇妙明亮的光线让一切都清晰了！
secondary_translated_text: Oh? Those who hesitate learn nothing, you know! The wonderfully bright light of the plasma makes everything clear!

original_en_text: <hpage>I have retrieved the Pure Plasmium, as requested. Know that, in your current state, I feel some reservation passing it to you.<hpage>This path your research takes... The final result may not be pleasant.<page>Pure Plasmium? No... Assistant... You must not doubt... It is precious. Perfect. It was needed... You have done well. As always...
original_zh_text: <hpage>你要的纯净生质液。但要交给这样状态的你，我有点犹豫。<hpage>你的研究方向……结局可能不太妙。<page>纯净生质液？不……助手……别怀疑……这是珍宝……完美……必须的……干得好……
translated_text: <hpage>我已经按照需要取回了纯粹高原。你知道，以你现在的状态，我对你有一些保留。<hpage>您的研究所正在走这条路。最终的结果可能并不令人愉快。<page>纯Plasmium？没有。助理。你不能怀疑它。它很珍贵。完美的就是它所需要的。你做得很好一如既往。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I have retrieved the Pure Plateau as needed. You know, in your current state, I have some reservations about you.<hpage>Your institute is going down this path. The end result may not be pleasant.<page>Pure Plasmium? No. Assistant. You can't doubt it. It's precious. Perfect is what it needs. You're doing great as always.

original_en_text: These lands have taken the Plasmium well... the soil has drunk it deep, and the creatures bloom so beautifully... have you seen them?<hpage>The effect of your Plasmium on the beasts here is all too evident. Great change has been inflicted upon them.<hpage>There is an echo also of other infections I have witnessed. I wonder at the meaning of it all... or if I am perhaps imagining similarities where there are none.<page>Assistant, ahhh... you grow more inquisitive... We both seek deeper insight...<page>Could we... peer deeper inside somehow...? Let us think on it...
original_zh_text: 这片土地吸收了生质液……深入土壤，深入生物，花苞绽放……看见了吗？<hpage>你的生质液让野兽变异，影响太明显了。<hpage>这让我想起以前见过的其他感染，不知是巧合还是……<page>助手啊……你也变好奇了……想深入探索……<page>或许……我们该更进一步研究？……让我想想……
translated_text: 这些土地很好地吸收了钚。土壤深深地吸干了它，这些生物绽放得如此美丽……你见过他们吗？<hpage>你们高原对这里的野兽的影响太明显了。他们发生了巨大的变化。<hpage>我见过的其他感染也有相似之处。我想知道这意味着什么.或者我可能在想象没有相似之处的地方。<page>助理啊.你变得越来越好奇，我们都在寻求更深层次的见解。<page>我们可以的以某种方式窥视内心深处……？让我们考虑一下。
secondary_translated_text: These lands absorb plutonium well. The soil sucked it dry deeply, and these creatures bloomed so beautifully... Have you seen them?<hpage>The influence of your plateau on the beasts here is too obvious. They have undergone tremendous changes.<hpage>Other infections I have seen have similarities. I want to know what that means. Or I may be imagining places that have no similarities.<page>Assistant. You become more and more curious, and we are all seeking deeper insights.<page>Can we somehow peek deep into our hearts…? Let's think about it.

original_en_text: Ahhhh... Assistant... greed was ever your greatest failing. Do not guard your discoveries so jealously...
original_zh_text: 啊……助手……贪婪是你的弱点……别独占成果……
translated_text: 啊啊啊...助手贪婪曾经是你最大的失败。不要如此危险地保护你的发现。
secondary_translated_text: Ahhhh... Assistant greed was once your biggest failure. Don't protect your discoveries so dangerously.

original_en_text: For you... dear assistant... drink deep my liquid life...
original_zh_text: 喝吧……亲爱的助手……饮下我的生命精华……
translated_text: 为了你...亲爱的助理。深深地喝下我的液体生活。
secondary_translated_text: For you... Dear assistant. Drink my liquid life deeply.

original_en_text: Since you have proven yourself a capable assistant, take this delightful implement of my own invention, a Plasmium Phial.<page>With it, you can inject precious Plasmium straight into your body. Almost painlessly!<hpage>Your tool certainly looks sharp enough to pierce my shell, sir, but why should I want to do so?<page>Because filling your body with Plasmium is so beneficial! It protects you from harm! And it feels so exquisitely good!<page>My assistant and I have been injecting Plasmium into the local flora and fauna since we arrived. No ill effects have been observed, and so we can conclude that the process is utterly, completely safe.<page>Keep using the Plasmium Phial, and enjoy all the wonderful effects it has on your body. If you ever run out of Plasmium, visit me again.<page>I’ll charge a few rosaries for refills, but you can be confident that every bead goes towards our vital studies!
original_zh_text: 既然你够格当助手，送你个好东西——生质液瓶！<page>有了它，就能直接往甲壳里注射生质液，几乎不疼！<hpage>这工具确实足够扎穿我的外壳，但我为何要这么做？<page>因为注射生质液好处多多！不仅能防止受伤，而且感觉非常好！<page>我和助手给本地动植物都打过，没出现任何副作用，完全安全！<page>尽管用，好好感受生质液的神奇。用完再来找我。<page>如果要重新装满生质液，我得收点念珠当经费，都是为科研做贡献！
translated_text: 既然您已经证明了自己是一名有能力的助手，请带上我自己发明的这个令人愉快的工具Plasmium Phial。<page>有了它，您可以将珍贵的Plastium直接注射到您的体内。几乎无痛！<hpage>先生，你的工具看起来确实足够锋利，可以刺穿我的壳，但我为什么要这么做呢？<page>因为用Plasmium填充你的身体非常有益！它保护您免受伤害！感觉太棒了！<page>自从我们到达后，我和我的助手一直在向当地的动植物注射Plasmium。没有观察到任何不良影响，因此我们可以得出结论，该过程是完全、完全安全的。<page>继续使用Plasmium Phial并享受它对您身体的所有美妙影响。如果你的Plasmium用完了，请再来找我。<page>我会收取一些念珠来补充它们，但你可以相信，每一颗珠子都将用于我们重要的研究！
secondary_translated_text: Now that you have proven yourself to be a capable assistant, please bring along this delightful tool Plasmium Phial that I invented myself.<page>With it, you can inject precious Plastium directly into your body. Almost painless!<hpage>Sir, your tool does seem sharp enough to pierce my shell, but why would I do that?<page>Because filling your body with Plasmium is very beneficial! It protects you from harm! It feels great!<page>Since we arrived, my assistant and I have been injecting Plasmium into local flora and fauna. No adverse effects were observed, so we can conclude that the process is completely, completely safe.<page>Continue using Plasmium Phial and enjoy all its wonderful effects on your body. If you run out of Plasmium, please come back to me.<page>I will collect some rosary beads to replenish them, but you can trust that each bead will be used for our important research!

original_en_text: Ahh, and exactly the required amount! A satisfactory effort, assistant!<page>With this pure Plasmium extract, I may finally come to understand this wondrous substance.
original_zh_text: 啊，分量刚好足够！干得不错！<page>有这纯净生质液，终于能破解奥秘了！
translated_text: 啊，这就是所需的数量！令人满意的努力，助理！<page>有了这种纯粹的Plasmium提取物，我终于可以理解这种奇妙的物质了。
secondary_translated_text: Ah, this is the amount needed! Satisfying effort, assistant!<page>With this pure Plasmium extract, I can finally understand this wonderful substance.

original_en_text: Assistant... You will help, yes? The buds have ripened... The Plasmium harvest can begin...
original_zh_text: 助手……你会帮忙的对吧？花苞熟了……该收集生质液了……
translated_text: 助手你会帮忙的，不是吗？花蕾成熟了... Plasmium收获可以开始了……
secondary_translated_text: Assistant, you'll help, won't you? The buds are ripe... The Plasmium harvest can begin...

original_en_text: <hpage>Take it, sir, though what insight it will grant you I cannot say.<page>Have faith, dear assistant... After all this I understand... the greatest knowledge comes only from faith... faith in Plasmium.<page>This blood you have collected... sparkles... I see it! A glorious form... a glorious future, shimmering back at us...
original_zh_text: <hpage>拿去吧，虽然不知能研究出什么。<page>要有信念，好助手……我现在明白了……真理源自信念……对生质液的信念……<page>你收集的血……在发光……我看见了！辉煌形态……辉煌未来……等着我们……
translated_text: <hpage>先生，请接受它，尽管我不能说它会给您带来什么见解。<page>有信心，亲爱的助手。经过这一切我明白了。最伟大的知识只来自信仰……对Plasmium的信仰。<page>你收集的这些血。闪闪发光。我看到了！光荣的形式。辉煌的未来闪耀在我们身上……
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Please accept it, sir, although I cannot say what insight it will bring to you.<page>Have confidence, dear assistant. After all this, I understand. The greatest knowledge comes only from faith…faith in Plasmium.<page>The blood you collected. Shimmering. I saw it! Glorious form. A glorious future shines on us...

original_en_text: You decline, Assistant? You cannot. The buds... The harvest. It must occur... For the source, and your saving...
original_zh_text: 你拒绝？花苞……必须收割……为了源头，也为了救你……
translated_text: 助理，你拒绝了吗？你不能伙计丰收它必须发生。为了来源和您的储蓄。
secondary_translated_text: Assistant, did you refuse? You can't, man. Harvest has to happen. For the source and your savings.

original_en_text: You would refuse?! There is much work to be done, and it is all so achingly slow when I have no aid!
original_zh_text: 你要拒绝？！这么多活要干，没助手进度太慢了！
translated_text: 你会拒绝吗？！有很多工作要做，但当我不帮忙的时候，一切都那么慢！
secondary_translated_text: Would you refuse?! There is a lot of work to do, but when I am not helping, everything is so slow!

original_en_text: Ohhhhh... Assistant? Is that you?... You return at last, my friend?<hpage>Sir, you are in a disturbing state. This substance sprouts from within your shell. Time will see it consume you entirely. Would you seek aid?<page>No... No... Assistant... you are confused. A wonderful thing, we become. The Plasmium, our great research... We have progressed.<page>The research must continue. Soon... I shall become a source.
