original_zh_text: 呃啊啊……助手？是你吗……终于回来了……<hpage>先生，你身体状态异常。某种物质在你壳内滋生，迟早会吞噬你。需要帮助吗？<page>不……不……助手……你错了。我们在进化……生质液……研究大突破……<page>研究必须继续……很快……我将成为源头……
translated_text: 哦哈哈。助理？是你吗？..我的朋友，你终于回来了吗？<hpage>先生，您的情况令人不安。这种物质从你的壳中发芽。时间会看到它完全吞噬你。你会寻求帮助吗？<page>不。不。助理。你很困惑。我们成为一件美妙的事情。我们对血浆的伟大研究取得了进展。<page>研究必须继续。很快...我将成为一个来源。
secondary_translated_text: Oh haha. Assistant? Is that you?.. My friend, are you finally back?<hpage>Sir, your situation is disturbing. This substance germinate from your shell. Time will see it completely devour you. Would you ask for help?<page>No. No. Assistant. You're confused. We become a wonderful thing. We have made progress in our great research on plasma.<page>Research must continue. Soon... I will be a source.

original_en_text: Assistant! Have you come to refill your reserve of Plasmium?
original_zh_text: 助手！你是来补充生质液的？
translated_text: 助理！您来这里是为了补充Plasmium储备吗？
secondary_translated_text: Assistant! Are you here to replenish your Plasmium reserves?

original_en_text: Oho? A new face! Not here to bother, I hope? I’ve critical studies underway in these twisting tunnels and can afford no distractions!<page>You haven’t met Zango, my assistant, by chance? An indolent sort? Short, slovenly, rather unreliable-seeming?<hpage>I have not, sir. I am curious though, about the equipment you have here, and the blue liquid contained within. What study consumes you?<page>Ahh yes! So this miraculous substance intrigues you too! A wonder beyond wonders, miracle made material!<page>Plasmium! A naturally occurring elixir with no equal! It heals wounds and strengthens shells! I suspect it can even defy death itself!<hpage>Plasmium, you call it? I have encountered its like before, or else a substance of remarkable similarity...<page>Highly unlikely! The grey and barren soil of the mainland could never produce something as singular as this, and that is indisputable fact.<page>Plasmium was first discovered by my master at the farthest edge of Pharloom, hidden deep in salt-stricken waters. I brought it to these caves under her direction, to study how it flourishes in a foreign place.<page>Now! To my work I must return! Unless you have further interest in my precious Plasmium, or chance upon my truant assistant, kindly leave me in peace!
original_zh_text: 哦哟？新面孔！不是来捣乱的吧？我在这些弯弯绕绕的洞里搞重大研究，可经不起分心！<page>有见过我助手赞戈吗？懒骨头一个，矮个子邋遢样，看着就不靠谱？<hpage>没见过。不过我对这些仪器和蓝色液体有点好奇，你在研究什么？<page>啊哈！你也对这神奇物质感兴趣！这是奇迹中的奇迹，实体化的魔法！<page>生质液！无与伦比的天然灵药！疗伤健体，说不定还能起死回生！<hpage>生质液？我好像见过类似的……<page>不可能！纺络那贫瘠的灰土地产不出这种宝贝，这是铁的事实！<page>最初是我的导师在王国边陲的咸水深处发现了它。我奉命带到这山洞研究异地培育。<page>好了！我要继续工作了！除非你对生质液感兴趣，或者碰见我那翘班助手，否则别打扰我！
translated_text: 哦？一张新面孔！我希望我不是来打扰你们的，对吧？我正在这些扭曲的隧道中做批判性研究，不能分心！<page>你没有碰巧见过我的助理赞戈吗？懒惰的那种？简短、草率、不可靠。<hpage>我没有，先生。不过，我对你们这里的设备以及里面含有的蓝色液体很好奇。哪些学习消耗了你的精力？<page>啊，是的！所以这种神奇的物质也吸引着你！奇迹之外的奇迹，奇迹创造的材料！<page>Plasmium！无与伦比的天然灵丹妙药！它可以治愈伤口并增强贝壳！我怀疑它甚至可以抵抗死亡本身！<hpage>你称之为高原吗？我以前遇到过这样的东西，或者非常相似的物质。<page>非常不可能！无可争议的事实是，大陆灰色贫瘠的土壤永远不可能产生如此奇怪的东西。<page>Plasmium是我的主人在法罗岛最远的边缘发现的，隐藏在盐水深处。在她的指导下，我把它带到了这些洞穴，研究它如何在陌生的地方茁壮成长。<page>现在！我得回去工作了！除非你对我珍贵的Plasmium有进一步的兴趣，或者偶然发现我的逃学助理，否则请让我安息吧！
secondary_translated_text: Oh? A new face! I hope I'm not here to bother you, am I? I am doing critical research in these distorted tunnels and cannot be distracted!<page>Haven't you happened to meet my assistant Zango? The lazy kind? Short, sloppy and unreliable.<hpage>I'm not, sir. However, I am very curious about the equipment you have here and the blue liquid it contains. What studies consume your energy?<page>Ah, yes! So this magical substance attracts you too! Miracles beyond miracles, the materials created by miracles!<page>Plasmium! An unparalleled natural panacea! It heals wounds and strengthens shells! I suspect it can even resist death itself!<hpage>Do you call it the plateau? I've encountered something like this before, or something very similar.<page>Very impossible! The indisputable fact is that the gray and barren soil of the continent could never produce anything so strange.<page>Plasmium was discovered by my owner on the farthest edge of the Faroe Island, hidden deep in the salt water. Under her guidance, I took it to these caves to study how it thrived in unfamiliar places.<page>Now! I have to get back to work! Unless you have a further interest in my precious Plasmium or stumble across my truant assistant, please let me rest in peace!

original_en_text: There... more. Let it seep deep into your shell... do not begrudge the pain...
original_zh_text: 灌满了……让液体渗入甲壳深处……别怕疼……
translated_text: 那里... mais让它深入你的壳。不要嫉妒痛苦。
secondary_translated_text: There... Mais Let it go deep into your shell. Don't be jealous of pain.

original_en_text: The Pure Plasmium... you have it. I can... smell it on you.
original_zh_text: 纯净生质液……你带来了。我闻到了……
translated_text: 纯血浆。你有。我可以。闻到你的气味。
secondary_translated_text: Pure plasma. You have. I can. Smell your scent.

original_en_text: Through consumption of the blood... we shall at last attain enlightenment...<page>For your reward... take the gland from within my shell... my gift to you.<page>I have no more need of it... and it shall grant you... unending reserves of Plasmium...<page>Yes... Plasmium. Pure... beautiful... Plasmium...
original_zh_text: 吸收生质血……我们终将开悟……<page>给你的奖励是……拿走吧……我壳里的腺体……<page>我不需要了……它会给你……无限生质液……<page>没错……生质液……纯净……美丽……
translated_text: 通过消耗血液。我们最终会获得启蒙。<page>作为你的奖励。把腺体从我的壳里拿出来。我给你的礼物。<page>我不再需要它了。它将授予你。一望无际的高原储备。<page>是的... Plasmium。Pure.漂亮...等离子体
secondary_translated_text: By consuming blood. We will eventually gain enlightenment.<page>As your reward. Get the glands out of my shell. My gift to you.<page>I don't need it anymore. It will be awarded to you. Endless plateau reserves.<page>Yes... Plasmium。Pure. Beautiful... the plasma

original_en_text: Assistant! How goes your work? Have you extracted a sufficient amount of Plasmium for me?
original_zh_text: 助手！进展如何？提取到足够生质液了吗？
translated_text: 助理！你的工作怎么样？你为我提取了足够的Plasmium吗？
secondary_translated_text: Assistant! How is your job? Have you extracted enough Plasmium for me?

original_en_text: Excellent! With two bugs at the task, the rate of discovery shall greatly increase!<page>Now! Before he went and died, my previous assistant seeded the warrens below with Plasmium buds.<page>The buds should be ripening as we speak, and the nectar within must be extracted before they reach maturity.<page>With the right tool in claw, collecting the nectar is an easy process. I’ll even lend you my own Needle Phial for the job.<page>Once you locate a bud, simply charge the Phial until readied, then release its needle into a bud’s core. Do it right, and it’ll suck out the nectar in one clean pop!<page>Return them to me when you’ve retrieved the necessary samples. With the right nectar, and the right testing, Plasmium can reveal even more of its wondrous properties!
original_zh_text: 太好了！效率翻倍！<page>我那死鬼助手在下面虫道种了生质液花苞。<page>现在应该快成熟了，得在成熟前提取生质液。<page>用储液针管采集，很简单的，我把我用的借给你。<page>找到花苞后蓄满力，把针头扎进核心，嗖的一下就能抽出来！<page>把带样本回来。有了它们做实验，生质液会更神奇！
translated_text: 太好了！如果任务中出现两个错误，发现率将大大提高！<page>现在！在他去世之前，我的前助理在下面的谷仓里种了Plasmium豆芽。<page>正如我们所说，花蕾应该正在成熟，其中的花蜜必须在成熟之前提取。<page>在爪子中使用正确的工具，收集花蜜是一个简单的过程。我甚至会借给你我自己的Needle Phial来完成这项工作。<page>找到花蕾后，只需给Phial充电直至准备好，然后将其针释放到花蕾的核心中。如果你做得对，它就会干净地弹出并吸出花蜜！<page>当您取回必要的样本时，请将其退还给我。通过正确的花蜜和正确的测试，Plasmium可以揭示其更多奇妙的特性！
secondary_translated_text: Great! If two errors occur in the task, the discovery rate will be greatly improved!<page>Now! Before he passed away, my former assistant planted Plasmium bean sprouts in the barn below.<page>As we said, the buds should be maturing and the nectar in them must be extracted before they mature.<page>Using the right tools in the claws, collecting nectar is a simple process. I will even lend you my own Needle Phial to do the job.<page>After finding the bud, just charge Phial until ready, then release its needle into the core of the bud. If you do it right, it will pop out cleanly and suck out the nectar!<page>When you retrieve the necessary samples, please return them to me. With the right nectar and the right testing, Plasmium can reveal more of its wonderful properties!

original_en_text: Are you so enchanted by the Plasmium that you will not part with it? You are more like that dolt Zango than I first thought!<page>Its enlightenings are beyond your meagre mind! Give me the phial, assistant, or the deeper secrets of this substance will never be revealed!
original_zh_text: 舍不得交出来？你和赞戈那蠢货一个德行！<page>你这脑子参不透其中奥秘的！不交出生质液就永远别想知道秘密！
translated_text: 您是否对高原如此着迷以至于不会放弃它？你比我最初想象的更像桑戈那个傻瓜！<page>它的启示超出了你微薄的头脑！把药瓶和助手给我，否则这种物质更深层次的秘密永远不会被揭露！
secondary_translated_text: Are you so fascinated by the plateau that you won't give it up? You look more like Sango than I first thought!<page>Its revelation goes beyond your meager mind! Give me the medicine bottle and assistant, or the deeper secrets of this substance will never be revealed!

original_en_text: Aahhh... and you have been using your Plasmium... good. Let me replenish your reserve...
original_zh_text: 啊……你一直在注射生质液……很好。让我给你补满……
translated_text: 啊...您的血浆利用率一直很好。让我补充你的储备。
secondary_translated_text: Ah... Your plasma utilization has been very good. Let me replenish your reserves.

original_en_text: Now. Share the discovery... Take this Plasmium Phial... Plunge it deep. Feel its vigour soak your shell...<page>If more is needed... If the Plasmium runs dry... return. Visit me again... That you may live, long... my loyal assistant.
original_zh_text: 现在，分享成果……拿着生质液瓶……扎进去……感受活力渗透……<page>用完再来找我……这样你才能……活得长久……我的好助手……
translated_text: 现在分享这一发现。以这个高原Phial为例。深入参与其中。感觉它的活力浸透了你的壳……<page>如果您需要更多。如果Plasmium干涸。回报.再来看我吧。祝您长寿。我忠实的助手。
secondary_translated_text: Share this finding now. Take this plateau Phial as an example. Deeply participate in it. Feel its vitality soak through your shell...<page>If you need more. If Plasmium dries up. returns. Come and see me again. I wish you a long life. My loyal assistant.

original_en_text: Grant the Herald’s wish and finish the game
original_zh_text: 成全使者的心愿，终结这场宿命
translated_text: 实现《先驱报》的愿望并结束比赛
secondary_translated_text: Fulfill the Herald's wishes and end the game
Defeat the lace in the cradle

translated_text: 拿起您的第一个佳士得

original_zh_text: 击败“斯卡尔歌后”卡梅莉塔

original_zh_text: 达成100%完成度并通关游戏

secondary_translated_text: Achieve 100% game completion and complete the game

original_zh_text: 收集全部忆痕并在钟居展示

Beat the lace in Deep Wood

secondary_translated_text: Learn the triple song of the castle

secondary_translated_text: Saved half of Farham's lost fleas

original_en_text: <hpage>Very well. This final rite... what would you have me do?<page>The time... of birth is close. Now give... its shell. Host... the final rite.<page>The time of birth... is near.
original_zh_text: <hpage>好吧。这最终仪式……需要我做什么？<page>诞生……之时。献出……甲壳。宿主……终仪。<page>诞辰……已至。
translated_text: <hpage>好.这最后的仪式。你想让我做什么<page>的时间...出生的时间即将到来。现在就给吧。它的壳。主持人最后的仪式。<page>出生时间。近
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>good. This last ceremony. what do you want me to do<page>The time... The time of birth is approaching. Give it now. Its shell. The host's final ceremony.<page>Time of birth. nearly

original_en_text: You may rest here in this sacred place, but know, if you choose to step further, you shall see my weapon raised.
original_zh_text: 你可以在此处休息，但记住，越界意味着面对我的兵刃。
translated_text: 你可以在这个神圣的地方休息，但要知道，如果你选择走得更远，你会看到我的武器举起。
secondary_translated_text: You can rest in this sacred place, but know that if you choose to go further, you will see my weapons raised.

original_en_text: The time... the time of birth approaches. The bud cries. Yearning. The final rite may begin.<page>White shell. Red cloak. Bug strong and old. The time of birth is near. Aid now the final rite.
original_zh_text: 时刻……诞生之时将至。花苞啼哭。终仪可启。<page>白面红袍。古老强虫。诞生之时已至，此刻助我终仪。
translated_text: 的时间...出生的时间即将到来。花蕾在哭泣。欲望最后的仪式可以开始了。<page>白色的壳。红色斗篷。昆虫强大且古老。出生的时间即将到来。现在为最后的仪式提供帮助。
secondary_translated_text: The time... The time of birth is approaching. The flower buds are crying. The final ritual of desire can begin.<page>White shell. Red cloak. Insects are powerful and ancient. The time of birth is approaching. Now provide assistance for the final ceremony.

original_en_text: P... Pollip Hearts. Gathered. Gathered all. All that is needed, is given.
translated_text: P... Pollip Hearts聚集所有人。所需的一切都已给予。
secondary_translated_text: P... Pollip Hearts gathered everyone. Everything needed has been given.

original_en_text: <hpage>I hear your request, but I must decline. My travels will take me far beyond this wood.<page>Decline. No. Decline, not. The time of birth approaches. The first rite must begin.
original_zh_text: <hpage>很遗憾，我有要事在身，没法帮忙。<page>拒绝。不可。诞生之时将至。仪式必启。
translated_text: <hpage>我听到了你的请求，但我必须拒绝。我的旅程将带我远远超出这些树林。<page>下降没有。拒绝，没有。出生的时候即将到来。第一场仪式必须开始。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I heard your request, but I must refuse it. My journey will take me far beyond these woods.<page>Falling no. Rejected, no. The time of birth is coming. The first ceremony must begin.

original_en_text: <hpage>If you have knowledge or power to grant, I will aid you. These Pollip Hearts you desire... they can be found about the wood?<page>P... Pollip Hearts. Found in the wood. Yes, bug.<page>Seek out the purple blooms. Inside... the hearts.<page>The time of birth approaches. Pollip Hearts are needed. Bring them, bug, and power will be shared.
original_zh_text: <hpage>若你能分享只是，我愿意帮忙。哪里能找到花芯？<page>花……花芯。树林间，对。<page>寻找紫花。芯……在其中。<page>诞生之时将至。带来花芯，共享力量。
translated_text: <hpage>如果你有知识或能力给予，我会帮助你。你想要的这些Pollip Heart。它们能在木头上找到吗？<page>P... Pollip Hearts。在树林里发现的。是的，虫子。<page>寻找紫色的花。在里面...心<page>出生的时间即将到来。需要Pollip Heart。带来它们，虫子，权力就会被共享。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>If you have the knowledge or ability to give, I will help you. The Pollip Heart you want. Can they be found on wood?<page>P... Pollip Hearts。Found it in the woods. Yes, bugs.<page>Look for purple flowers. Inside... heart<page>The time of birth is approaching. Need Pollip Heart. Bring them, bugs, and power will be shared.

original_en_text: Bug. Cloaked by red. The time of rebirth approaches.<page>First rite is completed. Prepared. For the time of birth.<page>Take... take. The refuse of the rite.
original_zh_text: 红袍虫。重生之时将至。<page>初仪完成。准备。迎接诞生。<page>收下……仪式残渣。
translated_text: Bug.穿着红色外套。重生的时刻即将到来。<page>第一次仪式结束。出生时做好准备。<page>采取. take.断然拒绝。
secondary_translated_text: Bug. Wearing a red coat. The time of rebirth is coming.<page>The first ceremony ended. Be prepared at birth.<page>take... take. Refuse flatly.

original_en_text: Rrrr... rite. The first rite must begin. Pollip Hearts are needed.
original_zh_text: 呃……仪式。初仪必启。需要花芯。
translated_text: 呃...道场的第一场仪式必须开始。Pollip Heart是必要的。
secondary_translated_text: Uh... The first ceremony of the dojo must begin. Pollip Heart is necessary.

original_en_text: <hpage>I am unable to help you. Not now. Perhaps another traveller will offer aid.<page>None... none come now. Once times, many bugs. Many. Now none. The final rite... the time of birth approaches...
original_zh_text: <hpage>我现在无法帮助你，或许会有其他旅者伸出援手。<page>无虫……曾有许多……如今无虫。终仪……诞生之时将至……
translated_text: <hpage>我帮不了你。现在不行也许另一位旅行者会提供帮助。<page>不。现在没有人来。有很多错误。还有更多，现在没有了。最后的仪式。出生的时间即将到来。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I cannot help you. Not now. Maybe another traveler will help.<page>No. No one is coming now. There are many mistakes. There are more, but now there is none. The final ceremony. The time of birth is approaching.

original_en_text: Bug. Red cloak. Far-travelled. Bring it here... the bud.<page>It calls. It cries for the rite. Offer it.
original_zh_text: 虫。红袍虫。远旅者。你带来了……花苞。<page>它在呼唤。呼唤仪式。献上吧。
translated_text: Bug.红色斗篷。旅行很远。把它带到这里。萌芽状态<page>它在召唤。它需要仪式。提供它。
secondary_translated_text: Bug. Red cloak. It's a long journey. Bring it here. the bud<page>It's calling. It requires ritual. Provide it.

original_en_text: Then go no further, that peace may remain between us.
original_zh_text: 那请就此止步，不必打破这份和平。
translated_text: 那就别再走了，我们之间可能会和平。
secondary_translated_text: Then don't leave anymore. There may be peace between us.

original_en_text: The bud... weak. New. It must be nourished.<page>Nnn... nourished. It will be nourished.
original_zh_text: 花苞……孱弱。新生。需要滋养。<page>滋……滋养。得到滋养。
translated_text: 伙计弱.新的.它必须得到滋养。<page>嗯.滋养。它将被滋养。
secondary_translated_text: Guys are weak. the new. It must be nourished.<page>hmm. Nourishing. It will be nourished.

original_en_text: Seek out the purple blooms. Inside... the precious hearts.<page>The time of birth approaches. Pollip Hearts are needed. Bring them, bug, and power will be shared.
original_zh_text: 寻找紫花。内有……珍贵花芯。<page>诞生之时将至。带来花芯，共享力量。
translated_text: 寻找紫色的花。在里面...宝贝。<page>出生的时间即将到来。需要Pollip Heart。带来它们，虫子，权力就会被共享。
secondary_translated_text: Look for purple flowers. Inside... Baby.<page>The time of birth is approaching. Need Pollip Heart. Bring them, bugs, and power will be shared.

original_en_text: Bug. Only you are left. None more tread here. None.<page>For the rite. The Pollip Hearts. They are needed. Bring them here, for the rite.
original_zh_text: 只剩你。无虫来此。<page> 仪式需要花芯。带来此处。
translated_text: Bug.你是唯一剩下的人。其他人不许踏足这里。号<page>为了典礼。Pollip Hearts。他们需要它。把他们带到这里来参加仪式。
secondary_translated_text: Bug. You're the only one left. No one else is allowed to set foot here. no.<page>For the ceremony. Pollip Hearts。They need it. Bring them here for the ceremony.

original_en_text: The first rite. Rite of the pollip. The first rite can begin.
original_zh_text: 初始仪式。花芯仪式。初仪可启。
translated_text: 第一次仪式。警察仪式。第一个仪式可以开始了。
secondary_translated_text: The first ceremony. Police ceremony. The first ceremony can begin.

original_en_text: The precious hearts... Give them. For the time of birth, for the rite, they must bleed...
original_zh_text: 珍贵花芯……交付。为了诞生，为了仪式，它们必须流血……
translated_text: 宝贝。把它给他们。出生时，他们必须为仪式流血。
secondary_translated_text: Baby. Give it to them. At birth, they must shed blood for the ritual.

original_en_text: The... the time of birth approaches. Now, the rite of the pollip.<page>Bug. Only you are left. None more tread here. None.<page>For the rite. The Pollip Hearts. They are needed. Bring them here, for the rite.
original_zh_text: ……诞生之时将至。现在，花芯仪式。<page>虫。只剩你。无虫来此。<page>仪式需要花芯。带来此处。
translated_text: 那个...出生的时间即将到来。现在，这是一个警察仪式。<page>Bug.你是唯一剩下的人。其他人不许踏足这里。号<page>为了仪式。Pollip Hearts。他们需要它。把他们带到这里来参加仪式。
secondary_translated_text: That... The time of birth is approaching. Now, this is a police ceremony.<page>Bug. You're the only one left. No one else is allowed to set foot here. no.<page>For the ceremony. Pollip Hearts。They need it. Bring them here for the ceremony.

original_en_text: Shhhh... shell. White mask, red cloak.<page>Bug. A living bug.<hpage>A bug I am, at least in part, but you are something quite different. I apologise if I have roused you from some deep slumber.<page>Slumber. Long sleep. But now is the waking.<page>Growth. Time of birth. The time of birth approaches.<page>Heed, bug. The time of birth approaches.
original_zh_text: 嘘……甲壳。白面甲，红袍子。<page>虫。是活虫。<hpage>我算是半虫，但你倒是截然不同。若吵醒你的长眠，我道歉。<page>长眠。苏醒时分已至。<page>生长。诞生之时。诞生之时将至。<page>听着，诞生之时将至。
translated_text: 嘘贝壳白色面具，红色斗篷。<page>Bug.一个活的虫子。<hpage>我是一只虫子，至少在某种程度上，但你完全不同。如果我把你从睡梦中吵醒了，我很抱歉。<page>睡长觉。但现在是觉醒的时候了。<page>增加出生时间。出生的时间即将到来。<page>注意了，虫子。出生的时间即将到来。
secondary_translated_text: Shush shells, white mask, red cloak.<page>Bug. A live bug.<hpage>I am a bug, at least to a certain extent, but you are completely different. I'm sorry if I woke you up from your sleep.<page>Sleep long. But now is the time to awaken.<page>Increase birth time. The time of birth is approaching.<page>Pay attention, bugs. The time of birth is approaching.

original_en_text: Th... the bud. It must be offered. It calls for it... for the rite.
original_zh_text: 花苞……必须献上。它在呼唤……呼唤仪式。
translated_text: 这个...它必须提供的种子。它需要它。为了仪式。
secondary_translated_text: this... It must provide seeds. It needs it. For the ceremony.

original_en_text: The time will come... Soon. The time of birth approaches.
original_zh_text: 时刻将至……诞生之时将至。
translated_text: 时机将会到来。很快出生的时候就到了。
secondary_translated_text: The time will come. The time of birth will soon come.

original_en_text: Halt, stranger. I am charged forever to guard the sacred shrine beyond.<page>Any who wish to pass must cross their weapon with my own.
original_zh_text: 止步，陌生的虫。我奉命永远守护后方圣所。<page>想要过去，先问过我的兵器。
translated_text: 停下来，陌生人。我肩负着永远守护远方神圣寺庙的责任。<page>任何想通过的人都必须将他们的武器与我的武器交叉起来。
secondary_translated_text: Stop it, stranger. I shoulder the responsibility of always guarding the sacred temple in the distance.<page>Anyone who wants to pass must cross their weapons with mine.

original_en_text: You may remain here and rest, if you choose. I am no enemy of yours. Only if you try to step beyond will I raise my weapon against you.<hpage>Then tell me, warrior, of the shrine you guard. These caves on wood’s edge seem long forgotten.<page>Some things may be hidden, but never forgotten. The shrine remains to remember the wood’s first seed, her that once was and always is.<page>I am the last bound to protect it. Sadly, in that service, many have fallen to my blade.
original_zh_text: 你可以在此处休息，只要不越界，我就不是你的敌人。<hpage>那就说说这处圣所吧。这深林边缘的洞窟似乎早已被遗忘。<page>事物或许会被被隐藏，但不会被遗忘。最初之种记得这处圣所，而她永恒存在。<page>我是最后一位守卫者。很遗憾，至今已有无数试图越界的亡魂。
translated_text: 如果你愿意，你可以留在这里休息。我不是你的敌人。只有当你试图超越时，我才会举起武器对抗你。<hpage>那么告诉我，士兵，你守卫的寺庙是什么？这些位于树林边缘的洞穴似乎早已被遗忘。<page>有些事情可能被隐藏，但永远不会被忘记。这座神殿仍然纪念着森林的第一粒种子，她过去是，现在仍然是。<page>我是最后一个保护它的人。可悲的是，在那次仪式中，许多人倒在我的刀下。
secondary_translated_text: You can stay here and rest if you want. I am not your enemy. Only when you try to surpass will I raise my weapon against you.<hpage>So tell me, soldier, what temple are you guarding? These caves on the edge of the woods seem to have long been forgotten.<page>Some things may be hidden, but will never be forgotten. This shrine still commemorates the first seed of the forest, which she was and still is.<page>I was the last one to protect it. Sadly, during that ceremony, many people fell under my knife.

original_en_text: A machine with a symbol of a bench.
original_zh_text: 一台印有长椅符号的机器。
translated_text: 一台带有长凳符号的机器。
secondary_translated_text: A machine with a bench symbol on it.

original_en_text: Play ancient melodies by stringing Silk along the needle.
original_zh_text: 用灵丝给织针上弦，拨弹悠长的古调。
secondary_translated_text: Follow the silk strings and play ancient songs.

original_en_text: A lock with the mark of ‘Indolent’.
A lock with the mark of ‘First Sin’.
A lock with the mark of ‘Apostate’.
Chase down prey and leap great distances.
original_zh_text: 追猎目标并进行超远距离跳跃。
secondary_translated_text: Chasing prey and jumping far away.

original_en_text: Silk will regenerate while resting at a bench.
original_zh_text: 在长椅休息时恢复灵丝。
translated_text: Silk在长凳上休息时会重新生长。
secondary_translated_text: Silk grows again while resting on the bench.

original_en_text: Weave runes of blazing Silk upon enemies.
original_zh_text: 在敌人身上缝上剧烈燃烧的灵丝符文。
translated_text: 在敌人身上编织燃烧的丝绸符文。
secondary_translated_text: Weave burning silk runes on the enemy.

original_en_text: Summon the Beastlings and return together to their mother.
original_zh_text: 召唤钟道兽群，并一同前往其母亲所在之处。
translated_text: 召唤野兽并一起回到它们的母亲身边。
secondary_translated_text: Call on the beasts and return together to their mother.

original_en_text: Pierce through enemies in a blur of blade and Silk.
original_zh_text: 灵丝与刃锋交织，高速穿透多个敌人。
translated_text: 在刀锋和丝绸的模糊中刺穿敌人。
secondary_translated_text: Piercing the enemy in the blur of blade and silk.

original_en_text: Attack by whipping a storm of Silk around oneself.
original_zh_text: 挥舞灵丝形成环绕自身的灵丝风暴。
translated_text: 通过在自己周围鞭打丝绸风暴来攻击。
secondary_translated_text: Attack by flogging silk storms around yourself.

original_en_text: Charge power in the needle, then release as a deadly attack.
original_zh_text: 将力量凝聚于针刃，释放出致命一击。
translated_text: 冲入针头，然后释放，作为致命攻击。
secondary_translated_text: Flush the needle and release it as a fatal attack.
The beat is fast and clear.

original_en_text: Silk Skills can be equipped in the Crest screen of the Menu.
original_zh_text: 可在菜单的纹章界面装备灵丝技能。
translated_text: 丝绸技能可以在菜单的佳士得屏幕上配备。
secondary_translated_text: Silk skills can be equipped on the Christie's screen in the menu.

original_en_text: Silk will be expended. Strike enemies to replenish Silk.
original_zh_text: 此举会消耗灵丝。攻击敌人可补充灵丝。
translated_text: 丝绸将被消耗。攻击敌人以补充丝绸。
secondary_translated_text: Silk will be consumed. Attack the enemy to replenish silk.

original_en_text: Strike enemies repeatedly to become focused, making needle attacks deadlier.<br>Heighten focus with additional strikes, and further increase lethality.
original_zh_text: 连续攻击敌人进入凝聚状态，强化织针威力。<br>继续攻击可提升凝聚等级，进一步增强杀伤力 。
translated_text: 反复攻击敌人以吸引注意力，使针刺攻击更加致命。<br>使用额外的打击来增加注意力并进一步增加杀伤力。
secondary_translated_text: Repeatedly attack the enemy to attract attention and make the needle attack more deadly.<br>Use extra blows to increase concentration and further increase lethality.

original_en_text: Fling the needle as a harpoon and launch forcefully towards it.
translated_text: 像鱼叉一样扔针，用力射击。
secondary_translated_text: Throw the needle like a harpoon and shoot hard.

original_en_text: Cling to sheer surfaces and leap to rapidly scale heights.
original_zh_text: 攀附绝壁并向上弹跳，快速跃升至高处。
translated_text: 靠近陡峭的表面并快速跳到高处。
secondary_translated_text: Get close to steep surfaces and jump high quickly.

original_en_text: Fling the needle upwards and launch to tremendous heights.
original_zh_text: 向空中掷出织针并跃升至高处。
translated_text: 将针抛起来并将其发射到巨大的高度。
secondary_translated_text: Throw the needle up and launch it to a huge height.

original_en_text: Silk will be expended. Strike enemies to replenish Silk.
original_zh_text: 此举会消耗灵丝。攻击敌人可补充灵丝。
translated_text: 丝绸将被消耗。攻击敌人以补充丝绸。
secondary_translated_text: Silk will be consumed. Attack the enemy to replenish silk.

original_en_text: A lock with the mark of ‘Heretic’.
translated_text: 一把带有“异教徒”标记的锁。

original_en_text: Strike enemies repeatedly to build focus.<br>Once focused, needle attacks will become deadlier.
original_zh_text: 通过连续攻击敌人积累凝聚力。<br>进入凝聚状态后，织针攻击将更加致命。
translated_text: 反复攻击敌人以建立焦点。<br>一旦你集中注意力，针头攻击就会变得更加致命。
secondary_translated_text: Attack the enemy repeatedly to establish focus.<br>Once you focus, needle attacks become more deadly.
Its beat is steady and powerful.

original_en_text: A small tunnel leading downward.<br>Descend to Pharloom?
original_zh_text: 通向纺络的狭窄通道。<br>是否下降至纺络？
translated_text: 一条向下延伸的小隧道。<br>去法鲁？
secondary_translated_text: A small tunnel extending downward.<br>To Faro?

original_en_text: Its pale light wards against the void.
original_zh_text: 散发出能够驱散虚空的柔光。
translated_text: 它苍白的光芒面向虚空。
secondary_translated_text: Its pale light faces the void.

original_en_text: Fragile flower taken from a deep and distant memory.
original_zh_text: 采自深层忆境的娇嫩花朵。
translated_text: 一朵来自深深而遥远的记忆的脆弱花朵。
secondary_translated_text: A fragile flower from a deep and distant memory.

original_en_text: Fabled feather down, layered within the cloak. Leap again while airborne.
original_zh_text: 披风内缝入传说中的羽绒。可在空中进行二段跳。
translated_text: 传奇般的羽毛落下来并在斗篷内分层。再次跳到空中。
secondary_translated_text: Legendary feathers fall and layer within the cloak. Jump into the air again.

original_en_text: Regained the power to regenerate Silk within one’s shell.
original_zh_text: 恢复甲壳内灵丝再生的能力。
translated_text: 恢复壳中再生丝的能力。
secondary_translated_text: Restore the ability to regenerate silk in the shell.

original_en_text: Bind Silk around the needle to deflect enemy attacks and instantly strike back.
original_zh_text: 用灵丝缠绕织针格挡敌人的攻击，并立即进行反击。
translated_text: 将Silk绑在针上可以立即偏转敌人的攻击并反击。
secondary_translated_text: Tying Silk to a needle can immediately deflect enemy attacks and counterattack.

original_en_text: A lock with the mark of ‘Apostate’.
Flare the cloak to ride strong winds or glide gracefully.
original_zh_text: 展开斗篷以乘风而行，或以悠然滑翔。
translated_text: 打开斗篷，可以乘着强风或优雅地滑行。
secondary_translated_text: Open your cloak and ride on strong winds or glide gracefully.

original_en_text: Mimic the song of the Bell Beast.
secondary_translated_text: Imitate the singing of the bell beast.

original_en_text: Completion quantities will be displayed in Menus.
original_zh_text: 菜单中将显示完成数量。
translated_text: 完成的数量将显示在菜单中。
secondary_translated_text: The completed quantity will be displayed in the menu.

original_en_text: A small tunnel leading upward.<br>Ascend to the surface?
original_zh_text: 通往地面的狭小通道。<br>是否上升至位于地面的墟野？
translated_text: 一条小隧道正在上升。<br>表面？

original_en_text: Eva’s soul and strength reside within.
original_zh_text: 封存着伊娃的灵魂与力量。
translated_text: 伊娃的灵魂和力量就在她内心。
secondary_translated_text: Eva's soul and strength are within her.

translated_text: 使用第一次犯罪的钥匙？
secondary_translated_text: Use the key to the first crime?

original_en_text: View a detailed map of the world in the Map pane of the Menu.
translated_text: 在菜单的“地图”面板中查看详细的世界地图。
secondary_translated_text: View a detailed world map in the Map pane of the menu.

original_en_text: Equip Silk Skills in the Crest screen of the Menu.
original_zh_text: 在菜单的纹章界面装备灵丝技能。
translated_text: 在菜单的Crest屏幕上装备丝绸技能。
secondary_translated_text: Equip silk skills on the Crest screen in the menu.

original_en_text: Spin lethal talons from thread that seek out enemies.
original_zh_text: 利用灵丝编织出追踪敌人的致命利爪。
translated_text: 从队伍中旋转致命的爪子寻找敌人。
secondary_translated_text: Spill deadly claws from the ranks to find enemies.

original_en_text: Ascend through the lands of Pharloom to reach the Citadel at the kingdom’s peak.
original_zh_text: 穿越纺络之境，上升至王国顶点的圣堡。
translated_text: 穿过法勒姆之地，到达王国山顶的城堡。
secondary_translated_text: Pass through the land of Farham to the castle on the top of the Kingdom.

original_en_text: Silk will be expended. Strike enemies to replenish Silk.
original_zh_text: 此举会消耗灵丝。攻击敌人可补充灵丝。
translated_text: 丝绸将被消耗。攻击敌人以补充丝绸。
secondary_translated_text: Silk will be consumed. Attack the enemy to replenish silk.

original_en_text: View Objectives in the Tasks screen of the Menu.
translated_text: 在菜单的“任务”屏幕中查看目标。
secondary_translated_text: View the goals in the Tasks screen of the menu.

original_en_text: The state of the world can be sensed.
original_zh_text: 纺络的瞬息变化皆可感知。
translated_text: 世界的状况是可以感知的。
secondary_translated_text: The state of the world is perceptible.

original_en_text: Attack by throwing the needle forward. Silk will be expended.
original_zh_text: 消耗灵丝，向前掷针突刺。
translated_text: 向前抛针进攻。丝绸将被消耗。
secondary_translated_text: Throw the needle forward and attack. Silk will be consumed.

original_en_text: Soar above foes. Reach new heights. Strike from above.
original_zh_text: 腾空而起，突破高度限制，并从俯冲袭击敌人。
translated_text: 翱翔于敌人之上。达到新的高度。从上面攻击。
secondary_translated_text: Soar above the enemy. Reach new heights. Attack from above.
Its beat is deep and slow.

original_en_text: Sprint at blinding speed, beyond one’s natural limits.
original_zh_text: 以突破生理极限的速度，向前疾速冲刺。
translated_text: 以令人眼花缭乱的速度冲刺，超越自然极限。
secondary_translated_text: Sprint at dazzling speeds and transcend natural limits.

original_en_text: Draw out memories of Pharloom’s forgotten past.
original_zh_text: 提取纺络之地被遗忘的往昔记忆。
translated_text: 让人想起法罗被遗忘的过去。
secondary_translated_text: Reminds people of Faro's forgotten past.

original_en_text: to view a map of the current area.
original_zh_text: 以查看当前区域的地图
secondary_translated_text: View a map of the current area.
Its beat is weak and fast.

original_en_text: <page=S>Miss courier! Pharloom’s bugs are wishing, waiting, sad and scared. The deliverings are needed, now more than more!
original_zh_text: <page=S>救星小姐！纺络的虫子们又怕又急，都等着物资呢！现在送货是十分要紧的事！
translated_text: <page=S>送货小姐！法鲁的昆虫们充满希望、等待、悲伤和恐惧。现在需要交付，不止于此！
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Delivery lady! The insects of Faro are full of hope, waiting, sadness and fear. Delivery is needed now, and it's not just that!

original_en_text: But what’s this?! I smell something on you right now! You have a relic for me!
original_zh_text: 慢着！你身上有味儿！揣着古董呢！
translated_text: 但这是什么？我现在闻到你的味道了！你有一件遗物给我！
secondary_translated_text: But what is this? I can smell you now! You have a relic for me!

original_en_text: Aha! The spines! Specimen, you have them! Then it is time, indeed! Bzzt! To free you of your wriggling torment, and show my genius clear!
original_zh_text: 啊哈！棘刺到手！病患，该手术了！滋滋！让你摆脱痛苦，见证本神医天才手段吧！
translated_text: 啊哈！脊柱！样品，你有！是时候了，真的。嗡嗡声！让你摆脱蠕动的折磨，让我清楚地展示我的天才！
secondary_translated_text: Aha! Spine! Samples, you have them! It's time, really. Buzz! Let you get rid of the torture of squirming, let me clearly show my genius!

original_en_text: Oh my, what a state you’re in! You look like you’re one breath away from keeling over dead!<hpage>I will continue to live, madam, but I am indeed afflicted. A parasite has taken root within my shell... Perhaps you have something that could help me? A medicine?<page>Mmm, not so sure I stock anything like that. You should ask Pavo there. It’s his job to give directions and such, so he may have some useful advice.<page>In the meantime... shopping itself is a type of medicine, isn’t it? You should buy something now. Given your condition, this might be your last chance!
original_zh_text: 圣堡在上！你这模样看着像要咽气了似的！<hpage>还死不了，女士，但确实抱恙。甲壳遭受寄生……可有药能治？<page>唔，我这不卖药。去问帕沃吧，他管指路，或许有招。<page>话说回来……购物也算疗愈嘛！趁还能动快买点，过了这村没这店！
translated_text: 天哪，你是什么样的人？你看起来好像快要死了！<hpage>我会继续活下去，女士，但我很痛苦。寄生虫在我的壳里扎根了……也许你可以做点什么来帮助我？医学？<page>嗯，我不确定我有这样的东西。你应该问问那里的帕沃。他的工作是给出指示之类的事情，所以他可能会有一些有用的建议。<page>同时...购物本身就是一剂药，不是吗？你现在应该买点东西。考虑到你的病情，这可能是你最后的机会了！
secondary_translated_text: God, what kind of person are you? You look like you're about to die!<hpage>I will continue to live, ma 'am, but I am in pain. The parasite has taken root in my shell... maybe you can do something to help me? Medicine?<page>Well, I'm not sure I have something like this. You should ask Paavo there. His job is to give instructions and things like that, so he might have some useful suggestions.<page>At the same time... Shopping is a medicine in itself, isn't it? You should buy something now. Considering your condition, this may be your last chance!

original_en_text: <page=S>Ughhh! What-what is this? Your body is all twisting, creaking! Horrid fiend inside! <hpage>A parasite has lodged deep inside my shell. It has taken some strength of will to keep its thrashing at bay.<page=T>With a shell like such, you cannot be taking no deliverings! Infect the goods you would-would!<hpage>Very well, couriers. If I somehow manage to remove the parasite, I may return to offer aid.
original_zh_text: <page=S>呃！什、什么东西？您甲壳里在扭动！有怪物！<hpage>是寄生体，暂时压制住了。<page=T>这样可不能送货！会污、污染货物！<hpage>有道理，若我能除掉它，或许再来帮忙。
translated_text: <page=S>呃！这-这是什么？你的身体在扭曲和吱吱作响！里面有一个可怕的恶魔！<hpage>一只寄生虫深深地卡在了我的壳里。它需要一定的意志力才能阻止它的打击。<page=T>有了这样的外壳，你就无法停止交付！感染您想要的产品！<hpage>很好，快递员。如果我设法摆脱寄生虫，我可能会回来提供援助。
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Ugh! What-what is this? Your body is twisting and squeaking! There is a terrible demon inside!<hpage>A parasite got stuck deep in my shell. It requires a certain amount of willpower to stop its blow.<page=T>With a shell like this, you can't stop delivering! Infect the product you want!<hpage>Very good, courier. If I manage to get rid of the parasite, I may come back to provide assistance.

original_en_text: What do you want, slave?<hpage>Slave? I am a traveller, stranger, not a slave.<page>Grnk. Exactly what a slave would say. Begone!
original_zh_text: 你来做什么，奴隶？<hpage>奴隶？我是旅者，不是奴隶。<page>哼，奴隶都这么说。滚！
translated_text: 你想要什么，奴隶？<hpage>奴隶？我是一个旅行者，一个陌生人，不是奴隶。<page>Grnk。奴隶们会说什么。走开！
secondary_translated_text: What do you want, slave?<hpage>Slaves? I am a traveler, a stranger, not a slave.<page>Grnk。What the slaves would say. Go away!

original_en_text: <hpage>Soon, Pavo, I shall calm the chaos. Please guard these bugs safe till then.<page>Of course, dear resident! Of course! Know all our faith, and our wishes go with you.
original_zh_text: <hpage>帕沃，我会尽快平息混乱。在此之前，请守护好这些虫子。<page>放心吧，亲爱的居民！请带上我们全体的信念与祈愿前行吧。
translated_text: <hpage>很快，帕沃，我就会平息混乱。请在此之前保护这些漏洞。<page>当然，亲爱的居民！当然！知道我们所有的信仰和愿望都与您同在。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Soon, Paavo, I will calm the chaos. Please protect these vulnerabilities before then.<page>Of course, dear residents! Of course! Know that all our beliefs and wishes are with you.

original_en_text: Loose rosaries will escape your pockets at the worst of times, and I’m a deft claw at stringing them tight! I can string you a whole necklace, safe and stylish.
original_zh_text: 危急时刻念珠易失，但我能将其编成项链！既牢靠又时髦！
translated_text: 在最糟糕的时候，松动的念珠会从你的口袋里滑出来，而我是一只熟练的爪子，可以把它们串得紧紧！我可以给你系一整条项链，既安全又时髦。
secondary_translated_text: At the worst of times, loose rosary beads will slip out of your pockets, and I am a skilled claw that can string them tightly! I can tie a whole necklace for you. It's safe and stylish.

original_en_text: <hpage>I have taken your wish, Tipp. If I find your brother safe, I’ll be sure to send him back this way.<page>My many thanks, miss saving! You are brave-brave. Same as brother! My faith goes all with you!
original_zh_text: <hpage>我接下了你的祈愿，若找到皮尔，会让他回这里。<page>多谢救星小姐！您和皮尔一样勇、勇敢！祝您好运！
translated_text: <hpage>我实现了你的愿望小费如果我发现你弟弟安全了，我会把他送回去。<page>非常感谢你，救援小姐！你很勇敢就像我哥哥一样！我的信仰与你同在！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I granted your wish. Tip If I find out your brother is safe, I will send him back.<page>Thank you very much, Miss Rescue! You're brave, just like my brother! My faith is with you!

original_en_text: Up there, in that Citadel, the fabled oil is waiting. Bestow it upon this fine pinmaster, and your blade shall sing louder yet.<hpage>I will find the oil, pinmaster. Keep your skills sharp.
original_zh_text: 圣堡藏着秘油。取来此油，你的针鸣将响彻纺络！<hpage>我会寻得此油，请针匠磨好利爪等候。
translated_text: 在那座城堡里，传奇般的石油正在等待着。把它交给这位精致的琴师，你的剑就会唱得更响。<hpage>我会找到油的，品马斯特。保持你的技能锋利。
secondary_translated_text: In that castle, legendary oil awaits. Give it to this exquisite zither player and your sword will sing louder.<hpage>I'll find the oil, Pinmaster. Keep your skills sharp.

original_en_text: Now now! What’s all this? Infested are you, bzzt?<page>Do you even know who I am? Why, ‘tis the great Yarnaby, genius physician, unfairly outcast, who now towers before you!<hpage>I apologise for intruding upon your work, but if you are the skilled physician you claim, I ask your assistance.<hpage>A parasite has wormed its way inside of me. Its roots twist and pull inside my shell, draining my strength. If you possess the skills and tools, I would see it removed.<page>Bzzt! Well, well! So you’re a special, sickly specimen, are you?! That changes matters, yes. Turns them on their head!<page>Let me see. Hm. Not haunted, indeed. No Silk-sickness. But something strange has certainly clawed its way in!<page>These “roots” that torment you so... I’m not altogether familiar with them, but it matters not!<page>If there’s something nasty inside a shell that must come out, we use great Yarnaby’s Extricator! It’s your only hope, bzzt!<page>...Hmmm, but to crack your stiff shell we’ll first need some extra strength. The healing can be done, yes! But before that my mighty Extricator needs an upgrade!
original_zh_text: 哟哟！这是什么情况？被寄生了，滋滋？<page>知道我是谁吗？伟大的雅纳碧！遭庸才排挤的天才医师！<hpage>冒昧打扰，但若您真如自称般医术高明，还请相助。<hpage>有寄生体钻入了我的躯壳，在体内扎根生长，吸收气力。若您真有本事，请帮我去除。<page>滋滋！哎哟！特殊病例啊？！这就另当别论了！<page>让本神医瞧瞧。嗯……非邪咒非丝病。但确实有怪东西钻进去了！<page>折磨你的'根须’……虽然不常见，但无所谓！<page>只要是壳里有脏东西，就用本神医的剥离机！这是你的唯一希望，滋滋！<page>……但想撬开你这硬壳，得先升级机器！
translated_text: 现在，现在！这是什么？你被感染了吗，伙计？<page>你知道我是谁吗？为什么，这就是伟大的亚拉比，才华横溢的医生，被不公平地抛弃了，现在他比你还高！<hpage>很抱歉打扰你的工作，但如果你是你声称的熟练医生，我请求你的帮助。<hpage>一只寄生虫侵入了我的身体。它的根在我的壳里扭曲拉扯，耗尽了我的力量。如果您拥有这些技能和工具，我会看到它被删除。<page>嗡嗡声！嗯，嗯！所以你是一个特殊的病理标本，是吗？！是的，这个变化很重要。把它们翻过来！<page>让我看看.嗯，它真的没有闹鬼。没有丝绸疾病。但一定有什么奇怪的东西进来了！<page>这些根折磨着你。我对他们不是完全熟悉，但没关系！<page>如果外壳内部有一些烦人的东西必须删除，我们可以使用伟大的Yarnaby ' s Extritor！这是你唯一的希望，嘘！<page>...好吧，但是要破解你的硬壳，我们首先需要一些额外的力量。治愈是可以做到的，是的！但在此之前，我强大的解放者需要升级！
secondary_translated_text: Now, now! What is this? Are you infected, man?<page>Do you know who I am? Why, this is the great Arabi, the talented doctor, unfairly abandoned, and now he is taller than you!<hpage>I'm sorry to interrupt your work, but if you are the skilled doctor you claim to be, I ask for your help.<hpage>A parasite invaded my body. Its roots twisted and pulled in my shell, exhausting my strength. If you have these skills and tools, I will see it removed.<page>Buzz! Hmm, hmm! So you are a special pathological specimen, right?! Yes, this change is important. Turn them over!<page>let me see. Well, it's really not haunted. There is no silk disease. But something strange must have come in!<page>These roots torture you. I'm not entirely familiar with them, but that's okay!<page>If there is something annoying inside the shell that must be removed, we can use the great Yarnaby's Extritor! This is your only hope, shh!<page>... Okay, but to crack your hard shell, we first need some extra power. Healing can be done, yes! But before that happens, my powerful liberator needs to upgrade!

original_en_text: Travellers should always keep spare shards close by. We Bellharters were once praised for our fine claw-work. An art lost on most modern pilgrims... excepting yourself I’m sure.
original_zh_text: 旅者该随身带碎片。钟心镇的虫昔年以各种技艺闻名，如今朝圣者都不懂……你除外。
translated_text: 旅客应始终随身携带备用碎片。我们贝尔哈特人曾经因其精湛的爪子而受到赞扬。大多数现代朝圣者都失去了一门艺术：我确信除了你自己什么也没有。
secondary_translated_text: Passengers should always carry spare debris with them. We Berharts were once praised for their superb claws. Most modern pilgrims have lost one art: I am sure there is nothing but yourself.

original_en_text: What a persistent little worm you are. Amuse me then. Why did you cut those poor bugs from their comforting curse?<hpage>There was old power in the creature that guided the thread, and a talent of Silk, now taken, that shall prove useful to me.<hpage>That the town is freed and its service returned is a benefit too. I may ofttimes feel myself apart from these bugs, but even I recoil to see Silk strung in such sickening service.<page>Grnk. To free them was no favour. But the gathering of power... In that goal, we may understand each other some.
original_zh_text: 真是阴魂不散的虫子。行啊，陪我解个闷。为何要把那些可怜虫从舒坦的诅咒里拽出来？<hpage>操控丝咒的古兽有我要的力量，它的灵丝天赋现已归我。<hpage>顺带让镇子回复往常也算好事。我虽与这些虫子不同，但见到灵丝被这般滥用也觉得恶心。<page>哼……蠢材才会解救他们！不过夺取力量这点……咱们倒是臭味相投。
translated_text: 你真是个顽固的小虫子。那让我笑吧。你为什么要把这些可怜的虫子从它们的安慰诅咒中剔除？<hpage>引导丝线的生物拥有古老的力量，以及丝绸的天赋，现在已经被拿走了，这对我来说很有用。<hpage>该镇被解放，服务业作为一种福利得到恢复。我可能经常感到与这些虫子分离，但即使是我也会畏缩地看到丝绸从事如此恶心的服务。<page>Grnk。释放他们不是恩惠。而是权力的聚集。在这个目标中，我们可以互相了解一点。
secondary_translated_text: You are a stubborn little bug. Then make me laugh. Why would you cut these poor bugs out of their soothing curse?<hpage>The creatures that guided the silk threads had ancient powers, as well as the gift of silk, which has now been taken away, and this is very useful to me.<hpage>The town was liberated and services were restored as a welfare. I may often feel separated from these insects, but even I cringe to see silk performing such disgusting services.<page>Grnk。Releasing them is not a favor. It's the gathering of power. In this goal, we can get to know each other a little bit.

original_en_text: Ahh... I smell something on you. Heavy with the past, you are. You have a relic for me, don’t you?
original_zh_text: 啊哈……闻着老灰味儿了。你肯定藏着好货！
translated_text: 啊...我闻到你身上有什么味道。你背负着过去的沉重负担。你有一件遗物给我，不是吗？
secondary_translated_text: Ah... I smell something on you. You carry the heavy burden of the past. You have a relic for me, don't you?

original_en_text: <hpage>Your skills are impressive. My needle sings from your care. But I must ask, can the blade be honed further?<page>You seek further sharpening? Further than Plinney does provide? Impertinence! But... Maybe? But... No...<hpage>You hesitate? Then it is possible? Are you incapable? Should I seek others within the kingdom?<page>Wait! Yes. Seek not others, but an oil, fabled and fine. With it the Citadel once brought gleaming edge and point to its pins.<page>Though the Citadel’s pinmasters are long past, some small store of that miraculous elixir may remain within its halls.<page>Were even a meagre drop pilfered, and gifted upon Plinney, your blade could shine brighter still...<page>Just know, dear friend, the veiled bugs would be oh so unkind to the thief who’d claim that fine prize for themself.
original_zh_text: <hpage>针匠手艺了得，此针经你打磨如获新生。但还能更锋利么？<page>还想更锋利？嫌普林尼手艺糙？真是无礼！不过……或许？但……不行……<hpage>犹豫？那就是可行？难道你办不到？我得另寻高匠？<page>慢着！不用找别家，但要找油。传说圣堡藏着秘油，昔年靠它磨出绝世神锋。<page>虽说圣堡针匠早已绝迹，但没准还囤着点。<page>偷来几滴给我，您这针刃还能更亮……<page>但丑话说前头，覆面虫对偷油贼可不客气。
translated_text: <hpage>你的技能令人印象深刻。我的针因你的关怀而歌唱。但我必须问，刀刃还能再锋利一些吗？<page>您正在寻求进一步的培训吗？比普林尼提供的还要多吗？不中肯！但是...也许吧但是...号<hpage>你犹豫了吗？这可能吗？你不称职吗？我应该在王国中寻找其他人吗？<page>等等！是的，不要去找别人，而要去找一种传奇而精致的油。有了它，城堡曾经带来了闪闪发光的边缘和指向它的别针。<page>虽然城堡里的琴师早已成为过去，但城堡里可能还有一些拥有神奇灵丹妙药的小商店。<page>即使偷了一点给普林尼，你的刀刃也会更亮……<page>亲爱的朋友们，要知道，这些戴着面纱的虫子对为自己索取奖品的小偷非常不友善。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Your skills are impressive. My needle sings because of your care. But I must ask, can the blade be any sharper?<page>Are you seeking further training? More than Pliny has to offer? Not pertinent! but... Maybe, but... no.<hpage>Did you hesitate? Is this possible? Are you incompetent? Should I look for others in the kingdom?<page>Wait! Yes, don't find anyone else, but find a legendary and exquisite oil. With it, the castle once brought sparkling edges and pins pointed to it.<page>Although the zither players in the castle have long been a thing of the past, there may be some Ministores in the castle that contain magical panacea.<page>Even if you steal some from Pliny, your blade will be brighter...<page>Dear friends, you know, these veiled bugs are very unkind to thieves who ask for prizes for them.

original_en_text: You’ve a tool pouch on you? I can add a few pockets so you can carry more tools, and more shards to make’em. My sewing skills are quite renowned in these parts.
original_zh_text: 带着工具袋？我可以给你多缝几格，附近就数我的手艺最好了。
translated_text: 你身上有工具包吗？我可以添加几个口袋，这样你就可以携带更多的工具和更多的零件来制作它们。我的缝纫技术在这些地方是有名的。
secondary_translated_text: Do you have a kit on you? I can add a few pockets so you can carry more tools and more parts to make them. My sewing skills are famous in these places.

original_en_text: <page=S>Miss saving! We are together, at last! My brother and myself, both returned to safety’s safe.<hpage>I am pleased you have found one another. If you are planning to venture out again, I would urge you reconsider for the sake of your shells.<page=S>We know it! Muchly-much! We cannot be leaving this home of bells. No more! Heres we will remain, for shells to survive. <page=T>But we instead did plan, together, clever! Yes-yes. Those pilgrims, them that pass, maybes they will help? For small reward as we have?<page=T>Even you, miss saving! Yes-yes! Saving is done. Our wishes now we ask. Now is time for miss courier!
original_zh_text: <page=S>救星小姐！我们兄弟终于团圆啦！<hpage>我很欣慰你们能重逢，但若再想外出送货，要小心。<page=S>知、知道啦！我们再也不离开钟心镇了。保命要紧。<page=T>但我们想了个妙、妙招！让路过的朝圣者帮忙送货，给点小报酬！<page=T>救星小姐也可以！您送完了货，换我们帮您实现愿望！<page=S>每单顺、顺利送达，客户都会给念珠！快看待送清单！
translated_text: <page=S>我想念储蓄！我们终于在一起了！我和我哥哥已经回到安全地带。<hpage>我很高兴你们找到了彼此。如果你打算再次冒险出去，我会敦促你重新考虑你的贝壳。<page=S>我们知道！很多！我们不能离开这个钟屋。不再！为了贝壳的生存，我们会留下来。<page=T>但我们一起明智地计划了！是的，朝圣者、路过的人们，也许他们会帮忙吗？为了像我们这样的一点奖励？<page=T>即使是你，错过拯救！是的-是的！救援已经完成。现在我们询问我们的愿望。现在是成为一名送货员的时候了！
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>I miss saving! We are finally together! My brother and I have returned to safety.<hpage>I'm so glad you found each other. If you plan to venture out again, I would urge you to reconsider your shells.<page=S>We know! A lot! We can't leave this clock room. No more! For the survival of shells, we will stay.<page=T>But we planned wisely together! Yes, pilgrims, people passing by, maybe they will help? For a little reward like ours?<page=T>Even you missed the rescue! Yes-yes! Rescue has been completed. Now we ask about our wishes. It's time to become a delivery man!

original_en_text: Lost within that fortress above, the fabled oil of my profession... Such sharpness one could achieve...<page>But, oh! ‘Tis an awful thing. Too cruel, the many stabbing pins you’d face in its seeking.
original_zh_text: 圣堡里头藏着的针匠秘油……那锋利劲……<page>唉，但要寻得，这一路上有多险呐！多少针刺等着扎穿您的壳呢。
translated_text: 迷失在上面的堡垒里，我职业中的传奇石油.如此尖锐的程度.<page>但是，哦！这是一件可怕的事情。太残酷了，寻找它的过程中会面临很多刺伤。
secondary_translated_text: Lost in the fortress above, the legendary oil of my profession. Such a sharp degree.<page>But, oh! This is a terrible thing. It's so cruel, you will face many stabbings while looking for it.

original_en_text: We’ve made a good start on the painting, resident! Give us a little more time and your bell’ll be shining like new.
original_zh_text: 刷漆进度不错！再给点时间，保准焕然一新！
translated_text: 居民们，我们的画有了一个良好的开始！再给我们一点时间，你的钟声就会像新的一样闪闪发光。
secondary_translated_text: Residents, our painting has a good start! Give us a little more time and your bells will shine like new.

original_en_text: Hnff... So the slave comes seeking?<page>I’ve heard it. Wishing on a world cut free, yes? Along with my nephew up there. Sounds he’s sunk as simple as you.<hpage>Will you not provide your aid, bug? This trap he plans requires power, and I suspect you’re hoarding more than most.<page>Oh no. I’ll give it. Not in the hope you’ll succeed... Bah! In that, there’s slim chance. I give just to see that restless energy unleashed.<page>So much soul, found and formed. Generations of it, all going to waste. Better it’s given a chance to blaze.
original_zh_text: 嗤……奴隶来讨东西了？<page>听说了。想挣脱束缚，取得自由？还有我侄儿掺和？他跟你一样蠢。<hpage>不帮忙吗？他那陷阱缺少力量，而你囤了不少吧？<page>帮，当然帮。但不是指望你们成事……哈！八成没戏。就想看你们折腾。<page>囤了世代的灵魂全在浪费，不如放把火烧个痛快。
translated_text: 呼呼。那么奴隶们来寻找它了吗？<page>我听说过。希望世界自由，对吧？我的侄子也在那里。听起来和你一样简单。<hpage>你不提供帮助吗，虫子？他策划的陷阱需要权力，我怀疑你囤积的东西比大多数人都多。<page>哦不。我把它给你。我并不希望你成功。呸！在这方面，机会很小。我付出只是为了看到不安的能量被释放出来。<page>如此多的灵魂被发现并形成。几代人的努力都白费了。最好有机会燃烧。
secondary_translated_text: Whoosh. So did the slaves come looking for it?<page>I've heard of it. Want the world to be free, right? My nephew was there too. Sounds as simple as you.<hpage>Aren't you offering help, bug? The traps he planned required power, and I suspect you were hoarding more than most people.<page>Oh no. I'll give it to you. I don't want you to succeed. Bah! In this regard, the chances are slim. I gave just to see the energy of anxiety released.<page>So many souls have been discovered and formed. Generations of efforts were in vain. Better have a chance to burn.

translated_text: 上锁的行李室。<br>打个电话？
secondary_translated_text: Locked luggage room.<br>Make a phone call?

original_en_text: <hpage>Madam, my shell has been overcome by a foreign force. Plasmium, it has been called in your land.<hpage>Though the substance provides some regenerative aid, I feel my mind at dangerous risk of being overtaken.<page>Bzzt! Maybe overtaken is good? Better even? Why go thinking yours is a mind so precious?<page>The great Yarnaby treats the sick! Not those that benefit from their afflictions. Enjoy its advantage and leave me in peace!
original_zh_text: <hpage>女士，我的躯壳遭异物侵占，在您这似乎叫生质液。<hpage>此物虽然能疗伤，但我感到意识有被夺舍的风险。<page>滋滋！被占岂不是更好？你这脑子有啥金贵的？<page>本神医只医病患！不医因病得利的。享你的福去，别烦我！
translated_text: <hpage>女士，我的外壳是由外部力量控制的。Plasmium在您的土地上被称为Plasmium。<hpage>尽管这种物质提供了一些再生援助，但我觉得我的大脑面临着被超越的危险风险。<page>嗡嗡声！也许超越是一件好事？甚至更好？为什么你认为你的想法如此珍贵？<page>伟大的Yarnaby治疗病人！而不是那些从苦难中受益的人。享受它的优势，让我安息吧！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Ma 'am, my shell is controlled by external forces. Plasmium is called Plasmium on your land.<hpage>Although this substance provides some regenerative assistance, I feel that my brain is at a dangerous risk of being overtaken.<page>Buzz! Maybe transcending is a good thing? Even better? Why do you think your ideas are so precious?<page>The great Yarnaby treats patients! Not those who benefit from suffering. Enjoy its advantages and let me rest in peace!

original_en_text: What? What now? What’s all that great racket? What is it?<hpage>Greetings, ma’am. If you are disturbed by the rending of these lands, I fear some blame is mine to bear.<page>Pah. I care not for the miseries and struggles of them outside! None of them have my keen sense, my respect for the past!<page>You seem able, though. Sneaky, too. If you find any fine old stuff, anything with a history to it, bring it here. I’ll take it.
original_zh_text: 干嘛呢？这么闹腾？叮叮咣咣的搞什么？<hpage>女士，若您被外面的响动打扰，那我很抱歉。<page>嘁。外头虫子的死活关我屁事！他们没我这眼力见儿，不懂敬重历史！！<page>但你倒像块料，鬼精的。要是找到老物件，有年头的，就往这儿送。我收！
translated_text: 什么？我们现在该怎么办？这些噪音是什么？它是什么？<hpage>你好，女士。如果你对这片土地的分裂感到不安，恐怕我也要承担一些责任。<page>呸。我不在乎他们在外面的痛苦和挣扎！他们没有我敏锐的洞察力和对过去的尊重！<page>但你看起来很有能力。而且狡猾。如果您发现任何美丽的古老、有历史的东西，请把它带到这里。我买了.
secondary_translated_text: What? What should we do now? What is this noise? What is it?<hpage>Hello, ma 'am. If you are uneasy about the division of this land, I am afraid I also have to bear some responsibility.<page>Bah. I don't care about their pain and struggle outside! They don't have my keen insight and respect for the past!<page>But you seem very capable. And cunning. If you find anything beautiful old, historical, please bring it here. I'll take it.

original_en_text: <page=S>Keep safe, miss courier! You and your deliverings, fragile both can be!
original_zh_text: <page=S>保重啊救星小姐！您和货物都伤不得！
translated_text: <page=S>小心点，送货小姐！你和你的交付，都可以是脆弱的！
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Be careful, delivery lady! You and your delivery can be fragile!

original_en_text: <page=T>Do not wait, miss courier! You hold the deliverings, so nows you must away! A quick-quick bug, you must become yourself.
original_zh_text: <page=T>救星小姐，别耽搁了！拿着货物赶紧动、动身吧！要快！
translated_text: <page=T>别等了，送货小姐！你拿着货，所以现在你必须离开！一个快速的错误，你必须成为你自己。
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Don't wait, delivery lady! You have the goods, so now you have to leave! One quick mistake, you have to become yourself.

original_en_text: <hpage>Tipp, I have promised a wish to an old bug of the Citadel, ingredients for a dish to stir a gourmand’s stomach.<hpage>Do you hold in your belongings a Courier’s Rasher? It seems a key element.<page>Courier’s Rasher! Not me, miss savings! Smelly, fatty foods, good for most. Not good for my sensitive stomach!<page>You want-want my brother, Pill! Pill is big. Pill loves rashers! Can prepare them fresh for you, but first, Pill must be found, saved, safe-safe!
original_zh_text: <hpage>蒂普，我答应了圣堡老虫做道大菜，需要送货虫的熏肉。<hpage>你身上有存货吗？若有，我想讨要。<page>熏肉？我才不带！油腻腻的，我肠胃可受不了！<page>您应、应该找皮尔！他块头大，爱死熏肉了！但得先找到他，救、救回来！
translated_text: <hpage>提示：我向城堡里的一只老昆虫许了个愿，它是一道可以搅动恐惧者胃的菜肴的原料。<hpage>您的物品中有快递员Rush吗？这似乎是一个关键因素。<page>拉什的使者！不是我，储蓄女士！闻起来难闻的高脂肪食物对大多数人来说都有好处。这对我敏感的胃不好！<page>你想要--你想要我的兄弟，皮埃尔！药丸很大。药丸爱鲁莽！新鲜的药物可以为您准备，但首先，必须找到、保存它们并且安全！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Tip: I made a wish for an old insect in the castle, an ingredient in a dish that can stir the stomachs of the fearful.<hpage>Do you have a courier Rush among your items? This seems to be a key factor.<page>Messenger of Rush! Not me, savings lady! Fatty foods that smell bad are good for most people. This is not good for my sensitive stomach!<page>You want-you want my brother, Pierre! The pill is big. Pills are reckless! Fresh medicines can be prepared for you, but first, they must be found, preserved and safe!

original_en_text: Bzzt! What now?! Not another bother for the great Yarnaby?<hpage>Madam, I have returned with the spines requested. Allow me to enter, that you may remove this parasite from my shell.
original_zh_text: 滋滋！又干嘛？！还来烦伟大的雅纳碧？<hpage>女士，棘刺已准备好，请开门为我去除寄生体。
translated_text: 嗡嗡声！我们现在该怎么办？！伟大的亚比不会再有麻烦了吗？<hpage>女士，我带着我需要的脊柱回来了。请允许我进来，这样你就可以把这个寄生虫从我的壳里移走。
secondary_translated_text: Buzz! What should we do now?! Will the great Abi not be in trouble again?<hpage>Ma 'am, I'm back with the spine I need. Please allow me to come in so you can remove this parasite from my shell.

original_en_text: That blade! By claw! My finest work by far. Pharloom may ail, but across its morbid dim, your needle will shine bright.
original_zh_text: 瞧这针刃！利爪啊！我毕生的杰作！旅者，纵使纺络病入膏肓，您的针芒也将照亮死寂！
translated_text: 那把刀！用你的爪子！我迄今为止最好的作品。法鲁可能会受伤，但穿过病态的黑暗，你的针会发出明亮的光芒。
secondary_translated_text: That knife! Use your claws! My best work to date. Faro may get hurt, but through the sick darkness, your needle will shine brightly.

original_en_text: Care to refresh yourself in a steaming spa? Given your hard labours, I’m sure your shell would thank you for it.
original_zh_text: 想不想泡个蒸汽浴？劳累这么久，甲壳该舒坦下！
translated_text: 想在热气腾腾的温泉中放松身心吗？考虑到你的辛勤工作，我相信你的贝壳会感谢你的。
secondary_translated_text: Want to relax in the steaming hot spring? Considering your hard work, I'm sure your shells will thank you.

original_en_text: Twine-strung globes filled with gleamflies. These’ll brighten up even the darkest bell.
original_zh_text: 充满荧虫的玻璃球串成的灯串，再黑的钟屋都能照亮！
translated_text: 双弦地球仪上到处都是萤火虫。这些甚至会点亮最黑暗的钟声。
secondary_translated_text: The double-string globe is full of fireflies. These will light up even the darkest bells.

original_en_text: <page=S>Another egg. Another grossy eater queen. Delivery for the big-big creature beyond the roaches. Maybe this one travels safer than last?
original_zh_text: <page=S>又一枚噬丝蛆女王的卵，给蟑螂堆旁的大、大块头。这次会比上回安全些吗？
translated_text: <page=S>另一个鸡蛋。又一位恶心的食客女王。向蟑螂以外的巨型生物运送货物。也许这次旅行比上次安全？
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Another egg. Another disgusting queen of diners. Shipping cargo to giant creatures other than cockroaches. Maybe this trip is safer than the last time?

original_en_text: Specimen, we must! There are secrets to uncover, bzzt! Progress can not be denied!
original_zh_text: 病患，我们必须搞清楚！有秘密就有揭秘，滋滋！进步是不可阻挡的！
translated_text: 样品，我们必须！有一个秘密要揭晓，BZTT！进步不容否认！
secondary_translated_text: Samples, we must! There is a secret to be revealed, BZTT! Progress cannot be denied!

original_en_text: <page=T>With your shell all a’wriggle, you can’t be taking no deliverings! Infect the goods you would!<hpage>Very well, couriers. If I somehow manage to remove the parasite, I may return to offer aid.
original_zh_text: <page=T>甲壳里有东西在动，不能送货！会搞砸的！<hpage>嗯，若能解决寄生体，我会再来。
translated_text: <page=T>当你的壳蠕动时，你不能不接受任何东西！你会感染货物的！<hpage>很好，快递员。如果我设法摆脱寄生虫，我可能会回来提供援助。
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>When your shell squirms, you can't help but accept anything! You will infect the cargo!<hpage>Very good, courier. If I manage to get rid of the parasite, I may come back to provide assistance.

original_en_text: Bzzt! Bravo! A specimen who sees my brilliance!<page>The task for you is simple. Head over into that tangled mess of cages, on the roads above the moors.<page>Two bugs hide away there, Benjin and Crull. Simple types, woefully ignorant... yet they have been useful in procuring me materials.<page>It’s Steel Spines I need. A full bundle of them, forged hard and sharp. Tougher than I’ve ever had. Tough enough to crack stone! And to pierce your thick shell, bzzt!<hpage>Then prepare your machine for my return, madam. I shall soon return with the spines, for I am eager to see myself freed.
original_zh_text: 滋滋！上道！是个识货的病患！<page>任务很简单：去沼地上边的铁笼堆找班金和克鲁尔。<page>那俩蠢货有我要的钢棘——要硬过石头！利到能捅穿你厚壳！<hpage>那请女士准备好机器，我这就去取棘刺来。
translated_text: 嗡嗡声！太好了！看到我才华的标本！<page>你的任务很简单。步入荒地上方道路上凌乱的笼子。<page>那里隐藏着两个虫子，Benjin和Crull。简单的类型，可悲的无知……然而，他们在为我采购材料方面非常有用。<page>我需要的是一根钢刺。一整捆，锻造得又硬又锋利。这比我经历过的更艰难。强度足以打碎石头！刺穿你厚厚的壳，嘶嘶作响！<hpage>然后准备好你的机器直到我回来，女士。我很快就会带着勇气回来，因为我渴望看到自己自由。
secondary_translated_text: Buzz! Great! See the specimen of my talent!<page>Your task is simple. Step into the messy cages on the road above the wasteland.<page>There are two bugs hidden there, Benjin and Crull. Simple type, sad ignorance... however, they were very useful in sourcing materials for me.<page>What I need is a steel thorn. A whole bundle, forged hard and sharp. This is more difficult than I have ever experienced. Strong enough to break stones! Piercing through your thick shell, hissing!<hpage>Then get your machine ready until I get back, ma 'am. I will come back soon with courage because I long to see myself free.

original_en_text: <hpage>I will find the oil, pinmaster. My needle has seen much use in this cruel kingdom, and I suspect many more battles are due. I will value your further skills upon my blade. <page>It is a dangerous wish you accept of this poor pinmaster. I welly hope this one’s professional desire does not cost you your life.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我会把油取来，针匠。往后旅途愈发凶险，这针刃还多有用处，你的手艺对我大有助益。<page>我这祈愿确实太过危险，希望您别为此送了命。
translated_text: <hpage>我会找到油的，品马斯特。我的针在这个残酷的王国中发挥了重要作用，我怀疑还会有更多的战斗。我会珍惜你在我剑上的进一步技巧。<page>你接受这个可怜的路德球员的愿望是一件危险的事情。我希望这个人的职业抱负不会让你付出生命的代价。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I'll find the oil, Pinmaster. My needles have played an important role in this cruel kingdom, and I suspect there will be more battles. I will cherish your further skills on my sword.<page>It's a dangerous thing for you to accept the wishes of this poor Lutheran player. I hope this person's career ambitions will not cost you your life.

original_en_text: If you insist on surviving your infestation, seek the one exiled from Bellhart, little Yarnaby. She was chased out, high up into the moors, last I heard.
original_zh_text: 非要治这寄生物，就去找被钟心镇放逐的雅纳碧。听说她被赶到灰沼了。
translated_text: 如果您坚持在入侵中幸存下来，请寻找被伯哈特流放的尤纳比。据我所知，她被赶出了荒野。
secondary_translated_text: If you insist on surviving the invasion, look for Eunabee who was exiled by Burhart. As far as I know, she was driven out of the wilderness.

original_en_text: I’ll waste no more words on a slave. Begone.
translated_text: 我不会再在奴隶身上浪费时间了。走开
secondary_translated_text: I will not waste any more time with slaves. go away

original_en_text: <page=T>More deliverings for those sad survivors in their cave below. <page=S>Deliver them quick-quick, miss courier! They will help much.
original_zh_text: <page=T>再给下面洞穴里那些可怜虫送趟货吧。<page=S>快点送去吧，救星小姐！能帮大忙呢！
translated_text: <page=T>为下面洞穴中悲伤的幸存者提供更多救济。<page=S>快递员小姐，快点送到！他们会提供很多帮助。
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Provide more relief to the grieving survivors in the caves below.<page=S>Miss courier, deliver it quickly! They will provide a lot of help.

original_en_text: That cry upon you, sister! Those are the sour sobs of a grey and twisted thing.<hpage>You speak of the bud? It is a mysterious thing indeed. In the dank swamps above the moor, I sought towards its plaintive wails, and found it resting there... Waiting, it almost seemed.<hpage>But you speak of its form, without sighting it upon me. Is it a thing familiar to you?... Have you heard these cries before?<page>Aye, yes! Not your own specimen, surely, but way back, other travellers did sometimes carry similar. Odd types they all were. Offerings they’d call the crying things, and towards the core of Shellwood they would trek.<page>Never I did see one again, not the buds nor the bugs that brought the gift...<page>If you’re planning to follow their path, I’ll wish on your safety, but ‘tis an ill omen to hear such sad sounds returned after so long.
original_zh_text: 旅者小姐，你身上那哭声！是灰色扭曲之物发出的哀鸣。<hpage>你是说那花苞？确实神秘。我在沼泽深处追寻它的哀鸣，发现它就躺在那里……仿佛在等待着什么。<hpage>可你未见过实物却知其形态，莫非你认得此物？……或是曾听过这哭声？<page>啊，没错！以前确实有旅者携带过类似之物，尽是些怪客。他们称这哭嚎之物为祭品，然后向着甲木林深处进发。<page>此后我再未见过那些花苞，也没再遇见过献祭之虫……<page>如果你要去寻找它们的踪迹，愿你平安。但这悲哭声重现，实属不祥之兆。
translated_text: 姐姐，你哭了！这些是灰色和扭曲的东西的酸味抽泣。<hpage>你是在说花蕾吗？这确实是一件神秘的事情。在荒原上方潮湿的沼泽中，我寻找它悲伤的哀号，发现它栖息在那里。等待，几乎看起来。<hpage>但你说的是它的形状，却没有给我戴上，你熟悉吗？......你以前听过这些哭声吗？<page>对，对！当然，不是你自己的标本，但很久以前，其他旅行者有时也会携带类似的标本。他们都是奇怪的类型。他们会称这个哭泣的东西为“东西”，然后他们会徒步前往谢尔伍德的核心。<page>我再也没有见过它，再也没有见过花蕾，再也没有见过带来礼物的昆虫……<page>如果你打算追随他们的道路，我会祝你平安，但这么久之后听到如此悲伤的声音是一个不祥的迹象。
secondary_translated_text: Sister, you are crying! These are sour sobs of something gray and twisted.<hpage>Are you talking about buds? This is indeed a mysterious thing. In the damp swamp above the moors, I searched for its sad wail and found it perched there. Waiting, almost seems.<hpage>But you talked about its shape, but you didn't put it on me. Are you familiar with it?... Have you ever heard these cries before?<page>Yes, yes! Not your own specimen, of course, but a long time ago, other travelers sometimes carried similar specimens. They are all strange types. They would call the crying thing the "thing" and then they would hike to the core of Shelwood.<page>I never saw it again, never saw a bud again, never saw an insect bringing gifts again...<page>If you plan to follow their path, I will wish you peace, but hearing such sad voices after so long is an ominous sign.

original_en_text: What? What, what? Who is it? What’ve you got? What do you want?<hpage>I am just a traveller, one hoping you were not too badly affected by the cursed snare set upon this town.<page>Pah! What binds them outside means nothing to me. None of them have my keen sense, my respect for the past!<page>You seem able, though. Sneaky, too. If you find any fine old stuff, anything with a history to it, bring it here. I’ll take it.
original_zh_text: 干嘛？要干嘛？你是谁？带了什么来？想要什么？<hpage>过路客而已，想看看你有没有被镇上的邪咒祸害。<page>嘁！外头虫子中招关我屁事！他们没我这眼力见儿，不懂敬重历史！<page>但你倒像块料，鬼精的。要是找到老物件，有年头的，就往这儿送。我收！
translated_text: 什么？什么，什么？是谁？你有什么？你想要什么？<hpage>我只是一名旅行者，希望你不会受到这个小镇上设置的诅咒陷阱的严重影响。<page>呸！外面束缚他们的东西对我来说毫无意义。他们中没有我敏锐的洞察力，我对过去的尊重！<page>但你看起来很有能力。而且狡猾。如果您发现任何美丽的古老、有历史的东西，请把它带到这里。我买了.
secondary_translated_text: What? What, what? Who is it? What do you have? What do you want?<hpage>I am just a traveler and hope you will not be severely affected by the curse traps set up in this town.<page>Bah! What binds them outside means nothing to me. None of them have my keen insight, my respect for the past!<page>But you seem very capable. And cunning. If you find anything beautiful old, historical, please bring it here. I'll take it.

original_en_text: And now! This pinmaster must work! Let the sharpening begin!
original_zh_text: 好了！针匠该干活了！纺络许久未见的锋芒该再现了！
translated_text: 而现在！这个Pinsmaster会工作！开始抛光！
secondary_translated_text: And now! This Pinsmaster will work! Start polishing!

original_en_text: Hff. The noise from above has returned, that pitiful clamour. The threads have been cut.<page>You... It was you who cut them. Do not deny it!<hpage>Why should I deny it, sir? I defeated the cruel creature above the town, and awoke the old bell stilled by Silk. Are you displeased?<page>Displeased! If I breathe, if I live, I am displeased. Only the dead are satisfied.<page>You are a slave, and a nuisance... begone.
original_zh_text: 嗤，上头又闹腾了，可怜虫们吵吵嚷嚷。丝线被斩断了。<page>你……就是你干的！别想抵赖！<hpage>何必抵赖？我斩了镇子上头的恶兽，敲醒了被灵丝封禁的古钟。你不满意？<page>满意？喘气的活虫哪有满意的！只有死虫才消停。<page>你是奴隶，是瘟神……滚。
translated_text: 呼呼。来自上面的噪音又回来了，可怜的噪音。电线已被切断。<page>你...你把它剪掉了。别否认！<hpage>我为什么要否认，先生？我击败了小镇上空的残酷生物，唤醒了被丝绸镇压的古钟。你不高兴吗？<page>不高兴！如果我呼吸，如果我活着，我就会不快乐。只有死者才满意。<page>你是一个奴隶，一个讨厌的人……走开
secondary_translated_text: Whoosh. The noise from above is back, the poor noise. The wires have been cut.<page>you... You cut it off. Don't deny it!<hpage>Why should I deny it, sir? I defeated the cruel creatures above the town and awakened the ancient clock suppressed by silk. Aren't you happy?<page>Not happy! If I breathe, if I live, I will be unhappy. Only the dead are satisfied.<page>You are a slave, a nuisance... Go away

original_en_text: Resident! What a marvel you are, continuing to dare the wilds and darkness, and returning home to us unscathed.<hpage>I return with hope worth sharing, Pavo. I have seen a way to calm this chaos, one I now work swiftly towards.<hpage>The chance remains slim, but if this town can hold, and my efforts succeed, Pharloom may see a future yet.
original_zh_text: 居民！您真是奇迹般的存在，外面如此黑暗危险，不仅仍旧只身闯荡，还能安然无恙地回来。<hpage>我是带着值得分享的希望回来的，帕沃。我已找到平息混乱之法，正全力推进。<hpage>虽然希望渺茫，但只要你们能继续坚守，只要我的努力能成功，纺络或许仍有未来。
translated_text: 居民！令人惊讶的是，你们继续勇敢地面对荒野和黑暗，并毫发无伤地回到我们身边。<hpage>帕沃，我带着值得分享的希望回来了。我已经找到了平息这场混乱的方法，我现在正在迅速工作。<hpage>机会仍然很渺茫，但如果小镇能守住，我的努力成功了，法鲁可能会看到未来。
secondary_translated_text: Residents! Amazingly, you continue to bravely face the wilderness and darkness and come back to us unscathed.<hpage>Paavo, I come back with hope worth sharing. I have found a way to calm this mess, and I am working quickly now.<hpage>The chances are still slim, but if the town can hold on and my efforts succeed, Faro may see the future.

original_en_text: The Citadel crafted some marvellous machines, and this looks to be one of its finest! Apparently sent by some creepy slitherer hidden away up there, for sale only to you!
original_zh_text: 圣堡精工杰作！据说是上头阴森爬行的家伙带来的，这宝贝我只卖给你！
translated_text: 城堡制造了一些奇妙的机器，这似乎是最好的之一！很明显是藏在那里的变态溜冰者寄来的而且只卖给你！
secondary_translated_text: The castle makes some wonderful machines, and this seems to be one of the best! Apparently it's from a psycho skater hiding there and it's only for you!

original_en_text: It’s my calling it is, to gather the relics of the past. If you find any fine old stuff, anything with a history to it, bring it here. I’ll take it.
original_zh_text: 我活着的念想就是收罗老古董！要是找到老物件，有年头的，就往这儿送。我收！
translated_text: 收集过去的文物是我的使命。如果您发现任何美丽的古老、有历史的东西，请把它带到这里。我买了.
secondary_translated_text: Collecting cultural relics from the past is my mission. If you find anything beautiful old, historical, please bring it here. I'll take it.

original_en_text: <hpage>I can not aid you, couriers. Not now. My own tasks are too pressing to consider taking on your deliveries. <hpage>With luck, some pilgrims may pass with sound mind and strength remaining. They may choose to promise your wishes.<page=T>Then we shall pray they come, miss saving! Our thanks go muchly with you, still.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我帮不了，有要事在身。<hpage>若有神志清醒的朝圣者路过，或许他们会帮忙。<page=T>那就祈祷他们快来！还是谢谢您！
translated_text: <hpage>我帮不了你，快递员。现在不行我自己的任务太紧迫了，无法考虑承担您的交付任务。<hpage>幸运的话，一些朝圣者可能会头脑清醒、精力充沛。他们可能会选择同意您的愿望。<page=T>然后我们祈祷他们来并错过救援！我们仍然感谢您。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I can't help you, courier. Not now. My own tasks are too urgent to consider taking on your delivery tasks.<hpage>With luck, some pilgrims may be clear-headed and energetic. They may choose to agree with your wishes.<page=T>Then we pray they come and miss the rescue! We still thank you.

original_en_text: Hff. The noise from above has returned, that pitiful clamour. The threads have been cut.<page>You... It was you who cut them down. Do not deny it!<hpage>Why should I deny it, sir? I severed the thread and defeated the creature guiding the curse upon the town. Are you displeased?<page>Displeased! If I breathe, if I live, I am displeased. Only the dead are satisfied.<page>You are a slave, and a nuisance... begone.
original_zh_text: 嗤，上头又闹腾了，可怜虫们吵吵嚷嚷。丝线被斩断了。<page>你……就是你干的！别想抵赖！<hpage>何必抵赖？我斩了丝线，灭了给镇子下咒的怪物。你不满意？<page>满意？喘气的活虫哪有满意的！只有死虫才消停。<page>你是奴隶，是瘟神……滚。
translated_text: 呼呼。来自上面的噪音又回来了，可怜的噪音。电线已被切断。<page>你...你把他们砍倒。不要否认！<hpage>我为什么要否认，先生？我割断了这条线，击败了引导这座被诅咒小镇的生物。你不高兴吗？<page>不高兴！如果我呼吸，如果我活着，我就会不快乐。只有死者才满意。<page>你是一个奴隶，一个讨厌的人……走开
secondary_translated_text: Whoosh. The noise from above is back, the poor noise. The wires have been cut.<page>you... You cut them down. Don't deny it!<hpage>Why should I deny it, sir? I cut the line and defeated the creatures that guided this cursed town. Aren't you happy?<page>Not happy! If I breathe, if I live, I will be unhappy. Only the dead are satisfied.<page>You are a slave, a nuisance... Go away

original_en_text: <page=T>We’s heard the word! Many fleas together, settled high in Pharloom, calling out their wants of us!<page=T>Clever grubbers, fleas, but theys too need-need our deliverings. See them served, miss courier! Always goodly-good to gain the thanks of fleas.
original_zh_text: <page=T>听说跳蚤们在上面建了窝！找我们要货！<page=T>跳蚤们都很机、机灵，送货交朋友准没、没错！
translated_text: <page=T>我们听到了这个词！许多跳蚤聚集在法鲁的高处，向我们呼喊他们的需求！<page=T>聪明的蛆虫、跳蚤，但它们也需要--需要我们的帮助。送货小姐，请把他们带到车上！总是很好--很高兴得到跳蚤的感谢。
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>We heard the word! Many fleas gathered high in Faro and shouted to us for their needs!<page=T>Clever maggots, fleas, but they also need--need our help. Delivery lady, please take them to the car! Always good-it's nice to get the flea's thanks.

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, shopkeeper. I’d ask to trade, but your store seems a little bare.<page>Ahem! Well, yes. Our little town’s seen some dire times, and now my courier’s gone and got themself lost.<page>But don’t worry! I’ve a few small things, still! And if that courier ever makes it safely back, we’ll have plenty more treasures to haggle over.
original_zh_text: <hpage>日安，店主。本想交易，但货架有点空。<page>咳！时局艰难，送货虫又跑丢了。<page>别急！还有点小玩意！等那小子平安归来，货品管够。
translated_text: <hpage>你好，店主。我想要求交易，但你的店似乎有点空。<page>咳咳！是啊我们的小镇经历了一些可怕的时期，现在我的快递员不见了，我迷路了。<page>但别担心！我还有一些小事要做！如果信使平安归来，我们就会有更多宝藏可以讨价还价。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Hello, owner. I wanted to ask for a deal, but your store seemed a little empty.<page>Cough cough! Yeah, our town has been through some terrible times, and now my courier is gone and I'm lost.<page>But don't worry! I still have some small things to do! If the messenger returns safely, we will have more treasure to bargain with.

original_en_text: Bzzt! Leave me in peace! The great Yarnaby treats the sick! Not those that benefit from their afflictions. Enjoy its advantage and leave me in peace!<hpage>Very well, madam. I did not mean to waste your time.
original_zh_text: 滋滋！别烦我！本神医只医病患！享你的福去！<hpage>好吧，女士。无意浪费您的时间。
translated_text: 嗡嗡声！让我安静点！伟大的Yarnaby治疗病人！而不是那些从苦难中受益的人。享受它的优势，让我安息吧！<hpage>好的，夫人。我不想浪费你的时间。
secondary_translated_text: Buzz! Let me be quiet! The great Yarnaby treats patients! Not those who benefit from suffering. Enjoy its advantages and let me rest in peace!<hpage>Yes, ma 'am. I don't want to waste your time.

original_en_text: Bonva! It is done, brave warrior. By my expert claw, your strange blade has received some fast-sharp shine. It shall cut cleaner than ever before.<hpage>Your efforts provide great aid, pinmaster. You have my thanks.
original_zh_text: 好了！完活啦勇士！经我利爪打磨，您这针刃寒光逼人，削铁如泥啊！<hpage>有劳了，针匠。感激不尽。
translated_text: 邦瓦！完成了，勇敢的士兵。通过我专业的爪子，你奇怪的刀刃获得了一些快速、尖锐的光芒。它将比以往任何时候都干净。<hpage>您的努力提供了巨大的帮助，品大师。我谢谢你。
secondary_translated_text: Bonwa! Done, brave soldier. Through my professional claws, your strange blade gets some quick, sharp light. It will be cleaner than ever before.<hpage>Your efforts have provided tremendous help, Master Pin. I thank you.

original_en_text: <page=T>Miss courier! What horror here! The caves shake-shake, crying pain of hurt most savage.<page=T>And see all our poor friends below, newly found, crowded inside this home of bells, hearts fast for fear.<page=S>But what-what for you? You are here to help, yes-yes? The deliverings, they are needed now at most! When caves turn dark, the deliverings are essential, more than more.
original_zh_text: <page=T>救星小姐！这儿太可怕了！洞窟震得像在惨叫！<page=T>钟居底下挤满了可怜的新朋友，全都吓坏了。<page=S>但您、您是来帮忙的对吧？现在最需要送货了！情况越危险，送货就越要紧！
translated_text: <page=T>送货小姐！这里有多可怕啊！洞穴震动，为最野蛮的伤害哭泣。<page=T>看到下面所有新发现的可怜朋友都挤在这个满是钟声的家里，我的心因恐惧而加速。<page=S>但你怎么了？你是来帮忙的，对吧？送货，你最多现在就需要！当洞穴变黑时，救援至关重要，甚至更加重要。
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Delivery lady! How scary it is here! The cave shook, weeping for the most barbaric injuries.<page=T>Seeing all the poor newly discovered friends below huddled in this home filled with bells, my heart quickened with fear.<page=S>But what happened to you? You're here to help, right? Delivery, you need it now at most! When caves turn dark, rescue is crucial, or even more important.

original_en_text: <page=T>The deliverings! They are broken-broke! Gone and spilled!<page=T>Do not lose hearty-heart, miss courier! This is Pharloom! Danger, deadly. In times as these, is a rarer thing for goods to get to their goings.<page=S>Would you try-try again? For the bugs so much in need of their deliverings?
original_zh_text: <page=T>货毁、毁了！全丢了！<page=T>别灰、灰心！纺络现在处处凶、凶险，能送到才是稀罕事！<page=S>要再试一次吗？那么多虫等着货救、救命呢！
translated_text: <page=T>送货！他们破产了！它消失了又洒了！<page=T>快递员小姐，不要灰心！这是法罗！危险、致命。当今时代，货物到货的情况很少见。<page=S>你会再试一次吗？对于一个如此需要拯救的错误？
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Delivery! They're bankrupt! It disappeared and spilled!<page=T>Miss courier, don't lose heart! This is Farrow! Dangerous and fatal. In today's era, it is rare for goods to arrive.<page=S>Would you try again? For a mistake that needs saving so much?

original_en_text: Those bugs, cowering in their gleaming bells. Grnk. They claim a common calling, to serve the pilgrims as they make their path upwards.<page>Such a crucial role they award themselves, surely worthy of praise!<page>A sweet lie, of course. They, like their predecessors, are simply too weak and fearful to venture any farther. A settlement born from indolence.
original_zh_text: 那些缩在亮堂钟屋里的怂包，哼。自诩要侍奉攀登圣堡的朝圣者。<page>给自己戴高帽，真当是个人物！<page>甜美的谎言罢了。他们和前代一样，不过是没胆往上爬的懦夫。这镇子就是怠惰的产物。
translated_text: 那些昆虫蜷缩在闪闪发光的钟声里。Grnk。他们声称有一个共同的使命，那就是为朝圣者提供服务。<page>他们为自己扮演了如此关键的角色，当然值得赞扬！<page>当然，这是一个甜蜜的谎言。和他们的前辈一样，他们太软弱，不敢再冒险。一个源于懒惰的解决方案。
secondary_translated_text: The insects curled up in the sparkling bell. Grnk。They claim to have a common mission, which is to provide services to pilgrims.<page>They certainly deserve praise for playing such a critical role for themselves!<page>Of course, this is a sweet lie. Like their predecessors, they were too weak to take any more risks. A solution that stems from laziness.

original_en_text: <hpage>He would have been wise to do so. If, on my travels, I happen upon the errant bug, I’ll make sure to send him your way.
original_zh_text: <hpage>他倒是聪明。要是在路上遇见那迷途虫，我会让他来寻你。<page>那就谢谢了！敢闯荒野帮助同类的虫可不多见。
translated_text: <hpage>他这样做是明智的。如果我在旅行中遇到错误的错误，我会确保把他带到你那里。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>He was wise to do so. If I run into the wrong mistake while traveling, I will make sure I bring him to you.

original_en_text: By claw! Are you then our saviour in the shell? Standing so calm and cool on entrance to Plinney’s bellhome!<hpage>What clue, sir, tells of my part in your town’s liberation?<page>Why your blade, fierce warrior! Any fine pinmaster would detect the sign of deadly work upon that needle’s edge.<page>T’was a vile curse that struck here. No simple bug, nor basic pin could have granted our release. No!<page>That blade though, so expertly clutched in claw. That could welly have met the task. It was you who cut us free, yes?<hpage>I’ll grant you’ve sharp sight, pinmaster, and your saving is fortuitous. This blade that restored your town would now benefit from your service.<page>Welly, yes! I’ve a busy backlog of pins to tend, but your gracious heroism decrees that unique weapon receives my care this very moment! What’s say I take a look?
original_zh_text: 利爪啊！您就是我们的大救星？踏进普林尼的华美钟居还这般气定神闲！<hpage>先生怎么知道我插手了镇子的事？<page>看你的针刃啊勇士！但凡有点眼力的针匠都认得出这针尖染过血。<page>那邪咒凶恶得很，寻常虫和寻常针可破不了。但您这把利刃……<page>握爪稳当，做工精良！肯定是您救了我们，对不对？<hpage>眼力不错，针匠。你既然得救，这针刃也该由你照料了。<page>好嘞！虽然我手上活计不少，但英雄的面子最大，立马给您开小灶！这就让我看看针刃？
translated_text: 用你的爪子！那么你是我们壳里的救世主吗？站在普林尼钟楼入口处，如此平静！<hpage>先生，有什么线索可以解释我在解放你们城镇的过程中所扮演的角色？<page>为什么你的剑，凶猛的战士！任何一个好的制针工人都能在针的边缘发现致命的痕迹。<page>在这里受到攻击的是一种卑鄙的诅咒。没有简单的错误或基本pin可以授予我们的版本。不！<page>但刀却被爪子巧妙地抓住了。这样就可以完全完成任务了。你让我们自由了，不是吗？<hpage>我承认你的眼光很敏锐，品大师，你的救赎是偶然的。您所在城镇的这款修复后的刀片现在将受益于您的服务。<page>威利，是的！我有一堆积压的别针要处理，但你优雅的英雄主义决定了我现在要照顾这件独特的武器！我看看怎么样？
secondary_translated_text: Use your claws! So are you the savior in our shells? Standing at the entrance of Pliny's Bell Tower, so calm!<hpage>Sir, what clues might explain my role in liberating your town?<page>Why your sword, fierce warrior! Any good needle-maker can find fatal marks on the edge of a needle.<page>What is attacked here is a despicable curse. There are no simple errors or basic pins that can be granted to our version. No!<page>But the knife was cleverly grasped by its claws. In this way, the task can be completely completed. You set us free, didn't you?<hpage>I admit that your eyes are very sharp, Master Pin, and your redemption is accidental. This restored blade in your town will now benefit from your services.<page>Willie, yes! I have a backlog of pins to deal with, but your elegant heroism has determined that I have to take care of this unique weapon now! How about I see?

original_en_text: More, then! Bring me more relics of the past! Records, seals, idols! Let’s gather up the history of the world and hoard it all here, nice and safe!
original_zh_text: 继续！多找点老物件！典籍、印玺、神像！把全纺络的过往都放在这儿才安稳！
translated_text: 然后更多！再给我一些过去的遗物！记录、封印、偶像！让我们收集世界的历史并将其全部存储在这里，又好又安全！
secondary_translated_text: Then more! Give me some more relics from the past! Record, seal, idol! Let's collect the history of the world and store it all here, nice and safe!

original_en_text: <page=S>Many deliverings still need making, miss courier! We is much needing your help, when you is ready for the giving of it-it!
original_zh_text: <page=S>还有好多货要送呢！等您有空了一定帮帮忙！
translated_text: <page=S>有很多东西要寄给Messenger小姐当您准备好提供帮助时，我们真的需要您的帮助-它！
