secondary_translated_text: <page=S>There is a lot to send to Miss Messenger when you are ready to help, we really need your help-it!

original_en_text: Done, it is! Marvel of Pharloom! See how it gleams, your long, fine blade. Havast! That the pins of our land all once held such shine. So much we have lost...<hpage>This is fine service, pinmaster. It has been a long age since I have seen my needle such. I had not remembered the finesse of its forging.<page>Welly, ho! It is certain! Yours is a blade of finer make than most, one of few that could bear even more sharpening.<page>If ever upon your long road more oil is acquired, seek my service with haste! Who knows what form we could find deeper within your weapon’s sharpened steel!
original_zh_text: 成啦！纺络的奇迹！瞧这寒光，长刃如新。唉！想当年万针皆有如此锋芒，如今……<hpage>针匠果然手艺精湛。此针许久未曾焕发如此神采，几乎快忘了它的锻造之精良。<page>哎呀呀！没错！您这针刃底子绝佳，还能更锋利！<page>要是再得到秘油，就来找我！谁知这针还能磨砺出何等锋芒！
translated_text: 完成了，就是这样！法勒姆奇迹！看看你细长的刀刃有多闪亮。哈瓦斯特！我们土地上的别针曾经闪闪发光。我们失去了很多。<hpage>这是一项很棒的服务，品斯马斯特。我已经很久没有见过这样的针了。我不记得它的锻造技术了。<page>威利，嗬！这是肯定的！您的刀片比大多数刀片都薄，是少数能够承受更锋利刀片的刀片之一。<page>如果您在漫长的道路上获得更多石油，请尽快向我寻求服务！谁知道我们能在你武器的锋利钢铁深处找到什么形式！
secondary_translated_text: It's done, that's it! Farham miracle! Look how shiny your slender blade is. Havast! The pins on our land used to shine. We lost a lot.<hpage>This is a great service, Pinsmaster. I haven't seen a needle like this in a long time. I don't remember its forging technology.<page>Willie, ho! This is for sure! Your blade is thinner than most blades and is one of the few blades that can withstand a sharper blade.<page>If you are getting more oil on the long road, please ask for my services as soon as possible! Who knows what form we can find deep in the sharp steel of your weapon!

original_en_text: <hpage>For the moment, I can not aid you, couriers. My own tasks are too pressing.<page=T>Then we shall hope you see them soon achieved! If the deliverings are not made, Pharloom’s bugs will suffer muchly-much!
original_zh_text: <hpage>眼下实在帮不了，有要事在身。<page=T>希望您早日达成目标！要是货送不到，大伙可遭、遭殃咯！
translated_text: <hpage>我目前无法帮助你们信使。我自己的任务太紧迫了。<page=T>那么我们希望您尽快实现这些目标！如果不交付，法鲁的昆虫将遭受巨大的损失！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I am currently unable to help you Messenger. My own task is too urgent.<page=T>Then we hope you achieve these goals as soon as possible! If it is not delivered, Faro's insects will suffer huge losses!

original_en_text: <hpage>It is fortune to see you returned, pinmaster. The roads between here and that deep woods’ grave crawl with violent foes. I had concerns for your safety.<page>Brave warrior, my hero! T’was indeed a fearful scramble home, but safe I now am! And a warmly pleasure to see you too, for the world has darkened indeed!<page>In such times, the task for a pinmaster is clear, to polish and sharpen and refine, suchly that the glimmer of your blade may pierce through the encroaching murk!
original_zh_text: <hpage>能见你平安归来真是万幸，针匠。从深林墓穴到此地的路上遍布凶险，我确实有些担心你的安危。<page>勇敢的战士，我的英雄！回家路上确实惊险万分，但我现在安全了！在这愈发黑暗的世道能遇见您真是令我欣慰！<page>在这危难时刻，针匠的职责再清晰不过——打磨、淬锋、精炼，让您的兵刃锋利到足以刺破这渐浓的黑暗！
translated_text: <hpage>我很幸运看到你回来，平托。从这里到深树林坟墓的道路上挤满了凶猛的敌人。我担心你的安全。<page>勇敢的士兵，我的英雄！匆忙回家确实很可怕，但我现在安全了！我也很高兴见到你，因为世界已经黑暗了！<page>在这样的时代，制针师的任务非常明确，那就是抛光、磨砺、精炼，就像你刀刃的光芒可以穿透侵蚀的黑暗一样！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I'm lucky to see you back, Pinto. The road from here to the deep forest tomb is crowded with fierce enemies. I'm worried about your safety.<page>Brave soldier, my hero! It was scary to rush home, but I am safe now! I'm very happy to see you too, because the world is already dark!<page>In such an era, the task of a needle maker is very clear, that is, polishing, sharpening, and refining, just as the light of your blade can penetrate the eroding darkness!

original_en_text: <page=S>We is got requested times a’many for this, a queeny egg of those eaters of Silk. Wish from big, sticky creature, near many roaches caged. Wants it muchly! <hpage>The creature, I have met them, a timid, fawning sort. Nonetheless, their tending of Silkeaters can be a benefit for me.<hpage>If a queen delivered could improve their harvest, I too would gain from the trade.<page=S>Miss courier, and big, sticky creature? Both are like to liking things so grossly-gross? We think yous are muchly strange...
original_zh_text: <page=S>接了个怪单！蟑螂笼子旁的黏糊大块头想、想要噬丝蛆女王的卵！<hpage>我见过那大块头，是个怂包。他们养蛆虽然恶心，但对我有利。<hpage>要是能提高他们的产量，倒也划算。<page=S>救星小姐和黏糊怪都好重口！真搞不懂……
translated_text: <page=S>我们收到了很多要求这些丝绸食客的女王蛋。笼子里许多蟑螂附近的又大又粘的生物发出的祝福。太想要了！<hpage>我以前见过他们，这个生物是一个胆怯、讨人喜欢的人。尽管如此，他们照顾丝绸对我来说是一个好处。<hpage>如果交付的女王能够提高收成，我也会从贸易中受益。<page=S>快递员小姐，还有又大又粘的生物吗？他们俩都喜欢这么恶心的东西吗？我们觉得你很奇怪。
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>We received a lot of queen eggs from these silk diners. Blessing from the large, sticky creatures near the many roaches in the cage. I want it so much!<hpage>I have seen them before, and this creature is a timid, likeable person. Still, they take care of the silk is a benefit to me.<hpage>If the delivered queen can improve the harvest, I will also benefit from trade.<page=S>Miss courier, are there any big, sticky creatures? Do they both like such disgusting things? We think you're weird.

original_en_text: <page=T>Miss saving! We thought us safe, brothers together at last, but what horror even here! The caves shake-shake, crying pain of hurt most savage.<page=T>And see all our poor friends below, newly found, crowded inside this home of bells, hearts fast for fear.<page=S>But what-what for you? You are here to help, yes-yes? The deliverings, they are needed now at most! Alas, for our shells to survive we cannot now leave this home of bells. No more. Heres we must remain.<page=T>But we instead did plan, together, clever! Yes-yes. Those strong ones, like yourselfs, maybes they will help? For small reward as we have?<page=S>Our savings is done, and the caves turn dark. Now the deliveries are needed, desperate. Now is time for miss courier!
original_zh_text: <page=T>救星小姐！本以为我们兄弟团聚就安全了，谁知这里也遭了灾！洞窟震、震个不停，像在惨叫似的。<page=T>您看钟居底下这些可怜的新朋友，全都挤作一团，心都快吓跳出来了。<page=S>但您、您是来帮忙的对吧？现在最需要送货了！可我们这副样子……实在不敢离开钟居了。只能守在这儿。<page=T>不过我们想、想了个聪明主意！像您这样的强者，说不定愿意帮忙？酬劳虽然不多……<page=S>我们的积蓄都花光了，洞窟也危在旦夕。现在送货是救命的事！该您出马了，救星小姐！
translated_text: <page=T>我想念储蓄！我们以为我们很安全，兄弟俩终于在一起了，但即使在这里也太可怕了！洞穴震动，为最野蛮的伤害哭泣。<page=T>看到下面所有新发现的可怜朋友都挤在这个满是钟声的家里，我的心因恐惧而加速。<page=S>但你怎么了？你是来帮忙的，对吧？送货，你最多现在就需要！唉，为了我们贝壳的生存，我们现在不能离开这座钟屋。没有更多.我们必须留下来。<page=T>但我们一起明智地计划了！是的-是的。那些像你这样坚强的人，也许会帮忙？为了像我们这样的一点奖励？<page=S>我们的积蓄用完了，山洞里变黑了。现在急需送货。现在是送货小姐的时候了！
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>I miss saving! We thought we were safe and the brothers were finally together, but even here it was scary! The cave shook, weeping for the most barbaric injuries.<page=T>Seeing all the poor newly discovered friends below huddled in this home filled with bells, my heart quickened with fear.<page=S>But what happened to you? You're here to help, right? Delivery, you need it now at most! Alas, for the survival of our shells, we cannot leave this clock house now. no more. We have to stay.<page=T>But we planned wisely together! Yes-yes. Someone as strong as you might help? For a little reward like ours?<page=S>Our savings ran out and the cave turned dark. Delivery is urgently needed now. Now is the time for the delivery lady!

original_en_text: What? What, what? Who is it? What’ve you got? What do you want?<hpage>I am just a traveller. May I ask, though, what work occupies you here?<page>What occupies me, you ask? The past! The voices of ages gone by, they speak to me through what is left behind.<page>Those outside, those dreary pilgrims and bell-adorned dullards... none of them have my keen sense, my respect for the past!<page>You seem able, though. Sneaky, too. If you find any fine old stuff, anything with a history to it, bring it here. I’ll take it.
original_zh_text: 干嘛？要干嘛？你是谁？带了什么来？想要什么？<hpage>过路客而已，请问您在忙什么？<page>忙什么？忙着挖掘历史！这些老物件都会跟我诉说过往呢！<page>外头那些呆瓜朝圣者和钟里的蠢货……没一个懂行！<page>但你倒像块料，鬼精的。要是找到老物件，有年头的，就往这儿送。我收！
translated_text: 什么？什么，什么？是谁？你有什么？你想要什么？<hpage>我只是一个旅行者。但我可以问一下，你在这里做什么吗？<page>你问我是什么？过去的！时间流逝的声音向我讲述了剩下的一切。<page>那些人，那些沉闷的朝圣者和拿着钟声的傻瓜……他们中没有一个有我敏锐的洞察力、我对过去的尊重！<page>但你看起来很有能力。而且狡猾。如果您发现任何美丽的古老、有历史的东西，请把它带到这里。我买了.
secondary_translated_text: What? What, what? Who is it? What do you have? What do you want?<hpage>I am just a traveler. But may I ask, what are you doing here?<page>You asked me what it was? The past! The voice of time passed told me everything else.<page>Those people, those dreary pilgrims and fools with bells... none of them has my keen insight, my respect for the past!<page>But you seem very capable. And cunning. If you find anything beautiful old, historical, please bring it here. I'll take it.

original_en_text: Your continued help to Bellhart has not gone unnoticed, miss traveller.<page>In these terrible times, it’s rare enough to see any wish granted. Now to see such care come from a stranger! Why, that’s simply unheard of!<hpage>I have seen the scale of suffering wrought across Pharloom, Pavo. And I will admit, fulfilling these requests may do little to affect the cause... Even still, I have found it a rewarding task.<hpage>To aid another... The small warmth of it, I had almost forgotten.
original_zh_text: 您对钟心镇的援助有目共睹，小姐。<page>这世道，能实现祈愿已是奇迹，更何况还是出自外乡客！闻所未闻！<hpage>我也目睹纺络遍地疮痍。实现祈愿虽难以撼动其根源，但总能得到些许慰藉。<hpage>助虫为乐……这份悸动，我几乎忘却。
translated_text: 乘客小姐，您对伯哈特的持续帮助并没有被忽视。<page>在这个可怕的时代，很少看到任何愿望成真。现在我看到这种担忧来自一个陌生人！为什么？这简直是闻所未闻！<hpage>我亲眼目睹了帕沃·法鲁姆的苦难。我承认满足这些要求对你的职业生涯影响不大。即便如此，我还是发现这是一项有用的任务。<hpage>帮助别人。一点温暖，我差点忘记了。
secondary_translated_text: Miss Passenger, your continued help to Burhart has not been ignored.<page>In these terrible times, it is rare to see any wishes come true. Now I see this worry coming from a stranger! Why? This is simply unheard of!<hpage>I witnessed with my own eyes the suffering of Paavo Farum. I admit that meeting these requirements will have little impact on your career. Even so, I still found it a useful task.<hpage>Help others. A little warmth, I almost forgot.

original_en_text: It’s my calling it is, to gather the relics of the past. Look at my collection, if you fancy! Look, look!
original_zh_text: 我活着的念想就是收罗老古董！想看我的珍藏不？来！快看看！
translated_text: 收集过去的文物是我的使命。如果您喜欢，请查看我的收藏！看，看！
secondary_translated_text: Collecting cultural relics from the past is my mission. If you like, please check out my collection! Look, look!

original_en_text: <page=T>Goods for the camp at base, where pilgrims’ journey starts. We muchly hope this delivering goes well!
original_zh_text: <page=T>给骸底营地的货物，希望这趟一路顺利！
translated_text: <page=T>来自朝圣者旅程开始的大本营的货物。我们非常希望这次交付顺利！
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Goods from the base camp where the pilgrims began their journey. We very much hope that this delivery will go smoothly!

original_en_text: <page=S>You have the good-goods, miss courier! Now only the deliverings needs doing. Don’t wait here-here!
original_zh_text: <page=S>救星小姐，拿、拿了货物，快出发吧！
translated_text: <page=S>快递小姐，你有好货！现在只需要送货即可。别在这里等--这里！
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Express lady, you have good goods! Now only delivery is needed. Don't wait here-here!

original_en_text: Off with you! Head over to that tangled mess of cages, in those roads above the moors.<page>Those two bugs, Benjin and Crull, can surely scrounge up what I need. A full bundle of hard, sharp spines!
original_zh_text: 赶紧去！找沼地上边铁笼堆的班金和克鲁尔，拿钢棘回来！
translated_text: 走开！荒原上方的道路上有一个凌乱的笼子。<page>本金和克鲁尔这两个错误肯定会找到我所需要的。一整捆又硬又尖的荆棘！
secondary_translated_text: Go away! There is a messy cage on the road above the wasteland.<page>The two mistakes of principal and Krull will definitely find what I need. A whole bundle of hard and sharp thorns!

original_en_text: That blade! By claw! It is done. Sharper than this pinmaster would have believed achievable. Shining pale and clear.<page>Bonva! Stranger, you have granted my wish, and more. Your blade is accomplishment to match those of great pinmasters past.<page>Pharloom may ail, but throughout its morbid dim, your needle will shine bright.
original_zh_text: 瞧这针刃！利爪啊！完成了！这苍白皎洁的锋芒，简直超乎我这针匠想象。<page>太好了！您不止完成了我的祈愿，还助此针达成了不逊于古匠的成就！<page>纵使纺络病入膏肓，您的针芒也将照亮死寂！
translated_text: 那把刀！用你的爪子！搞定了比制针师想象的要难。苍白而清晰。<page>邦瓦！陌生人，你实现了我的愿望，甚至更多。你的剑堪比昔日伟大的竖琴手。<page>法鲁可能会受伤，但在病态的黑暗中，你的针会发光。
secondary_translated_text: That knife! Use your claws! It was more difficult than the needle maker imagined. Pale and clear.<page>Bonwa! Stranger, you have fulfilled my wish and even more. Your sword is comparable to the great harpists of yesteryear.<page>Faro may get hurt, but in the morbid darkness, your needle will shine.

original_en_text: What? You refuse to pass it on? What good do you think it’ll do you?!
original_zh_text: 干嘛？为什么不交？留着能下崽啊？！
translated_text: 什么？你拒绝传承吗？你认为这对你有什么好处？！
secondary_translated_text: What? Do you refuse inheritance? What good do you think this will do you?!

original_en_text: <hpage>Stay safe, Pavo. Keep these poor bugs close and their spirits from sorrow.<page>None shall leave these walls, dear resident, and all still are welcome. Any that can be saved.<page>Better we bugs be together, here at the end of it all.
original_zh_text: <hpage>保重，帕沃。保护好这些可怜虫，别让他们陷入绝望。<page>没有虫会离开这里的，旅者小姐！这里永远欢迎任何幸存的虫。<page>末日将至，能聚在一起已值得庆幸。
translated_text: <hpage>注意安全，帕沃。让这些可怜的昆虫靠近，拯救他们的灵魂免受悲伤。<page>亲爱的居民们，任何人都不允许离开这些墙，仍然欢迎大家。任何可以拯救的东西。<page>当这一切结束后，我们最好呆在一起。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Be safe, Paavo. Let these poor insects come close and save their souls from grief.<page>Dear residents, no one is allowed to leave these walls, and everyone is still welcome. Anything that can be saved.<page>When this is over, we'd better stay together.

original_en_text: <hpage>Stay alert on your journey home, pinmaster. If you encounter other bugs upon the road, I advise you avoid them as you are able.
original_zh_text: <hpage>回程多留神，针匠。路上遇虫尽量躲着点。
translated_text: <hpage>回家的路上要保持警惕，品大师。如果您在路上遇到其他错误，建议您尽可能避免。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Be vigilant on the way home, Master Pin. If you encounter other mistakes on the road, it is recommended that you avoid them as much as possible.

original_en_text: Auugh! Bzzt! Again the world lashes out at me!<page>But the pain... it means nothing to Yarnaby!<page>Nothing can deter my great work! Not for long! I must not be stopped!
original_zh_text: 嗷！滋滋！这该死世道又针对我！<page>但痛苦……对雅纳碧而言没有意义！<page>什么都挡不住本神医的伟业！什么都不行！
translated_text: 啊！嗡嗡声！世界又在攻击我了！<page>但是痛苦。这对Yanabi来说毫无意义！<page>没有什么可以阻止我做我伟大的工作！不会太久了！我无法被阻止！
secondary_translated_text: Ah! Buzz! The world is attacking me again!<page>But pain. This makes no sense to Yanabi!<page>Nothing can stop me from doing my great job! Not for long! I cannot be stopped!

original_en_text: <page=S>A new destination this-this! And desperate these supplies are asked.<page=T>Deliverings for them-them escaped from the crumbled camp beside the bone, those few still living.<page=T>Hurting and hungry, those few must be.
original_zh_text: <page=S>这、这是新目的地！这批物资要得急！<page=T>送给骸骨营地的幸存者，就剩那么几个了。<page=T>他们肯定又惊又饿。
translated_text: <page=S>这是一个新的目的地！这些物资是急需的。<page=T>祝福他们--他们逃离了骨头旁边倒塌的营地，还有一些人还活着。<page=T>这些人一定很痛苦和饥饿。
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>This is a new destination! These supplies are urgently needed.<page=T>Bless them-they escaped the collapsed camp next to the bones, and some are still alive.<page=T>These people must be in pain and hunger.

original_en_text: <page=T>It is yours, miss courier! Meats prepared fresh as fresh, in our special way.<page=T>Miss courier must know! Our rasher is delicious, strong, fatty food, but is not long to last. If not stored quick, it-it is flavour fast turns foul.<hpage>If the rasher is likely to spoil, then I shall make fast for the Citadel. I’ve no desire to see your efforts, or your scant supplies wasted.
original_zh_text: <page=T>给您备好啦！送货虫特制熏肉，仅此一家！<page=T>熏肉香浓肥美但不耐存！得赶紧送！<hpage>既然如此，我即刻动身。不枉你们辛苦。
translated_text: <page=T>送货小姐，这是你的！以我们特殊的方式现煮的肉。<page=T>快递员小姐一定知道！我们的拉舍尔干酪味道鲜美、味道浓郁，但不会持续太久。如果不快储存，味道很快就会变坏。<hpage>如果拉舍尔病情恶化，我就回城堡。我不想看到你的努力或你微薄的物资被浪费。
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Delivery lady, this is yours! Fresh meat cooked in our special way.<page=T>Miss courier must know! Our Raschel cheese is delicious and rich, but it won't last long. If you don't store it quickly, the taste will go bad quickly.<hpage>If Raschel's condition worsens, I'll go back to the castle. I don't want to see your efforts or your meager supplies wasted.

original_en_text: Shellwood’s grown more dangerous in recent times, but I’m a lifelong catcher, right down to my core. Ain’t nothing that’ll change that.
original_zh_text: 甲木林近来愈发凶险，但我生来就是渔夫的命，避不开。
translated_text: 近年来，谢尔伍德变得更加危险，但我本质上是一名终身接球手。什么都改变不了。
secondary_translated_text: Shelwood has become more dangerous in recent years, but I am essentially a lifelong receiver. Nothing changes.

original_en_text: I rarely sell objects as intriguing as this. Supposed to improve a bug’s natural ability to heal! Can’t say I’ve felt its effects myself, but then I keep more healthy than most.
original_zh_text: 这可是少见的好玩意！据说能提升自愈力。我身子一向健康，倒是没感受过。
translated_text: 我很少卖这么有吸引力的东西。应该是提升昆虫的自然治愈能力！不能说我自己感觉到了影响，但我比大多数人都健康。
secondary_translated_text: I rarely sell something so attractive. It should be to improve the natural healing ability of insects! I can't say I feel the impact myself, but I'm healthier than most people.

original_en_text: Yes... This fits my collection well. Look, then! Look at what I have!
original_zh_text: 真不错……这玩意配得上我的珍藏。瞧啊！这才叫宝贝！
translated_text: 是的...这很适合我的收藏。所以，看！看看我有什么！
secondary_translated_text: Yes... This fits well in my collection. So look! Look what I have!

original_en_text: Ahh. ‘Tis your choice, warrior. If you’re choosing different in times ahead, Plinney shall be here to provide eager aid.
original_zh_text: 唉。随您，勇士。改主意了随时来找普林尼。
translated_text: 啊，这是你的选择，士兵。如果您将来选择不同的选择，普林尼将在这里提供热切的帮助。
secondary_translated_text: Ah, it's your choice, soldier. If you choose a different option in the future, Pliny will be here to provide eager help.

original_en_text: My sickly friend! Pavo can sense that you are ailing, but fret not! For in Bellhart, pilgrims may rest and recuperate until they are fit to travel once more!<hpage>Your hospitality is appreciated, Pavo, but I fear rest alone will not suffice for this illness. A parasite has taken root inside me, one I can not remove through strength alone.<hpage>Tell me, are there any you know who might help me? A healer, or a physician?<page>A physician? Well... we did once have one... A frightening fiend! Callous and crude in her practice. For the health of glorious Bellhart we voted, unanimously, to expel her!<page>I know not where she buzzed away to, and I prefer to keep it that way! But if you really must seek her out, you might start by speaking to the old hermit skulking beneath the Bellway.<page>Yes... that hermit seems mad, but he has a way of accumulating knowledge. He might be able to tell you where that wretched physician is lurking.
original_zh_text: 旅者小姐！帕沃察觉到您疾病缠身，但无需担心！您可以待在钟心镇疗养至康复！<hpage>心领了，但此症并非静养可以治愈，甲壳内寄生体难以驱除。<hpage>你可知道哪里能寻得医者？<page>医者？过去镇上曾有一虫……但手段可怕至极！因疗法过于粗暴遭全民驱逐！<page>如今行踪不明，但执意要寻找的话……可以问问在钟道下藏身的老隐士。<page>那老头虽然疯疯癫癫，但知道不少，或许能告知庸医的下落。
translated_text: 我生病的朋友！孔雀能感觉到你生病了，但不要担心！因为在伯哈特，朝圣者可以休息和康复，直到他们能够再次旅行！<hpage>帕沃，谢谢你的热情款待，但恐怕仅靠休息不足以治疗这种疾病。寄生虫已经在我身上扎根，我无法独自消灭它。<hpage>告诉我，你认识谁可以帮助我吗？治疗师还是医生？<page>医生？好吧...我们曾经有过一次。可怕的恶魔！她的行为无情而粗鲁。为了光荣的伯哈特的健康，我们一致投票驱逐她！<page>我不知道她去哪儿了，我宁愿这样下去！但如果你真的要找到她，你可以先和躲在贝尔威下面的老隐士谈谈。<page>是的...隐士可能看起来很疯狂，但他有一套积累知识的方法。他也许能告诉你可怜的医生潜伏在哪里。
secondary_translated_text: My sick friend! The peacock can feel you are sick, but don't worry! Because in Burhart, pilgrims can rest and recover until they can travel again!<hpage>Paavo, thank you for your warm hospitality, but I'm afraid rest alone is not enough to treat this disease. The parasite has taken root in me, and I cannot eliminate it alone.<hpage>Tell me, do you know anyone who can help me? Therapist or doctor?<page>Doctor? Okay... We had one. Terrible demon! Her behavior was ruthless and rude. For the health of glorious Burhart, we unanimously voted to expel her!<page>I don't know where she has gone, I'd rather go on like this! But if you really want to find her, you can talk to the old hermit hiding under Bellevue first.<page>Yes... A hermit may seem crazy, but he has a way of accumulating knowledge. He might be able to tell you where the poor doctor is lurking.

original_en_text: We are lucky to have you, miss traveller. In Bellhart you are always welcome, you and your big, sharp blade!
original_zh_text: 有您相助真是钟心镇之幸！这里随时欢迎您，以及您的针刃！
translated_text: 我们很幸运有你，旅行者小姐。贝尔哈特永远欢迎你，你和你的大，锋利的刀片！
secondary_translated_text: We're lucky to have you, miss traveler. Berhart always welcomes you, you and your big, sharp blade!

original_en_text: <hpage>What do you remember of your time caught upon the thread, Pavo?<page>Oh, ahh. It is difficult... Upsetting even to think. Strange, sad memories, not my own, and my own thoughts smothered amidst the tangle.<page>If one could choose to connect themself to something grander, that curse may seem a wonder. For myself, it now seems a horror.
original_zh_text: <hpage>帕沃，还记得被邪丝操控时的记忆么？<page>唉……回想起来有些痛苦……尽是陌生悲伤的回忆，自身的思绪仿佛被扼杀其中。<page>要是自愿投身于宏伟存在，这份诅咒或许是恩赐。但对于我……终究是梦魇。
translated_text: <hpage>帕沃，你还记得你有麻烦的时候吗？<page>哦，啊。这很困难。甚至思考也令人不安。奇怪、悲伤的记忆，不是我自己的，是我自己的想法交织在一起。<page>如果一个人可以选择将自己与更伟大的事物联系在一起，那么诅咒可能看起来就像是一个奇迹。对我自己来说，这现在似乎是一种恐怖。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Paavo, do you remember when you were in trouble?<page>Oh, ah. This is difficult. Even thinking is disturbing. Strange, sad memories, not my own, intertwined with my own thoughts.<page>If one could choose to associate himself with something greater, the curse might seem like a miracle. To myself, this now seems like a horror.

original_en_text: Oh! Ohhhh! They shall join... Union upon your thread... A gift, for your waking. A world strung to serve...<hpage>Creature, your claws guide those cursed threads, but you are not their source. What role do you play in this vile affliction?
original_zh_text: 哦！哦哦哦！他们将归附……缠绕在您的丝线中……献予您的苏醒之礼，一个以侍奉之名编织的世界……<hpage>怪物，你虽然操纵邪丝却并非其源头。在这卑劣诅咒中你扮演什么角色？
translated_text: 噢！噢！他们会加入。在您的线程上结合。给你醒来的礼物。一个致力于服务的世界.<hpage>生物，你的爪子引导着被诅咒的丝线，但你不是它们的来源。你在这种卑鄙的痛苦中扮演了什么角色？
secondary_translated_text: Oh! Oh! They will join. Combine on your thread. A gift for you to wake up. A world committed to serving.<hpage>Creature, your claws guide the cursed threads, but you are not their source. What role do you play in this despicable suffering?

original_en_text: <page=T>But hold, miss courier! Before depart you mustly know, all deliverings are in needing of great-great care!<page=S>No bump! No shake! No taking funny transport! Only leg, claw, wing must be used to see them where they need be going.<page=S>Carry the deliverings safe-safe, miss courier! Cared for like your own shell.
original_zh_text: 等等！出发前得知道：所有货物必须轻拿轻放！<page>不准磕！不准晃！只能用腿脚翅膀运送！<page>要当成自己甲壳一样护着货！
translated_text: <page=T>但是等一下，送货小姐！在离开之前，你必须知道所有的分娩都需要非常非常小心！<page=S>没有碰撞！不要摇晃！别开玩笑了！它们只能用腿、爪子和翅膀来判断需要去的地方。<page=S>安全携带送货安全，送货小姐！像照顾自己的壳一样照顾它。
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>But wait a minute, delivery lady! Before you leave, you must know that all childbirth requires very, very careful!<page=S>No collision! Don't shake! Stop joking! They can only use their legs, claws and wings to determine where they need to go.<page=S>Safe to carry and deliver safely, delivery lady! Take care of it like your own shell.

original_en_text: <page=T>Those good-goods, all packed fresh for the clever fleas. Take thems up for us, miss courier. Maybe new friends you might be making with your service? Yes-yes?
original_zh_text: 给聪明跳蚤们的新鲜货。送去说不定能交新朋友？对、对吧？
translated_text: <page=T>那些好货都是新鲜包装的，适合聪明的跳蚤。送货小姐，请帮助我们领取这些。也许您可以通过您的服务结交新朋友？是的-是的？
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Those good goods are freshly packed for smart fleas. Delivery lady, please help us collect these. Maybe you can make new friends through your services? Yes-yes?

original_en_text: Bzzt! Who’s bothering me now?! Leave the great Yarnaby in peace! Shoo shoo!
original_zh_text: 滋滋！谁在聒噪？！让伟大的雅纳碧静静！去去去！
translated_text: 嗡嗡声！现在谁在骚扰我？！让伟大的阿纳比安息吧！嘘，嘘！
secondary_translated_text: Buzz! Who is harassing me now?! Let the great Annabi rest in peace! Shh, shh!

original_en_text: <hpage>I am sick, madam, and badly in need of your service. I’ve become host to a vile infestation. It leeches my strength, and attempts to wrest control of my shell.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我身体抱恙，女士，需要您诊治。壳里寄生了恶心玩意，不仅吸我气力，还想夺舍躯体。
translated_text: <hpage>女士，我病了，迫切需要您的服务。我已经成为卑鄙入侵的主持人。它吸走我的力量并试图夺取我外壳的控制权。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Ma 'am, I am sick and urgently need your services. I have become the host of despicable intrusions. It sucks my strength and tries to seize control of my shell.

original_en_text: Halfwits, the lot of them! Such grand achievement, wrought by Yarnaby! A bug healed full by my marvellous machine!<page>A few weaklings expire, and they all raise their claws. Is there no place for progress in their tiny minds?!
original_zh_text: 全是蠢材！这是雅纳碧创造的奇迹！被神机治愈的病患！<page>死几个弱虫就举爪抗议！他们的小脑仁就这么容不下进步？！
translated_text: 半明智的，他们中的很多！如此伟大的成就是Yarnaby创造的！错误被我的神奇机器彻底治愈了！<page>几个虚弱的人死了，举起了爪子。他们的小脑袋就没有改进的空间吗？！
secondary_translated_text: Semi-wise, many of them! Such a great achievement was created by Yarnaby! The mistake was completely cured by my magical machine!<page>Several frail people died and raised their claws. Isn't there room for improvement in their little brains?!

original_en_text: Bellhart’s lost much of its lustre, but we still offer some comfort to the pilgrims who climb this high.
original_zh_text: 钟心镇是风光不再了，但还能为登高的朝圣者提供些慰藉。
translated_text: 伯哈特已经失去了大部分光彩，但我们仍然为攀登如此高的朝圣者提供一些安慰。
secondary_translated_text: Burhart has lost most of its luster, but we still offer some comfort to pilgrims climbing so high.

original_en_text: <page>Dear resident! To see you return alive is such a glimmer of light, even as the dark descends upon us all.<hpage>All these pilgrims gathered here... I had not expected so many to survive. The destruction beyond these bells suggested worse.<page>Indeed! Things should be worse! Would be worse, but for your tall warrior friend, her of those shining rings, who so fortunately chose our town to camp.<page>That brave bug now acts alone to guard our town and those pilgrims who flee for it.<page>For her efforts, our shells have stayed safe, though how long she can remain at that task... I do not dare to consider.
original_zh_text: <page>旅者小姐！看到您平安归来，就像一道萤火驱散了钟心镇的黑暗。<hpage>想不到有如此多朝圣者幸存，镇外的景象可是惨烈得很。<page>情况确实本应更糟！但幸运的是有您这样的勇士驻守。<page>正是有您的保护，朝圣者们才能逃难至此。<page>有您在，镇子才能暂时安全，但不知这景象能维持多久……
translated_text: <page>亲爱的居民！看到你活着回来就是一束光，即使黑暗降临在我们所有人身上。<hpage>所有这些朝圣者都聚集在这里……我没想到会有这么多人活下来。这些钟之外的损坏表明情况更糟。<page>确实如此！事情应该更糟！如果不是你高大的战士朋友戴着闪亮的戒指，她很幸运选择我们小镇露营。<page>这种勇敢的昆虫现在正在独自行动，保卫我们的小镇和逃往这里的朝圣者。<page>由于她的努力，我们的炮弹仍然安全，尽管她能坚持多久……我不敢想它。
secondary_translated_text: <page>Dear residents! Seeing you come back alive is a ray of light, even if darkness falls on all of us.<hpage>All these pilgrims gathered here... I didn't expect so many people to survive. Damage outside of these clocks suggests the situation is worse.<page>Indeed! Things should be worse! If it weren't for your tall warrior friend wearing a shiny ring, she would be lucky to choose our town to camp.<page>This brave insect is now acting alone, defending our town and the pilgrims who have fled here.<page>Thanks to her efforts, our shells are still safe, despite how long she can last... I dare not think about it.

original_en_text: My brother, Pill, still out there. Help-help others he must be, taking good-goods all across. I’m is only hope he stay safe-safe, but gone long is Pill. Too long!<page>On the wishwall, I’m placed my wish-wish, that my brother returns to me, and these bells of safety’s safe.<hpage>I shall check the wall, Tipp. If your wish aligns with my journey, I may track him down.
original_zh_text: 我兄弟皮尔还在外面送、送货，他肯定还在帮、帮别的虫，但去太久了！<page>我在祈愿墙上许、许了愿：希望他平安归来，还有钟心镇也永远平安。<hpage>我会查看祈愿墙，蒂普。若是顺路，或许能找到他的踪迹。
translated_text: 我的兄弟皮埃尔仍然逍遥法外。他一定在帮助别人，带着美好的东西环游世界。我只是想让他保持安全，但药丸不见了。太久了！<page>在愿望墙上，我写下了我的愿望，希望我的兄弟能回到我身边，这些安全的钟声也会安全。<hpage>我会检查一下墙壁，蒂普。如果你的愿望与我的旅程一致，我可能会找到他。
secondary_translated_text: My brother Pierre is still at large. He must be helping others, traveling around the world with something beautiful. I just wanted to keep him safe, but the pills were gone. Too long!<page>On the wall of wishes, I wrote my wish, hoping that my brother would come back to me and that these safe bells would be safe.<hpage>I'll check the walls, Tip. If your wishes are consistent with my journey, I might find him.

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, shopkeeper. Given the hardships of the lands beyond these bells, your store seems in remarkable order. <page>Aye, well, we’ve had our tough times too! Of once bustling Bellhart, only a few residents now remain.<page>But things are turned around for old Frey! Ho, yes! The town at least feels briefly at peace, and my courier has returned with fresh goods to trade. <page>Whether pilgrim or traveller, mine is the finest store you’ll have the fortune to visit throughout our blighted lands.
original_zh_text: <hpage>日安，店主。钟心镇外世道艰难，你这铺子倒打理得井井有条。<page>唉，我也吃过苦头的！往日热闹的钟心镇，如今只剩几口虫啦。<page>但老芙蕾时来运转！哈哈！镇子外总算消停会儿，送货虫也带新鲜货回来了。<page>不管是朝圣者还是旅者，走遍这破地儿也找不着比我家更棒的铺子！
translated_text: <hpage>你好，店主。考虑到这些钟声之外的土地的艰辛，你的商店似乎井然有序。<page>是的，好吧，我们也经历过艰难的时期！曾经热闹的伯哈特现在只剩下少数居民了。<page>但老弗雷的情况却发生了逆转！哦，是的！小镇至少暂时平静了下来，我的快递员带着新鲜的商品回来了。<page>无论您是朝圣者还是旅行者，我的商店都是您在我们破旧的土地上有幸参观过的最好的商店。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Hello, owner. Considering the hardships of the land beyond these bells, your store seems orderly.<page>Yeah, well, we've been through tough times too! The once-lively Burhart now has only a few residents left.<page>But Old Frey's situation has reversed! Oh, yes! The town calmed down at least temporarily, and my couriers returned with fresh merchandise.<page>Whether you are a pilgrim or a traveler, my store is the best store you will have the honor of visiting in our dilapidated land.

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings again, shopkeeper. Your shelves are looking better stocked. I see the courier made their way back to you safely.<page>Oh yes, the cheeky little so-and-so came by and dropped his cargo off at last.<page>Poor dear was so shaken by his misadventures, I almost didn’t have the heart to dock his earnings.<page>All’s well now, though! Take a look at the lovely new goods I have available!
original_zh_text: <hpage>日安，店主。货架充实不少，看来送货虫平安归来了。<page>可不，那小滑头终于把货带到了。<page>可怜虫吓得够呛，我都不忍扣他工钱。<page>现在齐活啦！瞧瞧这些新宝贝！
translated_text: <hpage>再次向主人问好。你的架子看起来更好了。我看到信使安全地回到你身边。<page>哦，是的，厚脸皮的小家伙终于过来放下了东西。<page>可怜的亲爱的对他的不幸感到震惊，我简直不敢扣除他的收入。<page>但现在一切都好了！看看我有哪些可爱的新产品！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Say hello to the owner again. Your shelf looks better. I saw the messenger return to you safely.<page>Oh, yes, the cheeky little guy finally came over and put down his things.<page>The poor darling was so shocked at his misfortune that I dared not deduct his income.<page>But everything is fine now! Check out what cute new products I have!

original_en_text: Ohhhh! She is here! The rare birthling! Precious child of Wyrm and Weaver!<page>Spawn of those who dared to flee. She has found her way home... at last.<page>How fine her shell, and Silk, and claw... For you, mother... let me claim her all for you!
original_zh_text: 哦哦哦！她来了！稀世子嗣！沃姆与织者的结晶！<page>逃亡者的后代，终于归乡……<page>多么完美的甲壳、灵丝与利爪……母亲啊……让我将她献予您！
translated_text: 噢！她来了！罕见的出生！维姆和韦弗的孩子！<page>那些敢于逃跑的人的后代。她找到回家的路...最后<page>她的贝壳、丝绸和爪子多么薄……给你的，妈妈。让我为你夺走她的一切！
secondary_translated_text: Oh! Here she comes! A rare birth! Vim and Weaver's child!<page>Descendants of those who dared to escape. She found her way home... last<page>How thin her shells, silk and claws are... for you, Mom. Let me take everything from her for you!

original_en_text: A fine purchase you’ve made! Allow us a moment and we’ll get it set up in your bellhome.
original_zh_text: 好买卖！稍等就给你装点进钟居。
translated_text: 你买了多么漂亮的东西啊！请稍等片刻，我们将将其安装在您的行李箱中。
secondary_translated_text: What a beautiful thing you bought! Please wait a moment and we will install it in your luggage.

original_en_text: Ah! That relic you possess! A cylinder of the Citadel’s sacred vault! That there is a mighty find. You will give it, yes?<hpage>I will not, seeker. To extract what knowledge it holds, this cylinder requires a listening device, one you do not possess.<hpage>If it were passed, whatever secrets it contains would remain forever hidden from us both.<page>Pah... If it will not speak to me, I do not want it! Don’t trouble me until you have something worth my taking!
original_zh_text: 啊！你手里那东西！圣堡秘库的音筒！这可是大发现。交给我吧？<hpage>不行，要听取其中知识，需要特殊机械，而你没有。<hpage>现在交出来，是埋没了它。<page>嘁……哑巴筒子我也不稀罕！弄到真宝贝再来！
translated_text: 啊！你拥有的遗物！圆柱形城堡的神圣拱顶！有一个伟大的发现。你会给它的，不是吗？<hpage>我不会的，探索者。为了提取它所包含的知识，圆柱体需要一个听音设备，但你没有它。<hpage>如果它通过了，它包含的任何秘密都将永远对我们隐藏。<page>爸...如果它不和我说话，我就不想要它！在你有值得拿走的东西之前，不要打扰我！
secondary_translated_text: Ah! The relics you have! The sacred dome of the cylindrical castle! There was a great discovery. You'll give it, won't you?<hpage>I won't, seeker. In order to extract the knowledge it contains, the cylinder requires a listening device, but you don't have it.<hpage>If it passes, any secrets it contains will always be hidden from us.<page>Dad... If it doesn't talk to me, I don't want it! Don't bother me until you have something worth taking away!

original_en_text: <page=T>The deliverings, all broken-broke? Would you try-try again, miss courier? Pharloom’s bugs are so much in need of your help!
original_zh_text: <page=T>货全毁、毁了？要再试一次吗？大伙可全指、指望您啦！
translated_text: <page=T>交货，他们破产了吗？快递员小姐，你能再试一次吗？Pharloom的虫子非常需要您的帮助！
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Delivery, are they bankrupt? Miss courier, can you try again? Pharloom's bugs need your help very much!

original_en_text: Bonva, traveller! You have the oil! Will you allow me to work wonder upon your blade?
original_zh_text: 旅者！你真的带秘油来了！可以让我用在你的针刃上？
translated_text: 邦瓦，旅行者！你有油！你愿意让我在你的剑上创造奇迹吗？
secondary_translated_text: Bonwa, traveler! You have oil! Will you let me work a miracle on your sword?

original_en_text: Welcome, welcome, weary pilgrim! Though glorious Bellhart may be past its finest shine, it still remains the last friendly stop before the Citadel. <page>It is the task of I, fair Pavo, to extend the warmest of welcome to those passing devout, such as your good self!<page>Now! I insist you enjoy our remaining hospitality, if only for a moment. We’ve wares to buy and services to enjoy!<page>Even in our reduced state, you’ll find ours as cosy a stop as can be offered in these ailing lands.
original_zh_text: 欢迎欢迎，疲惫的朝圣者！钟心镇虽不复往昔，但仍是攀登圣堡前最后一处友善驿站。<page>我，帕沃，专为虔行旅者献上最热忱的欢迎——比如尊驾您！<page>希望您能好好感受圣途前最后的余温！这里有货可购，有乐可享！<page>即便衰微，钟心镇仍是这病土中最温馨的歇脚处！
translated_text: 欢迎，欢迎，疲惫的朝圣者！尽管辉煌的伯哈特可能已经过去了最辉煌的时期，但它仍然是城堡前的最后一站。<page>美丽的帕沃，我的任务是向像你这样去世的人的仁慈致敬！<page>现在！我坚持要求您享受我们其余的款待，即使只是片刻。我们有商品可买，有服务可享受！<page>即使在我们缩小的状态下，您也会发现我们可以在这些病态的土地上提供舒适的停靠站。
secondary_translated_text: Welcome, welcome, tired pilgrims! Although the glorious Burhart may have passed its most glorious period, it is still the last stop in front of the castle.<page>Beautiful Paavo, my task is to pay tribute to the kindness of people like you who have passed away!<page>Now! I insist that you enjoy the rest of our hospitality, even if only for a moment. We have goods to buy and services to enjoy!<page>Even in our reduced state, you will find that we can provide comfortable stops in these sick lands.

original_en_text: My sickly friend! I can sense that you are ailing. Has the black curse struck even your sturdy shell?<hpage>This illness stems from a different source, Pavo. A parasite has taken root inside me, one I can not remove through strength alone.<hpage>Tell me, are there any you know who might help me? A healer, or a physician?<page>A physician? Well... we did once have one... A frightening fiend! Callous and crude in her practice. For the health of glorious Bellhart we voted, unanimously, to expel her!<page>I know not where she buzzed away to, but the world beyond the bells is full of danger. If you must seek her service, I expect she would not have travelled far...
original_zh_text: 哎朋友，你脸色不太好啊！帕沃一眼就瞧出来了。难道连你那坚硬的外壳，也被黑色的诅咒侵蚀了吗？<hpage>不，帕沃，这病根源另有其处，我体内寄生着异物，靠蛮力根本无法将它驱除。<hpage>你知道有谁能帮我摆脱异物吗？养疗师，医师都行？<page>有认识的医师吗？嗯……的确有过一个……不过是个恶魔！她行事冷酷，手段粗野。为了钟心镇的安宁，我们众口一辞，驱逐了她！<page>她嗡地飞走了，不知道去了哪儿。但钟声之外的世界，危机四伏。若你执意寻她的医术，我想她应该走得不远……
translated_text: 我生病的朋友！我能感觉到你病了。黑色诅咒击中了你坚固的外壳吗？<hpage>这种疾病来自不同的来源，帕沃。寄生虫已经在我身上扎根，我无法独自消灭它。<hpage>告诉我，你认识谁可以帮助我吗？治疗师还是医生？<page>医生？好吧...我们曾经有过一个可怕的恶魔！她的行为无情而粗鲁。为了光荣的伯哈特的健康，我们一致投票驱逐她！<page>我不知道她嗡嗡作响地去了哪里，但钟声后面的世界充满了危险。如果你一定要寻求她的服务，我想她不会走得太远……
secondary_translated_text: My sick friend! I can feel you're sick. Did the black curse hit your solid shell?<hpage>This disease comes from a different source, Paavo. The parasite has taken root in me, and I cannot eliminate it alone.<hpage>Tell me, do you know anyone who can help me? Therapist or doctor?<page>Doctor? Okay... We once had a terrible demon! Her behavior was ruthless and rude. For the health of glorious Burhart, we unanimously voted to expel her!<page>I don't know where she buzzed off, but the world behind the bells is full of danger. If you must seek her services, I don't think she will go too far...

original_en_text: Welly, nay? Certainly you make the safer choice. Better to keep one’s shell intact.
original_zh_text: 哎呀呀！保命要紧，理解理解。
translated_text: 威利，不？当然，你会做出更安全的选择。最好保持外壳完好无损。
secondary_translated_text: Willie, no? Of course, you will make safer choices. It is best to keep the shell intact.

original_en_text: <page=T>Supplies for the rest-stop in the fields. We is used to like this delivering, when we was young and muchly brave.
original_zh_text: <page=T>远野驿站的补给，我们年轻时也经常送这里的货。
translated_text: <page=T>田野休息的用品。当我们年轻勇敢的时候，我们已经习惯了这种送货方式。
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Supplies for field rest. When we were young and brave, we were accustomed to this delivery method.

original_en_text: This town feel safe, just, but I’m is worries for others. Is Pharloom needing its good-goods?<page>Many bugs helped by us couriers, me and brother Pill. Special now when danger grows big-big.
original_zh_text: 镇子暂时安全，但我担心别处，其他虫不需要货、货物吗？<page>我们送货虫兄弟俩，我和皮尔，可帮过不少虫。尤其现在世道这么凶、凶险。
translated_text: 这个小镇感觉很安全，但我担心其他小镇。法鲁需要它的好货吗？<page>我们的快递员皮尔兄弟和我帮助了很多虫子。现在，当危险变得越来越大时，这是特别的。
secondary_translated_text: This town feels safe, but I worry about other towns. Does Faro need its good goods?<page>Our couriers Brother Peel and I helped a lot of bugs. Now, when the danger becomes greater and greater, this is special.

original_en_text: I saw it! Took my wish off the board, you did! Heading out after my stray courier, then?<hpage>My own tasks see me travel far, shopkeeper. If, on my journey, I happen upon the errant bug, I’ll make sure to send them your way.<page>Then you’ll have my thanks and more! It’s a rare bug who’d brave the wilds to aid a fellow.
original_zh_text: 我看见了！你接了我的祈愿？要去找我那跑丢的送货虫？<hpage>我本就需要远行，店主。要是在路上遇见那迷途虫，我会让他来寻你。<page>那可多谢了！如今肯为同类闯进荒野的虫可太难找了！
translated_text: 我看到了！把我的愿望从黑板上拿走了，你做到了！所以，我们要去找我的流浪信使吗？<hpage>店主，我自己的任务让我走了很远。如果我在旅途中偶然发现了这个丢失的错误，我一定会把它们发送给您。<page>那我更加感谢你。勇敢地去荒野帮助一个人，这是一个罕见的错误。
secondary_translated_text: I saw it! Took my wish off the blackboard, and you did it! So, are we going to find my wandering messenger?<hpage>Shop owner, my own task has taken me a long way. If I stumble across this missing error while traveling, I will definitely send them to you.<page>Then I thank you even more. It is a rare mistake to bravely go into the wilderness to help someone.

original_en_text: For a spool bearing no Silk, it’s surprisingly heavy. Do you think perhaps it could be a gift left behind by the old creeping ones?
original_zh_text: 虽是空的灵丝轴，但却挺沉。莫非是古织者留下的？
translated_text: 对于没有丝绸的卷轴来说，它的重量惊人。你认为这可能是老爬虫留下的礼物吗？
secondary_translated_text: For a scroll without silk, its weight is staggering. Do you think this might be a gift left by the old reptile?

original_en_text: If you really must find that wretched physician, speak to the old hermit lurking beneath Bellhart. He knows much more than he admits of the world...
original_zh_text: 如果您执意要寻找那庸医，可以问问镇子下方的老隐士。他肚子里藏的秘密可不少……
translated_text: 如果你真的要找那个可怜的医生，那就去找那个躲在伯哈特下面的老隐士。他对这个世界的了解比他承认的要多得多..
secondary_translated_text: If you really want to go to the poor doctor, go to the old hermit hiding under Burhart. He knows much more about the world than he admits..

original_en_text: Welly, done! What miracle to work again upon steel so fine. Few pins left in Pharloom could attain such a sheen!<page>You must tell me, traveller, wherever did you come upon so splendid a weapon?<hpage>The blade was a gift, given by a noble tribe of my homeland. They forged the strongest steel, though it was rarely seen beyond their hive.<hpage>That tribe has now long passed, and with them the secrets to their craft.<page>Ahhh. If they are gone, it’s a rarer piece than would be guessed! But what grand luck for this humble pinmaster to have worked with such a weapon!
original_zh_text: 哎呀呀！成啦！圣油配上如此精钢，真是奇迹。纺络还剩几根针能有此锋芒！<page>旅者，我得问问你，哪里得来如此神兵？<hpage>故土一贵族部落所赠，其族以锻钢之术闻名，但成品鲜少外流。<hpage>该族早已灭绝，其锻造秘技随之消逝。<page>唉呀！竟然还是件孤品！我这卑微针匠能照料此针，也是三生有幸！
translated_text: 威利，搞定了！能再用这么好的钢工作真是个奇迹。在法鲁剩下的几个引脚可以实现这样的光泽！<page>旅行者，你一定要告诉我，你在哪里找到这么漂亮的武器？<hpage>这把刀是我祖国一个贵族部落送给我的礼物。他们锻造了最坚固的钢铁，尽管在蜂巢之外很少见到这种钢铁。<hpage>那个部落早已不复存在，他们手艺的秘密也消失了。<page>啊如果它们消失了，这将是一部比想象中更稀有的作品！但这位卑微的铁匠真是幸运，能够使用这样的武器！
secondary_translated_text: Willie, it's done! It's a miracle to be able to work with such good steel again. The few remaining pins in Faro can achieve such luster!<page>Traveler, you must tell me, where did you find such a beautiful weapon?<hpage>This knife was a gift from an aristocratic tribe in my motherland. They forged the strongest steel, although it was rarely seen outside beehives.<hpage>The tribe long ceased to exist, and the secrets of their craft were gone.<page>Ah if they disappear, this will be a rarer work than imagined! But this humble blacksmith was really lucky to be able to use such a weapon!

original_en_text: <page=T>Good-goods for the pilgrims up high! Thems brave ones, settled up on that big-big Citadel.<page=S>These deliverings they will muchly need, miss courier. Carry them safe-safe, for us!
original_zh_text: <page=T>给高处朝圣者的货！敢待在圣、圣堡，都是勇士。<page=S>都是要紧物资，救星小姐务必平、平安送到！
translated_text: <page=T>朝圣者的好东西高高举起！他们是勇敢的人，定居在那座巨大的城堡里。<page=S>快递员小姐，他们非常需要这些东西。替我们把它们安全地带走！
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Pilgrim's goodies held high! They were brave people and settled in that huge castle.<page=S>Miss couriers, they need these things very much. Get them safe for us!

original_en_text: Bzz-zzt! You hesitate! But your fear of my Extricator is born from mere ignorance, and you can overcome it with effort. Take a moment. Reconsider!
original_zh_text: 滋——滋！犹豫什么！怕剥离机是你无知！给你点时间，再想想！
translated_text: 嗡嗡声！你犹豫了！但你对我的解放者的恐惧纯粹源于无知，你可以通过努力克服它。花一些时间。再想一想！
secondary_translated_text: Buzz! You hesitated! But your fear of my liberator stems purely from ignorance, and you can overcome it through hard work. Take some time. Think again!

original_en_text: The great Yarnaby can rid you of those nasty “roots”, but to crack your stiff shell my mighty Extricator needs an upgrade!
original_zh_text: 本神医能治你体内的“根须”。但要撬开壳，得先升级剥离机！
translated_text: 伟大的Yarnaby可以摆脱你讨厌的“根源”，但要破解你坚硬的外壳，我强大的解放者需要升级！
secondary_translated_text: The great Yarnaby can get rid of your annoying "roots", but to crack your hard shell, my powerful liberator needs to upgrade!

original_en_text: Hello again! Fancy buying something special before your tasks whisk you away?
original_zh_text: 又来啦！出远门前不挑点特别的？
translated_text: 我们又见面了！想在任务带你离开之前购买一些特别的东西吗？
secondary_translated_text: We meet again! Want to buy something special before the mission takes you away?

original_en_text: <hpage>Couriers, I require a rasher of meat, for an old bug in the Citadel. Can you prepare it for me?<page=T>A bug up-up? Theys knows our finest food? If theys appreciate, we can prepare it most prompt! Miss courier has only to ask.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我需要熏肉送给圣堡老虫，能帮忙准备吗？<page=T>上头有虫识货？随时都能准备！救星小姐知会一声就行。
translated_text: <hpage>使者们，我需要一堆肉来对付城堡里的一只老虫子。你能为我做好准备吗？<page=T>升级错误？他们知道我们最好的食物吗？如果他们喜欢，我们可以尽快准备！快递员小姐只需询问即可。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Messengers, I need a pile of meat to deal with an old bug in the castle. Can you prepare for me?<page=T>Upgrade error? Do they know our best food? If they like it, we can prepare it as soon as possible! Miss courier only needs to ask.

original_en_text: A sturdy desk is the heart of any bellhome! Use it to take stock of your situation or organise your artefacts.
original_zh_text: 一张结实桌子可是钟居的核心！理货记账必备。
translated_text: 坚固的办公桌是任何贝尔家居的核心！使用它来评估您的情况或整理您的物品。
secondary_translated_text: A sturdy desk is the core of any Bell home! Use it to assess your situation or organize your belongings.

original_en_text: These roots that torment you so... I’m not altogether familiar with them, but it matters not!<page>If there’s something inside a body that must come out, we use great Yarnaby’s Extricator! It’s your only hope, bzzt!
original_zh_text: 折磨你的“根须”……虽然不常见，但无所谓！<page>只要是壳里有脏东西，就用本神医的剥离机！这是你的唯一希望，滋滋！
translated_text: 这些根折磨着你。我对他们不是完全熟悉，但没关系！<page>如果体内有东西必须取出，我们使用伟大的Yarnaby ' s Extricator！这是你唯一的希望，嘘！
secondary_translated_text: These roots torture you. I'm not entirely familiar with them, but that's okay!<page>If something must be removed from your body, we use the great Yarnaby's Extricator! This is your only hope, shh!

original_en_text: You’d ask my aid, but won’t assist yourself? Then leave! Remain suffering, and stop being a bother to me, bzzt!
original_zh_text: 想求医却不帮忙？滚！继续遭罪去吧，别来烦我，滋滋！
translated_text: 你会向我寻求帮助却不愿帮助自己？然后离开！继续受苦吧，别再打扰我了，呸！
secondary_translated_text: You would ask me for help but not help yourself? Then leave! Keep suffering and stop disturbing me, pooh!

original_en_text: Fellow resident! The world quakes and crumbles, but while my shell stays safe, my shop stays open.
original_zh_text: 好邻居！世道混乱，但只要我这壳不碎，铺子照开！
translated_text: 同胞们！世界震动了，崩溃了，但虽然我的壳仍然安全，但我的商店仍然营业。
secondary_translated_text: My fellow citizens! The world shook and collapsed, but while my shell was still safe, my store was still open.

original_en_text: Welly, nay? You hold the precious oil for yourself? For what purpose do you deny a pinmaster their work? There is only I alive to work with such a wondrous substance!
original_zh_text: 哎呀呀！你怎么私藏圣油？不让针匠干活？整个纺络只剩我能用此圣物！
translated_text: 威利，不？你为自己储备珍贵的石油吗？您出于什么目的拒绝音乐大师的工作？只有我还活着，我才能与如此美妙的物质一起工作！
secondary_translated_text: Willie, no? Do you reserve precious oil for yourself? For what purpose do you refuse the job of a music master? Only if I am alive can I work with such wonderful substances!

original_en_text: Find that wretched physician fast, dear resident! I know not where she buzzed away to, but the world beyond the bells is full of danger.<page>If you must seek her service, I expect she would not have travelled far...
original_zh_text: 老乡啊，要找她得赶快了！她嗡地飞走了，不知道去了哪儿。但钟声之外的世界，危机四伏。<page>若你执意寻她的医术，我想她应该走得不远……
translated_text: 亲爱的居民，快点找到那个可怜的医生！我不知道她嗡嗡作响地去了哪里，但钟声后面的世界充满了危险。<page>如果你一定要寻求她的服务，我想她不会走得太远……
secondary_translated_text: Dear resident, hurry up and find that poor doctor! I don't know where she buzzed off, but the world behind the bells is full of danger.<page>If you must seek her services, I don't think she will go too far...

original_en_text: What? What now? What’s all that great racket, what is it?<hpage>Greetings, ma’am. It is only I. If you are disturbed by the rending of these lands, I fear some blame is mine to bear.<page>Blame, is it? Pah. Those who come after us can apportion blame as they see fit.<page>For now, my collection is the only thing that matters! I must protect it!
original_zh_text: 干嘛呢？这么闹腾？叮叮咣咣的搞什么？<hpage>女士，是我。抱歉打扰到了您。<page>跟我有什么好说抱歉的，你在外头做的事自有后虫评判。<page>眼下我的珍藏最要紧！得保护好了！
translated_text: 什么？我们现在该怎么办？这么大的噪音是什么，是什么？<hpage>你好，女士。只有我一个人。如果你对这片土地的分裂感到不安，恐怕我也要承担一些责任。<page>怪吧？呸。那些追随我们的人可以在他们认为合适的情况下分担责任。<page>目前，我的收藏是唯一重要的！我必须保护它！
secondary_translated_text: What? What should we do now? What is this loud noise? What is it?<hpage>Hello, ma 'am. I was alone. If you are uneasy about the division of this land, I am afraid I also have to bear some responsibility.<page>Weird, right? Bah. Those who follow us can share responsibility as they see fit.<page>Currently, my collection is the only important thing! I must protect it!

original_en_text: <page=S>A delivery deadly, dangerous, fiercably cold, for old bug up there that does need it much-much! Serves us all he does, so we serve back.<page=T>And great test for you, miss courier! Most challenging-challenge this. The lacquer to bring is sloshy-slosh. A hard carry even for the best.<hpage>I have met this maker. His is a long service, worthy of respect. I will be glad to aid his efforts.
original_zh_text: <page=S>急单！但危险！把液状漆送给山上的老工匠。他造福大伙，我们得回报。<page=T>救星小姐，这可是巨、巨大挑战！液状漆晃荡难带，专业送货虫都犯、犯难。<hpage>我敬重这位匠师，乐意相助。
translated_text: <page=S>对于那些真正迫切需要它的老虫子来说，这是一次致命的、危险的、冰冷的交付！他所做的一切都为我们服务，所以我们会反击。<page=T>这对你来说是一个很好的考验，快递小姐！最具挑战性的挑战就是这个。你需要涂的油漆很马虎。即使是最好的也是一个艰难的过程。<hpage>我以前见过这个制造者。他的奉献是长期的，值得尊敬。我很乐意帮助他的努力。
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>For those old bugs who really need it urgently, this is a fatal, dangerous, and ice-cold delivery! Everything he does serves us, so we will fight back.<page=T>This is a good test for you, Miss Delivery! The most challenging challenge is this. The paint you need to apply is sloppy. Even the best is a difficult process.<hpage>I've seen this maker before. His dedication is long-term and worthy of respect. I would love to help him in his efforts.

original_en_text: <page=S>Deliverings for the waystation in the fields at Pharloom’s edge, a small rest-stop, still serving.<page=S>This journey is maybe not so very hard for you, miss courier? We think you is perfect for this wish!
original_zh_text: <page=S>给远野驿站的货，那小站还在营业。<page=S>对您不算难吧？您是最合适的人选！
translated_text: <page=S>预订法勒姆边缘田地里的中转站，这是一个仍在使用的小型休息站。<page=S>快递员小姐，这段旅程对您来说可能不难吧？我们认为您非常适合这个愿望！
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>Book a transfer station in the fields on the edge of Farham, a small rest station still in use.<page=S>Miss courier, this journey may not be difficult for you, right? We think you are perfect for this wish!

original_en_text: Welcome, welcome, travellers all! Rest your weary shell and revive your flagging spirit!<page>Bellhart! Glorious, gleaming, and very very safe! Stay a while before you begin your final climb!
original_zh_text: 欢迎诸位旅者！请尽情舒展甲壳，养好精神！<page>这里是钟心镇！辉煌、璀璨，更重要的是十分安全！启程前不妨多留一会！
translated_text: 欢迎，欢迎，所有乘客！让疲惫的身体休息一下，让无精打采的精神焕然一新！<page>伯哈特！光荣、闪亮、非常非常安全！在开始最后一次攀登之前停下来！
secondary_translated_text: Welcome, welcome, all passengers! Let your tired body rest and let your listless spirit take a new look!<page>Burhart! Glorious, shiny, very, very safe! Stop before embarking on the last climb!

original_en_text: Go and rest! Bzzt! Free yourself of your trifling ailment and leave me in peace! The great Yarnaby has no time for petty maladies!<hpage>Very well, madam. I did not mean to waste your time.
original_zh_text: 歇着去！滋滋！小病自己治，别烦我！本神医不接轻症！<hpage>好吧，女士。无意浪费您的时间。
translated_text: 休息一下！嗡嗡声！把自己从琐碎的疾病中解放出来，让我安息吧！伟大的Yanabi没有时间处理琐碎的疾病！<hpage>好的，夫人。我不想浪费你的时间。
secondary_translated_text: Take a break! Buzz! Free yourself from trivial diseases and let me rest in peace! The great Yanabi has no time to deal with trivial diseases!<hpage>Yes, ma 'am. I don't want to waste your time.

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, shopkeeper. It seems you’ve recovered well from that silken affliction.<page>Ah! Well, I’m a clever bug. When that strange thread struck down from above, I shut up tight and huddled in my bellhome.<page>Might’ve been a problem for the others about here, but my store was flush with supplies, so no fear I’d go hungry.<hpage>Your preparedness served you well then, and it seems your store is still well-stocked.<page>Oh yes, even my supplier is back to work, so I have plenty of goods to show you!
original_zh_text: <hpage>日安，店主。看来你已从丝咒中恢复。<page>啊哈！我机灵着呢。那怪丝掉下来的时候，我立马缩进钟居紧闭门户。<page>其他虫或许遭了殃，但我存货充足，饿不着。<hpage>未雨绸缪是好事。而且……你这铺子货还挺全。<page>可不！连送货虫都平安回来了，新到的好货随你挑！
translated_text: <hpage>你好，店主。看来你已经从那丝般的疼痛中恢复得很好了。<page>啊！我是只聪明的虫子。当奇怪的线从上面掉下来的时候，我紧紧地闭上了嘴，蜷缩在我的钟屋里。<page>这对这里的其他人来说可能是一个问题，但我的商店库存充足，所以我不必担心挨饿。<hpage>您的准备工作对您帮助很大，看起来您的商店仍然库存充足。<page>哦，是的，就连我的供应商也复工了，所以我有很多商品要给你看！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Hello, owner. It seems that you have recovered well from the silky pain.<page>Ah! I'm a smart bug. When the strange thread fell from above, I shut my mouth tightly and curled up in my clock house.<page>This may be a problem for others here, but my store is well stocked, so I don't have to worry about starving.<hpage>Your preparations have helped you a lot, and it looks like your store is still well stocked.<page>Oh, yeah, even my supplier is back to work, so I have a lot of merchandise to show you!

original_en_text: Welly now! You have the oil, traveller! Allow me to bring about a shine bright as none before!
original_zh_text: 哎呀！你拿到油了，旅者！该让这柄针刃成为绝顶神兵了！
translated_text: 威利，现在！你有石油，旅行者！请允许我带来前所未有的光明！
secondary_translated_text: Willie, now! You have oil, traveler! Please allow me to bring unprecedented light!

original_en_text: But, hold! There is something more about you... I’ve sliced the shells of countless filthy pilgrims! All those plain, greying innards! Yours are something else entirely!<page>It tickles at my mind, still! Bzzt! What is it of your shell that eludes even my perfect, precise perception?<page>Would you show me, specimen? Go on! Let the great Yarnaby peer at your deeper, darker secrets!<hpage>I’ve no desire to see my shell pried into further, healer. Your service has succeeded, and taken its toll in pain. I hope only that I never again need to seek your aid.
original_zh_text: 慢着！你壳里还有料……本神医剖过无数病壳！全是灰扑扑的！你的截然不同！<page>滋滋！到底是什么连本神医都看不透？<page>让我瞧瞧，病患！快！让本神医看看你藏着什么黑暗秘密！<hpage>我不想再被剖壳，医师。治疗虽然成功，但代价着实巨大。希望我们永远不用再见。
translated_text: 但坚持住！你还有更多。我已经切开了无数肮脏朝圣者的壳！所有那些普通的灰色内脏！你的完全是另一回事！<page>仍然让我心痒难耐！嗡嗡声！你的壳里有什么东西甚至无法完美准确地感知？<page>你能给我看看吗，标本？继续！让伟大的Yanabi窥视你更深、更黑暗的秘密！<hpage>我不想看到我的壳被进一步撬开，治疗师。您的服务是成功的，并付出了痛苦的代价。我只是希望我再也不用请求你的帮助了。
secondary_translated_text: But hold on! You have more. I have cut open the shells of countless filthy pilgrims! All those ordinary gray innards! Yours is something else entirely!<page>It still makes me itch! Buzz! What is in your shell that you can't even perceive perfectly and accurately?<page>Can you show me, specimen? Continue! Let the great Yanabi peek into your deeper and darker secrets!<hpage>I don't want to see my shell pried open further, therapist. Your service was successful and paid a painful price. I just hope I never have to ask for your help again.

original_en_text: If ever upon your long road more oil is acquired, seek my service with haste! Who knows what form we could find deeper within your blade’s sharpened steel!
original_zh_text: 要是再得到秘油，就来找我！谁知这针还能磨砺出何等锋芒！
translated_text: 如果您在漫长的道路上获得更多石油，请尽快向我寻求服务！谁知道我们能在你锋利的刀刃深处找到什么形式！
secondary_translated_text: If you are getting more oil on the long road, please ask for my services as soon as possible! Who knows what form we can find deep in your sharp blade!

original_en_text: Gahh! Who keeps making all that racket out there?! Such horrid shaking and screaming. The crucial work is being spoiled! Bzzzt!
original_zh_text: 哼！外面谁在吵吵？！震动和尖叫没完没了的！我的研究正值关键时刻呢！滋滋！
translated_text: 啊！谁一直在外面大惊小怪？！如此可怕的震动和尖叫声。关键工作已被破坏！嗡嗡声！
secondary_translated_text: Ah! Who has been making a fuss out there?! Such terrible vibrations and screams. Critical work has been destroyed! Buzz!

original_en_text: The operation... a success! The simpletons hiding in that blasted bellvein would shudder into dust if they saw how much I achieve without them!<hpage>Madam... I shan’t lie, that was an ordeal such as I have rarely suffered...<hpage>And yet, the parasite does seem to have been... unbound somewhat. Whatever remnant still lingers in my shell feels calmed, enough for me to claim its power as my own.<hpage>Perhaps this is a fortunate result after all.<page>Of course. Of course! Great Yarnaby has healed you! Shout it through the caverns. Scream it from the great spinning towers!<page>Just make sure they hear you in the so-called ‘civilised’ settlements of this ignorant land!
original_zh_text: 手术……成功！钟脉那帮庸才见这场面得吓成渣！<hpage>女士……不瞒您说，这真是毕生难忘的体验……<hpage>但寄生物似乎……松开了。残存部分很平静，反而能为我所用。<hpage>或许能算因祸得福了。<page>当然！本神医治好了你！快去各大洞穴传颂，去纺塔顶上喊出来！<page>让那些自诩“文明”的无知村镇都听听！
translated_text: 手术成功了！如果躲在那该死的时钟静脉里的傻瓜看到我在没有他们的情况下取得了如此大的成就，他们会颤抖并化为灰尘！<hpage>夫人...我不能撒谎。这是我很少经历的磨难。<hpage>但寄生虫似乎有.有些不受约束。无论我的壳里还残留着什么残余，我都感到足够冷静，声称它的力量是我自己的。<hpage>也许这是一个幸运的结果，毕竟。<page>当然！当然！伟大的Yanabi治愈了你！穿过洞穴大喊。从伟大的旋转塔尖叫！<page>只要确保他们听到你在所谓的“文明”定居点在这个无知的土地！
secondary_translated_text: The operation was a success! If the fools hiding in the veins of that damn clock saw that I had achieved so much without them, they would tremble and turn to dust!<hpage>Madam... I can't lie. This is an ordeal I have rarely experienced.<hpage>But the parasite seems to have. Some are not bound. No matter what remains in my shell, I feel calm enough to claim its power is my own.<hpage>Maybe it was a lucky result, after all.<page>Of course! Of course! The great Yanabi healed you! Yelling through the cave. Scream from the great rotating tower!<page>Just make sure they hear you in so-called "civilized" settlements in this land of ignorance!

original_en_text: A mighty collection of the past, is it not? If only I could hoard all of history here with me!
original_zh_text: 这等珍藏，够气派吧？我恨不得把全纺络的历史都囤在这儿！
translated_text: 这是过去的丰富收藏，不是吗？如果我能把我所有的历史都藏在这里就好了！
secondary_translated_text: This is a rich collection from the past, isn't it? If only I could hide all my history here!

original_en_text: Fellow resident, welcome home! The world may quake and crumble, and threaten its end, but while my shell stays safe my shop stays open.
original_zh_text: 欢迎回来，好邻居！世道混乱，但只要我这壳不碎，铺子照开！
translated_text: 居民们，欢迎回家！世界可能会发生地震，崩溃，并威胁到它的结束，但只要我的壳仍然安全，我的商店将继续开放。
secondary_translated_text: Residents, welcome home! The world could earthquake, collapse and threaten its end, but as long as my shell remains safe, my store will remain open.

original_en_text: Yes... yes! Bzzt! Finally, a specimen worthy of my mighty Extricator! My beautiful, unfairly-maligned Extricator! Come this way, bzzt...
original_zh_text: 对……对！滋滋！终于有配得上我伟大的剥离机的病例！来这边，滋滋……
translated_text: 是的...是的！嗡嗡声！终于，一个值得我强大的解放者的标本了！我美丽的、受到不公平诽谤的提取者！这边，嗡嗡声……
secondary_translated_text: Yes... Yes! Buzz! Finally, a specimen worthy of my powerful liberator! My beautiful, unfairly maligned extractor! Over here, the buzzing sound...

original_en_text: By claw! Who is this bold warrior, standing so calm and cool on entrance to Plinney’s bellhome!<hpage>Merely a traveller, sir, though one whose blade could benefit from your service.<page>Your blade! Of course, fierce warrior! Any fine pinmaster would detect the sign of deadly work upon that needle’s edge.<page>If your weapon sharpened would see our lands that much safer, then honour decrees it receives my care this very moment! What’s say I take a look?<hpage>
original_zh_text: 利爪啊！这位踏进普林尼的华美钟居还面不改色的勇士是谁！<hpage>过路客而已，不过针刃需要照料。<page>您的针刃！好说好说！是个针匠都看得出这针尖沾过多少条命。<page>如果磨利此针能保护镇子，自然应该优先照料！这就开始？
translated_text: 用你的爪子！这位勇敢的士兵是谁，如此平静地站在普林尼钟楼入口处！<hpage>先生，我只是一个旅行者，虽然他的剑可能会受益于你的服务。<page>你的刀！当然，凶猛的战士！任何一个好的制针工人都能在针的边缘发现致命的痕迹。<page>如果你们武器的锋利性能让我们的土地变得更安全，那么荣誉注定要由我来照顾！我看看怎么样？<hpage>
secondary_translated_text: Use your claws! Who was this brave soldier, standing so calmly at the entrance of Pliny's Bell Tower!<hpage>Sir, I am just a traveler, although his sword may benefit from your services.<page>Your knife! Of course, fierce warrior! Any good needle-maker can find fatal marks on the edge of a needle.<page>If the sharpness of your weapons makes our land safer, then honor is destined to be taken care of by me! How about I see?<hpage>

original_en_text: Come back with those spines, or not at all! The great Yarnaby’s time is precious, bzzt! I will not be distracted from my work!
original_zh_text: 带棘刺来再敲门！本神医时间金贵，滋滋！没空分心！
translated_text: 把那些荆棘带回来，否则就没有了！伟大的雅纳比的时间是宝贵的，嘘！我不会分心工作！
secondary_translated_text: Bring back those thorns, or there will be no more! The great Yanabi's time is precious, shh! I will not be distracted from work!

original_en_text: Ahh... how welly romantic t’would’ve been, had the lost pilgrims struck me down beside her grave, to lie together forever as the world crumbles all ‘round...<page>But fortune has claimed otherwise! And perhaps ‘tis best for this humble pinmaster to continue his trade a little longer. These uncertain times will bring much new work, I should think!
original_zh_text: 啊……要是迷途朝圣者把我和她一块埋了，在崩塌世界里相拥长眠……该多浪漫……<page>但看来我命不该绝！或许纺络就是要我这卑微针匠多干几年。在这乱世，新活计可多着呢！
translated_text: 啊...如果这位迷失的朝圣者把我推到她的坟墓旁边，在世界崩溃的时候永远躺在一起，那该是多么浪漫啊……<page>但命运还有另一种解释！也许这位不起眼的琴师最好再继续做一段时间。我认为这些不确定的时期会带来很多新的就业机会！
secondary_translated_text: Ah... How romantic it would be if this lost pilgrim pushed me next to her grave and lay together forever when the world fell apart...<page>But there is another explanation for fate! Perhaps it would be best for this humble zither player to continue working for a while longer. I think these uncertain times will bring many new jobs!

original_en_text: What’s this... twitching inside of you? A slave within a slave! Given over your shell to grow something greater?<hpage>A parasite has made its home within me. It saps my energy, and I can not purge it with strength alone...<page>Grnk. Lie down and die then, for all I care. Allow that wriggling thing its chance at life.<page>Or else... hff. Go seek the one exiled from Bellhart, little Yarnaby. She was chased out, high up into the moors, last I heard.
original_zh_text: 你壳里……有东西在扭？奴隶套奴隶！养着个更大的玩意？<hpage>寄生体在我壳里扎了根，单凭气力无法驱散它……<page>哼。那就躺平等死，让那玩意替你活。<page>或者……嗤。去找被镇子放逐的雅纳碧，听说她被赶到灰沼了。
translated_text: 这是什么？你内心在抽搐吗？奴隶中的奴隶！放弃你的壳去种植更伟大的东西？<hpage>寄生虫已经定居在我体内。它消耗我的能量，我仅靠力量无法清除它……<page>Grnk。然后躺下死去，我不在乎。给那个蠕动的东西一个活下去的机会。<page>否则...呼呼。去寻找那些被伯哈特流放的人，尤纳比。据我所知，她被赶出了荒野。
secondary_translated_text: What is this? Are you twitching inside? Slave among slaves! Give up your shell to grow something greater?<hpage>The parasite has settled in me. It consumes my energy, and I cannot clear it with my strength alone...<page>Grnk。Then lie down and die, I don't care. Give that squirming thing a chance to live.<page>Otherwise... Whoosh. To find those exiled by Burhart, Unabi. As far as I know, she was driven out of the wilderness.

original_en_text: More, then! Bring me more relics of the past! Records, seals, idols! Let’s gather up the history of the world and hoard it all here, nice and safe!<hpage>If I happen upon more curiosities of this kingdom’s past, I may visit again. Until that time, keep yourself safe.
original_zh_text: 继续！多找点老物件！典籍、印玺、神像！把全纺络的过往都放在这儿才安稳！<hpage>若找到这王国的遗物，我会再来。在此之前，请多保重。
translated_text: 然后更多！再给我一些过去的遗物！记录、封印、偶像！让我们收集世界的历史并将其全部存储在这里，又好又安全！<hpage>如果我碰巧发现对这个王国的过去有更多的好奇心，我可能会再次访问。在此之前，请确保您的安全。
secondary_translated_text: Then more! Give me some more relics from the past! Record, seal, idol! Let's collect the history of the world and store it all here, nice and safe!<hpage>If I happen to find more curiosity about the kingdom's past, I might visit again. Until then, please ensure your safety.

original_en_text: <page=T>More for you, miss courier! Lacquer, filled fresh, for the maker on the mount. We have much, so don’t worry for our supply. <page=S>To climb the frozen peak, it is a journey most difficult! Our thanks go full with you that tries again!
original_zh_text: <page=T>拿好，救星小姐！满满漆水送给山上匠师。货物管够！尽管送！<page=S>攀爬冰峰危险得很！多谢您原意冒险！
translated_text: <page=T>更多给你，快递小姐！油漆，新鲜填充，已准备好供山上的制造者使用。我们有很多，所以不用担心我们的供应。<page=S>攀登冰冻的山是最困难的旅程！我们对您的再次尝试表示衷心的感谢！
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>More for you, delivery lady! Paint, freshly filled, is ready for use by manufacturers on the mountain. We have a lot, so don't worry about our supplies.<page=S>Climbing frozen mountains is the most difficult journey! We would like to express our heartfelt thanks to you for trying again!

original_en_text: <page=T>More meats for you, miss courier! Best you be delivering it swiftly quick! If left not stored, our rasher’s flavour fast turns foul.
original_zh_text: <page=T>熏肉准备好啦！救星小姐快快出发！放久了会变味！
translated_text: <page=T>快递女士，更多肉给你！尽快送达最好！如果我们不储存它，我们的rusher的味道很快就会变坏。
secondary_translated_text: <page=T>Express lady, more meat for you! It is best to deliver it as soon as possible! If we don't store it, the taste of our rushers will quickly go bad.

original_en_text: Shoo I say! Unless you’ve brought a worthy specimen, with something truly nasty inside them, bzzt! Otherwise, leave the great Yarnaby in peace!
original_zh_text: 说了走开！除非带够劲的病患来，壳里长真家伙的！不然别烦本神医！
translated_text: 我说嘘！除非你带来一个有价值的标本，里面有一些真正烦人的东西，呸！否则，就让伟大的亚纳比安息吧！
secondary_translated_text: I said shh! Unless you bring a valuable specimen with something really annoying in it, bah! Otherwise, let the great Yanabi rest in peace!

original_en_text: Miss saving! Thanks again for you and your big-big blade! I’m is made it back, and grumpy grub-grub got her goods. She seemed happy, even!<page>I’m won’t be travelling out for a while-while methinks. Too many beasties! All about theys are. Even those pilgrims! All now going angry, a bit like old grub-grub.<hpage>This town remains safe for the moment, Tipp. You’re a smart bug to stay within its walls.
original_zh_text: 救星小姐！多亏了您，还有那柄长、长刀！我安全回来了，暴躁虫、虫婆婆也收到货啦！她可高兴呢！<page>我暂、暂时不出远门啦。外面全是发狂的野兽！连朝圣者都变凶了，跟虫婆婆一个德行。<hpage>眼下镇上还算安全，待在这里是明智选择。
translated_text: 我想念储蓄！再次感谢你和你的大刀！我回来后，脾气暴躁的grub-grub拿走了她的东西。她甚至看起来很高兴！<page>我想我暂时不会去旅行了。野兽太多了！关于他们的一切都是。甚至是朝圣者！现在大家都在生气，有点像旧物。<hpage>提普，这个小镇还是安全的你是一只聪明的虫子，呆在它的墙里。
secondary_translated_text: I miss saving! Thanks again to you and your big sword! When I came back, the grumpy grub-grub took her things. She even seemed happy!<page>I don't think I'll be traveling for a while. There are too many beasts! Everything about them is. Even pilgrims! Everyone is angry now, a bit like an old thing.<hpage>Tip, this town is still safe You're a smart bug, stay in its walls.

original_en_text: You’ve a good, solid bell up there, though its surface is showing its age. Why not have us paint it fresh? A protective coat and a little flair!
original_zh_text: 你的钟屋结实但显旧。刷层护漆加点花纹如何？
translated_text: 那里有一个很好的，坚固的时钟，尽管它的表面显示了它的年龄。为什么不让我们把它涂成新鲜的呢？一件防护外套和一点天赋！
secondary_translated_text: There is a nice, sturdy clock there, even though its surface shows its age. Why not let us paint it fresh? A protective coat and a little talent!

original_en_text: <hpage>You seem hard at work, good bug. Are you a hunter, of a sort?<page>Of a simple sort, aye. I’m a pondcatcher around these parts. The last remaining, in fact! <page>Us few Bellharters are badly needing for fresh food, so my lone shell’s carrying quite the responsibility.<page>At least Shellwood Pond’s still full of good meat, ‘specially if your aim with a longpin’s as good as mine.
original_zh_text: <hpage>你似乎很忙，也是个猎手？<page>勉强算吧，我是个渔夫。全镇最后一个渔夫！<page>钟心镇的虫个个饥肠辘辘，担子全压我的壳上。<page>好在甲木林池塘鱼肥，像我这样擅使长针的总能带点收获回来。
translated_text: <hpage>你看起来很努力，好虫子。你是某种猎人吗？<page>这很简单，是的。我是这些地区的池塘捕手。事实上，最后一个！<page>我们为数不多的贝尔哈特人迫切需要新鲜食物，所以我孤独的躯壳承担着相当大的责任。<page>至少谢尔伍德池塘里有很多好肉，尤其是如果你的长针和我的一样准确的话。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>You seem to be working hard, good bug. Are you some kind of hunter?<page>It's simple, yes. I am the pond catcher in these areas. In fact, the last one!<page>Our few Belharts are in desperate need of fresh food, so my lonely shell carries considerable responsibility.<page>At least there is a lot of good meat in Shelwood Pond, especially if your long needle is as accurate as mine.

original_en_text: My part’s been given, slave. We’ve no more need to speak.<page>Go and spin your spider’s web. Allow our kingdom’s restless soul its chance to blaze.
original_zh_text: 东西给了，奴隶。不跟你废话了。<page>去织你的网吧。让这王国里躁动的灵魂烧个痛快。
translated_text: 我的任务完成了，奴隶。我们不用再说话了。<page>去编织你的蜘蛛网吧。给我们王国陷入困境的灵魂一个燃烧的机会。
secondary_translated_text: My job is done, slave. We don't have to talk anymore.<page>Go weave your spider's web. Give the troubled souls of our kingdom a chance to burn.

original_en_text: <hpage>I have more oil, pinmaster. Its acquisition was no small task, but if it aids my blade, those challenges will be well rewarded.<page>Even more oil? What preposterous luck! That unseen gift, in quantity unheard, discovered by a single bug!<page>Would you pass the oil, traveller, and perhaps a few rosaries for the ongoing effort? Allow this pinmaster to again work wonder upon your blade?
original_zh_text: <hpage>我又得到秘油了，针匠。取之不易，但为了磨砺针刃，冒点风险也是值当。<page>还有秘油？您这运气！这老些圣物竟都被同一只虫找到了。<page>那就把油给我吧，再赏几颗念珠当辛苦费如何？让我再施展一次针匠的绝活！
translated_text: <hpage>我还有更多的油，品马斯特。获得它是一项艰巨的任务，但如果它对我的刀片有帮助，挑战就会得到良好的回报。<page>更多油？多么荒谬的运气啊！这份看不见的礼物数量闻所未闻，却被发现了一个错误！<page>旅客，你能把油递给我吗？也许有一些念珠可以供我们持续的努力吗？让这位琴师再次在你的刀锋上创造奇迹？
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I have more oil, Pinmaster. Getting it is a tough task, but if it helps with my blade, the challenge will pay off well.<page>More oil? What ridiculous luck! The number of invisible gifts was unheard of, but a mistake was discovered!<page>Passenger, can you pass me the oil? Perhaps there are some rosary beads for our continued efforts? Let this zither player work miracles on your blade again?

original_en_text: An exquisite item, containing a cherished memory. I have an excellent memory myself, but I’m sure you can make good use of it.
original_zh_text: 用来记录珍贵记忆的雅物。我记性好用不着，不过你应该用得上。
translated_text: 一件美丽的物品包含着珍贵的记忆。我自己的记忆力很好，但我相信你可以充分利用它。
secondary_translated_text: A beautiful object contains precious memories. I have a good memory myself, but I believe you can make the most of it.

original_en_text: Don’t act the fool, specimen! Bzzt! Share more of yourself, that I may gain greater understanding! Learning! What other hope is there to save our blighted, thankless world?! <hpage>I have declined, bug. Whatever you seek, you shall not find it either upon or within my shell.
original_zh_text: 别装傻，病患！滋滋！奉献自己，帮助本神医领悟！不然怎么拯救这不知感恩的世界！<hpage>我拒绝，你所求之物不在我身上。
translated_text: 别装蒜了，标本！嗡嗡声！更多地分享自己，让我获得更多的理解！学习！还有什么希望来拯救我们这个饱受摧残、吃力不讨好的世界呢？！<hpage>我拒绝了，虫子。无论你寻找什么，你都不会在我的壳上或壳里找到它。
secondary_translated_text: Stop pretending, specimen! Buzz! Share yourself more and let me gain more understanding! Learn! What hope is there to save our devastated and thankless world?!<hpage>I refuse, bug. Whatever you look for, you will not find it on or in my shell.

original_en_text: <page>Miss traveller! Thanks to your valiant contributions, our little town’s starting to feel like its old self again. Homes have been hoisted, and the square shines!<hpage>I have seen the changes myself, Pavo. It is pleasing to hear my contributions have not been in vain. <page>Indeed! Your generosity is a guide for others! We’ve only one thing now sorely missing...<page>Bugs! What is a town without its residents? Age, scarcity, deadly thread... Bellhart is beset by endless ills. Now there’s just us remaining few as you’ve met.<page>In recognition of your noble efforts, and as one small step to solving the problem, I have decreed a grand gift should be given! A bellhome of your very own!<page>A place to reflect. A bed to lay in. It’s hanging up there at the top, beside our good pinmaster. <hpage>I have no plans to settle, Pavo, but for now my task in Pharloom remains, and while it does, a residence may prove useful.<page>Of course! Of course! Your fortitude inspires us all! And if trouble ever descends anew, it surely won’t hurt to have a resident warrior close at claw!
original_zh_text: <page>旅者小姐！感谢您的无私奉献，钟心镇逐渐重现旧貌！屋舍纷纷重立，广场熠熠生辉！<hpage>镇上变化我也看在眼里，得知奉献没有付诸东流，很是欣慰。<page>正是！您的慷慨堪称楷模！现在只剩……<page>居民！没有居民哪有镇子？衰老、贫瘠、邪丝……钟心镇灾厄不绝。如今只剩您见过的寥寥数虫。<page>因此，为感谢您的无私援助，我们决定赠予您一份礼物——专属钟居！<page>钟居既是静思之所，也是安眠之榻。您的钟居位置高悬上方，与针匠大师为邻。<hpage>我无意久留，但现在既在此处，有居所也是方便。<page>好说好说！您的坚毅激励镇上众虫！况且万一有新的灾祸，身旁有勇士相助总是好的！
translated_text: <page>旅行者小姐！感谢你们的英勇服务，我们的小镇开始感觉又回到了从前。房屋已被拆除，广场闪闪发光！<hpage>帕沃，我亲眼目睹了这些变化。很高兴听到我的贡献没有白费。<page>确实如此！您的慷慨是他人的指南！我们现在只需要一样东西……<page>虫子！没有居民的小镇算什么？年龄、稀缺、致命线索……伯哈特被无尽的弊病所困扰。现在只有我们几个人，就像你看到的那样。<page>为了表彰您的崇高努力，并作为解决问题的一小步，我订购了一份礼物！一座属于你自己的钟楼！<page>一个反思的地方。一张可以躺的床。它挂在上面，就在我们优秀的路德制造者旁边。<hpage>帕沃，我没有安定下来的计划，但我目前在法鲁姆的任务仍然存在，尽管住宿可能有用。<page>当然！当然！你的坚韧鼓舞了我们所有人！如果再次发生麻烦，有常驻战士靠近爪子绝对不会造成任何伤害！
secondary_translated_text: <page>Miss traveler! Thanks to your heroic service, our town is beginning to feel like it was before. The houses have been demolished and the square shines!<hpage>Paavo, I have witnessed these changes firsthand. It's good to hear that my contribution was not in vain.<page>Indeed! Your generosity is a guide to others! We only need one thing right now...<page>Bug! What is a small town without residents? Age, scarcity, fatal clues... Burhart was plagued by endless ills. There are only a few of us now, just as you can see.<page>In recognition of your noble efforts and as a small step towards solving the problem, I ordered a gift! A bell tower of your own!<page>A place for reflection. A bed to lie on. It hangs on it, next to our excellent Lutheran maker.<hpage>Paavo, I have no plans to settle down, but my current mission in Faroum still exists, although accommodation may be useful.<page>Of course! Of course! Your tenacity inspires us all! If trouble occurs again, a resident soldier will never cause any damage if he approaches the claw!

original_en_text: If you refuse to share your secrets, then distract me no more, specimen! Bzzt!<page>There is still much work ahead for the great Yarnaby! Much thought, much learning!<page>Though the ungrateful world shuns me, still, by my own claws shall it be saved!
original_zh_text: 不分享秘密就别烦我了，病患！滋滋！<page>本神医还有伟大事业！要继续想、继续学！<page>就算这不知感恩的世道唾弃我，我也要亲手拯救！
translated_text: 如果你拒绝分享你的秘密，就别再让我分心了，标本！嗡嗡声！<page>伟大的Yarnaby还有很多工作要做！多思考、多学习！<page>虽然忘恩负义的世界回避我，但还是会用我自己的爪子拯救它！
secondary_translated_text: If you refuse to share your secrets, stop distracting me, specimen! Buzz!<page>The great Yarnaby still has a lot of work to do! Think more and learn more!<page>Although the ungrateful world avoids me, it will still save it with my own claws!

original_en_text: Welly’o! What a fearful fright you’ve saved poor Plinney from! Such a delight, at longest last, to see that fine needle dance and sing!
original_zh_text: 哎呀呀！您可真是救了可怜的普林尼一命！终于又能瞧见亮闪闪的针刃起舞啦！
translated_text: 好了！你救了可怜的普林尼，这太可怕了！我很高兴终于看到那根细针又舞又唱！
secondary_translated_text: Okay! You saved poor Pliny, it's terrible! I am so happy to finally see that thin needle dancing and singing!

original_en_text: <hpage>Again, pinmaster, I must ask your skilled service. I bring another gland of oil.<page>Oil, so much! This bug is past surprise! It is time methinks, to see your blade’s work finished! To bring about a shine bright as none before!<page>Welly now! Why wait? Would you have me begin, traveller?
original_zh_text: <hpage>要再劳烦针匠了，新得一些秘油。<page>这么多圣油！我都不觉得惊讶了！不过是时候了，该让这柄针刃成为绝顶神兵了！<page>哎呀呀！还等什么！快开始吧？
translated_text: <hpage>Pinsmaster，我必须再次请求您提供熟练的服务。我带来了另一个腺体。<page>石油，这么多！这个错误太神奇了！我想是时候看到你的刀片完成它的工作了！带来前所未有的光芒！<page>威利，现在！为什么要等待？你想让我开始吗，旅行者？
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Pinsmaster, I must again ask you to provide skilled service. I brought another gland.<page>Oil, so much! This mistake is amazing! I think it's time to see your blade do its job! Bringing unprecedented light!<page>Willie, now! Why wait? Do you want me to start, traveler?

original_en_text: <hpage>These are deadly roads to wander, pinmaster, especially with the black soaked threads tearing the lands apart.<hpage>Your greatest chance for safety lies in Bellhart, with your fellows. You can protect one another, and perhaps in time rebuild.<page>Oh yes, of course! T’was not Plinney’s wish to abandon his dear bellfriends, but with the world now ending, I had to come and say one last farewell to my sweet Melatolla.<page>I should be returning though, quite rightly. Our town will be needing a pinmaster’s fine work now more than ever!
original_zh_text: <hpage>如今世道凶险，针匠，尤其黑灾使各处分崩离析。<hpage>最安生的去处还是钟心镇，和同胞互相照应，或许还能重建家园。<page>是啊是啊！普林尼本不想抛下镇子里的老友，但想到要完蛋了，总得和亲爱的梅拉托拉道个别。<page>不过该回去啦！镇上如今可比任何时候都缺针匠手艺！
translated_text: <hpage>这些都是致命的游荡道路，皮斯马斯特，尤其是浸透了黑色的丝线撕裂土地。<hpage>您最大的安全机会在于伯哈特和您的同伴们。你们可以互相保护，也许可以及时重建。<page>哦是的，当然！普林尼不想抛弃他亲爱的服务员朋友，但世界即将结束，我不得不来向我亲爱的梅拉托拉说最后的再见。<page>但我应该回来，这是正确的。我们的小镇现在比以往任何时候都更需要路德球员的出色工作！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>These are deadly wandering roads, Pismaster, especially those soaked in black silk threads that tear through the land.<hpage>Your greatest chance for safety lies with Burhardt and your companions. You can protect each other and maybe rebuild in time.<page>Oh yes, of course! Pliny did not want to abandon his dear waiter friend, but the world was coming to an end and I had to come and say my last goodbye to my dear Melatola.<page>But I should come back, and that's right. Our town needs the good work of Lutheran players now more than ever!

original_en_text: Yes... yes. This is a mighty collection indeed!<page>So many relics safely piled up in here, nice and safe! I’ve done so well to gather it all up!<hpage>If your collection pleases you, some acknowledgement of my own contribution to its growth is not undue.<page>Pah! Is it gratitude you seek?<page>I will allow you to keep viewing my collection. That is gratitude enough for what little you’ve given me!
original_zh_text: 好……真好！这才是称得上是珍藏！<page>这么多遗物安安稳稳地堆在这儿！我得算是劳苦功高！<hpage>若您对这珍藏满意，也请念我几分功劳。<page>嘁！讨谢来了？<page>就你交的那点东西，准你多看几眼我的珍藏，就当是谢礼了！
translated_text: 是的...是的，这确实是一个强大的系列！<page>这么多文物都安全堆放在这里，又好又安全！我把它们收集得很好！<hpage>如果您的收藏让您满意，那么对我自己对其发展的贡献的认可也不是没有必要的。<page>呸！您正在寻找感恩吗？<page>我允许您继续阅读我的合集。对于你给我的，这已经足够感激了！
secondary_translated_text: Yes... Yes, this is indeed a powerful series!<page>So many cultural relics are safely piled here, it's nice and safe! I collected them well!<hpage>If your collection satisfies you, then recognition of my own contribution to its development is not unnecessary.<page>Bah! Are you looking for gratitude?<page>I allow you to continue reading my collection. I am grateful enough for what you have given me!

original_en_text: <page=S>Once was common, this delivery, for the bugs in their camp beside the bone. Now even this is-is challenge.<page=T>Down there at base, where many pilgrims’ journey start. To ready for their climb, these deliverings will give much value.
original_zh_text: <page=S>这本是寻常单子，给骸底营地的虫。现在竟、竟然也成难题了。<page=T>那儿是朝圣者起点，货到能帮大忙。
translated_text: <page=S>这种投递方式曾经对于骨头旁边营地里的虫子来说很常见。即使这现在也是一个挑战。<page=T>许多朝圣者从那里开始他们的旅程。为了为攀登做好准备，这些交付将带来巨大的价值。
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>This delivery method was once common for bugs in the camp next to the bones. Even this is a challenge now.<page=T>Many pilgrims began their journey there. In order to prepare for the climb, these deliveries will bring great value.

original_en_text: Would you pass the oil, traveller, and perhaps a few rosaries for their ongoing effort? Allow this pinmaster to again work wonder upon your blade?
original_zh_text: 那就把油给我吧，再赏几颗念珠当辛苦费如何？让我再施展一次针匠的绝活！
translated_text: 你会传递石油、旅行者和一些念珠来感谢他们的持续努力吗？让这位琴师再次在你的刀锋上创造奇迹？
secondary_translated_text: Will you pass on oil, travelers and some rosary beads to thank them for their continued efforts? Let this zither player work miracles on your blade again?

original_en_text: Found some fancy trophies on your travels? Then you’ll be needing these shelves to show them off!
original_zh_text: 旅途中搜罗了不少珍奇战利品？正好放上这架子显摆！
translated_text: 您在旅行中发现了什么漂亮的奖杯吗？那么你将需要这些架子来展示它们！
secondary_translated_text: Did you find any beautiful trophies during your trip? Then you will need these shelves to display them!

original_en_text: Just passing through these lands, are you, miss? I’d warn you not to stray far from Bellhart, but you’ve the look of one who can manage themself.
original_zh_text: 只是路过吗？劝你别离镇子太远，不过瞧你倒像是有本事的。
translated_text: 小姐，你只是路过这片土地，是吗？我想警告你不要远离伯哈特，但你看起来是一个可以管理自己的人。
secondary_translated_text: Miss, you're just passing through this land, right? I want to warn you not to stay away from Burhart, but you seem like someone who can manage yourself.
