original_en_text: If you’re heading out across the pond, be wary of the other catchers. They’re all long lost to Pharloom’s Haunting.<page>Weak minds, the lotta them. Still, their longpins remain sharp enough.
original_zh_text: 如果要经过池塘，当心其他渔夫，全被邪咒侵染了。<page>大多是心智软弱的家伙，但使长针的手艺没丢。
translated_text: 如果你穿过池塘，小心其他捕手。他们早已迷失在《法罗闹鬼》中。<page>他们喜欢它，思想薄弱。尽管如此，它们的长针仍然足够锋利。
secondary_translated_text: If you cross the pond, be careful of other catchers. They have long been lost in "Haunted Faro".<page>They like it and have weak minds. Still, their long needles are sharp enough.

original_en_text: Well, well! Welcome to you, our newest resident! I hope you’re finding your new home to your taste.<hpage>It is a finely forged bell, madam. I am fortunate to have a safe space to rest, even if my stay here may be short.<page>However long you’re with us, I’ve been holding onto some fine goods that’ll cosy up your home. This stuff ain’t for the riff-raff winding through, but a fellow Bellharter deserves the finest!
original_zh_text: 哟嗬！新住户！钟居可还满意？<hpage>铸造精良，女士。虽然是暂居，但能有一处安身之所实属幸事。<page>住多久随意，我留着些好货专供钟心镇自己人！过路粗客可配不上这档次！
translated_text: 嗯，嗯！欢迎，我们的新居民！我希望你找到一个适合你口味的新家。<hpage>这是一个精心锻造的时钟，女士。我很幸运有一个安全的休息空间，尽管我在这里的停留时间可能很短。<page>无论您在我们这里住多久，我都会保留一些让您家舒适的好东西。这些东西不适合乌合之众，但贝尔哈特人值得最好的！
secondary_translated_text: Hmm, hmm! Welcome, our new residents! I hope you find a new home that suits your tastes.<hpage>This is a carefully forged clock, ma 'am. I am lucky to have a safe resting space, although my stay here may be short.<page>No matter how long you stay with us, I will keep something nice to make your home comfortable. These things are not suitable for a rabble, but the Belharts deserve the best!

original_en_text: Welcome, welcome, weary pilgrim! Though glorious Bellhart may be past its finest shine, it still remains the last friendly stop before the Citadel. <page>It is the task of I, fair Pavo, to extend the warmest of welcome to those passing devout, such as your good self!<hpage>Your town seems returned to healthy form, good bug. I had some concern that, upon cutting you free, I’d find only husks.<page>Yes, well, many ahh... err... most of our residents did not fare so well... Still, it’s no good to dwell on dark things! We shall build, and grow, and welcome! As is any good bellbug’s task.
original_zh_text: 欢迎欢迎，疲惫的朝圣者！钟心镇虽然不复往昔，但仍是攀登圣堡前最后一处友善驿站。<page>我，帕沃，专为虔行旅者献上最热忱的欢迎——比如尊驾您！<hpage>看来镇子已然恢复生机，原以为斩断丝咒后只能见空壳遍地。<page>呃……这个……许多居民确实没挺过来……但沉溺于哀伤没有意义！我等将重建、成长、迎接！此乃钟心镇虫民的天职。
translated_text: 欢迎，欢迎，疲惫的朝圣者！尽管辉煌的伯哈特可能已经过去了最辉煌的时期，但它仍然是城堡前的最后一站。<page>美丽的帕沃，我的任务是向像你这样去世的人的仁慈致敬！<hpage>你的小镇似乎恢复了健康，好虫子。我有点担心，放你出去的时候，我只会找到贝壳。<page>是的，嗯，很多。呃...我们的大多数居民都做得不好。尽管如此，沉迷于黑暗的事情并没有任何好处！我们将建设、成长和欢迎！这也是任何优秀的时钟工人的任务。
secondary_translated_text: Welcome, welcome, tired pilgrims! Although the glorious Burhart may have passed its most glorious period, it is still the last stop in front of the castle.<page>Beautiful Paavo, my task is to pay tribute to the kindness of people like you who have passed away!<hpage>Your town seems to be back to health, good bug. I'm a little worried. When I let you out, I'll only find shells.<page>Yeah, well, a lot. Uh... Most of our residents are not doing well. Still, being addicted to dark things doesn't do any good! We will build, grow and welcome! This is also the task of any good clockworker.

original_en_text: You’ve met Frey, miss? She’s usually stocking useful items for travellers such as yourself.
original_zh_text: 见过芙蕾了么？她那常备着些旅者用得上的好货。
translated_text: 小姐，你见过弗雷吗？她通常为像您这样的旅行者储备有用的物品。
secondary_translated_text: Miss, have you met Frey? She usually stocks useful items for travelers like you.

original_en_text: The perfect choice! Your bell’s about to be looking the finest in town. We’ll get the work started straight away.
original_zh_text: 选得好！你这钟屋就要变成全镇最好的一间了。立马开工！
translated_text: 完美的选择！你的钟声将是城里最好的。我们将立即开始工作。
secondary_translated_text: The perfect choice! Your bells will be the best in town. We will start work immediately.

original_en_text: If you’re ever finding that bellhome a little bare, make sure to speak with Frey. She’s been known to gather all sorts of fancy furnishings.<page>That stock’s useless for a passing pilgrim, but for a new resident it’s just the stuff to turn a bell into home.
original_zh_text: 如果觉得钟居空荡，可找芙蕾购置家具。<page>那些家具对过客无用，但对新住民来说正好可以营造归家之感。
translated_text: 如果您发现钟楼有点光秃秃的，请务必与弗雷交谈。众所周知，她收藏了各种精美的家具。<page>这些库存对过往的朝圣者来说没有任何用处，但对于新居民来说，它只是带回家的东西。
secondary_translated_text: If you find the clock tower a little bare, be sure to talk to Frey. As we all know, she collects all kinds of exquisite furniture.<page>The inventory is of no use to past pilgrims, but for new residents, it is just something to take home.

original_en_text: <page=S>Up-up, in the big Citadel, a new place we heard is now claimed safety-safe! Theys too needing our deliverings, we is sure!<page=T>That Citadel. We knows its truths! Not so nicely-nice as pilgrims tells! Even if brave bugs would settle, danger still is close!<page=S>They would need deliverings, for food, for healings, for protection. Please takes them, miss courier!
original_zh_text: <page=S>听说上、上面的圣堡有新据点！肯定缺物资！<page=T>我们知道圣堡真相！根本没朝圣者说的那、那么好！就算有勇者定居也危险！需要食物药品护具——救星小姐去送吧！
translated_text: <page=S>在大城堡里，我们听说的一个新地方现在声称是安全的！我们确信他们也需要我们的救援！<page=T>城堡我们知道真相！没有朝圣者说的那么好！即使勇敢的虫子安定下来，危险仍然很接近！<page=S>他们需要救济来获得食物、治愈和保护。请把它们拿走，送货小姐！
secondary_translated_text: <page=S>In the Grand Castle, a new place we heard about now claims to be safe! We are sure they need our rescue too!<page=T>Castle, we know the truth! Not as good as the pilgrim said! Even if the brave bug settles down, danger is still close!<page=S>They need relief for food, healing and protection. Please take them away, delivery lady!

original_en_text: Tarano! We shall work, now as never. What joy you grant this humble artisan, traveller. Let us seek that shine thought lost within these lands...
original_zh_text: 开工！这是毕生难求的机会。旅者，谢谢您让我这卑微匠人重拾失传荣光……
translated_text: 塔拉诺！我们将一如既往地工作。您给这位卑微的工匠和旅行者带来了多么大的快乐啊。让我们寻找这些土地上失去的光明。
secondary_translated_text: Tarano! We will work as always. What a joy you have brought to this humble craftsman and traveler. Let us look for the lost light in these lands.

original_en_text: <page>Welly, ho! That oil! You have it! That rare substance, hoarded close by the Citadel. Few are the pinmasters of our age that ever chanced to work its wonders.<page>Would you see it, traveller? The finest work of this fair pinmaster and your blade sharper still! Pass me the oil, and we can commence!
original_zh_text: <page>哎呀呀！那就是圣油！您竟然有！圣堡秘藏的圣物，当世针匠谁摸过这玩意！<page>旅者，可愿见证纺络针匠的绝活？把油给我，肯定不会让您失望！
translated_text: <page>威利，嗬！那个油！你有它！这种稀有物质正在城堡附近囤积。我们这个时代很少有人能创造奇迹。<page>你看到了吗，旅行者？这是这位美丽的琴师的最好作品，你的刀更锋利了！把油递给我，我们可以开始了！
secondary_translated_text: <page>Willie, ho! That oil! You have it! This rare substance is being stockpiled near the castle. Few people in our era can work miracles.<page>Did you see that, traveler? This is the best work of this beautiful zither player, your knife is sharper! Pass me the oil and we can start!

original_en_text: Welly, yay? Reconsider my offer? Your blade would gleam at my fine skill!
original_zh_text: 哎呀呀！改主意了？我这手艺保准让刃口锃亮！
translated_text: 威利，是吗？再次考虑我的提议？你的剑将在我精湛的技艺下闪闪发光！
secondary_translated_text: Willie, right? Consider my offer again? Your sword will shine under my superb skills!

original_en_text: <hpage>Madam, I am sickly. Maggots of the fetid bogs beyond the moors writhe upon my shell. I would ask your aid in removing them.<page>Maggots! That’s all you bring the great Yarnaby?! My time is precious! Only for the seriously afflicted! The truly, hideously enfeebled. Bzzt!<page>Find a bench, or a bed, or a rock! It’s only rest you need. Settle yourself somewhere, and those maggots will soon wriggle themselves out of your shell.
original_zh_text: <hpage>女士，沼地的蛆虫在我壳上乱爬，请您帮忙清除。<page>蛆虫？！就为这破玩意烦本神医？！重症！我要治的是重症！惨不忍睹那种！滋滋！<page>找长椅、床铺、石头歇着去！睡一觉蛆虫自会掉光。
translated_text: <hpage>夫人，我病了。荒野外沼泽恶臭的蛆在我的壳上蠕动。我会请你帮忙把它们移走。<page>蛆虫！这就是你给伟大的亚纳比带来的全部吗？！我的时间宝贵！只适合伤势严重的人！真正的、可怕的弱点。嗡嗡声！<page>找一张长凳、一张床或一块石头！你只需要休息。定居在某个地方，这些蛆虫会很快从你的壳里爬出来。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Ma 'am, I'm sick. The stench of maggots in the swamp outside the wilderness wriggled on my shell. I'll ask you to help remove them.<page>Maggots! Is this all you bring to the great Yanabi?! My time is precious! Only suitable for severely injured people! Real, terrible weakness. Buzz!<page>Find a bench, a bed or a stone! You just need to rest. Settling somewhere, these maggots will quickly crawl out of your shell.

original_en_text: Welcome, fellow resident! Can I interest you in something special before you’re away again on your travels?
original_zh_text: 欢迎你，好邻居！出门前要不要买点特别的东西？
translated_text: 欢迎大家！在您再次旅行之前，我可以对一些特别的东西感兴趣吗？
secondary_translated_text: Welcome everyone! Before you travel again, can I be interested in something special?

original_en_text: <hpage>Greetings, shopkeeper. It seems you’ve recovered well from that silken affliction.<page>Ah! Well, I’m a clever bug. When that strange thread struck down from above, I shut up tight and huddled in my bellhome.<page>Might’ve been a problem for the others about here, but my store was flush with supplies, so no fear I’d go hungry.<hpage>Your preparedness served you well then. Although... your store now seems quite bare.<page>Ahem. Yes. I’ll admit, the wait was longer than I’d anticipated, and a bug has to eat...<page>I’ll have more to offer you once my courier turns up. No doubt he’s been avoiding Bellhart since the curse set its sights on us.
original_zh_text: <hpage>日安，店主。看来你已从丝咒中恢复。<page>哈！我机灵着呢。那怪丝掉下来的时候，我立马缩进钟居紧闭门户。<page>其他虫或许遭了殃，但我存货充足，饿不着。<hpage>未雨绸缪是好事。不过……你这铺子如今空荡得很。<page>咳，是。实话说，这劫难拖得比预期久，虫总要吃饭嘛……<page>等我家送货虫回来就有新货了，那小子肯定绕着钟心镇躲灾呢。
translated_text: <hpage>你好，店主。看来你已经从那丝般的疼痛中恢复得很好了。<page>啊！我是只聪明的虫子。当奇怪的线从上面掉下来的时候，我紧紧地闭上了嘴，蜷缩在我的钟屋里。<page>这对这里的其他人来说可能是一个问题，但我的商店库存充足，所以我不必担心挨饿。<hpage>那么你的准备将对你很有帮助。尽管...您的商店现在看起来空无一人。<page>咳咳，是的，我承认等待时间比我预期的要长，而且昆虫还得吃东西……<page>当我的信使到来时，我可以给你更多。毫无疑问，自从诅咒针对我们以来，他一直在回避伯哈特。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Hello, owner. It seems that you have recovered well from the silky pain.<page>Ah! I'm a smart bug. When the strange thread fell from above, I shut my mouth tightly and curled up in my clock house.<page>This may be a problem for others here, but my store is well stocked, so I don't have to worry about starving.<hpage>Then your preparation will be very helpful to you. Although... Your store now seems empty.<page>Ahem, yes, I admit that the waiting time was longer than I expected, and the insects had to eat...<page>When my messenger comes, I can give you more. There is no doubt that he has been avoiding Burhart since the curse was directed at us.

original_en_text: You bother me again? Begone, I said!<hpage>I ask only if you know what has happened to the bugs above us. They hang trapped in a vast snare of thread.<page>Hff. Hardly surprising. That there’s the final fate for all in Pharloom. Just come seeking a little sooner for them above.<page>Surely, oh surely, you don’t imagine your own end will be different? All that hunger, and fear, and pride, filling your fragile heart. You too are bound to end ensnared!<page>Grnk! Begone. In Pharloom, only a fool believes themselves free.
original_zh_text: 又来烦我？说了滚！<hpage>我只想问你可知上头虫子的遭遇？他们受困于邪丝之中。<page>嗤，迟早的事。纺络的众生终归此路，他们不过是早走一步。<page>难道……你觉得自己能逃过？饥渴、恐惧、傲慢塞满你那脆壳，你早晚也得落网！<page>哼！滚吧。在纺络，相信自己自由的都是蠢货。
translated_text: 你又骚扰我了吗？走开，我说！<hpage>我只是问你是否知道我们上面的虫子发生了什么。他们被困在一个巨大的线陷阱中。<page>呼呼。这并不奇怪。法勒姆是每个人的最终命运。只要早点来并在上面寻找他们即可。<page>当然，哦，当然，你难道不认为你自己的结局会有所不同吗？所有这些饥饿，恐惧和骄傲填满了你脆弱的心。你死定了！<page>Grnk！走开在法鲁，只有傻瓜才相信自己是自由的。
secondary_translated_text: Are you harassing me again? Go away, I say!<hpage>I was just asking if you knew what happened to the bugs above us. They were trapped in a huge line trap.<page>Whoosh. This is not surprising. Farham is everyone's ultimate destiny. Just come early and look for them up there.<page>Sure, oh, sure, don't you think your own ending would be different? All this hunger, fear and pride fills your fragile heart. You're dead!<page>Grnk! Go away In Faro, only fools believe they are free.

original_en_text: You want to cut them down? Hff. Yes, you look cruel enough.<page>Once the strings are cut, pain will return to them. They will remember fear and longing.<page>What a choice you make for them! Such power you grant yourself!
original_zh_text: 想斩断丝线？嗤，瞧你倒有几分机灵。<page>丝线一断，痛苦、恐惧、渴求都将复归。<page>你替他们选的好啊！好大的威风！
translated_text: 你想切断它们吗？呼呼。是的，你看起来够残忍的。<page>一旦弦被切断，疼痛又回到弦上。他们会记住他们的恐惧和欲望。<page>你为他们做了多么好的选择啊！你给了自己这种力量！
secondary_translated_text: Do you want to cut them off? Whoosh. Yes, you seem cruel.<page>Once the strings are cut, the pain returns to the strings. They will remember their fears and desires.<page>What a great choice you made for them! You gave yourself this power!

original_en_text: <hpage>Pinmaster, I have acquired oil with which my needle may see further sharpening.<page>Bonva! What wonder? What wish? To steal a gift so fine. Few are the pinmasters of our age who ever worked with such a substance.
original_zh_text: <hpage>针匠，我取来磨针秘油了。<page>太好了！这等圣物，这年头还有哪个针匠能摸到这宝贝！
translated_text: <hpage>Pinmaster，我已经得到了油，我可以用它来进一步磨尖我的针。<page>邦瓦！什么奇迹？什么愿望？我竟然偷了这么漂亮的礼物。在我们这个时代，很少有人使用这种物质。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Pinmaster, I've got the oil that I can use to sharpen my needles further.<page>Bonwa! What miracle? What wish? I can't believe I stole such a beautiful gift. In our day, few people use this substance.

original_en_text: How grand! To face an opponent with a bit of energy.<page>You’re a skilled one, clear enough. I hope my training has granted some insight.
original_zh_text: 痛快！总算遇到像样的对手。<page>身手不错，我的指导对你有用吧？
translated_text: 多么宏伟啊！面对充满活力的对手。<page>你是一个熟练的人，足够清楚。我希望我的训练能给我一些启发。
secondary_translated_text: How magnificent! Facing dynamic opponents.<page>You are a skilled person and clear enough. I hope my training will inspire me.

original_en_text: So rude! To raise a Pinstress from their deep meditation!<page>You carry on with that kind of brash behaviour and you’re likely to be stuck quick through!<hpage>I’m surprised to find a bug of sound mind alive in such an inhospitable place. You are a warrior learned in the blades of this land?<page>Aye! A Pinstress! Your needle there might fit you fair, strange as it is’n all, but it’s the pin that’s the glorious weapon of Pharloom.<page>Given I’m now awake, maybe you’d fancy a little training? Care to test the power of a Pinstress? Might be even this old master could show you a thing or two.
original_zh_text: 无礼之徒！竟敢打断针姬的冥想！<page>再这样莽撞行事，小心被扎成筛子！<hpage>这种荒凉之地居然还有清醒的虫活着？你是学过本地兵器的战士？<page>没错！刺针才是纺络的荣耀武器——你那根怪模怪样的针虽然趁手，但终究不是正统。<page>既然醒了，要不要来练练手？想试试刺针的威力吗？说不定我这老师傅还能教你两招？
translated_text: 太无礼了！唤醒一位公主！<page>如果你继续这种傲慢的态度，你很可能很快就会陷入麻烦！<hpage>我惊讶地发现，在如此荒凉的地方，竟然还有一只理智的昆虫活着。你是在这片土地上学习的士兵吗？<page>是的！女诗人！你的针可能很适合你，尽管很奇怪，这是法罗的光荣武器。<page>既然我现在醒了，也许你想接受一点训练？想测试女巫的力量吗？也许这位老师傅可以教你一两件事。
secondary_translated_text: How rude! Wake up a princess!<page>If you continue with this arrogant attitude, you are likely to get into trouble soon!<hpage>I was surprised to find that in such a desolate place, there was still a sensible insect alive. Are you a soldier studying in this land?<page>Yes! Poetess! Your needle may suit you well, strange as it may be, it is Farrow's glorious weapon.<page>Now that I'm awake, maybe you want to get a little training? Want to test the power of a witch? Maybe this old master can teach you one or two things.

original_en_text: It’s a right long time since I’ve felt so vigorous. All those dulled pilgrims were useless for testing my talents.<hpage>Your blade proved an impressive challenge, Pinstress. I’ve travelled the length of this kingdom, yet the strength and skills hidden throughout continue to surprise me.<page>You bear your own strange strengths, needle bug. If only we’d met in less troubled times, just think of all we could have learned from one another!
original_zh_text: 好久没这么热血沸腾了！那些呆滞的朝圣者根本不配当陪练。<hpage>你的技艺令我惊叹。即便我走遍整个王国，仍为这里隐藏的实力感到惊讶。<page>你身上带着奇特的力量。要是我们生在太平年代，本可以互相学习！
translated_text: 我已经很久没有感觉如此精力充沛了。所有那些无聊的朝圣者对考验我的才华没有任何用处。<hpage>公主，你的剑是个很大的挑战。我走遍了这个王国，但隐藏的力量和技能仍然让我感到惊讶。<page>你有你自己的奇怪的力量，针虫。如果我们在一个不那么麻烦的时候相遇，想想我们可以从彼此身上学到什么！
secondary_translated_text: It's been a long time since I felt so energetic. All those boring pilgrims are of no use in testing my talents.<hpage>Princess, your sword is a big challenge. I have traveled through this kingdom, but the hidden powers and skills still amaze me.<page>You have your own strange powers, needle worm. If we met at a less troublesome time, think about what we could learn from each other!

original_en_text: Bold choice, needle bug. Let’s get our shells a’shaking!
original_zh_text: 有胆识！让我们战个痛快！
translated_text: 大胆的选择，针虫。让我们的贝壳颤抖吧！
secondary_translated_text: Bold choice, needle worm. Let our shells tremble!

original_en_text: <hpage>These sands mark the edge of Pharloom’s territory. I was brought to this land through the caverns beyond.<hpage>Something at this kingdom’s height still hungers for me. Were I to flee now, I would again be pursued.<hpage>Until I find the source of that hunger, and slay it, I will not be free.
original_zh_text: <hpage>这片沙原是纺络的边界。我是穿过远处洞窟被带到此地的。<hpage>纺络的顶端仍有存在渴求着我。若此刻逃离，必将再次受到追捕。<hpage>唯有找到源头并将其斩杀，我才能获得自由。
translated_text: <hpage>沙子标志着法勒姆领土的边缘。我是通过远处的一个洞穴来到这片土地的。<hpage>在这个王国的鼎盛时期，还有什么东西在渴望着我。如果我现在逃跑，我会再次被追捕。<hpage>在我找到饥饿的根源并消除它之前，我不会自由。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Sand marks the edge of Farham territory. I came to this land through a cave in the distance.<hpage>In the heyday of this kingdom, something else longed for me. If I run now, I will be hunted again.<hpage>I will not be free until I find the source of hunger and eliminate it.

original_en_text: Back again, needle bug? Surely you’ve more important places calling than these sandy steps?<hpage>I shan’t stay long, Pinstress. Your home and your skills offer a sense of safety rare about these lands.
original_zh_text: 还不走？没有更要紧的事要做吗？<hpage>我不会久留。不过有你这般身手，待在这里反而安全。
translated_text: 又回来了，针线虫？你确定还有比这些沙质台阶更重要的东西吗？<hpage>我不会呆太久的，公主。您的家和技能提供了一种在这些土地上罕见的安全感。
secondary_translated_text: Back again, needle worm? Are you sure there is anything more important than these sandy steps?<hpage>I won't stay long, princess. Your home and skills provide a sense of security rare in these lands.

original_en_text: Find the vassal... pale It. Return them to us... Save us both from the Masters’ wrath.
original_zh_text: 找到仆从……苍白者。将其归还……平息主人怒火。
translated_text: 找到附庸。把它们还给我们.拯救我们俩免受大师们的愤怒。
secondary_translated_text: Find the vassal. Give them back to us. Save us both from the anger of the masters.

original_en_text: Needle bug! With those black quakes, Pharloom’s finale is fast arriving.<page>Raise your blade! Let’s see at least one of us end true to our nature!
original_zh_text: 看这黑色震动，纺络的终局将至了。<page>举针吧！至少让我们中的一个死得其所！
translated_text: 针虫！随着这些黑色地震，法鲁的末日即将到来。<page>举起你的刀！让我们看到，我们中至少有一个人最终忠于我们的本性！
secondary_translated_text: Needle worm! With these black earthquakes, the end of Faro is coming.<page>Raise your knife! Let us see that at least one of us is ultimately true to our nature!

original_en_text: Ah ha! Needle bug! Who else would dare wake a Pinstress with such force?!<page>Saw my wish, I’m guessing? Here hopin’ to fulfill it?<hpage>I know what you are seeking, Pinstress... a death duel, an end from battle, not cavern’s collapse.<hpage>I can oblige... to a point... But a greater challenge still awaits me below.<page>Whatever else you’re about, you might be finding it futile now, needle bug. The black quakes... Pharloom’s finale arrives.<page>So let’s stop the yapping, aye! How’s ‘bout we begin? Let’s see at least one of us end true to our nature!
original_zh_text: 哈！是你！除了你谁敢这么粗暴地吵醒一名针姬！<page>看到我的祈愿了？想来帮我实现？<hpage>我知道你在渴求什么……一场死斗，你想战死而非被沙土掩埋。<hpage>我可以满足你……但下面还有更大的挑战在等着我。<page>不管你要做什么，可能都是徒劳。这黑色震动……纺络的终局将至。<page>少废话！开打吧！至少让我们中的一个死得其所！
translated_text: 啊哈！针虫！还有谁敢用这种力量唤醒一个公主！<page>我猜你看到了我的愿望？想在这里实现吗？<hpage>我知道你在找什么，公主..一场死亡决斗，战斗的结束，而不是洞穴的倒塌。<hpage>我可以说是的。一定程度上但我面前还有更大的挑战。<page>无论你在做什么，你现在可能会发现它是徒劳的，笨蛋。黑地震.法鲁的终结就在这里。<page>所以让我们停止胡言乱语吧，是的！我们开始怎么样？让我们看到，我们中至少有一个人最终忠于我们的本性！
secondary_translated_text: Aha! Needle worm! Who else dares to use this power to awaken a princess!<page>I guess you saw my wish? Want to do it here?<hpage>I know what you are looking for, princess.. A death duel, the end of the battle, not the collapse of the cave.<hpage>I can say yes. To a certain extent, but I have bigger challenges ahead of me.<page>No matter what you are doing, you may find it in vain now, fool. Black earthquake. The end of Faro is here.<page>So let's stop babbling, yes! How about we start? Let us see that at least one of us is ultimately true to our nature!

original_en_text: Creature, higher... It has been sent... by Masters served... to retrieve Zi’s vassal lost?
original_zh_text: 上位者……主人派你来……回收失联仆从？
translated_text: 生物，更高……已发送.通过服务.夺回失去的诸侯？
secondary_translated_text: Biology, Higher... sent. Through services. Retake the lost princes?

original_en_text: No. No. No... My saviour slain!<page>Why do you do this, cruel slasher? Why must I stay, and serve, so long, long, long?<hpage>That void must not be called, bug. Already it attacks these lands with enough force to end them. To summon it stronger will only hasten that fall.<hpage>For this moment at least, your shell is saved. It was only by wish of your steel companion, and fear of her Masters’ punishment, that I arrived in time.
original_zh_text: 不，不……我的眷属被毁了！<page>你为什么这么残忍？为什么要我永世为奴？<hpage>虚空不可被召唤。纺络已然深受其害，再度召唤只会使情况更糟。<hpage>若不是你的钢铁同伴祈愿，我又及时赶到，你必死无疑。
translated_text: 不。我的救世主被杀了！<page>你为什么要这么做残忍的杀手为什么我必须留下来服务这么久这么久？<hpage>这个空白一定不能被调用，错误。它以足够的力量攻击了这些土地来结束它们。称其强大只会加速衰落。<hpage>至少此时，您的Shell已被保存。只是因为你的铁伙伴的愿望，害怕她的主人的惩罚，我才及时赶到。
secondary_translated_text: No. My savior has been killed!<page>Why do you do this, cruel killer? Why do I have to stay and serve for so long?<hpage>This blank must not be called, error. It attacked these lands with enough force to end them. Calling it strong will only accelerate decline.<hpage>At least for this time, your Shell has been saved. It was only because of the wishes of your iron partner and the fear of her master's punishment that I arrived in time.

original_en_text: Gah! Bested fair, and yet you choose to stay the killing blow?<hpage>I can test you, Pinstress, and myself for what’s to come, but I will not cut you down.<hpage>Despite its quakes, Pharloom’s demise is not as certain as it seems. I shall act to change that fate.<hpage>If I succeed at my task, the land that remains will require the watch of strong bugs like you.<page>Well, ain’t you an inspiration! Makin’ me seem a right fool, here thinkin’ only on the end while you’re looking to a future fair...<page>Seems you’ve beaten me twice, needle bug, both my pin’s edge, and my heart’s resolve...
original_zh_text: 咳！你已经赢了，为什么还不动手？<hpage>我可以与你比试，但不会杀你……<hpage>纺络的命运尚有转机，我要改变它。<hpage>若我成功，幸存的世界需要你这样的强者守护。<page>你可真是乐观！显得我像个只想着末日的蠢货……<page>你赢了我两次，无论是武艺还是觉悟……
translated_text: 啊！最公平的事情，但你选择留下来承受致命的打击？<hpage>我可以测试你，品斯，还有我自己，但我不会把你放下。<hpage>尽管发生了地震，法鲁姆的死亡并不像看起来那么确定。我将采取行动改变这种命运。<hpage>如果我成功完成任务，其余的土地就需要像你这样强大的虫子来守护。<page>好吧，你不是一个鼓舞人心的人吗？让我看起来像个傻瓜，只想着这里的最后一件事，而你却在寻找未来的公平……<page>看来你已经打败了我两次了。针挫败了我的刀尖和我的决心……
secondary_translated_text: Ah! The fairest thing, but you chose to stay and take the fatal blow?<hpage>I can test you, Pence, and myself, but I won't put you down.<hpage>Despite the earthquake, Farum's death was not as certain as it seemed. I will take action to change that fate.<hpage>If I successfully complete the mission, the rest of the land will need powerful insects like you to protect.<page>Well, aren't you an inspiration? Makes me look like a fool, thinking only about the last thing here, while you are looking for future fairness...<page>Looks like you've beaten me twice already. The needle frustrated my tip and my determination...

original_en_text: <hpage>Not for your Masters, but by my own will I may aid you, Zi, as long as the path permits.<hpage>Of your vassal, I have met one before, a scurrilous, scheming sort, and well able to remain hidden.<hpage>If your own servant shares similar disposition, they may prove hard to retrieve. Where would you advise I begin my search?<page>Zi has sensed their movement... She knows their places of rest. For pale It... Zi shall mark their chart.<page>Seek the vassal... Retrieve them, or their corpse... either is appropriate... either will aid... to avoid the Masters’ wrath.
original_zh_text: <hpage>若是顺路，我会你一臂之力。但并非为了你主人，而是为了我自己。<hpage>至于那仆从，我曾遇过同类。卑劣狡诈，极善藏匿。<hpage>若你的仆从也是如此，搜寻将很困难。你觉得该从何处下手？<page>梓能感知其动向……知晓其方位……苍白者，梓会在地图标记。<page>找到仆从……无论死活……皆能平息怒火……
translated_text: <hpage>不是为了你的主人，而是只要道路允许，我可以按照自己的意愿帮助你，儿子。<hpage>我以前见过你的一个附庸，一个肮脏、诡计多端的人，隐藏得很好。<hpage>如果你自己的仆人也有类似的倾向，他们可能很难康复。您建议我从哪里开始寻找？<page>姿已经感觉到了他们的动作……她知道他们在哪里休息。事实上，孩子们会标记他们的图表。<page>寻找附庸。埋葬他们，或他们的尸体..两者都合适。要么有帮助。为了避免大师们的愤怒。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Not for your master, but as long as the path permits, I can help you as I wish, son.<hpage>I have seen one of your vassals before, a dirty, scheming man, hidden well.<hpage>If your own servants have similar tendencies, it may be difficult for them to recover. Where do you suggest I start looking?<page>Zi could already feel their movements... She knew where they were resting. In fact, children will mark their charts.<page>Find vassals. Bury them, or their bodies.. Both are suitable. Either it helps. To avoid the anger of the masters.

original_en_text: So rude! To raise a Pinstress from their deep meditation!<page>You carry on with that kind of brash behaviour and you’re likely to be stuck quick through!<hpage>I’m surprised to find any bug still alive in such an inhospitable place. You are a warrior learned in the blades of this land?<page>Aye! A Pinstress! Your needle there might fit you fair, but the pin that’s the glorious weapon of Pharloom, least it was... It’s sure starting to feel like Pharloom doesn’t have long left.<page>Well, given I’m now awake, and time’s suddenly short, maybe you’d fancy a little training? Might be even this old master could show you a thing or two?
original_zh_text: 无礼之徒！竟敢打断针姬的冥想！<page>再这样莽撞行事，小心被扎成筛子！<hpage>这种荒凉之地居然还有活虫？你是学过本地兵器的战士？<page>没错！刺针曾是纺络的荣耀武器……虽然这王国恐怕撑不久了。<page>既然醒了又时日无多，要不要来练练手？让我这老师傅最后教你两招？
translated_text: 太无礼了！唤醒一位公主！<page>如果你继续这种傲慢的态度，你很可能很快就会陷入麻烦！<hpage>我惊奇地发现在这么荒凉的地方昆虫还活着。你是在这片土地上学习的士兵吗？<page>是的！女诗人！你的针可能很适合你，但别针是法罗光荣的武器，至少是.我真的开始觉得法鲁已经离开不久了。<page>好吧，考虑到我现在醒了，时间突然很短，也许你想接受一点训练？也许这位老师傅也能教你一两件事？
secondary_translated_text: How rude! Wake up a princess!<page>If you continue with this arrogant attitude, you are likely to get into trouble soon!<hpage>I was surprised to find that insects were still alive in such a desolate place. Are you a soldier studying in this land?<page>Yes! Poetess! Your needle may suit you well, but the pin is Farrow's glorious weapon, or at least. I'm really starting to feel that Faro hasn't been gone long.<page>Well, considering that I'm awake now and the time is suddenly short, maybe you want to get a little training? Maybe this old master can teach you one or two things?

original_en_text: Off with you now, needle bug. I’ve respect for you and your sharp blade, but my hospitality shouldn’t be abused.
original_zh_text: 走吧！我敬重你和你的利刃，但别滥用我的善意。
translated_text: 现在就走吧，针线虫。我尊重你和你的利刃，但我的热情好客不应被滥用。
secondary_translated_text: Let's go now, needle worm. I respect you and your sharp blade, but my hospitality should not be abused.

original_en_text: Dunno if you’ve heard it, needle bug, but supposedly there’s a gleaming secret hidden at this mountain’s core.<page>Meant to be a marvel, or so my sisters past once told, a giant cavern all of crystal.<hpage>I have visited the core, Pinstress. It was a remarkable site indeed. I only hope that it shall not soon be lost.<page>Course you’ve seen it! Master at the blade and at the seeking. You’ve proven yourself an imposing talent. <page>Well, given you seem done up here, maybe it’s time you get back to your all important business?
original_zh_text: 你听说过吗？山脉核心处藏着一份闪亮的秘密。<page>据前辈说是个水晶巨洞奇观。<hpage>我去过那，确实是奇观。希望它不会很快消失。<page>你果然去过！看来你找东西的本事和打架一样好。<page>既然这里的事忙完了，你该去忙正事了吧？
translated_text: 不知道你听说过没有，针虫，据说这座山的核心隐藏着一个闪亮的秘密。<page>至少我的姐妹们以前是这么说的。这应该是一个奇迹，一个充满水晶的巨大洞穴。<hpage>公主，我已经参观过核心了。这确实是一个非凡的地点。我只是希望它不要很快丢失。<page>你当然有！精通剑与搜索。你已经证明了你的才华。<page>好吧，考虑到你在这里似乎已经完成了，也许是时候回到你最重要的事情上了？
secondary_translated_text: I don't know if you've heard of it, needle worm, but it is said that the core of this mountain hides a shining secret.<page>At least that's what my sisters used to say. This should be a miracle, a huge cave filled with crystals.<hpage>Princess, I've already visited the core. This is indeed an extraordinary location. I just hope it doesn't get lost soon.<page>Of course you do! Proficient in sword and search. You have proven your talent.<page>Well, considering that you seem to be done here, maybe it's time to get back to your most important thing?

original_en_text: <page>But the seer knows nothing! Nothing of the pain. All small Sula’s to bear... To watch, watch these lands dying, slow, the bugs suffering, falling, while our shell sustains...<page>The steelhearts feel so little... but we forced to serve, we endure it all. We alone. Why?<hpage>...Others may know that pain, small bug... Or at least something similar.<page>So will you chain me again? Herd me by point of your blade, and knowingly return me to that pain?<hpage>...I will not. I will inform the child of steel of what has transpired here, but I cannot force any bug to return to a task so cruel.<page>Then, then... Sula is free? At least to run? By your mercy, bug, these legs must move, quick, quick and far, far!
original_zh_text: <page>但先知不懂痛苦！苏拉独自承受……看着大地衰亡……虫民受苦……<page>钢铁之心没有痛觉……而我们独自承受一切……为什么？<hpage>……会有其他虫了解这份痛的，小虫……或类似的苦楚。<page>你要再次禁锢我吗？用针刃逼我回到那里？<hpage>……我不会。我会告知钢铁之子真相，但不会强迫任何虫回去受苦。<page>那么……苏拉自由了？至少能逃亡？谢谢你的慈悲！我要快逃，越远越好！
translated_text: <page>但先知什么都不知道！没有疼痛。所有小苏拉都必须忍受……看着，看着这些土地慢慢消亡，昆虫受苦并坠落，而我们的贝壳却在维持..<page>钢之心的感觉如此之少……但我们被迫服役，我们忍受了。我们是孤独的。为什么？<hpage>...其他人可能知道疼痛、虫子……或者至少是类似的东西。<page>所以你会再次把我关起来吗？你用你的刀赶走我，故意让我承受那种痛苦吗？<hpage>...我不会的我会告诉钢铁之子这里发生的事情，但我不能强迫任何虫子回到如此残酷的任务中。<page>然后，然后。苏拉自由了？我们至少应该跑吗？可怜的虫子，这些腿必须动，快，远，远！
secondary_translated_text: <page>But the prophet knows nothing! No pain. All little Sulas have to endure... watching, watching these lands slowly die away, the insects suffer and fall, while our shells survive..<page>There was so little feeling at Steel Heart... but we were forced to serve and we endured it. We are alone. Why?<hpage>... Others may know about pain, bugs... or at least something like that.<page>So you'll lock me up again? Did you use your knife to drive me away and deliberately make me suffer that kind of pain?<hpage>... I won't. I'll tell the Sons of Steel what happened here, but I can't force any bug back to such a cruel mission.<page>Then, then. Sulla is free? Should we at least run? Poor bug, these legs must move, fast, far, far!

original_en_text: Zi must watch, record... and wait... Always she is true to her function... Ore-bound... To duty.
original_zh_text: 梓必须观察、记录……等待……恪守职责。
translated_text: 紫色必须观看、记录……等等她总是忠于自己的职责……矿藏...职守
secondary_translated_text: Purple must be watched, recorded... etc. She is always true to her duties... mineral deposits... their duties

original_en_text: A mighty battle we had, my friend... Time now you get to your all important business. I’ll be wishing for your success.
original_zh_text: 真是场激战啊朋友……快去忙你的事吧。祝你成功。
translated_text: 我的朋友，我们经历了一场激烈的战斗。现在是时候开始照顾你所有重要的事情了。祝你成功。
secondary_translated_text: My friends, we have been in a fierce battle. Now is the time to start taking care of all your important things. I wish you success.

original_en_text: ...Creature, higher... Its meeting. Zi’s awakening... It is not chance... It has been sent to Zi, yes? By Masters served?... To retrieve her vassal lost?
original_zh_text: ……上位者，相遇……梓苏醒……并非偶然……是主人派你来？……回收失联仆从？
translated_text: ...生物学，高等.正在开会。紫色的觉醒.这并非偶然。已经发给紫了吧？由大师服务？收复失地的附庸？
secondary_translated_text: ... Biology, Advanced. A meeting is underway. Purple awakening. This is no accident. It has been sent to Zi, right? Served by a master? A vassal who recovers lost territory?

original_en_text: <hpage>Pinstress, why do you choose to live amidst these storm-swept caverns? Surely there are more hospitable places?<page>Somewhere gentler? Warmer? I’d only go soft! How else is one expected to maintain their wits?<hpage>Then this is not a place of hiding? That Citadel up top seems no friend to the free, or the strong who’d choose to remain apart.<page>...Aye. Well, yes. That too’s a reason, though one that shames me some.<page>Our grand Citadel learnt well from the training of Pinstresses past. Then it went and turned those teachings upon us!<page>Despite our superior skills, our numbers have always been few, and their strength overwhelmed.<page>Of my once revered order, only two of us remain, wormed away in Pharloom’s forgotten corners, and my pin-sibling, she’s lost herself to more peaceable pursuits.
original_zh_text: <hpage>针姬，为何要住在风暴肆虐的洞窟？没有更舒适的地方吗？<page>更舒适？更温暖？那样只会让我变迟钝！<hpage>难道是在躲避什么？圣堡似乎容不下自由的强者。<page>……确实有这个原因，说来惭愧。<page>从前圣堡向我们讨教技艺，学成后却反过来对付我们！<page>我们虽然技艺高超，但终究寡不敌众。<page>曾经备受尊崇的教团，如今只剩两个。我躲在这遗忘角落，另一位更是彻底放弃了战斗。
translated_text: <hpage>公主，您为什么选择住在这些饱受风暴蹂躏的洞穴里？当然，还有更好客的地方吗？<page>去更温和的地方吗？热身？我只会变得软弱！否则，一个人怎么能保持智慧呢？<hpage>这不是藏身之处吗？上面的城堡似乎并不是选择保持分离的自由者或强者的朋友。<page>...是啊呃是的这也是一个原因，尽管这让我中的一些人感到羞耻。<page>我们宏伟的城堡从过去女演员的训练中吸取了教训。然后它把这些教义强加给我们！<page>尽管我们的技术精湛，但我们的人数一直很少，实力难以承受。<page>在我曾经崇敬的命令中，只剩下我们两个人，在法勒姆被遗忘的角落里蠕动，而我的别针哥哥姐姐，她却迷失在一种更和平的追求中。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Princess, why did you choose to live in these storm-torn caves? Of course, is there a more hospitable place?<page>Go somewhere more gentle? Warm up? I will only become weak! Otherwise, how can a person remain wise?<hpage>Isn't this a hiding place? The castle above does not seem to be a friend of the freers or the strong who choose to remain separated.<page>... Yeah, uh, yeah, that's a reason, even though it makes some of us feel ashamed.<page>Our majestic castle has learned from past training as actresses. Then it imposes these teachings on us!<page>Despite our superb skills, our numbers have always been small and our strength is unbearable.<page>In the command I once revered, we were left alone, wriggling in the forgotten corner of Farham, while my pin brother and sister, she was lost in a more peaceful pursuit.

original_en_text: <hpage>I cannot yet leave this land. Until I slay its source, this kingdom’s hunger for me will never abate.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我还不能离开。只要源头尚存，这国度对我的渴求不会消退。
translated_text: <hpage>我还不能离开这片土地。这个王国对我的渴望永远不会减弱，除非我杀死它的源泉。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I cannot leave this land yet. This kingdom's desire for me will never diminish unless I kill its source.

original_en_text: Pale It... You would reject the role? Are you not tamed, bound, by Masters?... You would know... obedience is essential.<page>Recall, the fate of those who defy... Even you higher... Especially you higher...<page>...Compression... We have suffered it. We would never wish it upon another.
original_zh_text: 苍白者……你要违抗？你未被主宰驯服？……你该明白服从的重要性。<page>想想违抗者的下场……即便是上位者……尤其是上位者……<page>……压缩之苦……我们经历过……不愿它降临他者。
translated_text: 苍白.你会拒绝这个角色吗？你没有被大师驯服和束缚吗？.你就会知道的。服从至关重要。<page>回想那些抵抗者的命运。即使你更高。尤其是如果你更高的话。<page>...压缩的.我们受够了。我们不希望其他人遭受同样的痛苦。
secondary_translated_text: pale. Would you refuse the role? Haven't you been tamed and bound by a master?. You'll know. Obedience is crucial.<page>Think back on the fate of those who resisted. Even if you are taller. Especially if you are taller.<page>... compressed. We've had enough. We don't want others to suffer the same pain.

original_en_text: Ahh, is your needle too shy to show its edge? What a shame.
original_zh_text: 呵，你的针不敢出鞘吗？真没劲。
translated_text: 啊，你的针羞于露出刀刃吗？可惜
secondary_translated_text: Ah, is your needle ashamed to show its blade? unfortunately

original_en_text: Even my welcome has limits, needle bug.<page>I’ve become well accustomed to solitude, and it’s unnerving to play host to your strange strength overlong.
original_zh_text: 我的耐心有限。<page>独居惯了，你这种异常存在让我不安。
translated_text: 就连我的欢迎也是有限度的，针虫。<page>我已经习惯了孤独，长期接待你的奇怪力量令人不安。
secondary_translated_text: Even my welcome has limits, needle worm.<page>I am used to loneliness, and the strange power of receiving you for a long time is disturbing.

original_en_text: Planning to hang about are you, needle bug?<page>Fancy a little training? Care to test the power of a Pinstress? Might be even this old master could show you a thing or two?
original_zh_text: 暂时不打算走吗？<page>那要不要来场训练，试试刺针的威力？说不定我这老师傅还能教你两招？
translated_text: 你打算出去玩吗，针线虫？<page>想接受点训练吗？想测试女巫的力量吗？也许这位老师傅也能教你一两件事？
secondary_translated_text: Are you going out to play, needle worm?<page>Want to get some training? Want to test the power of a witch? Maybe this old master can teach you one or two things?

original_en_text: Having second thoughts on our bout, needle bug? Good! I’ll not hold back my blade, and I’ll expect the same from you.
original_zh_text: 回心转意了？很好！我不会手下留情，希望你也一样！
translated_text: 你重新考虑过我们的约会了吗，针线虫？好！我不会放弃我的剑，我希望你也这样做。
secondary_translated_text: Have you reconsidered our date, needle worm? Good! I will not give up my sword, and I hope you will do the same.

original_en_text: ...Bug... Higher... It has come seeking... Zi is found... She is awoken.<hpage>Greetings, child of steel. I have known your type, in past. From your presence, it is clear this land too has caught the long gaze of your Masters.<page>Masters... Yes... For them, Zi observes... obedient... always...<page>And you... a creature in half... Pale It... Bug It... old... stubborn... alone... You too are observed.
original_zh_text: ……虫……上位者……它来寻找……梓被发现了……她苏醒了。<hpage>钢铁之子，我见过你的同类。你的到来说明你的主人已将目光投向此地。<page>主人……是的……梓侍奉他们……永远服从……<page>而你……半身者……苍白者……虫身者……古老……固执……独行……你也被注视着。
translated_text: ...虫子更高.它来寻找。孩子找到了。她醒了。<hpage>你好，钢铁之子。我以前就知道你的类型。从你的存在来看，显然这片土地也引起了你主人的长期关注。<page>主人.是的...齐观察到，对于他们来说。要听话。总是...<page>而你...一个半生物。苍白.装上窃听器老...固执了一个人...你也在被观察。
secondary_translated_text: ... Bugs are taller. It comes looking for. The child was found. She woke up.<hpage>Hello, son of steel. I knew your type before. Judging from your existence, it is clear that this land has also attracted the long-term attention of your owner.<page>master. Yes... Qi observed that for them. Be obedient. Always...<page>And you... A semi-creature. pale. Put a bug on the old... I am stubborn and stubborn. You are also being observed.

original_en_text: ...Creature, higher... Its meeting, Zi’s awakening... It is not chance... It has been sent, by Masters served?... To retrieve her vassal lost?<page>But no... pale It cannot.. First, a chart is needed. Pale It must acquire one. Only then can Zi provide the marks... Their vassal’s location sensed strong.
original_zh_text: ……上位者，相遇……梓苏醒……并非偶然……是主人派你来？……回收失联仆从？<page>不……苍白者……须先有地图……梓才能标记其方位……仆从感知强烈。
translated_text: ...生物，更高……它的遭遇，姿的觉醒这并非偶然。已经寄了，师傅送来了吗？收复失地的附庸？<page>但不。苍白的它不能..首先，你需要一张图表。苍白的它必须得到一个。紫色提供标记的唯一方法.他们的附庸地位让人感觉很强大。
secondary_translated_text: ... The creature, higher... What it encountered and Zi's awakening were no accident. It has already been sent. Has the master delivered it? A vassal who recovers lost territory?<page>But no. It is pale and cannot.. First, you need a chart. Pale it must get one. Purple provides the only way to mark. Their vassal status makes people feel powerful.

original_en_text: <hpage>Zi, your vassal is gone, alive, fled beyond these lands.<hpage>I chose to allow their escape, even if your wish may not be granted.<page>The wish? No... pale It... Zi sensed clear your meeting... The rite... The vassal is tarnished. They have touched the dark. By the Masters, they will now be hunted... no matter the distance fled.<hpage>Perhaps, for your vassal, that is preferable? Waste here in servitude or flee free. They made their choice, and proclaimed it clear by their black action.<hpage>Their dark champion is slain, but luck or guile may yet see them survive.<page>Hope!.. Pale It... For a vassal who defies the Masters?... You give Zi a thought, complex...<page>The outcome is different... and Zi must now observe alone... but this may be the better way?<page>Zi shall accept the happening... shall pray the Masters still see her loyal... and Zi too will share the hope... that her vassal lives long unbound.
original_zh_text: <hpage>梓，你的仆从已叛逃出境。<hpage>我选择放他们走，即使这样会违背你的愿望。<page>愿望？不……苍白者……梓很清楚……仪式……仆从已玷污，触及黑暗……逃不过主人追猎。<hpage>或许他们觉得这样更好？与其在奴役中腐朽不如自由逃亡。<hpage>其黑暗眷属已除，但或许能凭机遇存活。<page>希望？……苍白者……给背叛主人的仆从？……这想法……令梓困惑……<page>结果不同……梓将独自观察……或许这是更好结局？<page>梓将接受现实……祈祷主人知晓梓忠诚……但梓也希望……她的仆从能自由活着。
translated_text: <hpage>齐，你的附庸们都活着离开了，逃到了这些土地之外。<hpage>我选择允许他们逃跑，即使你的愿望可能无法实现。<page>愿望？不。它很苍白。紫明显感觉到你们的见面……仪式封臣已被玷污。他们触摸了黑暗。无论逃多远，都会被大师们追捕。<hpage>也许，对于你的附庸来说，这更好？在这里享受或自由逃脱。他们做出了自己的选择，并通过黑色的行动表明了这一点。<hpage>他们的黑暗战士被杀了，但运气或诡计可能会让他们活下来。<page>希望！..苍白.对于一个反抗主人的附庸来说，你给了他一个想法，很复杂……<page>结果有所不同。紫色现在必须独自观察。但这是一个更好的方法吗？<page>儿子会接受所发生的事情。祈祷大师们还能看到她的忠诚。紫色也会分享希望。她的附庸长期没有受到约束。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Qi, your vassals all left alive and fled outside these lands.<hpage>I choose to allow them to escape, even if your wishes may not be realized.<page>Wish? No. It's very pale. Zi clearly felt that your meeting... the ceremonial vassals had been tarnished. They touched the darkness. No matter how far he fled, he would be hunted down by the masters.<hpage>Perhaps, for your vassals, this is better? Enjoy here or escape freely. They made their choice and made it clear through black actions.<hpage>Their dark warriors are killed, but luck or trickery may keep them alive.<page>Hope!.. pale. For a vassal who resisted his master, you gave him an idea, which was very complicated...<page>The results are different. Purple must now be observed alone. But is this a better approach?<page>The son will accept what happened. Pray that the masters can still see her loyalty. Purple also shares hope. Her vassals have long been unchecked.

original_en_text: For your talents, needle bug, in blade and strength... and restraint, take this emblem of my order.<page>Hadn’t ever thought another’d be joining our slim ranks, but you’re as deserving a member as’s ever come before.
original_zh_text: 为你的武艺、觉悟……和克制，收下我们教团的徽章吧。<page>没想到还会有新成员加入，但你当之无愧。
translated_text: 为了你的才华，针虫，在刀刃和力量上……克制，拿起我命令的徽章。<page>我从未想过有人会加入我们的精英团队，但你比以往任何时候都更值得成为一员。
secondary_translated_text: For your talent, Needlebug, in blade and power…restraint, pick up the badge of my command.<page>I never thought anyone would join our elite team, but you deserve to be a member more than ever.

original_en_text: <hpage>I will not flee. I cannot abandon the kingdom to a collapse of my making.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我不会逃走。不能任由下方王国因我而崩塌。
translated_text: <hpage>我不是要逃跑。我不能因为我的创造而放弃王国。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I'm not running away. I cannot give up the kingdom because of my creation.

original_en_text: Creature, higher... return when a chart is acquired. A chart is needed, essential, to serve the Masters... to aid Zi.
original_zh_text: 上位者……取得地图再来……图是侍奉主人……协助梓的必要之物。
translated_text: 生物学，高等.获取图表并返回。为了为大师赛服务，需要一张图表，而且这也是必不可少的。Helper.
secondary_translated_text: Biology, Advanced. Get the chart and return. In order to serve the Masters, a chart is needed and it is essential. Helper.

original_en_text: Ahh... Shame. Surely battle’d be the better end, no?<page>If not by blade, we’ll just have to accept whatever conclusion this new quaking calamity flings upon our heads.
original_zh_text: 唉……真遗憾。战死本是更好的结局不是吗？<page>既然不能战死，我们就只能接受这黑暗带来的结局了。
translated_text: 啊...不幸的是，这场战斗肯定会是一个更好的结局，不是吗？<page>如果没有刀锋，我们别无选择，只能接受这场新的、令人震惊的灾难降临在我们身上的结论。
secondary_translated_text: Ah... Unfortunately, this battle would definitely have been a better ending, wouldn't it?<page>Without Blade, we would have no choice but to accept the conclusion that this new and shocking disaster has befallen us.

original_en_text: <hpage>Cease your summoning, fool bug!<hpage>Though you may yearn for freedom, that saviour you hope to call will bring only death.
original_zh_text: <hpage>停止召唤，蠢虫！<hpage>即便你渴求自由，那救赎者也只会带来死亡。
translated_text: <hpage>别再打电话了，傻瓜！<hpage>尽管你可能渴望自由，但你希望召唤的救世主只会带来死亡。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Stop calling, fool!<hpage>Although you may long for freedom, the savior you hope to call will only bring death.

original_en_text: It’s a right long time since I’ve felt so vigorous. All those dulled pilgrims are useless for testing my talents.<hpage>Your blade proved an impressive challenge, Pinstress. The strength and skills hidden about this kingdom continue to surprise me.<page>You bear your own strange strengths, needle bug. More I think than you’d be willing to reveal to me.<page>What, I wonder, are you planning to turn all that power towards?
original_zh_text: 好久没这么热血沸腾了！那些呆滞的朝圣者根本不配当陪练。<hpage>你的技艺令我惊叹。这王国暗藏的实力总是出乎意料。<page>你身上带着奇特的力量，用针的。远不止你愿意展示的这些吧？<page>我很好奇，你打算用这力量做些什么？
translated_text: 我已经很久没有感觉如此精力充沛了。所有那些迟钝的朝圣者都无法考验我的才华。<hpage>公主，你的剑是个很大的挑战。这个王国隐藏的力量和技能继续让我感到惊讶。<page>你有你自己的奇怪的力量，针虫。我觉得你不愿意告诉我。<page>我在想，你打算把所有的力量都转移到哪里去？
secondary_translated_text: It's been a long time since I felt so energetic. All those dull pilgrims cannot test my talents.<hpage>Princess, your sword is a big challenge. The hidden powers and skills of this kingdom continue to amaze me.<page>You have your own strange powers, needle worm. I don't think you want to tell me.<page>I was thinking, where are you going to transfer all your power?

original_en_text: No. No. No... My champion slain!<page>Why do you do this, cruel slasher? Why must I stay, and serve, so long, long, long?<hpage>That void must not be called, bug. Not ever. None can control it, though many have tried. <hpage>Any strength you hoped it offered would fast be proven false.<hpage>Consider yourself fortunate I arrived in time. Your shell is saved, all by wish of your steel companion, and fear of her Masters’ punishment.
original_zh_text: 不，不……我的眷属被毁了！<page>你为何如此残忍？为何要我永世为奴？<hpage>虚空不可驾驭，故不可召唤，这是无数血泪换来的教训。<hpage>无论你指望能从它身上获取什么力量，你都会后悔。<hpage>你该庆幸我来得及时。若不是你的钢铁同伴祈愿，你必死无疑。
translated_text: 不我的勇士被杀了<page>你为什么要这么做残忍的杀手为什么我必须留下来服务这么久这么久？<hpage>这个空白一定不能被调用，错误。从来没有虽然很多人都尝试过，但没有人能控制。<hpage>您希望它提供的任何力量很快都会被证明是错误的。<hpage>我及时赶到，你应该很幸运。你的身体得救了，这一切都是因为你钢铁搭档的愿望和对主人惩罚的恐惧。
secondary_translated_text: No, my warrior was killed.<page>Why do you do this, cruel killer? Why do I have to stay and serve for so long?<hpage>This blank must not be called, error. Never. Although many people have tried, no one can control it.<hpage>Any power you hope it provides will soon be proven wrong.<hpage>You should be lucky that I got here in time. Your body is saved, all because of the wishes of your steel partner and fear of punishment from your master.

original_en_text: <hpage>If I chose to head beyond, I would abandon Pharloom to a collapse of my making.<hpage>While I live, and still possess the strength to act, I will not allow that end to come to pass.
original_zh_text: <hpage>若我选择逃离，下方王国将因我而崩塌。<hpage>只要力气尚存，我绝不容许这样的结局。
translated_text: <hpage>如果我选择超越，我就会放弃法鲁，导致我的职业生涯崩溃。<hpage>当我还活着并且仍然有能力采取行动的时候，我不会允许这种结局发生。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>If I choose to surpass, I will give up on Faro and cause my career to collapse.<hpage>I will not allow this to happen while I am alive and still capable of taking action.

original_en_text: Dunno if you’ve heard it, needle bug, but supposedly there’s a gleaming secret hidden at this mountain’s core.<page>Meant to be a marvel, or so my sisters past once told, a giant cavern all of crystal.<page>If you’re hanging around these heights, and time’s allowing, maybe you’ll get to seeking it?<page>Course you’d first have to find the entrance, but you’ve certainly shown the skills to wriggle up in there, provided you’re so inclined.
original_zh_text: 你听说过吗？山脉核心处藏着一份闪亮的秘密。<page>据前辈说是个水晶巨洞奇观。<page>要是有时间不妨去找找？<page>当然得先找到入口，不过以你的身手肯定没问题。
translated_text: 不知道你听说过没有，针虫，据说这座山的核心隐藏着一个闪亮的秘密。<page>至少我的姐妹们以前是这么说的。这应该是一个奇迹，一个充满水晶的巨大洞穴。<page>如果你在这些高度盘旋，时间允许，也许你会寻找它？<page>当然，你必须先找到入口，但如果你愿意的话，你肯定已经展示了在那里蠕动的技巧。
secondary_translated_text: I don't know if you've heard of it, needle worm, but it is said that the core of this mountain hides a shining secret.<page>At least that's what my sisters used to say. This should be a miracle, a huge cave filled with crystals.<page>If you were circling at these altitudes, time permitting, maybe you would look for it?<page>Of course, you have to find the entrance first, but if you want to, you have definitely demonstrated the skill of squirming there.

original_en_text: <page>A small gift for you, pale It... for the thought, complex... rock of the home spear... and of Zi’s birth. May it aid your further action in this land.
original_zh_text: <page>苍白者，赠礼……为感谢你给的希望……梓诞生故土的岩石……愿它助你在此地的行动。
translated_text: <page>给你的一份小礼物，让它黯然失色。为了思想，为了复杂性。家园长矛的岩石。以及儿子的出生。愿它帮助您在这片土地上采取进一步行动。
secondary_translated_text: <page>A little gift for you makes it overshadowed. For thought, for complexity. Rock of home spear. And the birth of his son. May it help you take further action in this land.

original_en_text: Off with you now, needle bug! A Pinstress of my substantial talent requires their deep meditation, especially after such a satisfying bout.<hpage>Goodbye, Pinstress. May your blade remain sharp.
original_zh_text: 走吧！针姬需要继续冥想——激烈战斗后更需要静修。<hpage>再会，愿你的锋芒永不褪色。
translated_text: 现在就离开这里，笨蛋！像我这样才华横溢的女歌手需要深入的冥想，尤其是在经历了如此令人满意的比赛之后。<hpage>再见，公主。愿你的刀刃保持锋利。
secondary_translated_text: Get out of here now, fool! A talented female singer like me needs deep meditation, especially after such a satisfying competition.<hpage>Goodbye, princess. May your blade remain sharp.

original_en_text: Ho, miss! How’s all this then? Lotta dials to be trackin’, but at least the controls seem in good order.<page>From here, I can guide your bell down, best as any bug.<page><hpage>Then you’ve no prior experience with this type of transport?<page>No one does, miss! Them’s who used to dive’re all long dead, or cursed ta half life. An’ there ain’t no bug left alive’s been brave or stupid enough to try... ‘til now, at least.<page>I’ll work it best’s I can. Can’t do much more, I’m afraid. At least the forgings of these docks were built to last. Now we’s only gotta pray they hold for you.<page>Here’s the key that’ll see you inside its metal belly. Pop in there once you’re feelin’ good and ready. In the meantime, I’ll get to seeing things set up here.
original_zh_text: 嚯，小姐！这玩意儿够复杂的！仪表盘多得数不过来，好在操控装置还算正常。<page>我能在这儿引导潜钟下潜，保准比任何虫子都靠谱。<page><hpage>这么说，你从没操作过这种器械？<page>谁都没这种经验，小姐！以前开潜钟的早死绝了，剩下的也半死不活。活着的虫里，就没有哪个又疯又蠢的敢用这玩意……直到现在。<page>我会尽力而为，但别的可不敢打包票。好在码头造的这家伙够结实，现在只能祈祷它下潜后不会出什么故障。<page>这是这个大铁肚子的钥匙。等你准备好了就钻进去。我这就去把装置整备妥当。
translated_text: 嗬，小姐！那么一切都怎么了？Lotta旋钮正在跟踪，但至少控制看起来很有序。<page>从这里，我可以引导你的铃铛下来，这和任何虫子一样好。<page><hpage>那么您以前没有使用这种交通工具的经验吗？<page>没有人这样做，小姐！那些曾经潜水过的人早已死去，或者被诅咒了半生。没有虫子还活着，我足够勇敢或足够愚蠢地尝试了。至少到目前为止。<page>我会尽力的。恐怕我无能为力。至少这些码头的锻造是耐用的。现在我们只需要祈祷他们支持你。<page>这是让你进入它金属肚子的钥匙。一旦你感觉良好并准备好，就去那里。与此同时，我会在这里看到一切。
secondary_translated_text: Ho, miss! So what happened to everything? The Lotta knob is tracking, but at least the controls seem orderly.<page>From here, I can guide your bell down, which is as good as any bug.<page><hpage>So do you have no experience in using this type of transportation before?<page>No one does that, miss! Those who have ever diving have long died or been cursed for half their lives. No bugs were still alive, and I was brave enough or foolish enough to try. At least so far.<page>I will do my best. I'm afraid there's nothing I can do. At least the forges of these docks are durable. Now we just need to pray that they support you.<page>This is the key that gets you into its metal belly. Once you feel good and ready, go there. In the meantime, I will see everything here.

original_en_text: <hpage>Forge Daughter, I have acquired a power that will enable me to end this black madness. Soon I will act to stop the quakes and save this land.<page>Excellent, pointy bug. Your drive, and your vigour, both have proven surprisingly large for one so small.<page>Know we have heard from Ballow, who told of his repair efforts upon the diving bell below. By now, that task is likely completed.<page>If you are hoping to put his work to the test, then we shall wish again on your survival. And if our own service can aid your critical task, know we will continue to provide it gladly.
original_zh_text: <hpage>熔炉之女，我已获取终结这场黑灾所需的力量。终结动荡、拯救这片地区就在此一举。<page>啧，好家伙！小尖头虫，没想到你个头不大，魄力和干劲倒是真不小。<page>听巴洛说，他底下那口老破钟修得差不多了。这会儿多半已经完工。<page>想试试那家伙的成果？那咱还得再一次祝你好运。要是咱这熔炉里的功夫能帮上忙，甭客气，照旧伺候着！
translated_text: <hpage>锻造了我的女儿，我获得了结束这种黑色疯狂的力量。很快我就会采取行动阻止地震并拯救土地。<page>很棒的、尖头的错误。事实证明，对于这么小的一个人来说，你的干劲和活力却出奇地大。<page>得知我们收到了巴洛的一封信后，他在下面讲述了他对潜水钟的修复工作。到目前为止，这项任务可能已经完成。<page>如果您想测试他的工作，那么我们将再次祝愿您生存。如果我们自己的服务可以帮助您完成关键任务，请知道我们将继续乐意提供这些服务。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Forging my daughter, I gained the power to end this black madness. Soon I will take action to stop the earthquake and save the land.<page>Great, pointed mistake. It turns out that for such a small person, your drive and vitality are surprisingly great.<page>After learning that we had received a letter from Barlow, he described below his work on restoring the diving bell. So far, this task may have been completed.<page>If you want to test his work, then again we will wish you survival. If our own services can help you complete critical tasks, please know that we will continue to be happy to provide them.

original_en_text: Erm, you may notice your prize there is a little light, my lady...<page>Awful truth is, you’ve cleaned us out. We’ve not a single measly rosary left between us. Turns out we were just no match for you!<hpage>It was a game fairly played, sir, though I’ve no wish to see you destitute. Would you like to make another kind of wager, perhaps?
original_zh_text: 呃，您可能会觉得这次的奖品有点寒酸，女士……<page>实话说，您把我们家底都赢光了。半颗念珠都不剩！我们根本不是您对手！<hpage>先生，游戏确实公平公正，但我也不想见你倾家荡产。要不要换个赌注？
translated_text: 嗯，你可能注意到你的奖品有点闪闪发光，小姐。<page>可怕的事实是，你把我们掏空了。我们之间不再有微不足道的念珠了。所以我们根本不是你的对手！<hpage>先生，这是一场公平的游戏，尽管我不想看到你身无分文。也许你想再赌一把？
secondary_translated_text: Well, you may have noticed that your prize is a little sparkly, miss.<page>The terrible truth is, you emptied us out. There are no more insignificant rosary beads between us. So we are no match for you at all!<hpage>Sir, this is a fair game, although I hate to see you broke. Maybe you want to gamble again?

original_en_text: Grfff... So it’s gotten that bad, aye? I guess... If that’s how it is, I’ll be your bug.<page>Meet me below, at the diving bell. We’ll see if I can get you ready for the drop.
original_zh_text: <page>嘶……已经糟到这地步了？行吧……如果真是这样，那我帮你。<page>去潜钟底下碰头，我看能不能给你整备好。
translated_text: Griff.所以事情变得如此糟糕，是吗？我想...如果是的话，我就是你的虫子。<page>在下面的潜水钟处等我。看看我能不能帮你准备好空投
secondary_translated_text: Griff. So things got so bad, huh? I think... If I am, I am your bug.<page>Wait for me below at the diving bell. See if I can help you get the airdrop ready.

original_en_text: Holler when you’re ready, miss. The upgrades are done. That bell’s as ready as it’ll ever be.
original_zh_text: 准备好了就喊我一声，小姐。升级已经完成，这只潜钟现在状态绝佳。
translated_text: 准备好了就大喊吧，小姐。升级完成。铃声准备好了。
secondary_translated_text: Shout when you're ready, miss. Upgrade complete. The bell is ready.

original_en_text: Ahhh... Can you feel it yet? All your troubles dripping away...
original_zh_text: 啊哈……感觉到了吗？烦心事都在随着汗液滴落……
translated_text: 啊...你感觉到了吗？你所有的麻烦都在滴水……
secondary_translated_text: Ah... Do you feel it? All your troubles are dripping...

original_en_text: The deposits around here, those long-burning rocks. They’re useful to the Citadel, in whatever their shadowy business, but useless if you require tools of us!<page>We need finer material. Rare metal. Pharloom would provide a bounty to the able explorer. Find us some, and we’ll build your violent aids.
original_zh_text: 储备在附近的长效燃烧石？圣堡那帮虫子拿去搞些见不得虫的勾当倒合适，对我们来说屁用没有！<page>去找些更好、更稀有的金属！只要你有本事，纺络遍地都是是宝贝。找着了，我们就有办法给你造那些家伙什。
translated_text: 这里周围的沉积物，燃烧了很长时间的岩石。它们对城堡很有用，无论是在他们的秘密生意中，但如果你需要我们的工具，它们就没用了！<page>我们需要更好的材料。稀有金属法鲁姆将为有能力的探险家提供奖励。为我们找到一些，我们将为您提供暴力援助。
secondary_translated_text: The sediments around here, the rocks that have been burning for a long time. They are useful to the castle, whether it's in their secret business, but if you need our tools, they're useless!<page>We need better materials. The rare metal Farum will provide rewards for capable explorers. Find some for us and we will provide you with violence assistance.

original_en_text: Ola, ola! Our lady has missed her mark, and so thusly ends our challenge!
original_zh_text: 哎哎！这位女士脱靶了，挑战结束！
translated_text: 奥拉，奥拉！我们的女士错过了目标，所以我们的挑战结束了！
secondary_translated_text: Ola, Ola! Our lady missed the goal, so our challenge is over!

original_en_text: My lady, I pray you reconsider! T’would be an honour to see those strong limbs of yours in action, truly!
original_zh_text: 女士，再考虑考虑吧！要是能见识到您矫健的风姿，定会是我们的荣幸！
translated_text: 女士，我祈祷您重新考虑一下！看到你强壮的四肢在行动，真是非常荣幸！
secondary_translated_text: Ma 'am, I pray you will reconsider! It is a great honor to see your strong limbs in action!

original_en_text: A respectable enough effort, truly. You didn’t earn enough rosaries to make a profit off us, but that should only spur you on to try again!
original_zh_text: 表现非常不错！虽然赚的念珠还不够回本，或许正好能激励您再试一次！
translated_text: 事实上，这是一项值得尊敬的努力。您还没有赚到足够的念珠来从我们那里获利，但这只会激励您再试一次！
secondary_translated_text: In fact, this is a respectable effort. You haven't earned enough rosary beads to profit from us yet, but this will only inspire you to try again!

original_en_text: An old diving bell. Its door is shut tight by an ornate clamp.
original_zh_text: 一具古旧的潜钟，钟门被一只华丽的夹钳紧紧锁闭。
translated_text: 古老的潜水钟。它的门被一个华丽的夹子紧紧地关上。
secondary_translated_text: Ancient diving bell. Its door was closed tightly with a gorgeous clip.

original_en_text: The diving bell’ll be ready again soon, miss. Once this new shield-shell is fitted, it’ll surely withstand the drop!.. Surely!
original_zh_text: 潜钟很快就能再用，小姐。新护壳装好后绝对能扛住下坠！绝对！
translated_text: 潜水钟很快就会再次准备好，小姐。一旦新盾牌安装好，它就能承受坠落！..当然！
secondary_translated_text: The diving bell will be ready again soon, miss. Once the new shield is installed, it can withstand the fall!.. Of course!

translated_text: ...路径。阿诺德美联社。呃... epair。奥利.. iss.
secondary_translated_text: ... path. Arnold Associated Press. Uh... epair。Ollie.. iss.

original_en_text: Ola, ola, time to play! Take these straight pins and strike the target when you see it!
original_zh_text: 哎哎，游戏要开始咯！拿好这些掷针，见靶就扎！
translated_text: 奥拉，奥拉，比赛时间到了！当你看到目标时，拿起这些直钉子并击中它！
secondary_translated_text: Ola, Ola, it's game time! When you see the target, pick up these straight nails and hit it!

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I require a moment. Please unlock the bell for me.<page>Aye. Can do, miss. Hail me again when you’re ready to travel.
original_zh_text: <hpage>巴洛先生，我还需要点时间。麻烦打开钟门。<page>没问题，小姐。等您准备妥当了，再喊我一声就行。
translated_text: <hpage>先生，我需要一些时间。请帮我打开门铃。<page>是的，你可以的，小姐。当你准备好旅行时，请再次为我欢呼。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Sir, I need some time. Please open the doorbell for me.<page>Yes, you can, miss. Please cheer for me again when you are ready to travel.

original_en_text: Here to sweat away your sorrows, miss? The steam does wonders for a mind set sullen, or a shell gone stiff.<hpage>I’ve found these lowlands hot enough already, and mine is a shell more resilient than most.<hpage>To challenge that further seems a unique sort of madness.<page>Aye, well, this is Pharloom, miss! Madness is catching. I’d say this here’s the smallest form of it.
original_zh_text: 有烦心事吗，小姐？来蒸桑拿吧，蒸汽对郁结的心绪或僵硬的甲壳有奇效。<hpage>我倒觉得这里已经够热了，何况我这副甲壳比多数虫子都硬实。<hpage>热上加热，怕不是疯得别致。<page>哎，这儿可是纺络，小姐！疯病是会传染的。要我说，在这蒸桑拿算最轻的症状了。
translated_text: 小姐，您是来出汗解忧的吗？蒸汽对于抑郁的人或僵硬的外壳来说有很好的效果。<hpage>我发现这些低地足够热，而且我的贝壳比大多数地方都更有弹性。<hpage>进一步挑战这一点似乎是一种独特的疯狂。<page>是的，好吧，这是法罗，小姐！疯狂正在吸引人们。我想说这是它最小的形式。
secondary_translated_text: Miss, are you here to sweat? Steam works well for depressed people or stiff shells.<hpage>I found that these lowlands were hot enough, and my shells were more elastic than most places.<hpage>Challenging this further seems a unique madness.<page>Yes, well, this is Farrow, miss! Madness is attracting people. I would say this is its smallest form.

original_en_text: What an honour it was to play with you, my lady! I hope you’ll think of us whenever you feel those rosaries rattling around in your pockets.
original_zh_text: 与您同乐实乃荣幸！希望您摸着兜里的念珠时能想起我们。
translated_text: 能和你一起玩真是荣幸，我的女士！我希望你每次感觉到口袋里的念珠嘎嘎作响时都会想到我们。
secondary_translated_text: It's an honor to play with you, my lady! I hope you think of us every time you feel the rosary rattling in your pocket.

original_en_text: There is no choice! Not for us. We cannot leave, not ever. We are a Forge Daughter, fixed to this forge and its service. Ours is a duty lifetime bound.
original_zh_text: 没得选！从来就没得选。咱是熔炉之女，生来就和这熔炉缔结了契约。使命在身，至死方休。
translated_text: 别无选择！不适合我们。我们不能离开，永远不会离开。我们正在锻造女儿，并致力于这家锻造工厂及其服务。我们的责任是终身的。
secondary_translated_text: No choice! Not for us. We cannot leave, we will never leave. We are forging our daughter and are committed to this forging factory and its services. Our responsibility is lifelong.

original_en_text: If you’re planning passage below, Ballow’s the one to assist you. We must remain by the forge, always.
original_zh_text: 若想下潜，去找巴洛帮忙。咱得永远守着熔炉。
translated_text: 如果你打算从下面传球，巴洛就是协助你的人。我们必须永远留在铁匠铺里。
secondary_translated_text: If you plan to pass from below, Barlow is the one who assists you. We must stay in the blacksmith forever.

original_en_text: Oh! Pointy bug, why do you bother us at our work? The world cracks and quakes to some grave new calamity, surely you should seek somewhere safer?<hpage>As far as I might flee, I suspect no such place exists, and in any case, I would not see this land’s bugs abandoned to their end.<hpage>What of you? Why do you choose to remain so diligent at your task, given the fell state of your lands?
original_zh_text: 哟！小尖头虫，干嘛打扰咱干活？外面又闹起什么灾祸，搞得地动山摇，你该找个安全地儿躲躲才对啊？<hpage>恐怕无论逃到哪里，都无处可避。更何况，我不愿抛下此地生灵，让它们无力地面对终结来临。<hpage>你们呢？既然明白此地危在旦夕，为何还要死守这熔炉？
translated_text: 噢！尖锐的虫子，你为什么打扰我们的工作？世界正在破裂和地震，引发一些严重的新灾难，你确定你应该寻找一个更安全的地方吗？<hpage>只要我能逃，我怀疑根本没有这样的地方，而且无论如何，我都不会看到这片土地上的昆虫被遗弃到最后。<hpage>你呢？考虑到你的土地正在衰落，为什么你选择如此勤奋地工作来完成你的任务？
secondary_translated_text: Oh! Sharp bug, why are you disturbing our work? The world is rupturing and earthquakes, triggering some serious new disasters, are you sure you should look for a safer place?<hpage>As long as I can escape, I suspect there is no such place, and no matter what, I will never see the insects in this land abandoned until the end.<hpage>What about you? Given that your land is declining, why do you choose to work so hard to complete your task?

original_en_text: Oh! Small pointy bug, why do you bother us at our work?<hpage>The sound of your craft called me to investigate. What is your duty here? Are you a smith of some kind?
original_zh_text: 嘿！小尖头虫，干嘛打扰我们干活？<hpage>你们的锻打声引我前来。你们在这儿做些什么？可是铁匠？
translated_text: 噢！小尖头虫子，你为什么打扰我们工作？<hpage>你们船的声音叫我进行调查。您在这里的职责是什么？你是史密斯吗？
secondary_translated_text: Oh! Little pointy bug, why are you disturbing our work?<hpage>The voice of your ship calls me to investigate. What are your responsibilities here? Are you Smith?

original_en_text: Ola, ola, time to play! Take these straight pins and strike the target when you see it!<page>If you can strike the target fifteen times, the prize is yours!
original_zh_text: 哎哎，游戏要开始咯！拿好这些掷针，见靶就扎！<page>击中靶子十五次，奖品就是您的！
translated_text: 奥拉，奥拉，比赛时间到了！当你看到目标时，拿起这些直钉子并击中它！<page>如果您能击中目标15次，奖品就是您的！
secondary_translated_text: Ola, Ola, it's game time! When you see the target, pick up these straight nails and hit it!<page>If you can hit the target 15 times, the prize is yours!

original_en_text: A smith? Hardly so crude! We are Forge Daughter! How can a pointy bug not tell?<page>Ours is the ancient line and honoured role. These docks and lands around are fortunate to have our skills.<hpage>If you are as talented as you suggest, would you lend me your aid? I’ve lacked for my usual tools, and I suspect you could craft fine replacements.<page>Blades and traps, no doubt? We know your type!<hpage>Of sorts, but maybe strange to this land? Some would likely prove fine challenge for your craft.<page>Hmph! Then we’ll construct them. But! You’ll provide the materials, and compensation for our time.
original_zh_text: 铁匠？太掉价了！我们可是熔炉之女！你竟然不认识我们？我们祖传的手艺让整个深坞都沾光！<hpage>若你们的技艺真如你所夸耀那样好，可否帮我个忙？我的一些工具没有了，我想你们应该能打造合用的替代品。<page>要做刺针还是陷阱？你这种客人我见多了！<hpage>有些可能是你没见过的款式，对你们的工艺应该是不小的挑战。<page>哼！那咱就造出来给你看。但材料你得自备，工钱也得结清。
translated_text: 史密斯？没那么粗糙！我们是锻造的女儿！尖头昆虫怎么可能看不出来呢？<page>我们的是一条古老的路线，也是一个光荣的角色。这些码头和周围的土地很幸运拥有我们的技能。<hpage>如果你像你说的那么有才华，你会帮助我吗？我缺乏通用工具，而且我怀疑你能否做出好的替代品。<page>毫无疑问，刀锋和陷阱？我们知道你的类型！<hpage>有点，但对这片土地来说也许很奇怪？有些可能会对您的工艺构成巨大挑战。<page>哼！然后我们将建造它们。但是！您将为我们的时间提供材料和补偿。
secondary_translated_text: Smith? It's not that rough! We are forged daughters! How could a pointed insect not see it?<page>Ours is an ancient route and a glorious role. These docks and the surrounding land are fortunate to have our skills.<hpage>If you were as talented as you say you are, would you help me? I lack universal tools, and I doubt you can make good replacements.<page>There is no doubt that blade and trap? We know your type!<hpage>A little, but maybe strange for this land? Some may pose a huge challenge to your craft.<page>Hmph! Then we will build them. But! You will provide materials and compensation for our time.

original_en_text: Ola, ola, time to play! Take these straight pins and strike the target when you see it!<page>If you can strike the target twenty-five times, the prize is yours!
original_zh_text: 哎哎，游戏要开始咯！拿好这些掷针，见靶就扎！<page>击中靶子二十五次，奖品就是您的！
translated_text: 奥拉，奥拉，比赛时间到了！当你看到目标时，拿起这些直钉子并击中它！<page>如果您能击中目标25次，奖品就是您的！
secondary_translated_text: Ola, Ola, it's game time! When you see the target, pick up these straight nails and hit it!<page>If you can hit the target 25 times, the prize is yours!

original_en_text: Well, perhaps that’s enough games for now, eh?<page>We’ll need to come up with a much trickier challenge to best you, my lady!
original_zh_text: 好吧，我想就先玩到这里为止？<page>我们得琢磨个更刁钻的挑战才能赢过您，女士！
translated_text: 好吧，也许游戏现在就足够了，哈？<page>我们需要提出一个更困难的挑战来击败你，我的女士！
secondary_translated_text: Well, maybe the game is enough for now, huh?<page>We need to present a more difficult challenge to defeat you, my lady!

original_en_text: This world may not have long, but we shall face its end still delivering our duty.
original_zh_text: 这世界或许时日无多，但咱就算直面末日也要把活干完。
translated_text: 这个世界可能不会很长，但我们仍然会履行我们的责任并面对它的结果。
secondary_translated_text: The world may not last long, but we will still fulfill our responsibilities and face its consequences.

original_en_text: To maintain one’s tools is a constant task. These shards should be kept close when you travel, that you can repair and replenish as the need arises.
original_zh_text: 保养工具需要持之以恒。旅程中应当随身携带这些碎片，以便随时进行修理和补充。
translated_text: 维护工具是一项持续的任务。旅行时将这些物品放在附近，以便您可以根据需要进行维修和补充。
secondary_translated_text: Maintaining tools is an ongoing task. Keep these items nearby while traveling so that you can repair and replenish them as needed.

original_en_text: Pop inside the diving bell once you’re feelin’ good and ready. In the meantime, I’ll get to seeing things set up here.
original_zh_text: 这是这个大铁肚子的钥匙。等你准备好了就钻进去。我这就去把装置整备妥当。
translated_text: 一旦您感觉良好并准备好，请立即跳入潜水钟。与此同时，我会在这里看到一切。
secondary_translated_text: As soon as you feel good and ready, jump into the diving bell immediately. In the meantime, I will see everything here.

original_en_text: A vicious stabbing trap? We can build it. Just know, it disturbs us, these devious implements you conceive to kill.
original_zh_text: 带尖刃的陷阱是吧？能造。但你得知道，我们可不喜欢鼓捣这些阴险的杀戮工具。
translated_text: 恶毒的刺伤陷阱？我们可以建造它。只要知道，它让我们不安，这些狡猾的工具你想杀死。
secondary_translated_text: A vicious stab trap? We can build it. Just know that it makes us uneasy, these cunning tools you want to kill.

original_en_text: Ola, ola! Welcome, my lady, so glad you found us here! I can see you’re blessed with strong limbs and keen sight.<page>Fond of frolics are you? Keen to test your aim? We’d be right honoured to play a little game with you. A little test of skill we’ve set up.<hpage>I’ve no need to test my skills, sir, nor do I have time for frivolities.<page>Oh, but we’d make it worth your while! A prize awaits you, if you can meet our challenge!<hpage>If you offer a prize, that changes matters. I can meet any challenge if the reward is sufficient. What are the rules of your game?<page>Exceedingly simple, my lady! I’ll provide the pins for throwing, and my associate will provide a target. Hit the target fifteen times and you’ll earn yourself a worthy prize!
original_zh_text: 哎哎！欢迎大驾光临！真高兴您找到这儿！一看您就是肢强目锐的虫。<page>喜欢玩游戏吗？要不要来试试准头？我们设计了个小游戏，可以考验您的技巧。<hpage>先生，我无需试炼技艺，更无空闲嬉闹。<page>别呀！奖品丰厚着呢！只要完成挑战，奖品就是您的！<hpage>既然有奖品，倒可以尝试。只要奖励足够丰厚，任何挑战都能接受。游戏规则是什么？<page>简单至极！我将为您提供掷针，我的伙计会提供靶子。击中靶子十五次，奖品就归您了！
translated_text: 奥拉，奥拉！欢迎，我的女士，我很高兴您在这里找到了我们！我看你四肢强壮，视力敏锐。<page>你喜欢玩耍吗？热衷于测试你的目标？我们很荣幸与您一起玩小游戏。我们设置了技能测试。<hpage>我不需要测试我的技能，先生，我也没有时间学习智力。<page>但我们会让它值得的！如果你能接受我们的挑战，奖品等着你！<hpage>如果您提供奖品，情况就会改变。如果奖励足够，我可以接受任何挑战。你的游戏规则是什么？<page>非常简单，我的女士！我会提供投掷用的别针，我的同事会提供目标。击中目标15次，您将为自己赢得宝贵的奖品！
secondary_translated_text: Ola, Ola! Welcome, my lady, I'm so glad you found us here! I see you have strong limbs and sharp vision.<page>Do you like to play? Enthusiastic about testing your goals? We are honored to play Mini games with you. We set up skills tests.<hpage>I don't need to test my skills, sir, and I don't have time to learn intelligence.<page>But we will make it worth it! If you can accept our challenge, prizes are waiting for you!<hpage>If you offer prizes, the situation will change. If the reward is enough, I can accept any challenge. What are your rules of the game?<page>Very simple, my lady! I will provide pins for throwing, and my colleagues will provide targets. Hit the target 15 times and you will win valuable prizes for yourself!

original_en_text: A heavy door chained with a simple padlock.
original_zh_text: 一扇厚重的门扉，挂着一只简易挂锁。
translated_text: 一扇沉重的门，用简单的挂锁锁上。
secondary_translated_text: A heavy door locked with a simple padlock.

original_en_text: <hpage>This bell could carry me below, but it will first require a key, and an operator to aid its descent.<hpage>I cannot complete this task alone. Someone upon these docks will have to assist me.
original_zh_text: <hpage>此钟可载我下沉，但需要钥匙开启，还需要操作员协助下潜。<hpage>我自己难以达成此事，需要得到码头上某位清醒者的帮助。
translated_text: <hpage>这个时钟可以带我下来，但它首先需要一把钥匙和一个操作员来帮助它下来。<hpage>我无法独自完成这项任务。码头上的这些人必须协助我。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>This clock can get me down, but it first needs a key and an operator to help it down.<hpage>I cannot complete this task alone. These people on the dock have to assist me.

original_en_text: Oi! What’s with all these tremors? This smelt still need shovelling, and the shakes’re only making it harder.
original_zh_text: 啊喂！这震天动地的，到底是怎么回事？晃荡个没完，还让不让干活了？
translated_text: 嘿！你为什么抖得这么厉害？这个南瓜还需要铲掉，摇晃只会让它更难铲掉。
secondary_translated_text: Hey! Why are you shaking so badly? The pumpkin still needs to be shoveled off, and shaking will only make it more difficult to shovel off.

original_en_text: <hpage>Though tied by charge, would you provide me your service, Forge Daughter? I have need of tools that your skills could likely provide.<page>Blades and traps, no doubt? We know your type!<hpage>Of sorts, but maybe strange to this land? Some would likely prove fine challenge for your craft.<page>Hmph! Then we’ll construct them. But! You’ll provide the materials, and compensation for our time.
original_zh_text: <hpage>熔炉之女，你们虽有使命在身，但可否为我打造些工具？你们的手艺应该能胜任。<page>要做刺针还是陷阱？你这种客人我见多了！<hpage>差不多，有些可能是你们没见过的款式，对你们的工艺应该是不小的挑战。<page>哼！那咱就造出来给你看。但材料你得自备，工钱也得结清。
translated_text: <hpage>虽然费用有限，但锻造女儿你会为我提供服务吗？我需要您的技能可能提供的工具。<page>毫无疑问，刀锋和陷阱？我们知道你的类型！<hpage>有点，但对这片土地来说也许很奇怪？有些可能会对您的工艺构成巨大挑战。<page>哼！然后我们将建造它们。但是！您将为我们的时间提供材料和补偿。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Although the cost is limited, will you provide services for me to forge my daughter? I need the tools your skills may provide.<page>There is no doubt that blade and trap? We know your type!<hpage>A little, but maybe strange for this land? Some may pose a huge challenge to your craft.<page>Hmph! Then we will build them. But! You will provide materials and compensation for our time.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I need to return above. Please ready the bell for me.<page>Aye, miss. Sit on the bench, and let’s get you hauled up.
original_zh_text: <hpage>巴洛先生，我需要返回地面。请准备上浮。<page>好嘞，小姐。坐稳扶牢，这就把你拽上来。
translated_text: <hpage>先生，我需要回到那里。请为我准备好铃。<page>是的，小姐。坐在长凳上，让我们把你扶起来。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Sir, I need to get back there. Please prepare the bell for me.<page>Yes, miss. Sit on the bench and let us help you up.

original_en_text: Quite a lot of targets struck, and quite a lot of rosaries earned! Our lady never fails to impress us!
original_zh_text: 击中了非常多目标，念珠赚得盆满钵满！女士，您总能让我们大开眼界！
translated_text: 他击中了很多目标，赢得了很多念珠！我们的女士总是给我们留下深刻的印象！
secondary_translated_text: He hit a lot of goals and won a lot of rosary beads! Our lady always leaves a deep impression on us!

original_en_text: Ola, ola! Have to stop you there. That’s three times now you’ve missed your mark! I’m afraid that makes you the loser of our little game, with all due respect.<page>Fret not though, for we never tire of playing! Step over here, and we can start another game.
original_zh_text: 哎哎！得叫停啦。您已脱靶三次！恕我直言，这局算您输。<page>没关系，我们的游戏永远欢迎您！请移步这边来，我们再开一局。
translated_text: 奥拉，奥拉！你必须被阻止。你已经错过了三次！恕我直言，恐怕这会让您在我们的小游戏中成为失败者。<page>但别担心，因为我们永远不会厌倦玩！到达这里后，我们就可以开始另一场比赛了。
secondary_translated_text: Ola, Ola! You must be stopped. You have missed it three times! With all due respect, I'm afraid this will make you a loser in our Mini games.<page>But don't worry, because we will never get tired of playing! Once we get here, we can start another game.

original_en_text: This trinket is our own invention. It wards against the deadly lava and heat around these docks. The workers used to request them of us. Now they’ve lost the mind to care.
original_zh_text: 这宝贝可是我们的独家发明，可以用来抵御深坞致命的熔岩与高温。往日工虫们争相求购，如今它们却连心智都已涣散。
translated_text: 这个小饰品是我们自己的发明。它经受住了这些码头周围致命的熔岩和高温。工人们过去常常向我们索要它们。现在他们已经失去了关心的意图。
secondary_translated_text: This trinket is our own invention. It withstood the deadly lava and high temperatures around these docks. Workers used to ask for them from us. Now they have lost their intention to care.

original_en_text: Farewell, then. If you require our craft, this forge is always hot.
original_zh_text: 慢走不送，需要造东西的话随时过来。
translated_text: 所以，再见。如果您需要我们的工艺，这个炉子总是很热的。
secondary_translated_text: So, goodbye. If you need our craftsmanship, this stove is always hot.

original_en_text: The new shell-shield’s all bolted on tight, miss. If you’re planning another descent, head down, holler, and I’ll get you where you’re goin’.
original_zh_text: 我把新护壳加固得很严实，小姐。如果你打算再下潜一次，就下来喊一声，我会帮你启程。
translated_text: 新的炮弹和防护罩已经锁紧了，小姐。如果你打算再次下降，请低头呼喊，我会带你去你想去的地方。
secondary_translated_text: New shells and shields are locked, miss. If you plan to descend again, please bow your head and shout, and I will take you where you want to go.

original_en_text: <hpage>The behaviour of your fellow workers, I’ve seen similar... agitation upon the roads. These docks are not alone in the strangeness of their occupants.<page>’Tis odd behaviour to be sure, but not for Ballow and us to know. Ours is busy work, and we keep to ourselves.<page>Whatever the goings on of the world outside, no bother to us, as long as our craft can continue.
original_zh_text: <hpage>你同僚的这般行径，我在路上也见过类似的……狂躁。这码头的住民并非孤例。<page>这种行为确实奇怪，但我们和巴洛可懒得深究。我们只管埋头干活，少管闲事。<page>外头天塌地陷都与我们无关，只要这门锻造手艺能传下去就行。
translated_text: <hpage>我在你的同事中也看到过类似的行为。路上的骚动。这些码头并不是唯一的地方陌生的居民。<page>“这确实是奇怪的行为，但巴洛和我们并不知道。我们的工作很忙，也不打扰自己。<page>无论外面发生什么，只要我们的船还能继续，我们就不会打扰它。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I've seen similar behavior among your colleagues. The commotion on the road. These docks are not the only places where residents are unfamiliar.<page>"It was indeed strange behavior, but Barlow and we didn't know about it. Our work is very busy and we don't bother ourselves.<page>No matter what happens outside, as long as our ship can continue, we will not disturb it.

original_en_text: <hpage>How did you come to serve these docks, Forge Daughter?<page>Sent from our Forgehome we were, at request of those holy bugs above.<hpage>The Citadel dwellers? The veiled bugs? They ordered you here?<page>Yes! An age ago that. Such is duty! We Forge Daughters live to hone the craft, and aid the line.<page>By the Citadel’s patronage, and our long duty upon these docks, our Forgehome would swell in holy esteem.
original_zh_text: <hpage>熔炉之女，你们为何来此码头效力？<page>是上头那些圣虫召我们来的，我们在熔炉乡收到了调令。<hpage>圣堡的住民？那些覆面虫？是他们下令调遣你们来这儿的？<page>正是！都是陈年旧事了。职责所在嘛！我们熔炉之女活着就为磨砺手艺，延续传承。<page>靠着圣堡的庇佑和在这些码头长年累月的苦工，熔炉乡的名望自会愈发神圣。
translated_text: <hpage>锻造女儿，你是怎么来到这些码头服役的？<page>应上面神圣昆虫的请求，我们被从福格豪斯派了过来。<hpage>城堡居民？隐藏的错误？他们命令你来这里？<page>是的！那是一年前的事了。这就是责任！我们锻造了女儿的生活，磨练了工艺并帮助生产线。<page>凭借城堡的赞助以及我们在这些码头的长期责任，我们的锻造之家将受到神圣的尊重。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Forging daughter, how did you come to serve at these docks?<page>At the request of the sacred insects above, we were sent from Fogehouse.<hpage>Castle dweller? Hidden mistakes? They ordered you to come here?<page>Yes! That was a year ago. This is responsibility! We forged our daughter's life, honed our craftsmanship and helped with the production line.<page>With the patronage of the castle and our long-term responsibility at these docks, our Forge House will be held in sacred respect.

original_en_text: <hpage>I’d expected this workshop too would contain only combative types, but you seem composed, Forge Daughter.<page>You’ve met the workers? They’re all wound up! They still work at their tasks, in a simple way, but they’re useless for conversation. It’s only ourselves and young Ballow with any sense left.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我原以为这工坊里全是些好斗之徒，但你们倒是沉着清醒，熔炉之女。<page>见过那些工虫没？个个跟上了发条似的！它们没日没夜机械式地干活，但早就不会聊天了。如今只剩咱和那边的巴洛还保留着些清醒。
translated_text: <hpage>我以为这个研讨会只包括攻击性类型的人，但你看起来很冷静，塑造了你的女儿。<page>你见过工人吗？他们都很紧张！他们仍然以简单的方式完成任务，但对谈话毫无用处。只有我们和年轻的巴洛有理由。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I thought this seminar would only include aggressive types of people, but you seemed calm and shaped your daughter.<page>Have you ever seen workers? They are all nervous! They still complete tasks in a simple way, but are of no use to conversation. Only we and young Barlow have a reason.

original_en_text: Miss! Errr... Ullo... I see you’ve survived... somehow... Thought that last plunge must’a been your end.<hpage>It was not. I survived the fall, and managed a treacherous return.<hpage>For the diving bell’s failure, the risks were clear to me. The fault lies not with you.<page>Aye! As you say! This bell’s old. And time has a way of breaking things even as fine forged as this.<page>And see below, for its failure I’ve been workin’ hard at improving the design! Your last journey ended up being a valuable test... ahem.<hpage>Good. That return path is long closed to me, and your bell is now needed again.<page>Again? We’ll if you’re game enough to try a second time... A shell-shield’s been fitted, and the bell’s like new. Better’n new!<page>If you’re planning another descent, head down, holler, and I’ll get you goin’.
original_zh_text: 小姐！呃……那个……你居然还活着……真行啊……我以为那趟下潜准要了你的命。<hpage>还好，坠落时侥幸生还，又爬过险路回来。<hpage>潜钟故障本在意料之中，错不在你。<page>没错！你说得对！这钟老掉牙了。再好的锻造也经不起岁月折腾。<page>你瞧，因为这次事故，我已经在改进设计了！权当这回是一次有价值的测试……咳。<hpage>很好。从湖底回来的路已经行不通了，若我再次下潜仍需用到此钟。<page>还来？你要真有胆量再试……护壳已经装好了。现在这只潜钟跟全新的一样！不，比新的还强！<page>如果你打算再下潜一次，就下来喊一声，我会帮你启程。
translated_text: 小姐！呃...乌罗我看到你活下来了...不知怎么...我以为最后一跳就是你的结局。<hpage>不。我从秋天中幸存下来并冒险回来了。<hpage>我非常清楚潜水钟的故障。你不负责。<page>是的！正如你所说！这个钟很旧了。时间总有办法打破像这样精心锻造的东西。<page>请参阅下文。对于它的失败，我一直在努力改进设计！事实证明，你的最后一次旅程是一次宝贵的考验。咳咳<hpage>好.回去的路早已对我关闭，现在我再次需要你的钟声。<page>再次？如果您有兴趣尝试第二次，我们会的。壳罩安装好，钟声焕然一新。更好的更新！<page>如果您打算再次下降，请低下头，大喊一声，我就带您上路。
secondary_translated_text: Miss! Uh... Uro, I see you survived... Somehow...
