I thought the last jump would be your end.<hpage>No. I survived the fall and ventured back.<hpage>I am very aware of the malfunction of the diving bell. You are not responsible.<page>Yes! Just as you said! This clock is very old. Time always has a way to break something carefully forged like this.<page>Please see below. For its failure, I have been working hard to improve the design! As it turns out, your last journey was a valuable test. ahem<hpage>good. The road back has long been closed to me, and now I need your bell again.<page>Again? If you are interested in trying it a second time, we will. When the shell cover is installed, the bell is completely new. Better updates!<page>If you plan to descend again, please lower your head, shout, and I will take you on the road.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I am ready. Please prepare the bell for departure.<page>S’time to take the plunge, aye, miss? Just sit on the bench, and I’ll see you strapped in tight.
original_zh_text: <hpage>巴洛先生，我已就绪。请准备下潜。<page>好嘞，小姐，跳水时间到了。在椅子上坐稳，我来给你捆严实咯。
translated_text: <hpage>先生，我准备好了。请准备好开始铃。<page>是时候冒险了，对吧，小姐？只要坐在长凳上，我就会看到你被紧紧地绑起来。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Sir, I'm ready. Please be ready to start the bell.<page>It's time to take a risk, isn't it, miss? Just sit on the bench and I will see you tied up tightly.

original_en_text: An old mechanism with a keyhole.
original_zh_text: 一个带钥匙孔的老旧机关。

original_en_text: It’s done, miss! I’ve fitted the shell-shield. Bell’s like new. Better’n new even!<page>If you’re planning another descent, head down, holler, and I’ll get you goin’.<hpage>Your work is appreciated, sir. Know that, with luck, the threat from below might soon be quelled, and your lands shall rest calm.<page>Well... Good! I’m only really wishin’ to return to the forge, and my regular duties... A little purpose, routine...<page>Frankly, miss, all this action’s more’n a bit overwhelming for bugs like me. I’ll be glad when it’s all over... Providing we survive, of course.
original_zh_text: 搞定啦小姐！护壳装好了。现在这只潜钟跟全新的一样！不，比新的还强！<page>如果你打算再下潜一次，就下来喊一声，我会帮你启程。<hpage>辛苦你了。若是运气好，下面的威胁很快便会平息，此地也能重回安宁。<page>那敢情好！我只盼着早日回熔炉干回老本行……有点奔头，按部就班……<page>说真的，小姐，这种大场面对我这种小虫子来说太刺激了。等这一切都结束后，我们……当然，前提是我们能活下来。
translated_text: 完成了，小姐！我已经安装了壳盾。贝尔就像新的一样。更好，甚至是新的！<page>如果您打算再次下降，请低下头，大喊一声，我就带您上路。<hpage>先生，您的工作受到高度赞赏。要知道，如果幸运的话，来自下面的威胁可能很快就会被颠覆，你的土地就会平静下来。<page>好吧...好！我真的很想回到铁匠铺，承担我的日常职责。一个小目标，例行公事。<page>坦率地说，小姐，所有这些动作对于我这样的虫子来说有点太过分了。等这一切结束了我会很高兴的。当然，前提是我们生存。
secondary_translated_text: Done, miss! I have installed the shell shield. Bell is like new. Better, even new!<page>If you plan to descend again, please lower your head, shout, and I will take you on the road.<hpage>Sir, your work is highly appreciated. Know that with luck, threats from below may quickly be subverted and your land will calm down.<page>Okay... Good! I really want to go back to the blacksmith shop and take on my daily responsibilities. A small goal, routine.<page>Frankly, miss, all these actions are a little too much for a bug like me. I'll be so happy when this is over. Of course, the prerequisite is that we survive.

original_en_text: Miss! Errr... Ullo... I see you’ve survived... somehow... Thought that drop must’a been your end.<hpage>It was not. I survived the fall, and managed a treacherous return.<hpage>For the diving bell’s failure, the risks were clear to me. The fault lies not with you.<page>Aye! As you say! This bell’s old. And time has a way of breaking things even as fine forged as this.<page>And you can see here, for its failure I’d already been workin’ at improving the design! Ended up being a useful test... ahem.<hpage>Good. That return path is now closed to me, and your bell may still be needed if I choose to descend again.<page>Again? Well, if you’re game enough to try a second time...Once this new shield-shell is fitted, it’ll surely withstand the drop!.. Surely!
original_zh_text: 小姐！呃……那个……你居然还活着……真行啊……我以为那趟下潜准要了你的命。<hpage>还好，坠落时侥幸生还，又爬过险路回来。<hpage>潜钟故障本在意料之中，错不在你。<page>没错！你说得对！这钟老掉牙了。再好的锻造也经不起岁月折腾。<page>你瞧，因为这次事故，我已经在改进设计了！权当这回是一次有价值的测试……咳。<hpage>很好。从湖底回来的路已经行不通了，若我再次下潜仍需用到此钟。<page>还来？你要真有胆量再试……等新护壳装好，保准能扛住下坠！绝对没问题！
translated_text: 小姐！呃...乌罗我看到你活下来了...不知怎么...以为那一滴就是你的结局。<hpage>不。我从秋天中幸存下来并冒险回来了。<hpage>我非常清楚潜水钟的故障。你不负责。<page>是的！正如你所说！这个钟很旧了。时间总有办法打破像这样精心锻造的东西。<page>正如您在这里看到的，由于设计失败，我已经在努力改进它了！最终它成为一个有用的测试。咳咳<hpage>好.回去的路现在对我关闭了，如果我选择再次下降，我可能仍然需要你的铃。<page>再次？如果你有兴趣再试一次的话...一旦安装了这个新的防护罩，它一定能承受住坠落！当然！
secondary_translated_text: Miss! Uh... Uro, I see you survived... Somehow... Thought that drop was your end.<hpage>No. I survived the fall and ventured back.<hpage>I am very aware of the malfunction of the diving bell. You are not responsible.<page>Yes! Just as you said! This clock is very old. Time always has a way to break something carefully forged like this.<page>As you can see here, I am already working hard to improve it due to design failure! Eventually it became a useful test. ahem<hpage>good. The road back is now closed to me, and if I choose to descend again, I may still need your bell.<page>Again? If you are interested in trying again... Once this new protective cover is installed, it will definitely withstand a fall! Of course!

original_en_text: A smith? Hardly so crude! We are Forge Daughter! How can a pointy bug not tell?<page>Ours is the ancient line and honoured role. These docks and lands around are fortunate to have our skills.<hpage>If you are as talented as you suggest, would you lend me your aid? I’ve lacked for my usual tools, and I suspect you could craft fine replacements.<page>Blades and traps, no doubt? We know your type!<hpage>Of sorts, but maybe strange to this land? Some would likely prove fine challenge for your craft.<page>Hmph! Then soon, yes! I may accept. But not now! Now there is much work to be done, and we cannot afford to be bothered so.
original_zh_text: 铁匠？太掉价了！我们可是熔炉之女！你竟然不认识我们？我们祖传的手艺让整个深坞都沾光！<hpage>若你们的技艺真如你所夸耀那样好，可否帮我个忙？我的一些工具没有了，我想你们应该能打造合用的替代品。<page>要做刺针还是陷阱？你这种客人我见多了！<hpage>有些可能是你没见过的款式，对你们的工艺应该是不小的挑战。<page>哼！那行，你过阵子再来！咱会造出来给你看！这会儿活儿太多，咱忙不过来！
translated_text: 史密斯？没那么粗糙！我们是锻造的女儿！尖头昆虫怎么可能看不出来呢？<page>我们的是一条古老的路线，也是一个光荣的角色。这些码头和周围的土地很幸运拥有我们的技能。<hpage>如果你像你说的那么有才华，你会帮助我吗？我缺乏通用工具，而且我怀疑你能否做出好的替代品。<page>毫无疑问，刀锋和陷阱？我们知道你的类型！<hpage>有点，但对这片土地来说也许很奇怪？有些可能会对您的工艺构成巨大挑战。<page>哼！很快，是的！我可以接受。但不是现在！现在有很多工作要做，我们不能担心。
secondary_translated_text: Smith? It's not that rough! We are forged daughters! How could a pointed insect not see it?<page>Ours is an ancient route and a glorious role. These docks and the surrounding land are fortunate to have our skills.<hpage>If you were as talented as you say you are, would you help me? I lack universal tools, and I doubt you can make good replacements.<page>There is no doubt that blade and trap? We know your type!<hpage>A little, but maybe strange for this land? Some may pose a huge challenge to your craft.<page>Hmph! Soon, yes! I can accept it. But not now! There is a lot of work to be done now, and we cannot worry.

original_en_text: Oh! Small pointy bug, why do you bother this Forge Daughter at their work?<hpage>These black quakes that wrack your lands, I am seeking to see them quelled at their source, below the lakes of flame.<page>You would wish to descend so deep?... It is true these docks possess the means. Alas, we ourselves cannot help. Whether Pharoom’s health or fall, our charge ties us to this forge, always.<page>Ballow there’s the bug to ask, and if our fate is as dire as your action suggests, we are sure he is only needing of some quick convincing.
original_zh_text: 嘿！小尖头虫，干嘛打扰我们熔炉之女干活？<hpage><hpage>如今黑灾震动大地，我想深入熔岩湖之底，将其从源头平息。<page> 小尖头虫，你想潜那么深？……码头那边倒是有法子能办到。<page>唉，可惜咱帮不上忙。不管纺络是死是活，咱都得守着这熔炉。<page> 去找码头那边的巴洛吧。若局势真如你所说那般危急，你随便吓唬两句他就会服软。
translated_text: 噢！小尖头虫子，你为什么打扰这个锻造女儿的工作？<hpage>这些黑色地震摧毁了你们的土地，我正在寻求看到它们从源头、火湖下平息。<page>你想潜入这么深吗？这些码头确实有办法唉，我们自己无能为力。无论法鲁姆的健康还是死亡，我们的责任将永远将我们与这个熔炉联系起来。<page>巴洛有一个问题要问如果我们的命运像你的行为所暗示的那样可怕，我们确信他只是需要一些快速的说服。
secondary_translated_text: Oh! Little pointy bug, why are you disturbing this forging daughter's work?<hpage>These black earthquakes have destroyed your land, and I am seeking to see them subside from their source, under the lake of fire.<page>Do you want to dive this deep? These docks do have solutions, but there is nothing we can do ourselves. Whether Farum's health or death, our responsibilities will always connect us to this melting pot.<page>Barlow has a question to ask If our destiny is as dire as your actions suggest, we are sure he just needs some quick persuasion.

original_en_text: Return later, pointy bug! Now there is much work to be done, and we cannot afford to be bothered so.
original_zh_text: 过阵子再来，小尖头虫！眼下正忙着呢，少添乱！
translated_text: 稍后回来，尖头虫子！现在有很多工作要做，我们不能担心。
secondary_translated_text: Come back later, pointy bug! There is a lot of work to be done now, and we cannot worry.

original_en_text: <hpage>Forge Daughter, I have acquired a power that will enable me to end this black madness. Soon I will act to stop the quakes and save this land.<page>Excellent, pointy bug. Your drive, and your vigour, both have proven surprisingly large for one so small.<page>We shall remain here, still. If our service can aid your critical task, know we will continue to provide it gladly.
original_zh_text: <hpage>熔炉之女，我已获得终结黑灾的力量。很快便将行动，平息震动，拯救此地。<page>干得好，小尖头虫。你这小身板里的劲头倒是大得出奇。<page>咱还会守在这儿。若咱这手艺能助你成事，尽管开口便是。
translated_text: <hpage>锻造了我的女儿，我获得了结束这种黑色疯狂的力量。很快我就会采取行动阻止地震并拯救土地。<page>很棒的、尖头的错误。事实证明，对于这么小的一个人来说，你的干劲和活力却出奇地大。<page>我们会留在这里。如果我们的服务可以帮助您完成关键任务，请知道我们将继续乐意提供这些服务。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Forging my daughter, I gained the power to end this black madness. Soon I will take action to stop the earthquake and save the land.<page>Great, pointed mistake. It turns out that for such a small person, your drive and vitality are surprisingly great.<page>We'll stay here. If our services can help you complete critical tasks, please know that we will continue to be happy to provide them.

original_en_text: <hpage>Stay safe, Forge Daughter. If I require your aid, I shall return.<page>Our wishes go with you, pointy bug. Calm the raging of our world, that our task can continue.
original_zh_text: <hpage>保重，熔炉之女。若是需要帮助，我自会再来。<page>祝你好运，小尖头虫。平息这外头的狂乱，咱才能继续安心干活。
translated_text: <hpage>保重，锻造你的女儿。如果我需要你的帮助，我会回来的。<page>我们的祝愿与你同在，尖虫。只有平息世界的破坏，我们的使命才能继续下去。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Take care and forge your daughter. If I need your help, I will come back.<page>Our wishes are with you, sharp worm. Only by calming the destruction of the world can our mission continue.

original_en_text: <hpage>These controls are complex. If I’m to descend within the bell below, I will first require an operator.<hpage>Someone upon these docks will have to assist me.
original_zh_text: <hpage>此操控装置颇为复杂。若想要乘潜钟下潜，需要有操作员协助。<hpage>需要得到码头上某位清醒者的帮助。
translated_text: <hpage>这些控制很复杂。如果我要在下面的钟内下降，我首先需要一名操作员。<hpage>码头上的这些人必须协助我。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>These controls are complex. If I am going to descend in the bell below, I first need an operator.<hpage>These people on the dock have to assist me.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I wish to depart. Please ready the bell for travel.<page>Sure thing, miss. Sit on the bench, and I’ll send you down.
original_zh_text: <hpage>巴洛先生，我可以出发了。请整备好潜钟。<page>好嘞，小姐。在椅子上坐稳，我这就送您下潜。
translated_text: <hpage>先生，我想离开。请准备好旅行铃。<page>当然，小姐。坐在长凳上，我送你下去。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Sir, I want to leave. Please prepare the travel bell.<page>Of course, miss. Sit on the bench and I'll walk you down.

original_en_text: Interested in our little game, my lady?<page>If you can hit the target fifteen times you’ll earn yourself a worthy prize!
original_zh_text: 对我们的小游戏感兴趣吗，女士？<page>击中靶子十五次，奖品就归您了！
translated_text: 女士，您对我们的小游戏感兴趣吗？<page>如果您能击中目标15次，您将为自己赢得一份有价值的奖品！
secondary_translated_text: Madam, are you interested in our Mini games?<page>If you can hit the target 15 times, you will win a valuable prize for yourself!

original_en_text: Oh! Pointy bug, you return? Our world cracks and cries from some grave new calamity.<page>Nevertheless, we must remain, fixed to this forge and its service. Ours is a duty lifetime bound.
original_zh_text: <page>嘿！小尖头虫，你回来了？外面又闹起什么灾祸，搞得哭天抢地的。<page>不过无所谓，咱还得守着熔炉干活。使命在身，至死方休。
translated_text: 噢！尖头虫子，你回来了？我们的世界因一些严重的新灾难而支离破碎，哭泣。<page>然而，我们必须继续维护这家锻造厂及其服务。我们的责任是终身的。
secondary_translated_text: Oh! Pointed bug, you're back? Our world is shattered by some serious new disasters, crying.<page>However, we must continue to maintain this forging plant and its services. Our responsibility is lifelong.

original_en_text: If you need something, talk to the boss. I’m busy.
original_zh_text: 有事找老板说去。我正忙着呢。
translated_text: 如果你需要什么，请与你的老板谈谈。我很忙
secondary_translated_text: If you need anything, talk to your boss. I'm busy

original_en_text: A control panel with various levers and gauges.
original_zh_text: 布满操纵杆与仪表的控制台。
translated_text: 带有各种杠杆和仪器的控制面板。
secondary_translated_text: Control panel with various levers and instruments.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I have need to head below the lakes of flame.<hpage>There is a diving bell at the base of this structure that seemed fit for the task. I require it opened, and an operator to send it deep.<hpage>As one of few upon these docks with mind still sound, that role must fall to you.<page>Can’t you see I’m busy, miss? Ain’t got time for naught else while the shovelling needs doing.<hpage>Choose to aid me, or all your efforts will soon be wasted. This kingdom crumbles. Its collapse is inevitable. If you wish for your work, and your life to continue, you must help me, now.
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生，我需要潜入熔岩湖之下。<hpage>此建筑底部有座潜钟可用。我需要把它打开，并有个操作员送我下沉。<hpage>如今码头清醒者寥寥无几，此事只能由你来办。<page>没看我正忙吗，小姐？眼下铲矿石的活还干不完呢。<hpage>这王国正在崩塌，覆灭无可避免。你不帮我，就等着一切辛劳付诸东流。若你还想活命，还想每天有活干，就立刻帮我。
translated_text: <hpage>先生，我需要进入火湖下。<hpage>结构底部有一个潜水钟，似乎适合这项任务。我要求打开它并让接线员发送到深处。<hpage>作为这些码头上为数不多的仍在深思熟虑的人之一，这个角色必须落在你身上。<page>小姐，你没看到我很忙吗？当需要铲土时，没有时间做其他事情。<hpage>选择帮助我，否则你所有的努力很快就会白费。王国崩溃了。它的崩溃是不可避免的。如果你想让你的工作和生活继续下去，你现在就必须帮助我。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Sir, I need to get under the lake of fire.<hpage>There is a diving bell at the bottom of the structure that seems suitable for the task. I asked to turn it on and have the operator send it deep.<hpage>As one of the few people on these docks still thinking about it, the role has to fall to you.<page>Miss, can't you see I'm busy? When it comes to shoveling, there is no time to do anything else.<hpage>Choose to help me, or all your efforts will soon be in vain. The kingdom collapsed. Its collapse is inevitable. If you want your work and life to continue, you must help me now.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, I have need to head below the lakes of flame. Can you aid me in this task?<hpage><page>Hmmm... Well if you head down below to the very base of the docks, there’s an old diving bell built for just what you’re askin’. <page>Thing is, you can ride it, but it takes an operator stood dockside to send it. I might be capable, but I ain’t got time for naught else while the shovelling still needs doing.<hpage>Choose to aid me, sir, or all your efforts will soon be wasted. This kingdom crumbles. If you wish for your work, and your life to continue, you must help me, now.
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生，先生，我需要潜入熔岩湖之下。能否请你助我一臂之力？<hpage><page>唔……如果您是往深坞最底层去，那边倒是有口老潜钟专门干这活的。<page>可这玩意儿需要有另一只虫在地面操作才能下水。我虽然会弄，但眼下铲矿石的活儿堆成山，实在没闲工夫管别的啊。<hpage>这王国正在崩塌。你不帮我，就等着一切辛劳付诸东流。若你还想活命，还想每天有活干，就立刻帮我。
translated_text: <hpage>先生，我需要进入火湖下。你能帮我完成这个任务吗？<hpage><page>呃...好吧，如果你走到码头底部，你会发现一个古老的潜水钟，专门为你想要的东西建造。<page>问题是，你可以骑它，但你需要一个站在码头边的操作员来发送它。我可能有能力，但我没有时间做其他还需要做的事情。<hpage>先生，选择帮助我，否则你的努力很快就会白费。王国崩溃了。如果你想让你的工作和生活继续下去，你现在就必须帮助我。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Sir, I need to get under the lake of fire. Can you help me complete this task?<hpage><page>Uh... Well, if you walk to the bottom of the pier, you will find an ancient diving bell built specifically for what you want.<page>The problem is, you can ride it, but you need an operator standing by the dock to send it. I may be capable, but I don't have time to do anything else that needs to be done.<hpage>Sir, choose to help me, or your efforts will soon be in vain. The kingdom collapsed. If you want your work and life to continue, you must help me now.

original_en_text: Oi! Who’sat? Whoever’s down there, if you’re feelin’ mad enough to try and travel, best meet me up at the controls, and we can chat.
original_zh_text: 喂！谁在那儿？不管你是谁，如果想要下潜，最好来操控台找我聊聊。
translated_text: 嘿！谁坐着？无论下面是谁，如果你感到愤怒并想尝试旅行，最好在控制台等我，这样我们就可以聊天了。
secondary_translated_text: Hey! Who's sitting? No matter who's down there, if you're angry and want to try traveling, it's best to wait for me at the console so we can chat.

original_en_text: Well. Well. Still alive! You have proved yourself made of the hardiest stuff, pointy bug.<page>Ballow did tell, shamefully, of complications with your diving bell, and of your absence upon its retrieval.<page>He had feared you lost to the flame, but we ourself had slight guessed otherwise.<hpage>To return from below proved as difficult a climb as ever I have faced, and yet, in time near, I will need to descend again.<page>Then twice mad you are, bug! Or brave beyond measure. We shall wish on your continued survival, even if you seem intent on ending it.
original_zh_text: 啊哈！瞧瞧这是谁还生龙活虎的！小尖头虫，你可真是命硬。<page>巴洛支支吾吾地交代了潜钟的意外——打捞起来后，你已经不见了。<page>他以为你被火焰吞噬了，但咱倒隐约觉得不然。<hpage>从底下爬回来确实是个不小的挑战，但很快我又得再下去一趟了。<page>哈！？你这虫子，不是疯到顶了就是勇到没边了！尽管你像在自寻死路，咱还是祝你多活些时日。
translated_text: 好.好.还活着！你已经证明了自己是由最艰难的东西组成的，尖虫。<page>巴洛确实可耻地谈论了你潜水钟的并发症以及你在取回它时缺席的情况。<page>他担心你会输给火焰队，但我们自己也有一点猜测。<hpage>事实证明，从下面返回是我面临过的最困难的攀登，然而，在不久的将来，我需要再次下降。<page>那你疯了，虫子！或者极其勇敢。我们希望你继续生存，即使你似乎有意结束它。
secondary_translated_text: good. good. Still alive! You've proven yourself made of the most difficult things, point-worm.<page>Barlow did talk shamefully about the complications of your diving bell and your absence while retrieving it.<page>He's worried you'll lose to the Flames, but we have a little speculation ourselves.<hpage>Returning from below proved to be the most difficult climb I have ever faced, however, in the near future, I need to descend again.<page>Then you are crazy, bug! Or extremely brave. We want you to continue to survive, even if you seem intent on ending it.

original_en_text: The frolics haven’t ended, my lady! If you’d like to really test yourself, we should play again!<page>Hit the target twenty-five times and you’ll earn yourself a beautiful necklace of rosaries! What say you?
original_zh_text: 游戏还没完全结束，女士！想真正挑战自己一把吗？再来一局如何？<page>击中靶子二十五次，这条精美的念珠项链就是您的！意下如何？
translated_text: 嬉戏还没有结束，我的女士！如果你真的想测试自己，我们应该再玩一次！<page>击中目标二十五次，您将为自己赢得一条美丽的念珠项链！你说什么？
secondary_translated_text: The frolicking is not over, my lady! If you really want to test yourself, we should play it again!<page>Hit the target twenty-five times and you will win yourself a beautiful rosary necklace! What did you say?

original_en_text: <hpage>Keep well, Forge Daughter. I shall return if I require your aid.<page>Yes! Or no. Either is fine by us, as long as the craft continues.
original_zh_text: <hpage>保重，熔炉之女。若是需要帮助，我自会再来。<page>行！不来也行。只要手艺没断，咱都没意见。
translated_text: <hpage>照顾锻造女儿。如果我需要你的帮助，我会回来的。<page>是的！或者不。只要这个过程继续下去，我们就会没事。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Take care of forging daughter. If I need your help, I will come back.<page>Yes! Or no. As long as this process continues, we will be fine.

original_en_text: Hesitate not, my lady! Take aim and throw true!
original_zh_text: 别犹豫，女士！瞄准了就狠狠地扎过去！
translated_text: 别犹豫，夫人！正确瞄准并投掷！
secondary_translated_text: Don't hesitate, ma 'am! Aim and throw correctly!

original_en_text: If you add the implements from this set to your own, the quality of your crafting will increase. You will produce finer, sharper, and deadlier tools... if that is your wish.
original_zh_text: 若将此套器具与你的工具结合，你的制作水准将更上一层楼。你将打造出更精、更利、更致命的器械……只要你想。
translated_text: 如果您将这套工具添加到自己的工具中，您的生产质量将得到提高。您将生产出更薄、更锋利、更致命的工具。如果这就是你想要的。
secondary_translated_text: If you add this set of tools to your own tools, the quality of your production will be improved. You will produce thinner, sharper, and more deadly tools. If that's what you want.

original_en_text: Planning to lay a carpet of spikes? These would surely slow your prey. We’d never have considered using such common tools for combat.
original_zh_text: 用布满尖刺的毯子让敌人减速？如此普通的工具还能在战斗中应用，我们可从没想到过。
translated_text: 打算铺一层钉子吗？这些肯定会减慢你的猎物的速度。我们从来没有考虑过使用如此常见的工具来战斗。
secondary_translated_text: Are you going to lay a layer of nails? These will definitely slow down your prey. We have never considered using such a common tool to fight.

original_en_text: Ola, ola, ola! Perhaps I neglected to tell you not to cross past those markers? It’s a law of the game, and we all abide by laws here, don’t we?<page>Your actions have disqualified you, my lady, but we harbour no ill will! Step over here and we can begin a new round at once!
original_zh_text: 哎哎！我可能忘了告诉您别越过那个标记？游戏规矩总得遵守，对吧？<page>您犯规出局，但我们之间绝不会因此产生芥蒂！请移步这边来，我们马上新开一局。
translated_text: 啦！也许我忘记告诉你不要越过这些标记了？这些都是游戏规则，我们都遵守这里的法律，对吧？<page>女士，您的行为取消了您的资格，但我们无意伤害！到达这里，我们可以立即开始新一轮！
secondary_translated_text: La! Maybe I forgot to tell you not to cross these marks? These are the rules of the game, and we all abide by the laws here, right?<page>Ma 'am, your actions disqualify you, but we have no intention of harming you! Arriving here, we can start a new round immediately!

original_en_text: Ola, ola! That’s it then. Our lady has struck the target fifteen times! A beautiful victory!<page>Hopefully you enjoyed yourself! A little levity is a balm in these troubled times, don’t you think?<hpage>I’d have thought such games best saved for times of peace, but perhaps there is truth in what you say.<hpage>And now that I have bested your challenge, you will produce the prize I have earned?<page>Oh... o-of course! I see you have a tool pouch of your own there. Full to bursting with baubles and trinkets, no doubt!<page>I’ll fit another pocket onto it, so you can carry even more tools and shards with you. A fair prize, wouldn’t you say?
original_zh_text: 哎哎！成了！这位女士成功击中靶子十五次，完美胜出！<page>玩得开心吧？在这病怏怏的世道里找点乐子也算是良药，您说是不是？<hpage>我原以为这类游戏该留在太平年月，但或许你说的也有道理。<hpage>现在我已完成挑战，是否该兑现奖品了？<page>当……当然！我看您自带工具袋，里面准是塞满了各种零碎小玩意！<page>我给您的工具袋上加个新口袋，能多装点工具。这奖品公道吧？
translated_text: 奥拉，奥拉！就是这样。我们的女士已经击中目标15次了！一场美丽的胜利！<page>希望你玩得开心！在这个困难时期，一点轻浮也是一种安慰，你不这么认为吗？<hpage>我以为这样的游戏最好保留到和平时期，但也许你说的是实话。<hpage>既然我已经克服了你的挑战，你会拿出我赢得的奖品吗？<page>哦...当然！我看到你那里有自己的工具包。毫无疑问，充满了小玩意和小饰品！<page>我会在上面放另一个口袋，这样你就可以携带更多的工具和碎片。一个公平的奖品，你不认为吗？
secondary_translated_text: Ola, Ola! That's it. Our lady has hit the target 15 times! A beautiful victory!<page>I hope you have fun! In these difficult times, a little levity can be a comfort, don't you think?<hpage>I thought it would be best to keep such games until peacetime, but maybe you're telling the truth.<hpage>Now that I have overcome your challenge, will you take out the prize I won?<page>Oh... Of course! I see you have your own kit there. No doubt, full of gadgets and trinkets!<page>I'll put another pocket on top so you can carry more tools and debris. A fair prize, don't you think?

original_en_text: Ola, ola! We’ve devised a final challenge for you, my lady, if you’re interested.<page>Hit the target as many times as you can without missing. The more targets you hit, the more rosaries you’ll win from us! Care to try?
original_zh_text: 哎哎！我们给您准备了终极挑战，女士！<page>连续击中靶子次数越多，赢取的念珠越多！敢试试吗？
translated_text: 奥拉，奥拉！如果您感兴趣，女士，我们有最后的挑战给您。<page>击中尽可能多的目标而不失手。您击中的目标越多，您从我们这里赢得的念珠就越多！想尝试一下吗？
secondary_translated_text: Ola, Ola! If you are interested, ma 'am, we have a final challenge for you.<page>Hit as many targets as possible without missing. The more targets you hit, the more rosary beads you will win from us! Want to give it a try?

original_en_text: <hpage>Forge Daughter, within an old Weaver nest I discovered a weapon. Though much damaged by age, I believe your skills could see it restored.<page>Ho. An impressive tool that, and a fine challenge. We can reforge the weapon, if the price fits.
original_zh_text: <hpage>熔炉之女，我在一处古老织巢中发现了这件武器。虽年代久远损毁严重，但以你们的手艺应该能修复。<page>嚯，好东西！这活儿够意思，只要报酬合适，咱就帮你重铸。
translated_text: <hpage>锻造女儿，我在古代编织者的巢穴中发现了一件武器。尽管衰老造成了很大的伤害，但我相信你的技能可以恢复。<page>这是一个令人印象深刻的工具，也是一个很好的挑战。如果价格合适，我们可以重新锻造武器。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Forging daughter, I found a weapon in the nest of ancient weavers. Although aging does a lot of damage, I believe your skills can be restored.<page>This is an impressive tool and a good challenge. If the price is right, we can reforge the weapon.

original_en_text: A fair exchange made, pointy bug. Now our work calls. Return again if you find need of our trade and talent.
original_zh_text: 交易愉快，小尖头虫。眼下我们的活儿还多着呢，有需要再来。
translated_text: 公平的交换，尖锐的错误。现在我们的工作召唤了。如果您发现我们的贸易和人才需求，请再次返回。
secondary_translated_text: A fair exchange, a sharp mistake. Now our work calls. If you find our trade and talent needs, please return again.

original_en_text: We hope Ballow serves you well, pointy bug. In our long time serving these docks, he’s the finest assistant we’ve found.
original_zh_text: 希望巴洛能帮上忙，小尖头虫。在码头干了这么多年，他是咱见过最得力的助手。
translated_text: 我们希望Ballow能为您服务，尖头虫子。在我们长期为这些码头服务的过程中，他是我们最好的助手。
secondary_translated_text: We hope Ballow can serve you, pointy-pointed bug. He has been our best assistant in our long service to these docks.

original_en_text: Well. Well. Still about, pointy bug! You have proved yourself made of the hardiest stuff.<page>Ballow did tell, shamefully, of complications with your diving bell, and of your absence upon its first retrieval.<page>He had feared you lost to the flame, but we ourself had slight guessed otherwise.<hpage>To return from below proved as difficult a climb as ever I have faced, and yet I now need to descend again.<page>Then twice mad you are, bug! Or brave beyond measure.<page>Know we have heard from Ballow, who told of his repair efforts upon the diving bell below. By now that task is likely completed.<page>If you are hoping to put his work to the test, then we shall wish again on your survival. And if our own service can aid your critical task, know we will continue to provide it gladly.
original_zh_text: 啊哈！瞧瞧这是谁还生龙活虎的！小尖头虫，你可真是命硬。<page>巴洛支支吾吾地交代了潜钟的意外——打捞起来后，你已经不见了。<page>他以为你已经葬身火海了，但咱倒隐约觉得不然。<hpage>从底下爬回来确实是个不小的挑战，但很快我又得再下去一趟了。<page>哈！？你这虫子，不是疯到顶了就是勇到没边了！<page>听巴洛说，他底下那口老破钟修得差不多了。这会儿多半已经完工。<page>想试试那家伙的成果？那咱还得再一次祝你好运。要是咱这熔炉里的功夫能帮上忙，甭客气，照旧伺候着！
translated_text: 好.好.还在，尖头错误！你已经证明你是由最艰难的事情组成的。<page>巴洛确实无耻地讲述了潜水钟的并发症以及你第一次取回它时的缺席。<page>他担心你会输给火焰队，但我们自己也有一点猜测。<hpage>事实证明，从下面返回是我以前遇到过的一次困难的攀登，但我现在需要再次下降。<page>那你疯了，虫子！或者极其勇敢。<page>得知我们收到了巴洛的一封信后，他在下面讲述了他对潜水钟的修复工作。这项任务现在可能已经完成。<page>如果您想测试他的工作，那么我们将再次祝愿您生存。如果我们自己的服务可以帮助您完成关键任务，请知道我们将继续乐意提供这些服务。
secondary_translated_text: good. good. Still there, pointed error! You have proven that you are made of the most difficult things.<page>Barlow did shamelessly talk about the complications of the diving bell and your absence when you first retrieved it.<page>He's worried you'll lose to the Flames, but we have a little speculation ourselves.<hpage>Returning from below proved to be a difficult climb I have encountered before, but I now need to descend again.<page>Then you are crazy, bug! Or extremely brave.<page>After learning that we had received a letter from Barlow, he described below his work on restoring the diving bell. This task may now be completed.<page>If you want to test his work, then again we will wish you survival. If our own services can help you complete critical tasks, please know that we will continue to be happy to provide them.

original_en_text: And not a single target was struck... a right shame, that! We can’t reward you with any rosaries, my lady, but we’d love to see you test your aim once more!
original_zh_text: 一次都没中……太可惜啦！我没法给您念珠，女士，但欢迎随时再来试试准头！
translated_text: 没有击中任何目标。多么遗憾啊，那！女士，我们不能奖励您任何念珠，但我们很乐意看到您再次测试您的目标！
secondary_translated_text: No target was hit. What a pity, that! Ma 'am, we can't reward you with any rosary beads, but we would love to see you test your goals again!

original_en_text: A weapon from a long distant past. We can combine the Weaver components with our own mouldings to repair the tool.
original_zh_text: 远古时期遗留下来的武器。可以将织者的部件与我们自造的铸件结合，修复这件工具。
translated_text: 来自遥远过去的武器。我们可以将Weaver组件与我们自己的模具结合起来来修复工具。
secondary_translated_text: Weapons from the distant past. We can combine Weaver components with our own molds to repair tools.

original_en_text: <hpage>Forge Daughter, these black quakes that now wrack your lands, I am seeking to see them quelled at their source, below the lakes of flame.<page>You wish to descend so deep, pointy bug?... It is true these docks possess a craft capable.<page>Alas, we ourselves cannot help. Whether Pharloom’s health or fall, our charge ties us to this forge, always.<page>Ballow there’s the bug to ask, and if our fate is as dire as your action suggests, we are sure he is only needing of some quick convincing.
original_zh_text: <hpage>熔炉之女，如今黑灾震动大地，我想深入熔岩湖之底，将其从源头平息。<page> 小尖头虫，你想潜那么深？……码头那边倒是有法子能办到。<page>唉，可惜咱帮不上忙。不管纺络是死是活，咱都得守着这熔炉。<page> 去找码头那边的巴洛吧。若局势真如你所说那般危急，你随便吓唬两句他就会服软。
translated_text: <hpage>锻造女儿，这些黑色地震现在正在摧毁你的土地，我正在寻求看到它们从源头、火湖下平息。<page>你想潜入如此深、锋利的昆虫吗？这些码头确实有一艘有能力的航天器。<page>唉，我们自己无能为力。无论法勒姆的健康还是跌倒，我们的责任始终将我们与这个熔炉联系起来。<page>巴洛有一个问题要问如果我们的命运像你的行为所暗示的那样可怕，我们确信他只是需要一些快速的说服。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Forging daughter, these black earthquakes are now destroying your land, and I am seeking to see them subside from their source, under the lake of fire.<page>Do you want to dive into such a deep, sharp insect? These docks do have a capable spacecraft.<page>Alas, there is nothing we can do ourselves. Whether Farham's health or falls, our responsibility always connects us to this melting pot.<page>Barlow has a question to ask If our destiny is as dire as your actions suggest, we are sure he just needs some quick persuasion.

original_en_text: Crafting by claw alone produces inferior results. With this kit, you can craft finer, sharper, and deadlier tools... if that is your wish.
original_zh_text: 单凭你的肢爪，只能造出粗劣的工具。有此匣相助，你便可打造更精、更利、更致命的器械……只要你想。
translated_text: 仅靠爪子并不能很好地发挥作用。有了这个套件，您可以制造更薄、更锋利、更致命的工具。如果这就是你想要的。
secondary_translated_text: Paws alone do not work well. With this kit, you can make thinner, sharper, and more deadly tools. If that's what you want.

original_en_text: My lady, you left our game in such a hurry! No doubt some task of great import pulled you away.<page>That’s an instant disqualification, of course. You understand. But we don’t hold it against you, not at all! Care to play again?
original_zh_text: 女士，您离开得很匆忙！肯定是有要事要忙吧。<page>这局只能直接判负，希望您理解。但我们不会计较这种小事！要不要再来一局？
translated_text: 我的女士，你这么匆忙地离开了我们的游戏！毫无疑问，一些重要的任务让你放手。<page>当然，这是立即取消资格。你可以理解，但我们并不反对你，一点也不！想再玩吗？
secondary_translated_text: My lady, you left our game in such a hurry! There is no doubt that some important tasks will make you let go.<page>Of course, this is immediate disqualification. You can understand, but we have no objection to you, not at all! Want to play again?

original_en_text: <hpage>I need a moment, sir. Please unlock the bell that I may exit.<page>Seein’ some sense? Can’t blame ya if you’re thinkin’ on backin’ out. It’s a mad hope that old bell’d even survive the trip.
original_zh_text: <hpage>先生，我还需要一点时间。打开钟门让我出来。<page>总算清醒了？打退堂鼓也不怪你。那破钟能撑到湖底本就是个疯念头。
translated_text: <hpage>我需要一些时间，先生。请打开门铃，我就可以退出了。<page>这有意义吗？如果你想退出，我不能责怪你。人们疯狂地希望老贝尔能在这次旅行中幸存下来。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I need some time, sir. Please open the doorbell and I can quit.<page>Does this make sense? If you want to quit, I can't blame you. People frantically hoped that Old Bell would survive the trip.

original_en_text: <hpage>Sir, if you can hear me, there has been an accident during the descent.<hpage>In this broken state, the bell is unfit for travel. Retrieve it if you may, but I shall not return within.<page>...iss...istake...erwhelm...retrie...a...ssible...
original_zh_text: <hpage>巴洛先生，能听见吗？下潜途中出了点故障。<hpage>钟体已损坏，无法继续下潜。你可试着把它打捞上岸，但我无法乘它返回。<page>……错……错误……过载……无法……打捞……
translated_text: <hpage>先生，如果你能听到我的话，下降过程中发生了事故。<hpage>在这种破碎的状态下，铃不适合旅行。如果可以的话，请告诉我，但我不会再进去了。<page>... iss……istake。永恒的。搜索个... ssible。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Sir, if you can hear me, there was an accident during the descent.<hpage>In this broken state, the bell is not suitable for travel. Please let me know if you can, but I won't go back in there.<page>... iss……istake。Eternal. Search for... ssible。

original_en_text: Oh no... no, not at all. Wouldn’t do us any good, would it? No, it seems like this little frolic of ours is well and truly finished.<page>Oh, but what an honour it was to play with you, my lady! I hope you’ll think of us whenever you feel those rosaries rattling around in your pockets.
original_zh_text: 不不……不用。我们玩得起，也输得起。看来我们的游戏需要告一段落了。<page>但与您同乐实乃荣幸！希望您摸着兜里的念珠时能想起我们。
translated_text: 噢不...不完全没有这对我们没有任何好处，不是吗？不，看来我们的小游戏彻底结束了。<page>哦，但是能和你一起玩真是荣幸啊，我的女士！我希望你每次感觉到口袋里的念珠嘎嘎作响时都会想到我们。
secondary_translated_text: Oh no... No, not at all. It's not in any good for us, is it? No, it looks like our Mini games are over.<page>Oh, but what an honor to play with you, my lady! I hope you think of us every time you feel the rosary rattling in your pocket.

original_en_text: Ola! That’s... that’s twenty-five times the target has been struck!<page>My lady... I thought perhaps you’d have a little more trouble with this round, but you’ve emerged victorious again.<page>I’ll have to speak to my associate. I don’t think he provided you with enough of a challenge, truth be told.<hpage>It was challenge enough. My prize, sir?<page>
original_zh_text: 哎！这……命中二十五次了！<page>女士……本以为这局能让您吃点苦头，结果您又赢了。<page>我得找我的伙计谈谈，说实话他给您设的挑战不够难。<hpage>我觉得够难了。那么奖品呢，先生？
translated_text: 奥拉！那是...击中目标25次！<page>夫人.我以为你这一轮可能会遇到更多麻烦，但你又赢了。<page>我必须和我的同事谈谈。说实话，我认为他给你的挑战还不够多。<hpage>这已经足够有挑战性了。我的奖品，先生？<page>
secondary_translated_text: Ola! That's... Hit the target 25 times!<page>Madam. I thought you might have more trouble this round, but you won again.<page>I have to talk to my colleagues. To be honest, I don't think he's given you enough challenges.<hpage>This is challenging enough. My prize, sir?<page>

original_en_text: Urk! A prize, of course! My lady must have a prize!<page>Here then... a lovely necklace full with rosaries. I’d been hanging onto this for a while, but you’ve earned it fairly.<page>I just hope you think of me when you wear it, my lady!
original_zh_text: 啊！当然有！必须有！<page>给您……缀满念珠的漂亮项链。我私藏好久了，但您赢得实至名归。<page>希望您佩戴它时能想起我，女士！
translated_text: 呃！当然是奖品！我的女士一定有奖品！<page>所以就在这里。一条可爱的项链，上面装满了念珠。我已经有一段时间了，但你应得的。<page>我只是希望你戴上它时能想到我，小姐！
secondary_translated_text: Ugh! Prizes, of course! My lady must have a prize!<page>So here it is. A lovely necklace filled with rosary beads. I've had it for a while, but you deserve it.<page>I just hope you think of me when you put it on, miss!

original_en_text: Leave us! My great master needs time to reflect, and I must ponder on flavours anew!
original_zh_text: 快走吧！主人还要好好回味，我也要构思新菜式了！
translated_text: 离开我们！我的大师需要时间思考，我必须重新思考味道！
secondary_translated_text: Leave us! My master needs time to think, and I have to rethink taste!

original_en_text: Pilgrim who would hold our song within your shell, rise above.<page>Offer your most devout self unto our sacred heart.
original_zh_text: 心怀圣歌的朝圣者，升华吧。<page>将虔信之魂献予圣心。
translated_text: 朝圣者将我们的歌曲藏在你的壳里，请站起来。<page>将您最虔诚的自己奉献给我们神圣的心。
secondary_translated_text: Pilgrims hide our songs in your shell, please stand up.<page>Contribute your most pious self to our sacred hearts.

original_en_text: ...ilgrim!... ast aside those many sinful hopes for rest ...d reward... remain pure... within our midst... sk for nothing! <page>See... Citadel’s simple stone, bare an... dorned. See h...ain our garb, how sparse o... meal. Know that... excess is sin!<page>Stay vigil... ys, for tho... wretched pilgrims... dare relen... their base desi... Left unpunish... thin our pure chorus... eir seductive sin... pread like flame...
original_zh_text: ……朝圣者！……抛弃休憩与奖赏的邪念……保持纯洁……在我们中间……无欲无求！<page>看这圣堡素石……无华无饰。看这粗布麻衣……清汤寡水。须知奢侈即罪！<page>保持警惕……因那些堕落朝圣者……放纵卑劣欲望……若不惩戒……污秽将如野火蔓延……
translated_text: ...邪恶！抛开安息的邪恶希望。d奖励。保持纯洁在我们中间。不用问！<page>听着...城堡的简单石头暴露在外。签署看到h。我们的服装，多么稀疏……饭知道.过度是一种罪过！<page>保持警惕。是的，为了.可怜的朝圣者。敢于重新开始。他们的基本设计。侥幸逃脱惩罚。淡化我们纯粹的合唱。这是一种诱人的罪过。像火焰一样蔓延。
secondary_translated_text: ... Evil! Throw away the evil hope of rest in peace. d Reward. Stay pure among us. Don't ask!<page>Listen... The simple stones of the castle are exposed. Sign up to see h. How sparse our costumes are…I know. Excessive is a sin!<page>Stay vigilant. Yes, for... Poor pilgrim. Dare to start over. Their basic design. Got away with it. Downplay our pure chorus. This is a tempting sin. Spread like flames.

original_en_text: Accept, a t-t-token of the sentinel’s order.<page>As friends... let us p-part.
original_zh_text: 收下，哨卫信、信物。<page>以友、友人之谊……告别。
translated_text: 接受，哨兵命令的象征。<page>作为朋友。让我们分开p。
secondary_translated_text: Accept, a symbol of the sentry's order.<page>As friends. Let's separate p.

original_en_text: <hpage>I would view your collection, Vaultkeeper.<page>She may see it. A perfect set. This Vaultkeeper is rich with insights. Jealous its fellows would be... If still their minds remained.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我要看看你的收藏，管理员。<page>可以。看这完美收藏。羡慕死其他管理员……如果它们还有脑子的话。
translated_text: <hpage>我会检查你的收藏，金库管理员。<page>她可能会看到。一个完美的场景。这位财务经理很有洞察力。嫉妒它的同伴。如果他们的心还在的话。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I'll check your collection, vault keeper.<page>She might see it. A perfect scene. The financial manager is very insightful. Jealous of its companions. If their hearts were still there.

original_en_text: Aaaahh. What’s this? The rasher of a courier, tied up tight! I can see its fat still dripping fresh!
original_zh_text: 送货虫的熏肉！瞧瞧这油脂，还在滴汁呢！
translated_text: 啊这是什么？快递员的拉舍尔，紧！我能看到它的脂肪还在滴着新鲜的！
secondary_translated_text: Ah, what is this? The courier's rusher, tight! I can see its fat is still dripping fresh!

original_en_text: This stew, of Mossberries stirred thick. Good. Good! It shall form the base once set in mould.
original_zh_text: 德鲁伊的苔莓浓汤，够稠，够味！冻成型就能当基底。
translated_text: 这是与蔓越莓一起炖并搅拌得很稠。好.好！一旦放入模具，它将形成基地。
secondary_translated_text: This is stewed with cranberries and stirred until thick. good. Good! Once placed in the mold, it will form the base.

original_en_text: Ahh... you have brought song again, though perhaps it is wasted on one as unworthy as I.<hpage>You needn’t satisfy my curiosity if it pains you, sir, but I must ask, for what crime or sin did the Citadel imprison you?<page>My sin? A grave transgression, the cause of much pain for many. But to speak of a sin... is to invite its return. I will say no more.
original_zh_text: 啊……你又带来歌声，可惜我这罪躯不配聆听。<hpage>若勾起你伤痛可以不答，但我必须问：圣堡因何罪囚禁你？<page>我的罪过？我犯的错带来了许多伤痛。但罪过……是请它归来。我不想多说。
translated_text: 啊...你又带来了歌曲，尽管这对像我这样的人来说可能是浪费。<hpage>如果你感到痛苦，你不必满足我的好奇心，先生，但我必须问，城堡囚禁你是为了什么罪或罪过？<page>我的罪？这是严重违法行为，给许多人带来了巨大的痛苦。但当谈到罪时。就是邀请它回来。我不会再说什么了。
secondary_translated_text: Ah... You brought songs again, even though it might be a waste for people like me.<hpage>If you feel pain, you need not satisfy my curiosity, sir, but I must ask, for what sin or sin did the castle hold you captive?<page>My sin? This is a serious violation of the law and has caused great suffering to many people. But when it comes to sin. is to invite it back. I won't say anything more.

original_en_text: By the purity of your will... the c-c-clarity of your intent... you are innocent of the silken curse.<page>Failed, has this sentinel. Your j-judgment, will it accept.<hpage>Is this truly failure, gilded one? You meant to test me and have done so. I would expect nothing less of a true guardian.<hpage>The matter is resolved. There is no need for death. Stand, and let us part as friends.
original_zh_text: 凭纯、纯粹意志……清明本心……你未受魂丝侵蚀。<page>哨卫失、失职。甘受裁、裁决。<hpage>真有失职吗？你完成了测试，我认为已经尽了守卫之职。<hpage>此事到此为止，无需生死相搏。起身吧，你我以友相别。
translated_text: 以你意志的纯洁。你的意图很明确。你是无辜的丝绸诅咒。<page>失败了，有了这个哨兵。它会接受你的J判断吗？<hpage>这真的是失败吗，镀金人？你想考验我，而且你已经这么做了。我对真正守护者的期望丝毫没有减弱。<hpage>事情解决了。没有必要死。站起来，让我们像朋友一样分开。
secondary_translated_text: With the purity of your will. Your intentions are clear. You are an innocent silk curse.<page>Failed, with this sentry. Will it accept your J judgment?<hpage>Is this really a failure, Gilded Man? You wanted to test me, and you already did. My expectations for true guardians have not diminished at all.<hpage>The matter was solved. There is no need to die. Stand up and let us part as friends.

original_en_text: Seek out a Pickled Muckmaggot, the sacred treat revered and reviled for its intensity. It was a specialty of the chef Lugoli, long ago banished for culinary sacrilege.<page>Rumours sing that the great chef retreated to their home-caves in the dank midlands below...
original_zh_text: 找一份腌淤秽蛆。那是被放逐的卢戈利大厨的招牌菜。<page>听说那混蛋躲到中部地区的潮湿洞穴了……
translated_text: 寻找泡菜蛆，这是一种神圣的美味，因其强度而受到尊敬和谩骂。它是卢戈利厨师的特色菜，很久以前就因烹饪不合格而被淘汰。<page>有传言称，这位伟大的厨师已经退回到了家乡潮湿的中部山洞里。
secondary_translated_text: Look for pickle maggots, a sacred delicacy that is respected and reviled for its intensity. It is a specialty of Chef Lugoli and was eliminated long ago due to substandard cooking.<page>Rumor has it that the great chef has retreated to the damp central caves of his hometown.

original_en_text: <hpage>With this I have fulfilled my promise, sir. The ingredients have all been delivered. I trust now the meal can be made, and the oil awarded for my efforts?<page>You’ll have your oil, whelp! Firstly learn some patience! The dish must be prepared perfectly, enough to rouse my master and see them sated. <page>Now! Permit me to work my skill, and you’ll stand to see a meal of scent and taste that would dazzle Pharloom in her prime!
original_zh_text: <hpage>现在食材已备齐，该给我油了吧？<page>你这小虫急什么！得先把菜做得完美才能唤醒主人。<page>在这好好看着！见证这飘香万里的盛宴是怎么诞生的！
translated_text: <hpage>先生，我已经兑现了我的承诺。所有食材都已送达。我相信现在可以做好饭了。石油会奖励我的努力吗？<page>你会得到你的油的，孩子！首先，要学会耐心！这道菜必须准备得足够完美，才能叫醒我的主人并看到他们已经吃饱了。<page>现在！请允许我发挥我的技能，你会看到一顿足以让全盛时期的法鲁姆眼花缭乱的饭菜！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Sir, I have kept my promise. All ingredients have been delivered. I believe I can cook now. Will oil reward my efforts?<page>You'll get your oil, kid! First of all, learn to be patient! This dish had to be prepared perfectly enough to wake up my hosts and see that they were full.<page>Now! Allow me to use my skills and you will see a meal that dazzles Farum in its heyday!

original_en_text: Hrm? Oh, ‘tis merely the livid red bug. I was expecting some word from those above to explain the meaning of all this rumbling and shaking.<page>They fail in their holy duties! My master must be shielded from such inconveniences, else their digestion be disrupted.<hpage>There are worse fates than indigestion, sir. You are fortunate to be unharmed.<page>Fortune has nothing to do with it. I am simply of a hardier breed than the insipid young servants of these recent, wretched times!
original_zh_text: 嗯？是你这红衣虫啊，我还以为上面有虫来解释地震是怎么回事呢。<page>上面那帮渎职的家伙！惊扰主人的消化谁担待得起！<hpage>比起消化不良，你该庆幸自己没有受伤。<page>跟运气可没什么关系，我这把老骨头比现在那些软脚虾仆从硬朗多了！
translated_text: 嗯？哦，这只是一只铁青的红色昆虫。我希望上面的人能说点什么来解释所有这些隆隆和摇晃的含义。<page>他们没有履行自己的神圣职责！我的主人必须避免这些不便，否则他们的消化就会中断。<hpage>先生，还有比消化不良更糟糕的命运。你很幸运没有受伤。<page>这与命运无关。我只是比最近这些悲惨时期的迟钝年轻仆人更强大的品种！
secondary_translated_text: Hmm? Oh, it's just a livid red insect. I wish the people above would say something to explain what all this rumbling and shaking means.<page>They have not fulfilled their sacred duty! My masters must avoid these inconveniences or their digestion will be interrupted.<hpage>Sir, there is a worse fate than indigestion. You're lucky you weren't hurt.<page>This has nothing to do with fate. I am just a stronger breed than the dull young servants of these recent tragic times!

original_en_text: Rkkt! I know she has it. Keeps it. Carried coveted in her cloth. This one searched for it. Give it! Give it to us!
original_zh_text: 咔！我知道她藏着。揣在披风里。本管理员找了好久。交出来！立刻交出来！
translated_text: Rkkt！我知道她有。一直藏在我的衣服里。他正在看。把它给我！给我们！
secondary_translated_text: Rkkt! I know she does. It's been hiding in my clothes. He's watching. Give it to me! Give it to us!

original_en_text: Divine music... The soul of Pharloom eternal laid bare... That our cursed age could still receive such blessing...<page>So, Weaver-spawn, our melody is yours now, held in mind to carry beyond our walls. Was the learning worth its thieving? <hpage>It was, Vaultkeeper. And know to me your service continues. Keep the cylinder safe, along with any others I may bring.
original_zh_text: 神圣旋律……纺络永恒之魂的具现……这黑暗时代竟能重现荣光……<page>织者坏种，圣歌归你了，带出圣堡吧。这番追寻值得吗？<hpage>值得，而你将继续为我效命。保管好音筒，包括我以后带回来的。
translated_text: 神圣的音乐。法罗的永恒灵魂已经暴露了...在这个被诅咒的时代我们还能得到这样的祝福...<page>所以，韦弗的后代，我们的旋律现在是你们的了，记住把它带出我们的墙。学习值得窃取吗？<hpage>是的，金库管理员。请让我知道您的服务将继续。确保气瓶和我可能带来的任何其他气瓶是安全的。
secondary_translated_text: Holy music. Farrow's eternal soul has been exposed... We can still receive such blessings in this cursed era...<page>So, descendants of Weaver, our melody is now yours, remember to take it off our walls. Is learning worth stealing?<hpage>Yes, the treasury keeper. Please let me know that your service will continue. Make sure the cylinder and any other cylinders I may bring are safe.

original_en_text: ...Dear... grim... Dark it seems now... et these word... become your guide...<page>Hear our voice... Let it... your own! Give... of yourself... for great Pharloom, for... first-children who bequeath it to us... for our salva... sure to come!
original_zh_text: 亲爱的……朝圣者……黑暗笼罩时……谨记这些箴言……<page>倾听吾声……化为己念！为纺络献身……为赐予我们一切的初代子嗣……为即将到来的……救赎！
translated_text: ...亲爱的...严重的。现在看起来很黑……让这些话.成为您的向导。<page>倾听我们的声音。让它吧。你自己的！给...关于你自己。为了伟大的法罗，为了。把它留给我们的第一个孩子…为了我们的萨尔瓦。一定要来！
secondary_translated_text: ... Dear... serious. Now it looks very dark... let these words. Become your guide.<page>Listen to our voices. Let it go. Your own! Give... About yourself. For the great Farrow, for. Leave it to our first child... for our salva. Be sure to come!

original_en_text: For a sweet simmer, find me some Vintage Nectar. A rare brew, treasured by bugs with a keen scent for excellence.<page>There’s slim chance such an old yield might still exist. Alas! Its depth of flavour is a necessity for the holy dish!
original_zh_text: 甜味得用陈年蜜露，嗅觉敏锐的老饕才懂欣赏。<page>这陈酿怕是失传了……唉！可圣宴缺不得这醇香！
translated_text: 如果你想吃甜炖菜，请给我找一些复古甘露。一款被气味敏锐的昆虫所珍惜、追求卓越的稀有啤酒。<page>这种旧收益率仍然存在的可能性很小。唉！它的风味深度是圣菜的必要条件！
secondary_translated_text: If you want sweet stew, please find me some retro nectar. A rare beer that is cherished by perceptive insects and pursues excellence.<page>There is little chance that this old rate of return will still exist. Alas! Its depth of flavor is a necessary condition for sacred dishes!

original_en_text: Hark! ...ilgrim! You... climb... our eternal embrace... who stand stru... the threshold... our stark Citadel of stone... kno... true service may now commence.<page>Forget... your weary shell. Forgo... urge to still... arloom commands... give... greatest gift! Join our chor... Raise... shell... voice... and sing!
original_zh_text: 哈！……朝圣者！……你已攀至……永恒怀抱……立于圣堡石阶……须知……真正侍奉现在开始。<page>忘却……疲惫躯壳……摒弃……休憩之欲……纺络……命你……献上……最珍贵礼物！加入合唱……抬起躯壳……放声高歌！
translated_text: 听着！..邪恶！你...攀登我们永恒的拥抱。谁站起来了？阈值我们荒凉的石堡。知道真正的服务现在可以开始了。<page>忘了...你疲惫的身体。放弃.冲动仍然存在。arloom命令。给...最好的礼物！加入我们的合唱。提高贝壳...声音...唱歌！
secondary_translated_text: Listen!.. Evil! you... Climb our eternal embrace. Who stood up? Threshold our desolate stone castle. Know that the real service can now begin.<page>Forget... Your tired body. give up. The impulse remains. arloom order. Give... The best gift! Join us in the chorus. Improve shells... Sound... Sing!

original_en_text: For the core of the meal, find that marvellous meat... The rasher of a courier, those spritely bugs who once arrived at the toll of every second bell.<page>I saw many a courier gorge upon this fatty snack. Where are they all? Have they abandoned their holy toil?
original_zh_text: 主菜要送货虫的熏肉，那群按点报时的家伙最爱吃。<page>往日时常能在这看见他们，如今连个虫影都没了！
translated_text: 在饭菜的核心，找到美味的肉……快递员的垃圾，曾经在每次铃声响起时就到达的活泼虫子。<page>我看到很多快递员都在吃这些油腻的零食。他们都在哪里？他们放弃了神圣的辛劳吗？
secondary_translated_text: At the heart of the meal, find delicious meat... the garbage of the courier, the lively insects that once arrived every time the bell rings.<page>I see many couriers eating these greasy snacks. Where are they all? Have they given up their sacred toil?

original_en_text: The master has a mighty endurance, yet all of this rumbling and breaking makes me fearful for their safety.<page>Fear not. I will stay by their side until my old shell crumbles away.
original_zh_text: 虽说主人铜肠铁胃，但这动静也太吓人了。<page>不过不用怕，我就算拼了命也会保护主人！
translated_text: 大师们的耐力很强，但所有这些隆隆和破碎的声音让我担心他们的安全。<page>别担心我会和他们在一起，直到我的旧壳崩溃。
secondary_translated_text: The masters have great endurance, but all these rumbling and shattering sounds make me worry for their safety.<page>Don't worry I'll be with them until my old shell breaks down.

original_en_text: Eggy, eggy, hee hee! I’ll eat a lot, grow big and fat. Then I’ll lay a lot of eggies!<page>They bring me plenty of food, so they must want plenty of eggies.<page>And plenty they shall have, if they’re nice to me! Hee hee!
original_zh_text: 蛋蛋，生蛋蛋！吃饱饱，长胖胖，就能下好多蛋蛋！<page>他们给我这么多吃的，肯定想要好多蛋蛋！<page>只要对我好，要多少有多少！嘻嘻！
translated_text: 鸡蛋，鸡蛋，嘿！我会吃很多，长得又大又胖。那我就放很多鸡蛋！<page>他们给我带来了很多食物，所以他们一定想要很多鸡蛋。<page>如果他们对我好，他们就会有很多！呵呵！
secondary_translated_text: Eggs, eggs, hey! I will eat a lot and grow big and fat. Then I will put a lot of eggs!<page>They brought me a lot of food, so they must have wanted a lot of eggs.<page>If they were nice to me, they would have a lot! Hehe!

original_en_text: <hpage>I had thought I was answering your summons as a friend, or at least an ally, but now that we stand together in this place I can sense your intent.<hpage>You mean to raise your blades against me. Am I your enemy, then?<page>D-defence of the sacred Citadel, and the voices that fill it-t-t, is the eternal duty of the sentinels.<page>Termination, is the n-n-necessary fate of all those enthralled by the whispering Silk.<hpage>You believe me haunted, a slave to the pale threads? I think you are more perceptive than that. My Silk is my own, as is my will.<page>Unsure, is this sentinel. B-both haunted and innocent, you seem. With regret, this sentinel must t-t-test the strength of your will.
original_zh_text: <hpage>原以为响应的是友军召唤，但此刻感知到你的意图。<hpage>你要兵刃相向？视我为敌？<page>保卫圣、圣堡，守护其中圣、圣音……哨卫永恒之职。<page>清、清除所有被魂丝蛊惑者……是必要使命。<hpage>你认为我被苍白丝线操控？恐怕你错了，我的灵丝与意志皆属于我。<page>判、判断存疑。你似被侵蚀又似清白。遗憾……哨卫必须测、测试你的意志。
translated_text: <hpage>我以为我是作为朋友，或者至少是盟友，响应你的号召，但现在我们站在这里，我能感受到你的意图。<hpage>你想举起刀来对付我。那么我是你的敌人吗？<page>保卫神圣的城堡和充满其中的声音是哨兵永恒的职责。<page>结局是所有被低语的丝绸迷住的人不可避免的命运。<hpage>你相信我闹鬼，是苍白丝绸的奴隶吗？我认为你比这更有洞察力。我的丝绸是我自己的，也是我的意志。<page>不确定，这是哨兵。你似乎闹鬼又天真。不幸的是，这个哨兵必须考验你的意志力。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I thought I was responding to your call as a friend, or at least an ally, but now that we stand here, I can feel your intentions.<hpage>You want to raise the knife against me. So am I your enemy?<page>Defending the sacred castle and the voices that fill it is the eternal duty of the sentinel.<page>The ending is the inevitable fate of all those charmed by the whispering silk.<hpage>Do you believe that I am haunted and a slave to pale silk? I think you're more perceptive than that. My silk is my own and my will.<page>Not sure, this is the sentry. You seem haunted and naive. Unfortunately, this sentry must test your willpower.

original_en_text: An ornate lock mechanism with a keyhole at its centre.
translated_text: 一个华丽的锁机制，中心有一个钥匙孔。
secondary_translated_text: A gorgeous locking mechanism with a keyhole in the center.

original_en_text: The nectar! To think, such an aged extract still exists! What an exquisite tragedy that I cannot taste it myself. My master must have every drop!
original_zh_text: 陈年蜜露！没想到真的还存在，这等陈酿我都没福品尝，全都得给主人留着！
translated_text: 甘露！想想看，这么古老的提取物还存在！多么美丽的悲剧啊，我无法品尝自己的味道啊。我的主人一定要得到每一滴！
secondary_translated_text: Manna! Think about it, such an ancient extract still exists! What a beautiful tragedy, I can't taste my own taste. My master must have every drop!

original_en_text: Yes! Yes! She gives... It is ours! <hpage>I have passed the relic, Vaultkeeper. Now uphold your promise and aid me with your insight.<page>Fool! Demanding of a Vaultkeeper. Hers is impudence enough to bring death... If she did not carry the scent of Weaver-spawn.<hpage>So you know something of my ancestry, learned bug. If it gains me favour here, then I’ll expect your service in full.<page>Bleg! Dead! Dead, your vicious kind are meant to be. Better methinks to stay as such... <page>Gkkkt. But this one was taught. It shall fold its claws. It shall pass its knowledge, as much as is gleaned.<page>Only to a first child must a Vaultkeeper defer.
original_zh_text: 好！好！她交出了……归我们了！<hpage>遗物给你了，管理员。该兑现承诺了。<page>蠢货！竟敢命令本管理员。这般傲慢本该处死……若不是你带着织者的味道。<hpage>看来你知晓我的血脉，学者虫。若此地以我血脉为尊，我要求你为我效劳。<page>哼！早该灭绝的坏种……还是死干净为好……<page>咳，但本虫受过训诫。它会收起利爪，会分享知识，尽其所能。<page>唯有初代子嗣，能让本管理员低头。
translated_text: 是的！是的！她给了。这是我们的！<hpage>我已经穿过了废墟，守护者。现在信守你的承诺，用你的洞察力来帮助我。<page>傻瓜！对财务经理的要求。她的厚颜无耻足以带来死亡……如果她没有携带韦弗鸡蛋的气味的话。<hpage>所以你知道我祖先学到的错误。如果在这里得到我的青睐，那么我将期待您的全面服务。<page>布莱克！死了！死了，你们邪恶的同类注定会死。我认为最好保持这种状态。<page>Gkkkt。但这就是所教导的。它折叠爪子。它将尽可能多地传递它收集的知识。<page>财务主管只能服从第一个孩子。
secondary_translated_text: Yes! Yes! She gave it. This is ours!<hpage>I have passed through the ruins, keeper. Now keep your promise and use your insight to help me.<page>Fool! Requirements for financial managers. Her impudence was enough to bring death... if she hadn't carried the smell of Weaver's eggs.<hpage>So you know the mistakes my ancestors learned. If you find my favor here, then I will look forward to your comprehensive service.<page>Blake! Dead! Dead, your evil kind are doomed to die. I think it's best to keep it that way.<page>Gkkkt。But this is what is taught. It folds its claws. It will pass on as much of the knowledge it collects as possible.<page>The treasurer can only obey the first child.

original_en_text: Oh drab and trembling squib, you who timidly step upon the Great Stage, fate has seen you chosen!<page>Cast away your fear and join me as my partner. Pharloom’s flame may flicker, but together we shall spark it ablaze!<page>Let us enliven this Citadel lost to silence! Let us rouse the soul of this once great land!
original_zh_text: 怯懦的可怜虫啊，既踏上伟大舞台，便是命运所选！<page>抛却恐惧，与我共演！重燃纺络将熄的火焰！<page>唤醒沉寂的圣堡！唤醒这片土地的魂魄！
translated_text: 哦，单调而颤抖的哑炮，你们这些胆小的登上大舞台的人，命运已经看到你们被选中了！<page>抛开恐惧，加入我，成为我的伴侣。法鲁之火可能会闪烁，但我们将共同点燃它！<page>让我们重振这座寂静的城堡！让我们唤醒这片曾经伟大土地的灵魂！
secondary_translated_text: Oh, monotonous and trembling Squib, you timid people on the big stage, fate has seen you selected!<page>Put aside your fears and join me and become my partner. The fire of Faro may flash, but we will light it together!<page>Let us revitalize this silent castle! Let us awaken the soul of this once-great land!

original_en_text: <hpage>Vaultkeeper, I am seeking a melody held by your vaults, part of a set to open a path above. Tell me what you know of it.<page>The Weaver-thing would claim our sacred melody?! How grim the age we survive to see... Vile sacrilege for it to pass to an outsider...<page>Only our pontiff, lived long and low within our vault, they held the melody, jealously, covetously... A learning for the highest Vaultkeeper, and them alone.<page>A truth they were told to have found... There in the dark. Something within the melody, or the words. Something to set them silent... <hpage>I am not afraid of what I’ll hear, Vaultkeeper. If your pontiff and their melody wait below, I shall find them both.
original_zh_text: <hpage>管理员，我在寻找书库的旋律，用于开启上层通路。把你知道的告诉我。<page>织者竟想染指圣歌？！……何等黑暗的时代……异乡客妄图窃取圣律……<page>唯有深居书库之底的主教知晓……最高机密，独享的学识……<page>据说他们在地底发现了什么……旋律或歌词中的真相……令其沉默的真相……<hpage>我不惧真相，管理员。若你的主教在底下等着，我会找到他们。
translated_text: <hpage>财务主管，我正在寻找一首由您的金库承载的旋律，作为上面打开的道路的一部分。告诉我你对此了解多少。<page>韦弗，有什么东西会夺走我们神圣的旋律吗？！我们生活在一个多么严峻的时代啊……将其传递给外人是多么卑鄙的耻辱啊……<page>只有我们的教皇，他在我们的坟墓中长期而卑微地生活，邪恶而贪婪地握住旋律。这是关于顶级财务经理及其学习的。<page>他们被告知他们发现了一个真相。黑暗中旋律或文字中的一些东西。一些让他们安静的东西..<hpage>我不害怕我会听到的话，金库管理员。如果你的教皇和他们的旋律在下面等待，我会找到他们。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Treasurer, I am looking for a melody carried by your vault as part of the road that opens up above. Tell me what you know about it.<page>Weaver, is there anything that will take away our sacred melody?! What a severe era we live in... what a despicable shame to pass it on to outsiders...<page>Only our Pope, who lived long and humble lives in our graves, holds the melody wickedly and greedily. This is about top financial managers and their learning.<page>They were told they had discovered a truth. Something in the melody or words in the dark. Something to keep them quiet..<hpage>I'm not afraid of what I'll hear, vault keeper. If your popes and their melodies are waiting below, I will find them.

original_en_text: Yes! A fair gift, Weaver-spawn. This Vaultkeeper shall glean what knowledge a great mind can.
original_zh_text: 好！公平交易，织者坏种。本管理员将用智慧解析其中奥义。
translated_text: 是的！一份美丽的礼物，韦弗的后代。这位财务主管将收集伟大想法可以掌握的知识。
secondary_translated_text: Yes! A beautiful gift, descendants of Weaver. The treasurer will gather the knowledge that great ideas can be mastered.

original_en_text: As it was sung, our song sustains.<page>For Pharloom eternal, we shall guide.
original_zh_text: 歌咏不息，圣域不堕。<page>为永恒纺络，我等引领。
translated_text: 当它唱完时，我们的歌还在继续。<page>为了永恒的法鲁，我们将指导。
secondary_translated_text: When it was over, our song was still on.<page>For the sake of eternal Faro, we will guide.

original_en_text: Grkkt. What has she brought it? More treasures waiting on a Keeper’s insight, yes? The sacred cylinders of our holy Citadel? Pass them. Give them. Now! She must!
original_zh_text: 咔！她带了什么？更多需要解读的圣物？圣堡的圣咏音筒？快交出来！必须立刻交出来！
translated_text: Grkkt。她带来了什么？更多的宝藏等待着守护者的洞察，对吧？我们神圣城堡的圣筒？超越他们。把它给他们。现在！她必须！
secondary_translated_text: Grkkt。What did she bring? More treasure awaits the guardians 'insight, right? The sacred cylinder of our sacred castle? Beyond them. Give it to them. Now! She must!

original_en_text: Eternal, is the Citadel. Et-t-ternal, is the devotion of the sentinels.<page>While its shell is f-f-functional, this sentinel will hold true to its duty.
original_zh_text: 圣堡永存，哨、哨卫的忠诚也永存。<page>只要机能尚存……职责不怠。
translated_text: 城堡是永恒的。Et-t-ternal是哨兵的忠诚。<page>尽管它的外壳功能齐全，但这个哨兵将忠实地履行职责。
secondary_translated_text: The castle is eternal. Et-t-eternal is the loyalty of the sentry.<page>Although its shell is fully functional, this sentry will perform his duties faithfully.

original_en_text: Pilgrim of Pharloom eternal, you rare chosen who hath ascended to this final threshold, listen to our wish, deliver it, that you may rise above and see your pilgrimage end.
original_zh_text: 永恒纺络的朝圣者啊，荣登终阶的稀世天选。聆听我等祈愿，实现我等祈愿。方可升华，得见朝圣终焉。
translated_text: 法鲁姆的永恒朝圣者，你们难得的选择，已经到达了这最后的门槛，倾听我们的愿望并实现它，这样你们就可以超越并看到你们朝圣之旅的结束。
secondary_translated_text: Eternal pilgrims of Faroum, your rare choice, have reached this final threshold, listen to our wish and fulfill it, so that you can transcend and see the end of your pilgrimage.

original_en_text: Interloper! On you, our pontiff’s sacred melody! You have found it, hold it, and now you dally, lost like a mite in our shelves!<page>Return to the listening room below! The sacred cylinder can be played, and the melody of our vaults heard at last in this damned age stretched long.
original_zh_text: 入侵者！你已经找到主教圣歌，却还在此游荡！<page>回下层聆听室去！圣音筒可以演奏了，圣歌终将在此黑暗时代重现！
translated_text: 入侵者！你，我们教皇的神圣旋律！你已经找到了它并拿着它，现在你却在我们的架子上徘徊，像螨虫一样迷失了方向！<page>回到下面的收听室！神圣的圆柱可以演奏，在这个该死的时代，我们金库的旋律终于被听到了。
secondary_translated_text: Intruders! You, the sacred melody of our Pope! You have found it and held it, and now you are wandering on our shelves, lost like a mite!<page>Return to the listening room below! The sacred column can be played, and in this damn era, the melody of our treasury is finally heard.

original_en_text: Taste, smell, texture... It is done! A meal to rival Pharloom’s finest.<page>Mighty master, how long you have waited to set your jaw upon so perfect a dish! Join us, and dine!
original_zh_text: 色、香、味……俱全！纺络的绝世盛宴！<page>我的主人，让您久等了！快醒醒，开饭啦！
translated_text: 味道、气味、质地……完成了！这顿饭堪比法勒姆最好的一顿饭。<page>大师，您等了多久才品尝到如此完美的菜肴！和我们一起吃晚饭！
secondary_translated_text: Taste, smell, texture... it's done! This meal was comparable to the best meal in Farham.<page>Master, how long have you waited to taste such a perfect dish! Have dinner with us!

original_en_text: Yummy, yummy... oh! Are you here to serve me?<hpage>I am merely a visitor here, little one. Have you made this place your home, then?<page>My home? Oh yes! Lovely and warm. The big ones, they bring me food whenever I’m hungry. And I’m hungry now!
original_zh_text: 饿饿……咦？你是来喂我的吗？<hpage>我只是路过，小家伙。你把这当作巢穴了？<page>巢穴？对呀！又暖又舒服。大个子们总给我带吃的！现在就好饿！
translated_text: 好吃，好吃。噢！你是来为我服务的吗？<hpage>我只是这里的访客，小家伙。你认为这是家吗？<page>我的家？哦是的！可爱又温暖。大的，每当我饿的时候，他们就会给我送食物。我现在饿了！
secondary_translated_text: Delicious, delicious. Oh! Are you here to serve me?<hpage>I'm just a visitor here, little man. Do you think this is home?<page>My home? Oh yes! Cute and warm. Big one, whenever I am hungry, they will bring me food. I'm hungry now!

original_en_text: <hpage>I have more pressing tasks, sir. Perhaps your master should content themself with a humbler meal?<page>Blasphemy! My master shall have the holy indulgence they deserve, even if I must douse my shell in oil and climb onto a dish myself!
original_zh_text: <hpage>我有要事在身，让你主人先将就吃点吧？<page>放肆！就算把我榨成油膏摆上桌，也要让主人享用圣宴！
translated_text: <hpage>先生，我有更紧迫的任务。也许你的主人应该满足于一顿简单的饭菜？<page>亵渎神明！我的主人应该得到他们应得的神圣宽恕，即使我必须把壳浸在油里并亲自爬上盘子！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Sir, I have more pressing tasks. Maybe your host should settle for a simple meal?<page>blaspheme! My masters deserve the divine forgiveness they deserve, even if I have to soak the shell in oil and climb onto the plate myself!

original_en_text: To season a meal such as this... only a Crustnut will do. Once, scores of them could be gathered, high atop those coral crusted caves beyond the Grand Gate.<page>Surely some must still grow within that sand-ravaged land?
original_zh_text: 调味……一定得用硬壳果。珊瑚川里以前满地都是，现在就算只剩沙堆，应该也能刨到几颗。
translated_text: 像这样的菜肴调味。只能制造带壳坚果。曾几何时，几十只鸟可以聚集在门外珊瑚覆盖的洞穴顶部。<page>当然，还必须有一些生长在沙子肆虐的土地上吗？
secondary_translated_text: Season dishes like this. Only nuts in shells can be made. Once upon a time, dozens of birds could gather on the top of coral-covered caves outside the door.<page>Of course, must some grow on sand ravaged land?

original_en_text: As it was sung, our song sustains.<page>For Pharloom eternal, we shall teach.
original_zh_text: 歌咏不息，圣域不堕。<page>为永恒纺络，我等教化。
translated_text: 当它唱完时，我们的歌还在继续。<page>为了永恒的法鲁，我们将教书。
secondary_translated_text: When it was over, our song was still on.<page>For the eternal Faro, we will teach.

original_en_text: We would hear the voice of the Keepers, within their grand vaults.<page>They who guard our history, our prayers and our secrets, across the ages.
original_zh_text: 我等欲闻典藏司铎之音，回荡宏伟书库。<page>他们守护历史、祷文与秘辛，跨越无尽纪元。
translated_text: 我们将在他们宏伟的金库中听到守护者的声音。<page>他们守护着我们的历史、我们的祈祷和我们跨越时代的秘密。
secondary_translated_text: We will hear the voice of the guardians in their magnificent coffers.<page>They guard our history, our prayers, and our secrets that transcend the times.

original_en_text: Pickled Muckmaggot! So that banished chef’s recipes outlived them after all!<hpage>Not so, sir. I claimed the maggot from the chef themself. Their brutish work continued, even with their shell claimed by cursed thread.<page>Incredible! A bug so devout, they could cook with mind expunged. This Citadel was far too hasty to expel such brilliance.
original_zh_text: 腌淤秽蛆！卢戈利的秘方居然没失传！<hpage>我从他本人手里抢的，那家伙变丝傀了还在做菜。<page>厉害！没脑子还能掌勺，圣堡当初就不该赶他走！
translated_text: 泡菜蛆！所以流亡厨师的食谱比他们寿命更长！<hpage>并非如此，先生。我亲自从厨师手中夺走了蛆虫。他们的野蛮工作仍在继续，尽管他们的外壳被诅咒的线程占据。<page>难以置信！有了这样一只虔诚的昆虫，他们可以不假思索地做饭。堡垒太仓促，无法驱逐这样的荣耀。
secondary_translated_text: Kimchi maggot! So the recipes of exiled chefs outlast them!<hpage>Not so, sir. I personally snatched the maggots from the chef. Their barbaric work continues, even though their shell is occupied by cursed threads.<page>Unbelievable! With such a pious insect, they can cook without thinking. The fortress is too hasty to expel such glory.

original_en_text: <hpage>I could track down any ingredient you desire, for a price. The oil you keep here may be of some use to me.<hpage>Promise it as reward, and your master shall have his meal.<page>Hrmph! Such a squalid bargain ill befits a holy servant... but so be it. Fetch me the ingredients and you shall have that pale condiment for yourself!
original_zh_text: <hpage>我不能白白替你跑腿，拿这瓶油当酬劳吧。<hpage>答应的话，你的主人说不定能如愿吃上大餐。<page>哼！卑劣的交易……罢了，找回食材，苍白油就归你！
translated_text: <hpage>我可以根据价格找到您想要的任何食材。你在这里保留的油可能对我有一些用处。<hpage>承诺作为奖励，你的主人就会收到他的饭菜。<page>哼！这样肮脏的交易不适合圣侍……但那就这样吧。把原料给我，你就可以吃到那种淡味的调味品了！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I can find any ingredients you want based on the price. The oil you keep here may be of some use to me.<hpage>Promise as a reward, and your host will receive his meal.<page>Hmph! Such a dirty transaction is not suitable for a holy servant... but so be it. Give me the ingredients and you can eat the light condiment!

original_en_text: What an awful clattering! Would you kindly conduct yourself a little more carefully?<page>And why are you adorned in such an awful, livid red? By my oath, those above must make a sport of sending me the most wretched servants they can find!<hpage>I am no servant, sir, rather a guest of sorts, invited by the Citadel. Tell me, is this vial of oil on display your own?<page>Nothing here is my own, you impertinent young mite! This sacred hall, and all the food contained within, belong to my most exalted master.<page>The Great Gourmand! The finest connoisseur who has ever lived, the one whose tastes transcend the ages!<page>None are left now who venerate them as they deserve, save for the loyal, lonely bug who stands before you.<page>That oil is merely a small savoury to whet their appetite for the grand meal to come. A spectacular, Pharloom spanning dish that I have been planning for an age.<page>But alas, those above seem to have forsaken my poor master! And I have grown so old. Now I can never hope to gather the necessary ingredients. Blast their indolence!
original_zh_text: 叮叮咣咣吵死了！能安静点吗？<page>还有你为什么穿这身鲜红刺眼的装扮？上面那些混蛋专派些歪瓜裂枣来侍奉我！<hpage>我可不是仆从，算是圣堡的客人。这瓶油是你的藏品？<page>当然不是我的，你这没耐心的小虫！这里一切都属于我尊贵的主人——大胃王！<page>那是空前绝后的美食家！品味超越时代的存在！<page>如今只剩我忠心耿耿侍奉主人，其他虫早忘了本分。<page>那点油不过是开胃小菜，我筹备的可是横跨纺络的盛宴！<page>可恨上面那帮懒鬼断了供给，我这把老骨头哪凑得齐食材！
translated_text: 多么可怕的广告歌啊！你能小心一点吗？<page>你为什么穿着这么可怕、铁青的红色衣服？我发誓，上面的人一定要给我一个他们能找到的最悲惨的仆人！<hpage>先生，我不是仆人，而是城堡邀请的客人。告诉我，展出的那瓶油是你自己的吗？<page>这里没有什么是我的，你这个粗鲁的小螨虫！这个神圣的大厅，以及里面所有的食物，都属于我最高贵的主人。<page>伟大的美食家！有史以来最好的鉴赏家，品味超越时代的人！<page>除了站在你面前的忠诚、孤独的虫子之外，现在没有人像他们应得的那样尊重他们。<page>油只是一种小咸的味道，可以刺激他们对即将到来的饭菜的胃口。我计划了很长时间的一道壮观的法罗菜。<page>但唉，上面的人似乎抛弃了我可怜的主人！我变老了。现在我不再希望收集必要的食材了。该死的他们的懒惰！
secondary_translated_text: What a terrible jingle! Can you be careful?<page>Why are you wearing such terrible, livid red clothes? I swear, the people above will give me the most miserable servant they can find!<hpage>Sir, I am not a servant, but a guest invited by the castle. Tell me, is the bottle of oil on display your own?<page>Nothing here is mine, you rude little mite! This sacred hall, and all the food in it, belongs to my noblest master.<page>Great gourmet! The best connoisseur of all time, a person whose taste exceeds the times!<page>Except for the loyal, lonely bugs standing in front of you, no one now respects them as they deserve.<page>Oil is just a small salty taste that can stimulate their appetite for upcoming meals. I have been planning a spectacular Faroe dish for a long time.<page>But alas, the people above seem to have abandoned my poor master! I'm getting old. Now I no longer want to collect the necessary ingredients. Damn their laziness!

original_en_text: Horrid she! What fool dares strike a holy Vaultkeeper! It has knowledge! Insight! As much as any could possibly retain in our fallen age.<page>Would she cast it all aside just to create more death? If so, she is Weaver to the core!
original_zh_text: 疯婆子！竟敢袭击本管理员！本管理员可是掌握着末世最全的学识！<page>你要为了杀戮抛弃这些知识？果真是纯血织者！
translated_text: 她太可怕了！哪个傻瓜敢攻击神圣守护者！它有知识！洞察力！尽可能保留在我们这个颓废的时代。<page>她会放弃这一切，造成更多的死亡吗？如果是这样，她就是一个彻头彻尾的织布者！
secondary_translated_text: She is terrible! Which fool dares to attack the Divine Guardian! It has knowledge! Insight! Keep it as much as possible in our decadent era.<page>Will she give up all this and cause more deaths? If so, she would be a complete weaver!

original_en_text: So be it, impudent louse! Deny our kingdom’s agony. Refuse its touch upon your fickle shell!<page>Carve your hapless path. Stalk, and strike, and fight, but know your foe is fate herself, and she has risen raging!
original_zh_text: 那就这样吧，狂妄的虱子！拒绝感受王国的苦痛。让你善变的甲壳隔绝这一切！<page>走你的死路吧。即便你能潜伏、突袭、战斗，但记住你的敌人是命运本身——而她已怒火滔天！
translated_text: 那就这样吧，无耻的虱子！否认我们王国的苦难。阻止它触摸你善变的外壳！<page>开辟你不幸的道路。追踪、打击、战斗，但要知道你的敌人就是命运本身，她已经愤怒地崛起了！
secondary_translated_text: So be it, shameless lice! Deny the suffering of our kingdom. Stop it from touching your fickle shell!<page>Open up the path of your misfortune. Track, strike, fight, but know that your enemy is destiny itself, and she has risen angrily!

original_en_text: Pain! Pain! Do you hear her cries, cursed spider-spawn!? Pharloom suffers for our pathetic, mortal ignorance! We fail it and it falls! <page>Knowledge is needed. More and more! It must be hoarded, sought! Strength to understand, to calm and quell.<hpage>It is action now that needs taking, Vaultkeeper, by myself and those left alive who would aid me.<hpage>Seek solutions in your texts and psalms as you may, but they alone will not be enough to heal a pain so great.
original_zh_text: 痛苦！痛苦！听见她的哀嚎了吗，该死的蜘蛛坏种！？纺络正因我们可悲的愚昧受苦！我们辜负了它，它要灭亡了！<page>需要知识。无穷无尽的知识！必须囤积，必须追寻！需要力量去理解，去安抚，去镇压。<hpage>现在需要的是行动，管理员。由我，以及其他愿意相助的生者来执行。<hpage>你尽管在经卷圣歌中寻求解法，但光靠这些不足以治愈如此深重的伤痛。
translated_text: 痛！痛！你听到她哭了吗，被诅咒的蜘蛛蛋！？法罗因我们可悲的、凡人的无知而受苦！如果我们失败了，它就会倒下！<page>知识是需要的。越来越多！必须囤积并寻找！理解的力量，冷静和平静。<hpage>监护人，这是我和那些活着的帮助我的人现在需要采取的行动。<hpage>尽你所能在你的经文和诗篇中找到解决方案，但仅靠它们不足以治愈如此巨大的痛苦。
secondary_translated_text: It hurts! It hurts! Did you hear her cry, cursed spider egg!? Farrow suffers because of our sad, mortal ignorance! If we fail, it will fall!<page>Knowledge is needed. More and more! Must hoard and search! The power of understanding, calmness and calmness.<hpage>Guardian, this is the action I and those who live to help me need to take now.<hpage>Do your best to find solutions in your verses and psalms, but they alone will not be enough to cure such a huge pain.

original_en_text: Yessss! See them all! Its collection gleams complete. Such sacred understanding, stored safe.<page>You have performed your part, Weaver-spawn... The agreement is concluded. Knowledge and rosaries, all were passed fair. No more between us.<page>Leave this Keeper to its treasures and their insights. It has given its service. Now this Keeper wants its time alone!
original_zh_text: 好极了！看啊！藏品终于完整了。如此神圣的智慧，安然封存。<page>你完成了约定，织者坏种……交易结束。知识与念珠，两清。你我两不相欠。<page>让本管理员独享珍宝与真知吧。职责已尽。现在我只想独处！
translated_text: yeah!看到他们都!它的系列闪闪发光。这样一种神圣的理解被安全地保存着。<page>韦弗的后裔，你已经履行了你的职责。达成协议。知识和念珠公平传递。我们之间没有更多的了。<page>把这个守护者留给它的宝藏和他们的洞察力。它已经提供服务。现在这个守护者想要独处的时间!
secondary_translated_text: yeah! See them all! Its collection shines. Such a sacred understanding is safely preserved.<page>Descendants of Weaver, you have fulfilled your duties. reach an agreement. Knowledge and rosary beads are passed fairly. There is nothing more between us.<page>Leave this keeper to its treasures and their insights. It already provides services. Now this keeper wants time alone!

original_en_text: <hpage>Show me your collection, Vaultkeeper.<page>Grkt, Weaver-spawn! She is a bother! Nuisance! Bring more gifts. The collection still has gaps!
original_zh_text: <hpage>展示你的收藏，管理员。<page>咔！烦人的坏种！拿更多贡品来！本管理员的收藏还有空缺！
translated_text: <hpage>给我看看你的收藏，国库管理员。<page>快，韦弗!她是个麻烦!可爱的!多带点礼物。收藏还有差距!
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Show me your collection, Treasury keeper.<page>Come on, Weaver! She's trouble! Lovely! Bring more gifts. There is still a gap in the collection!

original_en_text: <hpage>Gilded one, what remained of the Citadel has been torn apart by the black threads. Still you keep to your duty?<page>While voices still fill the g-g-great chambers... the sacred task of the sentinels continues.<page>To defend... To p-p-protect.
original_zh_text: <hpage>金甲虫，圣堡残骸已被黑丝撕裂。还不放弃职责么？<page>只要圣、圣殿……仍存余音，哨卫之职……不止。<page>守、守卫……守护。
translated_text: <hpage>镀金堡垒的残余已被黑线撕裂。你还在履行职责吗？<page>当声音仍然充满g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-g-<page>防御为了保护。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>The remnants of the gilded fortress had been torn apart by the black line. Are you still performing your duties?<page>When the sound is still full of g-g-g-g-g-g g-g-g-g-g-@@-g-g-g-g-g @ g-g-g-g-g-g-<page>Defense for protection.

original_en_text: You dally, still? If you wish to earn your reward, you should be hunting down those ingredients! Or do you need directions from a serving-bug with some experience?
original_zh_text: 还磨蹭什么？想要报酬就赶紧的！还是说要本大厨给你指点指点方向？
translated_text: 你还在磨蹭吗？如果你想获得奖励，你应该寻找这些食材!或者您需要经验丰富的服务错误的指导吗？
secondary_translated_text: Are you still dawdling? If you want to get a reward, you should look for these ingredients! Or do you need experienced guidance on service errors?

original_en_text: The Weaver-spawn, she has found it! Our pontiff’s sacred cylinder, stolen from the dark below...<page>Never! States our law. Never must our melody pass to a bug not Keeper! But you, fool Weaver, would shatter those tenants with reckless ease.<hpage>Your pontiff is gone, Vaultkeeper. Your fellows have fallen to husk or thread. What laws once bound these vaults died with them.<page>Ackk! Fine, cursed she. Claim the sacred song, and pain to you if we both are damned forever for it!
original_zh_text: 织者坏种，她得手了！她夺走主教的圣音筒……<page>休想！律法规定，圣歌绝不可外传！但你这坏种竟然轻易践踏戒律。<hpage>你的主教死了，管理员。同僚都化作空壳或丝偶，昔日的律法也随他们入土了。<page>咳！随你便，诅咒你。带走圣歌吧，愿我们永堕地狱！
translated_text: 韦弗，她找到了!我们教皇的圣筒，从黑暗中被盗……<page>永远不会!陈述我们的法律。我们的旋律永远不能传递给虫子，而不是守护者!但你这个傻瓜韦弗，会轻易地鲁莽地压垮那些租户。<hpage>你的教皇走了，金库的守护者。你的同伴已经堕落成贝壳或细绳。曾经管理这些金库的法律也消亡了。<page>阿克！好吧，诅咒她。声称这首神圣的歌曲，如果我们因此永远被诅咒，那么你就会受苦！
secondary_translated_text: Weaver, she found it! Our Pope's holy cylinder, stolen from the darkness...<page>Never! State our laws. Our melody can never be passed on to the bugs, not to the guardians! But you fool Weaver will easily and recklessly crush those tenants.<hpage>Your Pope is gone, keeper of the vault. Your companion has fallen into shells or strings. The laws that once governed these vaults also died.<page>Ake! All right, curse her. Claiming this sacred song, if we are cursed forever for it, then you will suffer!

original_en_text: <hpage>I return, bug, and ask to hear your melody again, that I may lock it clear in my mind.<page>Very well, good pilgrim. For one so fiercely devout as yourself, gladly will I give this gift.
original_zh_text: <hpage>我回来了，请你再演奏一遍旋律，我要记牢。<page>好，虔信者。为了你这般赤诚，我很乐意演奏。
translated_text: <hpage>我回来了，Bug，要求再次听到你的旋律，这样我就可以将它清晰地锁在我的脑海中。<page>非常好，好朝圣者。对于像你这样虔诚的人，我很乐意送给你这份礼物。
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>I'm back, Bug, asking to hear your melody again so I can lock it clearly in my mind.<page>Very good, good pilgrim. For a pious person like you, I would be happy to give you this gift.

original_en_text: <hpage>Your master seems satisfied, sir. It is time you gave what was promised.<page>Yes. Yes! It has been done! Made and served. A dish to match my master’s refined desires.<page>The pale trifle is yours. Take it and leave! My master needs time to reflect, and I must ponder on flavours anew!
original_zh_text: <hpage>你的主人看来很满意，该兑现承诺了吧？<page>对，对！主人吃得很满意！<page>苍白油是你的了，拿走吧！主人还要好好回味，我也要构思新菜式了！
translated_text: <hpage>你的主人似乎很满意，先生。是时候兑现承诺了。<page>对，对！完成了！准备好了一道满足主人精致欲望的菜肴。<page>这个苍白的小东西是你的。拿着它离开！我的主人需要时间反思，我也必须重新思考我的品味！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Your master seems satisfied, sir. It's time to keep the promise.<page>Yes, yes! It's done! A dish was prepared that satisfied the owner's exquisite desires.<page>This pale little thing is yours. Take it and leave! My master needs time to reflect, and I must rethink my tastes!

original_en_text: <hpage>Vaultkeeper, I bring the psalm cylinder recovered from the dark chambers below here. I would learn its melody.<page>Kak! Then pass it, filthy Weaver-spawn! A cylinder so sacred should not remain a moment longer in your grubby claws!
original_zh_text: <hpage>管理员，我带来了下层密室的圣咏音筒，要学习其中旋律。<page>咔！交出来，肮脏的织者坏种！此等圣物岂能在你脏爪中多留一秒！
translated_text: <hpage>金库管理员，我带来了从下面暗室中找到的赞美诗管。我会学习它的旋律。<page>咔嚓！那就把它传下去吧，肮脏的韦弗！这样一个神圣的圆柱体不应该再留在你肮脏的爪子里！
secondary_translated_text: <hpage>Treasurer, I brought the hymn tube I found in the dark room below. I will learn its melody.<page>Crack! Then pass it on, dirty Weaver! Such a sacred cylinder should no longer remain in your filthy claws!

original_en_text: Hold them, will she? Covet them? Can she not part with such a small prize?<page>Remain blind fool she. This Keeper’s understanding stays with itself.
original_zh_text: 她想私藏？如此贪婪？连这点小礼都吝啬？<page>她就继续当瞎子吧。本管理员的智慧自会保留。
translated_text: 抓住它们，她会吗？觊觎他们？这么小的奖品，她难道舍不得吗？<page>继续盲目愚弄她，监护人的认识不会改变。
secondary_translated_text: Grab them, will she? Covet them? Wasn't she reluctant to part with such a small prize?<page>Continue to blindly fool her, and the guardian's understanding will not change.

original_en_text: Weaver-thing! Does she hope to spy upon our treasured records?<page>Within our vast store, always more there is to know, the old methods of prayer, to this land, to its rulers, and to the strength at its heart.
original_zh_text: 织者坏种！她想窥探我们的珍贵典籍？<page>在我们的浩瀚典藏中，有古老祷文，有统治之术，还有……核心力量的秘辛。
translated_text: 智奴想窥探我们的珍贵记录吗？<page>在我们巨大的商店、古老的祈祷方法中，总是有更多关于这片土地、它的统治者和它的核心权力的信息需要了解。
secondary_translated_text: Does Zhinu want to spy on our precious records?<page>In our huge shops and ancient methods of prayer, there is always more information to know about the land, its rulers and its core powers.

original_en_text: She carries a precious cylinder! She must give it! Share it! Claw to claw!<page>Pass it! And this Vaultkeeper shall grant their wisdom. Just a small taste! A trickle! A glimmer! Of our Citadel’s sacred understandings.
original_zh_text: 她带着圣咏音筒！必须交出来！分享！交出来！<page>递过来！本管理员便赐予智慧。只需浅尝！一滴！一缕！圣堡的至高真知！
translated_text: 她带着一个珍贵的气瓶！她必须这么做！分享一下！爪子对爪子！<page>传球！财务主管会给他们智慧。只是一小口！滴！一道光！对我们城堡的神圣理解。
secondary_translated_text: She was carrying a precious gas cylinder! She had to do it! Share it! Claw to Claw!<page>Pass the ball! The treasurer will give them wisdom. Just a small bite! Beep! A ray of light! A sacred understanding of our castle.

original_en_text: Woken, is this sentinel. F-f-f-functional, is its shell.<page>Still devoted, is this s-s-sentinel, and awaiting your commandment.<hpage>You speak, gilded one? I’ve no command for you, but my curiosity is piqued.<hpage>You call yourself a sentinel. What is it you are charged with protecting?<page>Defence of the sacred C-c-citadel, and the voices that fill it-t-t, is our eternal duty.<hpage>I had assumed as much. Yet look around you, gilded one. During your slumber, the Citadel has fallen, and its voices lay silent. This place is dead, or very nearly.<hpage>Some would argue that standing guard over a kingdom’s corpse is a foolish task, empty of meaning. I wonder then, will you still hold true to your charge?
original_zh_text: 苏、苏醒，本哨卫。功、功能正常。<page>忠、忠诚依旧，静候指令。<hpage>金甲虫，你会说话？我无意下令，但很好奇。<hpage>你自称哨卫，是在守护何物？<page>保卫圣、圣堡，守护其中圣、圣音，是哨卫的永恒之职。<hpage>意料之中。但环顾四周吧，圣堡已然倾颓，圣音皆已沉寂。此地已是坟冢。<hpage>守卫已死的王国已没有意义，你依然要恪守职责么？
translated_text: 醒来的是这个哨兵。F-f-f-f-f-f-f-functional是它的外壳。<page>这个哨兵仍然忠诚并等待您的命令。<hpage>你说镀金？我没有收到你的命令，但我的好奇心被激起了。<hpage>你称自己为哨兵。你有责任保护什么？<page>保卫神圣的C-c城堡和充满其中的声音是我们永恒的职责。<hpage>我也这么认为但看看你们周围，镀金的人们。当你睡觉的时候，城堡已经倒塌，声音无声。这个地方已经死了，或者几乎死了。<hpage>有些人会认为守护王国的身体是一项愚蠢的任务，毫无意义。我想知道，你还会忠于自己的职责吗？
