original_en_text: Adornment strung with a large quantity of rosaries. Can be broken and the rosaries used to trade.
original_zh_text: 串有大量念珠的项链，拆解后取出的念珠可用于交易。
translated_text: 串着大量念珠的装饰品。可以破碎并用于交易念珠。
secondary_translated_text: Ordnance strung with a large number of rosary beads. Can be broken and used to trade rosary beads.

original_en_text: Liquid lifeseed extracted from a ripe bud. Possesses regenerative qualities.
original_zh_text: 成熟花苞中提取的生命精华，具有再生功效。
translated_text: 从成熟花蕾中提取的液体丁香。它具有再生品质。
secondary_translated_text: Liquid cloves extracted from mature flower buds. It has regenerative quality.

original_en_text: Carved child’s toy of a bug clad in leaves.
original_zh_text: 披叶虫子造型的儿童玩具。
translated_text: 一个雕刻的儿童玩具，一只用树叶包裹的虫子。
secondary_translated_text: A carved children's toy, a bug wrapped in leaves.

original_en_text: Common weapon of Pharloom, still in good condition despite long use. An expertly crafted metal rod with a sharpened tip.
original_zh_text: 纺络的常见武器，精制的金属杆配上锐利的尖端，历久弥新。
translated_text: 法鲁的常用武器尽管长期使用，但仍然状况良好。一根精心制作的金属棒，尖端锋利。
secondary_translated_text: Faro's commonly used weapons are still in good condition despite long-term use. A carefully crafted metal rod with a sharp tip.

original_en_text: Last surgery of Conductor Mizello, performed in Whiteward’s operating theatre.
original_zh_text: 指挥家米泽洛在白愈厅的手术室中进行的最后一场手术。
translated_text: 米泽洛指挥的最后一次手术是在怀特沃德的手术室进行的。
secondary_translated_text: The last operation Mizelot directed was performed in the operating room in Whiteward.

original_en_text: Fine thread spun from the soul of its creator. Highly coveted for its remarkable strength and mystical properties. Used to heal wounds, extend life and weave powerful runes.
original_zh_text: 由其创造者的灵魂纺成的精细丝线，因其非凡的强度和神秘特性而备受珍视。可用于治愈伤口、延续生命，以及编织强力的符文。
translated_text: 物质是从它们的创造者的灵魂中编织出来的。它因其非凡的力量和神秘的属性而受到高度重视。用于治疗伤口、延长生命和编织强大的符文。
secondary_translated_text: Substances are woven from the soul of their creators. It is highly valued for its extraordinary power and mysterious attributes. Used to heal wounds, extend life and weave powerful runes.

original_en_text: Map of Pharloom, partially filled out. Without a quill it cannot be updated.
original_zh_text: 沙克拉绘制的纺络局部地图。可使用羽毛笔更新地图以显示新发现的区域。
translated_text: 法勒姆地图，部分填写。如果没有羽毛笔，就无法更新。
secondary_translated_text: Map of Farham, partially filled out. Without a quill, you cannot update it.

original_en_text: A frustrating fiend. They flee beneath the bone whenever I try to strike them down.
original_zh_text: 恼人的小恶魔，每当我挥针便钻入骸骨缝隙逃遁。
translated_text: 一个令人沮丧的恶魔。每次我试图击倒它们时，它们都会躲在骨头下面。
secondary_translated_text: A frustrating demon. Every time I try to knock them down, they hide under the bones.

original_en_text: Is this abundance a sign of purity or greed? The way faith is measured in this land is curious indeed.
original_zh_text: 这般财富象征着虔信还是贪婪？多数虫肯定视此等囤积为罪孽。
translated_text: 这种丰富是纯洁还是贪婪的标志？这片土地上衡量信仰的方式确实很奇怪。
secondary_translated_text: Is this richness a sign of purity or greed? The way faith is measured in this land is indeed strange.

original_en_text: Once they summoned song from their subjects. Now they rise only to command an end to those unstrung.
original_zh_text: 昔日的乐章指挥者，如今只为剿灭清醒者而挥棒。
translated_text: 一旦他们从他们的主题中呼唤这首歌。现在，他们的崛起只是为了命令那些不一定要结束的人。
secondary_translated_text: Once they call the song from their theme. Now, their rise is only to command those who don't have to end.

original_en_text: Automatons of impeccable construction, welcoming entrants to their chamber with a display of deadly dance.
original_zh_text: 以致命舞姿迎接访客的精密自动机。
translated_text: 机器人的结构无可挑剔，用致命的舞蹈欢迎进入他们的房间。
secondary_translated_text: The robots 'structure is impeccable, welcoming into their rooms with a deadly dance.

original_en_text: Mad matriarch of the Slab rarely seen outside her warren. From her all jailers are born and bred.
original_zh_text: 罪石牢狱的癫狂主宰，所有狱卒皆由其孕育。
translated_text: 石板上疯狂的女族长在她的领地之外很少见到。所有的狱卒都是在她手下出生和长大的。
secondary_translated_text: The crazy matriarch on the stone slab is rarely seen outside her territory. All the jailers were born and raised under her.

original_en_text: Flight it possesses, but only just. It may lift from the stone, but those sad wings would never carry it far.
original_zh_text: 那对萎缩的翅膀勉强能使它们离地数尺，但没法飞多远。
translated_text: 它有飞行的能力，但仅此而已。它可能会从石头上飞走，但那些悲伤的翅膀永远不会带它走得远。
secondary_translated_text: It has the ability to fly, but that's all. It may fly away from the stone, but those sad wings will never carry it far.

original_en_text: Mindless infant larva, coated in thick slime.
translated_text: 无脑婴儿幼虫身上覆盖着厚厚的粘液。
secondary_translated_text: The bodies of brainless baby larvae are covered with thick mucus.

original_en_text: Chief and chaplain of the Stilkin, forever raging against the Citadel that chokes their caves and sees them suffer.
original_zh_text: 斯提金部族酋长兼祭司，对圣堡切齿痛恨——圣堡毁掉了斯提金部族的洞穴，令其族虫苦不堪言。
translated_text: 斯蒂尔金的酋长兼牧师总是对城堡感到愤怒，城堡封锁了他们的洞穴，看着他们受苦。
secondary_translated_text: Stillkin's chief and priest was always angry at the castle, which sealed off their caves and watched them suffer.

original_en_text: An essential bug if one ever hoped to navigate that dark maze of stacks and scrolls.
original_zh_text: 如果没有此虫引路，没有其他虫能在那个由书卷堆砌的黑暗迷宫中穿行。
translated_text: 如果一个人想穿越书堆和卷轴的黑暗迷宫，这是一个必不可少的错误。
secondary_translated_text: If one wants to traverse the dark labyrinth of piles of books and scrolls, this is an indispensable mistake.

original_en_text: Child of Verdania, fully capable to fight despite its young age.
original_zh_text: 翠庭的幼童，虽年幼却战力完备。
translated_text: 维尔达尼亚的孩子们尽管年纪很小，但完全有战斗能力。
secondary_translated_text: Despite their young age, the children of Verdanha are fully capable of fighting.

original_en_text: Their thick shroud leaves them sightless, yet it seems to matter little. They have no care for their own safety, wishing only to charge at those they sense as sinful.
original_zh_text: 厚罩使其目不能视，却仍疯狂冲击周围感知到的“罪人”。
translated_text: 厚厚的裹尸布遮住了他们的眼睛，但这似乎并不重要。他们不关心自己的安全，只想指控那些他们认为有罪的人。
secondary_translated_text: A thick shroud covered their eyes, but it didn't seem to matter. They don't care about their own safety and just want to accuse those they believe are guilty.

original_en_text: Large, gelatinous drifter. Chases away threats by hurling its bulk around.
original_zh_text: 巨大的凝胶状漂浮生物。利用自己身体冲撞，驱赶威胁。
translated_text: 大型凝胶状漂移。通过散布威胁的音量来驱散威胁。
secondary_translated_text: Large gel-like drift. Dissolve threats by spreading the volume of the threat.

original_en_text: Aggressive fly of Pharloom’s lowlands. Rams prey with its hardbone mask.
original_zh_text: 纺络低地区域的暴脾气飞蝇，善于使用骨质头甲冲撞猎物。
translated_text: 法勒姆低地的攻击性苍蝇。公羊使用硬面具狩猎。
secondary_translated_text: Aggressive flies in lowland Farham. Rams use hard masks to hunt.

original_en_text: Blade maiden of a once renown warrior sect, survived long beyond the rest of her order.
original_zh_text: 纺络曾出现过一个赫赫有名的勇士宗派，而这位女针客就是其最后的幸存者。
translated_text: 曾经著名的武士派的刀锋女比她的其他教派生存了很长时间。
secondary_translated_text: The once-famous Blade Lady of the Samurai School has survived for a long time than her other sects.

original_en_text: Blindingly fast, winged warrior able to launch pointed pinions from its forelimbs.
original_zh_text: 能从前肢发射尖刺的极速飞翼勇士。
translated_text: 带翅膀的战士能够以惊人的速度从前臂射出尖锐的羽毛状突起。
secondary_translated_text: Winged warriors can shoot sharp feather-like protrusions from their forearms at alarming speeds.

original_en_text: Leaping hunter of a bygone age. The swiftest of their sect, deftly skilled with spinning foreblades.
original_zh_text: 善用旋转刀刃的传奇猎手，曾以速度称霸整个派系。
translated_text: 过去的跳跃猎人。他们派中最聪明的人熟练地旋转前剑。
secondary_translated_text: Jumping hunters of the past. The cleverest man in their faction skillfully rotated the front sword.

original_en_text: They seek to slay their only chance at survival. Alas, any words would fall useless. I have only my blade to offer response.
original_zh_text: 它们想要斩断族群最后的生机。我任何的言语劝解皆为徒劳，唯有利刃能终结这愚行。
translated_text: 他们试图扼杀唯一的生存机会。唉，什么都没用。我只有我的刀来回应。
secondary_translated_text: They tried to kill their only chance of survival. Alas, nothing works. I had only my knife to respond.

original_en_text: They call out to warn their fellows at the smallest sense of threat. A successful hunt here means staying silent and hidden right up until the decisive strike.
original_zh_text: 稍有威胁迹象便会向同伴鸣叫示警。在此地成功捕猎的秘诀，在于无声潜行直至发动致命一击前的最后一刻。
translated_text: 当他们感到最轻微的威胁感时，他们就会大声警告同伴。在这里成功的狩猎意味着在决定性的打击之前保持沉默和躲藏。
secondary_translated_text: When they feel the slightest sense of threat, they shout out a warning to their companions. Successful hunting here means staying silent and hiding before the decisive blow.

original_en_text: Though the Weavers have long passed from Pharloom, this servant still performs its function.
original_zh_text: 纺络的织者虽已绝迹，这位仆从仍恪守古老的职责。
translated_text: 尽管织布工早已离开法鲁，但仆人仍然履行了自己的职责。
secondary_translated_text: Although the weaver had long since left Faro, the servant still performed his duties.

original_en_text: Hard-shelled bug with a climber’s pin. Their pin, once aid, has become a weapon, though the bug is unrefined in its use.
original_zh_text: 身负硬壳的朝圣者，将攀爬用的长针作为武器，尽管使用手法粗陋。
translated_text: 带有攀爬针的精装昆虫。他们的别针曾经是一种帮助，现在已经成为一种武器，尽管该错误的使用并不完美。
secondary_translated_text: Hardcover insect with climbing needles. Their pins, once a help, have now become a weapon, although the wrong use is imperfect.

original_en_text: Huge ant hunter tasked to protect the stores and passages of its tribe.
original_zh_text: 守护部族仓库及通道的重甲巨蚁。
translated_text: 这位巨型蚂蚁猎人的任务是保护部落的商店和通道。
secondary_translated_text: The giant ant hunter's mission is to protect the tribe's shops and corridors.

original_en_text: Staunch and skilled bladebug of a once flourishing land lost to time.
original_zh_text: 失落王朝的精锐刀虫，双刃技法堪称艺术。
translated_text: 在这片曾经繁荣的土地上，坚强而熟练的布雷德博已经消失在时间中。
secondary_translated_text: In this once-prosperous land, the strong and skilled Bredebo has disappeared in time.

original_en_text: Aged pilgrim, overgrown with lichen and moss.
original_zh_text: 浑身覆满地衣苔藓的老迈信徒，会从胃囊喷射苔藓团块攻击。
translated_text: 年长的朝圣者身上长满了地衣和苔藓。
secondary_translated_text: The older pilgrims are covered with lichen and moss.

original_en_text: There is no finesse in its use of Silk. It consumes its slim supply only to amplify its force.
original_zh_text: 它对灵丝的运用毫无精妙可言，只是消耗那本就稀少的灵丝储备来增强自身的力量。
translated_text: 它没有使用丝绸的技巧。它消耗微薄的供应只是为了放大它的力量。
secondary_translated_text: It has no skill in using silk. It consumes its meager supply just to amplify its power.

original_en_text: Steel horned floater, able to defend itself and its companions.
original_zh_text: 长有螺旋犄角的浮空甲虫，能够有效保卫自身与同伴。
translated_text: 钢角漂浮物可以保护自己和同伴。
secondary_translated_text: The steel-horn float can protect yourself and your companions.

original_en_text: Tormented will of countless husks made manifest in a pit of Silk dregs.
original_zh_text: 灵丝残渣深坑中凝聚无数空壳的怨念集合体。
translated_text: 无数贝壳的痛苦意志在废墟中显露出来。
secondary_translated_text: The painful will of countless shells was revealed in the ruins.

original_en_text: That they ever hoped to keep their domain clean... What futility.
original_zh_text: 妄图维持这片土地的洁净……何等徒劳。
translated_text: 他们原本希望保持领地清洁。多么徒劳啊。
secondary_translated_text: They had hoped to keep the territory clean. How futile.

original_en_text: I would very much like to feel their soft fur, if only they weren’t so hostile.
original_zh_text: 要不是它们现在对谁都充满敌意，我真想摸摸这身柔软的绒毛。
translated_text: 我真的很想感受它们柔软的皮毛，只要它们不那么敌对。
secondary_translated_text: I really want to feel their soft fur, as long as they are not so hostile.

original_en_text: This kingdom appears more advanced in metalwork than my own ever was, in great part due to the natural heat source at its base. Working in such an environment is an impressive feat.
original_zh_text: 此地的冶金技术远超我的故国，全因地下天然热源的优势。能在如此高温环境中劳作生存，实为壮举。
translated_text: 这个王国在金属制品方面似乎比我自己的王国更先进，这在很大程度上是由于其底部的自然热源。在这样的环境中工作是一项令人印象深刻的壮举。
secondary_translated_text: This kingdom seems to be more advanced in metalwork than my own kingdom, in large part due to the natural heat source at its bottom. Working in such an environment is an impressive feat.

original_en_text: Aerial worker lost to Pharloom’s Haunting. Bears a pouch full with flintstone which they will fling at intruders.
original_zh_text: 被丝咒侵蚀的空中劳工，随身携带一个装满燧石的袋子，投掷燧石攻击入侵者。
translated_text: 机组人员因法勒姆的困扰而丧生。熊里装着一个装满磨石的袋子，它们会把磨石扔向入侵者。
secondary_translated_text: The crew died because of Farham's distress. The bear contained a bag full of grindstones, which they would throw at the invaders.

original_en_text: Haughty thespian convinced that only dazzling performance can raise Pharloom from the throes of death.
original_zh_text: 坚信华丽演出能拯救纺络的傲慢演员。
translated_text: 这位傲慢的演员相信，只有令人眼花缭乱的表演才能让法鲁摆脱死亡的痛苦。
secondary_translated_text: The arrogant actor believed that only a dazzling performance could save Faro from the pain of death.

original_en_text: Hard-shelled insect common upon the surface of Shellwood Pond. Once a staple food for passing pilgrims.
original_zh_text: 甲木林池沼的硬壳水栖虫，曾是朝圣者途中的主要食物。
translated_text: 贝壳池塘表面的一种常见的硬壳昆虫。它曾经是过去朝圣者的主食。
secondary_translated_text: A common hard-shelled insect found on the surface of shell ponds. It was once a staple food for pilgrims in the past.

original_en_text: Old knight consumed by black thread.
secondary_translated_text: The old knight was swallowed by the black line.

original_en_text: I would not have guessed so large and marvelous a flea existed. I am pleased it saw sense before I had to strike a killing blow.
original_zh_text: 我未曾料想竟存在如此巨大的跳蚤。幸好它在最后关头恢复理智，免于我下杀手。
translated_text: 我没想到会有这么大这么棒的跳蚤。我很高兴在我给它致命一击之前它看到了真相。
secondary_translated_text: I didn't expect such a big and wonderful flea. I'm glad it saw the truth before I gave it the fatal blow.

original_en_text: A terrifying achievement of Pharloom, to build a construct so large and yet so nimble.
original_zh_text: 竟能建造出如此庞大却又灵巧非凡的构造，实乃纺络工造技艺巅峰之作。
translated_text: 这是一个可怕的成就法鲁建立这样一个大而灵活的建筑。
secondary_translated_text: It was a terrible achievement for Faro to build such a large and flexible building.

original_en_text: Their rough, ridged shell grips tight to any surface. Even walls and roofs become pathways for these nimble bugs.
original_zh_text: 粗糙的带棱甲壳可攀附任何表面。峭壁和洞顶对它们来说都是畅通无阻的道路。
translated_text: 它们粗糙的脊状外壳紧紧地附着在任何表面上。甚至墙壁和屋顶也成为这些敏捷虫子的通道。
secondary_translated_text: Their rough ridged shells adhere tightly to any surface. Even walls and roofs become passageways for these agile bugs.

original_en_text: Nature distorted... This bug was born tiny and mild. The Citadel deformed it in futile hope it may sustain.
original_zh_text: 自然天性惨遭扭曲..……此虫原本小巧温顺，却被圣堡强行改造。它的改造者竟然妄想它能承受这种畸变……
translated_text: 自然被扭曲了。这种细菌本质上很小且温和。城堡扭曲了它，徒劳地希望它能够持续下去。
secondary_translated_text: Nature is distorted. The bacteria are inherently small and mild. The castle distorts it, hoping in vain that it will last.

original_en_text: They would make effective hunting companions, though even without the Haunting I suspect their loyalty would always remain to their clan.
original_zh_text: 它们是优秀的狩猎伙伴。就算没有丝咒作祟，我相信它们也会永远忠于自己的部族。
translated_text: 他们将成为有效的狩猎伙伴，尽管即使他们没有闹鬼，我怀疑他们的忠诚将永远留在部落中。
secondary_translated_text: They will become effective hunting companions, although even if they are not haunted, I suspect their loyalty will remain in the tribe forever.

original_en_text: Shell plated worm that lives beneath pools of shifting sand.
original_zh_text: 潜伏流沙之底的板甲蠕虫，突袭吞噬猎物。
translated_text: 生活在流沙池下的有壳蠕虫。
secondary_translated_text: Shelled worms living under quicksand ponds.

original_en_text: Large male Driznit, ferocious and territorial. Fires its heavy coral mask at intruders.
original_zh_text: 领地意识强烈的雄性掷面虫，投掷其沉重的珊瑚面甲御敌。
translated_text: 体型大的雄性德兹尼特，凶猛而轮廓分明。向入侵者发射沉重的珊瑚面具。
secondary_translated_text: The large male Deznit is fierce and well-defined. Fire heavy coral masks at intruders.

original_en_text: With its wranglers long dead, the Moorwing stalked the towers of Greymoor, feasting on passing pilgrims and tenders alike.
original_zh_text: 自从其驯兽师死后，荒沼翼主常年盘踞在灰沼的众多高塔，猎食过往的朝圣者和居民。
translated_text: 由于它的牧马人早已消亡，沼泽翼徘徊在格雷莫尔的塔楼上，以路过的朝圣者和温柔者为食。
secondary_translated_text: Since its horse-rangers have long since died, the swamp wings linger on Greymore's towers, feeding on passing pilgrims and gentlers.

original_en_text: Hiding its tongue amongst fronds so similar... There is impressive style to this one’s trickery.
original_zh_text: 将捕食舌伪装在相似钟乳石间的策略，展现惊人的欺诈美学。
translated_text: 把你的舌头藏在如此相似的叶子中。这个人的诡计风格令人印象深刻。
secondary_translated_text: Hide your tongue in such similar leaves. This man's trickery style is impressive.

original_en_text: Scissor-wielding bug charged to cut and spool fallen dregs of Silk for return to the Citadel above.
original_zh_text: 挥舞剪刀处理灵丝碎屑的工匠虫，处理好的灵丝会被送回圣堡。
translated_text: 挥舞剪刀的昆虫切割并卷起掉落的丝绸残渣，以便将其送回上面的城堡。
secondary_translated_text: Scissor-wielding insects cut and roll up the falling silk residue so that it can be returned to the castle above.

original_en_text: What seems at first a purely defensive mechanism may also be necessary to rid this creature of excess heat.
original_zh_text: 看似防御的行为，实为排出过量热量的必要生理机制。
translated_text: 最初看似纯粹的防御机制可能也是消除这种生物多余热量所必需的。
secondary_translated_text: What initially seemed pure defense mechanisms may also be necessary to eliminate this biological excess heat.

original_en_text: For his stern stewardship his legions seemed utterly loyal. For less combative bugs his would have been a hard rule.
original_zh_text: 其铁腕统治赢得了军团的绝对忠诚，但对非战斗种群来说则是暴政。
translated_text: 由于他的严格管理，他的军团似乎完全忠诚。对于攻击性较低的细菌来说，他的规则将是一个困难的规则。
secondary_translated_text: Because of his strict management, his legions seemed completely loyal. His rule will be a difficult one for less aggressive bacteria.

original_en_text: Remains of a Citadel bug possessed by Silk dregs. The husk will lash out wildly with the many sharp pins caught inside its thread.
original_zh_text: 被灵丝残渣控制的圣堡残躯，用丝线中缠绕的尖针发动无序攻击。
translated_text: 被丝渣附身的城堡蠕虫遗骸。贝壳会疯狂地射出，许多锋利的针会卡在它的线上。
secondary_translated_text: The remains of castle worms possessed by silk residue. The shell will shoot crazily, and many sharp needles will get stuck in its thread.

original_en_text: Altered servant of the Citadel’s Whiteward, responsible for the cremation of husks and the recycling of Silk from their shells.
original_zh_text: 白愈厅改造仆从，负责火化躯壳并回收灵丝。
translated_text: 怀特沃德城堡更换的仆人负责火化贝壳并回收贝壳上的丝绸。
secondary_translated_text: Replacement servants at Whiteward Castle were responsible for cremating the shells and recycling the silk from them.

original_en_text: Short elder crawbug eagerly serving in their court.
original_zh_text: 热衷审判的矮小腐囊虫长老。
translated_text: 矮小的老小龙虾热切地在他们的法庭上服务。
secondary_translated_text: Small old crayfish eagerly serve in their court.

original_en_text: Theirs is the perfect shell for their duty, a wall of a warrior and an adept fighter. If I hope to claim their treasures, I must bring my best.
original_zh_text: 它们拥有攻防兼备的重型甲壳，能完美适配其守卫的差事。想要取得它们看守的宝物，必须做好全力以赴战斗的准备。
translated_text: 他们的盾牌是履行职责的完美外壳，也是士兵和熟练士兵的高墙。如果我想获得他们的宝藏，我就必须放弃我最好的。
secondary_translated_text: Their shields are the perfect shell for performing their duties and the high walls for soldiers and skilled soldiers. If I want their treasure, I must give up my best.

original_en_text: Their bells would once have rung with hope and mirth, lifting the spirits of any climbing companions. Sadly, those instruments have turned purely to combative use.
original_zh_text: 这些钟曾为众多朝圣者奏响希望与欢乐的乐章。而今却成了投向清醒者的凶器——仿佛要砸碎最后一丝未被腐蚀的理智。
translated_text: 他们的钟声曾经充满了希望和欢乐，振奋了任何登山者的精神。可悲的是，这些工具纯粹被转用于战斗使用。
secondary_translated_text: Their bells were once full of hope and joy, lifting the spirit of any climber. Sadly, these tools were diverted purely for combat use.

original_en_text: The way they skate along the water’s surface is so elegant. Surely it is a skill that can be learned? When time permits, I should attempt the task.
original_zh_text: 如此优雅的水面滑行技艺，或许可以通过练习掌握？待战事稍歇，我定要试试这 "凌波微步"。
translated_text: 它们沿着水面滑行的方式是如此优雅。这一定是可以学习的技能吧？当时间允许的时候我应该尝试一下这个任务。
secondary_translated_text: The way they glide along the water is so elegant. This must be a skill that can be learned, right? I should try this task when time permits.

original_en_text: A creature long familiar to me. I suspect that no matter how far I travel, if I descend deep enough they will always be there.
original_zh_text: 这种生物于我而言早已熟悉。无论我跋涉多远，只要深入足够的地底，它们必会如影随形。
translated_text: 一种我早就熟悉的生物。我怀疑，无论我走多远，如果我深入那里，他们就会永远在那里。
secondary_translated_text: A creature I've long been familiar with. I suspect that no matter how far I go, if I go deep there, they will always be there.

original_en_text: When defeated, it splits into many smaller forms. Yet another remarkable creature of this land before the monarch.
original_zh_text: 击败后分裂为多个小型个体。圣堡崛起前，纺络土地上又一奇异而非凡的生灵。
translated_text: 当被击败时，它会分裂成许多更小的形式。在君主面前，这片土地是另一个非凡的生物。
secondary_translated_text: When defeated, it splits into many smaller forms. In front of the monarch, this land is another extraordinary creature.

original_en_text: Winged insect with a flaky shell that perfectly mimics its environment.
original_zh_text: 拥有一副古怪甲壳的飞虫，能完美拟态周围环境。
translated_text: 一种有翅膀的昆虫，其外壳完美地模仿其环境。
secondary_translated_text: A winged insect whose shell perfectly mimics its environment.

original_en_text: Unnaturally overgrown Mossgrub, bred within the Citadel’s Memorium.
original_zh_text: 圣堡忆廊培育的变异苔原蠕虫。
translated_text: 城堡纪念馆里长满了不自然的苔藓。
secondary_translated_text: The castle memorial hall is covered with unnatural moss.

original_en_text: While these bothersome bugs are left free to forage, no loose rosary or trinket is safe.
original_zh_text: 只要这些可恶的虫子尚存，任何散落的念珠与宝物皆不得安宁。
translated_text: 尽管这些烦人的虫子可以随意觅食，但没有任何松动的念珠或小饰品，它们是安全的。
secondary_translated_text: Although these annoying bugs can forage at will, they are safe without any loose rosary beads or trinkets.

original_en_text: Younger form of a Muckroach. Attacks prey by leaping from the water and snapping with its flexible jaws.
original_zh_text: 淤泥蟑螂的近亲变种，形态更类似于蛆虫。
translated_text: 蟑螂的幼年形式。通过跳出水面并用灵活的下巴折断下巴来攻击猎物。
secondary_translated_text: Juvenile form of the cockroach. Attack your prey by jumping out of the water and breaking your chin with your flexible chin.

original_en_text: Elite former hunter acting as the final line of defence before their mother.
original_zh_text: 精锐的猎手，曾作为最后防线守卫它们的母亲。
translated_text: 精英的前猎人是他们母亲面前的最后一道防线。
secondary_translated_text: Elite former hunters are the last line of defense in front of their mother.

original_en_text: All are haunted here, the jailers and the jailed. Do they realise they will never leave this place? Or how long they have stayed already?
original_zh_text: 此处的狱卒与囚徒皆被丝咒侵蚀。它们可曾意识到自己将永远无法逃离此地？是否知道已经在这地方困了多久？
translated_text: 每个人都在这里闹鬼，无论是狱卒还是囚犯。他们是否意识到他们永远不会离开这个地方？或者他们在这里多久了？
secondary_translated_text: Everyone is haunted here, whether they are jailers or prisoners. Do they realize they will never leave this place? Or how long have they been here?

original_en_text: Such feeble creatures could only survive thanks to the rarity of predators in these super-heated caverns.
original_zh_text: 唯有在这缺乏天敌的高温洞穴中，如此脆弱的生物方能幸存。
translated_text: 这种脆弱的生物只能生存，因为这些超高温洞穴中捕食者的稀缺。
secondary_translated_text: This fragile creature can only survive because of the scarcity of predators in these ultra-hot caves.

original_en_text: Fully grown mollusc able to unleash a gushing torrent of burning fluid from its back.
original_zh_text: 成年软体生物，能从背部喷射灼热流体洪流
translated_text: 成熟的软体动物可以从背部释放喷涌的燃烧液体。
secondary_translated_text: Mature mollusks can release gushing burning liquids from their backs.

original_en_text: By this swooping menace, a simple bug could be easily overcome. More dangerous still, they rarely attack alone.
original_zh_text: 对于其单个个体，尚可周旋，但它们鲜少单独行动。成群俯冲时，普通虫类极易被瞬间击溃。
translated_text: 有了这种潜水威胁，一个简单的错误就可以轻松克服。更危险的是，它们很少单独攻击。
secondary_translated_text: With this diving threat, a simple mistake can be easily overcome. What's even more dangerous is that they rarely attack alone.

original_en_text: A common enough bug, though not to be underestimated. The acuteness of their other senses more than makes up for their lack of vision.
original_zh_text: 一种相当常见的虫子，但不可小觑——它们其他感官的敏锐完全弥补了视觉的缺陷。
translated_text: 这是一个很常见的错误，但也不能低估。他们其他感官的敏锐足以弥补他们视力的不足。
secondary_translated_text: This is a common mistake, but it cannot be underestimated. The acumen of their other senses is enough to make up for their lack of vision.

original_en_text: Darting predator that clings fast to roofs and outcrops, often summoned to aid its larger companions.
original_zh_text: 擅长攀附在岩顶或峭壁的飞镖猎手，常被其大型同伴叫来支援。
translated_text: 快速捕食者，牢牢地附着在屋顶和露头上，经常被要求帮助他们的大同伴。
secondary_translated_text: Fast predators, firmly attached to roofs and outcrops, are often called on to help their larger companions.

original_en_text: Is it the Haunting that drove them to cackling madness, or was their unending toil the cause even before that?
original_zh_text: 究竟是丝咒导致了疯癫，还是在无尽苦役中早已精神失常？答案已无从考据。
translated_text: 是闹鬼让他们疯狂地傻笑，还是他们在此之前无休止的辛勤工作的原因？
secondary_translated_text: Is it the haunting that makes them giggle crazily, or is it the reason for their endless hard work before this?

original_en_text: Short, nimble bug who uses barbed bolas to keep beasts corralled and caged.
original_zh_text: 矮小敏捷的饲育者，擅于使用带刺流星索圈养腐汁蟑螂。
translated_text: 短而敏捷的昆虫，用有刺的短蝽把野生动物关在笼子里。
secondary_translated_text: Short and agile insects that use stinging short bugs to keep wild animals in cages.

original_en_text: Despite their youth, they are impressive opponents. It seems likely their tribe were trained for combat from birth.
original_zh_text: 虽然年轻却训练有素，显然它们从出生开始就被部族作为战士培养。
translated_text: 尽管他们年轻，但他们是令人印象深刻的对手。他们的部落似乎从出生起就接受过战斗训练。
secondary_translated_text: Despite their youth, they are impressive opponents. Their tribe appears to have received combat training from birth.

original_en_text: Disciple of the Whispering Vaults, tasked to navigate its dim recesses to retrieve old scrolls.
original_zh_text: 低语书库的信徒，负责在幽暗的书库中搜寻古籍。
translated_text: 在宝库里低声低语的男爵的使命是在黑暗的深处寻找古老的卷轴。
secondary_translated_text: The baron's mission, murmuring in the treasury, is to search for ancient scrolls in the depths of darkness.

original_en_text: This one’s strength was much enhanced by stolen soul. They are not the first who tried to hoard it, or to mould it towards such violent ends.
original_zh_text: 靠着窃取灵魂强化自己的力量，他并非第一个妄图驾驭此力的施暴者。
translated_text: 这个人的实力被窃取的灵魂大大增强。他们并不是第一个试图囤积它或将其推向如此暴力目的的人。
secondary_translated_text: This person's strength was greatly enhanced by the stolen soul. They are not the first to try to hoard it or push it towards such violent ends.

original_en_text: With all the refuse collapsing throughout their domain, the worker’s stiff shell would be essential if they held any hope to survive.
original_zh_text: 在废墟持续崩塌的领域，硬化甲壳成为他们最后的生存保障。
translated_text: 随着辖区内所有垃圾都倒塌，工人们的硬壳对于他们还有生存希望至关重要。
secondary_translated_text: As all garbage in the area collapses, the hard shells of the workers are crucial to their hope of survival.

original_en_text: Civilisation encroaches from this kingdom’s crown, but the lowlands are still ruled by great beasts. Its roar stirs something deep within me, some primal instinct.
original_zh_text: 文明从王冠之地蔓延开来，但低地区域仍是野兽的疆域。它的咆哮唤醒了我血脉深处的某种原始悸动。
translated_text: 文明已经入侵了王国的王冠，但低地仍然被巨兽统治。它的咆哮激起了我内心深处的某种东西，某种原始的本能。
secondary_translated_text: Civilization has invaded the crown of the kingdom, but the lowlands are still ruled by giant beasts. Its roar aroused something deep in me, some primitive instinct.

original_en_text: The poor creature has lived a life too calm and coddled. It would not fare well in the world beyond its walls.
original_zh_text: 这可怜虫一生过于安逸，若离开高墙庇护必难存活。
translated_text: 这个可怜的生物过着过于平静和被宠坏的生活。它在其墙外的世界不会过得很好。
secondary_translated_text: This poor creature lives an overly peaceful and spoiled life. It will not fare well in the world beyond its walls.

original_en_text: Lithe, winged scouts frequently paired with their heavier brethren.
original_zh_text: 与重装部队配合作战的敏捷翼兵。
translated_text: 轻型、有翼的侦察兵通常与较重的侦察兵配对。
secondary_translated_text: Light, winged scouts are usually paired with heavier scouts.

original_en_text: Their throwing weapon is well-suited to the wide caverns they inhabit. These sly little bugs must have a keen claw for crafting.
original_zh_text: 其长索武器的高效性在栖居的宽阔洞窟中总能发挥到极致，这般狡诈的小虫竟也有颗巧匠之心。
translated_text: 他们的投掷武器非常适合他们居住的巨大洞穴。这些狡猾的小昆虫必须有敏锐的爪子才能制造。
secondary_translated_text: Their throwing weapons are well suited to the huge cave they inhabit. These cunning little insects must have sharp claws to make them.

original_en_text: Toughened Kai capable of extending sharp spikes from within its shellsack.
original_zh_text: 甲囊中可弹出尖刺的硬化凯虫。
translated_text: 坚强的凯能够从贝壳口袋里伸出锋利的尖刺。
secondary_translated_text: Strong Kay was able to stick sharp spikes out of her shell pockets.

original_en_text: An impressive act of mimicry. To match so closely with its land, their clover caves must have sustained through generations uncounted.
original_zh_text: 与环境的契合程度，印证了千万年演化的精妙。
translated_text: 令人印象深刻的模仿行为。为了与土地如此紧密地匹配，他们的三叶草洞穴一定已经延续了几代人。
secondary_translated_text: Impressive imitation behavior. In order to match the land so closely, their clover caves must have lasted for generations.

original_en_text: This bug is soft and clumsy, but to its fortune its home caves seem relatively free of effective predators. I wonder why that is.
original_zh_text: 这种虫子柔弱笨拙，所幸其栖息洞穴缺乏高效捕食者。此地的生态平衡奥秘值得探究。
translated_text: 这种虫子又软又笨，但幸运的是，它的家乡洞穴似乎相对没有有效的捕食者。我想知道为什么会发生这种情况。
secondary_translated_text: The bug is soft and clumsy, but fortunately its home cave seems to have relatively no effective predators. I want to know why this happened.

original_en_text: Towering iron automaton, driven by rotor and cog.
original_zh_text: 由齿轮驱动的巨型铁质自动机。
translated_text: 由旋转的轮子和齿轮驱动的高大铁自动机。
secondary_translated_text: A tall iron automatic machine driven by rotating wheels and gears.

original_en_text: Small bug that crafts a shell of sharpened coral. Spins its shell at rapid speed to cut through crust and bone.
original_zh_text: 用锋利珊瑚作为外壳的小型生物，旋转切割无往不利。
translated_text: 小昆虫可以由锋利的珊瑚壳制成。旋转贝壳以切割皮肤和骨头。
secondary_translated_text: Small insects can be made from sharp coral shells. Rotate the shell to cut skin and bone.

original_en_text: Plump, plentiful drifter of a coral past.
original_zh_text: 昔日围绕珊瑚塔群居的漂浮生物。
translated_text: 过去，珊瑚礁面积大，漂流者丰富。
secondary_translated_text: In the past, coral reefs were large and drifts were abundant.

original_en_text: Far tougher for being matched inside their encrusted domain. They must have lived their whole lives within their tower, to command it so.
original_zh_text: 外壳比内部要坚硬太多。终生固守一地的生存方式，造就了独特的战斗形态。
translated_text: 在他们的领域踢球要困难得多。他们一定一生都住在塔里，才能以这种方式指挥它。
secondary_translated_text: Playing in their field is much more difficult. They must have lived in the tower all their lives to be able to command it in this way.

original_en_text: Tall bug charged to pile Silk dregs in preparation for respooling. Their sharp rake now doubles equally well as a stabbing weapon.
original_zh_text: 负责灵丝残渣回收的高个虫子，尖利的耙子现已成为它的武器。
translated_text: 高大的昆虫负责积累丝绸残留物，为重新采集做准备。它们锋利的耙子现在可以兼作刺击武器。
secondary_translated_text: Tall insects are responsible for accumulating silk residue in preparation for re-collection. Their sharp rakes can now double as a stabbing weapon.

original_en_text: Few creatures of that Silk stricken place would find nourishment enough to grow so large.
original_zh_text: 丝咒之地鲜有生物能获取足够养分长至此等体型。
translated_text: 在那个丝绸泛滥的地方，很少有生物能找到足够的营养来长这么大。
secondary_translated_text: In that place where silk is flooded, few creatures can find enough nutrients to grow this big.

original_en_text: Anguished spectre of lingering thread. Despite its ephemeral nature, strong strikes can dispel the Wraith for a time.
original_zh_text: 游荡的丝线怨魂，重击可将其暂时驱散。
translated_text: 挥之不去的线程的幽灵般的痛苦。虽然鬼魂在本质上是短暂的，但强烈的打击可以暂时驱散它们。
secondary_translated_text: The ghostly pain of lingering threads. Although ghosts are short-lived in nature, a strong blow can temporarily dispel them.

original_en_text: A tragic fate for a once honourable bug. Those void soaked threads... Their physical might is nothing compared to the corruption they wreak upon a soul.
original_zh_text: 昔日荣光骑士的悲剧命运。这些沾染虚空的丝线，对灵魂的腐化远胜肉体摧残。
translated_text: 曾经辉煌的昆虫的悲惨命运。那些浸泡在虚空中的丝线……与他们对灵魂的腐蚀相比，他们的肉体力量根本不算什么。
secondary_translated_text: The tragic fate of once glorious insects. Those threads soaked in the void... Compared to their corrosion of souls, their physical strength is nothing at all.

original_en_text: The coldshard, even when destroyed it remembers its former shape. A remarkable material, and perhaps even more astonishing there seems life contained within it.
original_zh_text: 冰晶被毁后仍存有对其原形的记忆，这等材料特性已属非凡，更神奇的是其中似乎竟蕴含着生命？
translated_text: 冰冷的碎片即使被摧毁，也会记住它以前的形状。这是一种非凡的材料，也许更令人惊讶的是，它似乎包含生命。
secondary_translated_text: Even if the icy debris is destroyed, it will remember its previous shape. This is an extraordinary material, and perhaps even more surprising, it seems to contain life.

original_en_text: The talent and intelligence of this construct goes far beyond others I have witnessed. They seem less built as a tool to serve than an attempt at life itself.
original_zh_text: 其智力远超我所见过的其他造物。它们似乎并非单纯作为工具而被打造，而更像是在追求生命的自我意识。
translated_text: 这个结构的才华和智慧远远超过我见过的任何其他结构。它们似乎与其说是服务工具，不如说是对生活本身的尝试。
secondary_translated_text: The talent and wisdom of this structure far exceed any other structure I have seen. They seem to be less service tools than attempts at life itself.

original_en_text: In entering their domain, I freed these bugs to infest the greater vaults. They are a nuisance, and I have only myself to blame.
original_zh_text: 我闯入了这些虫子的领地，并释放了它们。如今它们已蔓延到了各个书库，这都是我一手造成的麻烦。
translated_text: 在进入他们的领地时，我释放了这些错误来感染更大的金库。他们是麻烦，我只能怪我自己。
secondary_translated_text: On entering their territory, I released these errors to infect larger coffers. They are trouble, and I have only myself to blame.

original_en_text: Winged mite-beast, bred large to catch workers who once tried to flee their tasks.
original_zh_text: 精心培育出的巨型螨兽，用于追捕逃役工虫。
translated_text: 一种有翼的螨虫野兽，繁殖大型，用于捕获试图逃避任务的工人。
secondary_translated_text: A winged mite beast that breeds large and is used to capture workers trying to evade tasks.

original_en_text: The way it darts in and out of the ground has an almost playful quality to it. An amusing and effective way to ambush prey.
original_zh_text: 从地面突然窜出的攻击方式，兼具实用性与趣味性。
translated_text: 它进出地面的方式几乎有一种有趣的感觉。一种有趣且有效的伏击猎物的方法。
secondary_translated_text: The way it goes in and out of the ground almost has an interesting feel. A fun and effective way to ambush prey.

original_en_text: Floral foe with a core shaped to mimic a mask. The core can be thrust forth to bludgeon unwary bugs.
original_zh_text: 花芯长得像恐怖面甲的阴险植物，会突然向外猛戳，重击那些缺乏警惕的虫子。
translated_text: 花核的核心模仿面具的形状。它的核心可以被推出来打击粗心的错误。
secondary_translated_text: The core of the flower core mimics the shape of the mask. Its core can be pushed out to combat careless mistakes.

original_en_text: The servitor has been heavily damaged by time and the elements. Its actions have grown erratic. It seems no longer able to discern friend from foe.
original_zh_text: 岁月的侵蚀使这位仆从行为失常，似乎已经变得敌我不分。
translated_text: 仆人被时间和自然严重损坏。它的行为变得不稳定。它似乎不再能够区分朋友和敌人。
secondary_translated_text: Servants are severely damaged by time and nature. Its behavior becomes unstable. It no longer seems to be able to distinguish between friends and enemies.

original_en_text: A unique mask and impressive form. Now just another near forgotten specimen of this land before the monarch.
original_zh_text: 拥有独特的体型和面甲，本应成为传奇生物，如今却处于被遗忘的边缘。
translated_text: 独特的面具和令人印象深刻的形式。现在，这只是君主面前这片土地的另一个几乎被遗忘的样本。
secondary_translated_text: Unique masks and impressive forms. Now, this is just another almost forgotten sample of the land before the monarch.

original_en_text: These bugs work mainly as finders and foragers for the warriors of their tribe. Combat has not long been their nature.
original_zh_text: 主要负责探索和采集，本非战斗种族，最近才开始具有攻击性。
translated_text: 这些昆虫主要充当部落士兵的搜寻者和觅食者。战斗不再是他们的本性。
secondary_translated_text: These insects serve mainly as searchers and foragers for tribal soldiers. Fighting is no longer their nature.

original_en_text: Pharloom shall quickly learn the curse of this substance. What benefits it provides can be swiftly outweighed.
original_zh_text: 纺络很快就会领教这种物质所带来的诅咒。它所赋予的好处，很快就会被更沉重的代价所掩盖。
translated_text: 法鲁很快就会了解这种物质的诅咒。它提供的好处很快就会被抵消。
secondary_translated_text: Faro will soon understand the curse of this substance. The benefits it provides will quickly be offset.

original_en_text: Puppet servant of the Citadel, suspended on strings of Silk. An early form of automaton, requiring extensive Silk to maintain its service.
original_zh_text: 由灵丝悬吊操控的傀儡，圣堡的仆从。一种早期形态的自动构造，需要大量的灵丝来维持其运作。
translated_text: 城堡的傀儡仆人，挂在丝绸上。早期形式的自动机需要大量的Silk来维持其服务。
secondary_translated_text: Puppet servants of the castle, hanging on silk. Early forms of automata required a large amount of Silk to maintain its services.

original_en_text: Eternal defender of Shellwood Shrine. His pin and cymbal show many marks of their use.
original_zh_text: 甲木林圣所的永恒守卫者，佩针与钹尽显沧桑。
translated_text: 谢尔伍德神庙的永恒守护者。他的别针和钹上有许多使用痕迹。
secondary_translated_text: Eternal keeper of Shelwood Temple. There are many marks of use on his pins and cymbals.

original_en_text: It is no wonder these constructs were cast. No mortal bug would last long inside that scorching place. Even my shell struggles to withstand its heat.
original_zh_text: 这些造物被投入使用是有原因的——没有凡虫能在那片炽热之地撑太久，就连我的甲壳也难以抵御那里的高温。
translated_text: 难怪这些结构是铸造的。在那个灼热的地方，任何凡人的昆虫都无法生存太久。就连我的壳也承受不住它的热量。
secondary_translated_text: No wonder these structures are cast. In that scorching place, no mortal insect could survive for long. Even my shell couldn't withstand its heat.

original_en_text: Fabled first Cloverstag of Verdania’s wilds. Commands the grass and leaves to aid its attack.
original_zh_text: 翠庭荒野传说中的苜鹿始祖，能号令草木协同作战。
translated_text: 第一个传说是位于Verdane荒野中的克洛福斯塔。命令草和叶子帮助它的攻击。
secondary_translated_text: The first legend concerns Clofosta in the Verdane Wilderness. Command grass and leaves to aid its attack.

original_en_text: Disciple of the Choir, charged to maintain its perfect order, by sharp pin if necessary.
original_zh_text: 维护咏者团秩序的迅捷信徒，必要时以利针执法。
translated_text: 合唱团的按钮负责维持其完美的秩序，必要时可以使用锋利的别针。
secondary_translated_text: The choir's buttons are responsible for maintaining its perfect order, and sharp pins can be used if necessary.

original_en_text: When they do not hinder my path, I find their simple motion rather pleasant.
original_zh_text: 当它未阻挡前路时，笨拙的蠕动反而显得几分憨态可掬。
translated_text: 当他们不挡我的路时，我发现他们简单的动作相当令人愉快。
secondary_translated_text: When they were out of my way, I found their simple movements quite pleasant.

original_en_text: Holds an extensive supply of searing acid in a layered sack within its shell. The acid rains from its mouth upon any creature it sees as food.
original_zh_text: 它胃囊里的酸液储量足以蚀穿圣堡城墙，所幸那对退化的小眼睛总让攻击准头欠佳。
translated_text: 壳内的分层袋含有大量的热酸。它嘴里的酸雨落在任何它认为食物的生物身上。
secondary_translated_text: The layered bags inside the shell contain large amounts of hot acid. Acid rain in its mouth falls on whatever creature it thinks it is food.

original_en_text: Heavy, hard-shelled worker, forever repairing the Citadel’s crumbling Underworks.
original_zh_text: 永不停歇修缮圣堡工厂的重甲劳工。
translated_text: 沉重而勤奋的工人将永远修复城堡摇摇欲坠的地下工程。
secondary_translated_text: Heavy and diligent workers will forever restore the castle's crumbling underground works.

original_en_text: It has no means to defend itself. Its only hope for survival is to be mistaken for a plant.
original_zh_text: 生存的唯一希望，便是被误认作植物。除此之外，它们没有任何防御手段。
translated_text: 它没有办法自卫。它生存的唯一希望就是被误认为是植物。
secondary_translated_text: It has no way to defend itself. Its only hope for survival is to be mistaken for a plant.

original_en_text: This one has allied themself with me, either as thanks for their saving or respect for one judged as equal. Whichever the reason, their fellowship is welcome.
original_zh_text: 这一只现在成了我的盟友，不知道是报救命之恩，还是单纯觉得我实力强大，但多个帮手总是好的。
translated_text: 这个人与我结盟要么是为了感谢他们的拯救，要么是为了尊重那些被视为平等的人。无论出于何种原因，他们的友谊都是受欢迎的。
secondary_translated_text: This person allied with me either to thank them for their salvation or to respect those who are seen as equals. For whatever reason, their friendship was welcome.

original_en_text: Bugs like these crossed the caves to bring me to Pharloom. I cut down many before my capture. Then I had thought them minded and cunning. Now I can see the singular will that haunts them all.
original_zh_text: 正是这类虫子穿越洞穴将我带至纺络。被俘前我斩杀了许多，当时认为它们具备独立心智与狡诈。如今我明白是同一意志在支配它们全体。
translated_text: 像这样的虫子穿过洞穴，把我带到了法鲁。被捕之前我砍了很多东西。当时，我认为他们敏捷而狡猾。现在我可以看到困扰他们所有人的独特意志。
secondary_translated_text: Bugs like this came through the cave and took me to Faro. I chopped a lot of things before I was arrested. At the time, I thought they were quick and cunning. Now I can see the unique will that troubles all of them.

original_en_text: Its sticky spit would no doubt make a useful crafting material if moulded fresh. Unfortunately, I cannot stop to experiment.
original_zh_text: 它们喷射的粘稠物质经过及时塑形，一定可以作为优质的制造材料。可惜我无暇采集实验。
translated_text: 如果新鲜形成，其浓稠的唾液无疑将成为有用的工艺材料。不幸的是，我不能停下来做实验。
secondary_translated_text: If formed freshly, its thick saliva will undoubtedly become a useful craft material. Unfortunately, I couldn't stop and experiment.

original_en_text: The smell from these jailers overwhelms my senses. I strongly doubt they have ever thought to bathe.
original_zh_text: 这些狱卒的恶臭令我窒息。我怀疑它们从未有过沐浴的概念。
translated_text: 这些警卫的气味让我的感官崩溃。我强烈怀疑他们是否想过洗澡。
secondary_translated_text: The smell of these guards shattered my senses. I strongly doubt if they ever thought about taking a bath.

original_en_text: A creature at its most basic. This one is no threat to me, or any other.
original_zh_text: 作为最基础的生命形态，它对我或任何生物都不构成威胁。
translated_text: 最基本的生物体之一。他对我或其他任何人都没有威胁。
secondary_translated_text: One of the most basic organisms. He is no threat to me or anyone else.

original_en_text: Aged former pilgrim. Uses their wings to position above threats and crush them under their large shell.
original_zh_text: 年迈的前朝圣者，利用飞行优势从上方压制目标。
translated_text: 年长的前朝圣者。用它们的翅膀将它们置于威胁之上，并将它们压碎在它们的大壳下。
secondary_translated_text: Elderly former pilgrim. Use their wings to place them above threat and crush them under their large shells.

original_en_text: A bug once frail, pushed by twisted thread beyond its mortal limits.
original_zh_text: 灵丝撑开了它脆弱的甲壳，强行将这副残躯突破凡虫的限制。
translated_text: 一只曾经脆弱的昆虫被扭曲的线推到了极限。
secondary_translated_text: A once-fragile insect is pushed to its limit by a twisted thread.

original_en_text: The threat of its exploding rear is an effective deterrent to predators, but the slightest jolt or fall can cause its premature end.
original_zh_text: 尾部爆炸威胁能威慑捕食者，但轻微碰撞就会导致其提前自毁。
translated_text: 尾部爆炸的威胁对捕食者来说是一种有效的威慑，但最轻微的碰撞或坠落都可能导致它过早结束。
secondary_translated_text: The threat of a tail explosion is an effective deterrent to predators, but the slightest collision or fall can cause it to end prematurely.

original_en_text: To live only a single, bright moment... What would one feel? Is it glorious, or only despair? Or could it be both, mixed equal?
original_zh_text: 生命仅有瞬息的璀璨——它们会感到辉煌还是绝望？抑或是二者交织？
translated_text: 只活在一个单一的，明亮的时刻。你会有什么感觉？这是光荣还是绝望？或者可以两者兼而有之，混合平等？
secondary_translated_text: Live in a single, bright moment. How would you feel? Is this glory or despair? Or can it be both, mixed equality?

original_en_text: Though their mind is largely lost their skill with a chain has not been forgotten. Does the Haunting eternally bind a bug to the task it had in life?
original_zh_text: 锁链破空之声依旧精准狠厉——丝咒是否将生前的执念化作了死后的永恒苦役？
translated_text: 尽管他们的思想基本上已经丧失了，但他们使用链条的技能并没有被遗忘。困扰会永远将这个错误与它一生中承担的任务绑定在一起吗？
secondary_translated_text: Although their minds have been largely lost, their skills in using chains have not been forgotten. Will trouble forever bind this mistake to the tasks it undertakes throughout its life?

original_en_text: Angered, adult Beastfly with a weighty body and a thickened hardshell mask.
original_zh_text: 暴怒的成年兽蝇，身形沉重，戴着厚重面甲。
translated_text: 愤怒的成年野兽苍蝇，身体沉重，戴着厚厚的硬壳面具。
secondary_translated_text: Angry adult beast flies, heavy and wearing a thick hard-shell mask.

original_en_text: Young, bony bug that can curl its body to form a ball.
original_zh_text: 能蜷缩成球形的小型骨虫。
translated_text: 年幼的骨质昆虫可以卷曲身体形成一个球。
secondary_translated_text: Young bony insects can curl their bodies to form a ball.

original_en_text: So close to a perfect furred form... If only they’d been able to breed out the spines.
original_zh_text: 近乎完美的毛茸形态，唯有背刺未去除。改造自然的尝试总是难以尽善尽美。
translated_text: 如此接近完美的皮毛形态.如果他们能繁殖荆棘就好了。
secondary_translated_text: So close to perfect fur shape. If only they could breed thorns.

original_en_text: Bulky worm of the deepest depths. Lives in tight crevices and uses its weighty body to batter.
original_zh_text: 栖息狭窄裂隙的厚重蠕虫，以沉重身躯撞击敌人。
translated_text: 最深的巨型蠕虫。生活在狭窄的缝隙中，用沉重的身体击球。
secondary_translated_text: The deepest giant worm. Live in narrow gaps and hit the ball with your heavy body.

original_en_text: Crazed fanatic able to guide Pharloom’s haunted Silk by music played upon it.
original_zh_text: 癫狂的信徒，通过演奏音乐操控纺络的诅咒灵丝。
translated_text: 疯狂的爱好者能够通过播放音乐来引导法鲁的闹鬼丝绸。
secondary_translated_text: Crazy enthusiasts are able to guide Faro's haunted silk by playing music.

original_en_text: There is old anguish bound upon these threads, the result of countless cruel procedures.
original_zh_text: 这些丝线承载着古老痛楚，源自无数残酷改造手术。
translated_text: 这些线索受到古代苦难的束缚，这是无数残酷程序的结果。
secondary_translated_text: These clues are bound by ancient suffering, the result of countless cruel procedures.

original_en_text: Rare, enormous Skull Scuttler. The Marrow’s largest predator, and the most feared for its ferocious temperament.
original_zh_text: 罕见的巨型头骨潜行者，髓骨洞窟的顶级掠食者，以凶暴性情令凡虫闻风丧胆。
translated_text: 一台罕见而巨大的骨架机器。骨髓中最大的掠食者也因其凶猛的性情而最令人恐惧。
secondary_translated_text: A rare and huge skeleton machine. The largest predator in the bone marrow is also the most feared because of its ferocious temperament.

original_en_text: Full-grown former pilgrim serving the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 侍奉圣堡的前朝圣者，体型发生过异变。
translated_text: 一位前朝圣者，在城堡中长大。
secondary_translated_text: A former pilgrim who grew up in a castle.

original_en_text: Lord and justice of Pharloom’s craws. Delivers death to condemned bugs with his steel-plated beak.
original_zh_text: 执掌腐囊虫庭生杀大权的审判者，用其镀钢长喙对有罪的虫子执行死刑。
translated_text: 法鲁姆，贪婪的主和正义。用它的钢喙将死亡交给了这只被谴责的昆虫。
secondary_translated_text: Farum, greedy Lord and justice. Using its steel beak to hand death to the condemned insect.

original_en_text: Rarely seen beetle that spends most of its life nestled deep in bone and rock. The Flintgems on its shell excrete an explosive powder.
original_zh_text: 深藏岩骨深处的稀有甲虫，甲壳嵌满燧晶并分泌爆炸性体液。
translated_text: 稀有甲虫一生中的大部分时间都栖息在骨头和岩石深处。外壳上的弗林特宝石会分泌爆炸粉末。
secondary_translated_text: Rare beetles spend most of their lives inhabits deep in bones and rocks. The Flint gem on the shell secretes explosive powder.

original_en_text: Disgusting both in manner and stench. I feel no remorse to see them felled.
original_zh_text: 它们浑身散发着腐殖质恶臭，甲壳缝隙间还粘着陈年血痂。每当那对复眼在牢狱阴影中亮起，连最凶悍的囚徒都会瑟缩墙角。
translated_text: 举止和恶臭令人厌恶。当我看到他们被打败时，我并不感到悔恨。
secondary_translated_text: The demeanor and stench are disgusting. When I saw them defeated, I had no regrets.

original_en_text: Pharloom proves often the effectiveness of bells as weapons. Never before had I considered them as such.
original_zh_text: 纺络总在提醒我——钟亦可为兵器。只是从前，我从未想过这些圣器会被如此亵用。
translated_text: 法鲁经常证明钟声作为武器的有效性。我以前从来没有这样想过他们。
secondary_translated_text: Faro has often proved the effectiveness of the bell as a weapon. I've never thought of them like this before.

original_en_text: Enormous tubular beast uniquely suited to living close to the void below.
original_zh_text: 适应虚空环境的管状巨兽。
translated_text: 巨大的管状野兽独特地适应生活在下面的虚空附近。
secondary_translated_text: The giant tubular beast is uniquely adapted to live near the void below.

original_en_text: Old pilgrim carrying a heavy iron bell staff.
original_zh_text: 手持沉重铁制钟杖的年长领队，丝咒抹去了它昔日的权威。
translated_text: 老朝圣者拿着一根沉重的铁钟杖。
secondary_translated_text: The old pilgrim held a heavy iron bell staff.

original_en_text: If left to grow, these young bugs will fight for dominance until only one remains.
original_zh_text: 我曾目睹三只幼体将巢穴化作修罗场，最终胜者甲壳上插满兄弟的尖刺。这种养蛊式的成长，正是圣堡工厂默许的筛选机制。
translated_text: 如果任其生长，这些年轻昆虫将争夺统治地位，直到只剩下一只。
secondary_translated_text: If left to grow, these young insects will compete for dominance until only one remains.

original_en_text: Living Silk commanding a dead shell... An affront to nature, and one all too common across Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 活灵丝操纵死躯壳……违背自然的造物，在纺络却司空见惯。
translated_text: 活丝指挥死壳……这是对自然的侮辱，在法勒姆地区也很常见。
secondary_translated_text: The living silk commands the dead shell... This is an insult to nature and is also common in the Farham area.

original_en_text: Coiled nest of charged worms. Assaults intruders with bolts of crackling electricity.
original_zh_text: 带电蠕虫团，释放霹雳闪电攻击入侵者。
translated_text: 一个由带电蠕虫组成的卷曲巢穴。用爆炸性闪电攻击入侵者。
secondary_translated_text: A curled nest of charged worms. Attack the intruder with explosive lightning.

original_en_text: High caste bug, responsible for delivering sermons and leading prayer for those beyond the walls of the Whispering Vaults.
original_zh_text: 为低语书库墙外信众布道的高阶虫子。
translated_text: 高种姓蠕虫负责向那些低语的财政墙之外的人传教和引导祈祷。
secondary_translated_text: The high-caste worm is responsible for preaching and guiding prayers to those outside the murmuring fiscal wall.

original_en_text: Did he recognise my part played in this land’s void-strung state? If so, perhaps his judgment was not unfair. To these bugs I have brought much destruction.
original_zh_text: 若他知晓我与此地虚空缠结的关联，其裁决或许称得上公正——因我确实为腐囊虫族带来了毁灭。
translated_text: 他认识到我在这片空虚的土地上所扮演的角色了吗？如果是这样，也许他的判断并不不公平。我对这些虫子造成了巨大的损害。
secondary_translated_text: Does he realize my role in this empty land? If so, perhaps his judgment was not unfair. I've done tremendous damage to these bugs.

original_en_text: That incendiary material they carry is a natural wonder, with many potential applications. What a waste to carelessly throw it at me whenever I pass by.
original_zh_text: 其携带的燃烧材料堪称自然奇迹，具有多种潜在用途。每当路过就被随意投掷袭击，这等浪费行径实在令我扼腕。
translated_text: 它们携带的燃烧材料是一种具有许多潜在应用的自然奇观。每当我经过时，不小心把它扔到我身上，真是浪费。
secondary_translated_text: The burning materials they carry are a natural wonder with many potential applications. Whenever I pass by, accidentally throw it at me, what a waste.

original_en_text: Not a frontline force, but in my assault upon their tower all emerge to see me stilled.
original_zh_text: 虽非主力部队，但当我进攻其高塔时，它们倾巢而出进行阻截，阵势不容小觑。
translated_text: 不是前线部队，而是当我攻击他们的塔楼时，每个人都出现了，看着我陷入平静。
secondary_translated_text: Not the front-line troops, but when I attacked their towers, everyone showed up and watched me fall into calm.

original_en_text: A cowardly sort. They will try to remain at range to throw their sharp weapons. Best to rush them down and cut quick.
original_zh_text: 怯战而擅长投掷攻击。最佳策略是快速近身解决。
translated_text: 懦弱的那种。他们会试图保持在射程内并投掷锋利的武器。最好快点冲下来，快点剪。
secondary_translated_text: The cowardly kind. They will try to stay within range and throw sharp weapons. Better rush down quickly and cut quickly.

original_en_text: Wide-masked aerial attacker trained to act as support for its grounded companions while remaining at range.
original_zh_text: 佩戴宽幅面甲的远程支援型飞行攻击者。
translated_text: 这名宽面具空袭者接受的训练是在为停飞的同伴提供支持的同时保持射程。
secondary_translated_text: The wide-masked airman was trained to maintain range while providing support to his grounded companions.

original_en_text: Most likely this one’s true charge was to root out and condemn those not seen as sufficiently fervent.
original_zh_text: 表面传播教义，实为铲除异端的思想刽子手。
translated_text: 这个人的真正职责很可能是根除并谴责那些被认为不够热情的人。
secondary_translated_text: This person's real duty is likely to be to root out and condemn those who are not deemed enthusiastic enough.

original_en_text: Old catcher over Shellwood Pond, bearing a longpin and stricken by the Haunting.
original_zh_text: 甲木林池塘的老迈捕手，手持长针，遭受丝咒之苦。
translated_text: 老接球手在谢尔伍德池塘上空被鬼魂击中，鬼魂手里拿着一根长针。
secondary_translated_text: The old catcher was hit by a ghost over Shelwood Pond with a long needle in his hand.

original_en_text: Grizzled older roach tender weighted with a lasso of heavy chain.
original_zh_text: 心智迷失的老练饲育者，挥舞沉重锁链维持虫群秩序。
translated_text: 毛茸茸的老蟑螂轻轻地戴着沉重的链条套索。
secondary_translated_text: The furry old cockroach wears a heavy chain lasso gently.

original_en_text: These ones somehow learnt to call and guide the scorching Wisps that share their thicket. Whether through dominance or reverence is unclear.
original_zh_text: 这些家伙不知何故掌握了操控火灵之术。他们能随心所欲地召唤并指挥它们。
translated_text: 这些生物不知何故学会了召唤和引导居住在丛林中的灼热精灵。到底是通过统治还是通过敬畏尚不清楚。
secondary_translated_text: These creatures somehow learned to summon and guide the burning elves that live in the jungle. Whether it is through rule or awe is unclear.

original_en_text: He carelessly seeded these caves with that cursed substance... His final fate seems fair reward for those efforts, yet I feel some sympathy. It is an alluring power.
original_zh_text: 他肆意播撒那种禁忌物质……最终结局可谓咎由自取，但我仍有些许同情。凡虫对力量的追寻时常令我感到唏嘘。
translated_text: 他不小心把被诅咒的物质洒在了这些洞穴里。他的最终命运似乎是这些努力的公平回报，但我仍然感到一些同情。这是一种诱人的力量。
secondary_translated_text: He accidentally spilled cursed substance into these caves. His ultimate fate seems to be a fair reward for these efforts, but I still feel some sympathy. This is a tempting power.

original_zh_text: 被珊瑚包裹的软壳生物。
translated_text: 包裹在珊瑚中的软壳扰频器。

original_en_text: To pair with another is a base instinct, and one that brings some bugs great joy. I once sought similar union, but of my own mates none could match my lifespan.
original_zh_text: 与其他虫子结为伴侣是一种本能，是欢愉的来源。可惜我曾寻觅的伴侣都难敌岁月的变迁。
translated_text: 与他人配对是一种基本本能，也可以给一些虫子带来巨大的乐趣。我以前也曾寻求过类似的工会，但我自己的伴侣中没有一个能与我的寿命相媲美。
secondary_translated_text: Pairing with others is a basic instinct and can also bring great pleasure to some bugs. I have sought similar unions before, but none of my own partners can match my longevity.

original_en_text: Song queen of the Skarr and their most talented warrior.
original_zh_text: 斯卡尔一族的歌后，并且是族史上最具天赋的战士。
translated_text: Skelines乐队的歌手和他们最有才华的战士。
secondary_translated_text: The singers of the Skelines band and their most talented fighters.

original_en_text: For one to love another so similar to themselves, is that selfless or vain?
original_zh_text: 爱慕镜像般的另一个自己，究竟是无私还是极致的虚荣？
translated_text: 一个人爱一个和自己如此相似的人，是无私还是虚荣？
secondary_translated_text: Is it selfless or vain for a person to love someone who is so similar to himself?

original_en_text: A crude construct of my father’s fallen domain. Only a fool believes that void can be fashioned to do their bidding.
original_zh_text: 我父亲陨落国度的粗劣造物。只有愚者才会相信虚空可被驾驭。
translated_text: 我父亲堕落王国的大致结构。只有傻瓜才相信虚空可以在他们的指挥下创造出来。
secondary_translated_text: The general structure of my father's fallen kingdom. Only fools believe that the void can be created under their command.

original_en_text: Short-horned bug born with underdeveloped wings.
original_zh_text: 翅膀发育不全的短角虫。
translated_text: 短角昆虫生来就有不完整的翅膀。
secondary_translated_text: Short-horned insects are born with incomplete wings.

original_en_text: Common bug wielding a set of old bells. The bug will fling the bells at anyone it deems still free.
original_zh_text: 挥舞旧钟的普通信徒，向未被丝咒侵蚀者投掷旧钟。
translated_text: 一种挥舞着旧钟声的常见虫子。这个错误将给任何它认为仍然自由的人敲响警钟。
secondary_translated_text: A common insect that waves old bells. This mistake will be a wake-up call for anyone it believes is still free.

original_en_text: Born with many tools I would once have desired for myself. Fortunately, I have trained hard around those limits.
original_zh_text: 天生具备我曾渴求的利器。所幸我通过苦练突破了自身局限。
translated_text: 出生时就配备了许多我曾经渴望的工具。幸运的是，我已经围绕这些限制进行了艰苦的训练。
secondary_translated_text: I was born equipped with many of the tools I once longed for. Fortunately, I have trained hard around these limitations.

original_en_text: More bother than the bug themself are the countless traps they have already laid throughout their caves.
original_zh_text: 其洞穴内遍布的陷阱比这虫子本身更令我头疼。
translated_text: 比昆虫本身更麻烦的是，它们在洞穴里设置了无数的陷阱。
secondary_translated_text: What is more troublesome than the insects themselves is the countless traps they set in their caves.

original_en_text: The lethality of these bugs is unexpected. Their bodies were never built for combat. The Haunting has altered their nature dramatically.
original_zh_text: 这些本非为战斗设计的虫子竟有致命的战力，看来丝咒显著地改变了其本质。
translated_text: 这些细菌的杀伤力出乎意料。他们的身体从来就不是为战斗而生的。闹鬼极大地改变了他们的本性。
secondary_translated_text: The killing power of these bacteria is unexpected. Their bodies were never built for combat. Haunting has greatly changed their nature.

original_en_text: Docile bug whose wings mimic the grasses of the Far Fields. A common snack for larger predators.
original_zh_text: 温顺的飞虫，翅膀模拟原野草叶的模样。比它们大的生物基本都能把它们当作小零食来吃。
translated_text: 一种温顺的昆虫，其翅膀模仿户田的草。它是大型掠食者的常见食物。
secondary_translated_text: A docile insect whose wings imitate the grass of the fields. It is a common food among large predators.

original_en_text: Exhausted bug, grown sickly from the smog of the Underworks. The worker’s twistpins, once tools of repair, now serve as spun projectiles.
original_zh_text: 被工业废气侵蚀的抱病劳工，将维修旋针改造为投掷武器。
translated_text: 疲惫不堪的昆虫因地下室的烟雾而生病。工人的扭针曾经是维修工具，但现在它们充当旋转弹丸。
secondary_translated_text: The exhausted insect became sick from the smoke in the basement. Workers 'twist pins used to be maintenance tools, but now they act as rotating pellets.

original_en_text: Humbled prisoner serving their sentence for sin committed within the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 服刑中的卑微囚犯，曾在圣堡中犯下罪过。
translated_text: 卑微的囚犯因在城堡中犯下的罪行而服刑。
secondary_translated_text: The humble prisoner served time for crimes committed in the castle.

original_en_text: Ancient heart of Shellwood, connected to all its living things.
original_zh_text: 维系甲木林万物联结的远古之心。
translated_text: 谢尔伍德古老的心与所有生物相连。
secondary_translated_text: Shelwood's ancient heart is connected to all living things.

original_en_text: Guide and ofttimes leader within the Citadel’s Choir.
original_zh_text: 圣堡咏者团的向导与常任领袖。
translated_text: 曾担任城堡合唱团的总监和常务领导。
secondary_translated_text: He served as director and executive leader of the Castle Chorus.

original_en_text: Poor of sight but possessing a keen sense of smell, it uses its bulk to charge at foreign scents. Remaining fierce so far into old age is an admirable trait.
original_zh_text: 虽视力极差却嗅觉敏锐，凭借庞大身躯冲撞陌生气味源。暮年仍保有此等凶性，着实值得敬佩。
translated_text: 它的视力很差，但嗅觉很灵敏，并利用其体积吸收外来气味。晚年凶猛是一种令人钦佩的品质。
secondary_translated_text: Its vision is poor, but its sense of smell is very sensitive and uses its volume to absorb foreign odors. Ferocity in old age is an admirable quality.

original_en_text: Crawling insect with a sizzling bile sack in its abdomen.
original_zh_text: 腹部携带沸腾胆汁囊的爬行虫。
translated_text: 爬行昆虫，胃上胆汁袋嘶嘶作响。
secondary_translated_text: Crawling insects, bile pockets on their stomachs hissing.

original_en_text: If given a chance, this one will steal Silk from any significant source, including my own shell.
original_zh_text: 一旦有机会，它会从任何来源窃取灵丝——包括我的甲壳。
translated_text: 如果有机会，这个人会从任何重要来源窃取Silk，包括我自己的壳。
secondary_translated_text: If given the opportunity, this person would steal Silk from any important source, including my own shell.

original_en_text: Mindless sack filled with Plasmium. When broken the Plasmium can be consumed for its temporary benefits to health.
original_zh_text: 装满再生液体的活体炸弹。满载生质液的无智囊虫，打破后，可使用其生质液获得暂时性的生命值。
translated_text: 一个装满血浆的无脑袋。当Plasmium破裂时，可以食用，因为它对健康有暂时的好处。
secondary_translated_text: A brainless person filled with plasma. When Plasmium breaks, it can be eaten because of its temporary health benefits.

original_en_text: More effective an opponent than would be guessed. The precarity of its winding domain can make even its simple assault a challenge.
original_zh_text: 在错综复杂的齿轮迷宫中，这些机械的每一次俯冲都如同死神挥镰。
translated_text: 比想象中更有效的对手。其蜿蜒磁场的不稳定性使得即使是简单的攻击也成为挑战。
secondary_translated_text: A more effective opponent than you imagined. The instability of its winding magnetic field makes even simple attacks a challenge.

original_en_text: Elder Conchfly crowned with a huge coral horn. Once partnered with a mate, they will rarely be seen alone.
original_zh_text: 头戴珊瑚巨角的古老螺类，与伴侣终生形影不离。
translated_text: 头上长着巨大的珊瑚角的老贝壳。一旦与伴侣合作，他们很少单独出现。
secondary_translated_text: Old shells with huge coral horns on their heads. Once working with a partner, they rarely appear alone.

original_en_text: Drained yet dedicated labourer, wielding a coarse steel brush.
original_zh_text: 手持劣质钢刷的劳工，尽管身体已被苦役榨干，但仍孜孜不倦。
translated_text: 他是一名高强度工人，挥舞着一把粗糙的钢刷。
secondary_translated_text: He was a high-intensity worker, wielding a rough steel brush.

original_en_text: Fierce, strong and disciplined... yet these qualities do not protect them from the Haunting. Is such a fate inevitable in these lands?
original_zh_text: 勇猛强壮，且遵守纪律……连这样的战士都无法逃脱丝咒的侵蚀，难道纺络所有生物终将堕入此劫？
translated_text: 坚强、坚强、有纪律……然而这些品质并不能保护它们免受困扰。这样的命运在这些土地上不可避免吗？
secondary_translated_text: Strong, strong, disciplined... yet these qualities do not protect them from trouble. Is such a fate inevitable in these lands?

original_en_text: A form well suited for combat, lithe and fast. No surprise it seems to rank so high amongst its cult.
original_zh_text: 纤瘦迅捷的体态完美适配战斗，难怪能在教团中身居高位。
translated_text: 非常适合战斗、轻型、快速形式。毫不奇怪，它在其邪教中的排名如此之高。
secondary_translated_text: Ideal for combat, light, fast form. Not surprisingly, it ranks so high among its cults.

original_en_text: Winged ant hunter that strikes from the air with its bone lance.
original_zh_text: 使用骨制长矛的飞蚁猎手，擅长从空中发起突刺。
translated_text: 一个带翼的蚂蚁猎人，用骨矛从空中进行攻击。
secondary_translated_text: A winged ant hunter attacks from the air with a bone spear.

original_en_text: In my home caves, when once this substance was allowed to flourish, I saw similar aberrations. This is wonder tainted strong with revulsion.
original_zh_text: 在我故土的洞穴中，当这种物质开始蔓延时，我也目睹过类似的畸变。这是一种掺杂着强烈厌恶的“奇迹”。
translated_text: 在我的洞穴里，当这种材料被允许蓬勃发展时，我看到了类似的扭曲。这是一个充满厌恶的奇迹。
secondary_translated_text: In my cave, when the material was allowed to flourish, I saw similar distortions. This is a miracle full of disgust.

original_en_text: Furred bug beneath a heavy bell. It has grown too large to burrow, but in maturing has developed small wings.
original_zh_text: 毛茸茸的甲虫背负着沉重钟壳，胖得钻不进地洞，倒是长出了一对小翅膀。
translated_text: 一只毛茸茸的昆虫在一个沉重的铃下。它已经长得太大了，无法进入洞穴，但成熟后却长出了小翅膀。
secondary_translated_text: A furry insect is under a heavy bell. It had grown too big to enter the cave, but when it matured, it grew small wings.

original_en_text: Aerial bug of the Citadel, unarmed but for its short horn.
original_zh_text: 圣堡的飞行虫，仅凭短角作为武器。
translated_text: 城堡里的空中昆虫不携带武器，但有短角。
secondary_translated_text: The airborne insects in the castle do not carry weapons, but have short horns.

original_en_text: Adult Mossmir with a fully developed stinger and hardened hide.
original_zh_text: 成年苔翼虫，具备完全发育的毒刺与坚硬的外壳。
translated_text: 成年Mossmir已经发育成熟，皮肤坚硬。
secondary_translated_text: Adult Mossmir is mature and has hard skin.

original_en_text: Motherhood is an instinct that can push creatures beyond what seems their natural limits. It turns even weaker beasts like these into formidable foes.
original_zh_text: 为母则刚的本能，总能使弱小的生物展现出骇人的攻击性。
translated_text: 母性是一种本能，可以将生物体推向看似自然的极限。它将这样较弱的野兽变成强大的敌人。
secondary_translated_text: Motherhood is an instinct that can push organisms to seemingly natural limits. It turns such a weak beast into a powerful enemy.

original_en_text: The remains of an aged bug were housed at the pyre’s heart. The structure suggested they wished for immolation. If so, I have seen their wish granted.
original_zh_text: 一只年迈虫子的遗骸安放在火葬堆的中心。从构造上看，它们似乎希望通过自焚来进行献祭。若真如此，我想这一愿望已经实现。
translated_text: 一只老年昆虫的遗骸被放置在柴堆的中央。该结构表明他们想烧死自己。如果是这样，我已经看到他们的愿望成真了。
secondary_translated_text: The remains of an elderly insect are placed in the middle of the pyre. The structure suggests they wanted to burn themselves. If so, I have already seen their wishes come true.

original_en_text: Skilled ant hunter bearing blade and armour fashioned from bone.
original_zh_text: 装备骨制武器及护甲的蚁族精锐。
translated_text: 熟练的蚂蚁猎人，手持刀片和骨头制成的盔甲。
secondary_translated_text: Skilled ant Hunter, holding armor made of blades and bones.

original_en_text: To survive while storing so much searing fluid within... Before I would have believed it impossible, but Pharloom is home to many marvels.
original_zh_text: 体内存储巨量高温液体仍能存活……原以为不可能，但纺络本就充满奇迹。
translated_text: 为了在体内储存如此多的热液体的同时生存。我曾经相信这是不可能的，但法鲁姆是许多奇迹的诞生地。
secondary_translated_text: In order to survive while storing so much hot liquid in the body. I used to believe it was impossible, but Farum is the birthplace of many miracles.

original_en_text: Choir commander of the High Halls, able to summon and command cogflies at a flick of their baton.
original_zh_text: 高庭咏者团统帅，挥动指挥棒即可召唤机枢蝇群。
translated_text: 高级大厅的合唱团指挥官能够召唤并指挥指挥棒的轻弹。
secondary_translated_text: The choir commander in the senior hall can summon and direct the flick of the baton.

original_en_text: Masked coral drifter, grown larger than its more numerous companions.
original_zh_text: 古老的漂浮生物，体型远超同类。
translated_text: 蒙面珊瑚漂流者比他的许多同伴长得更大。
secondary_translated_text: The masked coral drifter is bigger than many of his companions.

original_en_text: Many-legged insect fanatically obsessed with flame.
secondary_translated_text: Multi-legged insects are fascinated by fire.

original_en_text: Curiosity saw me answer their summons, but I shall not allow them to stall me long. I must work fast to fix my grand mistake.
original_zh_text: 好奇心驱使我响应他们的召唤，但我不会在此浪费时间——我需要尽快修正我酿成的大错。
translated_text: 很好奇我响应了他们的电话，但我不会让他们耽误我太久。我必须尽快工作来纠正我的大错误。
secondary_translated_text: I was curious that I responded to their calls, but I wouldn't let them delay me for too long. I have to work as soon as possible to correct my big mistake.

original_en_text: A revolting creature. My shell itches at their presence. In the pens where their numbers grow vast, I am forever on edge.
original_zh_text: 肮脏恶心的生物。光是它们的存在就让我甲壳发痒。在蟑群泛滥的养殖场中，我会时刻保持警惕。
translated_text: 一个恶心的生物。它们的出现让我的壳发痒。在他们数量不断增加的栅栏里，我总是处于紧张状态。
secondary_translated_text: A disgusting creature. Their appearance makes my shell itch. Inside the fence where their numbers are increasing, I am always on edge.

original_en_text: Dancing around this simple creature as it charges back and forth is the sort of game I delighted in as a child. Alas, I now have more pressing matters to attend to.
original_zh_text: 我小时候就爱逗这种笨虫，在它身边闪转腾挪，看它来回乱撞可有意思了。唉，但我现在有更紧迫的事情要处理。
translated_text: 当这个简单的生物来回冲锋时，绕着它跳舞是我小时候喜欢的一种游戏。唉，我现在有更紧迫的事情要处理。
secondary_translated_text: Dancing around this simple creature as it charged back and forth was a favorite game of mine as a child. Alas, I have more pressing matters to deal with now.

original_en_text: Theirs seems a sad, grueling task, serving their lifetime for a Citadel unseen.
original_zh_text: 它们的工作实属可悲的苦役，为那见不到的圣堡永世效劳。
translated_text: 他们似乎是一项悲伤而艰巨的任务，为一座看不见的城堡服务。
secondary_translated_text: They seem to be a sad and arduous task, serving an invisible castle.

original_en_text: Airborne relative of the grounded Skull Scuttler, found only in the Marrow’s deepest, hottest caves.
original_zh_text: 头骨潜行者的飞虫近亲，髓骨洞窟深处灼热的洞穴独有。
translated_text: 它是搁浅的Skull Sccutler的空中近亲，只在最深、最热的骨髓洞穴中发现。
secondary_translated_text: It is an aerial relative of the stranded Skull Sccutler and is found only in the deepest and hottest bone marrow caves.

original_en_text: Theirs would be a high risk life, followed by a short, searing end.
original_zh_text: 这是份高危职业，它们的结局注定短暂而炽烈。
translated_text: 他们的生活将是一种高风险的生活，随之而来的是短暂而灼热的结局。
secondary_translated_text: Their life will be a high-risk life, with a short and scorching ending.

original_en_text: Placid native of Verdania. Its hide closely mimics the flora of its territory.
original_zh_text: 温顺的翠庭原生生物，其皮毛完美拟态栖息地的植被。
translated_text: 普莱西德出生于维达尼亚。它的皮毛非常模仿其领地的植物群。
secondary_translated_text: Placid was born in Vidania. Its fur closely mimics the flora of its territory.

original_en_text: They remorselessly eliminate any pilgrim or passerby deemed impure to their sight. The countless husks, strewn on paths beside them, tell of their conclusive decisions.
original_zh_text: 他们无情地消灭任何在他们眼中被视为不洁的朝圣者或过路者。堆积在路径旁的遗骸，无声控诉着所谓"净化"的残酷。
translated_text: 他们毫不犹豫地消除任何被认为不纯洁的朝圣者或路人。旁边小路上散落着无数的炮弹，讲述着他们的决定。
secondary_translated_text: They did not hesitate to eliminate any pilgrims or passers-by deemed impure. Countless artillery shells were scattered on the nearby path, telling their decision.

original_en_text: Weak, afraid, and aware of the imminent end. I understand their desperation, but my death will not prevent the coming fall.
original_zh_text: 弱小、恐惧，知道终局将至。我懂得它们的绝望，可我的死并不能阻止即将到来的灾祸。
translated_text: 软弱、害怕并意识到即将到来的结果。我理解他们的绝望，但我的死不会阻止即将到来的秋天。
secondary_translated_text: Weak, afraid and aware of the upcoming results. I understand their despair, but my death will not stop the coming autumn.

original_en_text: An inspired use of steam. I must remember its construction when designing future tools.
original_zh_text: 高温蒸汽在管腔内压缩爆鸣的声响，像极了垂死者的嘶吼。这种将杀戮伪装成清洁工程的设计，着实令人胆寒。
translated_text: 启发了蒸汽的使用。当为未来设计工具时，我必须牢记它的构造。
secondary_translated_text: Inspired the use of steam. When designing a tool for the future, I must keep its construction in mind.

original_en_text: They know well their domain, lurking in wait in its byways and bogs, always ready to pounce.
original_zh_text: 它们深谙领地内的每处沼泽暗道，时刻准备伏击。
translated_text: 他们非常了解自己的领地，在小路和沼泽中等待，准备随时发动袭击。
secondary_translated_text: They know their territory well and wait in the paths and swamps, ready to attack at any time.

original_en_text: Husk of an alchemist’s assistant granted false life by Plasmium.
original_zh_text: 被生质液赋予虚假生命的炼金术士助手的躯壳。
translated_text: 炼金术士助手的外壳被Plasmium赋予了假生命。
secondary_translated_text: The shell of the alchemist's assistant was given false life by Plasmium.

original_en_text: The false mask alone is frightening enough to scare away smaller pests.
original_zh_text: 光凭这个惊悚的造型就能劝退不少胆小鬼。
translated_text: 仅靠口罩就足以吓跑较小的害虫。
secondary_translated_text: A mask alone is enough to scare away smaller pests.

original_en_text: In its natural state it would avoid potential predators, but Pharloom’s Haunting now compels it to aggression. Fortunately, its jaws are ill-suited for combat.
original_zh_text: 本性畏避掠食者，然而纺络的丝咒迫使其凶性毕露。幸好它们的颚钳钝拙，不善搏杀。
translated_text: 在自然状态下，它会避开潜在的捕食者，但法鲁姆的困扰现在迫使它具有攻击性。幸运的是，它的下巴不适合战斗。
secondary_translated_text: In its natural state, it would avoid potential predators, but Farum's troubles now force it to be aggressive. Fortunately, its jaw is not suitable for combat.

original_en_text: Returned to their home caves, this chef continued to devise delicacies too repulsive for any bug still sane.
original_zh_text: 回到故土的洞穴后，这位厨师依旧沉迷于研制那些令任何尚存理智的虫子都难以接受的料理。
translated_text: 回到他们的家洞穴，厨师继续设计美味佳肴，这些美食对于任何保持理智的昆虫来说都太恶心了。
secondary_translated_text: Back in their home cave, chefs continue to design delicacies that would be too disgusting for any insect to keep its senses.

original_en_text: Hardened warrior lord of a bygone age, able to command the coral crust to his bidding.
original_zh_text: 能号令珊瑚甲壳的远古战主。
translated_text: 过去强大的军阀能够听从他的命令指挥珊瑚壳。
secondary_translated_text: In the past, powerful warlords were able to obey his orders and command coral shells.

original_en_text: There seem no ranks in their domain, yet this one has risen above the rest. A station likely gained through intimidation and thuggery.
original_zh_text: 该领域本无等级制度，此虫却凭威胁与暴力手段上位。
translated_text: 他们的领域似乎没有排名，但这个排名超过了其他排名。电视台可以通过恐吓和暴徒获得。
secondary_translated_text: There seems to be no ranking in their field, but this ranking exceeds other rankings. Television stations can be obtained through intimidation and thugs.

original_en_text: Manic fencer who delights in battle.
translated_text: 一位喜欢战斗的狂热击剑运动员。
secondary_translated_text: An avid fencer who likes to fight.

original_en_text: Sightless burrower that reacts violently to the slightest sound.
original_zh_text: 失去视力却听觉敏锐的穴居虫类，最细微的声响也会引起它们激烈的反应。
translated_text: 盲人穴居人对最轻微的声音反应强烈。
secondary_translated_text: Blind cavemen respond strongly to the slightest sound.

original_en_text: Monarch of Pharloom, and the primal source of Silk.
original_zh_text: 纺络的君主，灵丝的源头。
translated_text: 法鲁国王，丝绸的发源地。

original_en_text: These bugs have been driven out of their vault’s recesses by Pharloom’s black collapse. They are a nuisance, and I have only myself to blame.
original_zh_text: 由于纺络的崩塌，这些虫子被驱赶出书库的深处。这都是我一手造成的麻烦。
translated_text: 法勒姆的黑色崩溃将虫子赶出了金库深处。他们是麻烦，我只能怪我自己。
secondary_translated_text: Fallum's black collapse drives the bugs out of the vault's depths. They are trouble, and I have only myself to blame.

original_en_text: Flying bone mite that lives near magma. Roasts its prey by spitting scorching tar.
original_zh_text: 栖息在熔岩区的飞行螨虫，喷射高温焦油灼烧猎物。
translated_text: 生活在岩浆附近的飞行骨螨虫。吐出热焦油来烤猎物。
secondary_translated_text: Flying bone mites that live near magma. Spits out hot tar to roast the prey.

original_en_text: Plentiful pest with a sharp proboscis and a belly full of bile.
original_zh_text: 体内充满胆汁的群居蝠虫，死亡时剧烈爆炸。
translated_text: 大量害虫，鼻子锋利，肚子里充满胆汁。
secondary_translated_text: A large number of pests, sharp noses, and stomachs full of bile.

original_en_text: Small arachnid found in many crevices and caves throughout Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 纺络的岩缝和洞穴里常见的小型蜘蛛。
translated_text: 法鲁的许多裂缝和洞穴中都发现了小蜘蛛。
secondary_translated_text: Small spiders have been found in many cracks and caves in Faro.

original_en_text: Large worm mutated heavily by Plasmium. The creature has become fused to the roof of its cave, no longer able to move freely.
original_zh_text: 受生质液感染而变异的大型蠕虫。这只生物已与所处洞穴的洞顶融合，失去了自由移动的能力。
translated_text: 大型蠕虫会因疟原虫而发生严重变异。该生物已融入洞穴顶部，不再能够自由移动。
secondary_translated_text: Large worms can be severely mutated by malaria parasites. The creature has integrated into the top of the cave and is no longer able to move freely.

original_en_text: Its training resembles my own, favouring fast strikes and rapid movement. Once a hunter, perhaps?
original_zh_text: 战斗风格与我的技巧相似，崇尚速攻战术。或许它们曾经也是猎手？
translated_text: 它的训练与我自己的训练相似，喜欢快速投篮和快速移动。也许他曾经是一名猎人？
secondary_translated_text: Its training is similar to my own training and likes fast shots and quick moves. Maybe he was once a hunter?

original_en_text: What exceptional senses it possesses. It detects me with ease, even when not a single sound is made.
original_zh_text: 感知极为敏锐，哪怕分毫响动都能惊动它。
translated_text: 它有多么非凡的感官啊。即使它不发出任何声音，它也能轻松地检测到我。
secondary_translated_text: What extraordinary senses it has. Even if it doesn't make any sound, it can easily detect me.

original_en_text: Young masked worm that delights in ambushing intruders within its tunnels.
original_zh_text: 热衷隧道伏击的面甲蠕虫幼体。
translated_text: 年轻的蒙面蠕虫喜欢在隧道中伏击入侵者。
secondary_translated_text: Young masked worms like to ambush intruders in tunnels.

original_en_text: Small automaton built to work, without complaint, in the scorching heat of the Underworks’ Cauldron.
original_zh_text: 为圣堡工厂内大熔釜的酷热环境打造的小型自动机。勤勤恳恳，任劳任怨。
translated_text: 小型自动机是为了在Underworks ' Cauldron的高温下毫无抱怨地工作而建造的。
secondary_translated_text: Small automata were built to work without complaint in the high temperatures of Underworks ' Cauldron.

original_en_text: Elder overseers of the Deep Docks, responsible for the oversight and punishment of lesser workers.
original_zh_text: 深坞地区的监工，负责监管与惩戒低级别工人。
translated_text: 深航站楼的老年监管人员负责监督和惩罚下级工人。
secondary_translated_text: Elderly supervisors at Shenzhen Terminal are responsible for supervising and punishing lower-level workers.

original_en_text: Drifting creature with a wide coral mask and hard proboscis to stab its prey.
original_zh_text: 戴着宽大珊瑚面甲的漂流生物，使用坚硬的长喙攻击自投罗网的猎物。
translated_text: 漂浮的生物戴着宽大的珊瑚面具和坚硬的长鼻子来刺伤猎物。
secondary_translated_text: Floating creatures wear wide coral masks and hard long noses to stab their prey.

original_en_text: The feeder’s curled pin looks designed to keep ravenous roaches at bay, and the tender from turning into the meal.
original_zh_text: 那柄弯钩长针的设计堪称精妙— 既能防止饥渴的蟑螂反将饲主当作美餐，又可随时给不听话的 "宠物" 放血。
translated_text: 喂食器的卷曲针似乎是为了阻止贪婪的蟑螂并防止它们变成食物。
secondary_translated_text: The curled needles of the feeder appear to be designed to deter greedy roaches and prevent them from turning into food.

original_en_text: A creature born of a bug’s desperate hope for strength. Few possess the skill to call the void, and of those that can, none possess the means to tame it.
original_zh_text: 某只虫子在绝望中极度渴求力量，诞生出了此造物。能召唤虚空的虫子已寥寥无几，而在它们之中，更无虫子能真正驯服虚空。
translated_text: 一种因昆虫对力量的绝望希望而诞生的生物。很少有人有能力召唤虚空，而在有能力的人中，没有人有能力驯服虚空。
secondary_translated_text: A creature born of insects 'desperate hope for power. Few people have the ability to summon the void, and among the capable, no one has the ability to tame the void.

original_en_text: Dark-furred bug protecting itself with a spiked coral nut.
original_zh_text: 以带刺珊瑚坚果自卫的深色绒毛甲虫。
translated_text: 深色皮毛昆虫用多刺的珊瑚果实保护自己。
secondary_translated_text: Dark-furred insects protect themselves with spiny coral fruits.

original_en_text: Thick-plated scuttler that prefers high places.
original_zh_text: 偏好占据制高点的厚甲虫，从口中倾泻灼热酸雨。

original_en_text: Drained worker on the verge of collapse. Consumed by the Haunting, they continue to work far beyond their mortal limits.
original_zh_text: 被丝咒侵蚀的濒死劳工，超越生理极限持续劳作。
translated_text: 筋疲力尽的工人们濒临崩溃。他们被闹鬼激怒了，继续工作，远远超出了他们的极限。
secondary_translated_text: The exhausted workers were on the verge of collapse. Enraged by the haunting, they continued to work well beyond their limits.

original_en_text: Cunning bug that hunts with darts fashioned from stake and bile.
original_zh_text: 用尖桩与胆汁制作毒镖的狡诈虫子。
translated_text: 狡猾的昆虫用树桩和胆汁制成的飞镖捕猎。
secondary_translated_text: Crafty insects hunt with darts made from stumps and bile.

original_en_text: The void that will claim all things... In the barbed forms it chooses its nature can be seen clear.
original_zh_text: 吞噬万物的虚空本质，于此狰狞形态显露无遗。
translated_text: 空虚会夺走一切。在它所选择的倒刺形式中，它的性质可以清楚地看出。
secondary_translated_text: Emptiness takes everything away. In its chosen barb form, its nature can be clearly seen.

original_en_text: Cogwork construct forged primarily for the Core’s protection. Bears a shield and poke-pin, and possesses a lethal understanding of their use.
original_zh_text: 持盾佩枪的核心守卫机械，具备战术应变能力。
translated_text: Cogwork结构主要是为了保护核心而建造的。携带盾牌和针刺，并对它们的目的有致命的了解。
secondary_translated_text: The Cogwork structure was mainly built to protect the core. Carry shields and needles and have a fatal understanding of their purpose.

original_en_text: Small bony bug that favours dark tunnels. Can expand its spiked carapace to ward against attacking predators.
original_zh_text: 喜欢待在阴暗隧道的硬壳虫，遇到危险时会突然炸开背刺。
translated_text: 喜欢黑暗隧道的小骨虫。可以扩大其尖刺壳以抵御捕食者的攻击。
secondary_translated_text: Little bone worms who love dark tunnels. Its spiked shell can be expanded to withstand attacks from predators.

original_en_text: Their sharp cleaning implement is as filthy as the rest of the place. They only layer grime on grime.
original_zh_text: 他们的清洁工具与周遭同样污秽，这样打扫只会越来越脏。
translated_text: 他们锋利的清洁工具和其他地方一样脏。他们只是在泥土上涂上一层泥土。
secondary_translated_text: Their sharp cleaning tools are as dirty as anywhere else. They just put a layer of soil on the soil.

original_en_text: High standing insect of the Choir, bearing a bow. This elite Reed has been trained and fed beyond its smaller fellows.
original_zh_text: 圣咏团中地位崇高的虫子，持弓而立。比起普通的簧片战士，这位精英成员受过更严格的训练，也享有更丰盛的供养。
translated_text: 昆虫在唱诗班中高高站立，手握弓。这支精英里德队除了小伙伴之外还训练和喂食。
secondary_translated_text: Insects stand high in the choir, holding bows in their hands. This elite Reed team also trains and feeds in addition to their small partners.

original_en_text: It lies low to the ground, perhaps out of reverence for its task, but can spring up suddenly to attack. Its shear makes for a deadly weapon with surprising reach.
original_zh_text: 那柄形似剪枝钳的武器，既能精准剥离甲壳中的灵丝脉络，也能在瞬间绞碎试图逃逸的灵魂残片。
translated_text: 它躺在地上，也许是出于对它使命的尊重，但它可能会突然出现并发起攻击。它的剪刀是一种致命的武器，射程惊人。
secondary_translated_text: It lies on the ground, perhaps out of respect for its mission, but it may suddenly appear and attack. Its scissors are a deadly weapon with an astonishing range.

original_en_text: Small automaton with a shielded shell, intended to carry loads of dangerous flintflame.
