original_zh_text: 配备防护甲壳的小型自动机，负责运输危险的燧焰。
translated_text: 一个小型的自动装置，有一个屏蔽的外壳，用来携带危险的火石火焰。
secondary_translated_text: A small automatic device with a shielded enclosure used to carry dangerous flint flames.

original_en_text: They too seek the spectre at the Haunting’s heart, though I fear that foe would pose a challenge beyond their mortal limits.
original_zh_text: 他们同样在寻找那丝咒之源的幽魂——只是我担心，我们共同的敌人是超越凡虫极限的存在，恐怕不是他们所能应对的。
translated_text: 他们还在闹鬼的中心寻找鬼魂，尽管我担心这个敌人会构成超出他们极限的挑战。
secondary_translated_text: They are still searching for ghosts in haunted centers, although I fear this enemy will pose a challenge that exceeds their limits.

original_en_text: Defeat {0} more to complete the hunter’s notes.
original_zh_text: 再击败{0}只以解锁猎手的笔记。
translated_text: 击败{0}更多内容来完成猎人的笔记。
secondary_translated_text: beat{0}More content to complete the hunter's notes.

original_en_text: Nesting creature that fuses its face with sharpened coral.
original_zh_text: 将面部与珊瑚融为一体的巢居生物。
translated_text: 筑巢的生物将面孔与锋利的珊瑚融为一体。
secondary_translated_text: Nesting creatures blend their faces with sharp corals.

original_en_text: The moss looks to grow even inside their stomach, which the pilgrim spits at foes in compressed gobs. A foul form of offence.
original_zh_text: 苔藓甚至在其胃囊内滋长，被压缩成团的腐殖质带着刺鼻腥气——这恐怕是纺络最肮脏的远程武器。
translated_text: 苔藓似乎甚至在他们的胃里生长，朝圣者向敌人吐出苔藓，形成压缩粘液。一种肮脏的冒犯形式。
secondary_translated_text: Moss even seemed to grow in their stomachs, and the pilgrims spat it out at the enemy, forming compressed mucus. A dirty form of offense.

original_en_text: Rare automaton intended to perform the ringing of bells and cymbals in the depths of the Core.
original_zh_text: 专为敲击钟钹设计的稀有自动机。
translated_text: 罕见的自动机旨在在核心深处执行钟声和钹的鸣响。
secondary_translated_text: Rare automata are designed to perform the ringing of bells and cymbals deep in the core.

original_en_text: Disciple of the Choir, elevated above other pilgrims, and forced to cowl their face forever more.
original_zh_text: 蒙面的高阶信徒，地位远超普通朝圣者。
translated_text: 唱诗班的小丑，比其他朝圣者更是被迫永远皱起眉头。
secondary_translated_text: The choir clown, more than other pilgrims, is forced to frown forever.

original_en_text: Pharloom’s structures seem almost built for them. The endless corners and cracks, so perfect for mites to burrow and nest.
original_zh_text: 纺络的建筑结构仿佛为其量身打造，这里有无尽的角落和缝隙供螨虫打洞筑巢。
translated_text: 法鲁的建筑似乎几乎是为他们建造的。无尽的角落和裂缝非常适合螨虫筑巢。
secondary_translated_text: Faro's buildings seem to have been built almost for them. Endless corners and cracks are great for mites to nest.

original_en_text: Flighted creature formed from coldshard. If shattered it will quickly reform.
original_zh_text: 由冰晶碎片构成的飞行生物，破碎后可以迅速重组。
translated_text: 飞行生物由寒冷的碎片形成。如果坏了，它会很快改革。
secondary_translated_text: Flying creatures are formed from cold debris. If it breaks down, it will reform quickly.

original_en_text: In every land, creatures find new and surprising ways to disguise themselves. One must be wary always.
original_zh_text: 不论在哪一片土地上，万物皆有巧妙的伪装法门，行走此间当时刻保持警觉。
translated_text: 在每一片土地上，生物都会找到新的、令人惊讶的方法来伪装自己。一个人必须始终保持警惕。
secondary_translated_text: On every land, creatures find new and surprising ways to disguise themselves. One must always be vigilant.

original_en_text: Aggressive winged bug of the lowlands. When angered, it rapidly whips its bladed tail as a weapon.
original_zh_text: 低地区域的暴躁飞虫，一生气就把带刃的尾巴甩成风车。
translated_text: 低地有攻击性的有翼昆虫。生气时，它会迅速鞭打刀刃和尾巴作为武器。
secondary_translated_text: Aggressive winged insect of lowland. When angry, it will quickly whip the blade and tail as weapons.

original_en_text: Young ant hunter wielding sickles carved from teeth. Will often call for aid if danger comes close.
original_zh_text: 使用兽牙镰刀的年轻蚁族猎手，遇险时会呼叫支援。
translated_text: 年轻的蚂蚁猎人挥舞着一把刻着牙齿的镰刀。如果危险临近，他经常寻求帮助。
secondary_translated_text: The young ant hunter brandished a sickle with teeth engraved on it. If danger approaches, he often seeks help.

original_en_text: Overgrown elder, able to spawn burning bubbles from within its coral-cased shell.
original_zh_text: 与珊瑚融合的长老巨虫，能从甲壳内喷发炽热气泡。
translated_text: 过度生长的接骨木浆果会在珊瑚壳内产生燃烧的气泡。
secondary_translated_text: Overgrown elderberry berries can create burning bubbles inside the coral shell.

original_en_text: Imposing old insect nesting in the heights of Shellwood. Her command of twig and branch ensured no pilgrim ever survived within her territory.
original_zh_text: 盘踞甲木林高处的碎裂者女王，掌控树丛枝干屠尽领地内所有朝圣者。
translated_text: 让老昆虫在谢尔伍德高处筑巢。她对分支机构的控制确保了她的领土上没有朝圣者幸存。
secondary_translated_text: Let old insects nest high in Shelwood. Her control of the branch ensured that no pilgrims survived in her territory.

original_en_text: This bug’s fusion with the crust-growth... It seems intentional, though I imagine the union is far from comfortable.
original_zh_text: 这种融合看似自主选择，但其过程必定充满痛苦。
translated_text: 蠕虫的融合和地壳的生长。这似乎是故意的，尽管我不认为工会对此感到高兴。
secondary_translated_text: The fusion of worms and the growth of the earth's crust. It seems to be intentional, although I don't think the union is happy about it.

original_en_text: Born and built only to work until time stiffens its limbs. Perhaps it is mercy this construct knows nothing of the freedom it lacks.
original_zh_text: 生来只是为了劳作，直到岁月令它四肢僵硬。也许它对自己所缺失的自由一无所知，这反倒是一种仁慈。
translated_text: 出生和建造只是为了工作，直到时间硬化它的四肢。也许结构不知道它所缺乏的自由是仁慈的。
secondary_translated_text: Born and built just to work, until time hardens its limbs. Perhaps the structure does not know that the freedom it lacks is benevolent.

original_en_text: Warrior cartographer of a tribe from Pharloom’s edge. Her skills in battle could challenge the kingdom’s best.
original_zh_text: 纺络边陲部落的勇士制图师，其战力在纺络可谓数一数二。
translated_text: 他是法鲁姆边缘部落的战士制图师。她的格斗技巧足以挑战王国的顶级高手。
secondary_translated_text: He was a warrior cartographer for the fringe tribe of Faroum. Her fighting skills are enough to challenge the top masters of the kingdom.

original_en_text: Once one of Pharloom’s favoured bugs, and yet their domain and their shells would have been the first to fall to the Haunting.
original_zh_text: 曾经纺络的荣光加身者，却成为首批丝咒受害者。
translated_text: 它们曾经是法罗最喜欢的昆虫之一，但它们的领域和外壳首先落入了鬼魂手中。
secondary_translated_text: They were once one of Farrow's favorite insects, but their fields and shells first fell into the hands of ghosts.

original_en_text: Hidden amongst their tower’s matching crust, these smaller bugs would have survived and thrived.
original_zh_text: 这些小虫子依靠伪装得以繁衍生息。
translated_text: 这些较小的昆虫隐藏在塔的匹配地壳中，能够生存和繁殖。
secondary_translated_text: These smaller insects are hidden in the tower's matching crust and are able to survive and reproduce.

original_en_text: This one lived long and fed much. The wood will be much safer for their slaying.
original_zh_text: 她存活久远且吞噬无数，诛杀她将使丛林安全倍增。
translated_text: 这个人活得很长，吃得也很多。对于他们的杀戮来说，树林里会安全得多。
secondary_translated_text: This person lived a long life and ate a lot. The woods would be much safer for them to kill.

original_en_text: They once teemed around their tower, in numbers immense. It is a rare chance to witness such a bountiful display of life.
original_zh_text: 其数量曾经可谓铺天盖地。目睹此等生命奇观的机会已越发稀少。
translated_text: 他们曾经大量聚集在塔楼周围。这是见证如此丰富生活的难得机会。
secondary_translated_text: They once gathered in large numbers around the tower. This is a rare opportunity to witness such a rich life.

original_en_text: Burrower that nests in the Bellvein and seeks out hard bells to protects its soft body.
original_zh_text: 在钟脉内部打洞栖息的毛球状虫类，专门找硬钟壳当作盔甲。
translated_text: 尼安德特人在贝尔文筑巢，寻找坚硬的钟声来保护他们柔软的身体。
secondary_translated_text: Neanderthals built nests in Belvin, looking for hard bells to protect their soft bodies.

original_en_text: It is easy to be caught off-guard by the ricocheting trajectory of its flung mask, especially in tight corners.
original_zh_text: 投掷面甲的反弹轨迹难以预判。在狭窄空间尤其需要提防其袭击。
translated_text: 人们很容易被他抛出的面具的弹跳轨迹弄得措手不及，尤其是在狭窄的角落里。
secondary_translated_text: People can easily be caught off guard by the bouncing trajectory of the mask he throws, especially in narrow corners.

original_en_text: Time allowed their shell to grow thick, all the better for battering their targets.
original_zh_text: 岁月让它们的甲壳变得厚重，能更轻易地猛击目标。
translated_text: 时间会使它们的外壳更厚，更好地击中目标。
secondary_translated_text: Time will make their shells thicker and better hit their targets.

original_en_text: Arachnid that nestles within dark holes in cavern roofs. Pounces on prey from far above.
original_zh_text: 隐藏在洞顶暗处的蜘蛛，擅长从高处一跃而下，偷袭猎物。
translated_text: 蜘蛛栖息在洞穴顶部的黑洞中。从远处扑向猎物。
secondary_translated_text: Spiders inhabit the black hole at the top of the cave. Pounce on the prey from a distance.

original_en_text: A monster in the classic form of tales from youth. Its slaying was done as much by my fierce travelling companion as by myself.
original_zh_text: 童谣所述的经典魔物形态。此次诛杀多靠了我那勇猛的旅伴。
translated_text: 典型的青春故事形式的怪物。它被我凶猛的旅伴和我自己杀死了。
secondary_translated_text: A monster in the form of a typical youth story. It was killed by my fierce traveling companion and myself.

original_en_text: Passively waits for prey to blunder into its path. A technique that should not necessarily be derided. Whatever is effective is best.
original_zh_text: 静静等待猎物误入其攻击范围。看似消极的捕猎方式，往往能收获意外成效。
translated_text: 被动地等待猎物错误地进入它的路径。这项技术不一定应该被嘲笑。有效的就是最好的。
secondary_translated_text: Passively waiting for prey to mistakenly enter its path. This technology should not necessarily be laughed at. What is effective is the best.

original_en_text: My unique shell can resist the darker deformations of this substance, but even I have limits...
original_zh_text: 我的甲壳虽能抵抗此物质带来的畸变，但承受力终有极限。
translated_text: 我独特的外壳可以抵抗这种物质的黑暗变形，但即使是我也有局限性......
secondary_translated_text: My unique shell can resist the dark deformation of this substance, but even I have limitations...

original_en_text: Screeching scavenger dyed black in mourning at their land’s collapse.
original_zh_text: 大地倾覆之际，绝望哀叫的黑色食腐虫。
translated_text: 尖叫的食腐动物被土地的塌陷染成了黑色。
secondary_translated_text: Screaming scavengers were dyed black by the collapse of the land.

original_en_text: Amazingly, the creature carries the void’s black liquid in its stomach, violently spraying it forth if threatened.
original_zh_text: 神奇的是，它竟能将虚空黑液储于胃中，受威胁时剧烈喷吐攻击。
translated_text: 令人惊讶的是，这种生物的胃里充满了黑色液体，如果受到威胁，就会猛烈地喷出。
secondary_translated_text: Surprisingly, the creature's stomach is filled with black liquid, which will spout violently if threatened.

original_en_text: A critical member of the larger flock. Without them present the Kai would be fast driven to extinction by larger predators.
original_zh_text: 它们是族群存续的关键——当凯旋转尖角筑起防御阵时，连髓骨洞窟的暴君都要暂避锋芒。
translated_text: 一个大集团的重要成员。如果没有他们，凯人很快就会被更大的捕食者灭绝。
secondary_translated_text: An important member of a large group. Without them, the Kai people would soon be extinct by larger predators.

original_en_text: Strong bug replete with rosaries. If angered they will whip their strings in a ceaseless onslaught.
original_zh_text: 缠满念珠的强壮虫子，发怒时会挥舞珠串猛攻。
translated_text: 充满念珠的强大虫子。如果他们生气，他们会继续鞭打琴弦。
secondary_translated_text: Powerful bugs full of rosary beads. If they are angry, they will continue to whip the strings.

original_en_text: To subsist on the sickly water in this fetid environment it spits out the most toxic elements. Over generations, this former survival technique has turned into an effective hunting tool.
original_zh_text: 过滤毒液的生存机制经代际演化，成为高效的狩猎手段。
translated_text: 为了在这种恶臭的环境中的污水中生存，它会喷出最有毒的元素。经过几代人的努力，这种先前的生存技术已经成为一种有效的狩猎工具。
secondary_translated_text: In order to survive in sewage in this fetid environment, it spews out the most toxic elements. Over the course of generations, this previous survival technology has become an effective hunting tool.

original_en_text: Far more hostile than their younger companions but seemingly less likely to roam far from their nest.
original_zh_text: 看似凶暴，实为恋巢的保守派。
translated_text: 比它们的年轻同伴更具敌意，但似乎不太可能远离巢穴。
secondary_translated_text: More hostile than their young companions, but seem unlikely to stay far away from the nest.

original_en_text: Depressed thespian, consumed by the melancholy of a collapsing world.
original_zh_text: 被世界的崩解压垮的消沉演员。
translated_text: 这位沮丧的演员被崩溃世界的忧郁所吞没。
secondary_translated_text: The frustrated actor was engulfed by the melancholy of a collapsing world.

original_en_text: Once exulted chef, exiled from the Citadel for repeated culinary crimes.
original_zh_text: 曾经备受赞誉的大厨，却因屡次触犯烹饪禁忌而被逐出圣堡。
translated_text: 这位曾经开朗的厨师因多次烹饪犯罪而被逐出城堡。
secondary_translated_text: The once-cheerful chef was expelled from the castle for multiple cooking crimes.

original_en_text: Feeble servant of the Underworks with a long twistpin and hard shell.
original_zh_text: 手持长柄旋针的虚弱硬甲劳工。
translated_text: Underworks的虚弱仆人，戴着发夹和坚硬的贝壳。
secondary_translated_text: The frail servant of Underworks, wearing hairpins and hard shells.

original_en_text: Starved servant of the Slab, bearing a hooked longpin.
original_zh_text: 饥肠辘辘的罪石牢狱仆从，手持钩形长针。
translated_text: 一个饥饿的石仆人，拿着一根长钩针。
secondary_translated_text: A hungry stone servant, holding a long crochet.

original_en_text: Spherical, winged automaton housing many sharp spikes.
original_zh_text: 装载尖刺的球型飞行自动机，防御功能存疑。
translated_text: 一种球形、有翼的自动机，内部有许多锋利的尖刺。
secondary_translated_text: A spherical, winged automaton with many sharp spikes inside.

original_en_text: Their plump, round shape makes them well-suited for target practice. Difficult to resist testing my aim on them...
original_zh_text: 圆滚滚的身材十分适合用作靶子，不拿来练手都可惜……
translated_text: 它们丰满、圆润的形状使它们非常适合打靶练习。很难抗拒在他们身上测试我的目标……
secondary_translated_text: Their plump, rounded shape makes them ideal for target practice. It's hard to resist testing my goals on them...

original_en_text: Elder Drapefly grown big from age and consumption. Its heavy body allows it to hit much harder than its younger companions.
original_zh_text: 年迈体硕的帷虫，沉重的身躯赋予其强劲的冲击力。
translated_text: 老蜻蜓因年龄和消耗而长大。它沉重的身体使它击球比年轻的同伴更用力。
secondary_translated_text: Old dragonflies grow up due to age and consumption. Its heavy body makes it hit the ball harder than its young companions.

original_en_text: Final arbiter of the Blasted Steps, tasked to ensure only the sinless ever step beyond the Grand Gate.
original_zh_text: 蚀阶的最终裁决者，确保唯有无罪者能跨越巨扉圣门。
translated_text: 爆炸性步骤的最终仲裁者，任务是确保只有无辜的人才能穿过门。
secondary_translated_text: The ultimate arbiter of explosive steps, the task is to ensure that only innocent people get through the door.

original_en_text: This one chose to embrace the doom to come. I shall not share such easy surrender.
original_zh_text: 他选择臣服于灾难的降临，我绝不会效仿这种懦弱行径。
translated_text: 这个人选择拥抱即将到来的厄运。我不会分享如此轻易的投降。
secondary_translated_text: This person chose to embrace the impending doom. I would not share in such an easy surrender.

original_en_text: Gentle glider of Mount Fay. Its downy wings and cowl allow it to resist even the most cutting cold.
original_zh_text: 费耶山的温顺滑翔者，其绒翼可抵御极寒。
translated_text: 费伊山的温和滑翔机。它柔软的翅膀和腰带使它能够抵御最寒冷的寒冷。
secondary_translated_text: The gentle glider of Mount Fay. Its soft wings and belt allow it to withstand the coldest cold.

original_en_text: Heavy, hard-shelled charger relying on weight and strength.
translated_text: 依靠重量和强度的重型硬壳充电器。
secondary_translated_text: A heavy-duty hard-shell charger that relies on weight and strength.

original_en_text: This one’s husk held a masterful talent, to weave Silk into blazing runes. Throughout my life, I have seen runes woven for many tasks. Was she the first to hone such skills?
original_zh_text: 其躯壳曾掌握将灵丝编织为燃烧符文的绝技。纵观我毕生所见的各类符文，她或是这项技艺的开山鼻祖？
translated_text: 这个人的贝壳具有将丝绸编织成炽热符文的高超天赋。在我的一生中，我见过为许多任务编织的符文。她是第一个磨练这项技能的人吗？
secondary_translated_text: This man's shell has a superb talent for weaving silk into fiery runes. In my life, I have seen runes woven for many tasks. Is she the first person to hone this skill?

original_en_text: This one disturbs me... There is something in its simplicity. Do I almost feel fear?
original_zh_text: 这东西令我感到不安……其纯粹性中蕴含某种诡异的特质。我竟然感到一丝恐惧？
translated_text: 这让我感到不安。它的简单中有某种东西。我几乎害怕了吗？
secondary_translated_text: This makes me feel uneasy. There is something in its simplicity. Am I almost scared?

original_en_text: Myth made real in memory. The creature seemed completely at one with the flora around it. Did it ever truly exist as I have seen it?
original_zh_text: 传说中的生物在忆境中成为了现实，与周遭植物浑然一体。我所见到的一切，真的曾经存在过吗？
translated_text: 神话在记忆中成真。这种生物似乎与周围的植物完全融为一体。它真的像我所看到的那样存在吗？
secondary_translated_text: Myths come true in memory. The creature seems to be completely integrated with the surrounding plants. Does it really exist as I see it?

original_en_text: Simple. Graceful. Another fine bug lost forever from these lands.
original_zh_text: 简约而优雅。又一个永远从这片土地消失的美丽物种。
translated_text: 简单.优雅.又一只美丽的虫子永远地从这片土地上消失了。
secondary_translated_text: simple. elegant. Another beautiful insect has disappeared from this land forever.

original_en_text: His desire to see Pharloom saved may have been well intentioned, but he seemed quite happy for others to die upon the stage in pursuit of his goal.
original_zh_text: 他拯救纺络的愿望或许出于善意，但为实现目标似乎乐于目睹他人在舞台上殒命。
translated_text: 他希望看到法鲁姆获救可能是出于善意，但他似乎很高兴其他人为了追求他的目标而死在舞台上。
secondary_translated_text: He may have wanted to see Farum rescued out of good intentions, but he seemed happy that others were dying on stage in pursuit of his goals.

original_en_text: Brave worker carrying unstable flintflame and wearing a heavy bell to protect against potential ignition.
original_zh_text: 运输燧焰的工虫。燧焰性质不稳定，所以它们需要佩戴重型防爆钟罩。
translated_text: 勇敢的工人携带不稳定的引火材料，并戴着沉重的铃以防止潜在的点燃。
secondary_translated_text: Brave workers carried unstable tindling materials and wore heavy bells to prevent potential ignitions.

original_en_text: Its bright gems could be used to make beautiful, but short-lived jewellery. An amusing idea for a gift... or a trap.
original_zh_text: 每次甲壳碰撞都会迸发火星，这使得它们的巢穴成了行走的火药库。
translated_text: 其明亮的宝石可用于制作美丽但寿命短暂的珠宝。一个有趣的礼物想法。或者是一个陷阱。
secondary_translated_text: Its bright gems can be used to make beautiful but short-lived jewelry. An interesting gift idea. Or a trap.

original_en_text: Small burrowing ant, servant to the larger Skarr.
original_zh_text: 为大型斯卡尔蚁服务的小个子掘地工。
translated_text: 小型穴居蚂蚁，大型骷髅的仆人。
secondary_translated_text: Small burrowing ants, servants of large skeletons.

original_en_text: Heavy, hairy jailer responsible for capturing sinners and punishing prisoners.
original_zh_text: 厚重的多毛蝇虫，负责抓捕罪犯和惩戒囚犯。
translated_text: 笨重、蓬松的狱卒，负责逮捕罪犯和惩罚囚犯。
secondary_translated_text: Heavy, fluffy jailers responsible for arresting criminals and punishing prisoners.

original_en_text: Small fluttering creature capable of defending itself with its small stinger.
original_zh_text: 小型飞虫，使用自身毒刺进行攻击。
translated_text: 这个小飞行生物可以用它的小毒刺自卫。
secondary_translated_text: This little flying creature can defend itself with its little stinger.

original_en_text: Agile bug of Pharloom, its higher functions have been lost to the Haunting.
original_zh_text: 被丝咒夺去神智的敏捷朝圣者，仅存扑跃攻击的本能。
translated_text: 法鲁的敏捷性错误，它的高级功能已经被闹鬼失去了。
secondary_translated_text: Faro's agility error, its advanced features have been haunted and lost.

original_en_text: Old warrior guarding the border of their domain, stiffened by time and awoken by song.
original_zh_text: 守卫疆界的沧桑老将，因古老歌谣而苏醒。
translated_text: 守卫边疆的老兵被时间磨砺，被歌声唤醒。
secondary_translated_text: Veterans guarding the border have been tempered by time and awakened by singing.

original_en_text: More dangerous in the moment of its explosive and corrosive death than it ever was in life.
original_zh_text: 其死亡瞬间的腐蚀性爆炸远比生前更具威胁。
translated_text: 其爆炸性和腐蚀性死亡的那一刻比一生中的任何时候都更加危险。
secondary_translated_text: The moment of its explosive and corrosive death is more dangerous than at any time in life.

original_en_text: The core member of a powerful order, trained fearless and faithful. Theirs was a kingdom of warriors, one built upon their blades.
original_zh_text: 作为精锐战团的骨干成员，经受了严酷的训练，无畏且忠诚。它们建立的刀锋王朝，正是尚武精神的巅峰体现。
translated_text: 强大教团的核心成员训练有素、无所畏惧、忠诚。他们的王国是一个战士的王国，建立在他们的刀刃上。
secondary_translated_text: The core members of the powerful order are well-trained, fearless and loyal. Their kingdom is a warrior's kingdom, built on their blade.

original_en_text: If the woody hide is shattered, the bug will still bravely, foolishly try to attack.
original_zh_text: 它们至死都坚信那截空心木茎是神赐的圣枪——可悲的勇气，或是可敬的愚忠？
translated_text: 如果木皮破了，昆虫仍然会勇敢而愚蠢地试图攻击。
secondary_translated_text: If the wood skin breaks, the insects will still bravely and foolishly try to attack.

original_en_text: Young acolyte raised in the darkest vaults, destined to ascend to the rank of Scrollreader.
original_zh_text: 低语书库培育的诵经者接班人。
translated_text: 年轻的学徒在最黑暗的宝库中长大，注定会晋升为卷轴阅读者。
secondary_translated_text: Young apprentices grow up in the darkest treasure trove and are destined to be promoted to scroll readers.

original_en_text: Learned disciple of the Choir charged to maintain the Citadel’s Memorium.
original_zh_text: 受命维护圣堡忆廊的博学咏者团信徒。
translated_text: 合唱团博学的弟子负责维护城堡纪念馆。
secondary_translated_text: The erudite disciples of the choir are responsible for maintaining the Castle Memorial Hall.

original_en_text: Heart of the Haunting, long lulled to slumber and desperate to wake. The higher being’s threads stretched throughout Pharloom, snaring its bugs and driving them to madness and discord.
original_zh_text: 丝咒的核心，长久沉眠却渴求苏醒。她的丝线遍布纺络，诱使这片土地上的虫子陷入疯狂。
translated_text: 心脏闹鬼，长期睡眠，渴望醒来。高等生命的丝线遍布法鲁，困住了昆虫，迫使它们陷入疯狂和不和。
secondary_translated_text: Haunted heart, long-term sleep, eager to wake up. The threads of higher life spread throughout Faro, trapping the insects and forcing them into madness and discord.

original_en_text: Vigorous old knight and their noble companion, working together to see their lands cut free from haunted madness.
original_zh_text: 精力充沛的老骑士与他忠诚的同伴。他们并肩作战，誓要将自己的家园从丝咒的疯狂中解救出来。
translated_text: 精力充沛的老骑士和他们高贵的同伴共同努力，将他们的土地从闹鬼的疯狂中解放出来。
secondary_translated_text: The energetic old knights and their noble companions work together to liberate their land from the haunted madness.

original_en_text: Winged insect that feeds upon moss and lichen in the caves above Bone Bottom.
original_zh_text: 栖息于骸底镇上方洞窟的飞虫，以苔藓地衣为食。
translated_text: 有翼的昆虫，以骨头底部上方洞穴中的苔藓和地衣为食。
secondary_translated_text: Winged insects that feed on moss and lichen in the cave above the base of the bones.

original_zh_text: 监工兄弟 西格尼斯&格隆

original_en_text: Mournful creature tasked alone to expel the Citadel’s choking refuse. Their talent with a longpin is unmatched.
original_zh_text: 独自清理圣堡秽物的哀伤生物，长针技艺登峰造极。
translated_text: 一个勇敢的生物独自承担着驱逐城堡中令人窒息的垃圾的任务。他们的长别针天赋是无与伦比的。
secondary_translated_text: A brave creature alone undertakes the task of expelling the suffocating garbage from the castle. Their talent for long pins is unmatched.

original_en_text: They ceaselessly churn through rock and bone without ever seeming to rest. Do they have a destination? Or are they compelled to dig forever deeper?
original_zh_text: 它们似乎永远不知疲倦地向下挖掘。究竟是有目的地前进，还是被迫永无止境地穿行？
translated_text: 它们不断地在岩石和骨头中搅动，似乎永远不会休息。他们有目的地吗？或者他们被迫永远深入挖掘？
secondary_translated_text: They constantly stir in the rocks and bones and never seem to rest. Do they have a destination? Or are they forced to dig deep forever?

original_en_text: Obese offshoot of Muckroaches, born of the Citadel’s exhaust smog. The winged roach’s sagging stomach is filled with sizzling bile.
original_zh_text: 圣堡废气催生的肥胖蟑螂变种，鼓胀的腹部储存着沸腾胆汁。
translated_text: 蟑螂的肥枝是在城堡的废气中诞生的。有翼蟑螂下垂的胃里充满了嘶嘶作响的胆汁。
secondary_translated_text: The fat branches of cockroaches are born in the exhaust gas of the castle. The sagging stomach of the winged cockroach is filled with hissing bile.

original_en_text: Ancient Weaver condemned for a transgression lost to time.
original_zh_text: 远古时期因某项重罪被囚禁的古老织者。
translated_text: 古代编织者因其迷失在时间中的罪恶而受到谴责。
secondary_translated_text: Ancient weavers were condemned for their sin of being lost in time.

original_en_text: A fine shot with its sharp mask. Its aggression has no ill effect on its aim.
original_zh_text: 面甲投掷精准异常，暴戾的性情并未损耗其分毫准度。
translated_text: 一张漂亮的照片，锐利的面具。它的侵略性对其目标没有任何不利影响。
secondary_translated_text: A beautiful photo, a sharp mask. Its aggressive nature does not have any negative impact on its goals.

original_en_text: Seeming soft, but hiding a sharp surprise. Any larger predator attempting a bite would learn a pointed and painful lesson.
original_zh_text: 看似柔软实则暗藏杀机，掠食者的撕咬只会换来锥心之痛。
translated_text: 它可能看起来温柔，但它隐藏着尖锐的惊喜。任何试图咬人的大型捕食者都会得到尖锐而痛苦的教训。
secondary_translated_text: It may seem gentle, but it hides sharp surprises. Any large predator who tries to bite will learn a sharp and painful lesson.

original_en_text: Not a bug but a projection of another’s will cast in smog and Silk.
original_zh_text: 烟雾与灵丝交织的意志投影，并非实体生物。
translated_text: 不是一只昆虫，而是另一个人的意志扔进烟雾和丝绸中。
secondary_translated_text: Not an insect, but the will of another person thrown into the smoke and silk.

original_en_text: Broken construct built by Weavers past, able to fire a focused beam of silklight to carve halls and chambers through ice and bone.
original_zh_text: 破损的古织者装置，能聚集并发射灵丝光束凿穿冰体和骸骨，通常用来开凿厅室。
translated_text: 韦弗过去破碎的建筑能够散发出集中的Merceria，通过冰和骨头雕刻出大厅和房间。
secondary_translated_text: Weaver's broken buildings in the past were able to exude concentrated Merceria, carving halls and rooms through ice and bone.

original_en_text: Short-lived sprite born of flickering flame.
original_zh_text: 闪烁火焰孕育出的精灵，其生命往往转瞬即逝。
translated_text: 从闪烁的火焰中诞生的短暂精灵。
secondary_translated_text: A transient spirit born from the flickering flames.

original_en_text: Slow drifting bug with a heavy top shell. The bug reacts little to threats, even those that could claim its life.
original_zh_text: 顶覆厚重甲壳的漂浮虫，行动迟缓，对致命威胁也都反应微弱。
translated_text: 缓慢漂浮的昆虫的顶部壳很重。该漏洞对威胁几乎没有反应，即使是那些可能夺走它生命的威胁也是如此。
secondary_translated_text: The top shells of slow-floating insects are heavy. The vulnerability responded little to threats, even those that could take its life.

original_en_text: Bell-clad bug responsible for mining the deeper, treacherous depths below their docks.
original_zh_text: 负责开采深坞下方危险矿区的虫子，身覆钟甲。
translated_text: 戴铃的虫子负责在码头下方更深、危险的深处采矿。
secondary_translated_text: The bug wearing the bell is responsible for mining in the deeper, dangerous depths below the dock.

original_en_text: Toothy growth that lives on cave roofs. Wraps wayward bugs with its long tongue and drags them up to be consumed.
original_zh_text: 栖身洞顶的齿舌生物，用拟态长舌诱捕猎物。
translated_text: 洞穴屋顶上生长着牙齿植物。用它的长舌头包裹住任性的昆虫，拖起来食用。
secondary_translated_text: Tooth plants grow on the roof of the cave. Wrap the wayward insect with its long tongue and drag it up to eat.

original_en_text: Fine winged flyer that survives in flocks.
translated_text: 成群结队的带翅膀的飞行者。

original_en_text: Long dormant centipede, awoken and enraged by Pharloom’s crumbling collapse.
original_zh_text: 长期蛰伏的远古蜈蚣，因纺络的崩塌而苏醒、暴怒。
translated_text: 沉睡已久的蜈蚣被法勒姆的崩溃吵醒并愤怒。
secondary_translated_text: The long-sleeping centipede was awakened by Farham's collapse and became angry.

original_en_text: Erratic, flying pest that nests in rags and curtains.
original_zh_text: 寄居在破布和帷幔中的飞虫，居无定所。
translated_text: 一种不稳定的飞行害虫，在破布和窗帘中筑巢。
secondary_translated_text: An unstable flying pest that nests among rags and curtains.

original_en_text: Once a hunter purely for food, now they hunt unthinking and unending.
original_zh_text: 曾是只为果腹而捕猎的猎手，如今却在丝咒驱使下沦为永不停歇的屠夫。
translated_text: 他们过去纯粹为了食物而狩猎，但现在他们不假思索地无休止地狩猎。
secondary_translated_text: They used to hunt purely for food, but now they hunt endlessly without thinking.

original_en_text: So light they can rest atop still water’s surface. An elegant bug indeed.
original_zh_text: 轻盈得能栖于静水表面，确为优雅之虫。
translated_text: 因此，它们可以在足够光线的情况下栖息在静水上。这确实是一个优雅的错误。
secondary_translated_text: As a result, they can perch on still water with enough light. This is indeed an elegant mistake.

original_en_text: Its form is absurd... Surely it should not be able to hold itself in the air? The noxious gases in its stomach must provide its levity.
original_zh_text: 如此畸形的躯体竟能悬空？想必是腹中毒气提供了浮力。
translated_text: 它的形式是荒谬的。确定它不能在空中保持自己吗？它胃里的有毒气体一定提供了它的轻浮。
secondary_translated_text: Its form is absurd. Are you sure it can't maintain itself in the air? The toxic gases in its stomach must have provided its levity.

original_en_text: Once roused, the bug will crash its steely shell into walls, floors and foes.
original_zh_text: 被惊动后，会以钢甲撞击墙壁、地面与敌人。
translated_text: 一旦醒来，虫子就会将其钢铁般的外壳砸碎墙壁、地板和敌人。
secondary_translated_text: Once awakened, the bug will smash its steel-like shell into walls, floors and enemies.

original_en_text: Elder crawbug serving in a sacred ceremony.
original_zh_text: 参与神圣仪式的腐囊虫长老。
translated_text: 老年小龙虾以神圣的仪式服务。
secondary_translated_text: Elderly crayfish serve in a sacred ceremony.

original_en_text: Agile bug, and one of few hardy pilgrims to have reached the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 成功抵达圣堡的敏捷朝圣者。
translated_text: 这只敏捷的虫子也是为数不多的到达城堡的顽强朝圣者之一。
secondary_translated_text: This agile insect is also one of the few tenacious pilgrims to reach the castle.

original_en_text: Their use of a pin shows hard training. Their use of Silk, unfurled from a spool held close, shows skill far beyond standard bugs.
original_zh_text: 其刺针技法明显是经过严格训练，近身灵丝轴的操控技艺更是远超普通虫子。
translated_text: 他们使用别针的方式表明了训练有多艰苦。他们使用从附近卷轴上展开的Silk，展示了远远超出标准虫子的技能。
secondary_translated_text: The way they used the pins showed how hard the training was. They used Silk unwound from nearby scrolls, demonstrating skills far beyond standard bugs.

original_en_text: Gilded guardian of the Blasted Steps, bearing a cymbal and mallet.
original_zh_text: 镇守蚀阶的金甲守卫，用钹和木槌处决"不洁者"。
translated_text: 爆炸性台阶的镀金守护者，手持钹和木槌。
secondary_translated_text: Gilded guardians of explosive steps, holding cymbals and mallet.

original_en_text: A rare, calmer bug of Bilewater, survives its hazardous surroundings by hiding as a plant.
original_zh_text: 腐汁泽罕见的温顺虫子，在危险的环境中拟态植物，得以生存。
translated_text: 一种罕见、较平静的胆汁细菌通过隐藏在植物中而在危险的环境中生存。
secondary_translated_text: A rare, calmer bile bacterium survives in dangerous environments by hiding in plants.

original_en_text: Bug forged of iron, rotor and cog. The automaton works tirelessly to maintain the Core that houses it.
original_zh_text: 由齿轮与转子构成的铁质自动机，不知疲倦维护着机枢核心。
translated_text: 由铁、转盘和齿轮锻造而成的漏缝。自动机不知疲倦地工作以维护容纳它的核心。
secondary_translated_text: Leaks forged from iron, turntable and gear. The automaton works tirelessly to maintain the core that houses it.

original_en_text: Starved pack bug with an insatiable appetite. Despite their tough hide and pungent meat, roaches breed rapidly so are sometimes farmed for food.
original_zh_text: 贪婪的群居害虫，甲壳坚硬，虫肉腥臭，却因繁殖力超强被圈养作为为食物来源。
translated_text: 饥饿的共生体永远无法满足它们的胃口。尽管蟑螂皮硬，肉辣，但它们繁殖速度很快，有时被养殖作为食物。
secondary_translated_text: Hungry symbionts can never satisfy their appetites. Although cockroaches have hard skin and spicy meat, they reproduce quickly and are sometimes farmed for food.

original_en_text: They cling fast to the shells of other bugs, destroying any hope for concentration or comfort.
original_zh_text: 它们紧附其他虫子的外壳，彻底摧毁宿主的专注力与安宁。
translated_text: 它们附着在其他昆虫的外壳上，破坏了任何专注或舒适的希望。
secondary_translated_text: They attach to the shells of other insects, destroying any hope of concentration or comfort.

original_en_text: Pointed, darting insect that builds a hardy hive from Shellwood’s dried bark.
original_zh_text: 以甲木林干树皮筑巢的尖刺飞虫。
translated_text: 尖的、喷射的昆虫使用贝壳木材的干树皮来建造坚固的蜂巢。
secondary_translated_text: Pointed, spraying insects use the dried bark of shell wood to build strong hives.

original_en_text: Full-sized mite of the Citadel cloaked in an old curtain.
original_zh_text: 披挂破旧幕帘的圣堡巨型螨虫。
translated_text: 城堡里一只全尺寸的螨虫被旧窗帘包裹着。
secondary_translated_text: A full-size mite is wrapped in old curtains in the castle.

original_en_text: A snapping surprise on first encounter, though one easily avoided once aware.
original_zh_text: 初次遭遇的惊险过后，便再难构成威胁。
translated_text: 第一次见面时会有惊喜，尽管一旦你意识到这一点，就很容易避免。
secondary_translated_text: There will be surprises when you meet for the first time, although once you realize it, it can be easily avoided.

original_en_text: His tracks and traps... It should have been obvious from the start, this old hunter sought to draw me in. But what reason drove him to test himself so brutally? That answer I suspect I shall never know.
original_zh_text: 早该察觉他的踪迹与陷阱……但这老猎手对自己进行如此残酷试炼的原因，看来是无从得知了。
translated_text: 他的脚步和陷阱。从一开始就应该很明显，这位老猎人只是想吸引我，但是什么驱使他如此残酷地考验自己呢？我怀疑我永远不会知道答案。
secondary_translated_text: His footsteps and traps. It should have been obvious from the beginning that the old hunter was just trying to attract me, but what drove him to test himself so cruelly? I doubt I will ever know the answer.

original_en_text: Brutish cook responsible for dicing Muckroach meat into edible portions.
original_zh_text: 粗鲁的厨子，负责将淤秽蟑螂肉切分成便于食用的分量。
translated_text: 一位野蛮的厨师负责将蟑螂肉切成可食用的部分。
secondary_translated_text: A barbaric chef cuts the cockroach meat into edible parts.

original_en_text: Flighted automaton, responsible for repairing and extending the Core.
original_zh_text: 负责维修扩建核心的飞行自动机，简单攻击暗藏杀机。
translated_text: 飞行自动机，负责修复和扩展核心。
secondary_translated_text: Flying automata, responsible for repairing and expanding the core.

original_en_text: Giant roller of the lowlands. Its ridged hide will crush smaller creatures beneath it.
original_zh_text: 在低地区域横冲直撞的巨型生物，带棱甲的躯体能轻易碾碎小型生物。
translated_text: 低地的巨型滚轴。它的山脊状皮肤可以压碎下面的较小生物。
secondary_translated_text: Giant rollers in the lowlands. Its ridge-like skin can crush smaller creatures below.

original_en_text: Shell of a small bug possessed by Silk dregs. The husk will stretch its Silk to form a crude, crushing wheel.
original_zh_text: 被灵丝残渣附身的小型甲虫躯壳，伸展灵丝形成粗糙碾压轮。
translated_text: 小昆虫的外壳，用丝绸残留物附着在身体上。贝壳伸展其丝绸，形成一个粗糙、破碎的轮子。
secondary_translated_text: The outer shell of a small insect is attached to the body with silk residue. The shell stretches its silk to form a rough, broken wheel.

original_en_text: Rag-winged adult crawbug bearing a scavenged pin.
original_zh_text: 翅膀破烂的腐囊成虫，使用捡来刺针作为武器。
translated_text: 成年小龙虾，翅膀粗糙，有捕食性别针。
secondary_translated_text: Adult crayfish with rough wings and predatory pins.

original_en_text: I have not yet seen the bell this automaton is designed to ring, nor do I ever wish to hear it. Such a clamour would no doubt be unpleasant to experience.
original_zh_text: 它们机械臂摆动的节奏暗合圣咏旋律，若真让这些击钹者齐聚奏响终章，恐怕整个机枢核心都会在共振中崩塌。
translated_text: 我从来没有见过这个机器人设计来敲响的钟声，也从来不想听到它。这样的噪音无疑会让人感到不舒服。
secondary_translated_text: I have never seen the bell this robot is designed to ring, and I have never wanted to hear it. Such noise will undoubtedly make people feel uncomfortable.

original_en_text: If allowed the opportunity, these creatures will grow into a form larger and more oppressive.
original_zh_text: 此刻脆弱，却是未来灾祸的种子。放任其成长将成为巨大威胁。
translated_text: 如果有机会，这些生物会长成更大、更压迫性的形式。
secondary_translated_text: Given the opportunity, these creatures will grow into larger, more oppressive forms.

original_en_text: He offered fair warning and challenge, a duel in the purest sense. I admire his honour, and his skill.
original_zh_text: 他向我发起了正式的挑战，那是一场最纯粹的决斗。我敬佩他的荣誉感，也钦佩他的技艺。
translated_text: 他发出了公平的警告和挑战，这是一场最纯粹意义上的决斗。我钦佩他的荣誉和他的技能。
secondary_translated_text: He issued a fair warning and challenge. This was a duel in the purest sense of the word. I admire his honor and his skills.

original_en_text: Insect formed to imitate a branch, born with sharp, retractable horns atop its head.
original_zh_text: 头部配备可收缩尖角的拟态树枝虫。
translated_text: 昆虫模仿树枝，头上有尖锐、可伸缩的角。
secondary_translated_text: Insects imitate branches with sharp, retractable horns on their heads.

original_en_text: Small, soft bug that uses the hard skulls of the Marrow for protection and disguise.
original_zh_text: 小型软体虫，利用髓骨洞窟内硬质头骨作为自己的护甲和伪装。
translated_text: 又小又软的蠕虫，使用坚硬的骨髓头骨来保护和伪装。
secondary_translated_text: Small, soft worms that use a hard bone marrow skull to protect and camouflage.

original_en_text: When roosting, it would look convincingly plant-like. In flight, its bulbous body quickly ruins the ruse.
original_zh_text: 停栖时，双翼能完美伪装成远野的草叶。但这小聪明总在飞行时露出破绽——它膨大的腹部让伪装功亏一篑。
translated_text: 当栖息时，它看起来像植物一样令人信服。在飞行过程中，它的球形身体很快就破坏了这个技巧。
secondary_translated_text: When perched, it looks as convincing as a plant. During flight, its spherical body quickly undermined the technique.

original_en_text: Cloth-covered crawler with sharpened forelimbs. Lives and breeds in dark places.
original_zh_text: 栖息暗处的爬虫，身覆布料，前肢锐利。
translated_text: 爬行动物覆盖着布和锋利的前腿。在黑暗的地方生活和繁殖。
secondary_translated_text: The reptile is covered with cloth and sharp front legs. Live and reproduce in dark places.

original_en_text: The cost of so much grandeur... Did I peer closely enough into the foundations of my own kingdom?
original_zh_text: 辉煌背后的代价……我是否也曾如此审视过自己王国的根基？
translated_text: 这么大的价格。我有没有仔细看过我王国的根基？
secondary_translated_text: Such a big price. Have I looked carefully at the foundations of my kingdom?

original_en_text: Stout adult crawbug bearing several short pins.
original_zh_text: 手持短刺的矮胖腐囊成虫。
translated_text: 有几个短针的粗壮的成年小龙虾。
secondary_translated_text: Thick adult crayfish with several short needles.

original_en_text: Greed will always see some bugs swell above their kin.
original_zh_text: 贪婪终会导致膨胀，这是所有生物共通的教训。
translated_text: 贪婪的人总是会看到一些错误在他们同类之上扩张。
secondary_translated_text: Greedy people will always see mistakes spreading over their kind.

original_en_text: This graceful ruler once possessed skill to rival my own. At her youthful peak, her voice united all Skarr in her service.
original_zh_text: 这位优雅的统治者曾拥有与我匹敌的武艺。在她巅峰时期，其歌喉能让所有斯卡尔蚁族臣服效命。
translated_text: 这位优雅的统治者曾经拥有与我相媲美的技艺。在她青春的巅峰时期，她的声音团结了所有Skelines为她服务。
secondary_translated_text: This elegant ruler once possessed skills comparable to mine. At the peak of her youth, her voice united all Skelines to serve her.

original_en_text: False fly with a rune etched shell. A tortured mix of soul and void is caged within.
original_zh_text: 外壳刻有符文的飞虫形装置，内部囚禁着灵魂与虚空的痛苦混合物。
translated_text: 假蝇的壳上有符文蚀刻。灵魂与空虚的痛苦混合物被锁在笼子里。
secondary_translated_text: There are runic inscriptions on the shell of the fake fly. The painful mixture of soul and emptiness is locked in a cage.

original_en_text: Suction creature surviving on the thick slime that coats its caves.
original_zh_text: 依赖洞壁浓稠粘液维生的吸附生物。
translated_text: 吸力生物靠洞穴覆盖的粘稠粘液生存。
secondary_translated_text: Suction creatures survive on the sticky mucus that covers the cave.

original_en_text: Tall roach tender charged to feed Muckroaches on a lean diet of maggot gruel.
original_zh_text: 负责用蛆虫糊喂养腐汁蟑螂的高瘦饲育者。
translated_text: 高大的蟑螂需要用蛆粥中的瘦肉饲料喂养它们。
secondary_translated_text: Tall roaches need to be fed with lean meat feed from maggot porridge.

original_en_text: Tiny, soft creature that armours itself using the hard, hollow growths of Shellwood.
original_zh_text: 用甲木林硬质空茎武装自身的脆弱飞虫。
translated_text: 微小、柔软的生物使用贝类等坚硬、中空的植物来保护自己。
secondary_translated_text: Tiny, soft creatures use hard, hollow plants such as shellfish to protect themselves.

original_en_text: Taken by Pharloom’s Haunting, the bug is now capable of little more than prayer and aggression.
original_zh_text: 丝咒侵蚀了它们的理智，如今这些虫子只剩祷告与攻击的本能。
translated_text: 在Farham的“闹鬼”中，虫子现在只能祈祷和攻击。
secondary_translated_text: In Farham's "Haunted", bugs can now only pray and attack.

original_en_text: Oversized bug, briefly consumed by anger after its long time caged.
original_zh_text: 长期囚禁后暴怒的巨型跳蚤。
translated_text: 这些嗡嗡作响的昆虫在被关在笼子里很长时间后，被愤怒短暂吞下。
secondary_translated_text: The buzzing insects were briefly swallowed in anger after being kept in cages for a long time.

original_en_text: From the outset, theirs was a hopeless task. Those wild lands could never be replicated within a space so artificial.
original_zh_text: 从最初这就是徒劳之举——自然的荒野绝无可能在虫子造出的空间刻意复现。
translated_text: 从一开始，他们的任务就毫无希望。这些荒野永远无法在这样的人造空间中复制。
secondary_translated_text: From the beginning, their mission was hopeless. These wilds can never be replicated in such artificial spaces.

original_zh_text: 低地地区的游荡者，绒毛下暗藏钢刺并具备远程发射能力。

original_en_text: Wriggling young grub that lives in darkness.
translated_text: 生活在黑暗中蠕动的幼年幼虫。
secondary_translated_text: Young larvae that wriggle in the dark.

original_en_text: Their procedures with Silk may have prolonged life within the Citadel, but they unknowingly gifted many minds to the monarch.
original_zh_text: 他们的灵丝手术虽维系了圣堡的生命，却无意中将所有心智献予了君主。
translated_text: 他们用丝绸的待遇可能延长了城堡内的寿命，但他们在不知不觉中将许多想法传递给了君主。
secondary_translated_text: Their treatment with silk may have extended life in the castle, but they unknowingly passed on many ideas to the monarch.

original_en_text: Floral foe that reacts instinctively to movement nearby. Spits pellets of crackling pollen that burst on impact.
original_zh_text: 对周围动静极其敏感的植物，能够喷射噼啪作响的花粉弹。
translated_text: 花卉敌人对附近的动作本能地做出反应。喷出爆裂的花粉球，撞击时爆裂。
secondary_translated_text: Flower enemies respond instinctively to nearby movements. Spouts exploding pollen balls and bursts on impact.

original_en_text: In contests of speed against strength, I have seen the swift more often triumphant, a lesson I have taken to my own heart.
original_zh_text: 见证这以快制胜的案例，更坚定了我对敏捷的追求。
translated_text: 在速度和力量的比赛中，我看到雨燕赢得更多，这是我心中的一个教训。
secondary_translated_text: In the race of speed and power, I saw Swift win more, and that was a lesson in my heart.

original_en_text: Pilgrim endowed with large wings, carrying a brace of iron bells.
original_zh_text: 配备一对铁钟的飞行朝圣者。
translated_text: 朝圣者有巨大的翅膀和携带一对铁钟。
secondary_translated_text: Pilgrims have huge wings and carry a pair of iron clocks.

original_en_text: In my youth, I envied all bugs with wings. I even fancied I might grow a pair... I have since learned better. Accept the limitations of one’s body... and augment with tools as needed.
original_zh_text: 年少时，我曾一度羡慕生来便有翅膀的虫族，甚至曾幻想自己也能长出一对来……如今我已明白，接受身体上的限制，并学会用工具弥补缺陷才是正途。
translated_text: 当我年轻的时候，我羡慕所有有翅膀的昆虫。我甚至想象我会长出一双.从那时起，我学到了更好的东西。接受你身体的局限性。根据需要添加工具。
secondary_translated_text: When I was young, I envied all winged insects. I even imagined I would grow a pair. Since then, I have learned better things. Accept the limitations of your body. Add tools as needed.

original_en_text: Devious ambusher that poses as a fossil.
original_zh_text: 伪装成化石的狡诈伏击者。
translated_text: 狡猾的小丑，假装是化石。
secondary_translated_text: The cunning clown pretended to be a fossil.

original_en_text: This bug bears a spool of Silk, which they flail to attack. Though somewhat crude, theirs is a technique much reminiscent of Weavers. I wonder who taught them such a use?
original_zh_text: 这只虫子携带着一轴灵丝，并挥舞它进行攻击。动作虽略显粗糙，但竟带着几分织者的神韵。不知是谁教会了它这样使用灵丝？
translated_text: 昆虫携带一卷丝绸并挥手攻击它。虽然有点粗糙，但他们的技术让人想起韦弗。我想知道是谁教他们这个用法的？
secondary_translated_text: The insect carries a roll of silk and waves it at it. Although a little crude, their technique is reminiscent of Weaver. I wonder who taught them this usage?

original_en_text: Her presence would once have maintained the wood’s fragile order, allowing the safe passage of bugs across its branches.
original_zh_text: 昔日的她维持领域内脆弱的平衡，护佑虫子们安然通行其枝干。
translated_text: 她的存在曾经维持了森林脆弱的秩序，让昆虫能够安全地穿过树枝。
secondary_translated_text: Her presence once maintained the fragile order of the forest, allowing insects to safely pass through branches.

original_en_text: Though generally passive, their sharp masks can cause injury if carelessly blundered into.
original_zh_text: 虽性情温顺，但若冒失冲撞其锋利面甲仍会受伤。
translated_text: 虽然他们通常是被动的，但如果不小心撞到锋利的面具，可能会造成伤害。
secondary_translated_text: Although they are usually passive, injuries can be caused if they accidentally hit the sharp mask.

original_en_text: I like her. For her willingness to teach and her spirit still strong, despite a long age spent solitary... she has my respect.
original_zh_text: 我欣赏她——甘于传授技艺，孤寂长年也未磨灭斗志，值得尊敬。
translated_text: 我喜欢她。虽然她独居很长一段时间，但她很乐意教书，精神也很坚强……我尊重她。
secondary_translated_text: I like her. Although she lived alone for a long time, she was happy to teach and had a strong spirit... I respect her.

original_en_text: They held long at their vigil, far beyond the age of their brethren, yet still when roused they swung their blade with remarkable ease.
original_zh_text: 他们戍边的年岁就能远超同辈寿命，苏醒时仍能挥动利刃，动作流畅自如。
translated_text: 他们的守夜时间很长，远远超过了兄弟们的年龄，但当他们醒来时，他们仍然轻松地挥舞着剑。
secondary_translated_text: Their vigil was long, well beyond the age of their brothers, but when they woke up, they were still waving their swords easily.

original_en_text: Long-horned beast of Pharloom’s lowlands. Relies on its horn both to impale and to wrench the ground beneath it, flinging dangerous debris.
original_zh_text: 纺络低地的长角巨兽，依赖长角穿刺敌人并掘起地面制造危险碎片云。
translated_text: 法勒姆低地的长角兽。依靠它的角刺穿并扭曲下面的地面，投掷危险的碎片。
secondary_translated_text: Longhorn of lowland Farham. Rely on its horns to pierce and distort the ground below, throwing dangerous debris.

original_en_text: Could their actions be called skill? I see only a crude mangling of meat. Yet I wonder, before the Haunting snared their minds was it any different?
original_zh_text: 这般行径怎能称为厨艺？我只见到对血肉的粗暴摧残。它在丝咒侵蚀前，或许不会像现在这样粗鄙行事？
translated_text: 他们的行为可以称为技能吗？我只看到一块粗糙的肉。不过，不知道在闹鬼困住他们之前，情况是否有所不同？
secondary_translated_text: Can their behavior be called skills? I only saw a rough piece of meat. However, I wonder if the situation was different before the haunting trapped them?

original_en_text: Darting warrior with sharpened forelimbs and heightened senses.
original_zh_text: 前肢尖利且感官强化的迅捷战士。
translated_text: 飞镖战士，前臂锋利，感官敏锐。
secondary_translated_text: Dart warrior has sharp forearms and keen senses.

original_en_text: Mighty percussive disciple of the Choir, wielding a mallet and a Silk spool to wrap and enhance their attacks.
original_zh_text: 圣咏团的打击乐信徒，挥舞槌棒，并利用灵丝轴强化它们的攻击。
translated_text: 合唱团强大的进攻弟子挥舞木槌和丝绸卷轴来包裹和增强他们的攻击。
secondary_translated_text: The choir's powerful offensive disciples wield mallets and silk scrolls to wrap and enhance their attacks.

original_en_text: Dual princes of old Verdania, beloved by their subjects for their grace and for the ballet of death they delivered upon outsiders.
original_zh_text: 昔日翠庭王国的双生王子，以恩典治国，深受子民爱戴。对于不怀好意的外来者，他们会为其献上一支死亡芭蕾。
translated_text: 这位老韦尔达尼亚的双重王子因其优雅和向外人呈现的死亡芭蕾而受到臣民的喜爱。
secondary_translated_text: The double prince of Old Verdania was loved by his subjects for his elegance and the ballet of death he presented to outsiders.

original_en_text: Huge and soft, a fantastic combination ruined by their haunted aggression.
original_zh_text: 明明是个蓬松的大毛球，可惜被丝咒搞得见谁都想撞两下。
translated_text: 巨大而柔软，这是一个美妙的组合，但被它们闹鬼的攻击性所破坏。
secondary_translated_text: Huge and soft, it's a wonderful combination, but spoiled by their haunted aggression.

original_en_text: On uneven terrain their union of flight and range can prove a challenge even for me.
original_zh_text: 崎岖地形中，其飞行阵列的配合连我也需谨慎应对。
translated_text: 在凹凸不平的地形上，它们的飞行和航程的结合对我来说甚至是一个挑战。
secondary_translated_text: On rugged terrain, the combination of their flight and range is even a challenge for me.

original_en_text: They toiled incessantly for the Citadel, their shells bent and greyed, and now the kingdom’s curse means not even death can relieve them.
original_zh_text: 他们为圣堡鞠躬尽瘁直至甲壳弯折灰败，如今连死亡都无法终结这诅咒。
translated_text: 他们为城堡辛勤工作，他们的贝壳弯曲，变成灰色，现在王国的诅咒意味着即使死亡也不能解除他们。
secondary_translated_text: They worked hard for the castle, their shells bent and turned gray, and now the curse of the kingdom meant that even death could not lift them.

original_en_text: Destroying the hives will limit their presence in the wood. Useful to me now, as I pass along the branches. Dangerous in time for the wood’s order. Even a small disruption can tip a fragile balance.
original_zh_text: 摧毁蜂巢会限制它们在林中的活动。对我而言，这在穿行丛林时十分有用。但从长远来看，即便是微小的干扰，也可能打破丛林脆弱的生态平衡。
translated_text: 摧毁蜂巢将限制它们在树林中的存在。当我走过树枝时，它现在对我起作用了。木材订单的危险时刻。即使是很小的破坏也会打破脆弱的平衡。
secondary_translated_text: Destroying hives will limit their presence in the woods. As I walked past the branch, it worked on me now. Dangerous moment for wood orders. Even small disruptions can upset a fragile balance.

original_en_text: It has no true mind, and yet fights effectively, adjusting its strategy to my movements. Where exactly are its thoughts written?
original_zh_text: 当它用盾牌格挡我的织针突刺，同时以刁钻角度刺出长枪时，我仿佛在与某个沉睡在齿轮中的古老剑客对决。
translated_text: 它没有真正的想法，但战斗是有效的，根据我的动作调整策略。它的想法到底写在哪里？
secondary_translated_text: It had no real ideas, but the fight was effective, adjusting the strategy based on my movements. Where exactly are its ideas written?

original_en_text: A bug born entirely of thread. Much Silk would have been needed to see her sustained. A fragile form of life, but life nonetheless.
original_zh_text: 完全由灵丝编织而成的虫子。维持这种丝造生命需耗费海量的灵丝资源，虽形态脆弱却真实鲜活。
translated_text: 完全由线程生成的错误。需要大量的丝绸才能让她继续前进。一种脆弱的生命形式，但仍然是生命。
secondary_translated_text: Errors generated entirely by the thread. It takes a lot of silk to keep her moving forward. A fragile life form, but still life.

original_en_text: Individually they offer little challenge, but their numbers are surely vast, and most remain hidden.
original_zh_text: 单只不足为惧，但其庞大族群多潜藏暗处，如同阴影永难根除。
translated_text: 就个人而言，他们面临的挑战很少，但他们的数量肯定很大，而且大多数仍然是隐藏的。
secondary_translated_text: Personally, the challenges they face are few, but their numbers are certainly large and most are still hidden.

original_en_text: A lucky bug to be able to grow old. Pharloom’s roads take most much earlier.
original_zh_text: 能在纺络活到这样的年纪堪称奇迹，只可惜这份长寿化作了更持久的折磨。
translated_text: 一个可以变老的幸运虫子。法勒姆的道路走得更早。
secondary_translated_text: A lucky bug that can grow old. Farham's path went earlier.

original_en_text: Huge flighted creature formed from coldshard.
original_zh_text: 由冰晶碎片构成的巨型飞行生物。
translated_text: 巨大的飞行生物由冰冷的碎片形成。
secondary_translated_text: Giant flying creatures are formed from cold debris.

original_en_text: She has lived a mere fraction of my lifetime and yet her rings prove a ferocious match. As gifted a warrior as I have ever encountered, and one I am fortunate to call a friend.
original_zh_text: 她的年岁不过我生命的一小段，但她的战环却展现出凶狠的实力。她是我所遇过最出色的战士之一，很庆幸能和她成为朋友。
translated_text: 她只经历了我生命中的一小部分，但事实证明她的戒指是一对非常般配的。我见过的最有才华的士兵，也是我有幸称之为朋友的士兵。
secondary_translated_text: She has only experienced a small part of my life, but her rings have proved to be a very good match. The most talented soldier I have ever met and the soldier I have the honor to call a friend.

original_en_text: Sheer bulk makes for an effective weapon, but requires much sustenance. This creature would have spent most of its time eating. An acceptable life for some.
original_zh_text: 庞大的身躯是它们致命的武器，但也需要大量营养来维持。这种生物绝大多数时间都在进食，倒也活得纯粹。
translated_text: 纯卷是一种有效的武器，但需要大量的支持。这种生物大部分时间都在吃东西。对某些人来说是可以接受的生活。
secondary_translated_text: Pure scrolls are an effective weapon, but require a lot of support. This creature spends most of its time eating. An acceptable life for some people.

original_en_text: These ones grow large, yet I have never observed them eating, or sleeping. They seem such simple bugs... but I suspect they are not truly our cousins.
original_zh_text: 体型虽庞大，却从未见其进食或休眠。看似普通的虫子……实则与我们并非同类。
translated_text: 这些东西长得很大，但我从来没有观察到它们吃饭或睡觉。它们看起来很简单。但我怀疑他们不是我们真正的表兄弟。
secondary_translated_text: These things grow big, but I have never observed them eating or sleeping. They seem simple. But I doubt they are our real cousins.

original_en_text: Huge, hardbone bug that lives within and travels through the veins of old bells across Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 居住在古钟里并穿梭于纺络广阔钟脉里的骨甲大块头。
translated_text: 巨大而坚硬的蠕虫生活在法鲁古代时钟的静脉中，并穿过法鲁。
secondary_translated_text: Huge and hard worms live in the veins of Faro's ancient clock and pass through Faro.

original_en_text: Winged devout of the Citadel, carrying a brace of gilded bells.
original_zh_text: 圣堡的带翼信徒，背负一对镀金巨钟作战。
translated_text: 背着一对镀金的钟声，虔诚地在城堡里飞翔。
secondary_translated_text: Carrying a pair of gilded bells, he flew piously in the castle.

original_en_text: This one would make a perfect pet, but for the freezing temperatures it requires for comfort.
original_zh_text: 本可成为完美的宠物，但其生存需依赖刺骨的低温。
translated_text: 这将是一个完美的宠物，但由于气温寒冷，它需要舒适。
secondary_translated_text: This would be the perfect pet, but due to the cold temperatures, it needs to be comfortable.

original_en_text: These creatures look to have been bred deliberately in watery pens. If they are food to be, their scent suggests they must taste vile.
original_zh_text: 刻意养殖的水栖变种，若作食用，其恶臭已昭示其滋味堪忧。
translated_text: 这些生物似乎是在水围栏中故意繁殖的。如果它们是未来的食物，它们的气味表明它们的味道一定很糟糕。
secondary_translated_text: These creatures appear to have deliberately bred in water enclosures. If they are food of the future, their smell suggests that they must taste terrible.

original_en_text: Their skill once saw them chosen, and I can plainly see why. They would have lived and trained only for this duty.
original_zh_text: 它们的高超技艺我已亲身体会，必然是终生磨练只为履行职责。
translated_text: 他们的技能曾经导致他们被选中，我很清楚为什么。他们只会为这一责任而生活和训练。
secondary_translated_text: Their skills once led to them being selected, and I know exactly why. They will only live and train for this responsibility.

original_en_text: For this bug to have survived Pharloom’s climb it must have teamed with stouter companions. I cannot imagine it succeeding alone.
original_zh_text: 单凭自身的力量，这虫子绝无可能攀越纺络的天堑，成功进入圣堡。想必曾与更强壮的伙伴互为倚仗。
translated_text: 这只虫子在法鲁姆的攀登中幸存下来，并且一定与更强大的同伴合作。我无法想象它单独工作。
secondary_translated_text: The insect survived the climb of Farum and must have cooperated with a stronger companion. I can't imagine it working alone.

original_en_text: Did this one grow large thanks to the Citadel’s excess, or was its formidable size the reason it ever survived to reach this place?
original_zh_text: 这家伙的巨大体型是因圣堡的恩赐而异变，还是正因其巨大体型才得以存活至此？
translated_text: 城堡的规模是因为城堡的过多而变得巨大，还是它强大的规模是它幸存下来到达这里的原因？
secondary_translated_text: Did the size of the castle become huge because of the overabundance of the castle, or was its strong size the reason why it survived to get here?

original_en_text: Though surely fierce, the skull it bears looks taken from an even larger beast. If not for the bones as proof, I would scarcely believe bugs could grow to such scale.
original_zh_text: 它头顶的骷髅战盔竟取自更庞大的生物——若非有骸骨为证，我简直难以相信世间存在如此巨虫。
translated_text: 虽然它的头骨确实很凶猛，但它的头骨似乎是从更大的野兽身上取来的。如果没有骨头作为证据，我很难相信这种虫子会长到这么大。
secondary_translated_text: Although its skull is indeed fierce, its skull appears to have been taken from a larger beast. Without the bones as evidence, I find it hard to believe that the bug would have grown to this size.

original_en_text: Two cogwork bugs, and yet the soul seemed singular? A sad, yet masterful imitation of life, imbued inside shells of iron.
original_zh_text: 两只自动机虫却共享单一灵魂？这是栖身于铁壳内的生命仿品，展现出精湛的制造技艺，却难掩其悲哀的命运。
translated_text: 两个齿轮，但灵魂似乎独一无二？这是对生活的悲伤但精湛的模仿，充满了铁壳。
secondary_translated_text: Two gears, but the soul seems unique? It's a sad but superb imitation of life, full of iron shells.

original_en_text: Heavy insect that lives near large bodies of water. Its weighty body is best avoided.
original_zh_text: 栖息大型水域附近的笨重昆虫，遇到最好绕道而行。
translated_text: 生活在大片水域附近的重型昆虫。最好避免笨重的身体。
secondary_translated_text: Heavy insects that live near large areas of water. It is best to avoid heavy bodies.

original_en_text: Drifting bug disguised as a flower. Disperses crackling clouds of pollen if threatened.
original_zh_text: 伪装成花朵的漂浮生物，遇到威胁时会释放噼啪作响的花粉云自卫。
translated_text: 伪装成花朵的漂丝虫。如果受到威胁，它可以驱散花粉云。
secondary_translated_text: Drifting worms disguised as flowers. If threatened, it can disperse pollen clouds.

original_en_text: Dense knot of husks bound tight by void soaked Silk.
original_zh_text: 由虚空浸染的灵丝捆缚的躯壳，密集成团。
translated_text: 紧密的外壳结被空浸透的丝绸紧紧地束缚着。
secondary_translated_text: The tight outer shell knot is tightly bound by the empty soaked silk.

original_en_text: A smart hunter learns to wait long in ambush, always ready to strike the first blow.
original_zh_text: 优秀的猎手都懂得：耐心蹲点，一击必杀。
translated_text: 聪明的猎人学会在伏击中等待很长时间，准备随时发动第一次袭击。
secondary_translated_text: Smart hunters learn to wait long in ambushes, ready to launch their first attack at any time.

original_en_text: Grazing creature with sharp senses that nimbly retreats from danger.
original_zh_text: 感官敏锐的食草生物，遇到危险会灵活撤退。
translated_text: 感官敏锐的食草动物可以灵活地从危险中撤退。
secondary_translated_text: Sense-sensitive herbivores can flexibly retreat from danger.

original_en_text: Tiny, timid creatures that huddle in flocks and flee at the first hint of danger.
original_zh_text: 胆小的小型群居生物，一旦察觉到危险便四散奔逃。
translated_text: 娇小、胆怯的生物成群结队地挤在一起，一有危险就会逃跑。
secondary_translated_text: Petite, timid creatures huddle together in droves and run away when there is danger.

original_en_text: Lost in the madness of the Haunting, they still commanded the endless excavation of their caves.
original_zh_text: 即便深陷丝咒癫狂，仍持续号令无休止的矿洞挖掘。
translated_text: 他们迷失在闹鬼的疯狂中，仍然指挥着对洞穴的无休止的挖掘。
secondary_translated_text: They are lost in the haunted madness and still direct the endless excavation of the cave.

original_en_text: They rarely relax, always alert for potential danger, even deep in their own territory. To defeat them my focus must match their own.
original_zh_text: 就算在其领地深处，他们仍保持高度警戒。要想击败他们，我的专注力必须达到与其相当的水平。
translated_text: 他们很少放松，总是对潜在的危险保持警惕，即使是在他们的领地深处。为了击败他们，我的注意力必须与他们自己的注意力相匹配。
secondary_translated_text: They rarely relax and are always alert to potential dangers, even deep in their territory. In order to defeat them, my attention must match their own.

original_en_text: Steam shooting automaton, forged to clean the Cogwork Core and keep it free of infestation.
original_zh_text: 喷射蒸汽清洁机枢核心的自动机。
translated_text: 蒸汽喷射自动机，锻造用于清洁Cogwork核心并使其免受入侵。
secondary_translated_text: Steam-jet automatic, forged to clean the Cogwork core and keep it safe from intrusions.

original_en_text: Sticky young fly, born and grown in service to the Slab.
original_zh_text: 自幼服务于罪石牢狱的黏腻幼蝇。
translated_text: 粘稠的年轻苍蝇出生和成长是为了服务于石板。
secondary_translated_text: Sticky young flies were born and raised to serve the slate.

original_en_text: This mindless bug seems to sense only through its tendrils, yet despite that simplicity it still poses a serious threat.
original_zh_text: 虽只能凭借触须感知外界，这种虫子仍可以构成极大的威胁。
translated_text: 这种没有大脑的昆虫似乎只能通过它的卷须来感知，但尽管它很简单，它仍然构成了严重的威胁。
secondary_translated_text: The brainless insect seems to be perceived only through its tendrils, but despite its simplicity, it still poses a serious threat.

original_en_text: Basic bug of Pharloom, laid low upon the ground.
translated_text: 法鲁的基本昆虫是低伏在地面上的。
secondary_translated_text: Faro's basic insects lie low on the ground.

original_en_text: I am fond of simple, effective traps such as this bug’s extendable spikes. An unwary predator would be skewered clean through.
original_zh_text: 我很欣赏它这一招，简单有效。莽撞的捕食者肯定会被它的背刺一击穿透。
translated_text: 我喜欢简单有效的陷阱，比如这个错误的可延伸尖刺。无意中的捕食者可能会被刺穿。
secondary_translated_text: I like simple and effective traps, such as this wrong extendable spike. Unintentional predators can be impaled.

original_en_text: Short pilgrim that uses their long horn to launch upon threats.
original_zh_text: 用长角将自己弹射向敌人的矮小朝圣者。
translated_text: 矮个子朝圣者用他的长角威胁。
secondary_translated_text: The short pilgrim threatened with his long horn.

original_en_text: Thick-set bug consumed by haunted thread. Uses their solid frame to crush others.
original_zh_text: 被诅咒之丝缠裹的壮硕老者，用沉重甲壳碾压敌人。
translated_text: 厚集错误被闹鬼线程消耗。用你强壮的身体碾压别人。
secondary_translated_text: Thick set errors are consumed by haunted threads. Use your strong body to crush others.

original_en_text: Fur covered crawler with a series of sharp spikes along its back.
translated_text: 这种皮毛覆盖的爬行动物的背部有一系列锋利的尖刺。
secondary_translated_text: The fur-covered reptile has a series of sharp spikes on its back.

original_en_text: Burrowing worm that uses its many blunted teeth to dig through even the hardest bone.
original_zh_text: 拥有密集钝齿的穴居虫类，极其坚硬的骨质层也能被它们钻透。
translated_text: 穴居蠕虫有许多钝齿，甚至可以刺穿最硬的骨头。
secondary_translated_text: Burrowing worms have many blunt teeth that can pierce even the hardest bones.

original_en_text: With this one vanquished, I hope to have sped the end for that jail and its distasteful order.
original_zh_text: 击败她或将加速那座监狱与其恶心秩序的终结。
translated_text: 通过这次失败，我希望加快监狱及其令人厌恶的秩序的终结。
secondary_translated_text: Through this failure, I hope to speed up the end of prisons and their disgusting order.

original_en_text: Gelatinous coral drifter of simple mind and placid demeanour.
original_zh_text: 思维简单的凝胶状珊瑚生物，性情温和。
translated_text: 胶质珊瑚，心态单纯，神态平和。
secondary_translated_text: Gelatin coral has a simple mentality and a peaceful expression.

original_en_text: Totem and god, built and worshipped by the Burning Bugs.
original_zh_text: 焚身信徒建造并敬奉的图腾神像。
translated_text: 图腾和神，由燃烧的蠕虫建造和崇拜。
secondary_translated_text: Totems and gods, built and worshipped by burning worms.

original_en_text: Skittish scrambler of the Far Fields. Its antennae resemble stalks of grass to aid in camouflage.
original_zh_text: 远野地区极易受惊的爬虫，触须能够伪装成草茎。
translated_text: 一个狡猾的干扰者在远处。它的触手类似于草茎，以帮助伪装。
secondary_translated_text: A cunning disruptor is in the distance. Its tentacles resemble grass stems to help camouflage.

original_en_text: Infant fly, freshly hatched. At this age the soft, blind fly is little more than a bother.
original_zh_text: 刚破卵的盲眼软体幼蝇，不过是些烦扰的小东西。
translated_text: 年轻的苍蝇，刚刚孵化。在这个年纪，柔软、盲目的苍蝇只不过是一种麻烦。
secondary_translated_text: Young flies, just hatched. At this age, soft, blind flies are nothing more than a nuisance.

original_en_text: Tall creature with sharp senses. Defends its herd with powerful legs and a sharp-tipped mask.
original_zh_text: 感官敏锐的生物，以尖角面甲与强健后肢守护族群。
translated_text: 一个高大的，性感的生物。用强壮的腿和锋利的面具保护牛群。
secondary_translated_text: A tall, sexy creature. Protect the herd with strong legs and sharp masks.

original_en_text: Cruel physician of Whiteward, responsible for operations and modifications on the Citadel’s bugs.
original_zh_text: 白愈厅的残酷医者，负责对圣堡甲虫实施手术与改造。
translated_text: 怀特沃德残酷的医生负责堡虫的操作和改造。
secondary_translated_text: Whiteward's cruel doctor was responsible for the operation and transformation of the castle worm.

original_en_text: The huge Judge likely stood through countless generations, never defeated, never wavering in their charge.
original_zh_text: 这庞然裁决者已矗立无数世代，未尝败绩，坚守职责从未动摇。
translated_text: 这位伟大的法官可能经历了无数代，从未被击败，从未动摇过自己的职责。
secondary_translated_text: This great judge may have lived through countless generations, never been defeated, never wavered in his duties.

original_en_text: These bugs look to have spent every waking moment at their work. Grim, endless labour in service of the unseen Citadel above.
original_zh_text: 这些虫子似乎将全部生命投入劳作。为自己从未见过的圣堡执行着阴郁无边的苦役。
translated_text: 这些虫子似乎醒着的每一刻都在工作。残酷、无休止的劳动服务于上面的隐形城堡。
secondary_translated_text: These insects seem to be working every moment of their waking hours. Cruel, endless labor serves the invisible castle above.

original_en_text: Despite the Haunting of its shell, it has not been overcome with aggression. Its desire to flee remains too strong.
original_zh_text: 即使甲壳被丝咒侵蚀，其强烈的逃生本能依然压制住了被赋予的攻击性。
translated_text: 尽管它的外壳令人难忘，但它并没有被侵略征服。它的逃跑欲望仍然太强烈了。
secondary_translated_text: Despite its unforgettable shell, it was not conquered by aggression. Its desire to escape is still too strong.

original_en_text: Coral hulk with a dense shell, bred to immense size by the Citadel’s Memorium.
original_zh_text: 被圣堡忆廊催生至庞然体型的珊瑚厚甲虫。
translated_text: 珊瑚遗骸，贝壳密集，被城堡纪念馆培育成巨大的珊瑚。
secondary_translated_text: Coral remains, densely packed with shells, were cultivated into huge corals by the Castle Memorial Hall.

original_en_text: Sturdy bug lost to the Haunting. Rolls at threats with no care for its own discomfort.
original_zh_text: 被丝咒侵蚀的健壮虫子。滚动碾压构成威胁的一切，无视自身痛楚。
translated_text: 强大的虫子输给了闹鬼的虫子。当面临威胁时，不要关心自己的不适。
secondary_translated_text: The powerful bug loses out to the haunted bug. When faced with threats, don't worry about your discomfort.

original_en_text: Tiny empty creature, barely a bug. Swallows its prey whole and sucks their nutrients until nothing remains.
original_zh_text: 微型的虚无生物，几乎算不上是虫子。吞噬猎物至渣滓都不剩。
translated_text: 这个空心小生物勉强算不上虫子。将猎物整个吞下并吸收它们的营养，直到什么都不剩下。
secondary_translated_text: This little hollow creature is barely a bug. Swallow the prey whole and absorb their nutrients until there is nothing left.

original_en_text: Quite a beautiful creature. In my own kingdom’s court, it would have been highly favoured as an ornamental pet.
original_zh_text: 如此美丽的生物。若在我故国的宫廷，定会成为贵族追捧的装饰性宠物。
translated_text: 相当美丽的生物。在我自己王国的宫廷里，它作为观赏宠物会非常受欢迎。
secondary_translated_text: Quite beautiful creature. In the courts of my own kingdom, it would be very popular as a ornamental pet.

original_en_text: There is surprising strength hidden in their thin, elegant limbs. It would be a pleasure to ride upon it...
original_zh_text: 优雅纤细的后肢中蕴含强大的力量，若能驯服必是绝佳坐骑。
translated_text: 它们修长优雅的四肢中隐藏着惊人的力量。我很高兴能骑上它.
secondary_translated_text: Their long and elegant limbs hide amazing power. I'm so happy to ride it.

original_en_text: Whatever admiration I had for its fleecy down is spoilt by its disturbing mask... and its steely spines.
original_zh_text: 蓬松绒毛的吸引力被其阴森气质与钢刺彻底破坏。
translated_text: 我对它羽毛般的羽毛的钦佩被它令人不安的面具摧毁了……还有它的钢制脊柱。
secondary_translated_text: My admiration for its feather-like feathers was destroyed by its disturbing mask... and its steel spine.

original_en_text: Cymbal bearing worker of the Deep Docks. Pans the hauls of smokerock to find traces of more precious minerals.
original_zh_text: 深坞持钹工人，筛选烟岩中的珍贵矿物残渣。
translated_text: 深码头的钹工人。摇动烟熏岩石收获物，寻找更珍贵矿物质的痕迹。
secondary_translated_text: Cymbal workers at the deep dock. Shake smoked rock harvest to look for traces of more precious minerals.

original_en_text: Sticky mollusc that defends itself by spraying burning fluid from growths on its back.
original_zh_text: 通过背部凸起喷射燃烧体液的防御型软体生物。
translated_text: 粘稠的软体动物通过从背部喷洒燃烧的液体来保护自己。
secondary_translated_text: Sticky mollusks protect themselves by spraying burning liquid from their backs.

original_en_text: This one is pretty, but not as soft as first it seems. The plant it mimics is flaked and coarse, and the bug’s coat shares similar texture.
original_zh_text: 看似柔美实则粗粝，与其拟态植物的质感完全一致。
translated_text: 这很漂亮，但不像第一次看起来那么柔软。它模仿的植物是粗糙的，昆虫的皮毛也有类似的纹理。
secondary_translated_text: It's beautiful, but not as soft as it looked the first time. The plants it mimics are rough, and the fur of insects has similar textures.

original_en_text: Low level worker lost to Pharloom’s Haunting. Instinct keeps them at their task, though in much simpler fashion than before.
original_zh_text: 被丝咒侵蚀的低级劳工，仍凭本能重复着旧日工作。
translated_text: 低级工人因为法鲁的困扰而死亡。本能让他们能够完成任务，尽管方式比以前简单得多。
secondary_translated_text: Low-level workers died because of Faro's troubles. Instinct allows them to complete tasks, albeit in a much simpler way than before.

original_en_text: Something in their assault reminds me of my own skill, though their talents are born purely of instinct. My technique is formed from hard training.
original_zh_text: 攻击套路和我有几分相像。不过他们靠的是祖传本能，我则是勤学苦练。
translated_text: 他们的攻击让我想起了自己的技能，尽管他们的天赋纯粹是本能的。我的技能是通过艰苦训练形成的。
secondary_translated_text: Their attacks reminded me of my own skills, even though their talents were purely instinctive. My skills are developed through hard training.

original_en_text: Certain tools and skills can pierce its defences. I should adjust my strategy as needed.
original_zh_text: 正面硬撼绝非明智之举——只有特定的工具和技艺能撕开它的防御。
translated_text: 某些工具和技能可以突破它的防御。我应该根据需要调整我的策略。
secondary_translated_text: Certain tools and skills can break through its defenses. I should adjust my strategy as needed.

translated_text: 名誉扫地的厨师卢戈利

original_en_text: Bug charged to catch dregs of Silk that fall from the Citadel. Will attack with its staff if provoked.
original_zh_text: 专职收集圣堡掉落灵丝碎屑的劳工，受干扰时会挥杖攻击。
translated_text: 巴格负责捕捉从城堡上掉下来的丝绸残渣。如果被激怒了，他们就会和工作人员一起发起攻击。
secondary_translated_text: Bagh was responsible for catching silk residue that fell from the castle. If provoked, they will attack with staff.

original_en_text: Similar bugs would gnaw away at unguarded food supplies in my homeland. As a child, I would hunt them, eager to make use of myself and test my skills.
original_zh_text: 我的故土也有类似的飞虫，它们会啃食未加看守的食物补给。年少时我经常猎杀它们，既为守护食物也为试炼技艺。
translated_text: 这些虫子将侵蚀我国无人看守的粮食供应。小时候，我会追捕他们，渴望利用自己并测试我的技能。
secondary_translated_text: These insects will erode my country's unguarded food supply. As a child, I would hunt them down, eager to use myself and test my skills.

original_en_text: Automaton built in the shape of a scuttling bug. Its back contains retractable pins, intended to cut song cylinders free of any obstruction.
original_zh_text: 仿造爬虫外形的自动机，背部探针可切除阻塞音筒的障碍物。
translated_text: 这个机器人是以滑翔昆虫的形状建造的。它包含可伸缩的引脚上的背部，旨在削减歌曲管没有任何障碍。
secondary_translated_text: The robot is built in the shape of a gliding insect. It contains retractable pins on the back that are designed to cut the song tube without any obstacles.

original_en_text: Uses their steel-bristled pin to scrub the soot from vents and pipes.
original_zh_text: 以钢鬃尖刺清理管道煤灰的劳工。
translated_text: 用他们的钢发夹擦去通风口和管道上的灰尘。
secondary_translated_text: Use their steel hairpins to wipe dust off vents and pipes.

original_en_text: Huge, yet stealthy Skarr. An expert trapper and master of the undergrowth.
original_zh_text: 精通丛林陷阱的斯卡尔猎手，身形庞大却又善于潜行。
translated_text: 巨大但隐藏的骷髅。陷阱专家、丛林大师。
secondary_translated_text: Huge but hidden skeletons. Trap expert and jungle master.

original_en_text: Lashing fragments of pure darkness, shaped into sharpened tentacles.
original_zh_text: 由纯粹黑暗凝聚而成的尖锐触手。
translated_text: 鞭打纯粹的黑暗碎片形成锋利的触手。
secondary_translated_text: Whiplash pure dark fragments to form sharp tentacles.

original_en_text: Soft bug beneath a huge, horned skull. Charges at intruders to protect its territory and its smaller companions.
original_zh_text: 顶着怪兽头骨的软体虫，为保护地盘和自身柔软的内部，常对入侵者进行无差别冲锋。
translated_text: 头骨下有一条巨大的长角软虫。对入侵者的指控是为了保护他们的领土和他们较小的同伴。
secondary_translated_text: There is a huge long-horned soft worm under the skull. The charges against the invaders were to protect their territory and their smaller companions.

original_en_text: Common winged bug of the lowlands. Generally docile, but will attack if threats come close.
original_zh_text: 低地区域常见的温顺飞虫，不过被惹急了也会攻击来犯者。
translated_text: 低地常见的有翼昆虫。它们通常很温顺，但如果威胁逼近，就会发起攻击。
secondary_translated_text: Common winged insect in lowlands. They are usually docile, but attack if a threat approaches.

original_en_text: Foul creatures birthed into servitude. Their plight elicits no sympathy from me.
original_zh_text: 这些可悲的生物从蛹中钻出的瞬间，就被烙上了终生奴役的印记——但它们啃噬死囚腐肉时发出的欢快嗡鸣，实在让人难以怜悯。
translated_text: 肮脏的生物生来就是奴隶。他们的困境并没有引起我的同情。
secondary_translated_text: Dirty creatures are born slaves. Their plight did not arouse my sympathy.

original_en_text: The Haunting has stolen some important part of these bugs, yet still they attempt their former task. Until, that is, they sense my presence...
original_zh_text: 它们机械地重复着筛矿动作，直到感应到活物气息——那一刻，铜钹便化作呼啸的断头刃。
translated_text: Haunted窃取了这些错误的重要部分，但它们仍然尝试之前的任务。直到，换句话说，他们感觉到我的存在……
secondary_translated_text: Haunted stole important parts of these errors, but they still tried previous tasks. Until, in other words, they felt my presence...

original_en_text: Mutated young worm infected with Plasmium. The new form displays potent regenerative skill.
original_zh_text: 受生质液感染而变异的蠕虫幼体。其新形态展现出强大的再生能力。
translated_text: 感染疟原虫的突变幼虫。新形态显示出强大的再生技能。
secondary_translated_text: Mutant larvae infected with Plasmodium. The new form shows powerful regenerative skills.

original_en_text: Its core is filled with fine mechanisms, but that alone should not produce such a convincing mimic of life. Silk must also be used to animate this artifice, though exactly how I am not sure.
original_zh_text: 当灵丝顺着齿轮缝隙游走时，这台机器竟发出类似心跳的震颤——圣堡匠人究竟将多少生命奥秘编织进了这些钢铁躯壳？
translated_text: 它的核心充满了复杂的机制，但仅此一点不应该生产出如此令人信服的生命模拟器。丝绸也必须用来活跃这种技术，但我不确定如何使用它。
secondary_translated_text: Its core is full of complex mechanisms, but this alone should not produce such a convincing life simulator. Silk must also be used to activate this technology, but I am not sure how to use it.

original_en_text: Its shell gives it the advantage of surprise, but also forces it into a slender, brittle shape that cannot withstand a heavy attack.
original_zh_text: 拟态外壳带来突袭优势，但纤细脆弱的体型难以承受重击。
translated_text: 它的外壳赋予了它意想不到的优势，但也迫使它变成了细长、脆弱的形状，无法承受猛烈的攻击。
secondary_translated_text: Its outer shell gives it unexpected advantages, but also forces it into a slender, fragile shape that cannot withstand fierce attack.

original_en_text: Predatory plant with a powerful jaw shaped to resemble a lily pad.
original_zh_text: 伪装成睡莲的捕食性植物，拥有强有力的颚部。
translated_text: 捕食性植物，下巴强壮，形状像睡莲。
secondary_translated_text: Predatory plant with a strong jaw and shaped like a water lily.

original_en_text: Airborne pest, less common than its grounded siblings. Attacks with sharp fangs if agitated.
original_zh_text: 其陆行同类的飞行变种，较为稀少。受到刺激时会使用利齿攻击。
translated_text: 空气传播的害虫比地面上的类似害虫不常见。如果你兴奋，你就会用锋利的牙齿攻击。
secondary_translated_text: Airborne pests are less common than similar pests on the ground. If you are excited, you attack with sharp teeth.

original_en_text: The souls of so many bugs, obsessed with Silk, consumed by it. Their pain shall forever remain in that pit. Even I do not possess strength enough to cleanse it.
original_zh_text: 无数沉溺灵丝终被吞噬的灵魂，其苦痛将永远禁锢在这坑里。纵使是我也无力净化。
translated_text: 那么多昆虫的灵魂痴迷于丝绸，被丝绸吞噬，它们的痛苦将永远留在那个坑里。即使是我也没有足够的力量来净化它。
secondary_translated_text: The souls of so many insects are obsessed with silk and swallowed by it, and their pain will remain in that pit forever. Even I don't have enough power to purify it.

original_en_text: Silk-spun child possessed by the void.
original_zh_text: 被虚空侵蚀的灵丝造物。
translated_text: 被虚空附身的纺纱孩子。
secondary_translated_text: Spinning children possessed by the void.

original_en_text: Shell-plated worm found only in the deepest depths. Seems to survive despite consuming no food or liquid.
original_zh_text: 仅存于最深处的甲壳蠕虫，无需进食或饮水仍能存活。
translated_text: 带壳的蠕虫只能在最深的深处找到。尽管他不吃食物或液体，但他似乎活了下来。
secondary_translated_text: Worms with shells can only be found in the deepest depths. Although he did not eat food or liquids, he seemed to survive.

original_en_text: Trap setting bug carrying a pouch of sharpened long-stakes.
original_zh_text: 携带尖锐长木桩布置陷阱的虫子。
translated_text: 设置陷阱的虫子携带着一袋锋利的长桩。
secondary_translated_text: The bug setting the trap carried a bag of sharp long piles.

original_en_text: Aged female mite, grown larger and stronger than most of its kin.
original_zh_text: 年迈的雌性螨虫，体型力量都远超同类。
translated_text: 年老的雌螨比大多数同类长得更大更强壮。
secondary_translated_text: Older female mites grow bigger and stronger than most of their own species.

original_en_text: Mass of old masks swollen and animated by writhing void.
original_zh_text: 由纠缠的虚空驱动而膨胀、复活的一团古老面甲。
translated_text: 大量旧口罩因蠕动的空隙而肿胀活跃。
secondary_translated_text: A large number of old masks are swollen and active due to the squirming gaps.

original_en_text: Pernicious looter found all over Pharloom.
original_zh_text: 在纺络全境四处劫掠的卑劣盗虫。
translated_text: 法鲁到处都是恶毒的抢劫者。
secondary_translated_text: Faro is full of vicious looters.

original_en_text: Small bug, shackled and cowled for sin committed within the Citadel.
original_zh_text: 戴着镣铐，被蒙住头部的圣堡罪徒。
translated_text: 小虫子因在城堡里犯下的罪行而被戴上脚镣和头巾。
secondary_translated_text: The little bug was put in leg shackles and a turban for crimes committed in the castle.

original_en_text: Flighty insect that lives beside still waters.
original_zh_text: 栖息静水边的敏感飞虫。
translated_text: 一种生活在静水旁边的轻浮昆虫。
secondary_translated_text: A frivolous insect that lives next to still water.

original_en_text: Its form is certainly based on bugs found outside the Citadel. In my own craftwork, I too often look to nature for inspiration.
original_zh_text: 那对仿生复眼能精准识别音筒纹路，探针起舞时溅起的火花，竟在钢壁上刻出类似灵丝符文的痕迹。
translated_text: 它的形式当然是基于城堡外发现的错误。在我自己的创作中，我经常从大自然中寻找灵感。
secondary_translated_text: Its form is of course based on errors discovered outside the castle. In my own creations, I often look for inspiration from nature.

original_en_text: Birth equipped this one well. In its assault it becomes its own projectile.
original_zh_text: 它们生来就是活体投掷物——将整个身躯化作飞矛，用长角贯穿目标。
translated_text: 出生让这个人很好地装备了。在攻击中，它成为自己的投射物。
secondary_translated_text: Birth makes this person well equipped. In an attack, it becomes its own projectile.

original_en_text: Their heavier bells armour them well against my strikes, but against that oppressive heat... can they help at all?
original_zh_text: 它们厚重的钟甲可以抵挡我的针刃，但在酷热环境中恐怕难有作为。
translated_text: 它们更重的钟声可以很好地保护它们免受我的打击，但也可以抵御闷热的天气。他们能帮忙吗？
secondary_translated_text: Their heavier bells protect them well from my blows, but they also protect them from the sultry weather. Can they help?

original_en_text: A rare built bug within these ailing lands. Most pilgrims’ shells seem small by comparison. What nourishment did they discover to grow so large?
original_zh_text: 在纺络这片病恹恹的土地上，这般体型的虫子实属罕见。与它们相比，其他朝圣者的外壳简直孱弱如卵。它们究竟吞食了什么，才能膨胀至此等体型？
translated_text: 在这些病态的土地上，这是一种罕见的昆虫。相比之下，大多数朝圣者的贝壳似乎很小。他们发现了哪些营养物质使其如此之大？
secondary_translated_text: In these sick lands, this is a rare insect. In contrast, the shells of most pilgrims seem small. What nutrients did they find make it so big?

original_en_text: With a softer shell than most, they would have relied on their athleticism to survive.
original_zh_text: 甲壳柔软脆弱，全靠昔日矫健的身手生存。
translated_text: 由于它们的外壳比大多数人都软，因此它们只能依靠运动能力生存。
secondary_translated_text: Because their shells are softer than most people, they can only survive on their ability to exercise.

original_en_text: Common crawler that lives beneath sand.
translated_text: 一种生活在沙子下的常见爬行动物。
secondary_translated_text: A common reptile that lives under the sand.

original_en_text: Silk and shells corrupted. That void seeks now to claim this land whole. These poor shells are only the beginning.
original_zh_text: 灵丝与甲壳皆遭腐蚀，虚空正逐步蚕食这地界，这些可怜的甲壳不过是开端。
translated_text: 丝绸和贝壳被腐蚀。这个空白现在正试图占领这片土地。这些可怜的贝壳只是开始。
secondary_translated_text: Silk and shells are corroded. This void is now trying to occupy the land. These poor shells are just the beginning.

original_en_text: Screeching scavenger that roosts high in caverns and preys on passing pilgrims.
original_zh_text: 盘踞洞顶的食腐飞虫，惯用群体战术袭击朝圣者。
translated_text: 尖叫的食腐动物栖息在洞穴中，捕食路过的朝圣者。
secondary_translated_text: Screaming scavengers inhabit caves, preying on passing pilgrims.

original_en_text: Insect formed to imitate a branch, capable of remaining perfectly still for long periods, but unexpectedly swift when roused.
original_zh_text: 能长期静止拟态成树枝，受惊时发动闪电突袭。
translated_text: 模仿树枝的昆虫可以在很长一段时间内保持完全静止，但会出人意料地很快被唤醒。
secondary_translated_text: Insects that mimic branches can remain completely still for long periods of time, but can be awakened surprisingly quickly.

original_en_text: This larger form carries so much weight it can barely move from its place.
original_zh_text: 庞大身躯使其几乎无法离开原位。
translated_text: 这个更大的形式承载着如此大的重量，以至于它几乎无法离开它的位置。
secondary_translated_text: This larger form carries so much weight that it can hardly leave its place.

original_en_text: Small construct built by Weavers past, brought to life through Silk runes threaded within.
original_zh_text: 远古织者铸造的小型装置，通过灵丝符文赋予生命。
translated_text: 韦弗过去建造的小结构通过里面佩戴的丝绸符文而栩栩如生。
secondary_translated_text: Weaver's small structures in the past are brought to life through the silk runes worn inside.

original_en_text: The less these gruesome bugs breed, the better.
original_zh_text: 这种烦扰的虫子繁殖得越少越好。
translated_text: 这些可怕的虫子繁殖得越少越好。
secondary_translated_text: The less these terrible bugs reproduce, the better.

original_en_text: Gilded servant of the Whispering Vaults, born to read and recall the near endless scrolls of prayer.
original_zh_text: 低语书库的金袍仆从，专司诵读那些浩繁无尽的经文。
translated_text: 那些在金库低语的镀金仆人生来就是为了阅读和回忆无尽的祈祷卷轴。
secondary_translated_text: Those gilded servants whispering in the vault were born to read and recall endless prayer scrolls.

original_en_text: I cannot decipher its function to the greater Core. Is it built for defence? If so, its passivity seems far from optimal.
original_zh_text: 这些悬浮铁球会在入侵者靠近时突然爆开尖刺，但过于迟缓的反应速度，让它们更像布满锈迹的装饰品。
translated_text: 我无法破译它对更大核心的影响。它是为了防御而建造的吗？如果是这样，它的被动性似乎远非最佳。
secondary_translated_text: I cannot decipher its impact on the larger core. Was it built for defense? If so, its passivity seems far from optimal.

original_en_text: If not for the spikes, I would think it an appealing bug.
original_zh_text: 若没有尖刺，我会觉得它笨拙可爱。
translated_text: 如果不是Pinpoint，我会认为这是一个有吸引力的错误。
secondary_translated_text: If it wasn't for Pinpoint, I would have thought it was an attractive mistake.

original_en_text: Hovering pest with a hollowed proboscis able to spit gobs of sizzling bile.
original_zh_text: 通过中空口器喷射胆汁的悬浮虫。
